text: Hakunvueye di dianyi, yeye wakashiya tshivualu tshiandi kundi, wakanyema, wakahatuka
Nahô wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi abidi ne tshitema, wakalela Tela

Bakalua ne bana balume ba Alona; Mose wakateka mashi ku nsongo ya matshu abo ya ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku biala biabo bia ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku bana banene babo ba ku makasa a balume, Mose wakantumina mashi ku tshioshelu
Bantu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Rubene, nebase mitanda yabu ku tshisumbu ku tshisumbu, luseke lua kuinshi kua nzubu wa tshijila, muaba udi dibendela diabu
Pashishe mutuangaji neabuele mu nzubu bua kukenketa mushindu udi ditoba
Kanuenji bu munudi nuenza kunoko lelu, benza muntu yonso anu malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuandi; bualu bua kanuena banze kubuela mu dikisha ne buhianyi bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Yeye wakatuma Yuda ku mpala kuandi kudi Yosefe bua kumulesheye nshila wa ku Goshene, bakalua mu buloba bua Goshene
Dibadika dia kumpala dia bena Levi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe mu tshipela tshia Sinayi ne: Ubadike bantu balume bonsu ba bena Levi
Bantu bakimana kule, ne Mose wakalua hehi ne difutu difike hakadi Nzambi
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ndi mpueka musokome mu divuba bua kuyukila nebe, bua, padi bantu bumvue mutudi tuyukila nebe, bakuitabe
To ne hashika tshiji tshia muan enu kudi, ne hahueye bualu buwakamuenzela muoyo, hashishe nenkutumine di nenkubikile, nennujimishile bubidi buenu dituku dimue bualu kai
Palô wakanyunguluka, wakaya mu nsubu wandi, kakateka bualu ebu mu mutshima wandi
Maweja Nangila ne: Meme musangane bantu bakane makumi abidi, tshiakubutula tshimenga
Wambile bantu ne, Nudijidile bua makelela, nenudie munyinyi, bualu bua nuenu nuakudila mu matshu a Yehowa ne, Udi utudisha munyinyi nganyi
Lekelayi kupampakana, bualu Maweja Nangila nealuangane mvita eyi pa mutu penu
Badi Butamba Bena Isalele Bukole ku Homa Dut
Dutelonone Binuatangila nansha ngombe nansha mukoko bia mukuenu bihambuka, kusokoki bualu ebu kudiye, kadi ubihingashe kudi mukuenu
Arone ne bana bende ba balume kutentekabu bianza pa mutu wa tshimpanga atshi
Numulombe: alekele kulokesha mvula wa makubakuba ne mabue, bualu mbimane kuntonda
Kadi benji ba bilengulengu ba bena Ejipitu kuenza tshishima atshi, ne majimbu abu
Kanungu ka Too ne pikalabo bateeka Kabadi ka bulongolodi bwa midimu ya Mbulamatadi, Kabadi ka kabwendela kadi ne makookeshi adibo bateekela Kabadi ka Mbulamatadi ka kabwendela
Bualu Mvidi Mukulu uvua mumanye ne: pikale mvita mijuke, nebatshine, bapingane kabidi mu Ejipitu
Mu dekele mushintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, udi uteeka bantu ku midimu ya basivile ne ya basalâyi idi kayiyi ku bukookeshi bwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga

Eu udi mukenji wa disama dia nsudi dia mu tshilulu anyi dia mu nsubu, ne wa tshiuja kabidi anyi wa tshilamulamu anyi wa ditoba ditoke, bua kubalesha hadi bintu kabiyi biakane ne hadibi biakane eu udi mukenji wa disama dia nsudi
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu umona ne: mvula wakamuki, kabidi makubakuba ne mabue a mvula biajiki, kutungunukaye amu ne tshilema tshiende
Muakuidi neangate tshisaka mu bianza bienu, neatshiteke hanshi ku mpala kua tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita, muntu udibo bânji kulama mu tshimana badi ne tshia kumulekela anyi kumwambika kudi bumfumu bukoshi bwa nsambu budi ne bukookeshi abu
Nzambi wakidika munya ne, Munya, wakidika mîdima ne Butuku Dinda ne dilolo biakadi dituku dia kumudilu
Genese Nzambi Udi Ubikila Abalama Yehowa wakambila Abalama ne, Umuka mu musoko webe ne kudi bana benu ne ku nsubu wa tatu ebe, ya biebe mu muaba undualua kukulesha
Balombodi kuzakala bikole

Yosefe wakambila bana babo ne, Nfuafua, kadi Nzambi neikale n enu, neanumushe mu buloba ebu, neanuhingashe ku buloba buakalayeye Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba Yosefe wakatshihisha bana ba Isalele wakabambila ne, Nzambi neikale n enu, ne nuenu nenuye ne mifuba yanyi
Wakananukila kumusengelela ne yeye wakângata
Bena Isalele bakenza nunku, mu malu onso akambila Yehowa Mose, nunku bakashikama ku mabendele abo, ne bakaya ku mpala ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo
Bena Ejipitu kubalondakaja ne tubalu tua mukalenga wabu, matempu, ne bavua babanda pa tubalu
Kufundabu ku muntu ku muntu, bilondeshile meku ne bisamba biabu, bantu balume bonsu bavua ne bidimu makumi abidi ne pa mutu
Seluga wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu, wakalela Nahô
Matuku makuabu divuba divua dishale muaba umue amu butuku bumue, nansha dituku dimue ne butuku bumue

Nansha nanku, tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa tshidi mwa kupeesha Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa bukookeshi, biumukila ku dîyi, bwa kweela mêyi pa mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene
Ku nyama yonsu ya mu mayi, nudi mua kudia amu idi ne mamba ne misalala
Mei onso akaluhuka mukana muena nuenze bu munuakuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, binuakumulaya mukana muenu
Anu bana benu bena Levi nkayabu ke badi mua kunuambuluisha ku midimu yonsu ya mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Nuambile bena Izrayele bonsu ne: Dituku dia dikumi dia ngondu ewu, nusungule muana wa mukoku nansha muana wa mbuji ku diku dionsu nansha ku nzubu yonsu
Yeye wakadi wambila Yosefe bualu ebu ku dituku ku dituku, kadi yeye kakamunvuila bua kulaleye n andi, anyi bua kushala n andi
Enza tshiamu tshilukibue bu munyingu ne nkanu mai ya tshiamu tshia mitaku ku matumba atshi anai

Nomba Mikenji ya Bunazi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Biatshiha nansha mulume nansha mukashi kuditshiha kua Munazi bua kudijidila kudi Yehowa, neajile muoyo ne maluvu makole kanu vinaigre wa nvinyo anyi vinaigre wa maluvu makole, kanu mai a tumuma tukese, kadi tumuma tubishe anyi tumuma tûme
Kadi Yakoba kakatuma Benyamina, muakunyi wa Yosefe, ne bana babo, wakamba ne, Bumue bualu bubi nebumukuate
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua bana bebe tô mu bikondo biabo bionso udi ne tshilema kena mua kulua ha buihi bua kufileye milambu kudi Nzambi wandi
Ke mundi nnuteta, bua meme kujadika ne: bena Izrayele nebitabe mikenji yanyi anyi

Genese Bana Babo ne Yosefe Badi Balua mu Ejipitu bua Kusumba bia Kudia Hakamanya Yakoba ne, Bintu bia kudia biakashala mu Ejipitu, yeye wakambila bana bandi balume ne, Nudi batangilangana muaku bua tshinyi
Batangidi ba mudimu awu, kubambika bena Izrayele bua benze madiotu anu bungi bua tshibidilu, muvuabu benza matuku onsu pavuabu babapesha bisosa
Bantu bakafua ku disama adi bakadi binunu makumi abidi ne binai
Muan a Ngombe wa Or Dut
Nanku kabavua mua kuenza tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila to

Yeye nealengeshe nsubu ne mashi a nyunyu ne mai adi ahueka ne nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo ne mitshi ya cêdre ne mabeshi a hisopa ne bintu bikunze, kadi yeye nealekele nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo mu tshisuku ku butshika bua musoko, nealengeshe nsubu nunku, ne nsubu neikale muakane
Kabaki mukashi wa mu lufuila anyi mukashi wakahidiabo kudi mulume wandi anyi mukashi udi munyanga anyi mukashi wa masandi, yeye neabake mukashi utshidi kamama wa munkatshi mua bana babo
Bialala handi mulume ne biamumatshila katshetshi, yeye neikale ne bukoya tô matuku muanda mutekete, bulalu buonso budiye ulala nebuikale ne bukoya
Kadi nyama yonsu ya mu mayi idi kayiyi ne mamba ne misalala, idi ne mikiya
Moshe kubabadika muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Isaka wakahuola muoyo Wandi, wakafua, wakaya kudi bankambua bandi, wakadi muntu mununu wa bidimu bia bungi Esau ne Yakoba, bana bandi ba balume, bakamujika
Yeye wakamuandamuna dî ne, Ndi munyeme ku mesu kua mukelenge wanyi mukashi Salai
Muenyi kena mua kudia tshintu tshia tshijila, nansha muenyi wa muakuidi nansha muena mudimu kabena mua kudia tshintu tshia tshijila
Ke matandu kujuka pankatshi pa balami ba bimuna bia Abrame ne balami ba bia Lote
Mabue au akadi menza kudi Nzambi, ne mei akadi mafunda kudi Nzambi, mafunda ha mabue au

Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza, ne mu kukumbasha kua bana ne mu kukumbasha kua bimuna bienu ne mu bintu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba; bualu bua Yehowa neikale ne disanka bualu buenu, bu muakasankeye bualu bua batatu benu; binuatumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kuenza mikenji yandi ne mei andi bidi bifunda mu mukanda eu wa mikenji: binuakudimuka kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso
Nubivuluke, nubilondele bana benu ne bikulu benu
Mose ne Eleazâ bakenza muakambila Yehowa Mose
Umubikile ne: Sara

Nushikame ku butshika bua tshitudilu matuku muanda mutekete, muntu yonso wakashiha mundi mukuabo, anyi wakalenga muntu mufue tshianza, adilengeshe ku dituku disatu ne dituku dia muanda mutekete ne nuenu ne bantu banuakukuata
Ya biebe ku tshisumbu tshia mbushi, Ulue kundi ne nku ngulu ya mbushi ibidi idi mimpe, nendambile tatu webe munyinyi muimpe wa dihembu udiye musue
Meku onso a Bena Shuhama, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi asambombo ne binai ne nkama mai
Kumusuikaye muana panyima, umuambe ne: Ndaku
Kanungu ka Dikumbaja dia ndongamu wa midimu ya lupetu didi ditwadija mu dia kumpala dia tshiongu ne didi dijika mu dia dia tshiswa munene
Pambaleja butumbi buanyi nanku, bena Ejipitu nebajadike ne: meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Bintu bionso bidibo balela, ne bia bantu ne bia nyama idibo bafila kudi Yehowa, nebikale biebe, kadi wewe neuhikule ban a bute ba bantu ne ban a bute bonso ba nyama idi kayiyi miakane

Mu bidimu bisambombo nukune bintu mu buloba, nuhuole bintu bidi bikumbana, kadi tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete nushiye buloba bua kututuka ne bualu bua bantu bahele ba munkatshi muenu badie bintu, ne bintu bidibo bashiye, nyama ya mu mpata neyibidie

Yeye wakadi ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ, bana balume ba Alona bakadi bashala, tshiji, wakamba ne, Bualu kai nuenu kanuena banze kudia mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ntshintu tshia tshijila, tshiakanuha Yehowa bua kumusha n atshi bubi bua bantu ne bua kubabuikidila n atshi bubi buabo ku mesu kua Yehowa
Mutshima wa Palo wakakoleshibua, yeye kakabunvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Helabo mpungi, bantu bonso nebadisangishe kûb ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Diba dia luendu, anu Arone ne bana bende ba balume bamane kubuikila bintu bia tshijila, ke bena Kekate kushisha kuambula bintu bia tshijila abi bua kuya nabi
Lea wakamba ne, Dikasa dimpe
Wewe neuwelehu manyi ne musenga wa manananshi tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia mulambu wa bukula

Kana wakambila Yehowa ne, Dikenga dianyi didi dintamba bukole Mona, wewe wakungihata lelu ha buloba, nengikale musokome ku mesu kuebe, nengikale munyemi ne muena tshiendenda ha buloba, ne hashishe yonso wansangana neanshihe
Nenufile mpumbu wa mbushi umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne bana balume ba mikoko babidi ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala
Kanuenji bubi hanualumbulula bilumbu, anyi hanuidikisha bule bua bintu anyi bujitu buabi anyi bungi buabi
Nulame tshimuna atshi too ne ku dituku dia dikumi ne dinayi dia ngondu ewu
Kanungu ka Mêyi a maalu a mpetu adi aleeja makookeshi ne majitu a Mbulamatadi
Mvidi Mukulu kuakula, wamba ne: Meme ndi Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu webe, uvua mukupatule mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, muvuabu bakukuate ku bupika
Kubambilaye ne: Kanuteki madilu to
Mose wakambila Alona mei onso akamuambila Yehowa ne bimanyinu bionso biakamuheye
Wangate mulangala eu mu tshianza tshiebe, ûdi wenza n au bimanyinu ebi
Maweja Nangila kumukonka ne: Tshiji ntshia tshinyi

Efelona wakadi ushikama munkatshi mua bana ba Hete, ne Efelona, Muena Hiti wakambila Abalahama ku mpala kua bana ba Hete bonso mene bakadi babuela mu musoko wandi ne, Nansha, mukelenge, ungunvuile nenkuhe budimi ne lubuebue bidimu, nenkuhebi ku mpala kua bana ba bantu banyi, ujikemu tshitalu etshi
Kutuadilaye Abrame mampa ne maluvu
Yeye wakamba ne, Ungambila difutu diebe, nenkufutedi
Suliele, muana mulume wa Abihayila, neikale mukelenge wa nsubu wa batatu ba meku a Melali bobo nebashikame ku luseke lua nsubu wa tshitendelelu lua ku nôde
Mulau wa Nkusu Yehowa wakela dî kudi Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Olola mulangala webe, ukume dinfuenkenya dia buloba, dinfuenkenya nedikudunuke nkusu ya mu mitu mu buloba buonso bua Ejipitu
Ditutu diakabuikila nsubu matuku onso, diakakenka bu kahia butuku
Mose wakambila Alona ne bana bandi balume ne Bena Isalele bonso nunku
tulasa twa bâna bateketa, tupwekela, tubandila, twa midimu ya bianza ne twa nsungansunga pamwe ne twa bakulumpa tulongayi bilondeshila mêyi mafila kudi bukalenga bunene;
Kadi numanye ne: Kanuena mua kudia mashi a nyama to
Kanuvua bitabe bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila munuambile to
Padi muntu mulume nansha mukaji muikale ne makeji matokoloke pambidi, mutuangaji neamukenkete

Hashika matuku a kudilengesha kuandi, nansha matuku a muana wa balume nansha a muana wa bakashi, yeye nealue ne muana wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mputu nyunyu anyi nyunyu wa nkutshi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, kudi muakuidi, ne yeye neayifile ku mpala kua Yehowa, bua kumubuikidila n au bubi; yeye neikale mulengeshibue kudi mashi andi
Yeye wakamba ne, Ndi bianyi muhika wa Abalahama
Bena Isalele, nuenu nudi ne disanka, banganyi badi bu nuenu basungidibue kudi Yehowa
Mose wakabala ban a bute bonso ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bu muakamuambila Yehowa
Bu bungi bua milambu mudi nu fila nenulongolole bintu ebi
Yehowa wakamona ne, Mibi ya bantu idi idiundadiunda munkatshi mua ba ha buloba ne meji adibo bela mu mitshima yabo adi mabi matuku onso
Maweja Nangila udi unyoka bantu bende Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Bantu babi aba nebangele mpata kashidi anyi

Eu udi mukenji wa mukau hasesuka mukashi bua kulala ne mundi udi kayi mulume wandi ne yeye udi muonyibue, anyi hakuata mulume mukau bualu bua mukashi wandi, nunku yeye neashikike mukashi ku mpala kua Yehowa, hashishe muakuidi neashikishe mukenji eu wonso kudi mukashi
Bana balume ba Yosefe ku meku abo, Manashe ne Efelayima
Bobo kabena bikala mu buloba buebe bualu bua bobo nebakuenzeshe bua kungenzela malu mabi, biwatendelela nzambi yabo, bualu ebu nebuikale buteyi kûdi

Mose wakabambila ne, Hafika bidimu muanda mutekete, mu tshikondo tshidibo bahingashangana bintu, hadiabo bidia bia disanka dia bitandatanda, halua Bena Isalele bonso ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu muaba udiye usungula, hashishe nenubadile Bena Isalele bonso mikenji ei mu matshu abo
Ke pamvua mumusele nanku
Ke muaba uvua Maweja Nangila mupeshe bena Izrayele meyi ne mikenji biende, mubatete kabidi
Abrahame ne muanende wa balume Ismayele kubatekabu panshi dituku dimue
Bimuna bia bena Ejipitu kufua bionsu
Pashishe mutuangaji neangate nyunyi udi mushale ne muoyi, mitshi ya sedre, bilamba bienza ne miosa ya nyama bilaba kakula, ne mabeji a mutshi wa isope

Biwatutuma ne muan etu, netuye, ne tukusumbile bia kudia, kadi biwahidia kututuma n andi, katuena tuyaku, bualu bua mulume au waka tuambila ne, Kanuena nuntangila ku mesu, binuikala kanuyi nulua ne muakunyi enu kundi
Kuvudi mamu ebe mukuabo bilulu, yeye udi muan abo ne mamu ebe

Hashikameye ha nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge, yeye neadifundile mukanda wa mikenji idi mifunda mu mukanda au udi mu bianza bia bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi; yeye neashale ne mukanda eu, neaubale matuku andi onso; nunku yeye neamanye mua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, ne mua kutumikila mei onso ne mikenji yonso bidi bifundamu, bua kubienza; nunku mutshima wandi kaudibandishi ku mutu kua bana babo, nunku yeye kasesuki mu nshila wa mikenji nansha ku tshianza tshia balume nansha ku tshianza tshia bakashi; nunku nebavudishe matuku a bukelenge buandi, ne a bana bandi mu Isalele
Kadi Sarayi uvua nkumba
Padi mukaji ulela muana wa bakaji, neashale ne mikiya mbingu ibidi, anu bu muyilaye mupie mikiya matuku ende a tshijila tshia bakaji
Mpingu ya mushindu ewu idi ne bua kubutuka yonsu
Maweja Nangila, wewe kubafikisha, kubasombesha, pa mukuna uudi mudisunguile, pa muaba uudi musue kusomba, mu nzubu wa tshijila uudi mudiashile
Tuasanganyimu bantu ba ku ndelanganyi ya Anake, muntu wa mpolondu
Kuena mua kuwenza amu nkayebe to
Buswikakaji bwa bukalenga bwa polovensa budi ne tshia kwangata bweena mpala bwa polovensa ne mushinga
Kupuekabu mu tshibanda tshia Eshekole
Yosefe wakalongolola dikalu diandi wakaya kusangakena ne Isalele, tatu andi, mu Goshene Wakafika kudiye, wakamuela tshituha ku nshingu, wakadila to musangu mule
Newafunde ha minoko ya bibi bia nsubu webe, ne ha bibi bia mishiku ya luhangu luebe
Bantu aba bonsu, kutombokela Moshe ne Arone, kubambila ne: Nudi nukolesha malu
Bualu ndi mubasungule pa muaba wa bena Izrayele bakuabu
Badi Bashikisha Kuenza Bintu bia Kubuesha mu Tshitendelelu Ek
Nanku bena Izrayele kuenza mikata ne ditapi dia bukula buvuabu basopa kabuyi buanji kubanda, buvuabu bumuka nabu mu Ejipitu
Nenusangishe bintu bionso bia musoko mu musesu, nenuoshile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musoko ne bintu ebi bionso; musoko eu newikale musasula tshiendelele, kabena bawasaku kabidi
Nsuki yende idi ijadika mudiye mudifile bua kuenzela Maweja Nangila mudimu
Muntu yonsu ungasangila nende neanshipe
Nanku ndelanganyi ya Esawu kukuata ditunga adi, kuasamu
Bivua anu Ubalombola diba dionsu
Kushe kulela kabidi Nimrode, tshilobu tshia kumpala tshivua tshidia bumfumu mu matunga a bende
Neumumvuije tshidiye mua kuamba
Yehowa neanujadike bu bantu bandi ba tshijila, bu muakanulayeye, binuatumikila mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, binuenda mu nshila yandi
Ndi mmuela lupemba
Ndi njikija matandu abu

Mbua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne kuenda mu nshila yandi yonso, ne bua kumusua, ne bua kuenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mudimu ne mitshima yenu yonso ne bukole buenu buonso, ne bua kutumikila mikenji ya Yehowa ne mei andi anakunuambila lelu bua nuenu kukuma dikasa dimpe
Bena bilengulengu bakenza nunku ne manga abo bua kutuma nkusu, kadi kabakamanya mua kuenza, nkusu yakadi kudi bantu ne kudi nyama
Kanuena mua kuyilenga, padiyi mifue
Nanku nebanshipe bua kuangata mukajanyi
Mutuangaji ambule dianza dia bukula budi ne mafuta, ambule kabidi musenga wa kamonya onsu, abioshe pa tshilambuilu, bualu mmulambu wa tshivulukilu udi moshile Maweja Nangila

Tuteke tshilejilu tshikuabu: Padi muntu ulenga tshintu kampande tshidi ne mikiya kayi mumanye, bu mudi nyama wa tshisuku mufue, tshimuna nansha tshilandadi tshifue, muntu awu mmuena tshibawu, udi ne mikiya
Tshibangidilu Mvidi Mukulu udi ulaya ne: Sara nealele muana Maweja Nangila kumuenekela Abrahame ku mitshi ya tshijila ya ku Mambre
Bantu abu kupitshila luseke lua ku mikuna, kufika mu tshibandabanda tshia Eshekole, kutshitentekela

Ditshina ne buowa nebikale kudi nyama yonso ne kudi nyunyu yonso ya mulu ne kudi tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi ne kudi minyinyi ya mu mai manene bua bualu buenu, nakafila bintu bionso mu bianza bienu
Abalahama wakabika ku mpala kua tshitalu tshiandi, wakambila bana ba Hete ne, Ndi bianyi muenyi ne muikadi munkatshi muenu, numpe muaba wa majambu bua meme kujikarnu tshitalu etshi ku mesu
Yabale ke nkambua wa badi basomba mu nzubu ya ntenta bikale ne bimuna
Malu Adi Nzambi Ulomba Katataka, nuenu Bena Isalele, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi musue nuenu nuenze malu kai
Enza mabaya abidi a kutoka ku matumba a tshitendelelu adi ku nyima
Kuelanganabu muoyi bakoleshangana
Kabidi Moshe uvua ne lumu lunene mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Bua bubi buenu ebu, Maweja Nangila mmumfikile kabidi ne meme munda, unkandika ne: Nansha wewe mene Moshe kuena ufika mu ditunga dia Kenaane to
Kanuenji munudi basue to

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Kabahu Yehowa Muoyo Nudimuke, kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi ne malu anakunuambila lelu: hanuadia bintu bia bungi, hanukuta, hanuasa nsubu mimpe ne hanuashikamamu, hakumbana ngombe yenu ne mikoko yenu ne havulangana biamu bienu bia argent ne bia or, ne havulangana bintu bienu bionso; hashishe nudimuke, kanudisu mu mitshima yenu, kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu; wakanulombola mu tshihela tshinene tshibi, tshiakadi ne nyoka isuma bu kahia ne tuminyiminyi, ne buloba budi kabuyi ne mai; wakanuhatula mai mu dibue dikole; wakanuisha ne mana mu tshihela, adi batatu benu kabayi bamanye; bualu bua kunuhuekesha ne kunuteta, bua kunuenzela bimpe mu matuku a kunshikidilu kuenu: kanuambi mu mitshima yenu ne, Tuakudiangatshila biuma ebi bionso ne bukole bua bianza bietu
Nsongalume mukuabu kuyaye lubilu kudi Moshe, umuambila ne: Eldade ne Medade bavua bashale ku mitanda, badi bakula bu bambi
Tshibilu tshia Dinowa dia biakudia Kutuadija dituku dinuvua nubanga kunowa biakudia bienu, nubadike mbingu milondangane muanda mutekete
Bikalabo ne tshilumbu, badi balue kundi, ne meme ndi ndumbulula hankatshi ha muntu ne mmena mutumba n andi, ndi mbamanyisha mei a Nzambi ne mikenji yandi
Yehowa wakambila Yakoba ne, Uhingane ku buloba bua batatu ebe, ne bua bana benu, nengikale n ebe
Mose wakamba ne, Bualu buakukukuata bua kufila nyama mu bianza bietu ya kuoshila Nzambi, tudi basue kuyishihela Yehowa Nzambi wetu

Muakuidi nele dî diandi bua kumusha bintu bionso bia mu nsubu diambedi muakuidi kayi muanze kubuela bua kutangila disama, bua bintu bionso bia mu nsubu kabilu bu bintu bidi kabiyi biakane, ku nyima muakuidi neabuele bua kutangila mu nsubu
Mulami Wakenza bu muakamba Yosefe, wakalua n abo mu nsubu wa Yosefe

Munkatshi mua bisamba ebi kanuena nusangana ha kuikisha, anyi kua kutalasha munda mua makasa enu; Yehowa neanutumineku mitshima izakala ne mesu a buowa ne kusamina kua muoyo; nenuikale ne mpata bua mioyo yenu; nenuikale ne buowa munya ne butuku, kanuena nuikala ne ditekemena dia mioyo yenu
Uvua mutufuile luse ne bena meku etu bonsu
Diba adi, bena Izrayele bonsu kumona butumbi bua Maweja Nangila
Nubenzeje mudimu mukole, bua bapange mua kuteleja meyi a bena dishima
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita, badi bangata dîyi bu diumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu

Nakatuma bamessager mu tshihela tshia Kedemota kudi Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona, ne mei a ditalala ne, Witabushe bua tuetu tuhite mu buloba buebe: netuye anu mu musesu munene, katuena tusesuka ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Kumusokokaye ngondu isatu
Muntu wakenzela bibi, nebamusombuele misangu muanda mutekete
Yeye neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha muana wa ngombe wa mulambu wandi, neamushihe ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, ne bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebamiamme mashi ku tshioshelu
Nutshipe amu mu dina diende
Kumuambilabu ne: bimuna bia bena Izrayele kabiena bifua nansha tshimue
Kutuadija musangu awu, mabue adi amu mu mushete amu
Bantu aba badi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo, Bena Lewi, ku meku abo
Kadi hanuasabuka Yadene, hanuashikama mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuhianyisha, udi unuha dikisha kudi bena lukuna bonso badi banunyunguluka, ne nenushikame talalâ
Mvidi Mukulu kufuka nyama ya pa buloba ya mishindu yonsu, bimuna ne bilandadi bia mishindu mishilangane
Kimoko kakuena bintu bia kukuna nansha mamuma a nfigi nansha tumuma tukese nansha mamuma a grenade, kakuena mai a kunua
Bakambila Tamâ ne, Tatu ebe muenu uyaya ku Timena bua kukoseye mikoko yandi miosa
Mu tshipela amu, bena Izrayele kujana Moshe ne Arone, bamba ne: Maweja Nangila uvua mua kutubutuila nansha mu Ejipitu, mutuvua tudia minyinyi ngesu tente ne mampa tuukuta, basombele panshi
Mvidi Mukulu Maweja Nangila kumpesha mabue abidi, avuaye mufunde nkayende mikenji yonsu
Kabidi muntu yonsu udi wambula tshintu tshivua muena disama edi musombe, neasukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi
Neamiamine mashi ne munu wandi ha mutu hatshi misangu muanda mutekete, neatshilengeshe, neatshijidile bua bubi bua Bena Isalele
Yeye wakabakonka bua malu abo ne, Tatu wenu, muntu au mununu unuakungambila, udi mukole, anyi
Wewe neutelele bana balume ba Alona bikowelu ne mikaba ne bifulu bia butumbi ne buimpe
Mukaji umona ne: mutshi uvua muimpe kumona, bimuma biawu bimpe bua kudia, bifuana kupa muntu lungenyi, kupolaye tshimuma, kudia
Aba mbantu bakabalabo ba Bena Isalele ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua bantu bakabalabo ba mu bitudilu biabo ku bisumbu biabo buakadi binunu nkama isambombo ne bisatu ne nkama itanu ne makumi atanu
Divuba dia Maweja Nangila divua dienda kulu kua bena Izrayele mu munya, pavuabu babanga luendu
Nanku, nenukumbaje mikenji yanyi yonsu bua kuleja munudi bantu banyi
Utshidi ne muoyo, anyi
Bena Isalele, bitudilu bienu bidi bimpe
Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku dinai
Nenku yeye nkayende neasungule muntu wende wa tshijila
dilonda dia mêyi adi aludika bumuntu mu musoko;
Wewe wakusua kuhingana bualu bua mutshima webe wakadi ujinga ku nsubu wa tatu ebe, kadi wewe wakuiba mpingu yanyi bua tshinyi

Bualu bua tubalu tua Palo ne makalu andi ne masalayi akadi enda ha nyima ha tubalu biakaya mu mai manene ne Yehowa wakahingasha mai ha mutu habo, kadi Bena Isalele bakenda ha buloba bûme munkatshi mua mai manene
Alona wakolola tshianza tshiandi ku mutu kua mai a mu Ejipitu, biula biakabaha, biakûsha buloba bua Ejipitu tente
Kadi Lote uvua anu ujingakana
Muntu wa kutudi nansha umue kena mua kukupala lukita luende bua ujike muena kuebe to
Abrame mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu, kumukaye mu Arane muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile

Mu dituku dia dikumi ne atanu dia ngondo wa muanda mutekete nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, nenudie bidia bia Yehowa matuku muanda mutekete, nenufile milambu ya kuosha ha kahia idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa bana ba balume ba tshidimu tshimue ba ngombe dikumi ne basatu ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, bintu bisatu bia dî kunu ku muana wa ngombe tô ne ku bana ba ngombe dikumi ne basatu, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko to ne ku bana ba mikoko dikumi ne banai, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha ha kahia buatshia buatshia, ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Nkadi mbumanya anu lelu
Muntu yônso udi mwa kuya ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu bwa kuleeja dibenga kumvwangana dia Dîyi dikulu ne dipangadika diônso dia bwenji anyi dia buludiki
Au mmeku a bana balume ba Efelayima, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi ne nkama itanu Aba mbana balume ba Yosefe ku meku abo
Ndimba neikale ne mu miaba idibu balambila, too ne mu binu bia kutuila
Kadi mukashi wa Lota wakatangila ku nyima kuandi, wakakudimuka dibue dia luehu
Binuangashila tshioshelu tshia mabue, kanusongi mabue ne biamu, bualu bua binuâheya ne tshiamu, nuenu nuakuona mabue au
Kadi wewe newoshe munyinyi wa muana mulume wa ngombe, ne tshiseba ne tunvi ne kahia ku butshika bua tshitudilu ebu mbualu bua kubuikidila bubi bua bantu
Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku disambombo
Kanuenji mpingu ya mvidie, mifula ne biamu bitoke bia mushinga mukole nansha ne mpawungi
Ka bakamanya mua kutangilangana, nansha muntu wakumuka mu muaba wandi tô matuku asatu, kadi munya wakadi mu nsubu ya Bena Isalele bonso
Ushale mu buloba ebu, nengikale bebe, nenkusankishe, bualu bua nenkuhe wewe ne tunkanunuma diebe buloba ebu buonso, nenjadike n ebe tshihungidi tshinakahunga ne Abalahama, tatu ebe
Kayine umvua nanku, kuambila muanabu Ebele ne: Tuye kuendakana
Nunku kabena bashihela ba demon milambu yabo hadibo benda n abo masandi
Nensankishe bantu badi bakuvudishila wewe disanka, nengele muntu mulau udi ukuela wewe mulau Bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bua bualu buebe
Abrahame mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi tshitema ne tshitema, kumutekabu pende panshi
Nomba Isalele Udi Usombuela Midiyana Yehowa Wakambila Mose ne, Usombuele Bena Isalele bualu bua Bena Midiyana, ku nyima wewe neusangakene ne bankambua bebe
Moshe kuandamuna ne: Pandi ngumuka muaba ewu, nensengelele Maweja Nangila bua malaba njiji yumuke ku nzubu kuebe, kua balomboodi ba mu bukalenga buebe ne ku nzubu ya bantu bebe bonsu
Bualu bua yeye wakalengulula dî dia Yehowa, wakashiha mukenji wandi, nebamûmushilemu bulelela, neadituadile bubi buandi
Bantu badibu babadike bua benze mudimu mu bisumbu bia tshiluilu, nebabalombole kudi mfumu wa tshisamba tshiabu: Mfumu wa bena Dane: ke Akiyezere, muana wa Amishadayi, ne bantu bende
Muntu ne muntu udibo babala neafile tshituha tshia nshekele bu mudibo bafila mu nsubu wa tshiendelele tshituha tshia nshekele bu kuha kuabo kudi Yehowa
Matuku malondangane muanda mutekete, nudie anu mampa adi kaayi mela buanga
Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe
Bantu ba mu meku a bana balume ba Kohata nebashikame ku luseke lua ku sude
Kabidi netumanye bimuna bidiye musue bua tuetu kumulambula amu patuafika kutudi tuya
Udimuke biebe bua kuenza bintu bionso bu tshidikishilu tshinakukulesha mu mukuna
Kulondabu ne bintu abi
Maweja Nangila mmuambe bua nuenu kuboya biakudia bikumbane bua muntu yonsu kudia kuukuta
Uvua muteleje bivuabu bamba abi
Mutuangaji neamukenkete
Abrahame kuamba kabidi ne: Maweja Nangila kabikutondi, ntshidi anu ntungunuka
Moshe uvua uyukila ne Mvidi Mukulu, Mvidi Mukulu umuandamuna ne diyi bu dia dikubakuba dia mvula
Moshe kumvua muvua bena Izrayele badila muadi, basombela ku diku ku diku mu mishiku ya ntenta yabu
Bantu bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi ne nkama ibidi
Bobu aba ke bankambua ba bisamba

Lewitiki Makenga Adi Akuata Benji ba Malu a Bundu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele kabidi ne, Muntu yonso wa Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele udi ufila muana wandi kudi Moleke neashihibue bulelela, bena buloba nebamukume ne mabue
Mishindu ya kuteeka bulongolodi bwa tshimpitshimpi anyi bwa bilwilu badi bayileeja kudi mêyi a ditunga
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuteka muntu mu lupangu lua Edene bua kudimamu ne kulama bintu bionsu bivuamu

Lubena, Shimeona, Lewi ne Yuda, Yisakâ, Zebuluna ne Benyamina, Dana ne Nafatale, Gada ne Ashe Bantu bonso ba munda mua Yakoba bakadi makumi muanda mutekete, Yosefe wakadi mu Ejipitu diambedi Yosefe wakafua ne bana babo bonso, ne bantu bonso ba mulongo au Bena Isalele bakakumbana ba bungi, bakavulangana, bakalua bakole be, bakula mu buloba tente
Hakadi Noa ne bidimu nkama itanu, Noa wakalela Shema, Hama ne Yafete
Ubiteke milongo ibidi, mulongo isambombo mulongo isambombo, ha mesa adi ku mpala kua Yehowa

Kadi nyunyu wa nkutshi kakamona muaba wa kuikala, nunku wakahingana kudiye mu buatu, bualu bua mai akatshidi ha buloba buonso, yeye wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakamukuata, wakamuteka mu buatu muakadiye
Wakamba ne, Tshiena nshiha musoko binasangana bantu bakane makumi anai ne batanu
Kadi, bena Izrayele kabayi banji kujikija kudia, munyinyi awu mutshikale mukana, Maweja Nangila kubafikila munda
Kutedi dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi webe, tshitelatela, bua Yehowa kena ubingisha muntu udi utela dina diandi tshitelatela
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Mukelenge wa Edome wakamuambila ne, Nansha, kanuena nuhita, nendue kusangana n ebe ne muele wa nvita
Pa mukanda wa dîyi mujima, dieela dia tukanda didi dienzeka padibo babiikila dîna ne dîyi dikola
Matuku onso a Noa akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne makumi atanu, yeye wakafua

Halua dituku dia muanda mukulu, yeye neadiangatshile nansha nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi nansha mputu nyunyu ibidi, nealue n ai ku mpala kua Yehowa ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, neayifile mu bianza bia muakuidi, ne muakuidi neayifile bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, muakuidi neafue milambu ya kumubuikidila n ai bubi ku mpala kua Yehowa bualu bua tufina tuandi
Pashishe, neapingane kabidi munkatshi muenu
Moshe kuimana, kukenzakana nseke yonsu
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne bena mu bukalenga buende kumvua ne: bena Izrayele mbamane kunyema
Luhanza alu kaluena luhanza lua mukelenge wanyi ludiye unua n alu ne ludiye utempa n alu matempu anyi
Yeye wakela Benyamina tshituha ku nshingu, wakadila, ne Benyamina wakadia ku nshingu wandi kabidi

Ngendu ya pa mâyi a mbuwa ne a misulu , ngendu ya mu kapeepa, njila ya njanja, njila ya buloba ne mishindu mikwabo ya dimanyishangana mianda, mifuka kudi nzambi anyi kudi bantu, idi itwangaja polovensa ibidi anyi ya bûngi anyi tshipaapu tshia Ditunga ne tshipaapu tshia ditunga dieenyi anyi mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga miamba ne nyidi yambulwisha ditunga dijima nansha yôyi mikale isanganyibwa mu teletwale wa polovensa kampanda;

Mikenji ya bintu bidi bikuata butu nansha nsumba Padi butu bukuata ku bilamba bienza ne miosa ya nyama, nansha ku bia ndanda, nansha ku bilamba bia pambidi bienza ne miosa ya nyama, nansha ne ndanda, nansha ku bilamba bia biseba, nansha ku bintu bienza ne biseba, padi makeji awu amueneka makunzubile, nansha a mayi a matamba, mutuangaji neakenkete butu abu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Kanumushi tshisamba tshia meku a Bena Kohata munkatshi mua Bena Lewi, nubenzele nunku, bua bikale ne muoyo, kabafu, haluabo ha buihi ne bintu bia tshijila Alona ne bana bandi balume nebabuelemu, nebaleshe muntu ne muntu mudimu wandi ne bujitu buandi, kababuedi bua kutangila bintu bia tshijila nansha kakese, bua kabafu
Meme ne nsangakene n ebe aha, nensombe n ebe ha mutu ha tshibuikilu tshia mushete, hankatshi ha bakeluba badi ha mutu ha mushete, nenkumanyishe malu onso andi nkuhesha bu mikenji kudi Bena Isalele
Ke pandi nnukandika, bua kanuenji midimu dituku dia Dikisha
Kanuikadi ne Muena Edome lukuna, bualu bua yeye udi muan enu; kanuikadi ne Muena Ejipitu lukuna, bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba buandi
Bualu bantu ba bisamba bikuabu aba, badi mua kutombola ndelanganyi yenu, bua nubenge Maweja Nangila, nutendelele mvidie mikuabu
Nebayikengeshe, ishale ku bupika bidimu nkama inayi
Nebanubutule bonsu mu mvita
Nzambi wakamba ne, Mulu muikale hankatshi ha mai a ha buloba ne mai a mu diulu

Bialuangana balume ne biakuma umue mukuabo ne dibue anyi biamututeye tshisusu, kena umushiha kadi yeye udi ulala ha bulalu, biabikeye kabidi ne udi wenda ne mulangala wandi, muntu wakamukuma neabinge, kadi yeye neamufute bua matuku akalaleye hanshi, ne mushinga wa kuondahibua kua ndi
Arone ne Moshe ke bavua Maweja Nangila muambile ne: Nupatule bena Izrayele bonsu balondangane bimpe mu bisamba biabu mu Ejipitu
Maweja Nangila kuambila kabidi Arone ne: Mu ditunga dindi mpesha bena Izrayele, kuakupetamu tshiebe tshitupa tshia buloba, nansha buebe bupianyi to
Bena Amaleka ne Bena Kanâna badi ku mpala kuenu, nunku nenufue ku miele ya nvita, bualu bua nuenu nuakuhidia kulonda Yehowa, nunku Yehowa kena wikala n enu
Dina diende mMaweja Nangila
Ateke tshianza pa mutu pa mukoku awu
Nudie anu lukasa lukasa, bualu ntshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila

Wikala dikemena wa kwata kumu kusu Kabuya Pitch Lux Pitch Lualua Mama ya bongo Yelele yelele Nganji kubikila Maamù eh Mamiani mwà Mbuya kasasu eh Mambi wa Tumba ne Tshala eh Mwâna mudikaya yampongo eh Moyi munda nganyì wà ngakwile eh Ngipata mukunda muya mukanka Mwana we lekela we Ya Esther Ngalula Kulola
Nanku mbinyike meku a bena Levi bilondeshile mena a bana bonsu aba
Kadi wewe usonge buatu bua mutshi wa budimbu, ubukosolole tuzubu munda
Yeye kakamumanya kabidi tshiendelele
Mwâna yônso udi ne tshia kubweela mu tulasa tupwekela ne kabidi kabeena mwa kufutshila tulasa etu mu bilongelu bia mbulamatadi to
Ndelanganyi yebe neyipatuke mu bupika ne biuma bia bungi
Mapangadika aa badi baashintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila
Diba adi mukajebe Sara neikale mumane kulela muana wa balume
Badi babashikika mu nkwaasa kudi olodonase wa Mulombodi wa ditunga
Bualu Maweja Nangila kena musue bintu bia mushindu awu to
Matuku onso a Hanoka akadi bidimu nkama isatu ne makumi asambombo ne bitanu
Tshibelu tshia nyama atshi, ntshia mutuangaji udi ulambula mashi ne mafuta pa tshilambuilu
Patudi tumunemeka, netuikale bena diakalenga diba dionsu, netushale ne muoyi, bu mutudi nawu mpindiewu
Kuimanabu bu mabue, kabayi banyunga
Uvuluke ne wewe wakadi muhika mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakakubikula: ka nunku ndi nkuelela mukenji eu lelu
Bonsu babidi mulume ne mukaji bavua butaka, kadi kabayi bafua bundu
Nuenu nutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, bienza muntu nunku, neikale ne muoyo
Nuenu kutombokela Maweja Nangila, kuya anu ku mikuna ayi

Bungi bua Bena Lewi bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona ne kudi bakelenge ba mu Isalele, ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ba bidimu makumi asatu tô ne ku bidimu makumi atanu, buonso buabo bakadi benza mudimu ne bakadi batuala majitu a ntenta wa kusambakena, bakabalabo bakadi binunu muanda mukulu ne nkama itanu ne makumi muanda mukulu

Luhehele luakaheha kudi Yehowa, diakalua ne nyunyu ya nkuadi ku mai manene, luakayihonesha hehi ne tshitudilu, bu luendu lua dituku dimue ku luseke elu ne luendu lua dituku dimue ku luseke lukuabo, yakanyunguluka tshitudilu ku nseke yonso, yakalembelela mulelu mukese bu coudées ibidi
Wewe neusungule Alona ne bana bandi balume, ne bobo nebashale ne mudimu wa buakuidi, bialua muenyi ha buihi nebamushihe
Kubipeshaye Rebeka
Nenkoleshe mutshima wa Palô, nennudishe bimanyinu bianyi ne malu anyi a kukema mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Ndi mumanye ne, Yeye udi mua kuakula bimpe
Kuoshaye musenga wa kamonya bua kubakobolola
Merari ke nkambua wa bena Merari, badi batapuluka meku abidi, dia bena Mali ne dia bena Mushi
Enza biebe mitshi ya acacia, lamika tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yai yonso
Kabidi ndelanganyi yende neisombemu
Yeye wakamba ne Monai, diba ditshidi mulu, kandiba dia kusangisha bimuna nansha, nuishai mikoko mai, yai bienu nuyidishe
Enzai mudimu matuku asambombo; kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete nedikale dituku dia tshijila, dituku dia kuikisha ku mesu kua Yehowa; muntu yonso udi wenza mudimu dituku adi nebamushihe
Kadi kabena babisangana to

Nuenze anu malu adi makane ne mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa; bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nubuele ne nuhiane buloba buimpe buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu, bua kunuihatshila bantu bonso badi n enu lukuna ku mpala kuenu, bu muakamba Yehowa
Hakaleha matuku makumi anai, Yehowa wakampa mabue au abidi akadi malundahu mei a tshihungidi
Hashishe, yeye wakebesha balume ba mu musoko ne, Mukashi au wa masandi wakadi ku Enayima udi kudi kunyi
Moshe kupingana kudi Maweja Nangila, umuebeja ne: Maweja Nangila wanyi, udi mukengeshe bantu aba bua tshinyi

Padi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa tshikosa difila dia bukookeshi buvwa bwimikila Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa mushindu awu, bulongolodi bwa mêyi a ditunga adibo bapatula mu mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa polovensa, bilondeshila difila dia bukookeshi edi, adi ashaala ne bwenzeji mu polovensa mweena bwaalu too ne palwa dîyi dia polovensa kujikija mianda ayi
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Bu tatuende mumutuile mate mu mesu, kavua mua kufua bundu lumingu lujima anyi
Kutendeledi nzambi mukuabo nansha; bualu bua Yehowa udi ne dina diandi dia Mukau, udi Nzambi wa mukau

Muntu udi usangisha butue bua muana wa ngombe neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane to ne ku dilolo eu udi mukenji wa Bena Isalele ne wa muenyi udi munkatshi muabo tô ne tshiendelele
Nengenze tshishima etshi malaba
diambulwisha dia bashikumbata ne balema ba ku mvita;
Nunku yeye wakamuidika dana ne, Gada
Bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo mbia kudia bienu, bu munakanuha midioko, mbu mundi nnuha bintu bionso
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kukuba mwaba wa kusomba wa bantu ne bukola bwabu bwa mubidi

Nenuambe ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne, Tuakumusha bintu bia tshijila mu nsubu yetu, tuakabiha Bena Lewi ne benyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila, bu mukenji uwakutuelela, katuakashiha mikenji yebe, katuakuhua mikenji muoyo
Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Wewe kuena ne buhianyi mu buloba buabo, wewe kuena ne tshituha munkatshi muabo meme ndi tshituha tshiebe ne buhianyi buebe munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Kuenzekabi nanku
Kadi Kabanga kulua, mukuate muanabu Esawu ku tshikankanya
Tshisamba tshia bena Levi netshikale tshianyi meme
Wakenza nkanu ya or ibidi kuinshi kua mutu watshi, ku matumba abidi adi ku nseke yatshi, bualu bua kutshituala
Yosefe wakamba ne, Numpe bimuna bienu, nennuhe bia kudia ku bimuna bienu bikale argent yenu mishike

Genese Abalama Udi Usungila Lota Mu matuku a Amalafele, mukelenge wa Shinâ, ne Ayoka, mukelenge wa Elasa, ne Kedôlaome, mukelenge wa Elama, ne Tidala, mukelenge wa Goyima, bakaluangana nvita ne Bela, mukelenge wa Sodoma, ne Bisha, mukelenge wa Amola, ne Shinaba, mukelenge wa Adema, ne Shemebê, mukelenge wa Bena Seboi, ne mukelenge wa Belê eu udi Soâ
Nuenu kuenza bidi Maweja Nangila ubenga, kumufikisha munda
Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku disatu
Hashishe muakuidi neuvuwe bilulu ne mubidi wandi ne mai, ne ku nyima nealue biandi mu tshitudilu, neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo
Katuena tulua
Pavua Mvidi Mukulu ubutula Sodome ne Ngomore, uvua anu muvuluke Abrahame
Bielabo mai ha bintu ebi bia kukuna ne biahona tshituha tshia mubidi yabi mufue ha mutu habi, bintu ebi nebikale ne bukoya kunudi
Udi mwa kujuka anu padibo bamuteeka mwaba mupiamupia anyi ku didilombela diende anyi mu dikombolangana ditookesha ne dipangadika kudi Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya bakoshi ba nsambu
Hanuasa nsubu muhia muhia, nenuenze kabidi lumbu tukese ku mutu kua nsubu, nunku muntu kahonyi hanshi, ne mashi andi kaikadi ku nsubu yenu
Bena Izrayele badi balomba munyinyi Dituku dikuabu bantu benyi ba mishindu yonsu bavua basombe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele kukuatshika lukuka lua munyinyi
Bantu bonso bakabalabo ba mu tshitudilu tshia Lubena bakadi binunu lukama ne makumi atanu ne tshimue ne nkama mai ne makumi atanu Bobo nebatonde ku nyima, tshisumbu tshibidi

Abalahama wakambila Nzambi ne, Mbimpe Yishemaele ikale ne muoyo ku mesu kuebe Nzambi wakamba ne, Nansha, Sala mukashi webe neakulelele muana wewe neumuidike dina ne, Isaka, nenjadike n andi yeye ne tunkanunuma tuandi tshihungidi tshianyi bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele
Baminisitila ba mu polovensa badi babangata kudi nguvenêla munda anyi pambelu pa Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa
Mukashi wakabika, wakaya mu nshila wandi, wakavula tshilulu tshiandi tshikudika, wakaluata bilulu bia mu lufuila kabidi
Bua Lewi yeye wakamba ne, Tumima ne Ulima biebe bikale kudi ûdi musue, uwakateta ku Masa, uwakaluangana n andi ku mai a Meliba
Kadi Maweja Nangila kena muitabe dilomba dianyi to
Kuambilabu bena Izrayele bonsu ne: Ditunga dituvua baye kutentekela didi dimpe ditambe
Juka, endakana mu ditunga, uditangile mu bule ne mu butshiama buadi, bualu nenkupadi

Bikala muntu kayi ne muan abo wa kumuhingishila bintu bia bubi buandi, bintu bidiye uhingisha bia kudilengesha n abi munda kudi Yehowa nebikale bintu bia muakuidi, ha mutu ha mulambu wa tshimpanga udiye ufila bua kudibuikila n au bubi buandi
Bingenyingenyi bia dîyi bidibo banyisha ku Bukalenga bunene mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila badi babifila ku Bilo bia tshimwe tshia ku Bibambalu
Muana muakunyi kulala nende

Kanungu ka Padi nkwaasa mushala mutupu bifumina ku lufu, ku dimulekela anyi ku tshipumbishi tshia kashidi, midimu ya Mulombodi wa Ditunga, pa kumbusha idibo bafunda mu tunungu twa , ne , badi bayeenza kudi Mulombodi wa ba tshipwita bakulumpe
Yeye udi muledibue mu nsubu webe ne yeye udibo basumba ku argent webe udi ne bua kutengudibua, tshi hungidi tshianyi netshikale munda muenu bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele

Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi ufikisha bamweenampala ne batumibwa ba pabwabo ku matunga a beenyi ne ku malongolodi a bukwa matunga, bamwena mpala ne batumibwa ba pabwabo ba matunga makwabo padibo banyishibwa kudiye
Nukuate mudimu bua bantu kabavuluki kabidi nansha mena mene a mvidie ayi miaba yonsu ivuabu bayitendelela
Batatu kabafuidi bana babo, ne bana kabafuidi batatu abo: muntu yonso adifuile bua malu mabi andi
Bulelela, yeye udi muakunyi wanyi, udi muana wa tatu wanyi, kadi kena muana wa mamu wanyi, ne yeye wakalua mukashi wanyi
Hakalua dituku dia muanda mutekete, bakuabo bakaya kusangisha bidia, kadi kabakabisangana
Yehowa wakayikila ne Mose mpala ha mpala bu mudi muntu uyikila ne mulunda wandi
Mayi onsu kuandamuka mashi, mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne bantu bende bamone
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Amu kutuadija pa diba adi, mukaji awu kena kabidi ne mikiya ya buvyele to

Kudi mvidie uvua mukengeshe bantu, mutshimune mvita, muenze bishima ne malu a kukema, muenze kabidi ne malu adi akuatshisha bantu bowa, bu muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munuenzele mu Ejipitu anyi
Bakakudimuna Palo ne, Bantu bebe badi balami ba mikoko, ne tuetu ne batatu etu
Udi mubutule mu mayi manene, matempu ne biluilu bia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Kanungu ka Mu matuku asambombo adi alonda dianyisha dia dîyi , badi badituma kwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga bwa adipatula
Bilulu bienu kabiakasunsuka ham bidi henu, ne makasa enu kaena mûle bidimu ebi makumi anai
Abimeleke kakadi muanze kulua kudiye, ne yeye wakakonka ne, Mukelenge, wewe neushihe tshisamba tshiakane, anyi

Hashishe newambile muan ebe mulume ne, Tuakadi bahika ba Palo mu Ejipitu, ne Yehowa wakatuhatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole; ne Yehowa wakatulesha bimanyinu ne malu a kukema a bungi ne makole mu Ejipitu ne kudi Palô ne ba mu nsubu muandi, ku mesu kuetu; yeye wakatuhatulamu, bualu bua kulua n etu ne bua kutuha buloba buakalayeye batatu betu
Kuoshi musenga wa manananshi udi kauyi mujidila ha tshioshelu, nansha mulambu wa nyama idiho bosha, nansha mulambu wa bukula, nansha mulambu wa nvinyo idiho banua
Mu ngondo wa kumudilu ne ku dituku dia dikumi ne anai dilolo nenudie mampa adi kâyi ne luevene to ne ku dituku dia makumi abidi ne dimue dilolo
Yosefe wakumuka lubilu, bualu bua mutshima wandi wakajinga bua muakunyi andi, wakakeba muaba wa kudidileye, wakabuela mu nsubu wandi wa bulalu, wakadidilamu
Bavua ne mudimu wa kulama bintu bia tshijila bivua munda mua ntenta
Pashishe nyama yonsu minene ne mikese, bilandadi ne nyunyi yonsu, kupatukabi mu buatu ku tshisumbu ku tshisumbu
Abimeleke Wakabikila Isaka, wakamuambila ne, Bulelela, yeye udi mukashi webe, bualu kai wewe wakuamba ne, Yeye udi muan etu wa bakashi
Nudi bamanye nuwuaye muenze mu Ejipitu, ne mu tshipela
Bantu bakadi benda mu makalu ne ha nyima ha tubalu bakaya n andi, tshisumbu tshinene be
Udi ne tshia kulonda mêyi ne mikandu ya Ditunga pa wôwu

Etshi ntshintu tshia tshijila tshia Alona ne tshia bana bandi balume munkatshi mua milambu ya Yehowa idibo bosha ha kahia mu dituku diakabasunguleye bua kuenzelabo Yehowa mudimu wa buakuidi, Yehowa wakela mukenji wandi kudi Bena Isalele bua kubahabo tshintu etshi mu dituku diakabasunguleye
Matuku onsu adi muntu awu ne disama, udi mupie amu mikiya
Nzambi wakantuma ku mpala kuenu bua kunusangasha difuka dikese dia bantu ne bua kusungila mioyo yenu ku luhandu lunene
Mutumibue wende neakulombole
Tubale Kayine uvua ne muanabu wa bakaji, dina diende Naama
Yeye nealongolole minda ha bitekelu biai bia or numpe ku mpala kua Yehowa ku dituku ku dituku
Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidi tshiteeka Bukalenga bunene mu nkwaasa padibo banyisha ndongamu ewu kudi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia batshipwita
Bantu ba mu Sodoma bakadi babi, bakatamba kuhidia Yehowa
Anyisha, nsabuke musulu wa Yardene, bua meme kumonaku ditunga dimpe dialabale dia mikuna, didi dishiya dia musulu, kabidi ne mikuna ya Lebanone
Bena bilengulengu kabakamanya mua kuimana ku mpala kua Mose bualu bua mputa ya mbalanga, mputa yakadi ham bidi ha bena bilengulengu ne ham bidi ha Bena Ejipitu bonso
Nanku Abrahame kuinyika muaba awu ne: Mukuna wa Maweja Nangila udi utupesha
Muan a bute wakambila muan a mukala ne, Tatu wetu udi mununu, ne kakuena mulume mukuabo udi mua kulua kutudi bu mudi tshilele tshia bonso ba ha buloba
Nualekele, apueke panshi bu mayi
Yeye wakatula mulondo wandi lubilu ha diaha diandi, wakamba ne, Nua biebe, nensunyine tumelo biebe mai kabidi, nunku nakunua ne yeye wakumusha tumelo mai kabidi
Badi bambula kabidi ne bilamba bia ku lupangu, ne tshilamba tshia mu mushiku wa lupangu
Nunku Yehowa wakasungila Bena Isalele mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu dituku adi Bena Isalele bakatangila Bena Ejipitu bafue kukala kua mai manene
Mose wakangata kana ka ngombe kakenzabo, wakakosha mu kahia, wakakabotesha, wakakela mu mai, wakanuisha Bena Isalele mai au
Kuibi
Kanungu ka Dikala ditupu dia nkwaasa wa bulombodi bwa Ditunga badi baditundubula kudi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu padibo bakamanyisha kudi Bukalenge bunene
Bamuteke ku butshika bua tshitudilu matuku muanda mutekete, ne ku nyima nebamuhingishe kabidi
Abrame kuitaba bivua Sarayi mumulombe
Moshe kusaya tshimpanga atshi, kutshikosolola mabulu mabulu, kuosha pamue ne mutu, kabidi ne munyinyi wa mafuta
Nanku, kulejabu muena Levi yonsu mudimu uvuaye ne bua kuenza ne tshintu tshivuaye mua kuambula, amu bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambe
Kanungu ka Mudimu udi dipa ne dikanyika dia mushinga mukole bwa mweena Kongu yônso
Padiye umanya bualu bubi buvuaye muenze abu, adikobolole, alambule Maweja Nangila mbuji wa mpumbu udi kayi bulema
Yeye wakamukudimuna dî ne, Bualu budi bukese bua wakuangata bayanyi, anyi
Muntu yonso udi ulenga tshintu tshiakashalameye tshianza neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo, muntu udi utuala bintu ebi neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Bakamba kabidi ne, Bituikala ne luse ku mesu kuenu, nuitabushe bua buloba ebu buikale buhianyi bua bantu benu, kanuyi n etu dishiya dia Yadene
Mose wakamba ne, Wewe wakuamba bimpe, tshiena utangila mpala webe kabidi
Hakatshia butuku Yakoba wakamona ne Lea wakambila Labana ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi munyi
Nanku milambu yonsu ya tshijila idi bena Izrayele bandambula, ndi nkupeshayi kashidi
Mu Melali muakadi diku dia Bena Mali ne dia Bena Mushi au mmeku a Melali
Wakundinga ne: Sarayi mmuanetu wa bakaji bua meme kumuangata bu mukajanyi bua tshinyi

Kanudi mampa adi ne luevene ne mulambu eu; nenudie n au mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, mbia kudia bia tshivulukidi tshia dikenga; bualu bua nuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu lubilu; nunku numuke dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu matuku onso a muoyo wenu
Kanungu ka Bishimikidi bia ditunga bidi : Mfumu wa Ditunga; Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga; Bukalenga bunene; Bukalenga bwa bandumbulula
; Mfumu wa bena Menashe: ke Ngameliyele, muana wa Pedashure, ne bantu bende
Bobo nebatele efoda ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bukunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin mutambe buimpe, bintu bidibo benzesha kudi bantu badi ne lungenyi lule
Ubuejemu kabidi nyama ya mishindu ne mishindu, mulume umue ne mukaji umue bua ishale ne muoyi
Dina dia mukashi wa Amalama diakadi Yokebede, muana mukashi wa Lewi, wakalelabo mu Ejipitu: yeye wakalelela Amalama Alona ne Mose ne Miyama, muan abo mukashi

Mukelenge wa Ejipitu wakambila baleleshi ba bakashi ba Bena Ebelu, dina dia umue wabo ne, Shifela, ne dina dia mukuabo ne, Pua ne, Hanuaya kuenzela bakashi ba Bena Ebelu mudimu wa baleleshi, ne hanuabatangila mu buledi, bialelabo muana wa balume, nuenu nenumushihe, kadi bialelabo muana wa bakashi, numushiye ne muoyo
Nenshipe muanabute yonsu wa bena Ejipitu biangatshile kudi muanabute wa mukalenga, uvua mua kupiana bumfumu bua ditunga too ne kudi muanabute wa mukaji mupika udi upelesha bukula
Mikenji yanyi idi mushindu umue bua bantu bonsu, buenu nuenu bena Izrayele, ne bua benyi badi munkatshi muenu
Ei mmikenji yakelela Yehowa Bena Isalele mukana mua Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai

Nudie tshintu tshia dikumi tshia manvua enu ne tshia nvinyo yenu mihia mihia ne tshia manyi enu ne tshia ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne tshia ba mikoko yenu ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu muaba udiye Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi; nunku nenubale bualu bua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, matuku onso
Hakalela Leu Seluga, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama ibidi ne muanda mutekete, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Diba divuabu balele bana abu, Izake uvua ne bidimu makumi asambombu
Bionsu ebi bishale anu mu bimenga ebi bindi mumane kunupesha
Au mmeku a Manashe, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi atanu ne bibidi ne nkama muanda mutekete
Mutuangaji awu neabuele ne mukaji awu muaba wa tshijila bua kumuteka kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Pashishe, bena Izrayele kufika ku Elime
Matuku asatu awu, bena Ejipitu kabavua ne mushindu wa kuendakana, bualu kabavua mua kumona bantu nabu to
Nenuenzele misoko yonso idi kule, idi kayiyi misoko ya bisamba ebi
Mukaji awu neandamune ne: Amene
Moshe kuenza bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Yeye wakebesha Isaka ne, Wewe kuakunshilaku disanka, anyi

Bobo bakatshina hakaluabo n abo mu nsubu wa Yosefe, bakambilangana ne, Bakatubuesha mu nsubu nunku bualu bua argent yakahingashabo mu bibombi bietu diambedi badi basue kutubanda ne bubi, nebatukuate ne mpunda yetu, nebatubueshe mu buhika
Kadi kakosa tshilumbu mu bululama ne kikala kangata ne mushinga mianda yônso idi mwa kwambulwisha bantu bônso anyi muntu nkayende
Numanye ne: minyinyi ayi idi ne mikiya
Wakenza mahu asambombo, mahu asatu ku luseke lumue lua tshitekelu ne mahu asatu ku luseke lukuabo
; Mfumu wa bena Binyamine: ke Abidane, muana wa Ngideyoni, ne bantu bende
Lamika tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yonso ya mabaya ne enza nkanu ya or ya kuelamu mitshi, lamika or ku nseke yonso ya mitshi ei
Yehowa nea nuvudishile disanka mu bisasa bienu, ne mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu; neanuvudishile disanka mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nnuha
Bavua bela mbila bamukonka ne: Bantu balume bavua bafika kuebe dilolu edi badi penyi
Hakalela Sheme Âpakashada, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama itanu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Kadi baudile muaba wa tshijila, bualu udi wa tshijila menemene
Tshibangidilu Nowa udi ubuela mu buatu Maweja Nangila kuambila Nowa ne: Buela mu buatu ne diku diebe dionsu, bualu anu wewe ke muntu muakane munkatshi mua bantu ba tshikondu etshi
Moshe kubebeja ne: Tshinudi nuenza ntshinyi
Eu udi mukenji wa mukashi udi ulela nansha muana wa balume nansha muana wa bakashi
Bena Ejipitu banudi bamona aba, katshia kanuakubamona kabidi to
Nuvuluke Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, uvua munupatule ku bupika mu Ejipitu
dieepula ku njiwu idi ifumina ku kapia anyi ku bukenka bwa kapia ne diumusha dia bintu bidi bituma bukenke;
Maweja Nangila uvua mumone muvua Moshe usemena pabuipi bua kujadika bualu abu
Abalama wakadi ne bubanji be bua bimuna ne argent ne or
Arone kutuuta dikombu pa musulu wa Nile
Nanku, mutuangaji neafile milambu yonsu eyi kudi Maweja Nangila
Misangu yonsu ivua divuba adi diumuka pa mutu pa ntenta, bena Izrayele bavua bajula mitanda, bua kuyasa muaba uvuadi dimana
Ekesode Musambu wa Mose ne wa Miyama Mose ne Bena Isalele balambila Yehowa musambu eu, bakamba ne, Nengimbile Yehowa musambu, bualu bua yeye wakatamba bukole ne butumbi buandi
Nanku mulume ne mukaji ku nyunyi yonsu, ku bimuna bionsu, ku nyama yonsu minene ne mikese ibuele nebe mu buatu, bua ipande ku lufu
Au mmai a Meliba mu Kadesha mu tshihela tshia Sina
Shela ne meku a Bena Shela, Pelese ne meku a Bena Pelese, Zela ne meku a Bena Zela
Badi ne mudimu wa kulama bimpe bintu bia tshijila menemene

Kanungu ka Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga badi mwa kutshibikidija mu tshisangilu tshia tshimpitshimpi kudi mulombodi watshi bilondeshila ndongamu mutapuluke, ku dilomba dia Bilo biaatshi anyi dia tshia bibidi tshimwe tshia beena bilo anyi dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga anyi dia Bukalenga bunene bwa Ditunga
Kadi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu uvua anu ne tshitunu
Nutumikile mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nuende mu nshila yandi, numutshine
Ditwangaja, midimu, bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa tshipangu tshia ku mutu kwa mianda ya dimwangalaja dia ngumu ne dileeja dia bimfwanyi ku tudioomba badi babileeja kudi dîyi dilongolodi

Bungi bua bantu balume bonsu ba bena Levi, bavua Moshe ne Arone babadike, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambe, bituadije ku bana batekete ba ngondu umue too ne ku bantu bakulumpe, kabidi bilondeshile ku meku abu, bavua
Mpala ya badi bakeba mwa kubasungulabo mu Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga badi bayifila kudi bisumbu bia tshidiidi anyi kudi nsangilu wa bisumbu bia tshidiidi
Hakadiye uyikila n abo, Lakele wakalua ne mikoko ya tatu andi, bualu bua yeye wakadi muyilame
Muntu yonso wakangata dilonga diandi, wakatekamu kahia, wakatekahu musenga wa manananshi, bakimana ne Mose ne Alona ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Badi Baluangana ne Bena Amaleka Amaleka wakalua, wakaluangana ne Bena Isalele mu Lefidima
Bualu buakenjibua Buloba buakamenesha bimenyi, midioko idi yela ntete, bu mudi mishindu yai, ne mitshi idi ikuama mamuma adi ne ntete yai, bu mudi mushindu wai
Nebalenduishangane, mundi kayi ubihata, bu bantu badi banyema ku muele wa nvnta, kanuena nuikala ne bukole bua kuimana ku mpala kua bantu badi n enu lukuna
Udimuke ku mpala kuandi, unvue di diandi, kumufuishishi tshiji, yeye kena ukubuikidila bubi buebe bualu bua dina dianyi didi munda muandi

Nenjimishe kudisua kunudi n aku bua bukole buenu, diulu nedikale bu tshiamu tshifike ne buloba nebuikale bu tshiamu tshia mitaku, nenuenze mudimu wenu tshianana bualu bua buloba kabuena bukuama bintu, ne mitshi ya mu buloba kayena ikuama mamuma
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kulubulula miakulu yônso eyi kakuyi kansungansunga
Nulekele anu bana ba bakaji ne muoyi
Maweja Nangila kupatuka ne Abrame mu ntenta wende, umuambila ne: Tangila mulu ne udi mua kubala mitotu idimu
Bubidi buabo, mulume ne mukashi, bakadi butaka, kabakadi ne bundu
Nudi mua kubidia ne bena meku enu bonsu, bualu ndifutu dia ku mudimu unudi nungenzela mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Kutulabu kabidi bisosa ne mashinda bua kutudisha
Wewe newambile Bena Isalele ne, Biafua muntu udi kayi ne muana wa balume, nunku yeye neaheshe muan andi wa bakashi buhianyi buandi
Muana muakunyi pende kulela muana wa balume, kumuinyika dina ne: Bene Ammi
Benji ba bilengulengu bamone nanku, kuambilabu mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne: Ebi bidi bienzeka ku bukole bua Mvidi Mukulu

Kabidi muntu yonsu udi ulenga mukuabu udi ne mikiya, ulenga tshimuna tshidi ne mikiya, nansha nyama wa tshisuku udi ne mikiya, neapete dinyoka dia mushindu umue ne muntu udi mudie munyinyi wa mulambu wa bobumue uvuabu balambule Maweja Nangila muikale ne mikiya
Ekesode Kuledibua kua Mose Muntu wa tshisamba tshia Lewi wakabaka mukashi, muana wa Lewi
Moshe neele butu abu mulu, mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu mutangile

Uteke milongo ya masoso mai a kubueshamu mabue, mulongo wa kumudilu wa mabue a sardoine ne topaze ne émeraude, mulongo muibidi wa mabue a escarboucle ne saphir ne calcédoine, mulongo muisatu wa mabue a opale ne agate ne améthyste, ne mulongo muinai wa mabue a chrysolithe ne onyx ne jaspe ubueshe mabue a mu masoso
Nu hingane ne muan enu, muan a mukala kundi, nunku mei enu neajalame, kanuena nufue
Moshe kuenza bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Bamfumu ba bena Edome kutshina
Ku nyama yonsu anu wewe newikale ukoka difu panshi, kabidi neudie buloba matuku onsu audi ne muoyi
Bonsu pamue:
Maweja Nangila kumona ne buenzayi bua bantu budi buenda buvulangane pa buloba, meji adibu bela matuku onsu adi anu mabi
Yosefe wakamana bana babo, kadi bobo kabakamumanya
Mvidi Mukulu kufuka minyinyi minene ne mikese idi yenda mu mayi ya mishindu ne mishindu, ne nyunyi yonsu idi ibuka mulu ya mishindu mishilangane

Dituku dia lufu lua Isalele diakalua ha buihi, Wakabikila muan andi Yosefe, wakamuambila ne, Bingikala ne luse ku mesu kuebe, ulenge tshianza tshiebe muinshi mua tshibelu tshinyi, uditshihe bua kungenzela malu mimpe ne a bushuwa, ndi nkutendekena ne, Kabanjiki mu Ejipitu
Yeye udi butumbi buenu, yeye udi Nzambi wenu, wakanuenzela malu manene ne a kukema anuakatangila ku mesu
Nanku nuenu nudi bajadike malu manene adi Maweja Nangila munuenzele
Maweja Nangila kupueka mu divuba bua kuyukila ne Moshe
Buowa ne ditshina biakubakuata, bualu bua bukole bua diboko diebe bobo badi bashikama holâ bu mabue, to ne hasabuka bantu bebe, Yehowa, tô ne hasabuka bantu bawakahikula

Nanku, matuku dikumi ne anayi a ngondu wa kumpala, dilolu menemene, bena Izrayele kuenza tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila mu tshipela tshia Sinayi, bilondeshile muvua mikenji ivua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe bungi budi muntu kayi mua kuyibala
Udi umanyisha beena Ditunga mu mukenji
Kakuena mukuabu to
Abalama wakadia mpala hanshi, ne Nzambi wakayikila n andi ne, Mona, tshihungidi tshianyi tshidi n ebe, wewe newikale nkambua wa bisamba bia bungi
Sara kudisekela, wamba ne: Bukole bunkadi ebu, tshiena kabidi ne milowu ya balume bua kulela muana to
Bena Maki muana mulume wa Manashe bakaya ku Gilada, bakihata Bena Amole bakadimu bakanyenga musoko
Yeye wakatamba kulua mubanji wakadi ne bisumbu bia bimuna ne bena mudimu ba bakashi ne bena mudimu ba balume, ne tumelo ne tubalu
Mêyi a ditunga adi afila mishindu ya kwaasa ne ya kwendesha bilongelu ebi

Tuetu tuakakudimuna mukelenge wetu di ne, Tudi ne tatu muntu mununu, ne muan etu mukuabo wakamulelabo ku bununu buandi utshidi mukese, muan abo mukuabo wa difu dimue wakafua, ne anu yeye muana umuehele kua mamu wandi udi mushale ne tatu wandi udi umunanga
Bena Levi nebenze mudimu kumpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bua kuambuluisha Arone ne bena Izrayele bonsu

Tuetu tuakamuambila ne, Tudi bambe mei malelela, katuena batentekedi, tudi bana dikumi ne babidi ba tatu umue, umue wetu kenaku, ne mua n etu, muan a mukala udi mushale ne tatu wetu mu buloba bua Kanâna
Kanungu ka Nkoselu wa tshilumbu yônso badi bamufunda mu mukanda ne bumvwija tshidibo bakosela nanku
Nuoshe mpingu ya mvidie yabu yonsu

Kanungu ka Tshipangu tshia mianda ya bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bweena ditunga tshidi ne mudimu wa kufila ngenyi pa maalu a bubanji ne nsombelu wa bweena ditunga adibo ba tshipeesha kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga, Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa ne kudi Bukalenga bunene
Musulu awu uvua mupanduluke misapa inayi

Kadi yeye wakajanguluka bantu bakamukuata ku tshianza tshiandi, ne tshianza tshia mukashi wandi, ne bianza bia bana bandi bakashi babidi bualu bua Yehowa wakamufuila luse, bobo bakalua n andi, bakamuteka ku butshika bua musoko
Bulongolodi bwa mianda ya nzembu ne madimi ne ya meetu pa ditwa dia buluwa ne diloba, pa dikwata, pa dimuna, pa bidibwa bidi bifumina ku nyama ne pa bondapi bwa nyama
Nenudie bintu ebi mu miaba yonso, ne nuenu ne ba mu nsubu yenu edi ndifutu dienu diakanufutabo bua mudimu wenu mu ntenta wa kusambakena
; Mfumu wa bena Naftali: ke Akira, muana wa Eyinane ne bantu bende

Kanungu ka Bilondeshila bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu, Mulombodi wa ditunga udi weelangana mvita ku dipangadika dia Tshipangu tshia baminisitila panyima pa dianyisha dia Kapangu ka ku mutu kwa bilwilu ne dianyisha dia bibambalu biônso bibidi
Bialala mulume ne mukashi wa muan andi, nebabashihe bubidi buabo, bobo bakenza bualu bubi, ne mashi abo neikale ham bidi habo
Nubadike, nufunde mena a bantu balume bonsu badi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne pa mutu, bikale ne bukole bua kuenza mudimu mu bisumbu bishilangane bia tshiluilu tshia bena Izrayele
Tuakulua kabidi ne argent mikuabo bua kusumba bia kudia, katuena bamanye muntu wakahingasha argent ei mu bibombi bietu
Udi ne bua kuya ne mukoku wa tshimpanga kudi mutuangaji
Kulondabu bena Izrayele too ne mu mayi manene
Nansha, nuenu bantu balume nudi mua kuya kutendelela Yehowa, bualu bua nudi basue kuenza nunku
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kwikala mumanya, mu dienza dia midimu yende, dishilashilangana dia mianda ya bunkambwa mu ditunga
Kadi kakuakadi muntu umue munkatshi muabo wakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Mose wakamba ne, Halua Yehowa kunuha munyinyi dilolo ne kunukutshisha bidia ne dinda, bualu bua Yehowa udi munvue bu munudi numujiana, tuetu tudi banganyi
Tshimuangi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ambila Arone ne: olola diboku, atangije dikombu pa mayi adi mu musulu, mu tusulu tukese ne mu majiba, bua ndimba ipatukemu ibuele mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Biakuma muntu muhika wandi mulume anyi muhika wandi mukashi ne mulangala, ne biafueye mu tshianza tshiandi, nebamukengeshe bulelela
Badilamemu bua divuluije bena Izrayele buenzavi buabu
Wakabaha muntu ne muntu bilulu bihia bihia, kadi wakaha Benyamina bituha bia argent nkama isatu ne bilulu bihia bihia bitanu
Musangu awu, meme Moshe mvua muimane pankatshi penu ne Maweja Nangila, bua kunumanyisha bionsu bivuaye wamba
Esawu kuditshipa, kusumbisha bumuanabute buende kudi muakunyende
Bena Izrayele badi muaba ewu mbapite pa binunu nkama isambombu
Yeye wakamukonka ne, Wewe wakuenza tshinyi
Ndekela, mbanyoke

Diba adi, muaba wikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu musungule bua kusomba, nenumutuadile milambu eyi mishilangane, imvua munuambile: ya kuosha, ya bobumue, ya tshia dikumi tshia bintu bia mu madimi, ya budisuile, ne ya mapiku, inuvua bamulaye
Kadi biashaleye ne muoyo nansha dituku dimue nansha matuku abidi, kabena bamukengesha bualu bua yeye udi biuma biandi
Kanungu ka Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu kadi kamanyisha bûngi bwa lupetu bônso bwa Ditunga ku Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidimu tshiônso ne kafila kaaku ka dioosha
Mfumu wa kabukulu yônso udi ujinga kwenza mudimu, udi ukengela kufila mpala, udi ne tshia kudifila ku masungulangana, pa kumbusha dilonda dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka , kalongu bwa Dîyi dikulu edi
Meme nakanuambila ne, Nuakulua ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, buloba budi Yehowa mutuhe
Ubambile ne: Ndi Mundi mmuntume kunudi
Bakenza tshitotolo tshia tshijila tshia tshiamu tshia or, bakafundahu bu muakafundabo ha mabue ne, TSHINTU TSHIJIDILA KUDI YEHOWA
diumbula dia bifidi bia mudilu udi kawuyi utudika ne dipatula dia mâyi bwa majinga a polovensa
Itamare, muana wa mutuangaji Arone, neikale ubalombola
Kanungu ka : Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka, utentemuna ne padibio bienzeka, umbusha ku mudimu, mu olodonase, banzuji ne bandumbulula pa dilomba dia Kapangu ka ku mutu ka bandumbulula
Kadi tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete, neumulekele, aye

Kanungu ka Ndondo ya bupole, ya bungenda mushinga, ndondo ne diumvwangana bidi bitangila ndongolwelu ya bukwa matunga ne idi bitangila dikosa dia bilumbu bia bukwa matunga, eyi idi ikengela lupetu lwa Mbulamatadi, eyi idi ishintulula bulongolodi bwa ngelelu wa mêyi, eyi idi itangila mubidi wa bantu, eyi idi ifikisha kudishintakaja ne disakidila tshitupa tshia buloba badi mwa kuyijadika anyi kuyanyisha bilondeshila mêyi a ditunga
Muntu yonsu udi wenza tshilema tshia ku bitudi batela ebi, mmuena tshibawu, atonde bubi buende budiye muenze

Belâma Udi Wamba Malu Alualua Ku Mpala Tshiji tshiakakuata Balaka bualu bua Belâma wakakuma bianza biandi Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Nakakubikila bua kungelela bantu badi hanyi lukuna mulau, kadi mona, wewe wakubavudishila disanka misangu ei isatu
Maweja Nangila katshia ki mmunuambile bua kuenza nanku
Tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele netshienze tshilele etshi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Lewi ne, Hanuangata tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bintu bia Bena Isalele tshinakunuha bu buhianyi buenu, nenutshinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, tshintu tshia dikumi tshia tshintu tshia dikumi tshiakanuhabo
Wewe neuhe bantu ba bungi buhianyi bunene, ne bantu bakese buhianyi bukese muntu ne muntu wakabalabo wewe neumuhe buhianyi
Dituku dikuabu, Ismayele, muana wa Abrahame uvuaye mulele ne Agare muena Ejipitu, uvua unaya ne Izake
Bikala muntu kayi mumualamme mu musokoka, kadi Nzambi wakamuha mu tshianza tshiandi wakamushiha ku mpukahuka , nunku nenkulongoluele muaba wa yeye kunyemenamu
Biasua muntu wakajidila budimi kubuhikula, yeye neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu ha mushinga wakasanganabo, ne budimi nebuikale buandi
Udi upeta bukalenga padi dipangadika dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga dipatuka

Bialenga mundi tshianza tshiandi ha tshintu tshidi ne bukoya, nansha bukoya bua mundi nansha bukoya bua nyama nansha tshintu tshikuabo tshidi ne bukoya, ne biadieye munyinyi wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala udibo bafila kudi Yehowa, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo

Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, ne Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, bakaya ne bantu bakatentekela buloba, bakadihanda bilulu biabo, bakambila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele ne, Buloba butuakahita bua kutentekela budi butambe buimpe

Malu Makole Neakuate Bashihi ba Mikenji Kadi binuikala kanuyi nunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kuenza mikenji yandi yonso ne mei bindi nnuambila lelu, hashishe milau ei yonso neyilue kunudi, neyinukuate

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu kadi katangilula, mu mishindu mileeja kudi mêyi a ditunga, diludika dia lupetu lwa mbulamatadi, dia bintu bia mbulamatadi pamwe ne dia lupetu lwa mbulamatadi ya polovensa, ya bitupa bia teletwale bidiludika ne ya biâpu bia mbulamatadi

Nutume umue wa munkatshi muenu, alue biandi ne muan enu, muan a mukala kunoko, netunusuike mionshi buonso buenu, netutete mei enu, bua kumanya ne, Nudi nuamba mei malelela, anyi bualu bunakuditshiha ku muoyo wa Palo ne, Nudi batentekedi, nebuikale bulelela
Kadi bantu badi bannanga meme, bitaba meyi anyi, ndi mbafuila luse too ne ku ndelanganyi tshinunu
Elisheba awu uvua muanabu ne Nashone
Bantu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Dane nebase mitanda yabu ku tshisumbu ku tshisumbu luseke lua ku mutu kua nzubu wa tshijila, muaba udi dibendela diabu
Biula nebilue ham bidi hebe ne ham bidi ha bantu bebe ne ham bidi ha bahika bebe bonso
Bena Izrayele bavua bakuate ditunga dia mukalenga awu, bakuate kabidi ditunga dia mukalenga Oge wa mu Bashane

diteeka dia beena midimu ya diondapa nyama mu polovensa bu mudibio mu mukanda wa beena mudimu bashindama ba mbulamatadi; dienza dia ndongamu ya midimu ya dikuba dia nyama ne dilonda dia mapangadika a ba mpulushi ba mianda ya dikuba dia nyama nangananga mu bidi bitangila miaba ya mikalu ne ya dilamina nyama;
Muntu yonso udi uhambuisha muntu mufofo mu nshila udi ne mulau
lupetu lusomba munda mwa ditunga bwa majinga a polovensa;
Mu ditunga dienu nemuikale bapele misangu yonsu
Kadi padi mutuangaji mumane kuamba ne: muntu ewu kena mupie mikiya, pashishe mputa ya bilundu imueneka kabidi mu mutu, mutuangaji neakenkete musangu muibidi
Agare kushiya muana muinshi mua mutshi
Lebeka wakunvua bakambila Isaka Esau muan andi mei au Esau wakaya mu budimi bua kukebeye ntole, ne bua kuhinganeye n andi
Nebakeme, bamba ne: Bena tshisamba tshinene etshi badi ne bantu ba lungenyi ne meji
Nuvua badimuene muvua Maweja Nangila mukengeshe bena Ejipitu, nuwuaye muenze malu a kukema, muleje bukole buende bua kunupatula mu ditunga adi
Kadi Yakobe uvua muntu wa lutulu, musue kulama ku mbelu
Maweja Nangila kuambila kabidi Moshe ne Arone ne: Nulame bena Kekate bimpe bua bashale ne muoyi munkatshi mua bena Levi bakuabu
Mu ditunga dia Ejipitu ka muvua mushale kabidi mpasu nansha umue to

Yehowa wakahita ku mpala kuandi, wakela dî ne, Yehowa, Yehowa, Nzambi wa luse ne dinanga, kena ukuata tshiji lubilu, udi mûle tente ne luse lujalame ne bushuwa, udi ulesha binunu bia bantu luse lujalame, udi ubuikidila bantu malonga abo ne kusambuka kuabo kua mikenji ne malu mabi abo; kadi kena ubingisha muntu udi uhila; udi utumina bana ba tshikondo tshisatu anyi tshinai mibi ya batatu abo

Nenulekelelangane bintu nunku: muena dibanza yonso nealekele bintu biakasombesheye muena mutumba n andi; yeye kena wenzesha muena mutumba n andi ne muan abo mulume bua kuhingishabo bintu ebi; bualu bua etshi ntshidimu tshiakabambila Yehowa bua kulekelelangana bintu
Bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa bakashala mu tshituha ne bu muakadi dî ba Yehowa bakaya ku luendu, bakatumikila dî dia Yehowa, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Muaba awu, uvua mpokolu ya mayi dikumi ne ibidi ne mabue a ngaji makumi muanda mutekete
Nedikale Abrahame, bualu nenkuvuije nkambua wa bisamba bia bungi
Yetelo, tatu muenu wa Mose, wakalua ne bana bandi balume ne mukashi wandi kudi Mose mu tshihela hakadiye ushikama ku mukuna wa Nzambi
Ufunde mena a bantu balume bonsu badi ne bidimu bituadije ku makumi asatu too ne ku makumi atanu
Alona wakabiteka ku mpala kua Mushete wa Yehowa bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Muntu udi ushihela nzambi mikuabo nyama, kayi uyishihela Yehowa nkayandi, nebamushihe yeye
Hanoka wakalela Ilada ne Ilada wakalela Mehuyaela ne Mehuyaela Wakalela Metushaele ne Metushaele wakalela Lemeke
Bana ba Nafatale, Yasele ne Guni ne Yese ne Shilema

Mikalu yadi idi mushindu ewu: kutuadija ku tshipela tshidi kuinshi mu ditunga, too ne ku mikuna ya Lebanone, idi ku mutu mu ditunga; ku musulu munene wa Perate luseke lua kudi diba dipatukila, too ne ku Mayi manene a pankatshi pa matunga, luseke lua kudi diba dibuelela
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Ebu mbuloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba ne, Nembuhe tunkanunuina tuenu, nakukuleshabu ne mesu ebe, kadi wewe kuena usabukaku
Mukashi kaluatshi bilulu bia mulume, ne mulume kaluatshi bilulu bia bakashi: muntu yonso udi wenza malu au nunku udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Batshiteke kabidi pa nkayatshi matuku muanda mutekete makuabu

Biajidila muntu Yehowa tshituha tshia budimi bua buhianyi buandi, wewe neutuangane n andi mushinga ku bungi bua bintu bidiye mukunemu, biakuneye homer wa orge, mushinga wai newikale nshekele ya argent makumi atanu
Kalongu ka kumpala : Bidi Bitangila Mulombodi wa Ditunga Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi Mfumu wa Mbulamatadi
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu umvua nanku, kuambilaye nyoka ne: Wewe newenji nenku, ndi nkutshipa
Nupeshe mutuangaji Arone ne ndelanganyi yende bintu abi, bualu ke bintu binudi ne bua kubapesha matuku onsu too ne kashidi
Ndi nnujadikila lelu, diulu ne buloba biumvue, ne: Nuenu basonge mpingu, nebanuipate lukasa mu ditunga dia Kenaane dinuakuata, didi dishiya dia musulu wa Yardene
Nyunyi umue ikale bua mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu, mukuabu bua mulambu wa kuosha
Nenvudishangane tunkanunuina tuebe bungi bu mitoto ya mulu, nempe tunkanunui na tuebe buloba ebu buonso bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisankishibue bua tunkanunuina tuebe
Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga tshi mu polovensa
Benyi babidi kutungunuka ne luendu kuya ku Sodome
Eyowa, ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bakakanda bantu nunku

Ku milambu ya tshijila, bamane kuosha bitupa bidi bianyi, wewe ne ndelanganyi yebe, nenuangate milambu ya bia mu madimi bionsu bidibu bandambula, nyama ya kukobolola nayi bantu, ne nyama ya milambu ya dinua tshibalu
Kanuditshihi ne mashina ne dina dianyi, kanutedi dina dianyi tshitelatela, meme ndi Yehowa

Nuye kabidi mu buloba budi mutumba ne bena Amore, budibu base kudi bena Kenaane: ke ku mpata ya Yardene, ku mikuna, mu mpata ya luseke lua Mayi manene, mu tshitupa tshia kuinshi tshia ditunga, ne ku luseke lua muelelu wa Mayi manene
Kuamiaminaye Arone, ne ku bilamba biende
Monai, nakanuyisha mei ne mikenji, bu muakangambila Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, bua nuenu kubienza mu buloba bunudi nubuela bua kubuhiana
Bualu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, udi unuteta bua kujadika ne: nudi bamunange ne bukole buenu buonsu, kabidi ne muoyi wenu mujima anyi
Yakoba Wakenza nunku, wakashikisha lumingu luandi, ne yeye wakamuha Lakele bu mukashi wandi Labana wakafua Bileha, muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi, kudi Lakele bu muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi
Kanungu ka Mbênza tshisangilu tshia ba Nguvenêla ba polovensa
Bukula abu, buikale busambakaja ne mafuta, bukanga pa dilata bua kuenza mukata
Bena Levi nebatenteke bianza pa mutu pa ngombe ibidi bua kuyindambula meme Maweja Nangila, umue bua mulambu wa kubakobolola nawu, mukuabu bua mulambu wa kuosha
Kanungu ka : Kabeena mwa kutumina muntu nansha umwe dîyi bwa kwenzayi bwaalu bumweeneka ne kabweena bulonda mêyi ne mikandu
Mbabula eyi nya tshijila
Bobo nebanshihe meme, nebakushiye wewe ne muoyo
Udi mumane kudia tshimuma tshia mutshi umvua mukukandike anyi
Wakabisha mitshi hankatshi ha mabaya ku mutu tô ne ku tshitaku tshia mabaya
Uvua kabidi tshilembi tshia bushuwa, muikale ne bukole bua kudi Maweja Nangila

Nenudie bidia ebi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tô matuku muanda mutekete, mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka ne bintu bienu bionso biakakumbana, ne mudimu wonso unuakenza ne bianza bienu: nenuikale ne disanka dingi
Wakenza nkanu ya or mai, wakateka nkanu ei ku matumba anai ku mikolo ya mesa mai

Nenubange ku dituku didi dilonda dia lumingu, dituku dinuakalua ne tshisumbu tshia bintu bidibo banyukula, nenubale matuku a lumingu muanda mutekete, tô ne ku dituku didi dilonda dituku dia lumingu dia muanda mutekete bu matuku makumi atanu nenufile mulambu wa bukula buhia buhia kudi Yehowa
Kadi bikala mulume wandi mumukande mu dituku diakunvueye, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso kabiena bualame, mulume wandi wakavuisha malu au bu malu a hatuhu, Yehowa neamubiukidile bualu abu
Bakashi bonso bakadi ne lungenyi lule bakakuma bilulu ne bianza biabo, bakalua ne bilulu biakakumabo ne bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin muimpe
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kena mulekele bena Izrayele to, bualu uvua ne tshitunu bu muvua Maweja Nangila mudianjile kuambila Moshe
Moshe kubandamuna ne: Maweja Nangila mmumane kuamba ne: malaba ndituku dia kuikisha, dia tshijila dia Maweja Nangila

Hashishe hanatuma matutu mulu, muanzankongolo neumueneke mu matutu, nenvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi tshidi hankatshi hetu ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo, ne mai kaena avulangana kabidi bua kujimishau bintu bionso Muanzankongolo wanyi newikale mu matutu, hanaumona, nenvuluke tshihungidi tshia kashidi tshidi hankatshi ha Nzambi ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo ha buloba
Nenubajingile diakabi ku lusongu lua mukuna wa Ebale
Muntu udi ushiha nyama neafute muena nyama, muoyo ku muoyo

Hakatangileye kakanu ka ku diulu ne nkanu ya ku maboko a muan abo mukashi, ne hakunvueye mei a Lebeka muan abo mukashi ne, Mulume au wakungambila nunku, yeye wakaya kudi mulume wakadi muimane ne tumelo hehi ne mushimi wa mai
Neudie bisekiseki bia mu lupangu
Nanku kabakunshipa to

Dutelonone Yehowa Neabuele Bisamba bia Bena Kanâna Unvuai, Isalele, nenusabuke Yadene lelu, bualu bua kuihata bisamba bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole, ne misoko minene idi ne mpangu mile idi mihite mulu, bantu banene badi bale, bana balume ba Anaka, banudi bamanye; nuakulua lumu luabo ne, Nganyi udi mua kuimana ku mpala kua bana balume ba Anaka
Meme nenkufute
Hashishe, hakadiye wakula, tangilai, Lebeka wakadi mulela kudi Betuele, muana mulume wa Mileka, mukashi wa Naho, muan abo ne Abalahama, wakaluhuka ne mulondo wa mai ha diaha diandi
Yeye neashihe muana wa ngombe ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebaye ne mashi, nebamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu tshidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Nzambi wakamueneka kudi La bana, Muena Alama, mu tshiota butuku, wakamuambila ne, Udimuke, kuambidi Yakoba nansha di dimpe nansha di dibi
Nudie mampa adi kayi ne luevene to matuku muanda mutekete, ne dituku dia muanda mutekete nudie bidia ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kadi Palô kena ukunyuila, ne meme nenteke tshianza tshianyi ha Ejipitu, nempatule bantu banyi Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Bena Ejipitu ku dilumbulula dikole
Kanungu ka Padi tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshianyisha mukanda wa ditangilula,badi bangata Bukalenga bunene bu bulekela mudimu
Badi Basungula Balumbuluishi Dut
Buloba nebukuame bintu bia bungi, nuenu nenukute mafu tente, nenushikame bienu talala
Mukanda wa didiombola mutumina Bukalenga bunene badi bawangata ne mushinga padiwu mutwa tshiâla kudi tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia beena tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka
Bihanga ne mahu a tshitekelu biakadi bia tshituha tshia or tshimue, bakatula bintu bionso ne tshiamu tshia or nkayandi
Dituku divuadia bimuma bia mutshi awu, tshiebe ndufu
Mose wakatshunguluka, wakahueka mu tshibanda ne mabue abidi akadi ne mikenji mifundahu mu bianza biandi, mabue akadi mafu nda nseke yau ibidi, ha luseke lumue ne ha luseke lukuabo
Kubungamaye wamba ne: Nembutule muntu undi mufuke pa buloba
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ujidile bena Levi bua bikale banyi meme Maweja Nangila, pa muaba wa bamuanabute bonsu ba bena Izrayele
Moshe kuandamuna ne: Anu muwambi amu
Hashishe, Yehowa wakamatshisha mu Sodoma ne Amola soufre ne kalua bia mu diulu kudi Yehowa
Udi kabidi ne tshia kulama ne kutantshisha bisumbu bia bantu bidi kabiyi ne bukola pamwe ne tusumbu twa bantu twa tukesa
