Ndi mufike bua kubasungidila kudi bena Ejipitu, kubumusha mu ditunga edi, kubabueja mu ditunga dialabale didi ne mabela ne buitshi bipite bungi
Yeye ne balombodi ba mu bukalenga buende kuenza kabidi amu tshitunu
Wakahandibua kudi nyama mibi tshiakalua n au kûdi, meme nkayanyi nakaujimisha wakibabo nansha munya nansha butuku, wewe wakateka difutu edi ham bidi hanyi
Pashishe atue munu wende wa tshianza tshia balume, udi ulonda tshiala, mu mafuta adi mu tshianza tshiende tshia bakaji, amiamine mafuta awu ne munu misangu muanda mutekete kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Bana bandi ba balume bonso ne bana bandi ba bakashi bonso bakabika bua kumusamba, kadi yeye wakahidia bamusambe, wakamba ne, Nenye bianyi mu Muaba wa Lufu, njinga muan anyi

Tshimuangi Moshe ne Arone badi bamonangana ne mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu Malu onsu aa mamane kupita, Moshe ne Arone kuambila mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Izrayele udi wamba ne: Ulekele bantu banyi, baye kuenza tshibilu mu tshipela bua kuntendelela
Kekate uvua ne bana ba balume banayi: Amrame, Ishare, Ebrone ne Uziyele
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Nunganyishe bena Izrayele ne mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu malu onsu aa bua bena Izrayele bamone mua kumuka mu Ejipitu

Bobo bakimana ku mpala kua Mose ne kua Eleazâ, muakuidi ne ku mpala kua bakelenge ba mu tshisumbu, ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bakamba ne, Tatu wetu wakafua mu tshihela, yeye kakadi munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia Kola tshiakadisangisha kudi Yehowa, kadi yeye wakafua anu bualu bua mibi yandi, yeye kakadi ne bana ba balume nansha
Kayena mianji kumanyangana ne balume to
Bualu bua yeye wakatuhana, wakatudila bintu bietu bionso
Bena Izrayele kubanga kuangula nyunyi dituku adi, butuku bujima, too dituku dibiidi dijima
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Udi udidila kundi tshinyi
Kanungu ka Ndongamu wa lupetu lwa Mbulamatadi bu mudi lwa Bukalenga bunene ne lwa polovensa badi bamwenza musangu umwe ku tshidimu kudi dîyi

Muntu ne mundi wakela beka umue udi tshituha tshia nshekele wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi, muntu ne muntu wakadibo babala, waka mana kuhita bidimu makumi abidi, bakadi balume binunu nkama isambombo, binunu bisatu, nkama itanu ne makumi atanu
Enza mushonyi wa or bunene bua butshiama bua tshianza ku matshika onso, enza tshintu tshia or ku matengu onso
Mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu awu kena ne mikiya to
Bena Ejipitu bakamba kubihata, bakabalonda ku nyima kuabo mu bunene bua mai, tubalu tua Palô bionso ne makalu andi onso ne masalayi andi onso akadi enda ha tubalu
Kadi mbushi wakakuatabo kudi nshobo wa Azazele neamuteke ne muoyo ku mpala kua Yehowa bua kubuikila n andi bubi bua bantu, ne bua kumuihatshilabo bua Azazele mu tshihela
Kabidi kuena mua kukosa miosa ya muanabute wa mukoku
Matuku makumi anayi mamane kupita, Nowa kunzulula dididishi dia buatu buvuaye muenze

Bikala mulambu wa mundi mbushi, nealue handi ku mesu kua Yehowa, neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu handi, neamushihe ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, ne bana balume ba Alona nebamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu
Mubundayi, nukuate ditunga diende
Nealele bana

Katataka, ndi nkusengelela ne, Bukole bua Yehowa buikale bunene, bu muwakuamba ne, Yehowa kena ukuata tshiji lubilu, udi mûle tente ne luse lujalame, utu wabuikila bubi ne kuhanga bia bantu, kena ubingisha muntu utu wenza bubi, utu watumina bana ba tshihungu tshisatu anyi tshinai mibi ya batatu abo
Tshiji tshiakakuata Nzambi bualu bua yeye wakaya, ne muanjelo wa Yehowa wakaditeka mu nshila bu muhumbishi wandi: Belâma wakadi wenda ha nyima ha mpunda wandi, ne bahika bandi babidi bakadi n andi
mianda ya bunkanbwa,monima ya beena ditunga ne mpangu idibo bâmba ne idi yambulwisha ditunga dijima
Kanuena mua kuitaba bionsu ebi, nansha kuteleja mene bidibu banuambila to
Ulembeleshe tshilulu ha bitubuidi, Ulue ne mushete wa Nzambi ku nyima kua tshilulu, tshilulu atshi netshikale hankatshi ha muaba wa tshijila ne muaba mutambe wa tshijila
Pashishe kufuaye
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Bakasangisha tshiamu tshia mitaku bu ntalanta makumi muanda mutekete, ne nshekele binunu bibidi ne nkama mai
Kusukulaye bia munda ne bikonu mu mayi

Nansha nanku, tshingenyingenyi, dilomba anyi difwanyikija badi badifidila dieebeja dia beena ditunga anu padi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa tshibweeja Tshisangilu tshinene tshitabuja dilomba ku bûngi bwa bantu bwa bia bitanu bisâtu bia batshipwita
Mutuangaji akobolole muena tshibawu awu anu mushindu ewu, bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Bakumuka mu Tahata, bakashikama mu Tela
Ndi musue kubamanyisha mikenji yanyi, bua bayilonde, bannemeke patshidibu ne muoyi
Levi uvua mulele bana ba balume basatu: Ngershone, Kehate ne Merari

Mose wakambila Hobaba, muana mulume wa Luele, Muena Midiyana, tatu andi muenu wa Mose ne, Tutshidi tuya ku muaba wakamba Yehowa ne, Nennuheu, uye n etu, netukuenzele bimpe, bualu bua Yehowa wakalaya Bena Isalele bualu buimpe

Nuafunda ha minoko ya nsubu yenu, ne ku mishiku ya mpangu yenu; nunku nebavudishe matuku enu ne matuku a bana benu mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu bua kubahabo matuku onso atshidi diulu ha mutu ha buloba
Kadi muntu yonsu mukuabu walenga tshitupa tshia mulambu ewu, nebamunyoke

Nunku yeye neashihe mbushi wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, nealue ne mashi andi ku nyima kua tshilulu tshikudika, nênze bu muakenzeye ne mashi a muana mulume wa ngombe, neamiamine mashi ku tshibuikilu tshia mushete wa Nzambi ne ku mpala kua tshi kabidi

Mose wakabatuma ku nvita, bantu tshinunu ku tshisamba ku tshisamba, Pinehasa, muana mulume wa Eleazâ muakuidi, wakaya n abo ne bintu bikuabo bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne mpungi ya kuela n ai dî dikole mu tshianza tshiandi
Nujadike ne: buloba ne budi ne bufuke, anyi budi buatuka
Bana babidi bakakulelelabo mu Ejipitu diambedi tshiyi muanze kulua mu Ejipitu mbana banyi, Efelayima ne Manashe badi banyi bu Lubena ne Shimeona
Bena Izrayele kudikunguja muaba uvua Moshe ne Arone

Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bualu buenu, wakamba ne, Wewe kuena ubuelamu: Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, utu wimana ku mpala kuebe, yeye neabuelemu: ukoleshe mutshima wandi, bualu bua yeye neahianyishe Bena Isalele buloba
Pashishe ambule kabidi diampa diela buanga, didibu balambula pamue ne mulambu wa kutumbisha nawu Maweja Nangila
Nanku Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, neanuele lupemba mu bionsu binudi nuenza

Muakuidi neamutshihishe, neambile mukashi ne, Bikala mulume kayi mulale n ebe, ne wewe kuyi musesuke mu malu mabi kudi mundi udi kayi mulume webe, wewe wikale mubingishibue kudi mai a bululu adi elesha mulau
Patshiatshia mayi kupingana muawu mua kale
Shekeme wakambila tatu wandi Hamo ne, Ungangatshile nsongakashi eu bu mukashi wanyi
Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kudikuba
Mfumuanyi Abrahame mmupete diakalenga
Mulume eu wakamutangila talalâ, wakadi welangana meji munda bua kumanyeye ne, Yehowa wakungendesha dikasa bimpe, anyi
Yeye wakamba ne, Muntu kai wakadi kuambila Abalahama ne, Sala neamushe bana mabele
Maweja Nangila kukonka Abrahame ne: Mukajebe Sara udi useka tshinyi
Mvidi Mukulu kumona ne bionsu bidi bimpe
Genese Abalama ne Lota Badi Bahanduluka Abalama wakumuka mu Ejipitu ne mukashi andi ne bintu biandi bionso ne Lota, wakaya mu luseke lua ku Sude
Balume bonso ba mu nsubu wandi, baledibue mu nsubu wandi, ne basumbibue ku argent kudi ba bende, bakatengudibua n andi
Bakabala tshiamu tshia argent bu bungi bua bantu, ntalanta lukama ne nshekele tshinunu tshimue, nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu bu muakadi nshekele wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi
Nzala idi mua kunshipa
Hashishe Palô wakatuma di, Wakabikila Yosefe, bakamuhatula mu nsubu wa midima lubilu, yeye wakadibeya muedi wandi, wakaluata bilulu bikuabo, wakaya kudi Palô
Nuvuluke ngondo wa Abiba bua kutendelela kuhita kua Yehowa wenu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu butuku mu ngondo wa Abiba
Nyunyi umue ikale mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu
Kadi padi muntu awu ne dikeji ditoke pambidi, mputa kayi mondoke, kabidi boya kabuyi butokoloke, mutuangaji neumushe muntu awu munkatshi mua bantu
Kame udi tatuende wa Kenaane
Badi babwangatshila ku tshiengedi
Kabidi nenjadike ne: malu onsu auvua mulaye mfumuanyi Abrahame akumbanyi
Yeye ke uvua nsenda wa biamu bishilangane bikunze ne bifike
Amupeshe muana wa mukoku wa tshidimu tshimue bua aulambule Maweja Nangila, bu mulambu wa kuosha

Bualu bukuabo, usungule munkatshi mua bantu bonso balume badi ne lungenyi lule, badi batshina Nzambi, bena bulelela, badi bakina mbueshilu, ubateke ku mutu kua bantu bu bakokeshi ba bantu tshinunu ne ba bantu lukama ne ba bantu makumi atanu ne ba bantu dikumi

Yeye nênze nunku ne muana mulume wa ngombe, bu muakenzeye ne muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buabo nunku, ne bubi buabo nebuikale bubuikidibue
midimu ne bisalu bia bantu bônso idi yambulwisha polovensa ne misoko;

Bobo bakamba ne, Umuke Bobo bakamba ne, Mulumiana eu, wakahatula bua kushikameye kunoko, ne katataka yeye udi musue kuikala bu mulumbuluishi, nenkuenzele bualu bubi budi butamba bualu butudi tubenzela bobo
Noa wakashila Yehowa tshioshelu, wakangata wa nyama yonso idi miakane ne wa nyunyu yonso idi miakane, wakabika bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kalua ha tshioshelu
Kuenzabu nayi bitata bia kubuikila ku tshilambuilu
Nuenu nenuenze mudimu muaba wa tshijila, ne ku tshilambuilu
Yeye neadie munyinyi wa mulambu wandi wa kubisha n au ditalala bua kusakidileye n au Nzambi mu dituku didiye ufila mulambu wandi, kashiyi nansha katuha kakese tô ne dinda
Maweja Nangila udi wakuila bakaji bakamba ne bana ba nshiya
Milonda yonso ya mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne mu luhangu lua muaba wa kutendelela yakadi ya tshiamu tshia mitaku

Mesu enu akatangila bualu buakenza Yehowa bualu bua Bâla peô; Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakashiha balume bonso munkatshi muenu bakalonda Bâla peô; kadi nuenu bakalamata Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nudi ne muoyo lelu eu
Kadi munyinyi ne tshiseba, Arone kumuka nabi ku mitanda, kuya kubiosha
Nanku, bintu bia mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu ne bia mulambu wa dinua tshibalu, nebabiangate kudi mutuangaji, bualu mbintu bia tshijila menemene
Kadi nentue nebe ndondu
Nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe

Mikiya idi ikengela milambu bua kudikobolola Padibu babikila muntu kampande kudi balumbuluishi bua kujadika bualu budiye mumvue nansha mumone ne mesu, kadi yeye ubenga bua kujadika bualu abu, mmuena tshibawu
Mei abo akasankisha Hamo ne Shekeme, muan andi wa balume

Hakimita bimuna bikole mafu, Yakoba wakateka mitshi ei ku mpala kuabi mu mai, bua bimuna bimite mafu ku mpala kua mitshi, kadi hakatshidi bimuna bitekete, yeye kakateka mitshi, nunku bimuna bitekete biakadi bia Labana ne bimuna bikole biakadi bia Yakoba
Neamulombe kabidi bilamba bia kuvuala
Nunemeke Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, numulamate amu yeye
Pashishe kukangulaye bibuta biende, kupatulaye bilengejelu bia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, bia mpawungi, kabidi ne bilamba
Mose wakalua, wakabikila bakulu ba bantu, wakabamanyisha mei onso akamuambila Yehowa

Ya usangishe bakulu ba Bena Isalele, ubambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Isaka ne Nzambi wa Yakoba wakamueneka kundi, wakungambila ne, Nakulua kunudi, Hakatangila mudibo banuenzela mu Ejipitu

Katataka, tangilai, anu meme nkayanyi, nYeye mene, kakuena nzambi mukuabo, anu meme; meme ndi nshiha bantu, ndi mbabisha ku lufu; meme ndi ntaha bantu mputa, ndi mbondaha kabidi; kakuena muntu udi mua kubasungila mu tshianza tshianyi
Wakukuta difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Onana
Dituku dikuabu, padi bana benu banukonka ne: Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wetu, mmunuelele meyi ne mikenji ebi bua tshinyi
Bantu ba kafiondu aba bavua bilobu bia kalanda musenga ku kale
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakaya ku mpala, wakimana mu nshila mukese, kakadi ne muaba wa mua kuya ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Moshe udi ukeba muntu udi mua kubaludika mu luendu Moshe kuambila bukonde buende, Obabe, muana wa Reyuwele, muena Madiyane, ne: Tuetu tudi tuya mu ditunga divua Maweja Nangila mutulaye
Katuvua mua kuanyisha bua bapika betu bena Izrayele bumuke to

Edome Udi Uhidia bua Bena Isalele Bahite Mose wakatuma miloho ku Kadesha kudi mukelenge wa Edome ne, Muan enu Isalele udi wamba ne, Wewe udi mumanye makenga onso akutukuata: bankambua betu bakaya mu Ejipitu, ne tuetu tuakashikama mu Ejipitu musangu mule, Bena Ejipitu bakadienzela bibi ne bankambua betu kabidi: ne hatuakadila kudi Yehowa, yeye wakumpa dî dietu, wakatuma muanjelo wakatuhatula mu Ejipitu, ne tangila, tudi mu Kadesha, musoko udi ku butshika bua buloba buenu mene
Sarayi kuambila Abrame ne: Udi mumone ne Maweja Nangila kena mumpeshe bana
Numushipe bua kuenza tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila
Bumushe munyinyi wa mafuta onsu, bu mudibu benza bua mukoku wa mulambu wa bobumue
Enza mitshi ya acacia ibidi, ulamike or ku nseke yonso
Belâma Udi Uvudishila Bena Isalele Disanka Dinda Balaka wakaya ne Belâma ku mutu kua mikuna ya Bâla; yeye wakatangila tô ne ku matshika onso a tshitudilu tshia bantu

Kanungu ka Bukalenga bunene badi babwiimanyika kudi Minisitila kavulambedi, baminisitila, baminisitila bindonda ne padibio bienzeka, kudi bindonda bia Minisitila kavulambedi, baminisitila ba Mbulamatadi ne baminisitila batumibwa
Dîyi dilongolodi didi difila tuludiki twa bilumbulwilu bia basalayi
Bualu Mvidi Mukulu uvua mukandike lulelu lua mukaji wa Abimeleke ne lua bakaji bakuabu ba mu diku dia Abimeleke, bualu bua tshilumbu tshia Sara, mukaji wa Abrahame
Bena Awa bakadi bashikama mu misoko tô ne ku Gaza ne Bena Kafetô bakafuma ku Kafetô, bakabashiha, bakashikama mu muaba wabo
Butue nebulue bu dinfuenkenya dikese mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, butue nebuenzeshe mputa ya mbalanga ham bidi ha bantu ne ham bidi ha nyama mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Bana balume ba Bela bakadi Ada ne Nâmana: ne meku a Bena Ada ne meku a Bena Nâmana
Kinshasa ke tshimenga tshia mpwilamambu tshia ditunga ne kabidi lubanza lwa bishimikidi bia ditunga
Tumunuishe kabidi maluvu lelu
Bidimu bia Metushela bidi nkama tshitema makumi asambombu ne tshitema
Nutendelele amu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Bikala muntu ne disama dia nsudi, nebalue n andi kudi muakuidi, muakuidi neatangile, ne bikala tshima tshitoke tô mu dikoba, ne bikala miosa miandamuke mitoke tô, ne bikala munyinyi mubishe mu tshima, edi didi disama dia nsudi diakadi kudiye diambedi mu dikoba diandi, ne muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane, yeye kena umubuesha mu nsubu, bualu bua yeye kena muakane
Yeye wakamuambila ne Ya biebe, umone ne bana benu badi bakole ne bimuna bidi bimpe, anyi, walukila ungambile

Bwa kumona mwa kukumbaja dijinga edi divwa batumibwa ba ku Muyuki wa beena Kongu balêja,tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulu mpe ba mabala tshivwa tshiledibwa mu diumvwangana dia mu kabujima ne dia Tshikongu tshitwateedi atshi, tshiaafidi mu Tshimamwende wa bukalenga anyi MPANGU tshia Ditunga, bilondeshile kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu dia tshisabu, tshingenyingenyi any MPANGU tshia kumpala tshia Dîyi dikulu dipiadipia; Tshimamwende wa Bukalenga tshia Ditunga tshiaatshitabiji bu tshingenyingenyi tshia Dîyi dikulu tshidi beena mwaabo ne tshia kwamba nembatshianyisha
Pashishe, meme Maweja Nangila nempeshe mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu muoyi wa tshitunu, bua anulonde
Hashishe Sihona wakalua kutudi ne bantu bandi bonso bua kuluangana n etu nvita ku Yahasa
Nenuikale nupeta biakudia matuku asambombu malondangane
Kuenzekabi nanku
Nanku, milambu eyi neinuvuluije bualu ebu, bu mudi tshimanyinu ku diboku nansha pa mpala
Ndi ntuuta dikombu edi pa musulu wa Nile, bua mayi onsu andamuke mashi
Nemmufikishe mu ditunga edi divuaye muye kutentekela
Nennuambuluishe wewe ne muanenu Arone bua nuakule bimpe

Nsongakaji ungambila ne: Bu wewe musue tula mulondu panshi, umpeshe mayi a kunua, pikalaye mua kuitaba bua kumpesha mayi a kunua, ne kunuisha tumelu tuanyi, nemmanye ne nsongakaji awu ke uudi musunguile muntu webe Izake
Kusungulaye bantu bavua bonsu bamfumu ba bena Izrayele, bua bumuke mu tshipela tshia Parane, baye mu Kenaane

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ebu mbualu bua mudimu wa Bena Lewi ba bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu tô ne ha mutu nebenze mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, hahitabo bidimu makumi atanu, nebalekele mudimu, kabankuatshidi mudimu kabidi, kadi nebakuatshile bana babo mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bua kulamabo bintu, kabenji mudimu mukole, wewe newenzele Bena Lewi nunku hawabalesha mudimu wabo
Bakumuka mu Pihahilota, bakahita munkatshi mua dishiba dia mai bakaya mu tshihela bakaya luendu lua matuku asatu mu tshihela tshia Etama, bakashikama mu Mala
Bualu bua nakuha Bena Lewi tshintu tshia dikumi tshia Bena Isalele tshidibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, bu buhianyi buabo, bua bualu ebu nakubambila ne, Kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Bakakuata Lota, muana wa muan abo ne Abalama, wakadi ushikama mu Sodoma, ne bintu biandi bionso, bakaya n abi
Ke musangu wa kumpala uvua bena Izrayele bamuangala mushindu uvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe

Padi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Izrayele munusungule munkatshi mua bena Izrayele bakuabu bua nuenu kusemena pabuipi nende, kuenza mudimu muaba wa tshijila, kuyukila nende mu dina dia bena Izrayele bonsu, ki mbualu bunene budiye munuenzele anyi
Abrame kuasa mitanda yende muinshi mua mitshi ya tshijila ya Mambre pabuipi ne tshimenga tshia Ebrone
Kanungu ka Mu diumvwangana ne Mulombodi wa Ditunga, Bukalenga bunene budi busunguluja tshidiidi tshia Ditunga ne budi bwambula bujitu bwaatshi
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubikidisha Abrame, kumukonka ne: Tshiudi mungenzele ntshinyi

Nunku lua biebe, ndi nkusengelela, ungelele bantu aba mulau, bualu bua bobo badi bantamba bukole, hashishe nembahite bukole, netubashihe, nengihate mu buloba, bualu bua ndi mumanye ne, Muntu ûdi uvudishila disanka neikale ne disanka, ne mundi ûdi wela mulau neikale ne mulau
Milambu ya Masanka Majalame Dituku dia dikumi ne anai dia ngondo wa kumudilu ndituku dia kuhita kua Yehowa
Kulambi muana wa mukoko ne mabele a mamu wandi
Katuena ne dikima dia kuyamu to, bualu bana betu bavua bajadikila ne: bena ditunga adi mbatupite bukole ne bule
Mikenji ya bena Levi BADI BAJIDILA BATUANGAJI BA KUMPALA Tshibilu tshia kujidila Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ubikidishe Arone ne bana bende ba balume ku mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Nuenu nenudie mampa adi kayi ne luevene dituku adi bualu bua nakahatula bisumbu bienu mu buloba bua Ejipitu, nunku nenujidile dituku edi bu tshivulukidi tshienu tshiendelele
Bienza muntu bualu bubi budi Yehowa uhidia, kayi mumanye bualu, yeye neahile, neadituadile dihila dia bubi buandi
Kadi Mose wakanyema ku mesu kua Palo, wakikala mu buloba bua Midiyana, wakashikama hehi ne dina dia mai
Tshimuangi Mayi a Massa ne a Meriba Dib
; Mfumu wa bena Shimeyone: ke Shelumiyele, muana wa Surishadayi, ne bantu bende
Yeye wakababanyina bidia biakadi ku mpala kuandi, kadi tshituha tshia Benyamina tshiakahita tshituha tshiabo misangu itanu
Palô wakabikila Mose, wakamuambila ne, Yai bienu nutendelele Yehowa, shiyai anu mikoko ne ngombe, bana benu bakese baye n enu

Muakuidi neatangile ha disama, neateke tshintu tshidi ne disama edi ha buatshi tô matuku muanda mutekete, halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, yeye neatangile ha disama, bikala disama ditampakane mu tshilulu, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama, nansha mu tshiseba tshidibo benza n atshi mudimu edi ndisama dia nsudi; tshintu etshi katshiena tshiakane

Kudi tshibawu tshia mutabala mu lwendu lwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga anyi lwa Minisitila kavumbadi padiye wenza mudimu ne nzubu idi ne mushinga anyi ne bia kupaana bidiye mumanyina mianda yabi misokoma kadi mwikala wanji kubidiila makasa kumpala kwa mianda eyi kumanyikayi kudi bantu bônso
Maweja Nangila, tshisamba tshianyi ne meme katuena ne bualu to

Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata didi dianyisha, pikalabio kabiyi bibengangana ne bukubi bwa ditunga, dipengama pa bulaba bwadi dia beenyi badibo balonda anyi banyanga anu bwa, bu mudi, ngelelu wabo wa meji, ditabuuja diaabo, dikoba, tshiôta, tshisamba, mwakulu waabo anyi bwa midimu yaabo idi mikala yambulwisha mungalata, dikuba dia mapa a bantu ne bisamba biônso, bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu ne tuludiki tutshidi koku

Muakuidi neatangile ha disama didi mu dikoba diandi, bikala miosa ya mu muaba wa disama miandamuke mitoke tô, ne bikala disama dimane kubuela mu munyinyi wandi mene mene, edi ndisama dia nsudi, muakuidi neamutangile, neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane
Bakumukamu, bakaya ku Bê, ku mpokolo wa mai, wakambila Yehowa Mose ne, Usangisheku bantu, nembanuishe mai
Rebeka kushala muena kuende
Bena Ngershone bavua base mitanda yabu kunyima kua nzubu wa tshijila, luseke ludi diba dibuelela
Bakwiidi badi kabidi mwa kumulumbulwila kumpala kwa beena midimu ya bukubi bwa ditunga
Kufikabu ku Mara
Maweja Nangila mmuitabe anu bua bisamba bikuabu bitendelele bintu abi
Wewe muye netu, netukusankishe ne bintu bituikala bapete kudi Maweja Nangila, bu muvuaye mutulaye
Abalama wakatahulula bantu bandi, wakatuangana n abo butuku, yeye ne bahika bandi bakabatamba bukole, wakabihata to ne ku Hoba, udi ku tshianza tshia bakashi tshia Damaseke
Itamare, muana wa mutuangaji Arone, neikale ubalombola
Padi ditaba adi dimueneka menemene, nunku neajadike ne nzubu udi mupie mikiya, bualu kakuena mushindu wa kumusha butu abu to
Dituku dia tshitema: Abidane, muana wa Ngideyoni, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Binyamine
Abimeleke wakangata mikoko ne ngombe ne bahika balume ne bahika bakashi, wakabifila kudi Abalahama, wakahingasha Sala mukashi wandi kudiye kabidi
Mmumue ne: nebabipeshe mutuangaji
Kupandulukabu ne Abrame
Dituku dia muanda mukulu, muena nsudi awu, afile bana ba mikoku babidi badi kabayi ne bulema, ne lukungulu lua mukoku lua tshidimu tshimue kaluyi bulema

Kadi bikala bualu ebu bulelela, kabakamusangana ne bimanyinu bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama, hashishe nebalue ne mushikankunde eu ku tshibi tshia nsubu wa tatu wandi, ne balume ba mu musoko nebamukume ne mabue tô ne hafileye, bualu bua yeye wakuenza bualu bua tshikama mu Isalele, wakuenza bu mukashi wa masandi mu nsubu wa tatu wandi: nunku nenûmushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Meme ke bupianyi buebe ne bubanji buebe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele bonsu
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu a
Tshikondu atshi ke tshivua tumuma tua mvinyo tutuadija kukuama
Neyinupeteshe diakalenga
Wakenza malonga onso a tshioshelu ne bivuadi ne nkasu ne malonga ne bitubuidi bia kukuata n abi munyinyi ne bihanza bia kahia ne bintu biatshi bionso ne tshiamu tshia mitaku
Ashale ne muoyi
Nenushale ne muoyi matuku mavule mu ditunga didiye munupe kashidi
Bintu bionso bidi muntu udi kayi muakane ulenga bianza nebikale bu bintu bidi kabiyi biakane, ne muntu udi ubilenga tshianza neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo
Nanku kanuena mua kudia munyinyi, kudia kabidi ne muoyi to
Arone ne bana bende kutenteka bianza pa mutu wa tshimpanga atshi
Dituku dibidi: Netaneyele, muana wa Shuware, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Isakare
Ditendelela dibi Kanuena mua kuasa dikunji, nansha kukuna mutshi, bua kutendelela mvidie mikuabu, pabuipi ne tshilambuilu, tshinudi benzela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu to
Bana babo ne Yosefe dikumi bakaya mu Ejipitu bua kusumbabo bia kudia
Ke ditunga dia bena Keni, dia bena Kenizi, dia bena Kadmoni, dia bena Iti, dia bena Perizi, dia bena Refayime, dia bena Amore, dia bena Kenaane, dia bena Ngirgashi ne dia bena Yebusa
Pashishe neajikije mikiya ya mukaji awu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, bua kumukobolola ku mikiya ya tshijila tshiende tshia bakaji

Nanku mutuangaji ambule dianza dia bukula budibu basambakaje ne mafuta, ambule kabidi musenga wa kamonya onsu, abioshe bionsu pa tshilambuilu, bualu bintu ebi mmulambu wa tshivulukilu udi ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Ke padiye munupatule ku bupika, mununyenge ku bianza bia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu anu ku bukole buende
Mose wakumuka ku mukuna, wakahueka kudi bantu, wakabidika bantu ne bobo bakuvuwa bilulu biabo
Bakamukudimuna di ne, Tudi ba ku Halana
Nuenu bantu bahote badi kabayi ne meji, nudi nuhingishila Yehowa malu mabi nunku, anyi
Kanuenji nzambi mikuabo bua kuikala hehi n anyi nzambi ya tshiamu tshia argent anyi nzambi ya tshiamu tshia or, kanuyenji
Dinanga ne Butumike Bena Izrayele, tshidi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu utekemena kunudi ntshinyi
Gada, tshisumbu tshia bantu netshimunguile, kadi yeye neabakume ku bikankanyi biabo
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne tshimue ne nkama itanu
Nudimuke, kanupu ndondu muoyi, uvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mutue nenu
Kudisongedi luhingu anyi tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu tshia mu diulu anyi tshia tshintu tshia hanshi ha buloba anyi tshia tshintu tshia mu mai adi muinshi mua buloba
Meme kuambila Yoshuwa ne: Wewe nkayebe uvua mudimuene muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mutshimune bakalenga babidi ba bena Amore
Dikombu kuandamuka nyoka

Ei mmilambu ludi mua kuoshila ha tshioshelu bana ba mikoko babidi ba tshidimu tshimue ku dituku ku dituku misangu yonso Wewe newoshile umue wa mikoko ne dinda ne mukuabo dilolo Woshe muana umue wa mukoko ne tshia dikumi tshia tshihiminu tshia bukula busangisha ne tshia tshinai tshia tshihiminu tshia manyi, ne tshia tshinai tshia tshihiminu tshia nvinyo bu mulambu wa kunua
Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua nuenu kanuikadi bahika babo, nakatshibula mitshi ya tshikokedi yakatekabo ha nshingu yenu, nakanujalamisha
Bantu aba badi balami ba mikoko, bualu bua bakadi balami ba bimuna, bakalua ne mikoko yabo ne bimuna biabo ne bintu bionso bidibo n abi
Nembapeshadi bua badikuate

Bualu bua nuenu kanuakakuatshila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mudimu ne disanka mu mitshima yenu bua bintu bionso biakanuheye, nunku nenukuatshile badi n enu lukuna mudimu badi Yehowa unutumina, ne nzala ne nyota ne butaka ne kuhanga kua bintu bionso
Meme kushala muaba awu matuku makuabu makumi anayi a munya ne butuku, tshiyi mua kudia nansha kunua
Bobu bamane kutua ndondu nanku, Abimeleke ne Pikole, mulombodi wa bena mvita bende, kupingana mu ditunga dia bena Peleshete
Nuende bienu mu nshila wakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua nuenu nuikale ne muoyo, ne bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu mu buloba bunudi nuhiana
Panuikala kanuyi mua kumupikula, numushipe nukoyobole nshingu
dilonda dia mapangadika a bukookeshi bwa kusomba ne kwaasa nzubu kudi beenyi bu mudibio mu mêyi ne mikandu;
Dutelonone Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu ya Bena Kanâna Ek
Enoshe mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi tshitema, kulelaye Kenaane
Kadi bena Mowabe badi bababikila anu ne: mbena Emi
Arone uvua ne bana ba balume banayi: Nadabe, muanabute, Abiku, Elazare ne Itamare
Badi Batuma Batentekedi ba Buloba ku Kadeshe bânea Nom
Kanuena mua kulamba munyinyi wa muana wa mbuji, mu mabele a mamuende to
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu umvua bualu abu, kukebaye mua kushipa Moshe
Muntu yonso udi ulenga tshintu tshiakashikameye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Nuangate mfumu wa diku ku tshisamba tshionsu bua anuambuluishe
Yeye wakamuha Bileha, muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi, bu mukashi wandi, ne Yakoba wakaya kudiye
Kuasabu mitanda
Kanungu ka Tshingenyingenyi tshiônso anyi bulongolodi bwa dîyi bônso badi babujooja bilondangana kudi bibambalu biônso bibidi bwa kwanyisha mukanda wa momumwe
Bana balume ba Sheme badi nunku Elama ne Ashû ne Âpakashada ne Luda ne Alama
Bualu buakenzeye buakadi bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne yeye wakamushiha kabidi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Kumutshinyi nansha, bualu bua nakamufila mu tshianza tshiebe, ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buandi, wewe neumuenzele bu muwakuenzela Sifiona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi ushikama mu Heshebona

Kanungu ka : Ku bukookeshi bwa baminisitila badibo batwa mu nyima, baminisitila bindonda badi bakumbaja makookeshi adibo babapeesha kudi olodonase udi utangila bulongolodi ne ngenzelu wa mudimu wa Bukalenga bunene
Muntu yonso udi ulenga bulalu buandi tshianza neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Yehowa wakatangila bualu ebu, wakadi n abo tshiji, bualu bua mateta a bana bandi balume ne a bana bandi bakashi
Kutekabu bantu balume bonsu panshi, ne bapika bavuabu balelela mu nzubu muende, ne bavuaye musumbe ku matunga makuabu
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kumenesha mitshi ya mishindu yonsu pa buloba, mitshi milenga kumona ne mesu, mimpe kudia mukana
Palo wakakonka Yakoba ne, Bidimu bia muoyo webe bidi bungi munyi
Badi mua kuela mpungi anu kudi batuangaji, bantu ba ku ndelanganyi ya Arone
Badi bamanye muudi ubalama, bualu mu munya udi wenda kumpala kuabu mu divuba, butuku mu tshimunyi tshia kapia

Lewitiki Muaba Umuehele wa Kushihela Milambu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne bana bandi balume ne Bena Isalele bonso ne, Ebu mbualu buakuamba Yehowa ne, Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua Bena Isalele udi ushiha nansha ngombe nansha mukoko nansha mbushi mu tshitudilu anyi ku butshika bua tshitudilu, kayi nulue n andi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena bua kumufila bu mulambu wa Yehowa ku mpala kua nsubu wa Yehowa, nebamubale bu muhite bua mashi akamatshisheye hanshi, yeye wakamatshisha mashi hanshi, nebumushe mundi au munkatshi mua bana babo
Anyi bialengeye tshianza ha manyanu a muntu ne bikala bualu ebu busokoka ku mesu kuandi, hamanyeye bualu ebu, yeye neahile
Nuambile bantu bonso ba mu Isalele ne, Mu dituku dia dikumi dia ngondo eu muntu ne muntu asungule muana wa mukoko ku nsubu ya batatu abo, muana wa mukoko ku nsubu muana wa mukoko ku nsubu
Bena Izrayele bakuabu kubenga diyi dia Moshe, kushiya biakudia bikuabu bua kudia dinda
Uvua uyangula mikese, uvua nayi kilos binunu
Nyama ya mpunda yakadi binunu makumi asatu ne nkama itanu, ne mulambu wa Yehowa wakadi makumi asambombo ne umue
Hakambabo kubuela mu Ejipitu, Abalama wakambila mukashi andi Salai ne, Tangila ndi mumanye ne wewe udi mukashi muimpe kumona, ne hakumona Bena Ejipitu, bobo nebambe ne, Eu udi mukashi wandi
Mbadienzele lupingu lua tshiamu tshiengulula
Nunku ujikemu tshitalu
Muntu ne mundi wakela mulangala wandi hanshi, wakakudimuka nyoka, kadi mulangala wa Alona wakatuma milangala yabo
Mpindiewu nudi bungi bu mitotu ya mulu
Dituku dia muanda mukulu, muntu udi udikobolola awu, neafile bintu ebi kudi mutuangaji kumpala kua Maweja Nangila mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Diba adi bamfumu ba bisamba bia bena Izrayele bavua balombola dibadika dia bantu, kufika ne milambu yabu
Buloba nebuikale ne bidimu bia buhafe tô bu bungi bua bidimu binuakuhidia kushiya buloba bua kubandabu hanuakashikamamu
Nanku muntu ewu kena mupie mikiya nansha
Nanku muntu yonsu udi ne mikiya, nansha udi kayi nayi, udi mua kudia munyinyi awu, mudiye musue, bu munudi nudia munyinyi wa kabuluku, nansha wa ngulungu
Pashishe kuamiaminaye kabidi bana bende ba balume, ne ku bilamba biabu

Bikala muntu muenze bualu bubi bua lufu, ne badi bamushiha, nebamuowe ku mutshi; kabashiyi tshitalu tshiandi ku mutshi butuku bujima, bamujike anu dituku adi mene; muntu yonso muowa ku mutshi udi muedibue mulau kudi Nzambi; kanunyangi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Baleleshi kuandamuna ne: Bakaji ba bena Ebrewu badi ne bukole bua bungi, bapite ba bena Ejipitu
Hakatshiabu bakabika ne dinda dionso, bakafua milambu ya kuosha, bakalua ne milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, bantu bakashikama bua kudia ne bua kunua, bakabika bua kunaya
Kadi ndayi, nubambile ne: Meme Maweja Nangila, ndi ne muoyi

Unvudishile meme kabidi disanka tatu anyi Esau wa kabandisha di diandi wakadila Isaka tatu andi wakamuambila ne, Wewe neushikame mu buloba budi bukuatshika bintu bimpe, ne dibungi dia mu diulu nedikumatshile, wewe newikale ne muoyo bualu bua muele webe wa nvita wewe neukuatshile muakuny ebe mudimu hawahanduka wewe neumushe mutshi wandi wa tshikokedi ku nshingu kuebe
Pashishe nebabueje milonda ku mesa aku bua kuwambuilaku
Nanku, tukebayi mushindu wa kubapumbisha bua kabavudianganyi to
Dituku disambombu Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Pa buloba pikale nyama ya mishindu yonsu: bilandadi, nyama ya ditu ne bimuna

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi, mudi dipangila dia ditunga pikala Mulombodi wa Ditunga mudiâta Dîyi dikulu ku makasa mu budiswila bwenda anyi pikalabo bajadika ne yêye ne Minisitila kavulambedi, badi bênza, bênza pamwe anyi bambulwisha bakwabo mu didiata ku makasa dinene ne kadiyi kwela mpata dia Mapa a muntu yônso, anyi mu diabanyina beenyi tshitupa tshia bulaba bwa ditunga
Moshe ne Arone ne bana bende bavua base mitanda yabu luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua muaba wa tshijila, kumpala kua tshibuelelu tshia muaba awu

Yehowa wakamba ne, Bualu bua muadi wa Sodoma ne wa Amola udi munene, ne bualu bua malu mabi abo adi matambe bukole, nyaya katataka bua kubamona ne badi benza bu mudi muadi wabo wakufika kundi, ne bikalabo kabayi benze nunku, nemmanye bianyi
Tshimuangi Dikenga dia muanda mukulu: mpasu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Uye kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi nzuji wa manyooka wa Mulombodi wa ditunga ne wa Ministila wa kumpala bwa bibawu bia tshidiidi bia dipangila dia ditunga, dipeeja dia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga, dinyanga dia lumu anyi diupula dia mushinga wa ditunga pamwe ne bwa bibawu bia bantu batabala ne bwa bibawu bikwabo ku mêyi ne mikandu ya bantu bônso, bibawu bibunda mu midimu yabo anyi pa dîba dia midimu yabo
Bakaluangana ne Bena Midiyana bu muakambila Yehowa Mose, bakashiha balume bonso
Bileha, muena mudimu wa Lakele, wakimita difu kabidi, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume mukuabo

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka , utentemuna ku mudimu ne , padibio bienzeka, umbusha ku mudimu, pa dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene ditangilula mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila : bamwenampala mu matunga meenyi ne batumibwe ba pa bwaabo; bamfumu banene ne bamfumu ba ku mutu kwa bilwilu ne kwa bampulushi ba ditunga, panyima pa dijadika dia Kapangu ka ku mutu kwa bilwilu; Mfumu wa eta majolo mujima, bamfumu ba eta majolo ne bakumanda ba inite minene ya bilwilu, panyima pa dijadika dia Kapangu ka ku mutu kwa bilwilu; balombodi ba ku mutu kwa midimu ya mbulamatadi; bamfumu ba midimu ne nzubu ya mbulamatadi; batumibwe ba mbulamatadi mu kumpanyi ne mu bishimikidi bia ditunga, pa kumbusha batangiludi ba bibutshilu

Nebanutete mu ditunga dilaya Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, neanufikishe mu ditunga dimpe, didi ne tshitalela tshia mayi a misulu ne a mpokolu mivule, adi apatuka mu tshibandabanda, nansha mu mukuna
Nanku nenumanye ne: Meme ndi Maweja Nangila, ndi nsunguluja bena Ejipitu ne bena Izrayele
Baamiamine ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu tshidi ku mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta
Kumvuanganabu bua kuluangana mvita
Hashishe, Abalahama wakadishinda hanshi, wakaseka, wakamba mu mu tshima wandi ne, Nebalelele muntu udi ne bidimu lukama muana, anyi
Ke muanunyokabu, bualu nuvua nudiabakena, nujinga Ejipitu, nulengulula Maweja Nangila udi munkatshi muenu
Yehowa neanumushile masama onso: kena unusamisha masama mabi a mu Ejipitu, anudi bamanye, kadi yeye neasamishe badi n enu lukuna masama au

Nyama udi mufofo, anyi ne mifuba mitshibuke, anyi udi ujeka, anyi udi ne mputa, anyi udi ne tshikutu, anyi udi ne bilamulamu, kanufidi nyama ei kudi Yehowa bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ha tshioshelu tshia Yehowa
Kadi nyema, kolesha ubutame mu kasoku aka
Ndi nkupeshabi, bana betu bonsu batangile, bua ujikemu muena kuebe
Binuamba mu mitshima yenu ne, Nemmanye dî didi Yehowa kayi mutuambile munyi
Utshidikishe nseke mai mikosolola hankatshi bua kuikala nseke ibidi ya bunene bumue, buludi buatshi nebuikale bu ntanta wa tshianza, ne butshiama buatshi bu ntanta wa tshianza
Pavua Moshe mu njila, ulala mu nzubu wa tshilala benyi, kusambakenaye ne Maweja Nangila uvua ukeba kumushipa
Mweena Kongu yônso udi mwa kwasa tshisumbu tshia diaakwila beena mudimu anyi mwa kumubweela mudilekelela bilondeshila bulongolodi bwa mêyi a ditunga
Nunku mukelenge wa Edome wakahidia bua Bena Isalele bahite butshika buandi, nunku Bena Isalele bakasesuka kuakadiye
Bimenga binene bia kumpala bivua ku bumfumu buende bivua: Bahele, Ereke, Akade ne Kalne mu ditunga dia Babilone
Kadi nansha mbua kena mua kubululala umue wa Bena Isalele, nansha muntu nansha nyama, bua nuenu mumanye ne, Yehowa udi utahulula Bena Ejipitu ne Bena Isalele
Abrahame ne Sara bakavua bakole bakulakaje, Sara mumane kupita diba dia buledi, katshiyi umona tshijila tshia bakaji
Pikala bana benu banukonka ne: nudi nuenza tshibilu etshi bua tshinyi
Bakatua bana babo balume bu banyemi, ne bana babo bakashi bu bena lukanu kudi Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole
Nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe
Tshibangidilu Kayine ne Ebele Adame kubuelela mukajende Eva mu nzubu
Kanuena mua kushipa muena tshibawu awu kanuyi banji kujadika tshilumbu kudi bantu babidi nansha basatu
Nuase misoko ya bana benu bakese ne mpangu ya mikoko yenu, nuenze mei onso akaluhuka mukana muenu
Kumpala kwa kwenzatu mudimu, mulombodi wa Tshisangilu Tshinene udi utumanyisha Kabadi komekela mianda ya Dîyi dikulu bwa kôku kujadikaku dikumbanangana diatu ne Dîyi dikulu, mu tshipungu tshia matuku
Kadi bana benu bena Levi nebanulamate, banuambuluisha
Katshia bandela too ne mpindiewu patudi nebe apa, tshiena mumanye mua kuakula bimpe to
Badi banji kupingana baminisistila bakwabo padibo kabayi popu anyi padiku tshipumbishi
Tshimuangi Mvidi Mukulu udi umanyisha dikenga dia ndekelu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ndi ntumina mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne bantu bende dinyoka dia ndekelu
Kadi nudi mua kudia bishi, bidi kabiyi ne mikiya
Mu tshikondo tshinai tunkanunuina tuebe netulue kunoko kabidi, bualu bua bubi bua Bena Amole kabuena buanji kukumbana

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Buhidia Buabo Hashishe halua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, n enu mu buloba buakalayeye batatu benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bua kunuhabu, misoko minene ne miakane mudi kanuyi bibake, ne nsubu miule tente ne bintu bimpe mudi kanuyi bûshe, ne mena a mai akumbulabo, anudi kanuyi bumbule, ne madimi a tumuma tukese ne mitshi ya olive, binudi kanuyi bakune; nuenu nenudie, nenukute mafu tente; hashishe nudimukai, bua kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa buluka
Butshia dinda kubalayaye ne: Nkadi mpingana kudi mfumuanyi
Bakaya ku luendu luabo, ditshina dia Nzambi diakadi ku misoko yakadi ha buihi n abo, ne bena musoko kabakalonda bana ba balume ba Yakoba
Benji ba bilengulengu ba bena Ejipitu kuidikija mua kuipata tumue atu, ku majimbu abu
Nuenu nenujingulule bidi tshijila ne bidi kabiyi tshijila, ne bidi binyanguke ne bidi biakane
Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu badi bakenzulula mu tshimwe tshia bisatu tshiaku panyima pa bidimu biônso bisatu
Kadi nenusabuke musulu wa Yardene, bua kusomba mu ditunga adi ne ditalala
Pashishe pikale dikeji ditampakane pambidi ponsu, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu ewu mmupie mikiya, bualu udi ne disama dia nsudi
Bantu bonsu ba pa buloba mbafume anu kudi bana aba basatu ba Nowa
Hakalela Shela Ebê, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama mai ne bisatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Kadi ungenzele meme, ne bena ditunga dianyi diudi usomba, bimpe mumvua mukuenzele
Nualekele, apueke panshi bu mayi
Yeye wakaya bua kuebesha Yehowa
Mmudikebele tshilumbu
dikosa dia bibawu bia lupetu anyi bia lukanu bwa kuneemekija mêyi bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga;
Bantu bonsu bamone nanku, kuelabu tunkunduluila
Mikenji eyi idi itangila disama dia nsudi dia mishindu yonsu: kababa, biwuja, muaba muwule, dikeji ditoke pambidi pa muntu, butu budi bukuate pa bilamba, nansha ku nzubu
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi anayi
Kadi kakosa nsambu idi mitangila masungula a Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne a bena Tshiamwenda wa bukalenga pamwe ne idi mitangila dieebeja dia beena ditunga
Nuteleje muntu yonsu, mubanji ne mupele, kakuyi kansungansunga
Izake kuangata Rebeka, kuya nende ku ntenta wa mamuende Sara
Umpe bakashi banyi ne bana banyi, banakakukuatshila mudimu, undekele, nenye, bualu bua wewe udi mumanye mudimu unakukuenzela
Neubangile mukashi kadi munga muntu nealale n andi; newase nsubu kadi kuena ushikamamu; neukune budimi bua nvinyo, ne kuena udia mamuma abu
Muntu wakihata mbushi wa Azazele neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neowe mai, ne ku nyima yeye neuhingane mu tshitudilu
Bwa kufunda muntu yônso, kumukwata, kumwela mu lukanu anyi kumupiisha, bidi bikengela anu kulonda mêyi ne mikandu mu mushindu udiwu alongolola
Muntu udi utaha mukuabo mputa nebamuenzele muomumue mputa ku mputa, disu ku disu, dinu ku dinu bu muakenzeleye mukuabo nebamuenzele yeye
Mukalenga mumane kusomba mu nkuasa wa bukalenga, bamutentuile mukanda wa mikenji ewu, udibu balame kudi batuangaji ba bena Levi
Kunyengaye kabidi ne Lote, muana wa muanabu ne bintu biende bionsu, pamue ne bakaji ne bena diende bonsu ba wabu bakuate
Nanku panuafika mu ditunga didi Maweja Nangila munupe, divuaye mulaye bankambua benu, bu mudiye mununange, Yeye neanusankishe
Biambeye dî, kena udishikisha, anyi
Kubuelabu kabidi ne nyama ya muitu ya mishindu yonsu, bimuna bia mishindu yonsu binene ne bikese, nyunyi ne bishi
Nanku panuafika pabuipi ne ditunga adi bua kudikuata, Yeye neanuipatshile baluishi benu, badi banupita ku bungi ne ku bukole
Bisamba bionsu bidi bitangalaka mu bidila nansha ku mielelu ya mayi manene mbifume ku ndelanganyi ya bana aba
Bitupa bia munda ne lwendu lwa bisumbu bia beena mudimu bidi ne tshia kwikala bia mungalata
Masanka Majalame Ek
Sala udi ne bidimu makumi tshitema nealele, anyi
Bualu bua bantu bonso nebikale ne mukenji umue kunudi ne kudi muenyi udi munkatshi muenu ku bikondo bienu bionso: muenyi neikale bu nuenu ku mesu kua Yehowa
Tshiowelu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wewe newenze tshiowelu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku ne tshitaku tshiatshi tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku kudibo bowa mai
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile tshisumbu tshonso ne, Umukai ku nsubu wa tshitendelelu wa Kola ne Datana ne Abilama

Uvuluke Abalahama ne Isaka ne Isalele, bantu bebe, bawakaditshiha kudibo, wakabambila ne, Nenvudishe bana benu bu bungi bua mitoto ya mulu, ne buloba ebu buonso bunakanuambila nempe bana benu, bobo nebabuhiane tshiendelele
Tuakabasa mikete, musoko wa Heshebona udi muhaula tô ne ku Dibona, tuakunyanga buloba tô ne ku Nofa ne ku Medeba

Bikai bienu, yai, nuhite mu tshibanda tshia mai a Ânona: monai, nakafila Sihona, Muena Amole, mukelenge wa Heshebona, ne buloba buandi mu tshianza tshienu; nubange kuhiana buloba, nuluangane n andi nvita
Njiji yonsu kumuka kua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, kua balombodi ba mu bukalenga buende ne kua bantu bende bonsu
Tshibambalu tshidi tshipeta mukanda mumana kweelela tukanda kudi Tshibambalu tshikwabo tshidi tshijooja amu mukanda udibo batshitumina

Bantu bamwela diboku mulu Bwa bwimpa bwenda Yoyoyo Kemayi Muntu wa bwela mu cyalukamu Kusekiseki mwineba Maria Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Kabulu kwamba kusekiseki mwineba Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Wewa muswe kucina maalu Sanka olonda meyi ne mikandu ya Mulopo Kwema dinanga munda mwebe Unanga Nzambi webe kumpala kwa bionso Unemeke baledi bembe Kuvualakanyi kantu ka mukwebe shabana eyo Mukàjì wa benda kelengi
Ateke tshianza pa mutu wa mbuji awu, amukosele muminu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, muaba udibu bashipela nyama ya milambu ya kuosha

Dîyi dilongolodi ke didi difila ngikadilu wa butontolodi bwa beena tshidiidi Kanungu ka Mbulamatadi udi ne bukookeshi bwangatangana pa buloba, mwinshi mwa buloba, mâyi ne meetu, pa bitupa bia mu lupepela, mu misulu, mu mâyi matengebela ne mu mbuwa bia Kongu ne kabidi pa mbuwa wa ditunga ne pa maloba mûma a Kongu
Isaka wakambila Esau ne, Mona, nakumana kumuvuisha mukelenge, webe nakufila bana benu bonso kudiye bu bahika bandi nakumujadika ne manvua ne nvinyo muhiamuhia nenkuenzele wewe tshinyi, muan anyi
Nanku bonsu bumvue batela Izake nebaseke pamue nanyi
Maweja Nangila kukonka Moshe ne: Bena Izrayele nebabenge kuitaba meyi anyi ne mikenji yanyi too ne ku diba kaayi
Bele tshiadi tshia nyama atshi mulu, batshinyukule bua kutshilambula
Mukenji wa Tshia Dikumi Nufile kudi Yehowa tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso binudi nuhuola ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Kadi udi mumanye bivua bingenzekela
Kutulabu ntenta wa kusambakena, kumuambulabu kudi bena diku dia Ngershone ne dia Merari
Nebatekepu kabidi mampa a tshijila anudi ne bua kundambuilapu kashidi
Kadi bua nyama idi ne mikiya ubuele anu ne mulume umue ne mukaji umue

Yakabuikila buloba buonso, to ne hakalua buloba midima, yakadia midioko yonso ya mu madimi ne mamuma onso a ku mitshi, biakashala ku mabue a nvula, nansha tshintu tshikese nansha midioko nansha mutshi biakashala mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Kumuinyikaye ne Nowa, wamba ne: Muana ewu neatusambe ku mudimu mukole wetu wa bianza utudi tukuata, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mutshipe buloba

Nenudie bidia bia disanka dia bitandatanda tô matuku muanda mutekete, hanuashikisha kusangisha bintu ku tshishihuidi ne ku tshikaminu: nenuikale ne disanka hanuadia bidia ebi, ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muntu webe mulume ne muntu webe mukashi ne Muena Lewi ne muenyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila badi mu misoko yenu

Biajidileye Yehowa budimi buakasumbeye budi kabuyi bua buhianyi buandi, muakuidi neamubadile mushinga uwakatuangana n andi ku tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, yeye neafue mushinga uwakatuangana handi dituku adi bu tshintu tshia tshijila kudi Yehowa
Tshibangidilu Dina dia Abrame nedishale ne: Abrahame Abrame mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi tshitema ne tshitema, Maweja Nangila kumumuenekela, umuambila ne: Ndi Mvidi Mukulu wa bukole buonsu
Genese Kana ne Ebele Adama wakamanyangana ne Eva, mukashi wandi, ne yeye wakimita difu, wakalela Kana, wakamba ne, Nakuangata muntu kudi Yehowa
Pashishe Moshe kuambila kabidi Kora ne: Nuenu bena Levi telejayi
Kabidi bantu bonsu nebapingane ku nzubu yabu anu bimpe, bumvuangane
Kadi, bu muvua bena Izrayele kabayi bamanye bintu abi, kukonkanganabu ne: Etshi ntshinyi

Bakambilangana ne, Tuetu tuakudihisha bulelela mu bualu bubi butuakenzela muan etu hatuakatangila kanyinganyinga ka mutshima wandi hakadiye utusengelela, kadi tuetu katuakamunvuila, bua bualu ebu dikenga diakatukuata
Eyo, nakuangata dî bua kubavudishila disanka yeye wakabavudishila disanka, ne meme tshiena mumanye mua kudikudimuna
Mona, bantu aba badi bahika bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, yeye udi ubika bu nyama wa ntambue, yeye kena ulala kabidi to ne hadieye tshintu, ne hanueye mashi a tshintu tshiakashiheye

Muntu udi mupeta bukookeshi bwa kupengama mu njila mululame kêna mwa kubanga mudimu kampanda ônso wa kusalulula bulongama bwa ditunga diende dia bangabanga anyi bwa ditunga dikwabo diônso, yêye mwikala mu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata to
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nulue ne milambu, ne bintu binudi nuosha ha kahia, bidi bitua dihembu kundi, mu matuku anakasungula

Nunku hafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu bonso badi n enu lukuna mu bianza bienu, ne hanuaheta dikisha mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana, hashishe nenujimishe tshivulukidi tshia Amaleka muinshi mua diulu; kanuhu muoyo bua bualu ebu nansha
Bualu bua bobo badi bampebue bajima munkatshi mua Bena Isalele mu miabo ya ban a bute bonso ba Bena Isalele nakadiangatshilabo
Dîyi didi dileeja ngikadilu wa bamfumu ba kabukulu
Muntu ne muntu wakadi ne tshiamu tshia argent ne tshia mitaku wakalua n abi bu kuha kua Yehowa, muntu yonso wakadi ne mitshi ya acacia yakadibo mua kuenza n ai mudimu wakalua n ai

Nomba Badi Bihata Badi Kabayi Bakane mu Tshitudilu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wele dî kudi Bena Isalele bua bobo bihate bena nsudi mu tshitudilu, ne muntu yonso udi ne mputa wa luhangu ne muntu yonso udi munyanguke ku dilenga dia muntu mufue nebihate nansha mulume nansha mukashi ku tshitudilu, kabanyangi tshitudilu tshiabo, mundi mushikame
Yeye ke Mvidi Mukulu munene ne wa bukole bonsu, udi bantu bonsu batshina
Hakaha Nzambi wa mu diulu bisamba buhianyi buabi, hakatahululeye bantu, wakadika mikalu ya bantu bu mudi bungi bua bana ba Isalele

Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi mwa kwelangana mvita mu olodonase mushintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, panyima pa bamana kweebeja Kapangu ka ku mutu ka bilwilu ne bamana kupeta dianyisha dia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne dia batshipwita bakulumpe, bilondeshila kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi
Numanye ne: Maweja Nangila udi mfumu wa mvidie yonsu, ne mukalenga wa bakalenga

Wakambila Adama ne, Bualu bua wewe wakuteleja di dia mukashi webe, wakudia mamuma a mutshi unakukuambila ne, Kuadi nansha, buloba buakedibua mulau bualu buebe, wewe neudie bidia biabu ne kanyinganyinga matuku ebe onso, buloba nebukumeneshile meba ne tusokola, neudie midioko ya mu budimi, neudie bidia ne luanga ha mpala hebe to ne hawahingana mu buloba kabidi, wewe wakumushibua mu buloba, wewe udi dinfuenkenya dia buloba, neuhingane mu dinfuenkenya dia buloba kabidi
Meme nkayanyi tshiena mua kutuala bantu aba bonso, bualu ebu budi buntambe bunene
Mutuangaji ateke bintu bionsu abi pa nkunyi ya kapia idi pa tshilambuilu
Muakuidi neatonde milau ei mu mukanda, neanumushe mu mai a bululu, neamushe mukashi mai a bululu adi elesha mulau, ne mai adi elesha mulau neabuele munda muandi, neikale mai a bululu
Patshivua tshitalu tshia Sara katshiyi tshianji kujika, Abrahame kuya kudi ndelanganyi ya Ete, kubambila ne: Meme ndi muenyi munkatshi muenu
Nuenu nuakangambila ne, Bualu buwakuamba budi buimpe bua tuetu tuenze
Wakamona kabidi ngombe mikuabo muanda mutekete minyane, kayakadi ne manyi nansha, yakabanda mu mai, yakimana ne ngombe mikuabo kukala kua mai
Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu ke kadi kamanyisha dibumbusha adio
Nanku Maweja Nangila kakuitaba bua mushipianganyi udiye mutume abuele mu nzubu yenu bua kunushipa to
Mvidie yabu ivuabu batekemene kayena kabidi ne bukole bua kubalama to
Bantu aba, ke bavua Moshe mutume bua kutentekela ditunga dia Kenaane
Muudi ungambila bua meme kubambula bu mudi ndeji wambula muana pambidi, bua kubafikisha mu ditunga diuvua mulaye bankambua babu, mbishi
Nanku tshidi muntu upesha mutuangaji, mutuangaji udi mua kutshilama
Lelu nembange kubuesha buowa ne ditshina mu mitshima ya bantu bonso badi muinshi mua diulu, badi bunvua lumu luenu: ne hunvuabo, nebazakale ne mitshima yabo nebanyingalale bualu buenu

Mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda udi uleeja: a bule bwa matuku ne tuludiki twa lwendu lwa bilo, makookeshi ne mapa a mulombodi watshi pamwe ne a bakwabo beena Bilo; b bûngi, mushindu wa dibasungula, dibatwangaja,mudimu ne bukookeshi bwa tusumbu twabi twa tukese twa matuku male pamwa ne diaasa ne lwendu lwa tusumbu tukese twa pa bwatu ne twa mpoolu mikese; c bulongolodi bwa midimu ya munda idibo baludika kudi mufundi wa mukanda wa dipoku wa buludiki bwa mianda ya munda mwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu; d bulongolodi bwa nnemeekelu wa mêyi ne manyooka mateekela batshipwita munwamfwanka ne batshipwita bakulumpa; e mishindu mishilangana ya dieela dia tukanda , pa kumusha idibo bateeka, bajaadika bîmpe kudi Dîyi dikulu edi
Bena Amaleka badi ku luseke lua ku Sude, Bena Hiti ne Bena Yebuse ne Bena Amole badi ku luseke lua ku mikuna, Bena Kanâna badi hehi ne mai manene ne kukala kua musulu wa Yadene

Tshimanyinu tshia ndondu wetu ewu nenu, kabidi ne bionsu bidi pa buloba tshidi nunku: Ndi nteka muanzankongolu mulu mu mavuba bua wikale tshimanyinu tshidi tshivuluija ndondu udi pankatshi panyi ne bantu, kabidi ne bionsu bidi ne muoyi pa buloba
Munyinyi udi mushale ne mampa adi mashale nubioshe mu kahia
Hakatshia butuku banjelo bakenzesha Lota ne, Bika biebe, wangate mukashi webe ne bana bebe bakashi babidi badiku diambedi kanuyi banze kufua mu dikenga dia musoko eu
Padi tshibangu atshi tshiondoke, boya bua muaba awu butokoloke, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu ewu mmupie mikiya, bualu disama dia nsudi ndimuenekela mu tshibangu tshia mputa wa kapia
Binuatangila nansha mpunda nansha ngombe bia mukuenu biakahona hanshi mu nshila, kanubisokoki, kadi numukuatshishe bua kubibisha kabidi
Nenuhe muakuidi diboko dia balume dia nyama wa mulambu wa kuikisha n au ditalala udibo banyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kadi, Elazare, muana wa balume wa mutuangaji Arone, neikale ne mudimu wa kulama nzubu wa tshijila ne bintu bionsu bia tshijila bidimu
Bualu bobu balenga tshintu tshia tshijila menemene, nebafue
Bualu bavua balambule Maweja Nangila mulambu wa manananshi, avua kaayi a tshijila
buludiki bwa bilumbulwilu, bwa nzubu ya buloko ne tshinyongopelu ne ya mashika;

Tangila, makelela ha diba edi mene nemmatshishe mabue a nvula a bungi be, kabena banze kutangila mabue a nvula nunku ku tshibangidilu tshia bukelenge bua Ejipitu tô ne katataka, Nunku utumine bantu lubilu, basangishe bimuna biebe ne bintu bionso biudi n abi mu budimi, muntu yonso ne nyama yonso bidi bishala mu budimi bidi kabiyi bihingana mu nsubu, mabue a nvula neahone ham bidi babi, nebifue
Balaka wakatuma miloho mikuabo, yakahita miloho mikuabo butumbi
Pikala tshimuna tshimue tshia ku bimuna ebi tshitebuke, tshifua disu, nansha ne bulema bukuabu pambidi, kanuena mua kutshilambula Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu to

Yehowa, Nzambi wa mulu, wakangumusha ku nsubu wa tatu wanyi ne ku buloba buakandelabo, wakabambila, wakandaya ne, Nempe tunkanunuina biebe buloba ebu yeye mene neatume muanjelo wandi ku mpala kuebe, ne wewe newangatshile muan anyi mukashi kuakua
Nennumanyishe tshinudi mua kuenza
Ngombe minyane yakadia ngombe muanda mutekete yakadi midiunde, ne hakayidia ngombe mikuabo nunku, kabakama nya ne yakayidia, yakadi anu minyane bu diambedi Nunku nakatabala
diambulwishangana pankatshi pa polovensa;
Tshidi ne mudimu wa kukookesha ne kushiindika budikadidi ne dikuba dia butshikuma mbila pamwe ne mishindu yônso ya dimanyisha tshibûngi maalu mu kaneemu ka dîyi
Bakumuka mu Kibelota hatawa bakashikama mu Haselota

Pavua bena Izrayele bafike ne mushete wa ndondu muaba wa kuasa mitanda, Moshe uvua wela kabidi diyi dikole, wamba ne: Maweja Nangila, pinganaku, usombe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele, bantu bebe bapite bungi
Buesha mitshi ei mu nkanu idi ku nseke ibidi ya tshioshelu bua kutshituala

Bungi bua bana balume ba Gêshona bakabalabo ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ba mu bidimu makumi asatu tô ne ku bidimu makumi atanu, buonso buabo bakadi benza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bakabalabo ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo bakadi binunu bibidi ne nkama isambombo ne makumi asatu
Yeye wakalota tshilota tshikuabo, wakatshiawila bana babo, wakabambila ne, Monai, nakulota tshilota tshikuabo, nakumona diba ne ngondo ne mitoto dikumi ne umue, biakunkukuila
Muukadi ututumina diyi mbishi
Uteke dibungu adi kumpala kua Maweja Nangila bua kulamina ndelanganyi yenu

Malu awu mamane kupita, kuambilabu Abrahame ne: Bana ba balume badi Milka, mukaji wa muanenu Nahore, mulele badi muanda mukulu: muanabute udi Use, pashishe Buze, Kemuyele, tatuende wa Arame, Keshede, Azo, Pildashe, Idlafe ne Betuyele, tatuende wa Rebeka
Kadi ashale matuku muanda mutekete kayi ubuela mu ntenta wende
Divuba kabidi, divua kumpala kuabu, kupingana kunyima kuabu

Yeye neangate bintu bia kulengesha n abi nsubu nyunyu ibidi ne mitshi ya cêdre ne bintu bikunze ne mabeshi a hisopa, neashihele umue wa nyunyu mu tshivuadi tshia dima ha mutu ha mai adi ahueka, neangate mitshi ya cêdre ne mabeshi a hisopa ne bintu bikunze ne nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo, neafue bintu ebi mu mashi a nyunyu wakashiheye ne mu mai adi ahueka, neâmiamine ku nsubu misangu muanda mutekete
Pashishe ukunguje bantu bonsu ba bena Izrayele muaba ewu
Wewe neulamike tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe ha nyima honso ne munda mua mushete kabidi, neuteke tshiamu tshia or ku mibangu ya mushete
Bakamumona Yehowa uya kutangila bualu ebu
Wakantuma bualu kai
Kadi miadi yabu ya mu bupika buabu kufika kudi Mvidi Mukulu

Isalele wakolola tshianza tshiandi tshia balume, wakatshitentekasha ha mutu ha Efelayima, wakadi muan a mukala wakatentekasha tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi ha mutu ha Manashe wakashintakasha bianza biandi bu muakasueye, bualu bua Manashe wakadi muan a bute Yeye wakavudishila Yosefe disanka, wakamba ne, Nzambi wakadi batatu anyi Abalahama ne Isaka bendakena ku mesu kuandi, Nzambi wakandisha matuku anyi onso tô ne ku dituku edi, muanjelo wakampikula ku malu mabi onso, avudishile bansongalume aba disanka, dina dianyi ne dina dia batatu anyi, Abalahama ne Isaka, ashale kudibo, bakumbane ba bungi mu buloba
Kanungu ka Pikalabo babapiisha, badi bumbusha Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne Minisitila Kavulambedi ku mudimu

Hakatangila Esau ne bana bakashi ba Bena Kanana kabakasankisha mutshima wa Isaka tatu andi, Esau wakaya kudi Yishemaele, wakangata Mahalata muana mukashi wa Yishemaele muana wa Abalahama, wakadi muan abo wa bakashi ne Nebayota bu mukashi wandi, ha mutu ha bakashi bakadiye n abo
Uvua anu ne tshitunu
Dilongu dionsu diondoke divua ne bujitu bua grame

Nunku amba biebe ne, Mona, ndi mmuhe dihungila dianyi dia ditalala, nedikale kudiye ne kudi bana badi bamulonda ku nyima, bu dihungila dia mudimu wa buakuidi tshiendelele bualu bua yeye wakadi ne mukau bualu bua Nzambi wandi, wakabuikidila Bena Isalele bubi
Isaka wakaya mu budimi dilolo bua kutendelela, wakabandisha mesu andi, ne monai, tumelo tuakadi tulua
Bantu bakajuka dituku adi, ne butuku bujima tô ne ku dituku dikuabo, bakasangisha nkuadi muntu wakasangisha bungi bukese wakasangisha bihiminu binene dikumi, bakadilongoluelayi mu tshitudilu
Hakadibo babuela mu nsubu wa tshiendelele ne hakaluabo hehi ne tshioshelu, bakowa mai, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Tangila musoko eu udi ha buihi bua kunyemenamu, udi mukese, witabushe bua mpandilemu musoko eu udi mukese nansha

Kanungu ka Dîba didi maalu makole afwana kujimija budikadidi anyi bujima bwa tshipaapu tshia ditunga anyi kufikisha ku dimanyikija dia lweendu lwa bishimikidi bia ditunga, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka bulongolodi bwa tshimpitshimpi anyi bwa bilwilu panyima pa diyukilangana ne minisitila wa kumpala ne balombodi ba bibambalu biônso bibidi bia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga, bu mudibio biambibwa mu tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu edi

Bana bakashi ba Selofehada bakenza muakambila Yehowa Mose, bualu bua Mahala ne Tîza ne Hogela ne Mileka ne Noa, bana bakashi ba Selofehada, bakadi babakibua kudi bana balume bakadi bana babo ne tatu abo
Meme nembutule misoko yenu, ne bitendelelu bienu nebikale hatuhu, bintu bienu kabiena bi tua dihembu kundi
Muntu nansha nyama wasemena pabuipi ne mukuna, bua kumushipa, kabamulengi pambidi to, bamuase mabue nansha mikete
Yeye utshidi wanyi meme
Pashishe Arone kuleja Maweja Nangila milambu ivua bantu bafile
Kanungu ka Mbulamatadi udi wanyisha ne mweena ditunga anyi mwenyi udi mwa kufuka midimu yende ya nkayende
Yosefe wakamona bana ba Efelayima to ne ku bikondo bisatu, bakalela bana ba Mala, muana wa Manashe, ha binu bia Yosefe kabidi
Hadada wa kafua, ne Samala wa ku Maseleka, wakadia bukelenge buandi
Muntu udi ulenga bulalu abu, nansha muaba uvuaye usomba, udi ne bua kusukula bilamba biende, kuowa mayi
Mulume anyi mukashi udi ne muhongo anyi udi mutempi wa mbuku neashihibue, nebakumibue ne mabue, mashi abo neikale ham bidi habo
Kanubitshinyi
Bana bonso banudi batela mbanyi; ban a bute ba balume ba bimuna mbanyi, ban a bute ba ngombe ne ba mikoko
Kusakilabu Lote bikole, kusemenabu pabuipi ne nzubu bua kutula tshiibi
Nunku nenutahulule Bena Isalele ku bukoya buabo, bua bobo kabafu mu bukoya buabo honabo nsubu wanyi wa tshitendelelu tshidi munkatshi muabo
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ambila Arone ne: angata dikombu diebe, olola tshianza ku mutu kua mayi onsu a mu Ejipitu, adi mu misulu, adi mu tusulu tukese ne adi mu majiba
Binuahua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muoyo, binualonda nzambi mikuabo, binuenzela nzambi mikuabo midimu, binuayitendelela, ndi nnumanyisha lelu ne, Nenufue bulelela
Mvidi Mukulu udi uteka Arone tshindonda tshia Moshe Moshe kubenga, wambila Maweja Nangila ne: Maweja Nangila, tshiena mua kuya to
Hakamutangila Yuda, yeye wa kelangana meji ne, Yeye udi mukashi wa masandi, bualu bua yeye wakabuikila mpala wandi ne tshilulu
Kadi biahidieye kuvuwa bilulu biandi anyi mubidi wandi, yeye neadituadile bubi buandi
Mu Kohata muakadi diku dia Bena Amalama ne dia Bena Yisehâ ne dia Bena Hebelone ne dia Bena Uziele au mmeku a Bena Kohata

Wewe neubambile kabidi ne, Eu udi mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia unudi nûfila kudi Yehowa bana balume ba mikoko ba tshidimu tshimue, badi kabayi ne tshilema, bana babidi ba buatshia buatshia, bu mulambu wa kuosha wa tshiendelele
Wewe newangate tshiadi tshia tshimpanga tshia kujidila kua Alona, utshinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, netshikale tshituha tshiebe
Mayi awu, kupanduluka bu tshimana ku dia balume, tshikuabu ku dia bakaji
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Mukaji awu kuimita difu, kulela muana wa balume
Kuangataye mbuji wa mpumbu wa mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu, kumukosa muminu
Mose wakabambila ne, Imanai, nganji kunvua dî kudi Yehowa bua bualu buenu
Miselayima wakalela Ludima ne Anamima ne Lehabima ne Nafetuhima ne Patalusima ne Bena Kasaluha nkambua wa Bena Peleshete ne Bena Kafetô
Bakabambila ne, Katuena mua kuenza bualu ebu bua kufila muan etu wa bakashi kudi muntu udi kayi mute ngula, bualu ebu budi butufuisha bundu
Pashishe kumukabu mu Asherote bua kuya kuasa mitanda mu tshipela tshia Parane
Meme kuitaba, kusungula bantu dikumi ne babidi ba munkatshi muenu, umue ku tshisamba tshionsu
Bena Lubena, Bena Gada, ne Tshituha tshia Bena Manashe Badi Bashikama ku Esete kua Yadene Nom
Kungambilaye kabidi ne: Bangayi luendu

DITUNGA DIA KONGU WA MUNGALAATA TSHIMAMWENDE WA BUKALENGA TSHIA DITUNGA TSHILUBA TSHINGENYINGENYI TSHIA DIYI DIKULU DIA DITUNGA DIA KONGU WA MUNGALAATA KINSHASA LWABANYA NKASU DIUMVWIJA DIA TSHIEENA BWAALU Katshia Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata diaapeta budikadidi bwaadi mu matuku a kashipu nkenza , didi anu diambulangana ne ntatu ya tshidiidi itwa ipingana milela nangananga kudi dibeenga dia kwitabuja bishimikidi bidi koku ne bantu badi babiludika
Nuvuluke ne: nuvua bapika mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Anyi biambeye bualu, kena ubuenza, anyi
Bana balume ba Zebuluna ku meku abo Selede ne meku a Bena Selede; Elone ne meku a Bena Elone; Yalele ne meku a Bena Yalele
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu, uvua mutue netu ndondu mu mukuna wa Sinayi
Yosefe wakambila tatu andi ne, Nansha, tatu anyi, kuenji nunku, bualu bua eu udi muan a bute, utentekashe tshianza tshiebe tshia balume ha mutu handi
Dituku dia makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete dia ngondu muibidi, buloba kuuma kashidi
Nuvuluke bana benu bapele, ne bena dikenga badi munkatshi muenu

Bakokeshi bakalua ne mabue a onyx ne mabue makuabo a kuteka mu efoda ne mu tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi, ne manyi ne bintu bia dihembu dimpe bia kuela mu manyi, ne manyi a muinda ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne manyi adi atua dihembu
Kanutetshi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, bu munuvua bamuenzele ku Masa
Yeye wakabambila ne, Kanumpumbishi, bualu bua Yehowa wakungendesha dikasa dimpe, nuntume kudi mukelenge wanyi
Tshitupa tshibîdi : Bidi bitangila dikosoloja dia makookeshi pankatshi pa Bukalenga bunene ne polovensa
Bakumuka mu Dibona gada, bakashikama mu Alamona dibelatayima
Yakoba wakadi ne Lakele tshiji, wakakonka ne, Meme ndi bu Nzambi udi mujidike munda muebe ne, Kuledi, anyi
Musombuedi kalondi mushihianganyi eu hadiye ne tshiji tshikole, kamuhetshi, bualu bua nshila udi utamba bule, kamushihi diambedi kabayi banze kumuhisha, bualu bua yeye kakadi n andi tshiji diambedi
Padi bena Izrayele bamuangala, Arone ne bana bende ba balume nebumushe tshilamba tshidi tshilembeleja kumpala kua muaba wa tshijila, batshibuikila pa mushete wa ndondu
Mu Ejipitu tuvua tusanka
Uvua munuambile bua nunemeke ndondu, nukumbaje mikenji dikumi ivuaye mufunde pa mabue abidi
Bena Isalele bakanyenga bimenga ebi bionso Bena Isalele bakashikama mu bimenga bionso bia Bena Amole, mu Heshebona ne mu misoko ei yonso
Kanungu ka Dîyi didi dipeta bwenzeji matuku makumi asatu panyima pa dipatuka diaadi mu tshibejibeji tshia mbulamatadi, amba amu dioodio dilongolola mushindi mukwabo
Nanku Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wetu, kutuambuluisha
Sànka ukole mu mikolu, bwà kukèba mudimu, Nansha makenga, nansha mabika ni malu eee Ndi anu muku nangà
Padi muena Izrayele ulambula Maweja Nangila bintu bia tshianyi bia mu budimi buende, abikange, abitue mu tshinu, bangabanga ne kubilambula

Pashishe padi mamuende wa muana awu kayi muanji kudilongolola ku buvyele budiye nabu, kena mua kulenga tshintu tshia tshijila, kena mua kubuela muaba wa tshijila, too ne padi matuku makumi asatu ne asatu akumbana
Nenkuvudishangane ba bungi, nenkuvuishe bisamba bia bungi, bakelenge nebaledibue munda muebe
Kanungu ka Beena Kongo bônso badi ne bukookeshi bwa kusanka ne bumpianyi bwabo bônso bwa bumuntu
Katuakudia bintu ebi mu madilu etu, katuakabilenga hatuakadi banyanguke, katuakabifila kudi bakadi mu madilu: tuakutumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu; tuakuenza malu onso akatuambileye
Nanku Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuladika muntu mulume tulu tukole
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Au mmena a balume badi banutahuluila buloba bua buhianyi buenu, Eleazâ muakindi ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna
Kunyangakajaye kabidi bikunyibua bivua mu madimi ne mitshi yonsu
Yehowa Nzambi wakamba ne, Kambimpe bua mulume ashale nkayandi nansha, nemmufukile mukuatshishi bu mudiye
Ndelanganyi yende neyenze tshisamba tshinene
Padi ditoba didi ku tshimana dikale dikunze nansha difike, kabidi diumbule tshimana, mutuangaji apatuke, injile, akange ku nzubu aku matuku muanda mutekete
Yeye wakebesha Hagâ, mukashi muena mudimu wa Salai, ne, Wakufuma kudi kunyi
Mukelenge muhia muhia wakahingana mu bukelenge bua Ejipitu, wakadi kayi mumanye Yosefe
Bena Iti, bena Yebusa ne bena Amore mbase pa mikuna
Kadi muntu mukuabu mufike pabuipi ne nzubu wa tshijila awu, nebamushipe
Dikombo dia bukelenge kadiena diumuka kudi Yuda, tshibangu tshia bukokeshi katshiena tshiumuka hankatshi ha makasa andi to ne halua Shilo, ne bantu bonso nebakukukuile
Muntu wakamuambila ne, Bakumuka kunoko, nakabunvua bamba ne Tuyai ku Dotana Yosefe wakalonda bana babo, wakabasangana mu Dotana

Kanuntendeledi ne mashi a nyama mishiha ne bidia bidi ne luevene hohamue kanushiyi manyi a nyama ya milambu yanyi to ne ku dinda Bintu bia kumudilu binudi nu huola mu madimi, nulue n abi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Mutuangaji neangate mayi a tshijila mu dibungu
Uleshe kanemu kudi muntu udi ne nsuki yandi mitoke tô, unemeke muntu mununu, utshine Nzambi webe meme ndi Yehowa
Padi muena Izrayele ulambula mbuji, aye nende muaba wa tshijila
Nuenu nuakumvua diyi diende mu diulu, unulongesha bua kumutumikila
Bakumuka mu tshihela tshia Sinai, bakashikama mu Kibelota hatawa
Sangisha bintu bia ku diabi bionso, nebikale bu bintu bia kudia biebe ne biabi kabidi

Bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; nunku nudilengeshe, nuikale bantu ba tshijila bualu bua meme ndi wa tshijila, kanudinyangi ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba Bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua kuikala Nzambi wenu; nuenu nuikale bantu ba tshijila bualu bua meme ndi wa tshijila
Buela biebe ne balume ba nyunyu muanda mutekete ne bakashi ba nyunyu muanda mutekete, bua kusungila mioyo ya bintu
Nzambi wakamubadila mu Ejipitu, yeye udi ne bukole bua nyama wa mbowa, yeye neamine bisamba bia bantu badi n andi lukuna, neatshibule mifuba yabo bituha, yeye neabatubule ne mikete

Bilulu bia ku luseke lumue lua tshibi biakadi coudées dikumi ne itanu, ne makunshi asatu ne nkanu isatu, luseke lukuabo luakadi nunku kabidi, bilulu tô ne ku coudées dikumi ne itanu ne makunshi asatu ne nkanu isatu
Yosefe wakasangana luse ku mesu kuandi, wakamuenzela mudimu, wakamuteka mulami wa nsubu wandi yonso, wakafila bintu bionso biakadiye n abi mu tshianza tshiandi
Kanungu ka Mapangadika a Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu kabeena mwa kuatontolola to ne badi ne tshia kuakumbaja diakamwe
Binuadikonka ne, Netudie tshinyi tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete hatudi katuyi tukuna bintu, katuyi tuhuola bintu
Bena Ete kuandamuna ne: Mukalenga, Mvidi Mukulu mmukuele lupemba, suaku ututeleje
Nzambi akumbashe Yafete, yeye ashikame biandi mu ntenta ya Sheme, Kanana ikale muhika wandi kabidi
Ndi nkutendekena ne, Unsungile mu bianza bia mukulu anyi Esau, ndi mmutshina ne yeye nealue kunshiha ne bamamu ne bana
Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Butoke buenzeke
Hashika disama diandi, nebamubadile matuku muanda mutekete, ku nyima neikale mulengele
Matuku onsu awu, muntu awu ikale anu mudijidile mu dina dia Maweja Nangila
Dituku disatu Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Mayi onsu adi muinshi mua tshibuashibuashi adisange muaba umue, buloba bume bumueneke
Yeye wakakonka Yakoba ne, Dina diebe nganyi
Ke muvua ndelanganyi ya Yefete nanku
Ukuate kabidi dikombu edi mu tshianza, wenze nadi bishima
Divuba kuimana, kutuluka mu tshipela tshia Parane
Yeye udi bu ngabu wa dikuatshisha dienu; udi bu muele wa nvita unudi nutamba n au bakuabo
Kanungu ka Dîyi dilongolodi didi dileeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Tshipangu tshia mianda ya bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bweena ditunga
Bavua batshienze bilondeshile tshilejilu tshivua Maweja Nangila muleje Moshe
Lote kusungula mpata ayi, kuya luseke ludi diba dipatukila
Mose wakashikisha mudimu wonso nunku
Dutelonone Bena Isalele Badi Bahita Oga wa ku Bashana Bukole Nom

Nzambi Udi Ubalaya Muprofete Mufuanangane ne Mose Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanubishile muprofete munkatshi mua bana benu bu meme, nenunvue dî diandi: bu munuakalomba Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu Holeba mu dituku dituakasambakena n enu ne, Katunvu dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, kabidi, katutangidi kahia aka kanene kabidi, bua katufu
Maweja Nangila kumuambila ne: Tuluka, ubele bantu ne: kabasemenyi pabuipi ne mukuna bua kummona
Mose wakitabusha bua tatu andi muenu ahingane, yeye wakaya mu nshila wa ku buloba buandi
Tshibangidilu Lote udi upanduka ku kabutu ka Sodome ne Ngomore Batumibue babidi kufikamu Sodome dilolu

Bimuna bionsu bikale Maweja Nangila munupe mu ditunga dinuasomba, muntu yonsu udi ne mikiya nansha udi kayi nayi, udi mua kubishipa, kudia munyinyi wabi bu mudiye musue, ne muaba udiye musue, anu bu munutu nudia munyinyi wa kabuluku, nansha wa ngulungu
Kadi padiu ushala kabidi too ne ku dituku disatu, bawoshe mu kapia
Bantu aba nebimane ha mutu ha Ebala bua kuela bantu mulau: Lubena ne Gada ne Ashe ne Zebuluna ne Dana ne Nafatale
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Lubena, Elisu muana mulume wa Shedeu
Kunuishaye ne tumelu tuanyi

Bialenga muntu tshianza tshiandi ha tshintu tshibi, nansha mifuba ya nyama udi kayi muakane, nansha mifuba ya ngombe udi kayi muakane, nansha mifuba ya tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi tshidi katshiyi tshiakane, ne bikala bualu ebu busokoka ku mesu kuandi, yeye udi muntu wa bukoya, neahile
Kanulu kudi Yehowa ne mulambu wa bukula budi busangisha ne luevene, kanuoshi luevene anyi buitshi bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa
Bualu nudi tshisamba tshia bantu badi bamutombokela
Ndelanganyi ya Sheme Ndelanganyi ya Sheme idi nunku: mayi a tshipupu mamane kukama, kupita bidimu bibidi, Sheme kukumbaja bidimu lukama, kulela Arpakshade
Ekesode Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nakukuvuisha bu Nzambi ku mesu kua Palô, ne Alona mukulu ebe neikale muakuidi webe
KOKOLA udju wagashighaita baba shibaiwan wambe kokola kak tshala muana tseula muana wambe kokola mkana mwana tsheula mwana wambe kokola udju wagashighaita baba shibaiwan wambe kokola
Kanuikadi ne kanyinganyinga bua kupesha mupika budikadidi to
Yeye wakambila Sala ne, Mona, nakuha mukulu webe bituha bia argent tshinunu, ntshintu tshiebe tshia kutokesha n atshi munda ne bantu bonso badi n ebe, wewe wakubingishibua ku mesu kua bantu bonso
Nunku nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kusua benyi bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, muakuidi neamutangile kabidi, ne biamba disama kushika, bikaladi kadiyi ditampakana mu dikoba diandi, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, disama edi didi bu tshilamulamu, muntu eu neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale mua kane
Wewe newele Alona ne bana bandi balume manyi ha mutu, neubajidile, bua bobo bankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bualu bua Yehowa Nzambi webe wakungendesha dikasa dimpe

Bialua muenyi wa munkatshi muenu mundi mubanji, ne bialua mukuenu udi ushikama hehi handi muntu muhele, biadihaneye kudiye anyi kudi mundi mukuabo wa mu diku diandi, hadihaneye, badi mua kumuhikula, umue wa bana babo udi mua kumuhikula, manseb andi anyi muana mulume wa manseb andi anyi muan abo mukuabo udi mua kumuhikula, bialueye muntu mubanji, yeye udi mua kudihikula
Wewe wakolola tshianza tshiebe ne buloba buakabanda
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Zebuluna, Gadadiele, muana mulume wa Sodi
Padi batuangaji batela dina dianyi nanku, bua kuela bena Izrayele lupemba, meme nkayanyi nembele lupemba
Nutshienzele anu muaba wikalaye musungule
Panudi nutendelela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, kanulondi bibidilu bia bisamba abi to
Mbuji wa mpumbu umue bua mulambu wa dikobolola bantu
Dina dia diboko disatu didi Hidekela, didi dinyunguluka ku esete kua buloba bua Ashû
Mona
Nanku tudi tukusengelela se: wanyishe bua tuye mu tshipela, tuenze luendu lua matuku asatu bua kumulambula milambu
Muana wakakola, mamu andi wakalua n andi kudi muana wa bakashi wa Palo, yeye wakalua bu muana wandi mene
Udi ne tshia kulondolola bîmpe ditantamana diaatu
Kuibi

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu Nudimuke bienu bimpe; bualu bua kanuakatangila tshifuanyikishi tshia muntu dituku diakasomba n enu Yehowa mu Holeba munkatshi mua kahia; kanuonyi mitshima yenu, kanudisongidi luhingu ne tshifuanyikishi tshia muntu nansha mulume nansha mukashi, nansha tshia nyama yonso ya ha buloba, anyi tshia nyunyu yonso idi yenda mu diulu, anyi tshia tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi ha buloba, anyi tshia munyinyi wa mu mai adi muinshi mua buloba; bua hanuabandisha mesu enu mulu, ne hanuatangila diba ne ngondo ne mitoto ne bintu bionso bia mu diulu, kanubitendeledi, kanubienzedi mudimu; ebu mbualu buakaha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu bonso bakuabo badi muinshi mua diulu
Kadi kanufidi tshintu tshidi ne tshilema bualu bua tshiena ngitabusha tshintu etshi

Malu Makole Adi Akuata Bashihi ba Mikenji Kadi binuahidia kunvua dî dianyi, binuahidia kutumikila mikenji yanyi, binuahidia mikandu yanyi, binuabenga mei anyi mu mitshima yenu, kanuyi nuenza mikenji yanyi, binuashiha tshihungidi tshianyi, meme kabidi nennuenzele nunku nengenze malu adi anutshinyisha, nennutumine masama adi anyanyisha mibidi yenu ne disama dia mubidi kahia, masama au neashihe mesu enu, neanyanyishe mitshima yenu, nenukune bintu bienu tshianana, bualu bua bantu badi n enu lukuna nebabidie
Awu kupingana kuende
Kadi, bua kubikila bena Izrayele bonsu muaba umue, bele amu mpungi kukuyi bibingu
Bamfumu kufika, balondangane mushindu ewu: Dituku dia kumpala: Nashone, muana wa Aminadabe, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Yuda
Pashishe, Moshe kubikidisha Datane ne Abirame, bana ba Eliyabe
Shelumiele, muana mulume wa Sulishadai, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia bena Shimeona
Yehowa neamutahulule munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele bua kamuenzela bibi, bu mudi milau yonso ya tshihungidi etshi mifunda mu mukanda eu wa mikenji
Kadi tshisamba tshimue netshipite tshikuabu ku bukole
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne muanda mutekete

BADI BUMUKA KU SINAYI BAFIKA KU MIKALU YA MOWABE Bena Izrayele badi bumuka Matuku makumi abidi a ngondu muibidi wa tshidimu tshivua tshilonda tshidimu tshivua bena Izrayele bapatuke mu Ejipitu, divuba kubanda mulu ku ntenta wa kusambakena, uvua ne mushete wa ndondu
Muaba awu kuenzaye tshilambuilu tshikuabu, utendelela Mvidi Mukulu, utela dina dia Maweja Nangila
Yeye wa kamba ne, Tangila, ndi muntu mununu, tshiena mumanye dituku dia lufu luanyi
Kabidi nebase mitanda yabu minyungulule nzubu awu

Mose wakambila Palô ne, Wikale ne butumbi ebu kundi, ndituku kai diudi musue meme nkulombele bua kumusha biula kûdi ne kudi bantu bebe ne kudi bahika bebe ne mu nsubu yenu, bishale anu mu musulu nkayau
Katuena bapiane madimi a mvinyo, nansha madimi makuabu to
Arone uvua musele Elisheba muana wa Aminadabe

Kabeena mwa kubwelakana diakamwe anyi mu mantonya mu mishinga ya patooka idi ifila makasa kudi biludiki anyi bishimikidi bidibo badiila pabo makasa kudi bukalenga bunene, polovensa ne bitupa biludiki bidikadile
Matuku muanda mutekete malondangane awu, kanulami buanga bua mampa mu nzubu yenu to
Ebi bidi mei mafunda ne mei majalame ne mikenji biakela Yehowa hankatshi handi ne Bena Isalele mukana mua Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai
Pa buloba, wakanuleja tshimunyi tshia kapia, wakula nenu mu kapia aku
Sara umona nanku, kuambilaye Abrahame ne: Ipata mukaji mupika ewu ne muanende, bualu muana wa mukaji ewu kena mua kufuilakana bintu bia bupianyi ne muananyi Izake to
Nanku meme kunua mayi
Kanungu ka Bilumbulwilu bia basalayi bidi bitangila bilumbu bibunda kudi beena bilwilu ne bampulushi
Mpindiewu, Maweja Nangila neanutshimuine bisamba bionsu binudi nabi mutumba, bidi binupita ku bukole ne ku bungi
Bualu bua Yehowa wakamba ne, Bobo nebafue mu tshihela
Esau wakamba ne, Abu akadi ha kufua, ne bintu bia buan a bute nebinsankishe kudi kunyi
Tshimuangi Moshe uvua udisha bimuna bia tatuende muenu Yetro, mutuangaji wa mu Madiyane
Mukaji kuandamuna ne: Tudi mua kudia bimuma bia mitshi yonsu idi mu lupangu
Ndi nkutendekena ne, Tahuluka kundi bi waya ku tshianza tshia bakashi, nenye bianyi ku tshianza tshia balume ne biwaya ku tshianza tshia balume, nenye bianyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Mukalu wa Bena Kanana wakadi ku Sidona mu nshila wa ku Gela to ne ku Gaza mu nshila wa ku Sodoma ne Amola ne Adema ne Seboima to ne ku Lasha
Mvidi Mukulu kutuma tshipepela pa buloba, mayi kutuadija kukepela

Pashishe Maweja Nangila kunuambila bonsu ne: Bana benu banuvua nuelela meji ne: nebabakuate bonsu mu mvita, anu bobu aba, badi kabayi banji kusunguluja lelu bualu ne mbuimpe, ne mbubi, ke bavuavua kubuela mu ditunga edi ne Yoshuwa
Bena Izrayele kumuangalaka mu Ejipitu, benda badikebela bisosa
Ekesode Wakenza tshioshelu tshia kuosha nyama ne mabaya a acacia

Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne tshia kupangisha muntu yônso anyi tshisumbu tshia bantu mwa kwangata bukalenga ku bukole anyi mwa kudia bukalenga bikala badiaata ku makasa bulongolodi budi mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi
Bankambua ba Moshe ne Arone Ke mena a bisamba bia bena Izrayele: Rubene, muanabute wa Yakobe, uvua ne bana balume banayi: Anoke, Palu, Esrone ne Karmi
Kalongu kinâyi : Bidi bitangila makookeshi a batshipwita ba Ditunga anyi a batshipwita bakulumpa
Kumufikishabu kudi Moshe ne Arone muaba uvua bena Izrayele bonsu basangile
Bionsu ebi nebimuambuluishe bua kaditambishi, bu mupite bantu bonsu ba mu tshisamba tshiende, kabidi bua kalenguludi mikenji, kadi ayikumbaje yonsu too ne mikese mene

Nuvuluke malu onso akanuenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bidimu ebi makumi anai hakadiye munulombole mu tshihela, bualu bua kunuhuekesha, ne kunuteta bualu bua kumanya malu akadi mu mitshima yenu, ne nudi basue kutumikila mikenji yandi, anyi kuyihidia
Ku mbelu kua luhangu tshilulu netshikaleku tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin mutambe buimpe, tshienjibue kudi mundi wa lungenyi lule, enza makunshi anai ne nkanu mai
Binuandomba bintu bia dibaka bidi bitamba bungi, nennuhebi, anjai kumpa nsongaka shi bu mukashi wanyi
Lubena ikale biandi ne muoyo, kafu nansha, bantu bandi kabikadi banya banya
Kanusedianganyi nabu
Di dia Yehowa kudi Mose ne Alona Mose wakahingana kudi Yehowa, wakamba ne, Yehowa, wewe wakenzela bantu aba bibi nunku bualu kai
Dikenga dindi nkuatshisha bantu bebe kadiakukuata banyi meme
Mai akadi ahuekahueka tô ne ku ngondo wa dikumi, ku dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa dikumi, mitu ya mikuna yakamueneka
