Ka, tangila mukashi webe, umuangate, uye biebe mu nshila webe Palô wakadimusha bantu bandi bua bualu buandi, ne bakaya n andi ne mukashi wandi ne bintu biandi bionso mu nshila

Yeye kena ukeba mua kutangila ne tshintu tshidi tshimpe anyi tshidi tshibi, yeye kena mua kutshishintakasha nansha, biabishintakasheye, tshintu etshi ne tshintu tshiakashintakasheye n atshi nebikale bia tshima, kabena mua kubihikula
Bana ba balume ba Kame badi: Kushe, Misrayime, Pute ne Kenaane

Bulongolodi bwa tshibidilu badi ne tshia kubulonda bwa bingenyingenyi anyi bwa bialwa kwikala mêyi bidi bitangila dikumbajangana dia Dîyi dikulu anyi dishintulula dia mêyi malongolodi pamwe ne bwa bingenyingenyi bia dîyi didi difila bukookeshi didibo baleeja kudi kanungu ka
Ke kubafikilaye munda
Kadi mitshi mudi bamanye ne kayena ne tumuma, nudi mua kuyikosa; nuase n ai bibumba bia nvita ku butshika bua musoko wa badi banuluisha to ne hanuabahita bukole
Wakidika muana mukuabo dina ne, Efelayima, bualu bua wakamba ne, Nzambi wakunkumbasha mu buloba bua dikenga dianyi
Padi tunyama etu tufua, muntu utulenga, neapie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Nenufile tshituha tshia bintu bienu bionso bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa nenufile bintu bidi bitamba buimpe, bintu bia tshijila mene
Dituku adi, mutuangaji neamuambile ne: udi mua kudijidila tshiakabidi
Wakatula nkanu mai ya kuteka ku matumba a tshintu atshi bua kubueshamu mitshi
Muntu yonsu wa kunudi anemeke tatuende ne mamuende, mundi munuambile

Genese Luhanza Lujimina Yosefe wakambila mulami wa nsubu wandi ne, Ûshe bibombi bia balume ne bia kudia tente, bungi bua bujitu budibo mua kutuala, teka argent ya muntu ne muntu munda mua tshîbombi tshiandi
Bualu bua bobo bakashiha bantu mu tshiji tshiabo, ne mu tshishiku tshiabo bakakosa ngombe mijilu ya bikono biai

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi; ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa ku bialeha n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Elishama, muana mulume wa Amihuda
Bangabanga mutuangaji alambule nyunyi wa mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu
Kayine kuasa tshimenga, kutshinyika dina dia muanende Enoke
Aukose muminu kumpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Ku luseke lukuabo lua tshibi bilulu nebikale coudées dikumi ne itanu, ne makunshi asatu ne nkanu isatu
Zilepa, muena mudimu wa Lea, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume mukuabo Lea wakamba ne, Ndi ne disanka, ne bakashi nebambikile ne, Muena disanka Wakamuidika dina ne, Ashe
Kulamunaye lubala lumue mu lubadi luende, kupingajapu munyinyi
Kadi Maweja Nangila kushala muaba uvua Abrahame

Kamuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi buleeja mu tunungu twa , ne twa Dîyi ditudi nadi edi, basungudianganyi ne badi mwa kusungudibwa, bilondeshila makanyika a dîyi, badi beena Kongu balume ne bakaji, bikala bamana kukumbaja mvula dikumi ne mwanda mukulu ya tshileledi ne bikala ne makookeshi abo a bweena mwabo ne a tshidiidi
Baku ne bana bebe balume ne bana bebe bakashi ne bonso baudi n abo mu musoko eu, umuke n abo mu muaba eu
Nyama yonsu ya pa buloba ne nyunyi idi ibuka mulu, ne minyinyi ya mu mayi neyinutshine bikole ikuatshika buowa
Bua bualu ebu nakambila Bena Isalele ne, Muntu wa munkatshi muenu kadi mashi nansha muenyi udi munkatshi muenu kadi mashi
Nakakubikila bua kungelela bantu badi n anyi lukuna mulau, ne mona, wewe wakubavudishila disanka
Nenulele bana ba bungi
Yeye wakamita difu, wakalela muana wa balume, yeye wakamba ne, Nzambi wakungumushila bundu buanyi, wakamuidika dina ne, Yosefe, wamba ne, Yehowa ampe muana mukuabo
Bualu papita matuku muanda mutekete, nendokeshe mvula pa buloba matuku makumi anayi a munya ne a butuku
Kanuendakanyi bu bena mukoso munkatshi mua bantu benu, kanuhuwi bikala muena mutumba n enu mikuata kudi tshilumbu meme ndi Yehowa
Nudi nuteta Maweja Nangila bualu kaayi
Nyama ya mikiya, ne idi kayiyi ne mikiya Nyama idi ne mikiya idi Maweja Nangila mubenge, kanuena mua kudia munyinyi wayi to
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne muan abo mukashi, nansha muana wa tatu wandi nansha muana wa mamu wandi udi ne mulau
Kena mubanange
Nunku Bena Isalele nebajidile dituku dia Lumingu ku bikondo biabo bionso bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele
Nunku Yehowa wakabamuangalasha ha buloba buonso, bakalekela kuasa musoko
Ku bisamba bikuabu bionsu, kudi tshisamba tshidi ne mvidie, wakula natshi munkatshi mua kapia, bu mudi Maweja Nangila wakula nenu, nuenu kushala ne muoyi anyi
Tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu bakuabo tshiakaya n abo, ne mikoko ne ngombe ne bimuna bia bungi
Bidimu dikumi ne bibidi, bavua anu ku bukokeshi bua Kedorlayomere too ne pakatombokabu mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshisatu
Kadi nansha bobu bamone nanku, kabavua bangitaba to
Moshe kumukonka ne: Wewe neutupe bimuna bitudi mua kuya kuosha bua kulambula Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu anyi
Hanakehesha bintu bienu bia kudia, bakashi dikumi nebalambe bidia mu luesu lumue, bobo nebanuhimine bintu bia kudia mu tshihimu, nuenu nenuhidie kadi kanuena nukuta
Pankatshi pa Ninive ne tshimenga tshinene tshia Kela kuasaye kabidi Resene
Kutandishabu Moshe, bambe ne: Tupeshayi mayi a kunua
Kadi bana benu bakese banuakamba ne, Nebafue, badi kabayi banze kumanya malu mimpe ne malu mabi, bobo nebabuelemu, nebahiane buloba

Padi, panyima pa dibenga kumvwangana pankatshi pa Bibambalu biônso bibidi, tshingenyingenyi anyi dijinga dia kwenzeja dîyi kadiyi dianyishibwa panyima pa didibala kudi Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu, Bilo biônso bibidi bidi bienza kasumbu kasanga ka bantu bûngi bwa momumwe kimikila dieenza dia mukanda mutangila bulongolodi budibu bashaala bakonkoloja
Pavuaye upuekesha tshianza, bena Amaleke bavua batshimuna bena Izrayele

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Hanualua mu buloba bundi musue kunuha bu buhianyi buenu ne hanateka disama dia nsudi mu nsubu wa mu buloba bua buhianyi buenu, nunku muena nsubu nealue biandi, neambile muakuidi ne, Ndi ngelangana meji ne ditoba dia disama didi mu nsubu muanyi
Kadi luesu lua dibumba luvua muena disama adi mulenge, nebaluzaze
Kanungu ka Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia mu polovensa ke tshitupa tshifidi tshia ngenyi tshia polovensa
Nzambi wakambila Mose ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Kuitababu ne: Mbimpe, enza muwambi amu
Pashishe mashi onsu adi mashale, mutuangaji ayitshikije kuinshi kua tshilambuilu tshia milambu ya kuosha, tshidi ku mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta
Mose wakabatuma ku Kanâna bumuke ku tshihela tshia Palana, muakamba Yehowa buonso buabo bakadi balume ba ku mutu kua Bena Isalele
Maweja Nangila kumuambila ne: Ndi mumone dikenga dia bantu banyi badi mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Hanuaya kusangana mba ne bantu badi banukengesha mu buloba buenu, nenuele mpungi bikole, nenuikale nuvulukibua ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenusungidibue kudi bantu badi n enu lukuna
Abrahame kuitaba ne: Eyowa, ndi nditshipa nanku
Uteke tshioshelu tshia or tshia musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kua mushete, ukudike tshilulu ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Bua bualu ebu bakamuidika dina ne, Edome

Wakenza bakeluba babidi ne tshiamu tshia or tshituha tshimue tshijima, ku matengu abidi a tshibuikilu, mukeluba umue ku ditengu dimue, ne mukeluba mukuabo ku ditengu dikuabo, wakenza bakeluba ne tshibuikilu tshia mushete ne tshituha tshijima tshia or
Ushimike luhangu lua tshilulu lunyunguluke, ukudike tshilulu tshia ku mbelu kua luhangu
Bûngi bwa batshipwita ba ditunga pamwe ne mushindu wa kubasungula ne kusungudibwa badi babileeja kudi dîyi didi ditangila masungulangana
Bualu buenzayi budi pa buloba bujima, mbufume anu kudi bantu
Munyi tshiakusangana luse ku mesu kuebe bua wewe wakateka bujitu bua bantu aba bonso ham bidi hanyi
Bualu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mmunuendeshe diakalenga mu bionsu binuvua nuenza
Lufu lua Yosefe Yosefe wakashikama mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wandi, Yosefe wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne dikumi
Bakalenga aba bavua baluishangane banayi kua batanu

Mikenji ya Bamanyi ne Buhikudi Ei idi mikenji ya kuhumbulula hai malu ku bikondo bienu bionso, mu miaba yonso mudi nushikama, muntu udi ushiha mukuabo, nebashihe mushiku bu mu dî dia bamonyi; kadi kabena bamanye mua kumushiha anu ku dî dia mumonyi umue
Moshe kuandamuna ne: Kabiena mua kuenzeka to

Muntu yonso udi ne lungenyi lule alue biandi bua kuenza bi ntu bionso biakunuambila Yehowa ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu, ne nkanu yatshi ne mabaya atshi, ne mitshi yatshi ne makurishi atshi ne nkanu ya ku makunshi, ne mushete ne mitshi ya mushete, ne tshibuikilu tshia mushete, ne tshilulu tshia munkatshi mua tshitendelelu, ne mesa ne mitshi ya mesa ne malonga a mesa ne bidia bia ha mesa, ne tshitekelu tshia minda ne malonga atshi ne minda yatshi, ne manyi a muinda, ne tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi, ne mitshi yatshi, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu ne manananshi adi atua dihembu dimpe, ne tshilulu tshia ha mbelu ha tshitendelelu, ne tshioshelu tshia kahia ne bintu bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mitshi yatshi ne malonga atshi, ne tshiowelu ne mesa atshi, ne bilulu bia ku luhangu ne makunshi a luhangu, ne nkanu ya ku makunshi ne tshilulu tshia ha mbelu ha luhangu, ne milondo ya mu tshitendelelu ne ya mu luhangu ne nshinga yai, ne bilulu bia mushinga mukole bia kuenza n abi mudimu mu muaba wa tshijila, bilulu bia tshijila bia muakuidi
Bualu luepu ntshimanyinu tshia ndondu udi pankatshi penu ne Mvidi Mukulu
Bavua bamba ne: Maweja Nangila mmuyukile amu ne Moshe nkayende anyi

Nsambu ya kukosela muaba wa tshijila Pikala balumbuluishi ba muaba unudi basombe, bapangile tshilumbu tshia bantu, bavua bashipangane, batutangane, batapangane mputa, nansha benze tshilema tshikuabu kampande, nuye ne tshilumbu atshi muaba wikala Maweja Nangila musungule
Udi muimanyike bantu ku dinda too ne ku dilolu bua tshinyi
Hamo wakayikila n abo wakamba ne, Mutshima wa muan anyi Shekeme udi musue mua n ebe wa bakashi, ndi nkusengelela ne umufile kudiye bu mukashi wandi
Musombuedi nkayandi neashihe mushihi wa muntu
Betuele wakalela Lebeka: Mileka wakalelela Naho muan abo ne Abalahama, bana aba muanda mukulu
Kulu ne muntu mukuabo nansha: muntu kamueneki ku mukuna nansha: bisumbu bia mikoko ne bia ngombe kabidi bintu ku mukuna
Mai a Bulalu ku Mala Mose wakalombela bantu bua kuyabo ku mpala bumuke ku Dishiba Dikunze, bakaya mu tshihela tshia Shû bakaya mu tshihela matuku asatu, kabakasangana mai
Moshe kumuka ne tshiji tshikole kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Nebamuidike dina mu Isalele ne, Nsubu wa udi ne tshisabata tshiandi tshisulula
Yayi, nukuate ditunga edi, bu muvua Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu, mumane kuamba
Alona wakolola bianza biandi kudi bantu, wakabandisha disanka, yeye wakahueka kuakadiye ufila mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne wa kuosha ha kahia ne ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala
Bakeluba nebolole mahuahua abo kulu, nebabuikile tshibuikilu tshia mushete ne mahuahua abo, bobo batangilangana mpala, mpala yabo neyikale mitangile ha tshibuikilu tshia mushete
Newambile Arone malu onsu andi mukuambile, bua aye kumanyisha mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, bua anyishe bena Izrayele bumuke mu ditunga diende
Kukukuidi mpingu ya nanku
Yehowa neambe ne, Nzambi yabo idi kudi kunyi, ne dibue diabo diakadibo batekemena didi hanyi, yakadia manyi a nyama yakadibo bamushihela, yakanua nvinyo yakafilabo
bilwilu bia ditunga;
Noa wakabanga kuikala tshidime ne yeye wakakuna mitshi ya tumuma tukese
Kadi kanubedi diyi, kanubabundi to, bualu bobu kabidi nndelanganyi ya Lote
Mbuyi uvua mukunze, muikale ne boya pambidi, buenza bu tshinkutu
Tshimuangi Diledibua dia Moshe Muntu wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Levi, kusela mukaji wa mu tshisamba tshiabu tshia bena Levi
Muntu yonsu kuambula mbabula, kuelamu makala a kapia ne musenga wa kamonya
Kuyitendeledi, bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu webe
Nowa mumane kubuela, ne mulume umue kabidi ne mukaji umue wa ku nyama yonsu, bu muvua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile, Maweja Nangila kuinjila tshibi tshia buatu

Mu dituku diakashimikabo nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ntenta wa dimanyisha dia Yehowa, ditutu diakabuikila nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ku dilolo tô ne ku dinda diakakenka bu kahia ha mutu ha nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Nzambi Udi Ukengesha Bena Isalele Dut

Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, neabuikile bubi bua muntu udiye musue kulengesha ku bubi buandi ku nyima yeye neashihe mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bukula ha tshioshelu, muakuidi neamubuikidile bubi buandi, ne yeye neikale muakane

Yeye wakabambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi Wamba ne, Muntu yonso aluate muele wandi wa nvita, endakane ku tshibi ne ku tshibi mu tshitudilu tshionso, ashihe muan abo mulume ne mulunda wandi ne muena mutumba n andi

Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi uya ku mpala kuenu, yeye neanuluile nvita yenu, bu muakenzeye ku mesu kuenu mu Ejipitu, ne mu tshihela, nuakatangila ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanutuala mu maboko, bu mudi tatu utuala muan andi mulume, mu nshila yonso inuakaya tô ne hanuakalua ku muaba eu
Bantu bonsu bavua bimanyine pa bule
Mose ne Mabue a Mikenji Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ufunde mei â, bualu bua nakuhunga n ebe ne Bena Isalele tshihungidi bu mudi mei â
Mose wakamba ne, Nudie bintu ebi lelu, bualu bua edi ndituku diakadijidila Yehowa, kanuena nubisangana mu mpata lelu
Mose Wakabikila bakulu bonso ba Bena Isalele, wakabambila ne, Nusungule bana ba mikoko bungi buai buikale bungi bua meku enu, nuyishihe bua kuhita kua Yehowa
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuangata dima, kuenza nadi nyama yonsu ya pa buloba ne nyunyi yonsu ya mulu
Kadi bantu badimu mbilobu bia mvita

Mukenji wa Kuhingisha Muntu Bintu bia Bubi Buandi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Henza mulumi anyi mukashi bualu bubi budi bantu benza, udi ushiha mukenji wa Yehowa, ne badi bahisha muntu au, nunku yeye neatonde bubi buakenzeye, neahingishe bintu bionso biakangateye, neasangishe tshintu tshia tshitanu ha mutu habi, neabihingishe kudi nfumu wabi wakenzeye bubi
Nzambi wakamueneka kudi Belâma wakamuambila ne, Balume aba badi kuebe mbantu kai
Neangate kabidi tshiadi ne tshibelu bia nyama bu mudi tshibidilu
Moshe kulayangana ne tatuende muenu
Hakatangila tatu muenu wa Mose malu onso akenzeleye bantu, yeye wakamba ne, Wewe udi wenzela bantu tshinyi
Newenze nunku: ubamiamine mayi bua kubakobolola nawu
Nuenu nutu nuahidia Yehowa katshia ku dituku dinakanumanya
Lelu mfika ku tshiina tshia mayi, meme kutendelela ne: Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa mfumuanyi Abrahame, ndi nkusengelela ne: ungendeshe diakalenga mu luendu elu
Hadileye kundi, nemmunvuile, bualu bua meme ndi ne luse
Mulume wakabuela mu nsubu, wakumusha biseba ha nyima ha tumelo, wakalua ne mashinde ne manvua bia tumelo, ne mai a kuvuwa n au makasa andi ne makasa a bantu bakadi n andi
Tudi bajadike ne: tuetu bumvue kabidi diyi edi, tudi tufua
Nenusungule misoko ya kunyemena isambombo
Nenshale muendakanyi
Bakumuka mu Salemona, bakashikama mu Punona
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne mukashi wa tatu wandi udi ne mulau, bualu bua yeye wakavula tshilulu tshia tatu wandi
Kutuadijila lelu, nuele meji, nujadike ne: Maweja Nangila udi anu Mvidi Mukulu nkayende mu diulu ne pa buloba
Kadi, muntu wanyi Kalebe, uvua uleja muoyi muimpe
Muanabute neikale mupika wa muakunyende
Bobu bamane kupatukamu, kuelabu bantu lupemba

Mikenji ya bena Levi Mikiya mipeta ku masama a bantu balume Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone bua bamanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Padi muntu mulume mupete disama ku butaka buende, tufina tupatukamu, muntu awu mmupie mikiya
Nuenu ba bisamba bionso, sankai ne bantu bandi, bualu bua yeye nealombe mashi a bantu bandi, neasombuele badi n andi lukuna, udi umusha dihila dia buloba ne dia bantu bandi
Wakumukaku, wakimba dina dia mai dikuabo, kabakaditandila, yeye wakadidika ne, Lehobota
Padiyi mifue, muntu muyilenge, udi upia mikiya
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanusankishe bu muakanulayeye; nuenu nenusombeshe bisamba bia bungi bintu, kadi kanuena nusomba bintu kudibi; nuenu nenukokeshe bisamba bia bungi, kadi bisamba ebi kabiena binukokesha

Bana betu bakatekesha mitshima yetu, bakamba ne, Bantu aba badi batuhita hunene ne bule; misoko yabo idi minene, ne mpangu yai ya mabue idi miye mulu mule; bualu bukuabo, tuakatangilamu bana balume ba Bena Anaka

Eu mmudimu wa meku a Bena Gêshona udibo benza ne majitu adibo batuala nebabidie bilulu bidi binyunguluka nsubu wa tshitendelu, ne ntenta mene wa kusambakena, ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu, ne tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge tshidi ha mutu hatshi, ne tshilulu tshidi ku mbelu kua nsubu, ne bilulu bia ku luhangu, ne tshilulu tshidi ku tshibi tshia luhangu tshidi hehi ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu tshidi tshinyunguluka tshioshelu tshia kahia, ne nshinga ya ku luhangu, ne bintu bionso bidibo benza n abi mudimu, bobo nebenze mudimu eu
Meme nembutule buloba buenu, ne bantu badi n enu lukuna badi bashikamamu nebakeme bua bualu buabu
Biatangila muakuidi ne miosa mitoke tô kayena mu muaba au mutoke, ne disama kadiena dibuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, muakuidi neamubueshe ha nkayandi mu nsubu matuku muanda mutekete
Nyuma wakashala kudibo, bakadi ne mena abo mafunda, ka dî kabakaya ku Ntenta, bakamba di dia Nzambi mu tshitudilu
Mutuangaji atue munu mu mashi awu, aalabe ku matumba matalame adi ku tshilambuilu tshia milambu ya kuosha

badi bitaba: Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi upatula Dîyi dikulu dieena tshieena bwalu tshidi tshilonda etshi: KA DIOSHA Twêtu, Beena Kongu, Basangisha kudi kutuyâya ne kutudi tufumina mu majinga a mpatshi a budikadidi, a bweena muntu, a diswikangana,a bululama ne a mudimu; Bikala ne dijinga dieetu dimwe dia kwibaka munkatshi mwa Aflika Mbulamatadi wa mêyi ne mikandu ne Ditunga dia bukole ne bubanji dishindameena pa mungalata mulelela wa tshidiidi, wa bubanji, wa nsombelu wa bantu ne wa bunkambwa; Pa kumona ne dipangika dia bululama ne mamuma adi, dipangila dia kunyooka benzavi, ditabaleela anu balela ne balunda, ditabaleela anu beena polovensa wa momumwe, ditabaleela anu beena tshisamba tshia momumwe, ditabaleela anu beena dîku dia momumwe, mu dilondangana diawu, ke didi mfuki wa diupuka dia mishinga yetu ya bunkambwa ne wa dinyanguka dia ditunga; Bajadika dipangadika diabo dia kulaminyina ne kukolesha budikadidi ne kabumwe ka ditunga mu dinemeka dia ngikadilu yetu mîmpe mishilashilangana ne ya pa bwaayi; Bajadikulula dianyisha dieetu ne didifila ne dilamata dieetu ku Déclaration Universelle des Droits de l Homme, ku Charte Africaine des Droits de l Homme et des peuples , ku Conventions des Nations Unies sur les Droits de l Anfants et sur les Droits de la Femme, nangananga ku kipatshila ka dileeja mpala dia momumwe dia mulume ne mukaji mu bishimikidi bia ditunga ne mu bulongolodi bwa matunga butangila dilama ne dikolesha mapa a bumuntu; Batuma kudi dijinga dia kumona Mbulamatadi ya Aflika idisangisha ne yenza midimu mu diumvwangana bwa kujululula ne kukolesha kabumwe ka beena Aflika mu ndongolwelu ya Aflika mujima, ya bitupa ne ya bitupa bia mwinshi bia Aflika, bwa kupeesha beena Aflika mishindu mîmpe menemene ya kuvunguluka ne ya kutantshisha bubanji ne nsombelu wa bantu; Badifila anu ku dikolesha dia bukwatshishanganyi bwa matunga bwikala ne makasa ne ku diumvwangana dia bisamba bia mu buloba bujima, bikala baneemaka bumuntu bwa umwe ne umwe ne mêyi maludiki a didikookesha ne a bujima bwa maloba a Mbulamatadi umwe ne umwe; Bajadikulula budikookeshi bweetu kabuyi kumbusha anyi kushipa bwa kudilongolola badilekelela ne bwa kukolesha maalu etu a tshidiidi, a bubanji, a nsombelu ne a bunkambwa, muntu ne muntu bilondeshila bweenda bukola bwa lungenyi; Bikala bamanya bîmpe majitu etu ku mêsu kwa Nzambi , kwa Ditunga, kwa Aflika ne kwa Buloba bujima; Tudi tweela dîyi dikole twamba ne tudi bitaba Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi
Maweja Nangila kuanyisha milambu ya Ebele, kubenga ya Kayine
Miloho yakahingana kudi Yakoba, yakamuambila ne, Tuakuya kudi mukulu ebe Esau, ne yeye ulualua kusangakena n ebe mu nshila, udi ne balume nkama mai ku nyima kuandi
Kadi bena Avi, bavua basombe mu misoku ya mu ditunga dia Ngaza, bavua bababutula kudi baluishi bafumine ku Kaftore
Muntu yonsu udi mumane kukumbaja matuku avuaye mudijidile, nebaye nende mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Bakaya ku luendu luabo lua kumudilu bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Dijidila dia bena Levi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Umbusha bena Levi munkatshi mua bena Izrayele, bua kumusha mikiya idi pambidi pabu
Tshiena ngitabusha di diandi bua kulekela Bena Isalele
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu uvua mutuambile ne: Nudi bashale ku mukuna eku matuku mapite bungi
Nebamubikile ne: Mmukaji , bualu mmufumine kudi mulume

Muakuidi neahingane dituku dia muanda mutekete, neatangile kabidi, ne bikala disama ditampakane mu bimanu bia nsubu, muakuidi nêle di bua kumusha mabue akadi ne disama, nebêle mu muaba udi kauyi muakane ku butshika bua musoko, nebakuone munda mua nsubu, nebêle bintu bidibo bakuona ku butshika bua musoko mu muaba udi kauyi muakane, nebangate mabue makuabo, nebâbueshe mu miaba ya makuabo, nebajinguile makuabo mu miaba yakadi makuabo
Nunku buhianyi bumue kabuena bumuka ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba, tshisamba ne tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele netshikale ne buhianyi buatshi
Maweja Nangila kutupatula mu ditunga adi ku bukole buende
Nzambi wakalekela kuyikila ne Abalahama, wakamushiya, wakaya mu diulu
Au mmeku a Yisakâ, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi asambombo ne binai ne nkama isatu
Nanku mu matuku dikumi ne muanda mutekete a ngondu wa muanda mutekete, buatu kuimana pa mukuna wa Ararate
Tshimuangi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Wewe newikale bu Mvidi Mukulu ku mesu kua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Songa biebe mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi: neufundehu mei onso anakafunda ha mabue a diambedi awakatshibula
Usangishe biakudia bia mishindu yonsu, ubitekele mu buatu bua numone mua kudia wewe ne bena diebe, kabidi ne nyama
Nebanutshine
Nomba Yehowa Udi Ubaha Mai ku Dibue Bena Isalele bonso bakalua mu tshihela tshia Sina mu ngondo wa kumudilu, bakashikama mu Kadesha, Mîyama wakafua, bakamujikamu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bantu aba nebampetule musangu bule munyi
Pashishe kulejaye Maweja Nangila milambu ya bintu bia mu madimi
Tshidi tshienzekela, bilondangana, ku polovensa ne ku polovensa
Tshikondu tshivuabu balele Izake, Abrahame uvua mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama

Kanungu ka Musangu nansha umwe, ne nansha mene pikalabo bateeka ditunga mu bukalenga bwa tshimpitshimpi anyi bwa bilwilu bilondeshila tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu edi, kabeena mwa kulengulula mapa ne ngenyi miludiki ya nshindamenu idi ilonda eyi to: mapa a kwikala ne mutu ku nshingu ; dikandika dia tshikisu ne dikengeshangana anyi tshinyangu, ditangila muntu bu nyama, dimupula dia mishinga; dikandika dia bupika ne tshinyangu, lungenyi luludiki lwa kufila bibawu ne manyooka anu adi mêyi ne mikandu mitabija; bukookeshi bwa kudisungila ne bwa kutontolola dipangadika; dikandika dia dieela mu lukanu bwa mabanza, budikadidi bwa kweela meji, bwa kusungula bwîmpe ne bubi ne bwa ditabuuja
Nunku nudisunguile muaba ku mpenge kua tshitudilu bua nuenu nuye ha bule bua kuhuya munda
Lota wakabamona, wakabika bua kubakidila, wakabakukiula hanshi
Maweja Nangila ne: Meme musangane bantu bakane makumi asatu, tshiakubutula tshimenga

Wewe newambile muan ebe wa balume mu matshu, ne muana wa muan ebe wa balume, malu anakuenza mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne bimanyinu bianyi binakuenza munkatshi muabo, bua nuenu numanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Biahita bidimu bia bungi, wewe udi mumanye mua kuhandisha mushinga wa bintu, ne bialeha bidimu bikese, wewe neuhuekeshe mushinga wabi bu mudi bungi bua bintu bidiye ukusumbisha
Tshibangidilu Mvidi Mukulu kuvuluka Nowa ne nyama yonsu minene ne mikese ivuaye nayi mu buatu
Bena Izrayele kuambula biakudia abi
Nadaba ne Abihu bakafua hakafuabo kahia kakadi kakayi ka tshijila kudi Yehowa
Wewe newambile bantu dituku adi bua dituku adi dikale dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila kunudi, kanuenji mudimu eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu nsubu yenu yonso tô ne mu bikondo bienu bionso
Pikala bualu ebu bubi, budi kabuyi buengelela Maweja Nangila, buenzeke munkatshi muenu bulelela, muena tshibawu awu, nansha yeye mulume nansha yeye mukaji, nuye nende ku tshibuelelu tshia tshimenga
Diidikija diônso dia kumbusha ku bukole bukalenga bwenza kudi Dîyi dikulu badi badipiisha ne tshibawu katshiyi kukupula bwa bibi bienzela ditunga ne Mbulamatadi
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neasabuke ku mpala kuenu; yeye neashihe bisamba abi ku mpala kuenu, nuenu nenubihate; Yoshua neasabuke ku mpala kuenu bu muakamba Yehowa
Bantu aba Mose ne Alona mbantu bakambila Yehowa ne, Hatulai Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku misumba yabo

Mose wakambila Alona ne Eleazâ ne Itama ne, Kanutudi bifulu ku mitu yenu, kanuhandi bilulu bienu, bua kanufu bienu, ne bua tshiji tshia Yehowa katshilu kudi bantu bonso, kadi bana benu, tshisamba tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, badile bualu bua kahia kakatemesha Yehowa
Budi bwambula bujitu bwa midimu yabo kumpala kwa Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga tshidi mwa kubupeesha dinyooka dia mu tshibûngi pa ditabija dia mukanda wa ditangilula
Bena bilengulengu bakenza muomumue ne manga abo, bakatuma biula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Mmudileje nanku diba divua bena Ejipitu bakengeshe bena Izrayele bikole
Meme nengimane kumpala kuenu pa lubuebue ludi pa mukuna wa Sinayi
Mêyi a ditunga ke adi aakaja bûngi bwa lupetu lwa Ditunga bônso
Mai akatamba, akavulangana a bungi ha buloba, ne buatu buakabanda ha mutu ha mai
Kadi wewe musangane bantu bakane anu dikumi
Kadi padi dikeji adi dikale anu muadi muvuadi, kadiyi ditampakane pambidi ponsu, mutuangaji ambe ne: muntu ewu kena mupie mikiya to
Ne nyama idi mimpe ne nyama idi kayiyi mimpe ne nyunvu ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi, bintu bibidi bintu bibidi, bilume ne bikashi, biakabuela ne Noa mu buatu, bu muakambila Nzambi Noa
Moshe kuamba ne: Dina diende didi Ngershone, bualu ndi muena tshimuangi, musombe mu ditunga dia bende

Yehowa wakunvua mei enu, wakadi n enu tshiji, wakaditshiha ne, Nansha muntu umue wa mu tshikondo etshi tshibi neatangile buloba ebu buimpe, bunakalaya batatu enu bua kunuhabu, anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, neabutangile; nemmuhe buloba buakadiateye muinshi mua makasa andi, ne kudi bana bandi, bualu bua yeye wakalonda Yehowa bulelela

Wakashiha mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga kabidi, bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi bantu, bana balume ba Alona bakamulesha mashi akamiamineye ku tshioshelu, ne dianyi dia mulume wa ngombe ne dia tshimpanga ne mukila udi ne dianyi ne dianyi didi ha mutu ha bintu bia munda ne tumuma ne lukutu lua mutshima, bakateka dianyi ha biadi, ne yeye wakosha dianyi ha tshioshelu, kadi Alona wakanyukula biadi ne tshibelu tshia ku tshianza tshia balume bu mulambu wa kunyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa, bu muakamba Mose

Tshituha tshiakaheta bantu bakaya ku nvita tshiakadi mikoko binunu nkama isatu ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama itanu, ne mulambu wa Yehowa wakadi mikoko nkama isambombo ne makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu
Ngulube kena muakane kunudi, bualu bua udi ne mikono mihanduluke, kadi kena uhingishilula bintu mukana
Bena Ori ke bavua badianjila kuasa mu ditunga dia Seyire
Nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu yonsu nuikale nuenza bualu ebu kashidi
Butshia dinda, Maweja Nangila kuenza muvuaye muambe
Bana hadibo balela mu tshikondo tshisatu badi mua kubuela mu disangisha dia Yehowa
Yeye wakabaheta, wakabambila mei au
Ndi mumone mudi bena Izrayele banyingalala
Ubulabe budimbu munda ne panyima
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kukonka bantu bende bua kujadika tshivua tshienzeke
Pashishe muena mudimu wa Abrahame ne bonsu bavuaye muende nabu, kudiabu, kunuabu, kulalabu
Kubatuminaye tshipupu tshikole
Bakenza bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzu bia kuenza n abi mudimu mu muaba wa tshima, bakenzela Alona bilulu bia tshijila bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kadi dituku didi mputa umueneka, upatuka tufina, muntu awu neikale ne mikiya
Yeye wakamba ne, Udi mu ntenta
Kanutendeledi mvidie ya bena Kenaane Panuafika mu ditunga, Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu neabutule bisamba bionsu bidi mu ditunga adi
Nanku mutuangaji akobolole mfumu wa bena Izrayele anu mushindu ewu bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Yosefe wakidika muan a bute dina ne, Manashe; bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpuisha muoyo bua mudimu wanyi mukole ne bua bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu anyi
Matuku onsu atshidi bantu pa buloba, tshikondu tshia kukuna ne tshia kunowa, tshia mashika ne tshia luya, tshia mvula ne tshia mushipu, tshia munya ne tshia midima kabiena bijika kabidi to
Yeye wakadi kayi muitabushe di dia Yehowa wakashiya bantu bandi ne bimuna biandi mu mpata
Miaku eyi kutonda Abrahame bikole, bualu Ismayele uvua kabidi anu muanende
Ndimba kupatuka kubuela mu ditunga dionsu dia Ejipitu
Badi bankambua ba bisamba bibidi
Mêyi a ditunga adi aleeja mushindu wa kusanka ne budikadidi ebu
Maweja Nangila kuitaba bivua Moshe ulomba
Utuhe bietu buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo ne tatu wetu
Kadi kanuena mua kudia mashi a nyama to
Kakuena mvidie, pa buloba nansha mu diulu, udi ne bukole bua kuenza malu a dikema, bu muudi wenza wewe
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu udi nenu

Bakangata tshikowelu tshia Yosefe, bakashiha mbushi, bakina tshikowelu mu mashi, bakatuma tshikowelu tshia maboko male kudi tatu wabo, bakamba ne, Tuakutshisangana hanshi, umanye ne ntshikowelu tshia muan ebe, anyi

Yehowa wakatuhatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole ne diboko diandi diolola ne malu makole ne bimanyinu ne malu a dikema; wakalua n etu mu muaba eu, wakatuha buloba ebu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Yeye wakumuka mu buloba abu, wakaya mu Ashû, wakasa Ninewe ne Lehobote Ila ne Kala ne Lesene, hankatshi ha Ninewe ne Kala eu udi musoko munene
Hahita matuku asatu, Palô neabishe mutu webe, neakuhingashe mu mudimu webe kabidi, wewe neuhe luhanza lua Palô mu tshianza tshiandi, bu muwakenza diambedi bawakadi mutuadi wandi wa maluvu
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Mukelenge wetu udi wamba mei au munyi
Bualu tshintu tshia nanku, tshidi tshiumbusha mulumbuluishi, nansha yeye muntu wa meji, ku ba muanda, tshimutuma ku ba wetu, bua kunyangaye bilumbu bia bantu
Kuenzabi nanku
Bintu bidi ne bualu bua kuhikudibua bia ngondo umue, wewe neubihikule bu mudi mushinga wabi, nshekele itanu bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu nshekele udi bu guéras makumi abidi

mapa, maneema a bu muntu Tshibawu tshia budimu Budikadidi bwa teletwale yônso mu buludiki bwa ditunga Mungalata Tshipwita munwamfwanka Dekele, dipangadika dia mfumu wa ditunga Bubanji Mbulamatadi Mbulamatadi mwenza kudi mêyi ne mikandu Bukalenga bwa bilwilu Bukalenga bwa tshimpitshimpi Bitupa bia buludiki bwa ditunga et Masungulangana madilekelela, a patoka ne a mungalata
Bana ba balume ba Lewi, Geshona ne Kohata ne Melah
Aba mbana ba Ana Dishona ne Oholibama, muana mukashi wa Ana Aba mbana ba Dishona Hemedana ne Eshebane ne Yitelana ne Kelana
Nubande nende
Kuyaye lubilu kusuna mayi makuabu, kuanuisha tumelu tuonsu
Tshidi tshibweela misangu kayiyi mishadila ku ibidi ku tshidimu pa dibiikila dia Mulombodi watshi
Mulambu wonso udi muakuidi ufila nebawoshe ne kahia, kabadi mulambu eu

Muvua kabidi mbuji ya mpumbu dikumi ne ibidi bua milambu ya kukobolola nayi bantu, ngombe milume makumi abidi ne inayi, mikoku ya bimpanga makumi asambombu, mbuji ya mpumbu makumi asambombu ne bana ba mikoku makumi asambombu ba tshidimu tshimue, bua milambu ya bobumue

Mose Udi Uhingana mu Ejipitu Mose wakahingana kudi Yetelo tatu andi muenu, wakamuambila ne, Ndi musue kuhingana kudi bana betu badi mu Ejipitu, bua kubamona ne bobo batshidi ne muoyo Yetelo wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe talala
Bonsu abu, bisumbu bisatu, ke badi ne bua kumuka pashishe, benza tshiluilu tshibidi
Bishala ditoba ditoke mu muaba umue, kadiyi ditampakane mu dikoba, etshi ntshiuja tshiakadiosheye ne kahia, ne muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, etshi ntshibangu tshia kahia
Mu dituku disambombo nebalongolole bidibo bangate, bikale tshituha ha mutu ha tshituha tshidibo basangisha ku dituku ku dituku
Pashishe, Abrahame kujika muena kuende mu lubuebue alu luvua mu budimi bua Makpela pabuipi ne Mambre, udibu babikila ne: Ebrone, mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Nunku kabamatshishi mashi a muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu ha buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nnuha bua nuenu nubuhiane; mashi au kaikadi ham bidi henu
Dibadika Milambu ya kujidila nayi nzubu wa tshijila Moshe mumane kuasa nzubu wa tshijila mujikije, kujidilaye nzubu awu kabidi ne bintu bionsu bivua mu nzubu pa kubilaba manyi
Buloba buakashiyabo nebuikale ne bidimu bia kubanda, nebuikale hatuhu; bobo nebitabushe dikenga dia mibi yabo bualu bua bobo bakahidia mei anyi, ne mitshima yabo yakalengulula mikenji yanyi
Muntu yonsu asombe ku mbelu kuende
Bakabuesha tukanu tua or tuhindakana mu nkanu ibidi yakadi ku nseke ya tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi
Binuahidia kunvua di dianyi meme mumane kunuenzela malu au onso, nennukengeshe bikole misangu muanda mutekete bualu bua mibi yenu
Ishare uvua mulele bana ba balume basatu: Kora, Nefege ne Zikri
Kanudi mashi, kadi nuahongolole ha buloba bu mai
Ke bena Levi kutuadija mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena

Kuhungi tshihungidi ne bena buloba; hendabo masandi ne mpingu yabo, ne hashihelabo nzambi yabo nyama, hakubikilabo bua kudia n abo munyinyi wa nyama mishiha; bua nuenu kanubikidi bana babo ba bakashi kudi bana benu ba balume; ne bana babo ba bakashi badi benda masandi ku mpingu yabo ka benzeshi bana benu ba balume masandi kudi mpingu yabo
Yetro kutumina Moshe muntu ne mukenji ne: Ndi tatuebe muenu

Nanku mu ditunga dia Mowabe, luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene, Moshe kutuadija kulongesha bena Izrayele mikenji ya Mvidi Mukulu, ubambila ne: Mvidi Mukulu udi umusha bena Izrayele ku mukuna wa Sinayi Patuvua ku mukuna wa Sinayi
Muena mudimu uvua anu mupuwe umukenketa, udiebeja ne: Maweja Nangila mmungendeshe diakalenga anyi
Abimeleke kubikidisha Abrahame, umukonka ne: Tshiwatuenzedi nenku ntshinyi
Bu muakambila Yehowa Mose, wakababadila mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Wewe newoshe tshimpanga tshijima ha tshioshelu, tshidi mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa, udi utua dihembu, udibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia
Kadi kuvua misoku mikuabu mivule kayiyi miela mpangu to
Meme kulalaku matuku makumi anayi a munya ne a butuku, tshiyi mua kudia nansha kunua
Nvula yakaloka tô matuku makumi anai, mai akavulangana, akabandisha buatu ha mutu, buakabandishibua ku buloba
Mose wakafua argent ya buhikudi buabo kudi Alona ne bana bandi balume bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kadi Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Tshiakukuambila ne, Neakuambile mei onso adi Yehowa mungambile, anyi
Mapangadika a Minisitila kavulambedi badi baatwa tshiâla tshibîdi ku dia bakaji, padibo bienzeka, kudi baminisitila badiye wimikila dikumbaja dia mapangadika awu
Moshe kuateka onsu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, muaba udi Maweja Nangila
Abalama wakatula ntenta yandi, wakamuangala, wakaya kushikama hehi ne nu tshi ya telebinta ya Mamale idi mu Hebelone, wakenzelaku Yehowa tshioshelu
Biahona tshituha tshia mubidi yabi mufue ha bintu bidibo bakuna mu buloba, bintu ebi nebikale bilengele
Maweja Nangila kena nenu to
Uvua nkambua wa bimbi ba bisanji ne bedi ba nshiba
Muena mudimu awu kuangata tumelu dikumi tua mfumuende ne bionsu bivuaye mumone ne mbilenga
Hawamulekela, kumutumi ne bianza bituhu; umuhe bintu bia bungi munkatshi mua mikoko yebe, ne bia bintu biwakuhuola ne bia nvinyo; bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, mukusankishe, wewe neumuhe
Yeye ke nkambua wa bena Mowabe batudi nabu lelu
Miloho ya Moaba yakabika, yakahingana kudi Balaka, yakamba ne, Belâma udi uhidia bua kulua n etu
Enoke kulela Irade
Bualu ntshitupa tshia tshijila menemene, bualu ntshia ku mulambu uvuabu balambula Maweja Nangila
Ke Arone ne bana bende kuitaba bionsu bivua Moshe ubambila

Bobo nebunvue dî diebe, wewe ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele nenufile kudi mukelenge wa Ejipitu, nenumuambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu, wakusangakena n etu Tudi tukutendekena ne, Witabushe bua tuetu kuya luendu lua matuku asatu mu tshihela bua kushihela Yehowa Nzambi wetu nyama
Bakulu abu, nebalumbuluishe bantu matuku onsu bua kukuambuluisha
Kadi ku dikombu dia bena Levi ufundeku dina dia Arone
Balaka Wakenza muakamba Belâma, Balaka ne Belâma bakosha ngombe ne tshimpanga ha tshioshelu ne ha tshioshelu
Lufu lua Lakele Bakumuka ku Betele, ne diambedi bobo kabayi banze kufika ku Efelata, kanyinganyinga kakakuata Lakele, wakatantamana bikole
Kadi Kalebe kubapuwisha, wamba ne: Tuyayi mu ditunga adi
Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kushala mupika wa mukwabo to anyi kwikala muteeka mu tshitupa tshifwanangane
Bualu bua meme nengambe dina dia Yehowa: tumbishai bunene bua Nzambi wetu

Dielulula MIKENJI YA MAWEJA NANGILA Meyi ne mikenji binudi ne bua kukumbaja matuku onsu mu ditunga, didi Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu, munupe bua kusomba kashidi, bidi nunku: Muaba wa kutendelela wikale anu umue Nunyangakaje miaba ya tshijila yonsu, idibu base pa nsongu ya mikuna minene ne mikese, munkathi mua mitshi ya dileji, muaba udibu batendelela mvidie kudi bisamba binuanyenga matunga abi
Ke mpasu yonsu, nsua, bintunta ne mintuntu
Aba mbana ba Dishana: Usa ne Alana
Arone neakule ne bantu, ubambila malu auvua ne bua kuamba wewe
Kakuena mukashi udi utula difu, kakuena mukashi udi wikala nkumba mu buloba buenu, nenkumbashe bungi bua matuku enu
Nuenu kungandamuna ne: lungenyi alu ludi luimpe
Bua Benyamina yeye wakamba ne, Munangi wa Yehowa neashikame n andi talalâ, utu wamubuikila matuku onso, udi ushikama hankatshi ha makaya andi

Mose ne Alona bakangata balume aba bakabikilabo ku mena abo bakasangisha tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele ku dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo muibidi, bakababadila milongo ya bankambua babo ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, muntu ne muntu
Kadi Rebeka uvua mupite kunemenena anu kudi Yakobe
Tshibangidilu KU MBANGILU Mvidi Mukulu udi ufuka bintu ne bantu Dituku dia kumpala Mvidi Mukulu kufuka diulu ne buloba
Yeye wakamba kabidi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Sheme, atumbishibue, Kanana neikale muhika wandi
Maweja Nangila umvua nanku, kufikaye munda
Ndelanganyi ya Yakobe yonsu ivua bantu makumi muanda mutekete
Mikenji eyi indi munupeshe, nuyilame mu mioyi yenu ne mu mitshima yenu
Yeye wakafunda ha mabue abidi, wakampau
Kadi bantu bakaya n andi bakamba ne, Katuena bamanye mua baluangana ne bantu aba, bualu bua badi batutamba bukole
Nudifile muenu muonsu kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Uziyele uvua mulele bana ba balume basatu: Mishayele, Elishafane ne Sitri
Edome neikale buhianyi, ne Sei, buloba bua bena lukuna bandi, neikale buhianyi buandi, kadi Bena Isalele nebenze malu makole
Yishemaele, muan andi mulume, wakadi ne bidimu dikumi ne bisatu hakamutengulabo

Bialueye ne nyama mubi udibo kabayi mua kudia bu mulambu kudi Yehowa, yeye neateke nyama ku mpala kua muakuidi, ne muakuidi neatuangane handi mushinga bikala nyama muimpe anyi mubi, nyama neikale wa mushinga wakadiye ne muakuidi
Mose wakaya kusangakena ne tatu andi muenu, wakamukukuila, wakatuangana n andi mishiku, bakakonkangana bua malu abo, bakabuela mu ntenta
Ke midimu idi bena Merari ne bua kuenza mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Mose wakavula Alona bilulu biandi, wakabiluatshisha Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, ne Alona wakafua biandi ha mutu ha mukuna, ne Mose ne Eleazâ bakahueka mu tshibanda
Arone ne bana bende ba balume ke bavua babalombola
Bakamba ne, Muena Ejipitu wakatusungila mu tshianza tshia balami, wakatukokela mai kabidi, wakanuisha mikoko
Kadi binuahidia kuihata bena buloba ku mesu kuenu, bantu badi bashala nebikale bu tushingi mu mesu enu ne bu meba mu mbadi yenu, nebamatshishe mu buloba bunudi nushikama
Kadi yeye wakahingasha tshianza tshiandi, ne mona, muana mukuabo wakaluhuka
Nebupule nzubu awu, bumushe bintu bionsu bivua bimuibaka nabi: mabue, mabaya ne bionsu bivua bishinguila nabi
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakalua kudi Mose, wakamuambila ne, Alona, muan enu mulume, muena Lewi, kenaku, anyi
Dîyi dilongolodi didi ne tshia kuleeja mishindu ya kulonda mapa aa
Nanku muntu udi mua kuakula bimpe nansha kushala kamama, kumvua nansha kuikala ne mapapa, kumona nansha kayi umona ku bukole bua nganyi
Nebahe bantu bakuabo bana benu balume ne bana benu bakashi; mesu enu neabatangile ne mitshima minyingalala matuku onso; kadi kanuena nushala ne bukole nansha bukese mu bianza bienu
Isaka wakatamba kuhampakana, wakamba ne, Muntu kai wakangata munyinyi wa ntole, wakulua n au kundi, ne nakudia diambedi wewe kuyi muanji kulua, ne nakamuvudishila disanka
Ke muikale bungi bua ndelanganyi yebe
Ke mudi mutuangaji ujikija mikiya ya muntu nanku kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, bua muntu kashadi ne mikiya ya dipatuka dia tufina
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Kuedi meji ku bubi bua bena Izrayele, padibu bakutombokela, babenga diyi diebe
Palti, muana wa Rafu, wa mu tshisamba tshia Binyamine
Bavua bashale kabidi pa buloba pashishe
Mukàjì kayi mutamba bakwabu Utena yeya ne maalu munda Kalwa ubwela mu cyalukamu
Aba mbana ba Eze Bilehana, ne Zâwana ne Akana

Milau ei yonso neyilue kunudi, neyinulonde, neyinuhete tô ne hanuajimishibua ba buloba; bualu bua nuenu kanuakunvua mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi biakanuambileye: milau ei neyikale kunudi bu tshimanyinu ne dikema, ne kudi bana benu tshiendelele
Hakalua ngondo muibidi ne dituku dia makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete, buloba buakuma Nzambi wakambila Noa ne, Hatuka mu buatu, wewe ne mukashi webe ne bana bebe balume ne bakashi babo
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi ubiikija ne ulombola Tshipangu tshia baminisitila anyi bameena
Mvidi Mukulu, wewe ke udi mufuke bintu bionsu, mubipeshe muoyi
Alona ne bana bandi balume bakenza mei onso akamba Yehowa mukana mua Mose
Nanku, kuajiki
Wakenza malonga a mesa, ne nkuta ne bihanza ne bibuikilu bia bintu ebi ne tshiamu tshia or nkayandi
Nanku, dituku disatu dinda, makubakuba ne miele ya mvula kumvuika ku mukuna
Kadi, bu muvua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu mubanjije Sarayi, mukaji wa Abrame, Maweja Nangila kutumina mukalenga awu ne bonsu ba mu nzubu muende tshipupu tshikole tshia masama
midimu ya mbulamatadi mu polovensa ne mu misoko;
Lubena wakunvua tshifufu tshiabo, wakamusungila mu bianza biabo, wakamba ne, Kabamushihi
Tuetu kupitshila mu tshipela tshipite bunene, tshikuatshishe bowa, tshinudi bamanye, tshidi mu njila wa ku mikuna ya bena Amore

Kanungu ka Bwa kulondolola pa lukasa ndongamu wabu, Bukalenga bunene budi mwa kulomba kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe dianyisha dia kwangata, mu olodonase dîyi , mapangadika adi pa tshibidilu ku bukookeshi bwa dîyi mu mapangadikadîyi bwa tshipungu tshikese ne pa mianda mimanyika
Nzambi wakumpa mikemu yabo, ne Nzambi wakafuka mulayi wandi kudi Abalahama ne kudi Isaka ne kudi Yakoba
Nebimanshe bintu abi ku mpenga kua tshimenga muaba wa bintu bibi
Bualu bua bobo badi bantu banyi banakuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, kababahanyi bu bahika

Dibadika Bantu badi ne mikiya Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua kumanyisha bena Izrayele ne: Bantu bonsu badi ne masama a nsudi, masama a tufina tupatuka mu mubidi, nansha bavua balenga bitalu, nubumushe mu mitanda yenu, bualu badi ne mikiya

dienza dia ndongamu ya mianda ya madimi ne ya meetu ne diilonda bu mudibio mu mikenji ya ndongamu wa ditunga, diteeka dia beena midimu wa budimi, dia beena mudimu bashindame bu mudibio mu bulongolodi bwa mukanda wa beena mudimu bashindame ba mbulamatadi, dilonda dia mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga idi itangila mianda ya madimi, ya meetu, ya ditwa buluwa ne ya diloba pamwe ne ya miaba idi bantu basombela, ya dilamina bia pa buloba ne dikwata dia nyama ya diitu, dilongolola ne dilondesha dia mivu ya bia pa madimi, ditwa dia mishinga ya bia pa madimi;
Ke mu wabu bamujike pabuipi ne muena kuende Sara
Bena Ejipitu bakenzesha Bena Isalele mudimu bikole
Nanku muntu yonsu udi umbenga, ndi mmunyoka too ne ku ndelanganyi yende ya musangu muisatu nansha muinayi
Pashishe nebabueje milonda ku tshilambuilu aku bua kutshiambuilaku

Hakamunuisheye mai, hashishe Bikala mukashi muonyibue, bikaleye muenzele mulume wandi bualu bubi, mai adi elesha mulau neabuele munda muandi, neikale a bululu, ne mubidi wandi neutuntumuke, ne tshibelu tshiandi netshibole ne mukashi neikale ne mulau munkatshi mua bana babo
Kora uvua mulele bana ba balume basatu: Asire, Elkana ne Abiyashafe
Noba wakaya wakanyenga Kenata ne misoko mikuabo wakidika musoko wandi ne Noba, bu diba diandi
Biajidila mundi Yehowa nsubu wandi, muakuidi neatuangane n andi mushinga, bikala nsubu muimpe anyi mubi, nsubu neikale ne mushinga wakatueye ne muakuidi
Bakafika ku muaba wakamua mbila Nzambi, ne Abalahama wake nza tshioshelu, wakalongolola nkunyi, wakasuika muan andi Isaka, wakamuladika ha tshioshelu ha mutu ha nkunyi
Pashishe neaye nawu ku tshilambuilu
Udi mwengeleki wa budikadidi bwa ditunga, wa bujima bwa tshipâpu tshia ditunga, wa budikookeshi bwa ditunga ne wa dineemeka dia ndondu ne diumvwangana ne bakwa matunga
Hayabo ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu mu nshila, Bena Lewi nebatule nsubu, ne halongololabo tshitudilu, Bena Lewi nebamushimike, bialua muenyi ha buihi nebamushihe
diepele dia masama a bipupu ne a nyama adi mwa kujiwula bantu;

Mufuanyikije kabidi: padi muntu ulengangana ne mukuabu kayi mumanye, ne udi mulengangane nende ewu udi ne mikiya idi yambulukilangana, udi mulengangane awu, padiye umanya bubi buende, diakamue udi muena tshibawu
Bantu balume ba tshisamba etshi, bituadije ku bana batekete ba ngondu umue too ne ku bantu bakulumpe, bavua
Meme kutua binu panshi bua kuela Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa mfumuanyi Abrahame, tuasakidila
Bakalenga aba babidi ba bena Amore, ke bavua ne bumfumu luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene
Nanku, Meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu nennuvuluke
Mose nealue nkayandi hehi ne Yehowa, kadi bobo kabalu hehi nansha, bantu kabayi n andi
Wa munkatshi mua bana ba Yosefe, wa mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima, Elishama muana mulume wa Amihuda
Kadi bikalabo kabayi basangana muibi, nunku muena nsubu nealue biandi kudi balumbuluishi, bua bobo bajingulule ne yeye wakalenga biuma bia mukuandi tshianza, anyi
Misoko ei yonso yakadi ne mpangu mile ne bibi bikanda ne biamu; tuakanyenga misoko mikuabo ya bungi yakadi kayiyi ne mpangu

Biabuikila bena buloba mesu abo kudi muntu au hafileye bana bandi kudi Moleke, kabayi bamushihe, meme nengumushe mesu anyi kudi muntu au ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu muandi, nemmumushe ne bantu bandi bonso badi benza handi malu a masandi ne Moleke, munkatshi mua bana babo
Nukoleshe mitshima yenu, nulue ne mamuma a mu buloba abu Hakayabo nunku, mamuma a nvinyo akabanga kulua
Uyaya kudi kunyi

Halua dituku dia muanda mukulu, nealue ne bintu bia kudilengesha n abi kudi muakuidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena ku mpala kua Yehowa, muakuidi neangate muana wa mukoko wa mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji ne dikoho dia manyi, ne muakuidi neabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa
Yosefe wakadi ne bidimu makumi asatu hakimaneye ku mpala kua Palo, mukelenge wa Ejipitu

Super Mwika Ya Marie eh Maman coup de foudre Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Bya kulwa disànka Bya kulwa disànka Bya kulwa disànka Bya kulwa disànka Bya kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Bya kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Bya kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Bya kulwa disànka Twayi lona we
Dutelonone Bidimu Biakashalabo mu Tshihela Tuakanyunguluka, tuakaya mu tshihela mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze, bu muakangambila Yehowa; tuakanyunguluka mukuna wa Sei matuku a bungi
Bana ba balume ba Yisehâ: Kola ne Nefege ne Zikeli
Nanku Nowa kujadika ne: mayi akepedi pa buloba
Badi badilelela nkayabu, katuyi banji kufika
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele bua bobo balue kûdi ne manyi akatuabo bua kutemesha n au minda ku dituku ku dituku

Bakambila Palo ne, Tuakuluila bua kushikama mu buloba ebu, katuena ne muaba wa kudisha bimuna bietu bualu bua tshiole tshidi tshikole mu buloba bua Kanana, nunku tudi tukusengelela ne, Witabushe bua bantu bebe bashikama mu buloba bua Goshene Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Tatu ebe ne bana benu bakulua kudi, buloba bua Ejipitu buonso budi ku mpala kuebe, ushikike tatu ebe ne bana benu mu buloba budi butamba buimpe bashikame mu buloba bua Goshene, ne biwamanya bantu ba lungenyi luimpe munkatshi muabo, ubateke balami ba bimuna bianyi
Padi muntu ne dibala mutu mujima, kena mupie mikiya to
Nubuele mu ditunga adi ne dikima
Wewe wakungambila ne, Bulelela, nenkue nzele bimpe, nenkukumbashile tunkanunuina tuebe bungi bua nsenga ya kukala kua mai manene, idibo kabayi mua kubala

Numuambile ne, Mona, muntu webe Yakoba udi kabidi ku nyima kuetu Bualu bua yeye wakabambila munda ne, Nemmutokeshe munda ne matabisha akaya ku mpala kuanyi, ne hatuatangilangana n andi ku mesu, bumue yeye neangitabushe
Muntu nansha umwe kabena mwa kumwenzeja mudimu wa ku bukole anyi mumukanyika to

Muakuidi wakelabo manyi ha mutu ne wakajidilabo bua kubuela mu mudimu wa tatu andi yeye neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, nealuate bilulu bia lin bilulu bia tshijila, neafile mulambu bua kujidila nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bua ntenta wa kusangakena ne bua tshioshelu ne bua kubuikila n au bubi bua bakuidi ne bua bantu bonso
Kanungu ka Kakweena muntu udi mwa kudibweelela mu nzubu mwa muntu to
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Pingaja dikombu dia Arone muaba udi mushete wa ndondu
Nenudieku bidia ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenusanke mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu, ne nuenu ne ba mu nsubu yenu mu malu onso akanusankisha n au Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Budi kaludiki, dieedibwa mu lukanu ke didi tshiumusha
Kadi kenza mudimu wa kukanyika balumbulwishi bwa kulondabu mêyi ne mikandu
Lupepele alu kuipata mpasu yonsu, kuyituma mu Mayi manene makunze
Kadi bobo kabakitabusha dî dia Mose, bakuabo bakabishiya tô ne ku dinda, bishi biakabuelamu, bidia biakanunka muhuya mubi, Mose wakadi n abo tshiji
Tuetu netubiteleje, tubikumbaje kabidi
Abrahame ukenzakana, kumonaye mukoku wa tshimpanga, nsengu yatshi mipatame mu mutshi
Nanku bonsu abu, bisumbu bisatu, nebatuadije luendu pashishe, benza tshiluilu tshisatu
Balombodi ba bena mvita ba mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kumuanyishila bulenga bua mukaji awu
Aba mbantu bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona, ne kudi bakelenge ba Bena Isalele dikumi ne babidi, muntu ku nsubu wa batatu abo muntu ku nsubu wa batatu abo
Midimu ya tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwaka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe idi yenzeka pa bwashi, pa kumbusha pikalabo bapangadika ne yenzeka biibi bikanga
Bualu lelu ndituku dia Dikisha dia Maweja Nangila
Kanuhuodi bintu bidi bidimenena anyi tumuma didi tudimenena etshi ntshidimu tshia kubanda kua buloba
Nebateke dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Dana ku luseke lua ku nôde
Udi mutuenzele bualu budi muntu kayi mua kuenzela mukuabu to
Kadi kakuitaba to
Nanku batentekedi abu kubipisha ditunga dia Kenaane, bamba ne: Mu Kenaane bantu benyi kabena mua kusombamu to
Muena mudimu kukuata muinshi mua tshibelu tshia mfumuende Abrahame, uditshipa bua kukumbaja bionsu bivua mfumuende mumutume bua kuenza
Nomba Kulondolola kua Luendu lua Bena Isalele Ei ngendu ya Bena Isalele hakaluhukabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku tshianza tshia Mose ne Alona bu muakadi bisumbu biabo
BIDI BITANGILA BULONGOLODI NE BUDI BWA BUKALENGA
Nemmuenzeje kabidi ku bukole bua abipate mu ditunga diende
Kadi bua Mvidi Mukulu kumufuila luse ku bubi buvuaye muenze, udi ne bua kulambula Maweja Nangila dishina dia mukoku nansha dishina dia mbuji
Ubuele kabidi ne nyunyi milume muanda mutekete ne nyunyi mikaji muanda mutekete, bua diminu dia nyunyi dishale kashidi pa buloba
dienza dia ndongamu ya majimba, ya bia mwinshi mwa buloba, ya matanda, ya mudilu udi wambulwisha polovensa ne diilonda bu mudibio mu mikenji ya kabujima ya ndongamu wa ditunga ;
Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Mona, nakamana kulua kudi
Kadi nuenu, nunyunguluke, yai bienu mu tshihela mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze

Bantu mu Budimi bua Edene Eku nkulondolola kua malu a diulu ne a buloba hakafukibuabi Mu dituku diakenza Yehowa Nzambi buloba ne diulu, midioko ya mu madimi kayakanza kudiunda ha buloba ne mashinde kâkanza kutoloka, bualu bua Yehowa Nzambi kakanza kulokesha nvula ha buloba, ne kakuakadi muntu bua kuihileye buloba, kadi dibungi diakabanda ha buloba, ne tshitelele tshiakadi ha buloba buonso
Mose wakenza nunku, wakenza malu onso akamuambila Yehowa
Enza biebe tshintu tshia biseba bia bimpanga biaka tuabo mu mai makunze kunzû ne tshia biseba bia mbushi tshia kuteka ha musonga wa tshitendelelu
Kuangataye nyama umue ne nyunyi umue wa ku tshisumbu tshionsu tshia nyama idi kayiyi ne mikiya, kuyilambula Maweja Nangila pa tshilambuilu bu milambu ya kuosha
Alona wakahingana kudi Mose ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, disama diakashika
Kadi kanukepeshi mudimu wabu
Bualu nengipate bena Amore anu pambamona ne bubi buabu budi bukengela dinyoka
Arone kuamiamina ku nseke inayi ya tshilambuilu
Nudi balekela bana ba balume ne muoyi bua tshinyi
Mpindiewu ndi njadika ne: Maweja Nangila mmupite mvidie yonsu idi bantu batendelela
Adama wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne makumi asatu, wakalela muana mulume ne tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, mufuanangane n andi, wakamuidika dina ne, Sheta
Batangidi ba Mudimu Ebu mbungi bua bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu biakabalabo bu muakamba Mose biakakuatshila Bena Lewi mu mudimu wabo, mu bukokeshi bua Itama, muana mulume wa Alona, muakuidi
Eleyasafa, muana mulume wa Deuele, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Gada

Wakangata dianyi ne mukala wakadi ne dianyi ne dianyi dionso dia ha mutu ha bintu bia munda ne lukutu lua mutshima ne tumuma tubidi ne dianyi diabi ne tshibelu tshia ku tshianza tshia balume, wakangata mukala umue wakadi kauyi ne luevene ne mukata wakadi ne manyi mela ha mutu ne mukata mukuabo mu tshisaka tshiakadi ne mampa adi kâyi ne luevene ku mesu kua Yehowa, wakayiteka ha mutu ha dianyi ne ha tshibelu; wakateka bintu bionso mu bianza bia Alona ne mu bianza bia bana bandi balume, bakabinyukula bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa
Nenkumanyishe malu a wewe kubambila
Tshibilu tshia mampa kaayi mela buanga Maweja Nangila kuamba ne: Matuku malondangane muanda mutekete, nudie anu mampa kaayi mela buanga
Abrahame kujuka, kuinyika mutu panshi, wambila ndelanganyi ya Ete bavua base mu buloba abu, ne: Panuikala basue bua meme kujika muena kuanyi apa, ndombelayi kudi Efrone, muana wa Sohare
Ndi nshipa muana padiye untuuta
Ndi mupie mikiya

Muntu udi kayi muakane neangate butue bua mulambu wakoshabo bua kubuikila n au bubi, neangate mai adi ahueka mu dilonga: mundi utshidi muakane neangate mabeshi a hysope, neâtue mu mai, neamiamine ha ntenta, ne ha malonga onso, ne ha bantu bonso bakadimu, ne mundi wakalenga mifuba tshianza, anyi mundi wakafua ku muele wa nvita, anyi mundi mufue, anyi lukita, mundi utshidi muakane neamiamine mai ha mundi udi kayi muakane dî diku disatu ne dituku dia muanda mutekete, ne halua dituku dia muanda mutekete neamulengeshe, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne mai, neikale muakane ku dilolo
Bena Amaleka ne Bena Kanâna badi bashikama mu tshibanda, makelela nuhingane, yai mu tshihela mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze
Merari uvua ne bana ba balume babidi: Mali ne Mushi
Kanusongi mpingu

Mu tshidimu tshia makumi anai ne mu ngondo wa dikumi ne umue ne dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo eu, Mose wakamanyisha Bena Isalele bua malu onso akamuambila Yehowa mu mikenji yakabeleleye; hakashiheye Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi ushikama mu Heshebona, ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakadi ushikama mu Ashetalota ku Edelei
Kanuanji kutombokela Yehowa nansha, kanutshinyi bena buloba; bobo badi bu bintu bia tuetu kudia, bintu bidibo badisungila n abi biakumuka, ne Yehowa udi n etu; kanubatshinyi
Aba mbantu bakabikilabo ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele, bakelenge ba bisamba bia batatu abo, bakadi ku mutu kua binunu bia Bena Isalele
Yehowa neanutumine biusha bia mu Ejipitu, ne disama dia muiaka, ne mpusu ne lubila: masama adibo kabayi mua kuondaha
Yeye wakanunvuisha dî diandi mu diulu bua kunumanyisha malu: wakanuisha kahia kandi kanene hanshi ha buloba; nuenu nuakunyua mei andi munkatshi mua kahia
Kuambaye kabidi ne: Muntu kaayi uvua mua kuambila Abrahame ne: Dimue dituku Sara neamushe bana mabele
Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena bakambila Mose ne, Bantu bebe nebenze bu mudi mukelenge Wamba
Dituku dia muanda mutekete, nuenzele Maweja Nangila tshibilu bua kumutendelela
Bashiyangane ne mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, kumonanganabu ne Moshe ne Arone bavua babindile
Moshe kubamanyisha kabidi ne: Maweja Nangila udi wamba ne: nulame mana makuabu bua kualeja ndelanganyi yenu, imona biakudia bivua Maweja Nangila unudisha mu tshipela mu dipatuka dienu mu Ejipitu
Bualu kai wewe wakunyema mu musokoko kuakungambila, bua meme kukutuma ne disanka ne misambu ne biombelu

Nentume muanjelo ku mpala kuebe, nengihate Bena Kanana ne Bena Amole ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse, ku bu loba budi ne mabele ne buitshi bia bungi; bualu bua meme tshiena nya munkatshi muenu bualu bua nudi bantu ba buhidia bukole, bua tshinushihi mu nshila

Kanungu ka Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata didi mwa kutwa ndondu anyi kusheemeja diumvwangana, kudisanga anyi kuditeeka mu tshisumbu tshidi tshitekesha budishikaminyi bwadio bwa kuyisha bobumwe bwa bukwa mufika

Bana ba Yakoba bakamuenzela bu muakabambileye, bualu bua bobo bakamutuala mu buloba bua Kanana, bakamujika mu lubuebue lua mu budimi bua Makepela, luakasumba Abalahama hamue ne budimi, kudi Efelona, Muena Hiti, bu muaba wa kujikamu bafue, ku mpala kua Mamale
Nunku muan anyi, utumikile dî dindi nkua mbila
Yeye wakatahulula bana ba Lea ne ba Lakele ne ba bakashi babidi benji ba mudimu
Nebabanyangane bintu biabu, netubidie tuukute
Wakatemesha minda ku mpala kua Yehowa bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kadi dituku dia muanda mukulu, mukaji awu angate nkudimba ibidi nansha tumanda nkutshi tubidi, abipeshile mutuangaji mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Bajikija kuakula, Maweja Nangila kumuka, Abrahame kupingana kuende
Butuku bumane kuila, midima kuenzeka

Wewe neashihe tshimpanga, angata mashi atshi, wateke ku lusongo lua ditshu didi ku tshianza tshia balume tshia Alona, ne ku lusongo lua ditshu ku tshianza tshia balume tshia bana bandi balume, ne ku tshiala tshia ku tshianza tshiabo tshia bukole, ne ku muan a dikasa munene dia ku tshianza tshia balume, umiamine mashi ha tshioshelu tshionso
Bana ba balume ba Yuda Ele ne Onana ne Shela, ne Pelese ne Zela kadi Ele ne Onana bakafuila mu buloba bua Kanana Bana ba balume ba Pelese, Helelona ne Hamula
Kanungu ka Badi bâsa Tshibutshilu tshia ditunga tshiabanyi tshia mpetu ne bintu
Moshe kuambula mifuba ya Yozefe
Enzai nunku ne ngombe yenu ne mikoko yenu kabidi, muana neikale ne mamu wandi matuku muanda mutekete, kadi numufile kundi dituku dia muanda mukulu
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Dibikidibua dia Besalele ne Oholiaba Ek
Bavua bana ba badi basombele mulu bavuabu balele ne bana ba bakaji ba bantu bavuabu basela
Matuku makumi anai akashika, matuku adibo balongolola tshitalu akakumbana, Bena Ejipitu bakamujinga matuku makumi muanda mutekete
Uye lukasa kudi bena Izrayele bua kubakobolola

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bikala mundi wa munkatshi muenu anyi wa munkatshi mua tunkanunuma dienu munyanguke ku dilenga dia mundi mufue, anyi bikaleye muye ku luendu kule yeye neavuluke kuhita kua Yehowa
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne nyama udi ne mulau
Yeye wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Geshoma, wakamba ne, Nakadi mushikame mu buloba bua benyi
Kabeena mwa kwikala nabu popamwe ne bukwabo nansha
Bualu kai Yehowa udi ulua n etu ku buloba ebu bua kutushihesha ku miele ya nvita
Ku nyama yonsu idi mu mayi, mu majiba, mu mayi manene ne mu misulu, nudi mua kudia minyinyi idi ne misalala ne mamba
Bobo nebalame bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne bintu bia Bena Isalele, bua kuenzelabo mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Nanku bionsu bivua ne muoyi pa buloba kufuabi: nyunyi, bimuna, nyama ya muitu, bilandadi ne bantu kabidi
Meme nda Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bua kuikala Nzambi wenumeme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kayena mu diulu bua nuenu nuambe ne, Nganyi neahande mu diulu bua kulua ne mikenji kutudi, ne bua kutunyuisha bua tuetu kuyenza
Kubuelabu mu ditunga luseke lua kuinshi
Bana bandi ba balume bakadi ne bimuna biandi mu tshisuku Yakoba wakahuwa biandi to ne hakaluabo Hamo, tatu wa Shekeme, wakaya kudi Yakoba, wakayikila n andi
Kuvudi mukashi ne muan andi mukashi bilulu, kuvudi muana mukashi wa muan andi mulume, anyi muana mukashi wa muan andi mukashi bilulu, badi bana benu, bualu ebu budi bubi
mianda ya matunga meenyi idi munda mwayi mwikala malanda pamwe ne diumvwangana ne ndondu ne matunga makwabo;
Bena Isalele bakaya, bakenza nunku, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose ne Alona, mbu muakenzabo
Makookeshi ne makanyika a beena mwabo, mu tshikondo tshia mvita anyi padibo babwelela ditunga anyi badibunda kudi bantu ba pambelo badi baenzela dîyi
Bantu aba Mose ne Alona tuakambila Palo, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, ne, Lekela Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu Ka Mose ne Alona aba
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama mai
Kanuenzedianganyi bibi, nuenu nenutshine Nzambi webe bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Tshikondu atshi Maweja Nangila kupesha bena Levi midimu mishilangane eyi: kuambula mushete wa ndondu wa Maweja Nangila, kuenzela Maweja Nangila mudimu, kuela bantu lupemba mu dina dia Maweja Nangila
Mose Udi Unyema Ejipitu Mu matuku au, hakakola Mose, yeye wakaya kudi bana babo, wakamona mudimu wabo mukole, wakamona Muena Ejipitu ukuma Muena Ebelu, muan abo
Nebambule nzubu awu ne bintu biende bionsu
Bobo bakitabusha
Wewe umanyishe mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne: Maweja Nangila udi wamba ne: Izrayele udi muananyi wa balume muanabute
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ndi musue kukutumina biakudia bia mu diulu
Yakoba wakanyema mu musokoko, Labana, Muena Alama, kakadi mumanye bualu, yeye kakamuambila ne, Nyaya
Kadi panuikala kanuyi nukumbaja mikenji eyi, kanuyi nuitaba bindi nnuambila, nutendelela mvidie inudi kanuyi banji kumanya, nenuikale bena diakabi

Kadi kanuena mua kudia nyama idi amu idiululula, nansha idi amu ne bikonu bipanduluka, bu mudi: kamelu kadi kadia kadiululula, kadi kakena ne bikonu bipanduluke to; kanyama ka damane, kadi kadia kadiulula, kakayi ne bikonu bipanduluke; kalulu ka mpata, kadi kadiululula, kadi kakena ne bikonu; ngulube, bualu udi ne mikonu mipanduluke, kadi kena upingaja bintu mukana, ubidiululula
Nunku Yosefe wakafua, wakadi ne bidimu lukama ne dikumi bakalongolola tshitalu tshiandi, bakatshiteka mu mushete mu Ejipitu
Kadi biamueneka munyinyi wa mubidi mubishe, yeye kena muakane
Matuku onso a Enosha akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne bitanu, yeye wakafua biandi
Noa wakadi muntu muimpe, wakadi muakane tshishiki mu tshikondo tshiandi, Noa wakendakana ne Nzambi
Nzambi wakadi ne nsongalume, yeye wakadiunda, yeye wakashikama mu tshihela wakalua tshilembi tshidi ne ndudi
Padibu ne tshilumbu, badi bafika kundi
Lakele ne Lea bakamukonka ne, Tuetu tudi ne tshituha tshietu anyi buhianyi buetu mu nsubu wa tatu etu, anyi
Muntu yonso utu wenza malu au udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa; bualu bua malu au mabi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Wihata bantu ku mesu kuenu
Pashishe nubutule tshimenga atshi tshijima, kabidi ne bionsu bidimu

Hashishe tshiji tshikole netshinkuate dituku adi, ne meme nembalekele, nengumushe mesu anyi kudibo ne bobo nebajimishibue; ne matata ne makenga a bungi nealue kudibo; bobo nebambilangane dituku adi ne, Malu â mabi onso kaena alua kutudi bualu bua Nzambi wetu kena munkatshi muetu, anyi
Abrahame kuambila Mvidi Mukulu ne: Ismayele wanyi ewu udi anu mukumbane
Usangishe bena Izrayele bonsu, wimanyike bena Levi kumpala kuanyi, pabuipi ne ntenta wa kusambakena
Mose wakenza nunku bu muakamuambila Yehowa, mbu muakenzeye

Muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mbushi wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi miena mashi akaluabo n au bua ku buikila bubi mu muaba wa tshijila nebaye n ai ku butshika bua tshibi dilu, neboshe biseba biai ne munyinyi wai ne tuma tuai mu kahia
Biabaka mulume mukashi ne mamu andi, bualu ebu budi bubi, nebaboshe mu kahia, busatu buabo, bualu bubi kabuikadi munkatshi muenu
Kadi nuenu mene, mibidi yenu nenuhone hanshi mifue mu tshihela etshi
Enza biebe tshioshelu tshia mabaya a acacia, buludi bua tshi nebuikale coudées itanu, butshiama buatshi coudées itanu ne bule buatshi bua mulu coudées isatu
Nuenu benze nanku, nebanubutule musangu umue ne mpingu ayi
Bonsu babidi kuya natshi tshianyima, kubuikila tatuabu uvua butaka

Nomba Mikenji ya Maboko ne Bakashi Bahianyi Bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ba diku dia Bena Gilada, muana mulume wa Makî, muana mulume wa Manashe, wa meku a bana balume ba Yosefe, bakalua kudi Mose ne kudi bakelenge ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ba mu Isalele, bakamba ne, Yehowa wakela dî kudi mukelenge wetu bua kutahulula buloba bua buhianyi ku nshobo, Yehowa wakela dî kudi mukelenge wetu kabidi bua kuha buhianyi bua Selofehada muan etu mulume kudi bana bandi bakashi
Biwangata tshilulu tshia mukuenu bu tshieya, wewe neutshihingashe kudiye diambedi diba kadiyi dianzekubuela, bualu bua tshiotshi tshidi anu tshiandi tshia kudibuikila n atshi, yeye nealale tulu munyi
Mose wakinama mutu wandi lubilu, wakatendelela
Utume bakulu aba bua batentekele ditunga dia bena Kenaane, dindi mpesha bena Izrayele
Hakadiye kayi mua kumusokoka kabidi, wakamuangatshila tshisaka tshia ntuhu, wakatshilaba bitume ne kamonyi, wakatekamu muana, wakatshiteka mu malenge akadi kukala kua musulu
Monai, Yehowa wakunuha dituku dijidila, nunku yeye wakunuha bidia bia matuku abidi ku dituku disambombo, muntu ne muntu ashale mu muaba wandi, kaluhuki mu muaba wandi dituku dia muanda mutekete
Besalele, muana mulume wa Uli, muana mulume wa Hû wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda wakenza bintu bionso bakambila Yehowa Mose
Wewe musangane bantu bakane anu makumi abidi, newenze tshinyi
Nenukune mitshi ya tumuma tukese, nenuyilame bimpe, kadi kanuena nunua nvinyo, kanuena nuhuola tumuma; bualu bua bishi nebitudie
Wakangata mukanda wa dihungila, wakaubala ku mpala kua bantu, bobo bakamba ne, Mei onso akuamba Yehowa netuênze, netuatumikile
Anyongobole nyunyi awu nshingu, kayi umukosa mutu
Bungi bua matuku anuakutentekela buloba, matuku makumi anai mene, nebuikale bungi bua bidimu binudi nutuala bujitu bua bubi buenu, nenumanye ne mbualu bukole hangumuka kunudi
Yehowa neanumuangalashe munkatshi mua bantu bakuabo, nenuikale bantu bakehe munkatshi mua bisamba mudi Yehowa unutuma
Wakaluatshisha Alona kazaku, wakamuela mukaba, wakamuluatshisha tshikowelu ne efoda, wakamuela mukaba wa efoda, wakamusuika ham bidi handi
Kabena banupesha bisosa to
posete ne dimanyishangana dia mianda dia kule mudi mwikale telefone ne telekalema, dimwangalaja dia ngumu ku tshisanji ku televizio ne ku satelita;
Pashishe, nyunyi ya mikanku kupueka bua kuzokola minyinyi ya nyama ayi, kadi Abrame kuyipata
Pashishe wangate bakulu ba bena Izrayele, uye nabu kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, umuambile ne: Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Ebrewu, Mvidi Mukulu wetu mmutumuenekele

Yakoba wakaditshiha ne Bikala Nzambi n anyi, biandameye bimpe mu nshila mundi nya ne biampeye bintu bia kudia ne bia kuluata, bua meme kuhingana kabidi ku nsubu wa tatu wanyi talala, hashishe Yehowa neikale Nzambi wanyi, ne dibue edi dinakuimanyika nebikale bu nsubu wa Nzambi ne bintu bionso biwampa nempingashe tshia dikumi kudi bulelela
Kadi muanenu kena ne bua kunupingajilawu to
Divuba kumuka ku musonga wa ntenta

Muakuidi neamutangile, ne bikala tshiuja etshi tshitoke tô ku mutu kua muena dibala, anyi ha mpala hadi dibala, bu nsudi udi umueneka mu dikoba diandi, yeye udi muena nsudi, kena muakane, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane, udi ne disama dia nsudi ku mutu kuandi
Yosefe wakalota tshilota, wakatshiawila bana babo, bobo bakatamba kuikala n andi lukuna
Mbatupite bukole
Muanabute kusomba nende
Nuakatontolola mu ntenta yenu, nuakamba ne, Bualu bua Yehowa wakadi n etu tshiji, yeye wakatuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bua kutufila mu bianza bia Bena Amole, bua bobo batushihe
Moshe udiela panshi, dikombu kuandamuka nyoka
Yeye wakambila Balaka ne, Wimane ha buihi ne mulambu webe wa kuosha ha kahia, nenye kusangakena ne Yehowa kuaka
Pikala mupika mulume anyi mukaji mununange nuenu ne bena diku dienu, ubenga mua kumuka, bualu udi musombe bimpe, munuimanyike ku tshiibi tshia nzubu
Unvuai Isalele, Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, udi biandi Yehowa umue; sua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ne mutshima webe wonso, ne muoyo webe wonso, ne bukole buebe buonso
Nembatete ne badi benda mu di dianyi, anyi
Bikalamu bantu bakane makumi atanu kakuiyi bantu batanu, neushihe musoko wonso bualu bua bantu batanu kabayiku, anyi

Bikaleye muntu muhele udi kayi mua kusangisha bintu ebi bionso, neangate muana mulume wa mukoko umue bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji bua kunyukula kudi Yehowa bua kumubuikidila n au bubi buandi, ne tshituha tshimue tshia dikumi tshia épha tshia bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi ne dikoho dia manyi ne nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi anyi mputu nyunyu ibidi, bu bintu bidiye mua kuangata, nyunyu umue neikale bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Dutelonone Kanushihedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ngombe anyi mukoko bidi kabiyi biakane, anyi tshintu tshikuabo tshidi tshibi; bualu ebu budi bundu ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Udi ne tshia kuneemeka mêyi ne mikandu ne kabidi tuludiki twa Ditunga
Nenganyishe mupuya muimpe wayi
Mose wakalomba Yehowa bua buila biakatumeye kudi Palô
Mutuangaji neamukenkete
Yehowa wakaha bantu dikasa dimpe kudi Bena Ejipitu Muntu eu Mose wakadi muntu munene be mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ku mesu kua bena mudimu ba Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi

Bwa kubweeja bipeta bîmpe, dimanya dipiluke ne mitalu mu ditangila dia bilumbu, badi batapulula bilumbulwidi mu nkongu isatu ya tubadi: tubadi twa lukongu lwa bandumbulula tudibo batangila kudi Kabadi ka kashipi ka mapangadika; tubadi twa lukongu lwa baludiki ba mbulamatadi tulombola kudi Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi, ne Kabadi kimikila Dîyi dikulu
Bakamukudimuna ne, Tudi bamumanye
Bikala mulambu wandi wa kuosha wa muana wa ngombe, neafile mulume udi kayi ne tshilema, neamushihele ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, ne Yehowa neamuitabushe

Lufu lua Batentekedi Babi Dikumi Balume aba bakatuma Mose bua kutentekelabo buloba, bakadi bahingana, bakadi batontoluesha bantu bonso kudiye, bualu bua bobo bakalua ne lumu lubi lua buloba, balume aba mene bakalua ne lumu tubi lua buloba bakafua ne disama dikole ku mpala kua Yehowa
Nunku bintu bionsu ebi nebishale bia mutuangaji uvua mumiamine mashi ku tshilambuilu
Bakuidi bonso badi balue hehi ne Yehowa badijidile, bua Yehowa kabashihi
Yetelo wakamba ne, Yehowa avudishibue disanka, wakanusungila mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu ne mu bianza bia Palô, wakahatula bantu mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu

Kadi bintu bionso bia mu mai budi kabiyi ne mialala ne mabamba, bidi mu mai manene anyi mu misulu, bidi bibi kunudi, nebikale bibi kunudi, kanudi munyinyi wa bintu ebi, ne mibidi mifue yabi neyikale bu bintu bibi kunudi
Abimeleke kupingajila Abrahame mukajende
Yeye wakadila kudi Yehowa, ne Yehowa wakamulesha mu tshi, wakawela mu mai, mai akalua mimpe
Wewe neushikike Bena Lewi ku mpala kua Alona ne kua bana bandi balume, ubanyukule ku mpala kua Yehowa
Bena Izrayele kulama biakudia abi too ne dinda, bu muvua Moshe mubambile
Genese Yakoba Udi Uya mu Ejipitu ne Bantu Bandi Bonso Isalele wakabisha luendu luandi wakangata bintu bionso biakadiye n abi, wakalua ku Be sheba wakashihela Nzambi wa tatu andi Isaka nyama
Bobo kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo; Yehowa udi buhianyi buabo, bu muakabambileye
Nzambi wakenzela baleleshi bimpe, bantu bakakumbana ba bungi, bakalua bakole be, Bualu bua baleleshi bakatshina Nzambi, yeye wakabaha bana
Nuakuenza bibi mu bualu ebu

Hashishe hanuakunvua dî diakadi munkatshi mua midima, hakadi mukuna mutema kahia, nuenu nuakalua kundi, ne ba ku mutu kua bisamba bienu ne bakulu benu; nuakamba ne, Tangila, Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafuisha butumbi buandi ne bunene buandi, tuakulua dî diandi munkatshi mua kahia: tuakatangila lelu ne Nzambi udi usomba ne muntu, ne yeye udi wikala ne muoyo
Bana basatu ba Nowa Bana ba balume ba Nowa bapatukila mu buatu bavua: Sheme, Kame ne Yefete
Palo wakelela bantu bandi bonso mukenji ne, Bialelabo muana mulume, nenumuele mu musulu, kadi nensungile bana bakashi
Tshiluilu tshivua ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Yuda kupita kumpala, bena mvita bambule dibendela diabu
Bulongolodi bwa mu kabujima
Nebambe ne: Maweja Nangila anuele lupemba, anulame
Bantu bavua amu bimane kumpala kuende too ne ku dilolu
Kadi yeye wakabambila ne, Nansha, nuakuluila anu bua kutangila ne buloba budi hatuhu
Ndelanganyi ya Kekate Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Nubadike bena Levi ba bena Kekate ku meku ne ku bisamba biabu
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Muntu awu tshiende ndufu
Yehowa wakabidika mukana mua mpunda, wakambila Belâma ne, Nakuenza tshinyi bua wewe wakunkuma misangu isatu
Ke mikenji iwaye munumanyishe munkatshi mua kapia, panuvua kuinshi kua mukuna
Ebi mbidimu bia muoyo wa Yishemaele, biakadi lukama ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete, yeye waka huola muoyo wandi, wakafua, wakadisangisha ne bankambua bandi
Kanungu ka Budikadidi bwa muntu ne muntu budi bujadikibwa
Mai akahingana, akabanda ha mutu ha makalu ne ha mutu ha masalayi akadi enda ha tubalu, ha mutu ha bisumbu bionso bia Palô, biakabalonda mu bunene bua mai, nansha umue wabo wakahandika

Mutengula wa Alona Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Hanuambila Palo ne, Nundeshe bualu bua kukema, hashishe, wewe wambile Alona ne, Angata mulangala webe, uwele hanshi ku mesu kua Palô ne mulangala neukudimuke nyoka

Kanungu ka Too ne pikalabo bateeka Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu, Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi ne Kabadi kashipi ka mêyi, Kabadi ka ku mutu ka bandumbulula, tudi twenze midimu idibu batulongolwela kudi Dîyi dikulu edi
Kuenzekabi nanku
Bena Kohata bakaya ku mpala batuale bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshijila, ne bakuabo bakashimika nsubu wa tshitendelelu diambedi bobo kabayi banze kulua
Moshe kuitaba diyi dia Maweja Nangila
Bena Refayime bavua bantu ba bukole
Itaba bionsu bidi Sara mukuambile
Kunupitshishaye mu tshipela tshinene tshidi tshikuata bowa, tshiena ne nyoka ya lulengu, ne tuminyiminyi, kamuyi mayi
Bidi ne bukookeshi bwabo nkayabu pa bubanji, pa bantu, pa lupetu ne pa dimanya dipiluke

Eleyasafa, muana mulume wa Deuele, mukelenge wa bana ba Gada, wakafua bintu dituku disambombo Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Eleyasafa, muana mulume wa Deuele
Neakobolole muntu awu bua kumusha mikiya, bualu uvua musemene pabuipi ne tshitalu
Nanku, bu mumvua munupe bisekiseki bua nuenu kudia, ke mundi munupe kabidi nyama yonsu ikale biakudia bienu

Mikenji ya Milambu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Elela Alona ne bana bandi balume mukenji ne, Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, mulambu wa kuosha newikale ha nkunyi ha tshioshelu butuku buonso tô ne dinda, kahia nekikalehu butuku buonso, kakajimi nansha
Nuenu bakumbaje mikenji eyi bimpe, bantu ba bisamba bikuabu pamanyabu mikenji eyi, nebajadike ne: nuenu nudi bantu ba lungenyi ne meji
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakambila Belâma ne, Ya biebe ne balume aba kadi wewe wambe anu dî dinaknambila
Nakadi kusua bua bantu ba Yehowa bonso bikale baprofete, ne Yehowa ateke Nyuma wandi kudibo
Bena Isalele bakenza nunku, bakabihata mu tshitudilu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose, Bena Isalele bakenza nunku
Malu atshidi masokoka adi malu a Yehowa, Nzambi wetu: kadi malu adi masokolola adi malu etu ne a bana betu tshiendelele, bua tuetu tuenze mei onso a mikenji ei
Abalahama wakamba ne, Nenditshihe nunku
Dibadika Ke Maweja Nangila kuambila Arone ne: Ntelejayi wewe, ndelanganyi yebe ne bana benu bena Levi: bilema bidi bantu benza muaba wa tshijila, nebinutangile nuenu bonsu biangatshile ku lelu
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubenga diyi dia Moshe ne Arone, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mumupeshe muoyi wa tshitunu nuwuaye mudianjile kuambila Moshe
Panuikala numuitaba, nukumbaja meyi ne mikenji bindi nnuambila lelu ebi, nuenza bidi bimulengelela, nenupete diakalenga kudiye, nupangane
Bualu bena Levi bakuabu bavua ne bua kuasa nzubu wa tshijila, bena Kehate kabayi banji kufika
Bûngi bwa baminisitila ba polovensa kabweena ne tshia kupita pa dikumi to

Biahuwa mulume wandi ku dituku diakunvueye kuditshiha kuandi anyi mei makuabo akaluhuka mukana muandi, nunku yeye udi ujadika kuditshiha kuandi kuonso ne mei andi onso, bualu bua yeye wakuhuwa ku dituku diakakunvueye
Mvidi Mukulu kuambila Abrahame ne: Kubikidi kabidi mukajebe ne Sarayi to
Anyi bikaleye mumukume ne mutshi mu tshianza, ne biafileye, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu, nebashihe mushihi wa muntu
Muntu nansha umwe, tshianana udi upeta dinyooka dia dipangila dia ditunga, kêna mwa kubiumbusha mu njila wabi bwa kumwenzelabio yêye nkayenda mudimu to
Hakamona mukashi ne, Mutshi au udi muimpe wa kudia ne udi muimpe ku mesu ne udi mua kuha muntu lungenyi, yeye wakangata dimuma, wakadia, wakahesha mulume wandi kabidi, ne yeye wakadia
Yeye wakateka munyinyi muimpe ne bidia biakalambeye mu bianza bia Yakoba muan andi
Kanulu ku mesu kuanyi ne bianza bituhu
Kadi muanjelo wakamuambila ne, Bulelela, wewe wakaseka
Bantu badibu babadike bua benze mudimu mu bisumbu bia tshiluilu, nebabalombole kudi mfumu wa tshisamba tshiabu: Mfumu wa bena Rubene: ke Elishure, muana wa Shedeyure, ne bantu bende
Neyibuele mu nzubu muebe, nansha mu nzubu webe wa bulalu too ne pa bulalu buebe
Kadi bobu nebajikije tulumbu tukese
Muntu wakuosha bintu ebi neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne ku nyima neuhingane mu tshitudilu
Abahalama wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakangata kele bua kushiheye n aku muan andi
Moshe kupatula makombu onsu avua mu ntenta wa kusambakena

Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua kumanyisha bena Izrayele ne: Bituadije ku lelu, too ne ku ndelanganyi yenu yonsu, pikala bena Izrayele ne mikiya bua tshitalu tshivuabu balenge, nansha bikale ku luendu dituku didibu bangenzela tshibilu tshia Dipita dianyi meme Maweja Nangila, nebenze amu tshibilu atshi, kadi mu matuku dikumi ne anayi a ngondu muibidi dilolu

Dituku dikuabu Abrahame kuambila muena mudimu mukulumpe wa ku bena mudimu bende ne: Kuata muinshi mua tshibelu tshianyi, uditshipe mu dina dia Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa diulu ne buloba, bualu kuena mua kukebela muananyi Izake mukaji wa mu ditunga dia Kenaane mundi muase emu to
