Bishimikidi bidi bitwa mungalata mpanda bidi bimungutuka kakuyi dikonka dia muntu bwaalu to bitwadija ku dishikila dia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga
Kumuelaye mulawu wamba ne: Kenaane ikale muena diakabi
Âpakashada wakalela Shela ne Shela wakalela Ebe

Ku tshidimu tshionsu, bantu balume bonsu badi munkatshi muenu, nebadileje kudi Maweja Nangila misangu isatu, muaba wikalaye musungule, bua tshibilu tshia mampa adi kaayi mela buanga, bua tshibilu tshia Dinowa biakudia, ne bua tshibilu tshia tuzubu tua Bisasa
Bualu Maweja Nangila mmunupatule mu Ejipitu anu mu ngondu awu butuku
Yehowa wakambila Mose mu Midiyana ne, Ya biebe, uhingane mu Ejipitu bualu bua bantu bonso bakasua kukushiha bakafua
Bidi mua kunukebela diakabi

Bobo bakalua ha buihi n andi, bakamba ne, Netuashile mpangu ya bimuna bietu kunoko, ne misoko ya bana betu bakese, kadi tuetu nkayetu netuye ne bintu bia nvita ku mpala kua Bena Isalele to ne hatualua n abo ku miaba yabo, ne bana betu bakese nebashikame mu misoko idi ne ngumbu bualu bua bena buloba

Bualu ebu nebuikale mukenji kunudi tshiendelele mu dituku dia dikumi mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete nenujinge mu mitshima yenu, kanuenji mudimu, nansha bantu baledibue mu nsubu yenu nansha benyi badi munkatshi muenu, bualu bua edi ndituku didibo banubuikidila bubi buenu bua kunulengesha nunku nenuikale balengeshibue ku mibi yenu yonso ku mpala kua Yehowa
Yeye wakamba ne, Ubuele, wewe udi musankishibue kudi Yehowa, udi muimane ha bule bualu kai
Rebeka uvua nsongakaji muimpe, wengelela
Kena musue kulekela bena Izrayele bumuke ku bupika to
Kanungu ka Badi basungula tshipwita wa ditunga bwa tshipungu tshia mvula itaanu
Mîyama wakabambila ne, Nuimbile Yehowa musambu, bualu bua yeye wakatamba bukole ne butumbi buandi, wakela kabalu ne muntu wakadi wenda ha nyima haku mu bunene bua mai manene
Nutumikile mikenji yanyi, nuyenze meme ndi Yehowa udi unulengesha
Mvidi Mukulu asankishe Yefete, ndelanganyi ya Yefete isombe mu nzubu ya ntenta ya bena Sheme; Kenaane ikale mupika wa Yefete
Maweja Nangila mmusue kutubueja mu ditunga dia Kenaane bua kutubutula mu mvita anyi
Bulelela, kakuena muena muhongo munkatshi mua bana ba Yakoba, kakuena batempi ba mbuku munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, katataka nebambile bana ba Yakoba ne Bena Isalele ne, Yehowa wakuenza tshinyi

Lufu ne Kujikibua bia Yakoba Bonso aba badi bisamba bia Bena Isalele dikumi ne bibidi, a mmei akabambila tatu wabo, hakabavudishileye disanka, muntu ne muntu wakadi ne disanka diakamuvudishileye n adi
Yoshuwa kuya kuluangana ne bena Amaleke, bu muvua Moshe mumuambile
Bena Isalele bonso bakadi ha buihi habo bakanyema hakunvuabo muadi wabo, bobo bakamba ne, Buloba kabutuminyi
Kubikumbajaye

Abalahama wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakangata bidia ne mulondo wa mai, wakabika kudi Haga, wakabiteka ha diaha diandi, wakamuha muana, wakabatuma ha bule, wakaya biandi, wakendakana mu tshihela tshia Bê sheba
Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mukelenge wanyi Abalahama, ndi nkulomba ne, Ungendeshe dikasa dimpe lelu, ufuile mukelenge wanyi Abalahama luse

Yeye neujidile Yehowa matuku a tshijila tshiandi, nealue biandi ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bihanga diandi, kadi matuku a diambedi adi hatuhu bualu bua tshijila tshiandi tshiakadi tshionyibue
Kadi bu muvua bantu bonsu bapungila ne nyota, bavua anu banungana, bamba ne: Udi mutupatule mu Ejipitu bua tuetu kufua nyota ne bana betu ne bimuna bietu bua tshinyi

Ekesode Yehowa Udi Ulaya Lufu lua Ban a Bute Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nentume mulau umue mukuabo kudi Palo ne ha buloba bua Ejipitu; ne ku nyima yeye neanulekele, hanulekeleye, yeye neanuihate tshiendelele
Kanubingishi muena tshibawu

Yeye wakamba ne, Tangilai, ba kelenge banyi ndi nnusengelela ne Luai kunu, nubuele mu nsubu wa muntu wenu, nulalemu butuku ebu, nuvuwe makasa enu, hashishe, ne nubike dinda dionso, nenuye mu nshila wenu Bobo bakamba ne, Nansha, netuikale mu misesu butuku ebu buonso

Nomba Midima Yakahabo Bena Lewi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Balai bungi bua bana balume ba Kohata ba munkatshi mua bana balume ba Lewi ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, mu bidimu makumi asatu to ne ku bidimu makumi atanu buonso buabo badi bakuata mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Buloba Nebuabanyibue ku Nshobo Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Newabanyine bantu aba buloba bua buhianyi buabo bu bungi bua mena abo
Muakuidi neabuoshe bu tshivulukidi, tshituha tshia miehu nu tua ne tshia manyi ne musenga wonso wa manananshi tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Kumonaye tshiina tshia mayi muaba awu
Maweja Nangila neavudije ndelanganyi yebe bungi budi muntu kayi mua kubala
Yosefe wakamona bana babo, wakabamanya, kadi yeye wakadivuisha bu muntu mukuabo kudibo, wakabambila mei makole, wakabakonka ne, Nuakufuma kudi kunyi
Ndi nkutendekena ne, Witabushe matabisha anakulua n au kudi, bualu bua Nzambi wakungenzela bimpe ne meme ndi ne bintu bikumbane kabidi

Hakatangila Yosefe Benyamina n abo, wakambila mulami wa nsubu wandi ne, Ulue ne balume aba mu nsubu, ubashihele nyama, ulongolole bintu bia kudia, bualu bua bantu aba nebadie n anyi bidia diba hankatshi
Katshia numuka mu Ejipitu too ne munudi bafike muaba ewu, nutshidi amu numutombokela
Wewe newangate tshimpanga tshikuabo, Alona ne bana bandi balume nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha tshimpanga

Mose wakambila Alona ne, Semena ha buihi ne tshioshelu, ufile mulambu webe wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mulambu webe wa kuosha ha kahia, udibuikidile bubi buebe ne bubi bua bantu, ufile mulambu wa bantu kabidi bua kubabuikidila n au bubi buabo bu muakamba Yehowa
Eu udi mukenji wa hafuila mundi mu ntenta mundi yonso udi ubuela mu ntenta au, ne mundi yonso wakadi mu ntenta au neikale bu mundi udi kayi muakane tô matuku muanda mutekete
Kadi meme malaba nengimane pa katongobela ka mukuna, mukuate dikombu dia Mvidi Mukulu mu bianza
Bakulu bamane kupeta Mueyelu wa Mvidi Mukulu, kutuadijabu kuakula bu bambi
Padiye ulambula ngombe bu mulambu wa kuosha, ngombe awu ikale anu mulume, kayi bulema
Dina dia mukuabo ne, Eliezê, bualu bua Mose wakamba ne, Nzambi wa tatu anyi wakadi mukuatshishi wanyi, wakansungila ku muele wa nvita wa Palô
Biuvuwabo tshilulu nansha milongo ya buludi nansha milongo ya butshiama anyi tshintu tshia tshiseba, ne biajimina disama, nebatshiuvuwe musangu muibidi ne tshintu etshi netshikale tshiakane
Kadi, Abrahame kuela Abimeleke lusanzu bua tshiina tshia mayi tshivua bena mudimu bende bakandamana natshi

Kanungu ka Kabeena mwa kuteekela mweena Kongu nansha umwe kansungansunga pa bidi bitangila mianda ya tulasa ne dienza dia midimu ya mbulamatadi anyi mianda mikwabo, kansungansunga kamwenekela mu mêyi ne mikandu anyi mu dipangadika dia Bukalenga bunene, pa kutangila tshisumbu tshia ditabwija tshia muntu, dîku didiye mufumina, mulongo weende mu musoko, mwaba udiye usombela, ngelelu wende wa meji ne bidiye pende mumona bîmpe mu mianda ya tshidiidi, dikala dieende dia mweena dikoba kampanda, dia tshisamba kampanda, mweena lukongu, mweena tshisamba kampanda, bûngi bwa bantu bukesa mu bunkambwa anyi mu mwakulu umwe

Bidi bilwa mêyi badi babimanyisha, kumpala kwa dishintakaja ngenyi ne dibianyisha, Bukalenge bunene budi butumina, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi aloonda dibituma, wabu ngelelu wa meeji ku Bilo bia Tshibambalu etshi anyi tshiatshia
Ditempu dionsu divua mulambu bua bamfumu babidi, ngombe yonsu uvua mulambu bua mfumu umue
Mêyi ne mikandu adi aleeja mishindu ya kusanka ne budiikadidi ebu
Nanku ku bidimu bisatu bisatu, numushe tshia dikumi tshia bia mu madimi enu bia tshidimu atshi, nutshiteke mu bimenga bienu

Binunvua mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, inakunuambila lelu, nenuhete disanka; binuahidia kunvua mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, binuasesuka mu nshila unakunulesha lelu bua kulonda nzambi mikuabo, Nudi kanuyi bamanye, nenuhete mulau

bulongolodi budi butangila: a b c mêyi maludiki a bungenda mushinga, mwikalamu dikuba, diaasa ne dianyisha dia kumpanyi; mêyi ne mikandu, bulongolodi bwa nzubu ya mashika; mêyi maludiki a bulongolodi ne bukookeshi bwa beena nsambu ne mêyi maludiki a mianda ya beena nsambu; d e f g h i j k l m n o bulongolodi budi butangila midimu ya badi baditambakeena; bulongolodi bwa mianda ya midimu butangila bu mudi mêyi adi aludika nsombelu wa bamfumu ne beena mudimu ,bukubi bwa beena mudimu,tuludiki tudi tutangila dikuba dia bantu mu musoko ne nangananga, tuludiki tudi tutangila dikubisha dia bantu ne dipangila dia mudimu, kadiyi dielela menji; bulongolodi bwa mianda ya bubanji butangila mêyi adi atangila majimba, bia mwinshi mwa buloba ne mafuta a bia mwinshi mwa buloba, matanda, bifidi bia midilu ne dilama dia makookeshi a kwa Nzambi; bulongodi budi butangila bufuki mu lungenyi ne midimu ya bianza; bulongolodi budi butangila manga ne midimu ya londapu, didimwija ku masaama, bu mudi mankenda a mubidi, mankenda a miaba ya tshinsangansanga ne dikuba dia bamamu ne bâna, bulongolodi butangila mudimu wa balambi ba manga, disumbisha dia manga, dibweela dia mu ditunga dia benda ne dipitshilamu, tuludiki twa mianda ya bukole ne makanda a mubidi tutangila matunga abidi ne tutangila bukwa matunga, bulongolodi budi butangila mankenda ku mudimu, ditwangaja dipiluke dia biâpu bia manga ne diabanya dia bangangabuka; dîyi didi ditangila mianda ya masungulangana; bulongolodi butangila dilamba, diludika, dibiikidisha, dipatula ne disumbisha dia maluvu makola mengula; bulongolodi butangila dilamba, dibiikidisha ne dipatula ne disumbisha dia maluvu makolesha ne adi kaayi makolesha; bulongolodi butangila difula, dibiikidisha ne dipatula ne dipitshisha dia biamwa bia mvita; bulongolodi butangila dimitshisha dia mukaji ku biamwa , diludika dia mamanya a pa bivuba ne a pa ditentemuna dia bitupa bia mubidi ne bia misunya ya mubidi; bulongolodi butangila beena tshimwangi,badibo bipata ne badi banyeema; bulongolodi butangila diangatshibwa ku midimu ya manga ne ku midimu mikwabo ne ditambakana

Mukelenge wanyi wakuntshihisha ne, Kuangatshidi muan anyi mulume mukashi wa bana bakashi ba Bena Kanâna badi mu buloba bundi mushikame, kadi uye biebe ku nsubu wa tatu anyi ne kudi bana betu, wangatshileku muan anyi mulume mukashi bakambila mukelenge wanyi ne, Ahu, biahidia mukashi kundonda
Biakabuela ne Noa mu buatu, bintu bibidi bintu bibidi bia bintu bionso bidi ne muhuya wa muoyo
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuipata muntu mu lupangu lua Edene bua aye kudima buloba, bualu buloba ke buvuaye mumufuke nabu
Telejayi
Pashishe munyinyi wa nyama ayi, newikale wenu anu bu munudi nuangata tshiadi ne tshibelu tshia luseke lua balume bia nyama ya milambu ya bobumue
Bisumbu bia tshidiidi bidi biambulwisha bwa bantu kwambabo majinga abo mu disungulangana bwa kukolesha dimanya dia bwikadi bwa mweena Kongu ne bwa kulongesha bantu mianda ya bweena mwabo
Nudi batukebele dikenga ne lulu

mu Kasumbu kakese kadikadile komekela mianda ya masungulangana mu ditunga kadi ne mudimu wa kulongolola ngenzelu wa masungulangana nangananga didifundisha dia basungudianganyi, dilama dia fishi wa masungulangana, midimu ya masungulangana, ya dibadika dia mêyi ne ya dikonkoloja beena ditunga

Muakuidi neashikike mukashi ku mpala kua Yehowa, neasulule nsuki ya mukashi, neateke mulambu wa bukula wa tshivulukidi mu bianza biandi, eu udi mulambu wa mukau, muakuidi neangate mai a bululu adi elesha mulau mu tshianza tshiandi
Newikale muendakanyi pa buloba, kuyi ne muaba wa kusomba
Nulame mukenji ewu kashidi
Muntu wikale mukoonga tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia mêyi, ke wajadikabu ne badi bamusungula mu musangu mwibîdi
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi muanda mutekete ne binai ne nkama isambombo
Wakamutuma ku tshibanda tshia Hebelone, ne yeye wakalua ku Shekeme Mulumiana wakamusangana ne, mona, wakadi wendakana mu tshisuku, wakamuebesha ne, Udi ukeba tshinyi
Moshe udi usungula balumbuluishi Moshe kuambila kabidi bena Izrayele ne: Tshikondu etshi, mvua mumane kunumanyisha ne: Meme nkayanyi tshitshiena mua kuambula bujitu bua kunulombola to
Kufilaye bintu bia mushinga mukole kudi Labane, ne kudi mamuende wa Rebeka
Buowa bua Bantu Dut
Nanku nempande pamue ne bena kasoku aka
Mose wakafunda ngendu yabo bu mu dî dia Yehowa ei idi ngendu yabo

Nomba Dilomba dia Bana Bakashi ba Selofehada Bana bakashi ba Selofehada, muana mulume wa Hefê, muana mulume wa Gilada, muana mulume wa Mala, muana mulume wa Manashe, wa meku a Manashe, muana mulume wa Yosefe, au mmena a bana bakashi: Mahala ne Noa ne Hogela ne Mileka ne Tîsa
Wewe neubiluatshishe Alona muan enu ne bana bandi balume badi n andi, wewe neubele manyi ha mutu, ubalengeshe, ubajidile, bua bobo bankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi
Kumanyishaye bena Izrayele, bamane kumuka mu Ejipitu, bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila musue: meyi ne mikandu, kabidi ne mikenji
Numanyishe bana benu mei â, nubambileu hanuashikama mu nsubu yenu ne hanuenda mu nshila ne hanuaya ne hanuabika
Kanuena mua kumupua muoyi to
Numuke bintu bulelela; mitshima yenu kayinyingaladi, hanuamuhabi; bua bualu ebu Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza bienu

Nakuinyika mutu wanyi, nakutendelela Yehowa, nakutumbisha Yehowa, Nzambi wa mukelenge wanyi Abalahama, wakandombola mua kuya mu nshila muakane bua kuangatshila muana mulume wa mukelenge wanyi mukashi kudi muana wa muan abo
Badi bamwambulwisha kudi mufundi wa mikanda wa Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya bakoshi ba nsambu
Nanku kanuakunyanga milambu ya tshijila ya bena Izrayele to
Kadi katangila difwilakana dia makookeshi pankatshi pa Bukalenga bunene ne Bukalenga bwenji bwa mêyi ne mikandu ne kabidi pankatshi pa Mbulamatadi ne polovensa

Mose wakangata bintu mu bianza biabo, wakabisha ha tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kahia, ebi mbintu bia kujidila n abi bakuidi bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa eu udi mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Mukashi wakamukudimuna ne, Umpe kakanu ka ku munu webe ne mionshi misuika ku maboko ebe ne tshibangu tshiebe tshiudi n atshi mu tshianza tshiebe
Hakabutula Nzambi misoko ya mu Mpala, yeye wakavuluka Abalahama, wakumusha Lota munkatshi mua dikenga hakabutuleye misoko kuakadi Lota mushikame
Bisamba ebi bidi bitendelela nzambi yabo munyi
Wakabuesha mitshi mu nkanu ya ku nseke ya mushete bua kutuala n ai mushete

Hanuatangila malenda au, nuvuluke mikenji ya Yehowa, nuyenze, kanulondi mitshima yenu ne mesu enu adi anuenzesha malu a masandi, nuenu nuvuluke mikenji yanyi yonso, nuyenze, nuikale bantu ba tshijila kudi Nzambi wenu
Tera kuangata muanende Abrame, Lote muana wa muanende Arane ne Sarayi mukaji wa Abrame
Dituku dia muanda mukulu: Ngameliyele, muana wa Pedashure, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Menashe

Kadi bikala ngombe muikale ne tshilele tshia kukuma bantu nsengu, ne bakamanyisha mukelenge wandi, ne yeye wakahidia kumukanda, biashiheye nansha mulume nansha mukashi, nebakume ngombe ne mabue, nebashihe mukelenge wandi kabidi
Kanuseleshi bana benu ba bakaji kudi bana babu ba balume
Yeye wakamuitaba ne Ndi nkeba bana betu, ndi nkusengelela ne, undeshe kudibo badisha mikoko
Katataka, bingikala ne luse ku mesu kuebe, undeshe bienzedi biebe, bua meme kukumanya wewe, ne bua kusangana luse ku mesu kuebe, uvuluke ne tshisamba etshi tshidi bantu bebe
Kabidi, newikale utuma mwoyi webe anu kudi bayebe, yeye neikale mfumuebe
Alona wakabaka Elisheba, muana wa bakashi wa Aminadaba, muan abo wa bakashi ne Nashona ne yeye wakamulelela Nadaba ne Abihu, Eleazâ ne Itamâ

Kadi ei nyunyu mudi kanuyi mua kudia: nyunyu wa mukanku, ne nyunyu wa gypaete, ne nyunyu wa orfraie, ne nyunyu wa faucon, ne nyunyu wa milan mufike ne wa milan mukunze, ne mushindu wonso wa tshikololo, ne nyunyu wa nfiondo, ne nyunyu wa chat huant ne nyunyu wa mouette ne wa nkumbi kumbi, ne nyunyu wa tshihungulu ne nyunyu wa chouette, ne nyunyu wa ibis, ne nyunyu wa pêlican, ne nyunyu mutoke utu wadia bintu bibole, ne nyunyu wa cormoran, ne nyunyu wa cigogne, ne nyunyu wa hêron ne nyunyu wa huppe ne nyunyu ya mudima
Tatuabu Yetro kubakonka ne: Lelu munudi bapingane lukasa nanku mmunyi

Kanubengi muenyi anyi bana ba nshiya dilumbulula didi diakane; kanuangatshi bilulu bia mukashi wa mu lufuila bu tshieya: nuvuluke ne nuenu nuakadi bahika mu Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhikula: bua bualu ebu nakunuelela mukenji eu
Tshikondu atshi, bantu bonsu bathivua ne bukole bua kuluangana mvita papatukilabu mu Ejipitu, bakafua bamane kubutuka, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mumane kuditshipa
Tshibangidilu Lufu lua Abrahame
Ekesode Nsubu wa Tshitendelelu Ek
Kueyemenyi buhele bua muntu muhele mu dikosa dia tshilumbu tshiandi
Kuikadi ne lukuna mu mutshima kudi muan enu, kadi ubele muena mutumba n ebe, bua wewe kutuadi bubi bua bualu buandi

Halua dituku dia matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondo wa muanda mutekete hanuashikisha kuhuola bintu, nenudie bidia bia Yehowa matuku muanda mutekete, dituku dia kumudilu nedikale dituku dia kuikisha, ne dituku dia muanda mukulu nedikale dituku dia kuikisha
Tshidi tshintu tshiakunuambila Yehowa ne, Muntu ne muntu adisangishilebi mudiye mua kudia, tshihiminu ku muntu ne muntu, muntu ne muntu adisangishilebi bu bungi bua bantu ba mu ntenta wandi
Kadi pikala bena Izrayele kabayi bakuitaba bua bishima bibidi ebi, utunte mayi a mu musulu wa Nile, witshikije panshi
Kabidi bantu bonsu batuvua nabu mu mvita bangambuluisha abu: Anere, Eshekole ne Mambre, bobu nkayabu nebadiangatshile tshiabu tshitupa tshia bintu
Maweja Nangila neameneshe kabidi bisosa bia nuenu kudisha bimuna bienu
Kadi diakamue butumbi bua Maweja Nangila kumuenekela bena Izrayele kulu kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Biasanganabo muibi mubuele mu nsubu ne biamukumabo ne biafueye, kabena benze mushiku bualu
Matuku onso a Kenana akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne dikumi, yeye wakafua biandi
Ndi nnupesha kabidi biakudia bia tshianyi bia mu madimi, bidi bena Izrayele bandambula: mafuta, maluvu a mvinyo, ne ntete ya kuenza bukula
Akose ngombe awu muminu kumpala kua ntenta
Nukungule bubanji buonsu bua mu tshimenga atshi muaba umue, muaba udi bantu bambilangane malu
Bena Izrayele basabuke ku makasa kuma
Bikaleye kayi ne disanka bualu bua mukashi eu, hashishe yeye neamutume kudiye musue kuya; kadi kamuhanyi ku biuma, kamuenji bu muhika, bualu bua yeye wakamukehesha
Nudie anu mampa adi kâyi ne luevene to matuku muanda mutekete, kanuikadi ne mampa a luevene, kabatangidi luevene mu nseke yenu yonso
Moshe kumanyisha bena Izrayele meyi awu
Bualu biamueneki patoke ne: muntu awu mmupie mikiya
Mukashi wakimita difu, wakalela muana wa balume, hakamumoneye ne muana muimpe, wakamusokoka ngondo isatu
Maweja Nangila udi bukole buanyi
Nuipate bantu aba bonsu, balume ne bakaji, bua kabatampakaji mikiya mu mitanda yenu

Yeye wakamuela lusumuinu luandi ne, Belama, muana mulume wa Beô, muntu wakadi ne disu diandi dibuikila, udi Wamba ne, Udi unvua mei a Nzambi, udi ne lungenyi lua Nzambi wa mu diulu, udi utangila bilota bia Nzambi wa Bukole, hahoneye hanshi ne mesu andi adi matabale
Kanungu ka Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya bakoshi ba nsambu kadi tshitupa tshidi tshiludika bukalenga bukoshi ba nsambu
Pikala bena Ejipitu bakumona, nebatshinke ne udi mukajanyi

Tshimuangi Mikenji mikuabu ya tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Muanabute yonsu wa balume wa bena Izrayele, udi mukaji ulela, nansha wa tshimuna, umujidile, ashale wanyi
Tuetu tudi tshinyi
Angata kabidi nkudimba ibidi nansha tumanda nkutshi tubidi
Bana balume ba Gomê badi nunku Ashakenaza ne Lifata ne Togama
Kanungu ka Mu dilonda dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi, bulongolodi bwa mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi momumwe ne bwa mbulamatadi wa bilwilu,badi babuteeja kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga
mianda ya dikolesha lungenyi ne ya manayi;
Nuenu nenuhikule muan a bute wa nyama wa mpunda ku muana wa mukoko, ne binuahanga kumuhikulai nenutshibule nshingu wandi, nenuhikule ban a bute bonso ba bantu kabidi
Tshimuangi Tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila Pavua Moshe ne Arone mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, Maweja Nangila kubambila ne: Ngondu ewu ikale wenu wa ntuadijilu wa tshidimu
Anyi biaditshiha muntu lubilu ne mishiku yandi bua kuenza bualu bubi anyi bualu buimpe, biaditshiha muntu lubilu nunku ne bikala bualu ebu busokoka ku mesu kuandi, hamanyeye bualu, yeye neahile
Masanka Asatu Majalame Ek

Bana balume ba Gada ku meku abo Sefona ne meku a Bena Sefona, Hagi ne meku a Bena Hagi, Shuni ne meku a Bena Shuni, Ozeni ne meku a Bena Ozeni, Eli ne meku a Bena Eli, ne Aloda ne meku a Bena Aloda, ne Aleli ne meku a Bena Aleli
Ke Maweja Nangila kubafuila luse
Wakatuangana mishiku ne bana babo bonso, wakadidila ku nshingu yabo, hashishe bana babo bakayikila n andi
Bantu kabakadi ne mai a kunua, bakadisangisha kudi Mose ne kudi Alona
Tshibilu etshi netshikale bu tshimanyinu ku diboku nansha pa mpala yenu, bua kunuvuluija dipatuka dienu mu Ejipitu
Nuenu nuvuluke ne nuakadi bahika mu buloba bua Ejipitu; bua bualu ebu nakunuelela mukenji eu
Bakavuluka kuhita kua Yehowa mu ngondo wa kumudilu mu dituku dia dikumi ne anai ku dilolo, mu tshihela tshia Sinai, bu muakadi mei onso akambila Yehowa Mose, Bena Isalele bakenza nunku
Dikumbajija, ndongolwelu ne lwendu lwa bitupa bia teletwale bidikadila ebi ne kabidi malela abi ne Mbulamatadi ne polovensa adi masunguluja kudi dîyi dilongolodi
Bikala Yehowa ne disanka bualu buetu, yeye nealue n etu mu buloba ebu, neatuhebu; buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Hakayabo n abo ha bule umue wabo wakamba ne Nyema lubilu, bua kuhandisha muoyo webe kutangidi ku nyima kuebe, kushadi ha mpata nyema ku mikuna kufu biebe
Lea wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpa difutu dianyi bualu bua meme nakafila muena mudimu wanyi wa bakashi kudi bayanyi, wakamuidika dina ne, Yisakâ
Kuambilaye bena Izrayele malu onsu awu
Ditutu dia Yehowa diakadi ku mutu kuabo mu munya, hakumukabo ku tshitudilu tshiabo
Abrahame kuinyika muana, uvua Sara mumulelele ne: Izake
Mu dipingana diende, muena mudimu wa Abrahame kuya lubilu kumpala kuende, umulomba ne: Bu wewe musue, mpeshaku mayi a kunua
Tuakamona bantu ba nfiondo, bana balume ba Anaka, hakalelabo kudi Nefilima hatuakaditangila, tuakadi bu mpasu, tuakadi nunku ku mesu kuabo kabidi
Bobo nebalame mushete wa Nzambi ne mesa ne minda ne bioshelu ne malonga adibo benza n au mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne tshilulu tshidibo bateka ku mpala kua muaba wa tshijila
Bobo bakamukudimuna ne Yeye wakadi ne bualu bua kuenzela muan etu wa bakashi bu mukashi wa masandi, anyi
Kanumushi bualu nansha bumue
Enza minda muanda mutekete, bualu bua kutemenayi muaba udi ku mpala kua tshitekelu
Tshimuna tshia bena Izrayele katshiakufua nansha tshimue
Nanku ndi nnuvuluija lelu ne: panudi nutendelela mvidie mikuabu, nuyenzela mudimu, kanuyi nuvuluka Maweja Nangila, nenubutuke bonsu
Kutshisokokaye mu malenga avua ku muelelu wa musulu wa Nile
Bena Izrayele mbena diakalenga Mpindiewu nudikonke bua malu onsu avua menzeke kale, kabayi banji kunulela, katshia Mvidi Mukulu wafuka bantu pa buloba
Nanku Moshe umushe mikiya pambidi pa bena Levi bua kubajidila, bikale banyi meme Maweja Nangila
Nanku amu mutuangaji udi ukobolola muntu ke udi wangata munyinyi awu
Mitshi yenu ne bintu bienu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba nebikale bia mikumbi
Yakoba wakabebesha ne Bakuetu, nuakufuma kudi kunyi
Katshia mfika kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bua kumuambila malu mu dina diebe, udi amu ukengesha bena Izrayele bikole
Ei idi mikenji yakela Yehowa kudi Mose bua mulume ne mukashi wandi, ne bua tatu ne muan andi mukashi udi mu nsubu wandi mu bunsongakashi buandi
Tshimuangi Mikenji dikumi Diel

Hanuakenga mu dikenga, halua malu au onso kunudi, nenuhingane kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu matuku adi ku nyima, nenutumikile dî diandi: bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi wa luse; yeye kena unuhanga, kena unujimisha, yeye kena uhua muoyo bualu bua tshihungidi tshia batatu enu tshiakahungeye n abo
Padi muntu udia mafuta a nyama udibu balambula bu mulambu wa kuoshila Maweja Nangila, muntu awu bamuipate munkatshi mua bena Izrayele
dilongolola dia mêyi maludiki a mianda ya tulasa adibo ne tshia kulonda mu teletwale yônso ya ditunga;
Mîyama, muprofete mukashi, muan abo mukashi ne Alona, wakangata tshisanji mu tshianza tshiandi, ne bakashi bonso bakamulonda ne bisanji, benda batuhika
Tshintu tshionso tshia dikumi tshia ngombe anyi tshia mikoko bidibo babala netshikale tshintu tshia tshijila kudi Yehowa
Mpasu ayi ivua mipite bungi mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu, ikila miaba yonsu
Mose wakambila tatu andi muenu ne, Bualu bua bantu badi balue kundi bua kuebesha Nzambi malu
Muanenu Arone neakuenzele mudimu wa buambi
Mukaji munue mayi, bidi ne bua kuenzeka mbiobi ebi: yeye mudinyange bushuwa, mudinge bayende, nanku mayi a bululu neamutue munda, amuwuje difu, ashale nkumba
Bamonyi ba bualu nebolole bianza kudiye diambedi bua kumushiha, ne ku nyima bantu bonso nebolole bianza biabo

Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu udi ukengesha bena Izrayele Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kuambila Shifra ne Puwa, baleleshi ba bena Ebrewu ne: Panudi nulelesha bakaji ba bena Ebrewu, nutangile bimpe mushindu udi muana
Bana benu bena Levi abu nebanuambuluishe bua midimu yonsu ya mu ntenta wa kusambakena

Eu udi mukenji wa Munazi hashikisheye matuku a tshijila tshiandi nebalue n andi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena: neafile mulambu wandi kudi Yehowa, muana mulume wa mukoko udi kayi ne tshilema wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne muana mukashi wa mukoko udi muakane wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kubuikila hau bubi, ne tshimpanga tshidi tshiakane bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala, ne tshisaka tente ne mampa adi kayi ne luevene, ne mikata yakenzabo ne bukula bubotesha ne manyi, ne mikata idi kayiyi ne luevene ne manyi mela ha mutu hai, ne mulambu wa bukula ne mulambu wa bintu bia kunua

Yehowa neanunzuluile masanka adiye n au mu diulu bua kunulokeshila nvula ha buloba mu tshikondo tshia nvula, ne bua kunuvudishila disanka mu malu anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu; nuenu nenusombeshe bisamba bia bungi bintu, kadi nuenu kanuena nusomba bintu kudibo
Seture, muana wa Mikayele, wa mu tshisamba tshia Ashere
Wakabikila nsubu ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu ha nsubu, wakateka tshilulu tshikuabo ha mutu hatshi, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nuikale bantu ba tshijila kundi, bualu bua meme Yehowa ndi wa tshijila, nakanusungula munkatshi mua bantu bua nuenu nuikale bantu banyi
Kusunaye mayi kabulubulu tente, kunuisha muana
Abalahama wakaya lubilu ku tshisumbu tshia ngombe, wakangata lukungulu lua ngombe luakadi lutekete ne luimpe, wakalufila kudi muntu wandi, ne yeye wakaluhandulula lubilu
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu mumane kuipata muntu mu lupangu lua Edene, kutekaye Bakerubine mu lupangu amu ne muela utema kapia
Nuvua bapatuke lelu, mu ngondu ewu wa Abibe
Udi ne mikiya kabidi ke ngulube, bualu udi ne mikonu mipanduluke, kadi kena upingaja bintu mukana, ibidia kabidi
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele mei onso akambila Yehowa Mose
Nu nku Mose wakela di, bakamanyi shangana mu tshitudilu ne, Nansha mulume nansha mukashi kalu ne bintu bikuabo bia tshitendelelu
Mose wakamba ne, Nenumanye ne Yehowa wakatuma bua kuenza malu au onso, tshiakadienzela bualu bua mutshima wanyi
Pashishe bena Izrayele kumuka mu Ramsese bua kuya ku Sukote
Pashishe wambile bena Izrayele, bafile pabu mbuji wa mpumbu kudi Maweja Nangila bu mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Bakangata bintu biakadiunda mu buloba mu bianza biabo, bakalua n abi kutudi, bakatuambila ne, Buloba budi Yehowa mutuhe budi buimpe
Kanutedi dina dianyi meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu tshitelatela, bualu meme nennyoke muntu yonsu udi kayi unemeka dina dianyi
Mudimu wa tshipwita wa ditunga anyi wa tshipwita mukulumpa udi ubengangana ne midimu idibo bafidila mafutu kudi Ditunga dia beenyi anyi kudi bulongolodi bwa bukwa matunga
Nenumulame tô ne ku dituku dia dikumi ne anai dia ngondo eu, bantu bonso ba mu Isalele nebamushihe dilolo

Yosefe Udi Ukolesha Mitshima ya Bano Babo Hakatangila bana babo ne Yosefe ne, Tatu wetu wakafua bakambilangana ne, Hashishe Yosefe neikale n etu lukuna, neatusombuele bua malu mabi onso atua kamuenzela
Mutuangaji neatshioshe, nansha butu bukuate luseke lumue

Padi nkwaasa mushaala mutupu anyi padi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu katundubula ne tshipumbishi tshidi tshia kashidi, disungula dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga mupiamupia didi dienzeka bilondeshila dilomba dia Kasumbu Kadikadile komekela Mianda ya Masungulangana mu ditunga, mu matuku kaayi mashadila ku makumi asambombo anyi kaayi mapita pa matuku makumi tshiteema, panyima pa disokola dia diikala ditupu dia nkwaasa anyi dia ditundubula dia tshipumbisha tshia kashidi
Kadi pikala mulambu awu wa bintu bilamba mu luesu, udi ne bua kuikala bukula busambakaja ne mafuta
Ke mudi bankambua ba meku a tshisamba tshia bena Levi nanku
Nanku neakose muminu wa nyama wa mulambu wa kuosha
Biwasangana mpingu yebe mu bianza bia muntu wanyi afue biandi, usungule bintu biebe bionso ku mpala kua bana betu, uye n abi Bualu bua Yakoba hakadi mumanye ne, Lakele wakayiba
Bualu mbimueneke patoke ne: udi ne mikiya
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke milau ei yonso ham bidi ha bena lukuna ne badi n enu tshiji, bakadi banukengesha
Nutshiase bu bintu binakakulesha ne bu tshidikishilu tshia tshitendelelu ne bu tshidikishilu tshia bintu bia kutekamu
Kanusuiki nkata ku mishiku ya ngombe udi udiata mponda
Diambulwisha ku majitu a mbulamatadi didi dikanyika dia muntu yônso udi usanganyibwa mu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata
Bakambila Mose ne, Bualu bua kakuakadi nkita mu Ejipitu, wewe wakulua n etu bua tuetu kubala mu tshihela, anyi
Tumue atu tuvua tusuma bantu ne nyama
Abidana, muana mulume wa Gideoni, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Benyamina
Ngombe midiunde muanda mutekete idi bu bidimu muanda mutekete, ne miehu miakane muanda mutekete idi bu bidimu muanda mutekete, tshilota tshidi anu tshimue
Pashishe Moshe kubikila bana ba Arone ba balume, kubavuadika mintumpu, kubasuika mikaba, kubasa bifulu ku mitu, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Bualu tshidi tshinuvuluija dituku dimvua mupatule bantu benu mu Ejipitu
Hakalela matuku a bungi, mukelenge wa Ejipitu wakafua Bena Isalele bakafua mikemu bualu bua buhika, bakadila, muadi wabo wakafika kudi Nzambi bualu bua buhika buabo
Wakaya kudi Haga ne yeye wakimita difu, hakatangileye ne, Nakuimita difu, yeye wakalengulula mukelenge wandi mukashi
Nebenze midimu yonsu idi itangila nzubu wa tshijila
Dikenga disatu: tumue Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ambila Arone ne: tuuta dikombu panshi bua lupuishi luandamuke tumue mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu
Muntu yonsu uvua nabi bungi buvuaye nabu dikenga
Pashishe, ujidile bena Levi bua bikale banyi meme Maweja Nangila, pa muaba wa bamuanabute bonsu ba bena Izrayele
Meme ne bantu banyi tudi benze bibi
Amu Kalebe, muana wa Yefune, ne Yoshuwa, muana wa Nune, nebabuelemu
Muakuidi neoshe dianyi ha tshioshelu, kadi tshiadi netshikale tshia Alona ne bana bandi balume
Muudi mua kuamba ne: nembapeshe munyinyi, mbadisha ngondu mujima mbishi
Tshiluilu tshivua ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Dane kulonda muaba wa ndekelu, bena mvita bambula dibendela diabu
Bintu ebi bidi ku mpala kuebe mbia nganyi
Oshe munyinyi onsu pa nkunyi ya kapia idi pa tshilambuilu, bualu mmulambu wa dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Yosefe wakela bantu bandi mukenji bua kulongololabo tshitalu tshia tatu wandi, banganga buka bakalongolola tshitalu tshia Isalele
Wakalua ne mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, waka ufila bu muakadi mukenji
Mose ne bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi bakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Huwai, unvuai, Bena Isalele, lelu nuakulua bu bantu ba Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
bukubi bwa ditunga pambelu;
Kanungu ka Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi mwa kukwata mudimu menemena anu padi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beenabi bikalaku

Lewitiki Bakuidi Bikale ba Tshijila Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile bakuidi, bana balume ba Alona, ne, Nansha umue wabo kadinyangi bua bantu bafue badi munkatshi muabo, anu bua bana babo, nansha mamu andi nansha tatu andi, nansha muan andi mulume, nansha muan andi mukashi, nansha muan abo wa balume, nansha muan andi mukashi utshidi kamama, udi kayi ne mulume, yeye udi mua kudinyanga bua bualu buandi
Kabeena mwa kukosela muntu tshibawu tshinene tshipita etshi tshidibo mwa kukosa dîba didi tshilema tshienzeka

Neangate dilonga tente ne makala a kahia ku tshioshelu tshidi ku mpala kua Yehowa, ne bianza biandi tente ne musenga wa manananshi, nealue n abi ku nyima kua tshilulu tshikudika, neateke musenga wa manananshi ha kahia ku mpala kua Yehowa bua ditutu dia muishi wa musenga wa manananshi dibuikile tshibuikilu tshia mushete wa Nzambi, bua yeye katu nansha

Mucìma muku nanga mwena kwanyì Bayanyì dinanga dya bamoyo wanyì Shabana, kunangindi bibi lelu Bwalu bilengele bicilwàlwa Mukaji wa badiadia badiadia Wa kafwisha bayende mwitu eee Claude Mashala Mu civwa muku nanga mwena kwanyì Bayanyì dinanga dyà bamoyo wanyì Shàbana, kunangindi bibi lelu Bwalu bilengele bicilwalwa Mukaji wa badiadia badiadia Wa kufwisha bayende mwitu eee Kabuta kaka, bakulumpe bakamba ne Kunangindi byà kubwala bwala ishibuta usànke bwalu cyèbè cidimu
Kadi butuku uvua mu tshimunyi tshia kapia bua kutokeshila bena Izrayele njila
Mena onso a mai akimbabo kudi bahika ba Abalahama, tatu wandi, Bena Peleshete bakajibikila, bakelamu buloba
Bualu bu mudi Maweja Nangila mufike munda, kabutu nkamane kutuadija
Mose wakadi ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu, ne Alona wakadi ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu ne bisatu, hakadibo bakula ne Palô
Kadi kalongolola diangata ku mudimu, dibandisha miânzu ne diipata dia balumbulwishi ku mudimu
Mêyi a ditunga adi ateela mêna a mpetu mikwabo ya mu musoku ne mushindu wa kuyabanya
Bikala muenyi munkatshi muenu udi musue kuvuluka kuhita kua Yehowa, yeye nênze bu mudi mikenji ya kuhita kua Yehowa, nenuikale ne mukenji umue kudi muenyi ne kudi muntu mulela munkatshi muenu
Nunku bobo neboweshe bianza biabo ne makasa abo ne mai, bua bobo kabafu, etshi ntshilele tshiabo tshiendelele kudiye ne bana bandi badi banulonda ku nyima ku bikondo biabo bionso
Maweja Nangila mumane kunyanga musulu wa Nile, matuku muanda mutekete kupita nanku
Bantu bakadinyangisha kudiye, kabena bu bana bandi, bakahambuka, malu abo akanyanguka, akalua manyongoboka
Udi wangata mapangadika mu mukanda wa olodonase
Nakadiangatshila Bena Lewi mu miaba ya ban a bute bonso munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Nudi bamanye muvuaye mubabutule kashidi mu Mayi manene makunze
Nutumikile mei anyi
Bantu ba mu tshisamba tshia Manashe nebashikame hehi n andi
Nulue kudi muakuidi wa mu matuku au, numuambile ne, Ndi nkuambila lelu ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ne, Nakubuela mu buloba buakaiaya Yehowa batatu betu, bua kutuhabu
Kadi Yeye ke uvua munudianjidile mu njila, bua kunukebela muaba wa kuasa mitanda

Kadi bua kupikula bamuanabute ba bena Izrayele , badi bapite ba bena Levi ku bungi; pa muntu yonsu, bafute nkanu itanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole nkanu ya mu muaba wa tshijila, ya grame dikumi ku lukanu lumue
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Pashishe kupinganabu kabidi ne mvita mu Ene Mishepate mmumue ne Kadeshe
Diimanyika kadieena mwa kupita matuku a midimu idi yenzeka ku bûngi to
Esau wakaya lubilu bua kumuakidila, wakamuela tshituha ku nshingu, wakatuangana n andi mishiku, bakadila
Nunku Bena Isalele kabatu badia munyinyi wa ku tshikundukundu to ne katataka, bualu bua yeye wakalenga tshianza ha tshikundukundu tshia Yakoba

Nuitabushe balue ne mai, nuvuwe makasa enu, nuikishe bienu mu diledi dia mutshi, nendue ne bintu bia kudia bikese, nukoleshe mitshima yenu hashishe nudi mua kuhita, bualu bua nuenu nuakulua kudi muntu wenu Bakamuambila ne, Enza biebe bu muwakuamba

Biatangila muakuidi ne disama diakuamba kushika hashikishabo kuvuwa tshintu atshi, yeye neahande tshituha tshia tshilulu anyi tshia tshiseba anyi tshia milongo ya buludi anyi tshia milongo ya butshiama tshidi ne disama
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Nzambi akufute luse, muan anyi
Kadi dikombu dia Arone kumina makombu abu onsu
Arone kushala mupuwa

Mose wakatendekena Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, wakamba ne, Yehowa, bualu kai tshiji tshiebe tshidi tshitambe bukole kudi bantu bebe bawakaluhula mu buloba bu Ejipitu ne bukole bunene ne tshianza tshia bukole
Nenufile bintu ebi ku mutu kua milambu mudi nuosha ne dinda bu mulambu wa kuosha wa tshiendelele
Bualu bukuabo kabidi, meme, muntu webe nakadieyeka bu tshieya tshia nsongalume eu kudi tatu wanyi
Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne tshia kukuba bintu, biûma ne makasa a bantu bônso ne kuneemeka bintu bia bende
Yai bienu, nudikebele bisonsa kunudi mua kubisangana, kadi kabena bahuekesha mudimu wenu
Maweja Nangila kuambila Abrame ne: Umanye bimpe ne: ndelanganyi yebe neyisombe mu ditunga dia bende
Hakalua dilolo nkuadi yakalua, yakabuikila tshitudilu, dinda dime diakadi dinyunguluka tshitudilu
Badi babudia bilondeshila bikadilu bia mu musoko padibio kabiyi bibengangana ne Dîyi dikulu, ne mêyi ne mikandu, ne bulongoma bwa ditunga ne bienzelu biakane
Kadi nuenu nuakahidia bua kuyamu, nuakahidia mukenji wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Ateke tshianza pa mutu wa mbuji awu, amukosele muminu kumpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji

Miehu muanda mutekete mikese yakadi mifubidile ku luhehele luakafuma ku esete, yakadiundila kuinshi kua mikuabo, ne miehu nukese yakadia miehu muanda mutekete miakane, meme nakatshiawila benu majimbu, kadi nansha umue wabo wakamanya mua kutshinjinguluila
Ke bintu bidiye ne bua kulambula Maweja Nangila
Abrame kulambula Melkisedeke tshia dikumi tshia bintu biende bionsu bivuaye munyenge mu mvita
Mêyi a ditunga adi ne tshia kufila ngenyi miludiki ya nshindameenu ne mishindu ya kulongolola mianda ya bukola bwa mubidi ne ya kweepala njiwu ma bia kudia
Arone ne bana bende ba balume, kukumbaja mikenji yonsu ivua Maweja Nangila mubatumine kudi Moshe
Tatu wandi Isaka wakamuambila ne, Semena ha buihi, muan anyi, utuangane n anyi mishiku
Kadi numanye bimpe ne: meme nkayanyi tshiena mua kuambula bujitu bua kunulumbuluisha mu bilumbu bienu, ne mu matandu adi munkatshi muenu to

Wewe neulongolole luhangu lua tshitendelelu, ku luseke lua sude enza bilulu bidi bituangane tô ne ku coudées lukama, makunshi makumi abidi ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku makumi abidi, bitubuidi bia ku makunshi nebikale bia argent
Mutuangaji neamukenkete tshiakabidi
Nzambi Udi Ukengesha Bena Isalele Nom
Anu butuku abu mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubikila Moshe ne Arone kubambila ne: Umukayi ne bena Izrayele mu ditunga dianyi, nuye kutendelela Maweja Nangila bu munuvua bandombe
Dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Shelomita, muana mukashi wa Dibili, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana
Selofehada, muana mulume wa Hefê, kakadi ne bana ba balume nansha, wakadi anu ne bana ba bakashi, mena a bana ba bakashi ba Selofehada
Wewe ne bantu baudi n abo nuakudisangisha bua kuelangana ne Yehowa
Ke Mvidi Mukulu kuambila Nowa ne: Patuka mu buatu, ne mukajebe ne bana bebe ba balume ne bakaji babu
Bakidika muaba au ne, Kibelota hatawa, bualu bua bakajikamu bantu bakadi ne lukuka
Bikala bantu bakane makumi atanu mu musoko, wewe neûshihe, kuena usungila musoko bualu bua bantu bakane makumi atanu badimu, anyi

Kadi bikala mulume usangakena ne mushikankunde udi mubangila kudi mulume mukuabo mu budimi, udi umuakuata ku bukole, udi ulala n andi, anu mulume wakalala n andi neafue biandi; kadi kanuenji mushikankunde bualu; yeye kena muenze bualu bubi budibo mua kumushihela; bualu ebu budi bu muntu udi uhika ku mpala kua muena mutumba n andi udi umushiha; bualu bua yeye wakasangakena n andi mu budimi; ne mushikankunde mubangila kudi mukuabo wakadila, ne kakuakadi muntu bua kumusungila

Bilembi bia m ta biakumunyingalasha bikole, biakumuela mikete, biakumutatshisha, kadi buta buandi buakuikala bukole, maboko andi ne bianza biandi biakakoleshibua kudi bianza bia Nzambi wa Bukole wa Yakoba
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Hingana kudi mukelenge webe mukashi, udikokeshe mu tshianza tshiandi
Yehowa wakabikila Mose ku mutu kua mukuna, ne Mose wakabanda
Bidimu bia Shete bidi nkama tshitema dikumi ne bibidi
Bakabangila kukeba ku muan a bute to ne ku muan a mukala, bakasangana luhanza mu tshibombi tshia Benyamina

Yehowa Nzambi wakamba ne, Monai, mulume wakulua bu umue wetu, udi mumanye malu mimpe ne malu mabi, bua yeye kolodi tshianza tshiandi bua kuangateye mamuma a mutshi wa muoyo, wadia, wikala ne muoyo tshiendelele, Yehowa Nzambi wakamuihata mu budimi bua Edene, bua kuihileye buloba buakafumeye

Bakenza tshitekelu tshia muinda ne tshiamu tshia or tshiakafulabo, bakatula tshitaku tshiatshi ne bilongo biatshi ne tshiamu tshia or tshijima, bakenza tshitekelu bu tshidikishilu tshiakalesha Yehowa Mose
Wewe kuena mulue kundi munyi
Uvua mumone kakanu ne bikanu bivua ku maboku a muanabu wa bakaji, mumvue kabidi nuwuaye ulonda bivua muena mudimu awu mumuambile
Maweja Nangila, udi mfumu wa kashidi ne kashidi tshiendelele
Palô wakambila bantu bandi ne, Tudi mua kumona muntu mukuabo udi ne mutshima wa Nzambi nunku kudi kunyi
Edi ndisanka dia Yuda; wakamba ne, Yehowa, unvua dî dia Yuda, ulue n andi kudi bantu bandi: bianza biebe bimukoleshe, wikale mukuatshishi wandi kudi bena lukuna
Bantu bebe bonso nebalue kundi, nebankukuile, nebambe ne, Ya biebe ne bantu bonso badi balonda ku nyima kuebe, ne ku nyima kua bualu ebu nempatuke
Bikala mulambu wandi wa kuosha muana wa mukoko anyi muana wa mbushi, yeye neafile mulume udi kayi ne tshilema

Yeye wakalalahu butuku abu wakasungula bintu biakadiye n abi bua kuambika mukulu andi Esau matabisha mashina a mbushi nkama ibidi ne mpumbu ya mbushi makumi abidi, mashina a mikoko nkama ibidi ne mikoko ya bimpanga makumi abidi, ne tumelo tudibo bakama mabele makumi asatu ne bana batu, ne ngombe idibo bakama mabele makumi anai, ne balume ba ngombe dikumi mashina a mpunda makumi abidi ne nkungulu yai dikumi
Bantu bakuabu musumba munene, ba bisamba bishilangane, bavua ne bena Izrayele mu njila amu, kabidi ne bimuna bipite bungi: mikoku, mbuji ne ngombe
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Ebu mbualu buakamba Yehowa bua tuetu tuenze
Moshe ne Arone kudiela mpala panshi, bamba ne: Kia
Misangu yonsu mwuluke tshibilu tshia kudia mampa kaayi mela buanga
Isaka wakebesha muan andi ne, Muan anyi, wakamona ntole lubilu nunku munyi
Tshisamba tshinudi kanuyi bamanye nebadie bintu biakadiunda mu buloba bualu bua mudimu wenu; nebanunyange, nebanudiate matuku onso; malu anudi nutangila ku mesu neanuhadishe
Kuitabusha bua yeye kuikala bu muntu mufue udi ne tshituha tshia mubidi mubole hamulelabo
Ndi mumanye ne, Mukelenge wa Ejipitu kena witabusha bua nuenu kuya, neitabushe anu ne tshianza tshikole
Nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kujimisha miaba yonso yakadi bisamba binudi nuihata bitendelelaku nzambi yabo ku mutu kua mikuna mile, ne ku mutu kua tukuna tukese ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi
Yeye kuitaba ne: Ke meme ewu
Eu newikale mukenji kudibo bikondo biabo bionso

Kanungu ka : Minisitila kavulambedi udi ujaadika dikumbaja dia mêyi ne udi ne bukookeshi bwa kufila tuludiki, pa kumbusha makookeshi adibo bitabijila anu Mulombodi wa Ditunga yêye nkayenda kudi Dîyi dikulu edi
Mose wakatshishiha, wakantumina mashi ku tshioshelu
Nenusungule mukelenge wa mu tshisamba ne tshisamba bua kunutahuluila buloba
Nanku Maweja Nangila uvua wakula, mutangilangane nenu, ku mukuna, munkatshi mua kapia
Noa Udi Ukuatshika Maluvu Bana balume ba Noa bakaluhuka n andi mu buatu bakadi Sheme, Hama ne Yafete Hama wakadi nkambua wa Kanâna

Hakahanduluka Lota, Yehowa wakambila Abalama ne, Bandisha mesu ebe ha muaba ûdi muimane, utangile ku nôde ne ku sude ne ku esete ne ku wesete, buloba buonso bûdi umona nenkuhebu ne tunkanunuina tuebe tshiendelele
Munyinyi wa kudia, udi bena Izrayele bonsu aba bandomba, badila ne muadi, meme ndi mua kuupeta kuepi
Mose wakatua mulambu wa Yehowa kudi Eleazâ bu mulambu udibo banyukula, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Mukalenga awu kena mua kusela bakaji ba bungi
Bena Amaleke badi babunda bena Izrayele Bena Amaleke kufika mu Refidime bua kuluisha bena Izrayele
Kanunu kabidi maluvu makole, panudi nusunguluja bintu bidi bia tshijila, ne bidi kabiyi bia tshijila, bidi ne mikiya, ne bidi kabiyi ne mikiya
Bantu bonsu bavuabu babadike, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe, bavua bungi nunku: bena Kekate bavua
Moshe kumuambila ne: Nebikuenzekele muudi ulomba anu bua ujadike ne: kakuena utudi mua kufuanyikija ne Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu
Mose wakolola tshianza tshiandi ha mai, ne Yehowa wakatuma luhehele lukole lua ku esete, wakahingasha mai butuku abu buonso, buloba bûme buakamueneka kuakadi mai, mai akahanduluka
Bikala mukashi kayi muonyibue, kadi yeye udi muakane, nunku yeye neikale mubingishibue, nealele bana
Bakimana ditutu nansha matuku abidi nansha ngondo nansha tshidimu, Bena Isalele bakashala mu tshitudilu, kabakaya ku luendu, hakumukadi, bakaya ku luendu

Hanualongolola mulume wa ngombe bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia anyi bu mulambu wa kushikisha kuditshiha anyi bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa, nebafile mulambu wa bukula bubotesha bu bituha bisatu bia ha dikumi busangisha ne tshituha tshia dikoho dia manyi, nebafile kabidi tshituha tshia dikoho dia nvinyo bu mulambu udibo banua, bu mulambu wa kuosha, bua kûtuisha dihembu kudi Yehowa
Papita matuku muanda mutekete kena kabidi ne mikiya to
Angata mutanda wa mampa, ne mukala mulamba ne manyi, ne kakata kahehele bia mu tshisaka tshia bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene bidi ku mpala kua Yehowa
Nzambi wakamba ne, Kulu ha buihi, umushe bisabata biebe ku makasa, bualu bua muaba udi muimane udi buloba bua tshijila
Bakumuka ku Dishiba Dikunze, bakashikama mu tshihela tshia Sina

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata Bena Lewi mu miaba ya ban a bute ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, ne bimuna bia Bena Lewi mu miaba ya bimuna biabo, Bena Lewi nebikale banyi meme ndi Yehowa Bua kuhikula ban a bute ba Bena Isalele, nkama ibidi ne makumi muanda mutekete ne basatu, badi bahita balume ba Bena Lewi bungi, newangate nshekele itanu ku muntu ne ku muntu bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi nshekele udi bu guéras makumi abidi : wewe neufue nshekele ya bungi buabo buakahikulabo, kudi Alona ne kudi bana bandi balume
Ke muvua biluilu bia bena Izrayele bilondangane nanku mu luendu luabu
Kabidi kena mua kubeya nsuki ne miedi, too ne pakumbana matuku onsu avuaye mulaye bua kudijidila
Pashishe kufuaye

Milambu yabi ya bintu bidibo banua neyikale tshituha tshia dikoho dia nvinyo ku muana wa ngombe yonso, ne tshintu tshisatu tshia dikoho dia nvinyo ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshinai tshia dikoho dia nvinyo ku muana wa mukoko yonso, eu udi mulambu unudi nuosha ha kahia ku ngondo ku ngondo tô ne ngondo yonso ya mu tshidimu, Nenufile mulume wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi kudi Yehowa ku mutu kua milambu idibo bafila buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Moshe kutuuta dikombu pa lubuebue, bakulu ba bena Izrayele bonsu batangile
Nanku nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu, nenunemeke Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, panutshidi ne muoyi
Halua Yehowa n enu mu buloba bua Bena Kanâna buakanulayeye ne batatu enu ne hanuheye buloba abu, nuenu nenujidile Yehowa ban a bute bonso ba bantu ne ba nyama kabidi, bana ba balume mbana ba Yehowa
Bena Isalele bonso bakatontolola Mose ne Alona, bakabambila ne, Biakadi bimpe tuafuila mu Ejipitu, anyi tuafuila mu tshihela etshi
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ndi mumane kumvua bijanu bia bena Izrayele
Kabavua ne diba dia kulamba biakudia, nansha dia kuangata bintu bia luendu
Awu kuitaba ne: Ke meme awu
Hela muntu bilumi, yeye neadioweshe mubidi wandi wonso ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Tshisamba kai tshidi ne mikenji ne mei majalame bu mikenji ei yonso inakateka ku mpala kuenu lelu
Nunku wewe neumujidile bualu bua yeye udi ufila milambu kudi Nzambi webe, bualu bua meme Yehowa wakamuidika, ndi wa tshijila

Dilondangana Mulombodi wa Ditunga Ndumbulwilu wa ku tubadi Tshidiidi a manyooka Mweena tshimwangi Didila Ndudiki Dibadika dia bantu Dieebeja dia dianyisha dia beena ditunga Ditunga Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa Disungudibwa kudi bantu bonso
Kadi kafila mwaku mudiku kamona mu mianda ya dilomba dia luse
Bavua ba bungi, kabidi banene bale, bu ndelanganyi ya Anake
Muena tshibawu awu, bamushipe anu ne mabue
Yehowa wakatuela mikenji ei, bua tuetu tutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bua yeye atuenzele bimpe matuku onso, bua tuetu tuikale ne muoyo utudi n au lelu eu
Bikala mulume anyi mukashi ne matoba matoke mu dikoba, muakuidi neamutangile, ne bi kala matoba au kâyi matambe kutoka tô, ei idi bu mpusu yakumueneka mu dikoba, muntu eu udi muakane
Neyikale pambidi pebe wewe, pa balombodi ba mu bukalenga buebe ne pa bantu bebe bonsu
Abrame kumutuadila nyama yonsu ayi, kuyipanda nseke, kuteka luseke ne luseke bitangilangane
Meme kuteka bena Izrayele bakuabu ku mudimu wa kuludika bantu ku tshisamba tshienu tshionsu
Bakamukudimuna di ne, Mu buloba bua Kanana, tuakuluila bua kusumba bia kudia
Bakunfuisha mukau ne tshintu tshidi katshiyi Nzambi, bakunfikisha munda ne mpingu yabo ya hatuhu, meme nembafuishe mukau ne bantu ba hatuhu, meme nembafikishe munda ne tshisamba tshia bantu bahote

Wakalongolola luhangu lua muaba wa kutendelela ku luseke lua ku sude wakenza bilulu bia lin muimpe tô ne ku coudées lukama, ne makunshi makumi abidi, ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku makumi abidi, kadi bitubuidi bia ku makunshi biakadi bia argent

Yeye wakamba ne, Bulelela, hakumbana ngondo, nempingane kûdi, ne mona, Sala, mukashi webe, neakulelele muana mulume Sala wakunvua dî diandi hakadiye mu ntenta ku mpenge kua tshibi, wakadi ku nyima kua muanjelo
Kadi, bena Izrayele bavua basue kuya ku mukuna ku bukole
Kadi ditunga dinudi nukuata mpindiewu didi ne bibandabanda ne mikuna

Dikengesha dia Badi Batela Dina dia Yehowa Tshitelatela Muana wakadiku, mamu wandi wakadi Muena Isalele ne tatu andi wakadi Muena Ejipitu wakaluhuka munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, muana mulume eu wa mukashi wa Bena Isalele wakasangana ne Muena Isalele mukuabo mu tshituilu, muana mulume wa mukashi wa Bena Isalele wakateta dina dia Yehowa tshitelatela, wakamuhenda, ba kalua handikudi Mose
Ulongeshe bantu meyi ne mikenji bia Mvidi Mukulu, bua babilame, bakumbaje bidiye musue
Kadi nuikale badimuke
ditambakana, bintu bia kale, dibandila dia bantu bônso ne mpangu ya nyama idi ne diambulwisha mu polovensa ne mu musoko

Buloba ebu buakadi buloba bua Bena Lefa: Bena Lefa bakashikamamu diambedi; kadi Bena Amona badi bababikila ne, Bena Zamazuma, bantu bakole, bantu ba bungi, bule bua Bena Anaka; kadi Yehowa wakabashiha ku mpala kuabo, bobo bakabalonda ku nyima, bakashikama mu muaba wabo; bu muakenzeleye bana ba Esau, bakadi bashikama mu Sei, hakashiheye Bena Holi ku mpala kuabo; bobo bakabalonda ku nyima, badi bashikama mu muaba wabo tô ne ku dituku edi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ulue biebe ne tshisamba tshia Lewi, ubateke ku mpala kua Alona muakuidi, bua bobo bamuenzele mudimu

Nenufile bintu ebi kudi Yehowa mu matuku anudi nudia bidia bia Yehowa, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuditshiha n ai ne bintu budi mitshima yenu misue kufila, ne milambu yenu ya kuosha ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua ne milambu yenu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala
Maweja Nangila kuandamuna ne: Lekela kuamba nanku
Kabidi uvua mumuangalajilamu bantu pa buloba bujima
Neubale mushinga wa bintu bionso bu mushinga wa nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu guéras makumi abidi idi nshekele umue
Matuku onso a Lemeke akadi bidimu nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mutekete ne mua nda mutekete, yeye wakafua biandi

Yeye wakungambila ne, Yehowa, undi ngendakana ku mpala kuandi, neatume muanjelo wandi n ebe, neakuendeshe dikasa dimpe, ne wewe newangatshile muan anyi mulume mukashi kudi bana betu ne kudi ba mu nsubu wa tatu wanyi Hashishe, munda muebe nemuikale mutoke ku kuditshiha eku, hawaya kudi bana betu, biahidiabo kukuha mukashi, munda muebe nemuikale mutoke ku kuditshiha eku
Moshe umvua miaku eyi, kuitabaye
; bena Levi bonsu bavua
Nzambi wakafuka muntu ne tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, wakamufuka ne tshifuanyikishi tshia Nzambi, wakabafuka balume ne bakashi
Bakunvua di dia Yehowa Nzambi wendakana mu budimi dilolo, mulume ne mukashi bakasokoma munkatshi mua mitshi ya mu budimi ku mesu kua Yehowa Nzambi
Yehowa wakamueneka kudiye, wakamba ne, Kuyi mu Ejipitu, ushikame mu buloba bundi nkuambila
Kadi pa bukula abu, kena mua kuelamu mafuta, nansha kutekapu musenga wa kamonya to
Bena Izrayele bakumbaje mikenji eyi, kabakumfikisha munda nansha
Mamuma mimpe a mu buloba buabo buonso adibo bahuola diambedi, adibo halua n au kudi Yehowa, neikale mamuma ebe, muntu yonso wa mu nsubu webe udi muakane neadie
Bivua bitoke bifuanangane ne ntete ya koriandre
Luesu alu badi ne bua kulushipa

Kanungu ka Bukalenga bunene kabweena mwa kutumina nzuji dîyi padiye mu mudimu wende to, anyi kutangila bilumbu, anyi kunyangakaja lwendu lwa dilumbulwisha, anyi kubenga mwa kukumbaja dipangadika dia bilumbulwilu
Kadi mukalenga ewu kena mulekele bena Izrayele to, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mumupeshe muoyi wa tshitunu
Kadi nebahaule Bena Kene tô ne haya Bena Ashû n abo bu bena lukanu
Bena Isalele bakamona mpala wa Mose ne musunyi wa ha mpala ha Mose wakakonka: Mose wakateka tshilulu tshikudika ha mpala handi kabidi tô ne hakayeye kusomba ne Yehowa
Moshe kuambila Arone ne bana bende ba balume ne: Nulambile munyinyi wa tshimpanga tshibidi atshi mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Numanye ne: matuku onsu anudi mu ditunga dienu, kanuena mua kulengulula bena Levi to
Nanku mfumu wa tshisamba tshionsu neikale ne dikombu diende
Hanukonka muan enu wa balume ne, Bualu ebu ntshinyi
Nuvua badimuene nkayenu, muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, mubutule bantu, bavua batendelela mvidie Baale Peyore
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nensokoke Abalahama bualu bundi ngenza, anyi
Mulami wa mikoko wakafumaku, ku dibue dia Isalele
Dibaya dimue diakadi ne tutshi tua bituha tutshiamakasha hankatshi ha dibaya, bakenza mabaya onso a mu nsubu nunku
Juka, ubishe muana, umukuate bikole ku tshianza
Paudi musue kunkengesha nanku, mbimpe unshipe
Bintu ebi nebikale bilamibue mu diyeba bua bidimu muanda mutekete bia tshiole tshilualua mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bua bena buloba kabafu ne tshiole
Mose wakambila balumbuluishi ba mu Isalele ne, Muntu ne muntu ashihe bantu ba mu tshisamba tshiandi bakadisangisha kudi Bâla peô

Esau wakabaka bakashi ba bana bakashi ba Bena Kanana: Adamuana wa bakashi wa Elona, Muena Hiti, ne Oholibama, muana wa bakashi wa Ana, muana wa bakashi wa Sibiona, Muena Hiwi, ne Basemata, muana wa bakashi wa Yishemaele, ne muan abo wa bakashi wa Nebayota
Kumulamabu bimpe, bindile mua kumanya dinyoka dia kumupesha
Mutuangaji alambule nyunyi umue bua mulambu wa kukobolola nawu muntu, nyunyi mukuabu bua mulambu wa kuosha
Kanuteki lupingu nansha lumue luleja mvidie wa mushindu ewu mu nzubu yenu
Kadi muanabute wa ngombe, wa mukoku, nansha wa mbuji, kubena mua kumupikula to, bualu nnyama ya tshijila
Badi badinyooka bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu
Muntu awu mumane kukungula nsuki, mutuangaji neamupeshe diboku dia mukoku wa tshimpanga dimane kulamba, kabidi ne mukata mulamba kabayi bela buanga wa mu tshisaka, kabidi ne kampa

Bana balume ba Eliaba: Nemuele ne Datana ne Abilama Datana eu ne Abilama eu bakabikila tshisumbu tshia bantu, bakatanda ne Mose ne Alona mu tshisumbu tshia Kola, hakadibo batanda ne Yehowa, buloba buakubulula mukana muabu, buakabamma ne Kola, bakafua tshisumbu atshi, kahia kakosha balume aba nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, ne bobo bakalua bu tshivulukidi kudi Bena Isalele
Dibadika Mbabula ya bena Kora Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ambila mutuangaji Elazare, muana wa Arone, ne: upatule mbabula idi mu kapia, utangalaje makala aye kule

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu badi bakakumbaja kudi bantu tshiteema bateeka kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga, yêye nkayende mudisungwila basatu ba ku bôbu abu, Tshimamwende wa Bukalenga patshi, mu tshisangilu tshiatshi tshinene, tshifila bantu basatu ne Kapangu ka kumutu ka bakoshi ba nsambu kafila bantu basatu
Elisu muana mulume wa Shedeu neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Lubena
Ditutu dia mu munya diakadi ne dinkenke butuku kadiakumuka ku mpala kua bantu
Muaba awu ke uvua Arone mufuile
Mose wakangata mulangala ku mpala kua Yehowa bu muakamuambileye
Pikalabi bishale, nubilame bua kudia malaba
Genese Bufukibua Kale ku tshibangidilu Nzambi wakafuka diulu ne buloba

Abalama wakangata mukashi wandi Salai, ne Lota, muana wa muan abo, ne bintu biabo bionso, ne bantu bonso bakahetabo mu Halana, bakaya mu nshila wa ku buloba bua Kanâna, bakafika mu buloba bua Kanâna Abalama wakalala mu buloba, wakalua ku Shekeme, kuakadi mutshi wa telebinta wa mu Mole Bena Kanana bakadi mu buloba tshikondo atshi

Bena Ejipitu bakabalonda ne tubalu dionso ne makalu onso bia Palô Masalayi andi ne bantu ba ha nyima ha tubalu bakabaheta hakadibo bashikama hehi ne mai manene, hehi ne Pi hahilota ku mpala kua Bâla sefona
Milonda yebe ya bibi bia musoko neyikale ya tshiamu tshifike ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, bukole buebe nebuikale bule bua matuku ebe onso
Nsongakaji kumuandamuna ne: Meme ndi muana wa Betuyele, kabidi muikulu wa Nahore ne Milka
Mutuangaji neambule mayi a bululu awu, a kutshipa nawu muntu

Nebashihe ngombe webe ku mesu kuebe, ne wewe kuena udia munyinyi wandi; nebanyenge mpunda webe ku mesu kuebe ku bukole, ne kabena bakuhingishileye; nebahe badi n ebe lukuna mikoko yebe, kakuena muntu wa kunusungila
Nafatale udi bu ntole musulula, udi Wamba mei malengele
Kakuena mukuabu utudi tutumbisha
Muena lukuna wakamba ne, Nembalonde, nembahete, nentahulule bintu bionso bidi bishala, mutshima wanyi neusanke bualu buabo, nempatule muele wanyi wa nvita, nembashihe ne tshianza tshianyi
Hashishe hakamuangalakabo ku esete, bakasangana mpata munene mu buloba bua Shinâ, bakashikamaku
Yeye wakadi muakuidi wa Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu
Kuambilabu Moshe ne: Tuafiki mu ditunga diuvua mututume
Nuebeje batuangaji ba bena Levi ne balumbuluishi, badi balumbuluisha dituku adi
Noa wakabuela mu buatu ne mukashi wandi ne bana bandi balume ne bakashi ba bana bandi, bualu bua mai akavulangana

Dutelonone Bintu Bifila kudi Bena Lewi Bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi, ne tshisamba tshionso tshia Lewi kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele; bobo nebadie munyinyi wa milambu ya Yehowa idibo bosha ha kahia bu buhianyi bua Yehowa
Bualu ebu nebuikale bu tshimanyinu ku tshianza tshiebe ne bu tshivulukidi hankatshi ha mesu ebe, bua dî dia Yehowa dikale mukana muenu, bualu bua Yehowa wakanuhatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole
Wewe newenze tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi ne mutshi wa acacia
Yeye wakalela muakuny andi Ebele kabidi Ebele wakadi mulami wa mikoko, kadi Kana wakadi tshidime

Nakaha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada buloba buonso ku Gilada tô ne ku hankatshi ha tshibanda tshia Ânona tô ne ku kasulu ka Yaboka ku butshika bua Bena Amona; ne buloba bua Alabâ kabidi ne tshibanda tshia Yadene ku Kinelete tô ne ku dishiha dia Alabâ, Dishiba dia Luehu, kuinshi kua mukuna wa Pisega ku esete
Bena Izrayele kumuka ku mpokolu ya mayi a Bene Yakane, kuya ku Moshera

Bena Isalele bakamushiha ne muele wa nvita, bakanyenga buloba buandi ku mai a Ânona tô ne ku mai a Yaboka ku butshika bua buloba bua Bena Amona, bualu bua butshika bua buloba bua Bena Amona buakadi bukole
Nsongakaji kumusha mulondu lukasa pa makaya, ungamba ne: Nuaku
Alambule Maweja Nangila mbuji wa dishina, kayi ne bulema

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Shelumiele, muana mulume wa Shulishadai
Kadi numanyene: Maweja Nangila mmuipate bantu aba kumpala kuenu, bualu mbena buenzayi
Genese Mulayi wa Kuledibua kua Isaka Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Abalahama hehi ne mitshi ya telebinta ya Mamale hakadiye ushikama ku mbelu kua ntenta wandi munda munya
Mêyi a ditunga adi aleeja mishindu ya kukumbaja kanungu katudi naku aka
Nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Ku tshikondo atshi Yehowa wakangambila ne, Songa mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi, ulue biebe kundi ku mukuna, udienzele mushete wa mabaya
Etshi ntshintu tshiabo tshiendelele mu bikondo biabo bionso
Pashishe kulondabu kudi bena tshisamba tshia Zebulone, babalombola kudi Eliyabe, muana wa Elone
Kadi blê ne bintu bikuabo kabiakadi bifue, kabiakanza kukola nansha
Padi mutuangaji umona ne: tshibangu ntshiondoke, kabidi boya bua muaba awu mbutokoloke, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu ewu mmupie mikiya

Bakalamata Kedolaomê to bidimu dikumi ne bibidi, ne mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bisatu, bakatomboka Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne binai Kedôlaome wakalua ne bakelenge bakadi n andi, bakahita Bena Lefa ba mu Ashelota kânayima bukole, ne Bena Zusa ba mu Hama, ne Bena Eme ba mu Shawe kiyatayima, ne Bena Holi ba ku mikuna ya Sei to ne ku Ele palana, hehi ne tshihela
Kujidilaye kabidi tshilambuilu ne bintu bionsu bivuaku, kubilabaye manyi
Tshimuangi Mana ne nyunyi ya tulumbu Bena Izrayele kumuka bonsu mu Elime
Yeye wakamba ne, Kulengi nsongalume tshianza nansha, kumuenzedi bualu, bualu bua katataka ndi mumanye ne wewe udi utshina Nzambi, bualu bua wewe kuakumpidia muan ebe, muana umuehele mene
Nebishale anu kudi muana wa munda muebe
Yeye kena ne bualu bua kudiangatshila bakashi ba bungi bua kukudimuneye mutshima wandi; yeye kena ne bualu bua kudikumbashila biamu bia argent ne bia or
Nanku, neanyishe bua muntu udiye musungule asemene pabuipi nende
Muena mudimu awu kukonka Abrahame ne: Kadi pikala mukaji awu mubenge bua kumuka mu ditunga diabu bua kusomba kuneku, ndi mua kuya ne muanebe Izake bua aye kusomba kuenu, muaba udi mukaji awu anyi
Ajikije mikiya yonsu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila bua muntu ashale kayi ne mikiya
Meme nengikale Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Nanku muntu awu kena mupie mikiya to
Pashishe kufuaye
Agare uvua wenda ulalakana mu tshipela tshia Bersheba

Yehowa neanuhadishe, neanutumme bufofo, nenufue mikemu mu mitshima yenu; nenububute munda munya bu mudi muntu mufofo ububuta mu midima; kanuena nuenda dikasa dimpe mu nshila yenu, nebanutatshishe, nebanuibe, kakuena muntu udi mua kunusungila
Badi Basangula Bena Lewi Kadi kabakabala Bena Lewi munkatshi muabo ku tshisamba tshia batatu abo
Bena Isalele Badi Bumuka ku Sinai Mu tshidimu tshibidi, mu ngondo muibidi, mu matuku makumi abidi a ngondo eu, ditutu bakumuka ku mutu kua ntenta wa dimanyisha ba Yehowa
Pashishe nengenze nebe tshisamba tshikuabu, tshidi tshipite bena Izrayele ku bungi ne ku bukole
dilongolola dia mishindu ya kusonsoloja ne ya kukuba mapa a muntu yônso ne budikadidi bwa nshindameenu bujaadika mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi;
Nennumushe ku midimu mikole inudi nuenzela bena Ejipitu
Budi bwangata mapangadika bwa kujimija nsanzu yônso ya tshinyangu tshia mukaji mu nsombelu wa bantu bônso anyi mu nsombelu wa muntu ne muntu

Hakunvua Mose dî edi, yeye wa kakuma mpala hanshi, wakambila Kola ne bakadiye habo ne, Dinda Yehowa neadileshe bantu bandi, ne nganyi udi wa tshijila, neamubikile ku mpala kuandi, neabifile wasunguleye ku mpala kuandi
Yeye wakashiya bintu bionso biakadiye n abi mu tshianza tshia Yosefe, yeye kakamanya bungi bua bintu biakadiye n abi, anu bidia biakadiye udia
Bualu bua bantu aba, yeye wakabateka ku musoko ne ku musoko ku matshika a buloba bua Ejipitu to ne kunfudilu kuabu
Kuyaye muaba uvua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile bua kulambula mulambu
Nsenji kena muakane kunudi bualu bua udi uhingishilula bintu mukana, kadi kena ne mikono mihanduluke
Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu tshidi tshidikookela mu buludiki ne mu mianda ya lupetu ne tshidi ne lwatshi lupetu lwa nsungansunga
Bukalenga bwa bandumbulula ne bukoshi bwa nsambu
Baka muela mu lukanu bua kuindila mei a kudi Yehowa
Pashishe mutuangaji udi wangata muana wa mukoku umue, bu mulambu wa dinua tshibalu, ne tshitupa tshia litre tshia makuabu mafuta, abiele mulu, abinyukule
Kanungu ka Bukookeshi bwa kwimanyika midimu bwa kutontomona budi bumanyike ne bujadikibwe
Bakateka bintu bia kudia ha nyima ha mpunda yabo bakaya
DIYUKI DIBIDI DIA MOSHE Moshe kuambila bena Izrayele mikenji ya Mvidi Mukulu
Nanku anu bantu balume ba ku ndelanganyi ya Arone, ke badi mua kudia bukula bua mulambu abu
Biakuma ngombe muhika mulume anyi muhika mukashi ne nsengu, nebafute mukelenge wabo nshekele makumi asatu ya argent, nebakume ngombe ne mabue
Mvidi Mukulu uvua mumone buenzayi bua bantu pa buloba bujima
Kadi biasumba muakuidi muntu, muntu eu udi mua kutshidia, ne bana baledibue mu nsubu muandi nebadie bidia biandi
Moshe utshipingaja, utshiumusha kabidi
Kupita matuku muanda mutekete kabidi, Nowa kutuma nyunyi wa nkudimba musangu muisatu, nkudimba kuya kashidi
Mmumue ne: dituku dimue nedienze tshidimu tshijima tshia tshibawu
Wakimita difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamba ne, Katataka nentumbishe Yehowa, nunku wakidika dina diandi ne, Yuda, ne yeye wakalekela kulela
Kapia ka Maweja Nangila kutema munkatshi muabu, kuosha tshitupa tshia mitanda
Nanku nenukuate ditunga didi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupe, nushalemu ne muoyi

Muntu yônso udi ne bukookeshi bwa kudiakwila yeye nkayende anyi bwa kubiikila mumulumbulwidi udiye mudisungwile, ne biônso abi, mu bitupa biônso bia ndumbulwilu ku tubadi, mwikalamu dikebulula dia bampulushi ne diela dia nkonku kumpala kwa kufika ku tshilumbulwilu
Nebanshipe bua kukuangata wewe
Kanubenzedi bibi to
Bena Ejipitu nebamanye ne meme ndi Yehowa, hangolola tshianza tshianyi ha Ejipitu ne hanahatula Bena Isalele munkatshi muabo
Pa kubeenga kufila dimanyisha edi, mu matuku makumi asatu, muntu mweena bwaalu ebu badi bamutangila bu muntu mubeenga mudimu
Yeye wakabebesha ne, Yeye udi ne bukole, anyi

Kanungu ka Mu tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu a dituma dia dijinga dia kwenzeja dîyi, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi mwa kulomba kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa dijooja dia tshiakabidi dia dîyi anyi dia tumwe tunungu twadi
Bonsu abu bamane kufua, Maweja Nangila kushisha kungambila meme Moshe ne: Mpindiewu nupitshile ku mikalu ya ditunga dia Mowabe, nukosoluele mu ditunga dia Are
Kuyaye kudi bantu, kuvua kabutu kamane kubanga
Kanuhendi muena mahaha, kanuteki tshintu tshia ku lenduisha n atshi muntu mufofo, kadi nuenu nutshine Nzambi wenu meme ndi Yehowa
Bena Amore, bavua base ku mikuna ya Seyire aku, kutuluka bua kunuluisha
Bikala mundi muenze bualu bubi ku mpukahuka, neafile muana mukashi wa mbushi wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Palô wakabikila Mose ne Alona mu butuku, wakamba ne, Bikai, yai bienu munkatshi mua bantu banyi, ne nuenu ne Bena Isalele, yai bienu nutendelele Yehowa bu munuakamba
Enza makoha makumi atanu ku mibangu ya tshilulu, ne makoha makumi atanu ku mibangu ya tshilulu tshikuabo tshidi tshituangane katshi
Bena Izrayele bamone muvua bena Ejipitu babalonda ne mvita, kabidi muvua mukalenga wabu ufika, kutshinabu bikole
Panuasemena pabuipi, yeye neipate bantu aba ku kakese ku kakese
Bena Isalele bakaya mu bunene bua mai ha buloba bûme, mai akadi bu tshinunu kudibo ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Panudi nulongolola mulambu wa kuoshila Maweja Nangila, kashidi kenu kanuena mua kuelamu buitshi, nansha buanga bua mampa to

Hakambeve ne, Bimuna bionso bia matoba ndifutu diebe, hashishe, bimuna bionso biakalela bana bakadi ne matoba, hakambeye ne, Bimuna bionso bia mihola ndifutu diebe, hashishe, bimuna bionso biakalela bana bakadi ne mihola
Kulekelabu bana ba balume ne muoyi
Ndelanganyi ya Yayire, muana wa Menashe, ivua mikuate ditunga dia Argobe, divua mu Bashane, too ne ku mikalu ya bena Ngeshure ne bena Maaka
Butuku mana avua amata mu mitanda ne lumuma musangu umue
Kuandamunaye Abrahame ne bena Iti bavua basombe ku tshibuelelu tshia tshimenga bonsu bateleja ne: Ndi nkusengelela ne: tshiena nkusumbisha budimi ne lubuebue to
Pashishe, wela musenga wa kamonya pa makala apu
Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, muakuidi neamutangile ne bikala disama ditampakane mu dikoba muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi

Tshibutshilu tshia ditunga tshiabanyi tshia mpetu ne bintu mudimu watshi udi wa kufila lupetu bwa kukumbajija bingenyingenyi ne ndongamu ya dieela dia lupetu mu midimu ya Mbulamatadi, bwa kujadika diswikangana dia beena ditunga ne bwa kololola dishilangana mu divunguluka pankatshi pa polovensa ne pankatshi pa bitupa bia teletwala bikwabo bidiludika
Mukelenge wanyi wakakonka bantu bebe ne Nudi ne tatu, anyi muan enu mukuabo, anyi
Bualu panudi nualenga ne biamu bienu bia bantu, kaena andengelela kabidi to

Aba mbana ba balume ba Luele Nahata ne Zela ne Shama ne Miza, aba mbana ba balume ba Basemata, mukashi wa Esau Aba mbana ba balume ba Oholibama, muana wa bakashi wa Ana muana wa bakashi wa Sibiona mukashi wa Esau, yeye wakalelela Esau Yeusha ne Yalama ne Kola
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Dituku dia matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondo eu wa muanda mutekete nebikale dituku didibo badia bidia bia mu bitandatanda tô matuku muanda mutekete
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Buonso buabo nebafile bintu biabo, mukelenge dituku, mukelenge dituku, bua kujidila tshioshelu
Kanuena mua kuimanyika dibue dia kutendelela mvidie muaba awu to
Mapangadika a tubadi ne tubinadi badi baakumbaja mu dîna dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga
Bena Izrayele kuashila Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu tshimenga tshia Pitome ne tshia Ramsese bua balaminemu bintu biende
Abalahama ne Yishemaele, muan andi mulume, bakatengudibua dituku dimue
Nunku bakasangisha ku bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele bantu tshinunu ku tshisamba, bantu tshinunu ku tshisamba, bena nvita binunu dikumi ne bibidi

Yehowa wakanunkila dihembu dimpe: Yehowa wakamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Tshiena ngela buloba mulau kabidi bualu bua bantu badi ne meji mabi mu mitshima yabo hatshidibo bitende tô ne hakulumpabo, tshiena njimisha bifukibua bionso bidi ne muoyo kabidi bu munakenza diambedi

Enza biebe mitshi ya acacia ya kuela ku mabaya atanu adi ku luseke lumue lua tshitendelelu, mitshi itanu ya kuela ku mabaya adi ku luseke lumue ne mitshi itanu ya kuela ku mabaya adi ku luseke lukuabo, ne mitshi itanu ya kuela ku mabaya adi ku nyima
Padibio bienzeka Bia kumanyishangana nabi mianda Bienji ne bisumbu Mpwila mambu , tshimenga tshia ku mutu kwa ditunga
Kumufila kudi muena mudimu bua amulambe lukasa
Kadi kabivua bitungunuka to
Hakabamona Yakoba, yeye wakamba ne, Ebi mbisumbu bia banjelo ba Nzambi, Wakabikila muaba au ne, Mahanayima
Batentekedi bakuabu kudiwula Moshe
Moshe kutuluka, kuya kuvua bantu, kubalondelaye bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile abi
Bialua mukuenu mundi muhele, biateketa maboko andi ha buihi hebe, wewe neumukuatshishe, yeye neikale kûdi bu muenyi anyi bu muena luendu
Yoshua wakahita Amaleka ne bantu bandi bukole ne muele wa nvita
Wewe newase tshitendelelu ne bilulu binene dikumi bia lin mutambe buimpe, bilulu bia bleu ne bilulu bikunzubile ne bilulu bikunze kunzû, ubienze ne bakeluba benjibue ne lungenyi lule
Wakateka tshioshelu tshia or mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ku mpala kua tshilulu, wakoshahu musenga wa manananshi, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Nenudie mampa adi kayi ne luevene to matuku muanda mutekete, dituku dia kumudilu nenumushe luevene mu nsubu yenu, muntu yonso udi udia mampa adi neluevene ku dituku dia kumudilu to matuku muanda mutekete, nebamumushe munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Hashishe nennuenzele bu munakelangana meji bua kubenzela bobo
Ngomere kulela bana ba balume aba: Ashekenaze, Rifate ne Togarma
Mpindiewu ngajadiki ne: udi untshina meme Mvidi Mukulu, bualu kuena mumpale muanebe umuepele umvua mukupeshe
Nunku kanutshinyi, nennudishe ne bana benu bakese Yeye wakabasamba, wakabambila mei a kalolo

Nomba Kulengesha kua Badi Kabayi Bakane Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Eu udi mukenji wakuela Yehowa ne, Nuambile Bena Isalele bua bobo balue kûdi ne muana wa ngombe mukunze, udi kayi ne ditoba anyi tshilema, udi kayi muanze kuya muinshi mua mutshi wa tshikokedi
Abrame kumuinyika Ismayele
Nzambi wakambila Belâma ne, Kuyi n abo, kuedi bantu aba mulau nansha, bantu aba badi basankishibue
Nenuikale ne milau mu kukumbasha kua bana ne mu bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba ne mu kukumbasha kua bimuna ne kua mikoko

Maweja Nangila udi ulaya Moshe tshiakabidi Pavua Maweja Nangila uyukila ne Moshe mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, uvua mumuambile ne: Ndi Maweja Nangila, ambila mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bionsu bindi mukuambile

Dikenga dinayi: njiji Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Malaba dinda, padi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu upatuka bua kuya ku musulu wa Nile, uye kumuambila ne: Maweja Nangila mmuntume bua ulekele bantu bende, baye kumutendelela
Nanku nenubutule bantu bonsu bikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupeshe
Ditangilula dia Dîyi dikulu diônso didi dipatshila anyi difikisha ku dikepeesha dia makookesha ne madilekelela a muntu, anyi kudikepeesha dia makookeshi a polovensa ne misoko didi dikandikibwa
Basatu bavua bashale kunyema batangila ku mukuna
Abalahama wakangata nkunyi ya kalua ka ha tshioshelu, wakayiteka ha diaha dia muan andi Isaka, yeye wakangata kalua ne kele mu tshianza tshiandi, bubidi buabo bakaya hohamue
Nanku, nuenu nenufuile bonsu amu mu tshipela emu
Bidimu bia Nowa bidi nkama tshitema ne makumi atanu
Nuenu nuyishe Bena Isalele mikenji yonso yakabamanyisha Yehowa mukana mua Mose
Padiye umanya bualu bubi buvuaye muenze, udi ne bua kudikobolola
Wewe neulue ne mulambu wa bukula budi busangisha ne bintu ebi kudi Yehowa, ulue n abi kudi muakuidi ne yeye nealue n abi ku tshioshelu
Aba mbana balume ba Sheme ku meku abo ne ku miaku yabo ne ku maloba abo ne ku bisamba biabo
Hakatshiabu Yehowa Wakenza bualu ebu; bimuna bionso bia mu Ejipitu biakafua, kadi bimuna bia Bena Isalele kabiakafua nansha tshimue
Benze madiotu anu bungi bua tshibidilu, bualu mbena lulengu
Metushela mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama makumi muanda mukulu ne muanda mutekete, kulelaye Lemeke

Ebi mbilulu bidibo ne bua kutela tshintu tshia kuteka ha tshiadi, ne efoda, ne tshikowelu, ne kazaku ka bibaka bibaka, ne tshilulu ne mukaba, bobo nebatelele Alona ne bana bandi bilulu bia tshijila, bua yeye ankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa muanda mutekete nedikale dituku dia kuikisha kunudi, dituku dia tshivulukidi didibo bela mpungi, dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila
Sala wakamba ne, Nzambi wakansekesha ne bantu bonso badi bunvua lumu elu nebaseke n anyi

Yetelo, tatu muenu wa Mose, wakangata Sipola, mukashi wa Mose, hakadiye mumutume, ne bana bandi balume babidi, dina dia mukuabo ne, Geshoma, bualu bua Mose wakamba ne, Nakadi muenyi mu buloba bua bende
Kadi yeye wakahidia, wakambila mukashi wa mukelenge wandi ne, Mona, mukelenge wanyi kena mumanye bintu bindi n abi mu nsubu muandi, yeye wakashiya bintu bionso bidiye n abi mu tshianza tshianza

Muakuidi neangate bukula bua mulambu wa mukau ku bianza bia mukashi, neanyukule mulambu wa bukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, nealue n au ku tshioshelu, ne muakuidi neambule dianza tente ne bukula, bu tshivulukidi tshiau, neabuoshele ha tshioshelu, ne ku nyima yeye neamushe mukashi mai
Kumulombi tshia kasombela, kadi utshine Nzambi webe, mukuenu neikale n ebe
Kadi, wewe pebe ulekele kutulembakaja
Wenze kabidi mushete wa mabaya
Nuenu bena Izrayele, matuku malondangane asambombu kanuena mua kudia mampa mela buanga
Muntu yonsu uvua musue kuenza mudimu muaba awu, kayi mutuangaji, bavua ne bua kumushipa
Hakimana ditutu ku mutu kua nsubu matuku a bungi, nunku Bena Isalele bakatumikila dî dia Yehowa, kabakaya ku luendu
Pashishe kuyaye wenda utula mu bitupa bishilangane too ne kuinshi kua ditunga dia Kenaane
Muntu mukuabu muenze mudimu awu kayi mutuangaji, nebamushipe
Udi nkambua wa bena Ebere bonsu
Dielulula Bibidilu bibi bia mu madilu Nuenu bena Izrayele, panudi mu madilu, kanuena mua kuditapa nsalu, nansha kukungula pa lubombu to
Nenteke ditahulula hankatshi ha bantu banyi ne bantu bebe, nengenze tshimanyinu etshi makelela
Benyamina udi bu nkashama udi ne luonji, udi udia bintu dinda, ne dilolo udi ubiabanya
Alona wakambila Mose ne, Mukelenge wanyi, kuteki bualu bubi kutudi, bualu bua tuetu tuakuenza buhote, tuakuenza bualu bubi
Bikaleye mufutshile nyama au bua kuenza n andi mudimu, mushinga wakumufutshileye neukumbane
Yeye wakambila Mose ne, Meme tatu ebe muenu, Yetelo, nakukuluila ne mukashi webe ne bana bandi ba balume babidi

Binuasangana disua dia nyunyu mu nshila ku mutshi anyi ha buloba, ne bana ba nyunyu anyi makela bidimu, ne mukashi wa nyunyu udi ushikama ha bana anyi ha makela, kanuangatshi mukashi wa nyunyu ne bana bandi kabidi; nulekele mukashi wa nyunyu tshianana, kadi nudi mua kudiangatshila bana ba nyunyu; nunku malu enu neikale mimpe, nenuvudishe matuku enu
Tudi tukulomba ne: wanyishe bua tuye mu tshipela, tuende luendu lua matuku asatu bua kulambula Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu milambu
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Batuangaji bamiamine mashi a mbuji awu ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Mukalenga awu, kikadi muenyi, muntu wa tshisamba tshikuabu to
Bobo nebikale ba tshijila kudi Nzambi wabo, kabanyangishi dina dia Nzambi wabo, bualu bua bobo badi bafila milambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia nunku bobo nebikale ba tshijila
Bakumuka mu Litema, bakashikama mu Limona pelese
Mu dituku dia dikumi ne anai dia ngondo eu ku dilolo, nebadie mu tshikondo tshiaku, bobo nebenze bu mudi mei onso ne mikenji yonso bia kuhita kua Yehowa
Mêyi malongolodi adi aleeja bulongolodi, Kapangu ka kulu ka disungidila dia ditunga
Kamushintakashi nansha, nyama muimpe ku nyama mubi anyi nyama mubi ku nyama muimpe, biashintakasheye nyama ku nyama mukuabo, nyama eu ne nyama wakashintakasheye handi nebikale bia tshijila
Kutangidi panyima, kuimanyi pa muaba
Tuyaya mu tshipela, tuenze luendu lua matuku asatu bua kulambula Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu milambu idiye musue
Kupatulabu Miriyame mu mitanda lumingu lujima
Kanuibi, kanudingidianganyi, kanushimianganyi
Pashishe Abimeleke kuambila Sara ne: Nempeshe tutuebe nkanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole tshinunu, bua bantu bonsu baudi nabu bajadike ne: wewe kuena muenze tshilema to
Alona neoshileku musenga wa manananshi dinda ne dinda hayeye kulongolola minda
Yehowa avudishile bintu biandi disanka, itabushe mudimu wa bianza biandi: atshibule nyima ya bantu badi bahika ku mpala kuandi, ne ya badi n andi lukuna bua kababiki kabidi
Nenku, bua bubi buenu, ndi nnunyoke bidimu makumi anayi
Elazare, muana wa Arone, uvua musele muana wa Putiyele
Kuenzabu pabu tshishima atshi
Kadi netufuile ku mesu kuebe, netujimishe buloba buetu kabidi bualu kai
Ebu mbuloba bua Bena Lefa
Nowa kuashila Maweja Nangila tshilambuilu
Mukelenge wandi wakamona ne, Yehowa udi n andi, ne Yehowa wakadi mumuendeshe diakalengele mu tshianza tshiandi mu malu onso akenzeye
Bantu bonsu kuitaba ne: Netuenze bionsu bidi Maweja Nangila muambe
Yeye kuandamuna ne: Eyowa, tuyaya amu nende
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale, Ahila muana mulume wa Enana
Amukose mutu, awoshe pa tshilambuilu
Dituku dia muanda mutekete, muena nsudi awu asukule bilamba biende, akungule nsuki, miedi, makiki ne boya buonsu budi pambidi pende
Mu dituku adi Yakoba wakumusha mbushi ya bimpanga yakadi ne matoba, ne mashina a mbushi akadi ne matoba, ne mikoko yonso yakadi mifike, wakabika mu bianza bia bana bandi balume
Hakahita matuku asatu, Yosefe wakabambila ne, Enzai nunku nushale ne muoyo, bualu bua meme ndi ntshina Nzambi

Kukumi mutshima webe ku mukashi wa mukuenu, anyi ku nsubu wa mukuenu, anyi ku budimi buandi, anyi ku muhika wandi mulume anyi ku muhika wandi mukashi, anyi ku ngombe wandi anyi ku mpunda wandi anyi ku tshintu tshionso tshia mukuenu
Moshe kufika munda bikole bua diandamuna diabu adi
