Hakabuela Mose mu tshitendelelu, difutu diakahueka, diakimana ku mbelu kua Ntenta ne Yehowa wakayikila ne Mose

Wewe neutusumbishe bia kudia ku argent bua tuetu kudia; Utuhe mai a kunua ku argent, bua tuetu kunua, anji kuitabusha bua tuetu tuhite ku makasa; bu muakatuenzela bana ba Esau ne Bena Moaba badi bashikama mu Ala, tô ne hatuasabuka Yadene mu buloba buakatuha Yehowa, Nzambi wetu
Nudi mua kulombela bantu ba bende bintu ebi; kadi bintu bionso bidi muan enu mulume n abi, nuenu nenubilekele
Abimeleke wakambila Isaka ne, Umuka kutudi, bualu bua wewe udi ututamba bukole
Bana abu bavua baluangana bikole munda mua mamuabu
Yeye kena udinyanga nansha, bualu bua yeye udi muntu munene munkatshi mua bana babo
Kanuena nutujana tuetu to
Lua, tunuishe tatu wetu nvinyo, netulale n andi, bua tuetu tulelele tatu wetu bana
Meme nengendakane munkatshi muenu, nengikale Nzambi wenu, ne nuenu nenuikale bantu banyi
Kakuanyisha bua bena Izrayele bumuke to
Pashishe muntu awu udi mua kutuadija kunua maluvu
Kadi nuvua nukimina kujana muntu wanyi Moshe bua tshinyi
Haditshiha mulume kudi Yehowa, anyi halayeye mulayi wandi, yeye kena mumanye mua kulekela dî diandi, yeye nênze mei onso akaluhuka mukana muandi
Yakoba wakamba ne, Anji kuditshiha kundi diambedi
Bitupa bia teletwale bidikadile abi bidi tshimenga, komina, seketela ne musoko wa bamfumu
Ke muvua Maweja Nangila mubutule bionsu bivua ne muoyi pa buloba, kutuadija ku bantu ne ku bimuna, ku nyama minene ne mikese, ne ku nyunyi idi ibuka mulu
Katataka wewe ubafundile musambu eu, wayisha Bena Isalele bonso musambu; uteke musambu eu mukana muabo, newikale bu mumanyi wa bualu buanyi kudi Bena Isalele
Ke muvuabu mua kuenda butuku ne munya
Pikala mulambu awu wa kuosha, nulambule munyinyi ne mashi pa tshilambuilu tshia Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Wewe newangate bintu ebi ku bianza biabo, ubioshile ha tshioshelu bu mulambu udi utua dihembu dimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa, udi mulambu udibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia
Pavua Moshe wela tshianza mulu, bena Izrayele bavua bapita bena Amaleke bukole
Mona, nengihate Bena Amole ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse ku mpala kuebe
Yehowa wakambila Mose mu tshihela tshia Sinai ne, Ubale bana ba Lewi ku nsubu ya batatu abo ne ku meku abo ubale bana ba balume bonso ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu
Kadi bantu badi bannange, batumikile mikenji yanyi, nembanange, mbenzele bimpe too ne ku ndelanganyi tshinunu
Nunku mashi andi adi ashala ha bilamba bienu
Leu wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu ne bibidi, wakalela Seluga
Bantu bonso nebunvue mei abo, nebatshine, kabena benza malu a tshitshu kabidi

Nanku katuena bafike mu ditunga dia bena Amone, ne mu misoku yonsu idi ku luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yaboke, ne mu bimenga bionsu bidi pa mikuna, ne miaba ivua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu munkandike bua katufikimu
Genese Yuda ne Tamâ Mu matuku au Yuda wakumuka kudi bana babo, wakaya ku di Muena Adulama dina diandi Hila
Yehowa wakamana ku sungula dituku, makelela Yehowa nênze bualu ebu mu buloba
Abalahama wakashikama mu buloba bua Bena Peleshete matuku a bungi

Muntu mubanji kena ne bualu bua kufila tshintu tshidi tshilamba tshituha tshia nshekele bunene, ne muntu muhele kena ne bualu bua kufila tshintu tshidi tshilamba tshituha tshia nshekele bukese, hanuafila kuha kua Yehowa bua kuhikula mioyo yenu
Padi muena Izrayele ulambula Maweja Nangila mulambu wa bintu biosha muiku, wikale amu wa mikata misopakaja ne mafuta, nansha wa tuampa tukese tulaba mafuta, kabiyi biela buanga bua mampa to
Aba mbana balume ba Benyamina ku meku abo Bela ne meku a Bena Bela; Ashabele ne meku a Bena Ashabele; Ahilama ne meku a Bena Abalama; Shefufama ne meku a Bena Shefufama; Hufama ne meku a Bena Hufama
bulongolodi butangila bibutshilu bia lupetu ne midimu yabi ne ya difila dia mishinga ya kashintu ;
Nanku kena kabidi ne mikiya
Arone kuolola diboku ku mutu kua mayi onsu mu ditunga dia Ejipitu

Abrame kumuka mu tshitupa tshia kuinshi mu ditunga dia Kenaane, wenda wikisha too ne ku Betele, too ne ku muaba uvuaye mumane kuikisha matuku makese kale, pankatshi pa Betele ne Ayi, muaba uvuaye muase tshilambuilu

Beena Bukalenga bwa polovensa badi mwa kubumbusha ku mudimu mu tshibûngi anyi ku muntu ku muntu pa nkayenda, pikala dilomba dia ditangilula anyi dia didiombola difila kudi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa ditabijibwe

Njila mwibîdi : Bidi bitangila bukalenga bwenji bwa mêyi Kanungu ka : Bukalenga bwenji bwa mêyi badi nabu kudi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidi tshikala ne bibambalu bibidi: Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa ba mabala
Tshiena mua kubutula bionsu bidi ne muoyi musangu muibidi bu mumvua muenze emu
Abalahama wakabuela mu ntenta lubilu kudi Sala wakamuambila ne Wangate bihiminu bisatu bia bukula lubilu, usangakashe, ulambe mikata
Binuamba mei malelela, nuitabushe bua: umue wenu ashale musuikibue mu nsubi wa lukanu, kadi bakuabo benu baye kuenu ne bia kudia bualu bua tshiole tshidi mu nsubu yenu
Bualu bua bisamba ebi binudi nuihata nunku bakadi bunvue mei a bena dijimbu ne a batempi ba mbuku; kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kena witabusha bua nuenu nuenze nunku
Tuyaya nabi bionsu, bualu tuyaya kutendelela nabi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu
Kanungu ka Bukalenga bwa polovensa badi babutwangaja kudi Nguvelenela, tshindonda tshia Nguvenêla ne ba minisitila ba polovensa
Bantu bonso ba ha buloba nebamanye ne, Nuenu nudi nubikidibua ku dina dia Yehowa; bobo nebanutshine

Bana ba Zebuluna ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita; bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Zebuluna binunu makumi atanu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama mai
Nutumikile, nuenze malu onso ne mei onso anakuteka ku mpala kuenu lelu
Amu mukaji neapete dinyoka, pikalaye muenze bibi
Ndi mmanyisha bantu bunene buende
Nanku Sheme ne Yefete kuangata tshilamba tshia Nowa, kutshibuikila pa makaya abu
Bakamba ne, Mulume au wakatukonka bua malu etu mene, ne bua bana betu ne, Tatu wenu utshidi ne muoyo, anyi
Tshikondu atshi, Ismayele uvua ne bidimu dikumi ne bisatu
Mfumuanyi Abrahame uvua mungambile bua meme kuditshipa, yeye muteleje, bua tshikebedi muanende Izake mukaji wa mu ditunga dia Kenaane, muaba udi mfumuanyi musombe
Kadi tshivua mubambile dina dianyi dia Maweja Nangila to
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nenjimishe bantu banakafuka ha buloba, ne bantu ne nyama ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ne nyunyu ya mulu, bualu bua mutshima wanyi udi munyingalale bua nakabifuka
Nunku bobo ne bantu bonso bakalamata kudibo bakaya mu Muaba wa Bafue hakadibo ne muoyo, ne buloba buakabuikila mukana muabu ku mutu kuabo, ne bobo biakajimina munkatshi mua tshisumbu

Bikaleye kayi ne mushinga wa muana wa mukoko, alue biandi ne nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi anyi mputu nyunyu ibidi, umue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, muakuidi munene neayifile bua kumubuikidila n au bubi, ne yeye neikale mulengeshibue
Nebapete bintu bia kudiabu kuukuta
Nomba Milambu ya Buatshia buatshia Ek

Kadi bakashi benu ne bana benu bakese ne bimuna ndi mumanye ne, Nudi ne bimuna bia bungi nebishale mu misoko nakanuha, tô ne haha Yehowa baha benu dikisha bu nuenu, ne bobo badi bahiana buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ubaha, dishiya dia Yadene; hashishe nenuhingane muntu ne muntu ku buhianyi buandi bunakamuha
Sila wakalela Tubalakana, yeye wakadi mutudi wa tshiamu tshia mitaku ne tshiamu tshifike, muakuny andi mukashi wakadi Nama
Diba adi, neanufuile luse
Tshianana nudi mua kufua kabidi bua mibi yabu yonsu
Kakuena muntu udi mua kuambangana nende to

Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe bua amanyishe kabidi bena Levi ne: Pikala bena Izrayele bafike ne tshia dikumi tshindi munupeshe atshi, nuenu nkayenu numushe kabidi tshia dikumi ku tshia dikumi atshi bua kutshindambula
Tshibangidilu Abrahame udi witaba bua kulambula Mvidi Mukulu Izake Izake mumane kukola, Mvidi Mukulu kuteta Abrahame
Mose wakabambila ne, Muntu kabishiyi tô ne dinda
Eyowa, patuikala bakumbaje bimpe mikenji yonsu ivua Maweja Nangila mutuambile, netuenze anu bidiye musue
Muhika wakambila Isaka malu onso akenzeye
Padi matuku awu muanda mutekete ajika, mutuangaji neakenkete muntu awu tshiakabidi
Kadi kuandamunaye ne: Kumpala kua meme kudia, nganji kunuambila bualu bundi muende nabu
Kadi wewe wakamba ne, Ndi mumanye dina diebe, ne wewe wakasangana luse ku mesu kuanyi
Neubueshe mitshi ai mu nkanu idi ku nseke ya mushete, bua kutuala n ai mushete
Wakakanga nkata ya makalu, kabakamanya mua kuya bimpe, Bena Ejipitu bakamba ne, Tunyeme bietu ku mesu kua Bena Isalele, bualu bua Yehowa udi ubaluila nvita yabo, udi uluangana ne Bena Ejipitu
Hakatshia butuku, Yehowa wakatangila bisumbu bia Bena Ejipitu mu ditutu diakadi ne dinkenke dia kahia, wakabatshinyisha
Apingaje tshintu tshivuaye muibe, munyenge, muangule, nansha tshi wabu batekesha kudiye, nansha tshintu tshivuaye muditshipe mitshipu ya dishima bua kutshipeta ne budimu
Pavua bantu bajuka ne mushete wa ndondu, Moshe uvua wela diyi dikole, wamba ne: Maweja Nangila, juka, bua bena lukuna bebe bamuangalake, baluishi bebe banyeme
Moshe kolola tshianza mulu, midima mikole kuenzeka mu ditunga dia Ejipitu matuku asatu
Nanku kushipaye muena Ejipitu, kumujibikila mu lusenga
Pikala muenyi udi kumbelu kuebe musue kuenza tshibilu tshia Dipita dianyi, nuteke bantu balume bonsu, ne bana mene, ba mu diku diabu panshi, bua bikale bu bena Izrayele
Lebeka wakabandisha mesu andi kabidi ne hakatangileye Isaka, yeye wakatuluka ha nyima ha kamelo
Kuangataye matempu onsu a mu Ejipitu, kadi nangananga matempu mimpe nkama isambombu
Nzambi wakunvua di dia nsongalume, ne muanjelo wa Nzambi wakela dî kudi Hagâ difume mu diulu, wakamukonka ne, Hagâ, bualu kai budi bukutonda
Etshi ntshidimu tshia disanka dinene, netshikale tshidimu tshia tshijila kunudi, nenudie bintu bidi bidimenena mu madimi
Yosefe wakatuebesha ne, Kujingulula kua malu kakuena kudi Nzambi, anyi
Bikala tshintu tshikese tshia munyinyi wa tshijila anyi tshia bidia bishale tô ne ku dinda, wewe neutshioshe mu kahia, kabatshidi, bualu bua tshidi tshia tshijila
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama isambombo ne makumi atanu
Kuluishabu kabidi bena Ori bavua ku mukuna wa Seyire, kubipata too ne ku Ele Parane pabuipi ne tshipela

Lewitiki Mikenji bualu bua Bena Nsudi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Bikala muntu ne tshiuja tshikese mu dikoba diandi anyi tshilamulamu anyi ditoba ditoke tô, bikala bintu ebi bu disama dia nsudi, nebalue n andi kudi Alona muakuidi anyi kudi umue wa bana bandi balume bakuidi

Bobo bakanyenga buloba buandi, ne buloba bua Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, bakelenge babidi ba Bena Amole, bakadi dishiya dia Yadene kudi diba dihatuka; ku Aloê udi ku butshika bua tshibanda tshia mai a Ânona tô ne ku mukuna wa Sileona dina dikuabo ne Hêmona , ne buloba buonso bua Alabâ dishiya dia Yadene ku esete tô ne ku dishiha dia mai a Alabâ kuinshi kua mukuna wa Pisega
Meme ke udi mumupe muoyi wa tshitunu, yeye ne balombodi ba mu bukalenga buende bua mmone mua kuenza bishima bionsu ebi mu ditunga diende
Abrahame ne: Ndi ngakula musangu wa ndekelu, kufiki munda
Diba adi neakungule nsuki
Wewe neukole ukulakaja, ufua ne disanka ne ditalala, ulonda bankambua bebe
Hakumuka Mose ku mukuna wa Sinai ne mabue abidi a mei a dihungila mu bianza biandi, hakahuekeye nunku, Mose kakamanya ne musunyi wa ha mpala handi wakakonka bualu bua yeye wakadi usomba ne Yehowa
Butu abu nebuandamuke lupuishi mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu
midimu ya didimukila mvula ne ntuangajilu mupiluke wa midimu ya dipima bunene ne mupimbu wa buloba, ya dizola dia misoko ne ya dizola dia misulu;
Palô wakamba ne, Monai, bantu bakukumbana ba bungi mu buloba, ne nuenu nudi nulekesha midimu yabo
Mu ditunga dia Kenaane, tuyaya kuenza tshinyi
, bu mudi nkanu ya mu muaba wa tshijila
Bakumuka ku Hô, bakashikama mu Salemona
Muntu yonso udi uhidia kunvua mei anyi adiye wamba mu dina dianyi, meme nenkose tshilumbu tshiandi
Yeye wakambila mukashi ne, Nentambe kuvudisha didinyenga diebe ne kuimitshishibua kuebe neulele bana ne didinyenga, mutshima webe newikale kudi mulume webe, yeye neikale ne bukokeshi ku mutu kuebe
Yeye wakabakudimuna ne, Nyaya Nunku bakatuma muan abo Lebeka ne muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi ne muhika wa Abalahama ne bantu bandi
Yeye wakabakoma nyima, wakadia, ne yeye wakatshinguluka kudibo, wakayikila n abo, wakakuata Shimeona, wakamusuika ku mesu kuabo
Izake uvua musombe mu tshitupa tshia kuinshi tshia ditunga dia Kenaane
Ekesode Mabue a Mikenji Mafundibue Tshiakabidi Dut
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udibo basungula udi utwadija mudimu mu matuku dikumi adi alonda dipatula dia bipeta bia ndekeelu bia masungula a Mulombodi wa Ditunga

Yoketana wakalela Alamodada ne Shelefe ne Hasamaweta ne Yela ne Hadolama ne Uzala ne Dikela ne Obala ne Abimaele ne Shiba ne Ofi ne Hawila ne Yobaba bantu aba bonso bakadi bana balume ba Yoketana Mukalu wabo wakadi ku Mesha mu nshila wa ku Sefa, to ne ku mikuna mile ya ku esete
Wewe mukoshi wa nsambu munene wa buloba bujima, kuena mua kukosa nsambu bibi to
Dituku diwafika kabidi apa, udi ufua
Ndi ntshijadika ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo ne nyunyu ne bimuna ne nyama yonso bidi n enu bintu bionso bia ha buloba biakaluhuka mu buatu
Tshikutu tshia kapia ne ndimi yaku kupitabi pankatshi pa bitupa bia nyama bivua Abrame mupande abi
Ditumibwa dia muntu ewu didi dia matuku makumi asatu adibo mwa kwambulula musangu umwe epele
Kuangataye mukoku wa tshimpanga awu, kulambula Mvidi Mukulu pa muaba wa muanende Izake
Neakuakuile bua kufu to
Abalahama wakamba ne, Tangila, nakukuata bualu bua kusomba ne Yehowa, meme ndi bu luhuishi ne butue
Kubamanyishaye bionsu bivua bimuenzekele abi
Asakidile kabidi ne tshia bitanu tshimue tshia mushinga wa bintu abi
Kadi bu muvua Abrahame muambile bantu ne: Sara mmuanetu wa bakaji Abimeleke, mukalenga wa bena Ngerare, kuangata Sara bua ikale mukajende

Nanku, misangu yonsu idibu bosha mafuta pa tshilambuilu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, nebafile kabidi tshibelu ne tshiadi, babiela mulu, babinyukule Pashishe wewe ne ndelanganyi yebe, nubiangate, nubidie, bualu mbintu bivua Maweja Nangila munupe kashidi, bu muvuaye mumane kuamba
Hashishe nengumushe tshianza tshianyi, ne wewe neumone nyima wanyi; kadi kuena mua kumona mpala wanyi
Baluishi benu nebanubutule
Tshisamba kai tshidi ne nzambi ha buihi n abo bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, hanuaulukila
Wakakenzakana, kakamona muntu, wa kashiha Muena Ejipitu, wakamusokoka mu lusenga

Genese Yakoba Udi Wangata Disanka dia Isaka Dituku dikuabo hakadi Isaka muntu mununu ne mesu andi akadi bileshileshi, kakamanya mua kutangila bimpe, yeye Wakabikila Esau muan andi, muan a bute, wa kamuambila ne, Muan anyi Yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Wakangata makalu nkama isambombo masungula, ne makalu onso makuabo a mu Ejipitu ne tuhita tua makalu onso
Mesu a Isalele akadi bileshileshi bualu bua bununu buandi, yeye kakamanya mua kumona bimpe Yeye wakalua n abo ha buihi n andi, yeye wakatuangana n abo mishiku, wakabuhukila
Noa wakenza muanda yonso yakamuambila Yehowa
Bantu bonsu bavua ne bua kuamona
Bana balume ba Yuda, Ele ne Onana; Ele ne Onana bakafua mu buloba bua Kanâna
Biwasumba muhika, Muena Ebelu, yeye neakukuatshile mudimu bidimu bisambombo, ne tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete yeye neahete budishikaminyi hatuhu
Hashishe Abalahama wakahingana kudi bansongalume bandi, bakabika, bakaya bonso hohamue ku Be sheba, Abalahama wakashikama mu Be sheba

Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso akusankishe akukumbashe, akuvuishe bana ba bungi bua wewe ulue tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu, akuhe wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe disanka dia Abalahama, bua wewe kuhiana buloba buakalaya Nzambi Abalahama
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuihatshile bisamba abi ku mpala kuenu bituha bituha: kanubashihi tshikondo tshimue, bualu bua nyama ya muitu neyikumbane munkatshi muenu
Ke padiye mubashipele mu tshipela
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi ne bukookeshi bwa kwakula
Mose wakaya ne bualu ebu ku mpala kua Yehowa

Ebi mbintu biakajidilabo n abi tshioshelu mu dituku diakelabo manyi ha mutu hatshi kudi bukelenge ba mu Isalele malonga masalame a argent dikumi ne abidi, ne malonga a ndondo a argent dikumi ne abidi, ne nkutu ya or dikumi ne ibidi; bujitu bua dilonga disalame dimue buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne bua dilonga dia ndondo dimue nshekele makumi muanda mutekete, ne argent yonso ya bintu ebi bionso yakadi nshekele binunu bibidi ne nkama mai bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu; ne nkutu ya or dikumi ne ibidi yakadi miule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, bujitu bua nkutu ne nkutu buakadi nshekele dikumi bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, or yonso ya nkutu ei yakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi abidi; ne mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia wakadi balume ba ngombe dikumi ne babidi, bimpanga dikumi ne bibidi, ne bana balume ba mikoko ba tshidimu tshimue dikumi ne babidi, ne mulambu wabi wa bukula, ne mbushi ya mpumbu ya mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi dikumi ne bibidi; ne mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala wakadi balume ba ngombe makumi abidi ne banai, ne bimpanga makumi asambombo ne mbushi ya mpumbu makumi asambombo ne bana balume ba mikoko makumi asambombo ba tshidimu tshimue
Yeye wakanyema ne bintu bionso biaka diye n abi, wakabika, wakasabuka musulu wa Pelata, wakabisha luendu bua kuya ku mukuna wa Gilada
Yeye kakamujingulula bimpe bualu bua bianza biandi biakadi ne miosa bu bianza bia muan abo Esau, nunku yeye waka muvudishila disanka
Lemeke mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama makumi muanda mukulu ne bibidi, kulelaye muana wa balume
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ubale bungi bua bintu biakangatabo ne bia bantu ne bia bimuna, ne wewe ne Eleazâ muakuidi ne ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo mu Isalele

Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kumubuikidila n au bubi buakenzeye, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue, tshituha tshia bukula tshidi tshishale netshikale tshia muakuidi, bu mudibo benza ne mulambu wa bukula
Kuyaye kualeja bena Izrayele
Wakenza bualu bubi ne, Udi ukumina mukuenu tshinyi
Bûngi bwa batshipwita ba mu polovensa bateeka amu nanku mu diumvwangana kabweena mwa kupita pa tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia bûngi bwa beena Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa
Bena Amole bakadi bashikama ku mikuna bakaluhuka kunudi, bakanuihata bu mbulubulu, bakanunyemesha mu Sei tô ne ku Hôma

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata mulangala, usangishe bantu bonso ne wewe ne Alona mukulu ebe, wewe wambile dibue didi ku mesu kuabo, dihatule mai, wewe neubahatuile mai ku dibue, wewe neubanuishe mai ne bimuna biabo
Anu dituku adi
Enza biebe buatu ne mutshi wa gopher, enza nsubu mikese munda mua buatu ne laba kamonyi munda mua buatu ne ku nyima kuabu kabidi
Mvidi Mukulu akuambuluishe
Tshisamba tshia Yuda:

Enzelai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshioshelu ne mabue adibo kabayi basonge; nuenu nenuoshilehu Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, milambu; nenufile kabidi milambu yenu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, nenudieku; nenusanke ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Mvua muambule ku bianza mabue avua ne mikenji ya ndondu

Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kukolesha ne kujadika, ne diambulwisha dia tulasa, dimanya dia maalu ne ditangalaja, dineemeka dia mapa a bantu bônso, budikadidi bwa nshindameenu ne makanyika a mweena mwaabo adibo bafunda mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi
Nuenu kanumuki ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena bua kanufu nansha, bualu bua manyi akela Yehowa adi ham bidi henu Bakenza bu muakamba Mose
Nanku pikala bena Izrayele bonsu bumvua bualu ebu, nebatshine
Mukenji umue newikale kûdi ne kudi muntu muledibue mu buloba buenu ne muenyi udi ushikama munkatshi muenu
Lota wakaya ne Abalama, ne yeye wakadi ne mikoko ne bimuna ne ntenta
Nanku dituku dia muanda mutekete, mutuangaji neakenkete muntu awu kabidi
Ndi nebe, nenkulame ku njiwu yonsu, kabidi difutu diebe nedikale dinene
Hanakalua kudi Palô mu dina diebe, yeye wakenzela bantu aba bibi, ne wewe kuena muanze kusungila bantu bebe nansha kakese
Bobo nebakukuatshishe bua bintu bia mu ntenta wa kusambakena, ne mu mudimu wonso wa Ntenta muenyi kalu ha buihi n enu

Wewe neushikame mu buloba bua Goshene, newikale ha buihi n anyi, wewe ne bana bebe ne bana ba bana bebe, ne mikoko yebe ne ngombe yebe ne bintu bionso biudi n abi, nenkudishileku bualu bua bidimu bia tshiole bidi bishale bitanu; kanulu bu bahele, wewe ne bonso badi mu nsubu webe ne bintu biudi n abi
Kanukudimunyi mitshima yenu kudi mpingu, kanudienzedi mpingu ne tshiamu tshiakengululabo mu kahia ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kadi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kuenza kabidi tshitunu
Udi kabidi ne tshia kufuta bitadi biende
Nanku bena Izrayele kuvulangana, kushala bantu bakole
Nyunyi ayi ivua mikilangane panshi minyungulule mitanda, mutantshi wa luendu lua dituku dijima, mienza mushiki bu metre mujima
Abimeleke kuambila Abrahame ne: Ditunga dianyi ndikulekele, wase muaba uudi musue
Padi dituku dia muanda mutekete dikumbana, mutuangaji mumone ne: muntu awu udi ne disama mubidi mujima, ambe ne: muntu ewu mmupie mikiya, bualu udi ne disama dia nsudi
Moshe udi wakuila bantu Pashishe meme kudiela panshi kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Nanku bena Kenaane mbamane kumvua muudi wewe Maweja Nangila wenda ne tshisamba tshiebe tshia bena Izrayele, umonangana nabu mpala ne mpala
Ndi muteke muanzankongolo wanyi mulu, newikale bu tshimanymu tshia tshihungidi hankatshi hetu ne buloba
Mukalenga wa bena Sodome kuambila Abrame ne: Mpingajila meme bantu banyi, wewe ushale ne bintu

Tuetu tuakulua ne mulambu wa Yehowa, bintu biakangatabo kudi mundi ne mundi, bintu bia or ne nkanu ya ku mikolo ne nkanu ya ku maboko ne tukanu tua ku munu, lukanu tua ku matshu ne tukanu tua ku nshingu, bualu bua kubuikidila n abi bubi buetu ku mesu kua Yehowa
bweena ditunga,ngikadilu ne bukubi bwa beenyi;
Yeye neangate kudi Bena Isalele mpumbu ya mbushi ibidi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne tshimpanga tshimue tshia mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Muaba au wakidikibua ne, Tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bualu bua tshisumbu tshia mamuma tshiakakosamu Bena Isalele
Mêyi a ditunga adi ne tshia kuleeja mushindu wa kusanka ne mapa aa

Wakaha bana balume ba Gêshona makalu abidi ne ngombe mai, bu muakadi mudimu wabo wakaha bana balume ba Melali makalu anai ne ngombe muanda mukulu bu muakadi mudimu wabo wakenzabo, ku tshianza tshia Itamâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona mei a kuya n au kudi Bena Isalele ne kudi Palo, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, bualu bua kuhatula Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Ivua mu nzubu mua mukalenga, mu nzubu mua balombodi ba mu bukalenga buende, ne mu nzubu ya bantu bonsu
Sarayi kukengesha Agare bikole too ne padinyemenaye kuya mu tshipela
Nuvuluke bu muakenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Miyama mu nshila hanuakalubuka mu Ejipitu
Tatuabu kavua mumanye bionsu bivua bienzeka abi to
Bualu mmulambu wa kudikobolola nawu
Dina dia musapa wa kumpala didi Pishona; wowu udi munyingulule ditunga dijima dia Avila
Nundambule kabidi milambu ya bobumue
Bantu badibu babadike bua benze mudimu mu bisumbu bia tshiluilu, nebabalombole kudi mfumu wa tshisamba tshiabu: Mfumu wa bena Efrayime: ke Elishama, muana wa Amikude, ne bantu bende
Padi muntu upatula biana, udi ne bua kuowa mayi mubidi mujima
Yosefe wakambila bana babo ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu andi ne, Nendianjile kudi Palô, nemmuambile ne, Bana betu bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wanyi bakadi mu buloba bua Kanâna bakulua kundi
Tuhita tua bantu ne tupitene tuakaya kudi bantu, tuakabambila ne, Palo wakamba ne, Tshiena nnuha bisonsa
Moshe udi usungula bakulu bakoshi ba nsambu Butshia dinda, Moshe kusomba bua kumvua bilumbu bia bantu

Biadieye tshituha tshia munyinyi wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala tshidi tshishale tô ne ku dituku disatu, kabena bitabusha mulambu wandi, kabena baubala, netshikale bu tshintu tshibole, ne mundi udi udia munyinyi neadituadile bubi buandi
Mukalu wa bena Kenaane uvua mutuadije ku Sidone too ne ku Ngerare pa buipi ne Ngaza
Nanku muntu yonsu wa kunudi, mulume nansha mukaji, kakuikala nkumba, too ne ku bimuna bienu
Meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Muakuidi neabioshe ha tshioshelu etshi ntshintu tshia kudia tshidibo bafila bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu, dianyi dionso ndia Yehowa
Ndi mfuila bantu luse bua mibi yabu, ne bua ditomboka diabu
Hakaluabo n andi, yeye wakatumina tatu andi muenu dî ne, Nakimita difu kudi muena bintu ebi, ujingulule nfumu wa bintu ebi, kakanu ka ku munu, ne mionshi ya ku maboko ne tshibangu
Wakenza mbote ya tshiamu tshia mitaku makumi atanu bua kutuangasha bilulu bia nsubu bu nsubu umue
Difutu diakumuka ku mutu kua Ntenta, ne tangila, Miyama wakadi mûle tente ne disama dia nsudi mitoke to Alona wakatangila ne Mîyama wakadi mûle tente ne nsudi

Nebangate tshilulu tshia bleu, nebabuikile hatshi bitekelu bia minda ne minda, ne bintu bidibo bajima habi minda, ne tuhanza tua mishila ya kahia, ne bihanza bia manyi adibo bakuatshisha n au minda nebateke minda ne malonga ne bintu ebi bionso mu tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge, nebabiteke ha mitshi ibidi idi mikuatakasha
Unudi nujana ki ngArone nansha
Ivua mikile panshi, mipafikishe fitutuu
Milambu ya mufuki wa tshintu ne ya mwena lungenyi lufuka badi bayijadika ne bayikuba kudi mêyi a ditunga
Utangila ditunga dijima dia Sodome ne Ngomore, kumonaye muinshi ubanda mulu bu wa tshikutu tshia kapia
Bakenza nkanu ya or ibidi bakayiteka ku luseke lua tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi luakadi lutuangane ne efoda

Nenudie bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, mu tshikondo tshinakasungula mu ngondo wa Abiba bualu bua nuakaluhuka mu Ejipitu mu ngondo au muntu kalu ku mesu kuanyi ne bianza bituhu, nenudie bidia bia disanka hanuahuola bintu bia kumudilu binuakakuna mu madimi, nudie bidia bia disanka kabidi kunshikidilu kua tshidimu hanuashikisha kusangisha bintu bionso bia mu madimi
Ku nzubu yonsu kudibu badie munyinyi awu, nebalabe mashi ku dibaya didi kulu kua tshiibi ne ku mabaya adi ku nseke yatshi
Mutuangaji akobolole muena Izrayele awu anu mushindu ewu bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Yeye wakungambila ne, Ndi muana wa Betuele, muana wa Naho, wakamulelela Mileka, nunku nakumuluatshisha kakanu ka ku diulu diandi ne nkanu ya ku maboko
Yehowa wakamba ne, Teka tshianza tshiebe mu tshiadi kabidi
Kadi ndelanganyi ya Esawu kubashipa, kubanyenga ditunga adi, kusombamu

Pashishe, batuangaji balambule Maweja Nangila bintu ebi: mafuta onsu adi malamate ku bia munda, tuonyi tubidi ne mafuta onsu adi malamataku, mafuta adi malamate ku mulemba, lutandatanda ludi ku mutshima ludibu balamuna pamue ne tuonyi
Buludi buatshi buakadi coudées itanu ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées itanu, ne bule buatshi bua mulu buakadi coudées isatu
Tshihungidi tshia Abalahama ne Abimeleke Mu tshikondo atshi Abimeleke ne Pikola, kamanda ka masalayi andi, bakambila Abalahama ne, Nzambi udi n ebe mu malu onso audi wenza
Butoke kuenzekabu
Meme ndi mua kudisha bantu aba bonso munyinyi kudi kunyi
Mmumue ne: Mua bana , bualu yeye udi mamu wa bonsu badi ne muoyi
Kadi bayende kena mumujikidile ne mulume

Mose wakashikisha kuambila Bena Isalele bonso mdi â onso; yeye wakabambila kabidi ne, Tekai mei onso anakunuambila lelu mu mitshima yenu, mei onso a mikenji mene mudi nuambila bana benu bua bobo kuyenza
Mvidi Mukulu kutabeja mesu a Agare
Mpasu ayi neyikile panshi, ipafikishe fitutuu
Bantu bonso bakatangila makubakuba ne miele ya nvula ne di dia mpungi ne muishi ha mukuna, hakamonabo malu â, bakatshina, bakimana ha bule
Mayi avua apueka anu kupueka
Shaula wakafua ne, Balahanana, muana wa Akabo, wakadia bukelenge bua ndi
Yeye Wakabikila tumelo binu hanshi ku butshika bua musoko hehi ne mushimi wa mai dilolo ha diba diyaya bakashi bua kusunabo mai
Kupeshaye bena Ngershone matempu abidi ne ngombe inayi, bua bibambuluishe mu mudimu udibu nawu
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Enza tshishima etshi bua bena Izrayele bitabe, bajadike ne: meme Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua babu, wa Abrahame, wa Izake ne wa Yakobe, ndi mukumuenekele
Tshintu tshionsu tshidi bena Izrayele bafila kundi bua kashidi ntshiebe wewe kabidi
Kanulambi muana wa mukoko mu mabele a mamu wandi
Dinanga dia Isalele kudi Yosefe diakatamba dinanga diandi kudi bana bandi bonso, bualu bua yeye wakadi muana wakaleleye ku bununu buandi, wakamulelela tshikowelu tshia maboko male

Mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi Bua kulambula mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi, nuenze nunku: Anu bana ba Arone ba balume ke badi mua kuela bintu abi mulu, kumpala kua tshilambuilu, kubinyukula bua kubilambula Maweja Nangila
Yehowa neanutumme biusha bibi ku binu bienu ne ku mikolo yenu, ne ku munda mua makasa tô ne mu lubombo lua mutu: disama didi kadiyi mua kuondahibua
Bakadi babakibua kudi ba mu meku a bana balume ba Manashe, muana mulume wa Yosefe, buhianyi buabo buakashala mu tshisamba tshia meku a tatu abo
Katshia meme tshiena mubenzele bibi
Badi batshilombola kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga
Muana wa mukalenga ubulula tshisaka, kumonaye muana wa balume udila
Kumupa kabidi bikanu bibidi bia ku maboku, tshikanu tshionsu tshivua ne bujitu bupite pa gramme lukama
Tshibangidilu Badi bipata bantu mu lupangu Nyoka uvua mudimuke mupite nyama yonsu ivua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu mufuke
Mpindiewu ndi mumvue miadi ya bena Izrayele badibu bakuate mu bupika kudi bena Ejipitu
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Nenkumbashile tunkanunuina biebe, tuikale bia bungi, kabena mua kutubala bua bungi bualu
Padi kanyama kafue kaponena pa tshintu kampande, bu mu ditshiwa, tshintu atshi netshipie mikiya
Lelu udi ungipata pa buloba
Eyowa, nukumbaje mikenji yonsu indi nnuambila
Bantu badi bamba malu malelela, babenga mabuejila ubateke bakulu badi ku mutu kua bantu tshinunu, lukama, makumi atanu too ne kua bantu dikumi

Kanungu ka Pa kumbusha tusumbu tukese twa matuku mala ne twa pa bwâtu, bibambalu biônso bibidi bidi mwa kushimika kamwe anyi tusumbu twa bûngi tudi tusambakaja bantu bûngi bwa momumwe nseka yônso bwa kutwangaja ngelelu wa meeji padiyo kayiyi ipetangana pa mwanda udi ukengela ne tuswika dîyi dimwe mu ngakwilu wa momumwe
Nunku bakabikila muaba au ne, Besheba bualu bua bubidi buabo bakaditshihilaku
Bakayila ku luseke lua sude, bakafua ku Hebelone, ne Ahimana ne Sheshai ne Talemai, bana ba Anaka bakadimu
Ke panudi nundomba bua kuya kulambula Maweja Nangila milambu
Moshe kukosa tshimpanga atshi muminu, kumiamina mashi atshi ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Muanabute uvua Nebayote, balonda kudi Kedare, bamutua mu nyima kudi Adbeyele ne Mibsame, Mishema, Duma, Masa, Adade, Tema, Yeture, Nafishe, uvua mushile Kedma dibela

Bikalaku mushikankunde utshidi kamama, udi mubangila kudi mulume, ne muntu mukuabo udi usangakena n andi mu musoko, udi ulala n andi; hashishe nebalue n abo bubidi buabo ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko au, nenubakume ne mabue tô ne hafuabo; mushikankunde, bualu bua yeye kakadila hakadiye mu musoko, ne mulume, bualu bua yeye wakanyanga mukashi wa muena mutumba n andi: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Bukalenga bunene budi bwambula majitu aabu kumpala kwa Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga bilondeshila makanyika mafila mu tunungu twa ne
Mamu a ndi wakamuambila ne, Mulau webe wikale ha mutu hanyi, muan anyi, anji kutumikila di dianyi, Ulue ne nkungulu ya mbushi
Mukuna wa Sinai wonso wakadi ne muishi, bualu bua Yehowa wakahueka ha mutu hau mu kahia, muishi wakabanda bu muishi wa tshikutu, mukuna wonso wakakanka bikole
Nanku bena Izrayele bavua ne mudimu wa kutangila bantu, pakumvuabu ne: Nuenze madiotu anu bungi bua tshibidilu, bu munuvua nuenza matuku onsu patuvua tunupa bisosa, kupangabu tshia kuenza
Kubasanganabu basombe ku muelelu wa mayi manene makunze, pabuipi ne Pi Hahirote, batangilangane ne Baale Sefone
Neufile muana wa mukoko mukuabo dilolo, neumufile ne mulambu wa bukula ne mulambu wa kunua, bu muwakenza dinda, bu mulambu wa dihembu dimpe, mulambu udibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia

Hanuahanga, kanuyi nutumikila mikenji yonso yakambila Yehowa Mose, malu onso mene akanuambila Yehowa mukana mua Mose ku dituku diakanuheye mikenji yandi tô ne ku bikondo bionso bidi ku mpala, bikala bualu buenjibue ku mpukahuka, bantu ba tshisumbu kabayi babumanye, bantu bonso nebafile muana mulume wa ngombe bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia bua kutuisha dihembu dimpe kudi Yehowa, ne mulambu wandi wa bukula ne mulambu wandi wa bintu bidibo banua, ne muana mulume wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, bu mudi mukenji wamba
Ekesode Mikenji ya Dia Lumingu Mose Wakabikila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, wakabambila ne, Â mmalu adi Yehowa musue nuenu nuenze
Umukankamike, bualu yeye ke wafikisha bena Izrayele mu ditunga edi
Kumpala kwa kusomba mu nkwaasa, nguvenêla udi umanyisha Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa ndongamu wa bukalenga bwende
Nuambile bena Izrayele bonsu badi bapia mikiya ne: Kanusemenyi pabuipi ne muaba wa tshijila

Nzambi wakabisankisha, wakabambila ne, Nulelangane, nukumbane ba bungi, nûshe buloba tente, nubukokeshe, nuikale ne bukokeshi ku mutu kua minyinyi ya mu mai, ne nyunyu ya mulu, ne tshintu tshionso tshidi ne muoyo tshidi tshiendakana ha buloba
Bobo bakadikuma hanshi, bakamba ne, Nzambi, Nzambi wa mioyo ya bantu, wewe newikale ne tshisumbu tshonso tshiji bua bubi bua mundi umue, anyi
Netutshimune bantu bonsu abu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe ha buloba bua Ejipitu, bua kutuala mikumbi mu buloba bua Ejipitu, neyidie bintu bionso biakashala ku mabue a nvula
Ei idi ndelanganyi ya bana balumeba Noa Sheme ne Hama ne Yafete, bobo bakalela bana balume ku nyima kua nvula munene
Kadi utshidi anu uditambisha, ubenga mua kutekela bantu banyi
Biangatshile ku dituku adi, bena Izrayele kuboya dinda dionsu biakudia bikumbane, bua muntu yonsu kudia kuukuta
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Olola tshianza pa mayi manene, bua mayi apingane, abutule bena Ejipitu ne tshiluilu tshiabu

Kanulumbuluishi bantu ne dilumbuluisha didi kadiyi diakane; kanutangidi mpala ya bantu; kanuitabushi bintu bia kunubueshilabo n abi; bualu bua bintu bia kunubueshilabo n abi bidi bifofomesha mesu a muena lungenyi, bidi binyanga dilumbuluisha didi diakane

Palo enze biandi bualu ebu kabidi, asungule tuhita tua mu buloba, tusangishe tshintu tshitanu tshia bintu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba bua Ejipitu mu bidimu ebi muanda mutekete bidi buloba bulua ne bintu bia bungi
MUTU WA MUKANDA XI: Bidi bitangila bulongolodi bwa tshisabu ne bwa ndekeelu

Bana ba Benyamina ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita; bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina binunu makumi asatu ne bitanu ne nkama mai
Bidimu bia Malaleyele bidi nkama muanda mukulu makumi tshitema ne bitanu

Wambile bena Izrayele bonsu ne: Bangabanga ne kumuka mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, nuenu bonsu balume ne bakaji, nulombe kudi bena mutumba nenu, bintu bienza ne mpawungi nansha ne tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole
Badi mwa kubikilamu mwena bukalenga bunene mukwabo yônso

Bana ba Shimeona, ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo muntu ne muntu, balume bonso ku bidimu makumi abidi to ne ha mutu, bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona binunu makumi atanu ne tshitema ne nkama isatu
Adi akanyika ne atuma dîyi kudi bamfumu ba Mbulamatadi, kudi bamfumu bônso baludiki ba mianda ya mbulamatadi ne ya bilumbulwilu bia bantu bônso ne bia basalayi, ne kudi muntu ne muntu
Dituku dikuabu kupitshilaye mu tshipela too ne ku Orebe, mukuna wa Mvidi Mukulu
Bulongolodi bwa tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi budi butangila, bilondeshila dishintuluka dia mianda, beena Bukalenga bwa polovensa
Bintu ebi mmajitu a bana balume ba Kohata mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Mvidi Mukulu muena kulu uvua mukuambuluishe bua wewe kutshimuna baluishi bebe atumbe
Nzambi wakamona bintu bionso biakenzeye ne biakadi bimpe be
Bantu bakaluhuka, bakâsangisha, bakâhela mu biamu ne mu binu, bakâlamba mu bivuadi ne mai, bakalamba n au mikata, akashemakana bu manyi mahia mahia

Nuenu bakumbaje bimpe mikenji ya Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu, indi nnuambila lelu eyi, nuenu bamunange, bamuenzele mudimu ne muoyi wenu mujima ne bukole buenu buonsu, nealokeshe mvula anu pa diba diende, bua nupete biakudia bimpe, ntete ya bungi ya kuenza bukula, maluvu a mvinyo, ne mafuta
Kuyifilaye kudi muntu bua amone mudi muntu uyinyika mena
Kadi, bia munda bionsu, ne bikonu bia ngombe, babisukule mu mayi
Muakuidi udi ufila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia wa muntu mukuabo, yeye mene neangate tshiseba tshia mulambu wa kuosha udiye ufila
Mu masanka awu, mwuluke bena Levi banudi nabu mu bimenga bienu, bualu kabena ne wabu muaba wa bumpianyi munkatshi muenu
Meme nengumushe mesu anyi kunudi, nenuhone ku mpala kua bantu badi n enu lukuna, bantu badi n enu lukuna nebanukokeshe, nenunyeme tshianana, bantu kabayi banze ku nuihata
Elemu mafuta, atekepu ne musenga wa kamonya, bualu mmulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi
Bana babo kabakamanya mua kumuitaba, bakadi batshina ku mesu kuandi

Wakazola bilongo bia amande ne tuhanza tusatu tuakadi ku mutu kua mahu a tshitekelu, ne tshihunga tshia or ne tshilongo, wakazola bilongo bia amande ha tuhanza tuakadi ku luseke lukuabo, ne tshihunga ne tshilongo, wakenza matu asambombo nunku
Dituku disatu: Eliyabe, muana wa Elone, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Zebulone
Mulume udi wenda masandi ne mukashi wa mulume mukuabo, nebashihe mulume ne mukashi wake ndeye n andi masandi
Nutahulule bintu bituha bibidi, tshituha kudi bena nvita bakaya mu nvita ne tshikuabo kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne tshitema ne nkama isatu
Bena majimbu ba bena Ejipitu kupanga mushindu wa kumonangana ne Moshe, bualu bavua ne maputa bu bena Ejipitu bonsu
Moshe ne Arone kuya kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, kuenza muvua Maweja Nangila muambe
Padiye usangana dikeji dienda dikepela, kadiyi ditampakane pambidi, mutuangaji neajadike ne: muntu awu uvua amu ne tshiuja
Kena wa mamu to
dipingaja dia beena bilumbu mwabo, diya kusomba mu ditunga dia benda, dipatuka dia mu ditunga diebe, difila dia pasepolo ne viza;
Lufu lua Isaka Matuku onso a Isaka akadi bidimu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu
Mvidi Mukulu kukenketa bintu bionsu bivuaye mufuke, kumonaye ne: bidi bimpe bitambe
Bidimu bia Kenaane bidi nkama tshitema ne dikumi

Salai wakambila Abalama ne, Bubi buanyi buikale kûdi wewe nakafila mukashi muena mudimu wanyi mu tshiadi tshiebe, ne hakamoneye ne, Nakuimita difu, yeye wakundengulula, Yehowa alumbuluile tshilumbu tshidi hankatshi hetu n ebe
Yehowa neanuhe bintu bia bungi bia disanka, ne bia kukumbasha kua bana, ne bia kukumbasha kua bimuna ne bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa bankambua benu bua kunuhabu
Kuandamukadi nyoka
Olodanase ya Mulombodi wa Ditunga idibo bapatwila maalu aa badi bayitwa tshiâla tshibîdi ku dia bakaji kudi Minisitila kavulambedi
Abioshe bionsu pa tshilambuilu

Mikenji idi itangila minyinyi ya milambu Pashishe Moshe kuambila Arone ne bana bende ba balume babidi, Elazare ne Itamare, bavua bashale ne muoyi ne: Angatayi bukula budi bushale bua ku mulambu uvuabu balambula Maweja Nangila
Bakatulula nsubu wa tshitendelelu hanshi, ne bana balume ba Gêshona ne bana balume ba Melali, bakadi batuala nsubu, bakaya ku mpala
Bakenza bintu ebi bionso ne ntalanta wa or nkayandi
Kadi nundombele kudi Mvidi Mukulu wenu, angele lupemba
Ubuele ne nyama milume muanda mutekete ne mikaji muanda mutekete idi kayiyi ne mikiya

Halua dî diku dia muanda mukulu nealue biandi ne nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi anyi mputu nyunyu ibidi kudi muakuidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena muakuidi neafile umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, neamubuikidile bubi buandi buakenzeye bua muntu mufue, neajidile mutu wandi dituku adi mene
Nudi ne bua kumusha kabidi tshibelu tshia luseke lua balume lua nyama wa mulambu, kutshipesha mutuangaji
Noa Udi Wenza Buatu Eku nkulondolola kua malu a Noa
Tatuende muenu wa Moshe kumuambila ne: Mushindu uudi wenza mudimu kawena mukumbane to
Hakaya Mose ku tshitendelelu, bantu bonso bakabika, bakimana muntu ne muntu ku ntenta wandi, bakatangila Mose tô ne hakabueleye mu Ntenta
Meme nempueke, nensombe n ebe, nengangate Nyuma udi kûdi, nembaheye, nenukuatshishangane bua kutuala bujitu bua bantu aba, wewe kuena ubutuala nkayebe
Bikala mulambu wandi wa kuosha wa nyunyu, yeye neafile nansha nyunyu wa nkutshi nansha mputu nyunyu
Wakadidika ne, Sitena
Aba mbana ba balume ba Esau, aba mbakelenge babo, eu udi Edome

Neafile umue wa nyunyu wa nkutshi anyi wa mputu nyunyu udiye mua kuangata umue wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo wa mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bukula, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua muntu udiye musue kulengesha ku mpala kua Yehowa
Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka beena bukalenga bunene bakwabo ne udi ubumbusha mu midimu yabo padibo bamulomba kudi Minisitila kavulambedi
Mose ne Alona bakaya kudi Palô, bakamuambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu, udi Wamba ne
Mpadi munanga mushia mu mpanga telejayi, Babikila wa mikusu mwena nsonsu witabè, Babela wa muntu wà mutu wà teleja die bie
Meme nentue nende ndondu wa kashidi kabidi ne ndelanganyi yende yonsu

Numanye kabidi ne, Nendombe bulami bua mashi enu, nembulombe kudi nyama yonso ne kudi muntu yonso, nendombe bulami bua muoyo wa muntu hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu Muntu yonso udi umatshisha mashi a munga muntu hanshi, nebamatshishe mashi andi hanshi, bualu bua Nzambi wakafuka bantu mu tshifuanyikishi tshiandi

Bena Lewi nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha balume ba ngombe wewe neufile umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa, bua kubuikidila Bena Lewi bubi buabo
Bana ba balume ba Geshona: Libini ne Shimei, ku meku abo
Bana balume ba Alama badi Usa ne Hula ne Gete ne Masha
Matuku a Tela akadi bidimu nkama ibidi ne bitanu, Tela wakafua mu Halana

Bena musoko bakamukonka bua mukashi wandi, ne yeye wakabambila ne, Yeye udi muan etu wa bakashi Bualu bua yeye wakatshina mua kuamba ne, Yeye udi mukashi wanyi, bua bena musoko kabamushihi bua Lebeka, bualu bua yeye wakadi miumpe kumona
Yehowa udi muena nvita, Yehowa ndina diandi
Tshiakukukuatshila mudimu bualu bua Lakele, anyi
Kuambaye ne: Maweja Nangila atumbe, bualu uvua mukuambuluishe, mukupatule mu tshinyangu tshia bena Ejipitu ne tshia mukalenga wabu
Bonsu badi bakuela lupemba, nembele
bulongolodi budi butangila ngikadilu wa midilu, wa madimi ne meetu, bumunyi,bidibwa bia munyinyi ne bia bisekiseki;
Dituku dibidi Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Tshibuashibuashi tshienzeke munkatshi mua mayi, bua kupandulula mayi adi muinshi ne adi mulu

Kadi, pikala Maweja Nangila mubenzele bualu budi kabuyi buanji kuenzeka, pikala buloba bumine, bujibikile bantu abu ne bena meku abu, ne bintu biabu, baye mu kandondu ka bafue, batshikale ne muoyi, nanku nenujadike ne: mbasendeke Maweja Nangila
Bafika muaba uvua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile, Abrahame kuenza tshilambuilu, kutekapu nkunyi
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne bisambombo ne nkama itanu
Gamaliele, muana mulume wa Pedasû, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe
Lea wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpa bintu bia bungi, katataka bayanyi neashale n anyi bualu bua meme nakamulelela bana ba balume basambombo, wakamuidika dina ne, Zebuluna
Moshe kutshiela mu mayi
Mose wakamba ku mesu kua Yehowa ne, Mona, meme ndi muena tshikukumina, Palo neangunvuile munyi
Alona wakasaku, bakamujika; ne Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, wakenza mudimu wandi wa buakuidi
Nenku bilamba bionsu, nansha biseba, bivua biana bimatshila, neabisukule ne mayi
Bantu kumvua lumu alu, kuzakala
Nanku Sihone ne tshikulu tshiende, kutubunda pabuipi ne tshimenga tshia Yahase
Netusabuke ne bintu bia nvita ku mesu kua Yehowa mu buloba bua Kanâna, netuikale ne buhianyi buetu dishiya dia munemu dia Yadene
Mvidi Mukulu kulama muana awu bimpe
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata bakelenge bonso ba bantu, ubowe ku mpala kua Yehowa mu munya, nunku tshiji tshikole tshia Yehowa tshiumuke kudi Bena Isalele
Bakumuka mu Sukota, bakashikama mu Etama, udi ku butshika bua tshihela

, ne dilongu diondoke dia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, dikale dia bujitu bua grame , bilondeshile tshipimu tshidi muaba wa tshijila malongu abidi aa, avua ne bukula busambakaja ne mafuta bua mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi
Tera kushala ne muoyi bidimu nkama ibidi ne bitanu, kufuila mu Arane
Neumukume ne mabue, neumushihe; bualu bua yeye wakakeba mua kunusesuisha mu nshila wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu
Nanku muntu uvua ne disama, neasukule anu bilamba biende bua kikadi ne mikiya to

Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Nunku Bena Ejipitu nebunvue lumu elu, bualu bua wewe wakahatula bantu aba munkatshi muabo ne bukole buebe, bobo nebamanyishe bena buloba ebu Bobo bakunvua lumu ne, Wewe Yehowa udi munkatshi mua bantu aba, bualu bua wewe Yehowa udi umuenyibua mpala ha mpala, ne ditutu diebe didi dimana ku mutu kuabo, ne wewe utu waya ku mpala kuabo ne difutu didi ne diledi mu munya, ne difutu didi dikenka ne kahia butuku
Nuenu nutumikile mei onso adi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuambila; kanusesuki ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Nanku tshiakufikila kabidi bena Izrayele bonsu munda to
Nanku muntu awu neasukule amu bilamba biende bua kikadi ne mikiya
Dîba adi tshilumbulwilu tshidi tshipangadika bwa kutangila nsambu bantu kabayipu to
Biafila balume aba bu mudi bantu bonso bafue, anyi biabakuata bualu bu mudibu bukuata bantu bonso, nunku Yehowa kena muntume
Kakuena mukuabu utudi ne bua kutshina
Bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebele mpungi, mpungi neyikale bu mukenji, ku bikondo bienu bionso tshiendelele

Muntu yonso udi ulenga tshianza ham bidi ha bintu ebi neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo; muntu yonso udi utuala tshituha tshia mubidi mufue wa bintu ebi, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Netanele, muana mulume wa Suâ, wakadi ku mutu kua Bena Yisakâ
Mbimpe kumukandika bua kuolodi tshianza tshiende ku mutshi wa muoyi
Longololayi nsuki yenu bimpe
Dikanga dia midimu ya tshibidilu anyi ya pa bwaayi badi badindija kakuyi ditontolola bwa kumona mwa kulonda, pikalabio bienzeka, bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka
Kadi, pikala muntu amu umue mutupakane mu mpukapuka, neandambule muana wa mbuji wa tshidimu tshimue bua kudikobolola
Ku nyima kua malu au Abalahama wakajika Sala, mukashi wandi, mu lubuebue biakadi mu budimi bua Makepela ku mpala kua Mamale eu udi Hebelone mu buloba bua Kanâna
Nunku hanuahuola bintu, nenufile tshi tuha tshitanu kudi Palô ne nuenu nenushale ne bituha binai bua kukunaku kabidi ne bua kudidisha ne bonso banudi n abo mu nsubu yenu, ne bana benu bakese
MUTU WA MUKANDA VI: Bidi bitangila bishimikidi bia ditwa nabi mungalata mpanda Kanungu ka Mbâsa Kasumbu kakese kadikadile komekela mianda ya Masungulangana Ditunga kadi kamanyika mu mêyi a ditunga
Mayi kubanda, kupita mikuna mile bule bua metre muanda mutekete
Dibadika Bena Izrayele badi bafika mu Tabera Dituku dikuabu bena Izrayele bavua bajana Maweja Nangila bikole
Mikenji mishilangane idi itangila mana Moshe kubambila kabidi ne: Biakudia ebi, nubidie bijika anu dituku dimue
Nubukokeshe, nuikale bamfumu ba minyinyi ya mu mayi, nyunyi ya mulu, bimuna, bilandadi ne bionsu bidi pa buloba
Mu Ejipitu kamuvua nkita anyi
Wakela di diandi kudi muhika wandi wa ku mpala ne, Hawasambakena ne Esau, mukulu anyi, ne hakukonkeye ne, Wewe udi wa nganyi
Nenudie munyinyi nunku ne bilulu bienu biela mikaya, ne bisabata ku makasa ne mulangala ku bianza bienu nenudie munyinyi lubilu, bualu ebu budi kuhita kua Yehowa
Nyama idi ne mikiya ne idi kayiyi ne mikiya, nyunyi, kabidi ne nyama idi ilandala, kubuela mu buatu ne Nowa, mulume ne mukaji, bu muvua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile
Bungi bua Bena Lewi bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona bu muakambila Yehowa, ku meku abo, balume bonso ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu, buakadi binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi
Lote ne bana bende ba bakaji Lote uvua ne buowa bua kushala mu Soware
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, Nashona muana mulume wa Aminadaba
Nuvua basombe mu ntenta yenu, numutombokela, nuamba ne: Maweja Nangila mmutupatule mu Ejipitu bua lukinu
Muntu yonsu wa ku bantu nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu banudi nabu, ikale ne mbabula, elemu musenga wa kamonya, afike nende kudi Maweja Nangila

to, Tshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshipwita mukulumpa kêna mwa kwikala popamwe: a mweena Bukalenga bunene; b mweena tshishimikidi tshia ditwa mpanda ku mungalata c mweena bilwilu, bumpulushi ne midimu ya bukubi bwa bantu; d bundumbulula; e mweena mudimu mushindame wa mbulamatadi; f mulombodi mushindame wa telitwale, pa kumusha bamfumu ba musoko, bisamba ne bifuku; g mutumibwa wa mbulamatadi mwikala utshidi ku mudimu, h mweena mu nzubu wa mudimu wa Mulombodi wa Ditunga, wa minisitila kavulambedi, wa Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia ba tshipwita munwamfwanka , wa Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa, wa beena mu bukalenga bunene ne, mu tshibûngi wa mfumu wa tshidiidi anyi wa buludiki bwa mbulamatadi, mweena mudimu mu kumpanyi wa mbulamatadi anyi mu kumpanyi ya bubanji busanga; i mudimu mukwabo ônso udibo bateeka muntu musungula
Nanku, ku batentekedi bonsu bavua Moshe mutume, anu Yoshuwa ne Kalebe ke bavua bashale ne muoyi
Bualu Maweja Nangila mmumane kumvua muadi wa dikenga diebe
Ndelanganyi ya Kayine Kayine kubuelela mukajende mu nzubu
Tshibangidilu Abrame kumuka mu Ejipitu, kupingana kabidi mu ditunga dia Kenaane mu tshitupa tshia kuinshi

Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Tshiakuambila miloho yebe kabidi iwakuntumina ne, Biampa Balaka nsubu wandi mûle tente ne argent ne or, tshiena mumanye mua kuya ku mpala kua dî dia Yehowa, bua kuenza bualu buimpe anyi bualu bubi mu mutshima wanyi, nenkuambile mei onso adi Yehowa ubambile, tshiakayambila nunku, anyi
Bakambilangana ne, Tusungulai bietu kapitene, netuhingane mu Ejipitu
Mweena lukanu yônso badi ne tshia kumwangata mu mushindu wa kulaminyina mooyo wende, bukole bwende bwa mubidi ne bwa lungenyi ne kabidi mushinga wende
Nakabaha tshituha tshia mulambu wanyi wa kuosha ha kahia, tshintu tshidi tshitambe tshijila bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu ne mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji
Kubakonkaye ne: Munyinyi ewu wa mulambu udi Maweja Nangila munupe, kanuena baudile muaba kampande wa tshijila bua tshinyi
Yeye wakenzaku tshitendelelu, Wakabikila dina dia Yehowa, waka shimikaku ntenta yandi, ne bahika ba Isaka bakimbaku dina dia mai
Moshe kutuluka ku mukuna
Kuambilabu Moshe ne: Tuetu tudi ne mikiya, bualu tudi balenge bitalu
Patshivuaye ne muoyi, kupeshaye bana bavuaye mulele ne bakaji bakuabu, biabu bintu bia bumpianyi
Bumuka aku, kuyabu ku Yotbata, muaba udi misulu mishilangane
Kanunugu ka : Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi wimana wambila beena ditunga mianda
Kanungu ka Mêyi malongolodi adi aleeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa midimu ya mbulamatadi ya bukalenga bunene, ya polovensa ne ya bitupa bia teletwale bidiludika
Umue wa kudibu kulaya Abrahame ne: Tshidimu tshialonda, ngondu wa momumue nempingane kuebe eku
Nemmone muanza nkongolu mvuluka ndondu undi mutue ne bionsu bidi ne muoyi pa buloba
Mayi manene kubuikila bena Ejipitu
Ubande biebe ku mutu kua Pisega, bandisha mesu ebe ku luseke lua ku wesete ne lua ku nôde ne lua ku Sude ne lua ku esete, tangila ne mesu ebe, bualu bua wewe kuena usabuka Yadene eu
Udi mumanye mua kubala bana ba Yakoba nganyi
Kuhidi kubingisha muntu muhele mu tshilumbu tshiakane tshidiye n atshi bualu bua buhele buandi

Ukuate mudimu webe matuku asambombo, wenza midimu yebe yonso; kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete didi Lumingu lua Yehowa, Nzambi webe: dituku adi kuenji mudimu, nansha wewe nansha muan ebe mulume nansha muan ebe mukashi, nansha muhika webe mulume nansha muhika webe mukashi, nansha ngombe webe, nansha mpunda webe, nansha bimuna biebe, nansha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuebe; bualu bua muhika webe mulume ne muhika webe mukashi nebikishe bu wewe mene
Bintu bia bena Levi Maweja Nangila kuamba kabidi ne: Bena Levi badi bangenzela mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, difutu diabu ke tshia dikumi tshimue tshia bintu bionsu bidi bantu bapeta mu Izrayele
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona, Shelumiele muana mulume wa Sulishadai
Biahatuka tufina mu mubidi wa muntu, biatuidileye muntu udi muakane lute, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Nanku kanuyi to
Mvidi Mukulu kumuambila ne: Meme ndi Mundi
Nempeshe bena Ejipitu muoyi mukole wa tshitunu bua banulonde
Bena Izrayele nebitabe malu audi ubambila
Anu mu buloba bua Goshene muakadi Bena Isalele, mabue a nvula kakadiku
Muambi yonsu, nansha muntu udi Mvidi Mukulu uleja malu, padiye unumusha kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, uvua munupatule ku bupika mu Ejipitu, numushipe

Mu ngondo muibidi mu dituku dia dikumi ne anai ku dilolo nebakuvuluke, nebadie mampa adi kâyi ne luevene ne matshitshi adi ne bululu, kabashiyi tshintu to ne ku dinda, kabatshibudi nansha mufuba umue, nebenze bu mudi mikenji yonso ya kuhita kua Yehowa
Luse kumuenza
Kora ne bonsu bavuaye nabu kuitababu

Muntu au, mukelenge wa buloba, wakabambila ne, Ku bualu ebu nemmanye ne, Nudi nuamba mei malelela, nushiye umue wenu kundi, bakuabo benu bangate bia kudia bia kumana n abi tshiole tshidi mu nsubu yenu, yai bienu
Mwâna yônso wa mabela pa ludimi udi mwa kumanya mêna a tatwende ne a mamwende
Maweja Nangila kungambila kabidi ne: Ndi mujadike ne: bantu aba mbantombokele
Budimi abu ne lubuebue luvuamu, Abrahame kubiangata kashidi, bena Iti bonsu bamone
Nomba Bisamba Bibidi ne Tshituha Bidi Bishikama ku Esete wa Yadene Dut
dijalamija dia ditunga dijima;

Kanulondi nzambi mikuabo ya bantu badi ha buihi n enu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi wa mukau, bua tshiji tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, katshikadi kunudi, ne bua yeye kanujimishi ha mutu ha buloba
Nanku, dinda dionsu bavua basakidila bintu abi ku mulambu wa kuosha
Dibungama divuaye nadi bua lufu lua mamuende Sara kujikadi
Banupeshe mayi, nowe ku makasa, nuikishe kuinshi kua mutshi ewu
Kadi kajadika bululama bwa ngenzelu wa masungulangana ne wa dikonkoloja dia beena ditunga

Nebateke tshilulu tshia bleu ha mutu ha tshioshelu tshia or, nebâteke ha mutu hatshi tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge, nebabueshemu mitshi ya tshioshelu nebangate malonga onso adibo benza n au mudimu wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu nebâteke mu tshilulu tshia bleu, nebâbuikde ne tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge, nebâteke ha mitshi ibidi idi mikuatakasha Nebumushe butue ku tshioshelu, nebatekehu tshilulu tshikunzubile nebâteke ha mutu hatshi bintu bionso bidibo benza n abi mudimu watshi ne malonga a kahia ne nkobo ya munyinyi, ne nkasu, ne bihanza ne malonga onso a tshioshelu, nebâteke tshibuikilu tshia biseba bia nkonge, nebabueshemu mitshi yatshi
Nuye kudikuata
Pashishe kukonkaye nsongakaji ne: Ungambile: udi muana wa nganyi
Malu onso akalua bu muakambeye, bakampingasha mu mudimu wanyi, kadi bakowa muntu mukuabo
Mose ne Eleazâ muakuidi ne bakelenge bonso ba mu tshisumbu bakaya bua kusangakena n abo ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Moshe kuambila bena Izrayele malu awu
Nanku tshiakuikala kabidi ne tshilumbu tshia kunyoka bena Izrayele badi basemena pabuipi ne muaba wa tshijila to
Kahia katemene ha tshioshelu ku dituku ne ku dituku, kakajimi nansha
Enza tshitekelu ne bintu ebi bionso ne ntalanta umue wa or mutambe buimpe
Moshe uvua musue kumanya tshivuabu benza ne mbuji wa mpumbu wa mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Mulume wandi udi mumanye mua kujadika kudi tshiha kuandi kuonso anyi mei andi onso, anyi udi mua kumusha malu au ne malu a hatuhu
Nunku nakenzela mushete wa mitshi ya acacia, nakasonga mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi, nakabanda ku mukuna ne mabue abidi mu tshianza tshianyi
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Mahalelela, Kenana wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi anai, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Matuku onsu bivua amu nanku: divuba dibuikila nzubu, dikenka bu kapia butuku
Pagiele, muana mulume wa Okelana, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Ashê

Kadi mukashi ne mukashi nealombe mukashi udi ushikama ha buihi n andi, ne mukashi udi ushikama mu nsubu wandi, bintu bia argent ne bia or ne bilulu, nuenu nenubiluatshishe bana benu ba balume ne bana benu ba bakashi, nunku nenuhaule Bena Ejipitu
Pashishe Maweja Nangila kuambila Abrame ne: Meme Maweja Nangila ke uvua mukupatule mu Ure wa bena Babilone, bua kukupesha ditunga edi, dishale diebe
Kanuena mua kudia bishi bidi ne masala, bikale kabidi ne mapangu anayi
Yeye wakatuma bansongalume ba Bena Isalele, bakoshila Yehowa nyama, bakamushihela ngombe ya milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala
Bimuna kabidi bia bena Levi nebikale bianyi, pa muaba wa bamuanabute bonsu ba bimuna bia bena Izrayele

Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Wambile bana benu ne, Enzai nunku, tekai majitu ha nyima ha mpunda yenu, yai bienu ku buloba bua Kanâna; nuangate tatu enu ne bantu badi mu nsubu yenu, nuhingane kundi nennuheshe bintu bimpe bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu, nenudie bintu bidi bitamba buimpe bia mu buloba
Tshisamba tshia Binyamine:

Alona neatentekashe bianza biandi bibidi ha mutu ha mbushi udi ne muoyo, neatondele Bena Isalele mabi yabo ne disambuka diabo dionso dia mikenji ne malu mabi abo onso, neatentekashe malu mabi onso ha mutu ha mbushi, nebamuihate mu tshihela ku tshianza tshia muntu wakasunguleye diambedi, mbushi neatuale bujitu bua mibi yabo mu muaba wa hatuhu, neihate mbushi mu tshihela
Bimenga biabu bidi bialabale
Mose wakamba ne, Adi kadiena dî dia bantu badi bahita bakuabo bukole, ne kadiena dî dia bantu bakutambibua bukole, ndi munvue mutoyi wa bantu badi bimba misambu
Wakudia mamuma a mutshi unakukuambila ne, Kudi, anyi
Kadi bana benu bakese banuakuamba ne, Bobo nebafue ku miele ya nvita, nendue n abo, bobo nebamanye buloba bunuakuhidia
Hashishe mulangala wa muntu unakusungula newele ntonga, meme nenshikishe kutontolola kua Bena Isalele kudibo bakutontolola

Nzambi wakambila Abalahama ne, Kabena babikila mukashi webe, Salai kabidi, nebamubikile ne, Sala, nemmuvudishile di sanka, yeye neakulelele muana mulume, nemmusankishe bulelela, yeye neikale nkambua wa bisamba bia bungi, ne bakelenge ba bantu nebaluhuke munda muandi
Mamuende kumuselesha mukaji wa bena Ejipitu

Mikenji ya bena Levi MIKENJI YA PA MILAMBU Mulambu wa kuosha Pavua Maweja Nangila mu ntenta wa kusambakena, kubikilaye Moshe, kumuambila bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Padi muena Izrayele ulambula Maweja Nangila mulambu wa nyama, asungule ngombe, mukoku nansha mbuji
Nanku, makopu onsu dikumi ne abidi avua ne bujitu bua grame
Arpakshade kulela Shela, Shela kulela Ebere
Pashishe meme kuambila balumbuluishi bua bakose bilumbu bia bantu mushindu ewu: Nuteleje bilumbu bia bana benu bimpe
Nsongalume wakadiku, wakaya lubilu, wakamanyisha Mose ne, Eladada ne Medada badi bamba dî dia Nzambi mu tshitudilu
Badi babasungula mu tshipungu tshibîdi ku Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa
Mvidi Mukulu kumona ne butoke budi buimpe, kupandukaye butoke ne midima
Neyikale misoko ya kunyemenamu kudi Bena Isalele, ne kudi muenyi udi munkatshi muabo, hashiha muntu muntu mukuabo ku mpukahuka, neanyemenemu
; bena Ngershone bavua
Uvuluke matuku a lumingu, wakale ne ditshina mu nsubu wanyi meme ndi Yehowa
Nundombele kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu angumushile dinyoka edi dia lufu
Pagiele, muana mulume wa Okelana mukelenge wa bana ba Ashe, wakafua bintu dituku dia dikumi ne dimue
Kadi bobu kumuandamuna ne: Tuabengi
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Noa, Lemeke wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama itanu ne makumi tshitema ne bitanu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Wakidika dina dia muaba eu ne Betele kadi diambedi dina dia musoko diakadi Luze
Biangateye mukashi mukuabo, yeye kena mua kuhuekesha bidia biandi ne bilulu biandi ne bilele bia bantu bia kubakangana
Mose wakaluhuka mu tshitudilu ne bantu bua kusangakena ne Nzambi, bobo bakimana kuinshi kua mukuna

Kanungu ka Ngenzelu yônso, diumvwangana diônso, tshipungidi tshiônso anyi bwaalu bukwabo bônso budi bufikisha ku dipangisha ditunga, bantu bendende anyi nsanga bantu, bujima anyi tshitupa tshia mishindu yaabu ya kupandila mifumina ku makookeshi aabu anyi ku bubanji bwaabo bwa kwa nzambi, kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bwa pankatshi pa matunga butangila bibawo bia mianda ya bubanji, badi babwangata bu tshibawu tshia tshinyangu tshidi mêyi a ditunga anyooka
Mikenji eyi idi itangila nyama, nyunyi, minyinyi ya mu mayi ne bionsu bidi bienda pa buloba

Bikala tshilumbu tshinuhite bukole, nansha hankatshi ha bashihianganyi, nansha hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu badi badiakuilangana, nansha hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu badi batutangana, mmalu adibo batandangana n au mu misoko yenu; hashishe nenubike, nenuye ku muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, usungula; nenulue kudi bakuidi, Bena Lewi, ne kudi mulumbuluishi munene wa mu matuku au; nenubakonke, ne bobo nebanukosele tshilumbu
Tshidimu tshia makumi atanu netshikale tshidimu tshia disanka dinene kunudi, kanukunyi bintu, kanuhuodi bintu bidi bidimenena anyi tumuma tudi tudimenena
Neutulekele tufua bonsu, tubutuka nanku anyi
Nulabe mashi awu ku dibaya didi kulu kua tshiibi ne ku mabaya adi ku nseke yatshi
Lakele wakafua, bakamujika mu nshila wa ku Efelata eu udi Beteleheme
Nuenu bamane kumusha binudi ne bua kundambula, nuangate penu bidi bishale, bu mudi bena Izrayele bonsu bangate bintu bidi bishale ku ntete ya bukula, ku maluvu a mvinyo, ne ku mafuta
Yeye wakateka tshivualu tshia Yosefe hanshi to ne hakahingana mukelenge wandi ku nsubu wandi
Bantu bonsu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Dane badi

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu kadi katangila malomba a ditangilula ngumvwilu wa Dîyi dikulu, pa dilomba dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga , dia Bukalenga bunene, dia Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe, dia Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia Batshipwita munwamfwanka, dia tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia beena tshibambalu tshimwe ne tshimwe tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga, dia banguvenêla ba polovensa ne dia balombodi bia bimamwenda wa bukalenga bia polovensa

Mikenji idi itangila maluvu makole Maweja Nangila kuambila Arone ne: Wewe ne bana bebe, kanuena mua kunua maluvu a mvinyo, nansha a kapia, panudi nubuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bualu nudi mua kufua
