Yehowa wakakonka Kana ne, Muakuny ebe Ebele udi kudi kunyi

Bikala tatu andi kayi ne bana babo, yeye neaheshe muan abo udi umulonda mu diku diandi buhianyi buandi, yeye mene neabuhete, eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele kudi Bena Isalele, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Muntu yonso udi uhenda tatu wandi anyi mamu wandi udi ne mulau; bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Tshintu tshionso tshia dikumi tshia buloba anyi tshia bintu biakakuama mu buloba anyi tshia mamuma a mitshi, etshi ntshintu tshia Yehowa, ntshintu tshia tshijila kudi Yehowa
Meme nengikale munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, nengikale Nzambi wabo
Nunange Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, ne muoyi wenu mujima, ne mutshima wenu onsu, ne bukole buenu buonsu
Katataka ndi mumanye ne, Yehowa udi utamba nzambi yonso buene, bualu bua wakahatula bantu mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu hakabaleshabo dikamakama
majitu, bipimu ne emfolomatika;
Muakuidi nealue munu wandi mu mashi makuabo a mulambu, nealabe ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshia kahia, neahongolole mashi makuabo ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu tshia kahia
Matuku muanda mukulu akumbana, Abrahame kuteka Izake panshi bu muvua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile
Tshiyole tshia nzala kupatuka mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Wakenza mitshi ya acacia mai, wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yonso
Wakenza mesa a acacia, buludi buau buakadi coudées ibidi, ne butshiama buau buakadi coudée umue, ne bule buau bua mulu coudée umue ne tshituha
Nebangele mpata, bamba ne: Maweja Nangila kena mukumuenekele to
Kadi pavuadi dibanda kulu, bena Izrayele kubanga luendu musangu umue
Yalede wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne makumi asambombo ne bibidi, wakalela Hanoka
Muhika wakaya lubilu kudiye, wakamuakidila, wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Umpeku tuima tukese bia meme kunua
Bantu bakamusangana hakadiye wangula nkunyi, bakalua n andi kudi Mose ne Alona ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele
Efelona wakakudimuna Abalahama di ne, Mukelenge wanyi, ungunvuile budimi bua nkama mai ya nshekele ya argent budi mushinga kai munkatshi muetu
Misrayime kulela bisamba ebi: bena Lude, bena Aneme, bena Lehabe, bena Naftu, bena Patrose, bena Kaslu ne bena Kaftore
Hamona mukashi katshetshi, yeye neikale ne bukoya tô matuku muanda mutekete, ne muntu yonso udi umulenga tshianza neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Bidimu bia Yerede bidi nkama tshitema makumi asambombu ne bibidi
Nanku koleshayi muoyi, kanutshinyi
Nunku bakafunda mu mukanda dina diau Nvita ya Yehowa ne, Waheba wa mu Sufa ne tshibanda tshia Ânona, buloba budi busendama mu tshibanda ku musoko wa Ala hehi ne butshika bua Moaba
Enza mabaya makumi abidi bua kuteka ku luseke lua ku Sude lua tshitendelelu
Mose wakamba ne, Nudi nuhidia dî dia Yehowa munyi
Tshibangidilu Mvidi Mukulu udi musue kubutula bantu Pavua bantu batuadija kuvulangana pa buloba, kulelabu bana ba bakaji
Bakabisha luendu luabo ku Kibelota hatawa, bakaya ku Haselota, bakashikama mu Haselota

Au mmalu anakuambila Palô, Nzambi wakulesha Palô malu akadiye ha kuenza Monai, bidimu muanda mutekete bilualua bidi buloba bua Ejipitu buonso bulua ne bintu bia bungi, ne ku nyima bidimu muanda mutekete bia tshiole bilualua bidi bantu bahua muoyo bua bintu bia bungi biakadibo n abi, tshiole netshidie bintu bionso biakadi mu buloba, kabena bamanye bintu bia bungi mu buloba bualu bua tshiole tshilualua, netshitambe bukole
Au mmei ne mikenji bakambila Yehowa Bena Isalele mukana mua Mose mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mitangilangane ne Yeleko

Mu dîba adi, Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshidi mwa kulunguluja nansha mukanda uvwabo beenza kudi Kasumbu kakese kasanga ka bantu bûngi bwa momumwe, nansha mukanda wa ndekeelu uvwatshi tshielele tukanda, mushintulula pikalabio bienzeka kudi diakajilula dia dîyi dimwe anyi a bûngi adibo banyisha kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe

Uvuluke bantu bebe, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba; kutangidi tshitshu tshia bantu aba anyi buhidia buabo anyi mibi yabo, bua bena buloba buwakatuhatula kabambi ne, Bualu bua Yehowa kakadi ne bukole bua kulua n abo mu buloba buakahaneye ne bualu bua yeye wakadi n abo tshiji, yeye wakalua n abo mu tshihela bua kubashiha

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kubisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Gamaliele, muana mulume wa Pedasû
Kabutu kamane kujika, Arone kupingana mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusambakena muvua Moshe
Nyama yonso idi ne mikono mihanduluke ne idi ihingishilula bintu mukana ibidia kabidi, nudi mua kudia nyama ei
Nzambi yenu ibike, inukuatshishe, inulame
Badi ne bua kuenza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Noa wakalela bana balume basatu, Shema, Hama ne Yafete
Yeye wakambila bakulu ne, Nutuindile bienu kunoko tô ne ha bialua kunudi kabidi, ne monai, Alona ne Hû badi n enu, muntu udi ne tshilumbu aye biandi kudibo
Mutuangaji oshe munyinyi wa mafuta onsu pa tshilambuilu
Bakalua ku Elima kuakadi mpokolo ya mai dikumi ne ibidi, ne mabue makumi muanda mutekete bakashikamaku hehi ne mai
Dilekedibwa anyi dipeepeja dia bitadi didi mwa kwenzeka anu mu diswa dia mêyi a ditunga
Hakamba diba kubuela, tulu tukole tuakakuata Abalama monai, buowa bua midima buakamukuata
Ndi njinga se: lelu nusungule tshinudi basue: diakalenga nansha diakabi
Padi muntu udia mashi, bamuipate munkatshi mua bena Izrayele
Kadi wewe newangate ngombe mulume mukuabu bua mulambu wa kubakobolola nawu
Abimeleke wakadimusha bantu bandi bonso ne, Bialenga muntu mulume eu anyi mukashi wandi tshianza, nebamushihe
Shafate, muana wa Ori, wa mu tshisamba tshia Shimeyone
Nanku, nuenu bena Izrayele, bana benu, ngombe yenu, mpunde yenu, bimuna bienu bikuabu, nansha benyi badi ku mbelu yenu, kanuenji mudimu dituku adi
Abrahame kuambika muanende Izake tshisumbu tshia nkunyi, kukuata kela, kuambula mbabula ne makala a kapia
Padi kanyama kamue ka ku tunyama etu kapona mu luesu lua dibumba, bintu bionsu bidi mu luesu bidi bipia mikiya
Moshe kuambila Arone ne: Ambula mbabula webe, welamu makala a ku tshilambuilu
Kadi tshiadi atshi tshikale tshia Arone ne bana bende ba balume
Kumpala kua tshifulu, kuvua kulamika tshitata tshia tshiamu tshia mpawungi, tshifuane tshilongu, bilondeshile mikenji ya Maweja Nangila
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamusangana hehi ne mushimi wa mai wa mu tshihela, mushimi eu udi mu nshila wa ku Shû
Kadi bua munyinyi wa nyama wa mulambu wa bobumue, baudie ujika onsu anu dituku dimue, kauladi to
Pamona mukalenga wabu nanku, neanulekele
Bionsu abi mbintu bienu bindi munupe
Bapatula bualu tudi basue bikale bakaji betu
Adame mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama ne makumi asatu, kulelaye muana wa balume mufuanangane nende
Pashishe kutualabu kabidi mukoku wa tshimpanga wa mulambu wa kuosha
Kabidi Sara udi ne bidimu makumi tshitema, neapete muana mushindu kaayi
Kadi pavuabu batangile ku ntenta wa kusambakena, kumonabu muvua divuba dileja butumbi bua Maweja Nangila dibuikila ntenta
Umuamine manyi ha tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kuosha, ne ha bintu biatshi bionso, ujidile tshioshelu tshioshelu netshikale tshijidila
Bikala muntu mubi mukumbane bua kukumibua, hashishe mulumbuluishi neamuladike hanshi, nebamukume ku mpala kuandi; bungi bua mikumu nebuikale bu bubi buandi
Nunku bantu bakikisha dituku dia muanda mutekete
Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Kubedi mulau, kubavudishidi disanka nansha
Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, wakatangila malu onso akenzela Bena Isalele Bena Amole
Bakadila bibombi biabo hanshi lubilu, ne muntu ne muntu bakasulula bibombi biabo
Mukaji kuangata muana bua kumuamusha
Unvuai, Isalele, nubienze; bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nukumbane ba bungi, bu muakanulaya Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu enu, mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Nanku, mu matuku dikumi ne anayi a ngondu wa kumpala ewu, dilolu menemene, nenungenzele tshibilu etshi, bilondeshile mikenji yatshi ne bibidilu biatshi
Mushiki eu wikale mumanyi wa bualu ne dibue edi dikale mumanyi wa bualu, ne, Meme tshiena nsambuka mushiki eu bua kukuenzela bibi, ne wewe kuena usambuka mushiki eu ne dibue bua kungenzela bibi
Kanuyi bualu bua Yehowa kena munkatshi muenu, kanufu ku mesu kua bantu badi n enu lukuna
Nuenu bamane kushala matuku a bungi mu ditunga edi, didi Maweja Nangila munulaye, nuenu bamane kulela bana, bapete ne bikulu, kanuenji bibi to
Gamaliele, muana mulume wa Pedasû, mukelenge wa bana ba Manashe, wakafua bintu dituku dia muanda mukulu

Lewitiki Mikenji ya Bintu Bidibo Bajidila Yehowa Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Biasua mundi kushikisha kuditshiha kua kudifila kuandi, wewe neubale bungi bua bintu bidiye ufila kudi Yehowa
Mpindiewu, ndi nnuambila nuenu mikenji eyi
Bienza Muena Isalele bualu bubi ku mpukahuka budi Yehowa uhidia ne biahileye, ne hamanyeye bualu bubi buakenzeye, yeye neafile mukashi wa mbushi udi kayi ne tshilema bu mulambu wa bubi buakenzeye
Wakamba kabidi ne, Ndi bianyi Nzambi wa tatu ebe, Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Isaka, Nzambi wa Yakoba Mose wakayikila mesu andi, wakatshina kutangila Nzambi
Matuku atshidiye mudijidile awu, kena mua kudia tshintu tshipika ne tumuma tua mvinyo, nansha ntete yatu nansha bikamfu biatu
Hakatshimonabo, Bena Isalele bakakemangana ne, Etshi ntshinyi

Hanuahuola bintu bia mu madimi enu, ne kafulaminyi kadi kanukuata bua kushiya bisumbu bikuabo mu madimi enu, kanuhinganyi bua kubiangata; nebikale bia benyi ne bia bana ba nshiya ne bia bakashi ba mu lufuila; nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Bana ba balume ba Kohata ku meku abo Amalama ne Yisehâ ne Hebelone ne Uziele Bana ba balume ba Melali ku meku abo Mali ne Mushi
Aba mbana ba balume ba Seî, Muena Holi, bena buloba Lotana ne Shobala ne Sibiona ne Ana, ne Dishona ne Eze ne Dishana, aba mbakelenge ba Bena Holi, bana ba Sei, mu buloba bua Edome
Dituku dia muanda mutekete nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Kukolaye, kushalaye tshilembi tshia buta bua mbale tshia kalanda musenga
Abalahama wakafua bintu bionso biakadiye n abi kudi Isaka
Maweja Nangila neanutangalaje munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabu
Yehowa, nakuindila luhandu luebe
Dina diebe kadiakuikala kabidi Abrame to

Mona, meme nakusungula Oholiaba, muana mulume wa Ahisamaka, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana bua kumumatshisha, nakabuesha lungenyi lule mu mitshima ya bantu bonso badi ne meji bua bobo benze bintu bionso binakukuambila
Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Tufuke muntu mufuanangane netu, bua ikale mfumu wa minyinyi ya mu mayi, nyunyi ya mulu, bimuna, bilandadi ne bintu bionsu bidi pa buloba

Anu dituku adi, Abrahame kuteka muanende Ismayele panshi, kabidi ne bana ba balume bonsu bavua mu diku diende, too ne bapika bavuabu balele mu nzubu muende, ne bonsu bavuaye musumbe, bu muvua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile
Akosele muminu wa nyunyi umue pa luesu lua dibumba, luikale ne mayi a mpokolu
Wakenzela tshioshelu munyingu wa tshiamu tshia mitaku, wakatekeye munda mua mibangu ya ku mutu kua tshioshelu hankatshi, mu bule buatshi
Wewe neutele tshikowelu tshia efoda ne bilulu bia bleu
Tuyayi bua kanuvu kubutuka pamue ne tshimenga etshi
Pashishe kuyaye kuebeja Maweja Nangila
Mana avua mushindu wa ntete ya koriyandre, mitoke too, mafuanangane ne budimbu bua mutshi wa mbdeliyume
Kadi bua nuenu kumupeta, anu nuenu bamukebe ne muoyi mujima ne bukole buenu buonsu
Kenana wakikala ne muoyo bidimu makumi muanda mutekete, wakalela Mahalelela
Mu tshidimu tshia kuhuola blê, Lubena wakaya mu budimi, wakangula tumuma, wakalua n atu kudi mamu andi Lea Lakele wakambila Lea ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Umpeku tumuma tukuabo tua muan ebe
Kadi hakadi difutu kadiyi dibandishibua, kabakaya mu luendu tô ne ku dituku diakabandishibua difutu
Mose wakamba ku mesu kua Yehowa ne, Mona, Bena Isalele kabena banze kutumikila dî dianyi, Palô neunvuile muena tshikukumina kudi kunyi
Dikopu dimue dia tshiamu tshia mpawungi divua dia bujitu bua grame
Kuipatabu Moshe ne Arone muaba uvua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu

MALU lyrics Maalu katonda bakole Kutonda nkumba, kutonda ne balela Kutonda ntontodi wa nyingala pankatshi Udi kayi ne maalu ela munu mulu e Taatù wa kafwa, maamù wakaya kwabu Bana bakashala batangula ntàngu Taatù wanyì musumbi dya bilamba Muntu yônso udi ne maalu e Maamù wakafua, Taatù kutubenga Bana bakashala batangula ntàngu Maamù wanyì, mulami dya cisenga Muntu yônso udi ne maalu e Kusekiseki mwineba Maria Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Kabulu kwamba kusekiseki mwineba Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Maalu akudia ne akulwata Maalu a basanka ne makenge Maalu akulala ne kubika kwee Akwata baluma ne bakaji e Akwata babanji ne bapele Maalu akwata banfumu ba matunga Yoyoyo Kemayi Ngabilayi kwakalwa maalu Mulùme nganyi wa ditanta
Bena Ejipitu kuipata bena Izrayele mu ditunga diabu bamba ne: Umukayi lukasa, bualu tudi mua kubutuka
Kanungu ka Batshipwita munwamfwanka ba ditunga ne batshipwita bakulumpa badi ne bukookeshi bwa kutambakana kakuyi mukalu anyi dipangisha munda mwa ditunga dijima ne bwa kumupatuka
Nuenu nenuikale kundi bu bukelenge bua bakuidi, bu tshisamba tshia tshijila
Badi ne bua kukosa nyama muminu, muaba udibu bashipela nyama ya milambu ya kuosha

Lewitiki Matuku a Masanka Majalame Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nakasungula matuku andi musue bantu badie bidia bia Yehowa anudi mua kumanyisha bantu, matuku au neikale matuku a tshijila
Meme kunuambula mudi nyunyi wa tshiminyi wambula bana bende pa mapuapua, kunufikisha kundi meme
Yeye ke nkambua wa bena Amone batudi nabu lelu

Katataka wewe wakuedibua mulau mufume ha buloba buakubulula mukana muabu bua kumina mashi a muakuny ebe ku tshianza tshiebe, hawadima buloba, kabuena bukumeneshila bintu bimpe, wewe newikale munyemi ne muena tshiendenda ha buloba
Mulambu awu mbua kukobolola mfumu wa bena Izrayele bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Nebambule kabidi mionji ya ku lupangu ne biamu bikuabu bionsu bia kuenzabu nabi mudimu ku lupangu
Yakoba, tatu wabo, wakabambila ne, Nuenu nuakunjimishila bana banyi Yosefe kenaku, ne Shimeona kenaku, ne nudi nuamba kuya ne Benyamina, malu au onso adi mantonde
Wakatshiawila tatu wandi ne bana babo, tatu wandi wakamukuhulula ku di diandi ne, Etshi ntshilota kai tshiwakulota

Mu matuku au bantu banene ba nfiondo bakadi ha buloba, ne hakaya bansongalume ba bantu ba Nzambi kudi bansongakashi ba bantu ba tshianana, bakalela n abo bana Bobo bakadi bantu banene ba kale ne ba butumbi
Enza mpandu ne tulonga tukese bia tsiutekelu ne or mutambe buimpe
Batuangaji bamiamine mashi a mukoku awu ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Nashone, muana wa Aminadabe, ke uvua ulombola bena Yuda
Lewitiki Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, etshi ntshintu tshidi tshitambe tshijila
Hanuahuola tumuma tukese tua mu madimi enu a tumuma, kanutuhuodi tshiakabidi: tumuma netushale tua benyi ne tua bana ba nshiya ne tua bakashi ba mu lufuila
Nanku tuma diyi lukasa bua bantu bumushe bimuna biabu ne bintu biabu bionsu bidi mu mpata, bualu bantu ne bintu bikale mu mpata nebifue ku mabue a mvula
Hanakadi nfuma ku Padana, Lakele wakafua mu nshila wa ku buloba bua Kanâna diambedi katuyi banze kufika ku Efelata, nakamujika kuakua mu njila wa ku Efelata eu udi Beteleheme
Kuambaye ne: Muana ewu ngua bena Ebrewu
Neupete tshiakudia tshiebe anu ku tshisululu tshia mu mpala muebe, too ne pawapingana mu buloba bundi mukufuke nabu
Hakahita matuku asatu bakambila Labana ne, Yakoba wakunyema

bukumbaji, makookeshi ne lwendu lwa Njila wa : Bidi bitangila buludiki bwa mianda ya mbulamatadi Kanungu ka Buludiki bwa mianda ya mbulamatadi kabweena bubweelakana mu mianda ya tshidiidi, kabweena butwa ku tshia muntu ne kabweena ne kansungansunga
Bantu bakadi ku mutu kua Bena Isalele bakalua, bakadila kudi Palo ne, Udi wenzela bantu bebe nunku bualu kai
Tuye kumuhana kudi Bena Yishemaele, katumulengi tshianza, bualu bua yeye udi muan etu, udi musunyi wetu Bana babo bakamunvuila
Kadi matu manene nealue kukala kua buloba bua Bena Kiti, nebakengeshe Bena Ashû, nebakengeshe Bena Ebê kabidi, yeye neikale muhaudibue kabidi
Yeye wakitabusha Yehowa, ne Yehowa wakabala kuitabusha kuandi ne, Mbuakane buandi
Bintu bionso bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba bidi bibi, kanudi bintu ebi
Moshe udi usengelela Maweja Nangila bua afuile bena Izrayele luse Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ndi muenzele bantu aba bishima bia bungi bua kubaleja bukole buanyi
Yakoba wakadi ne tshiji, wakatanda ne Labana, wakebesha Labana ne, Dihanga bianyi didi hanyi, anyi bubi buanyi budi hanyi bua wakundonda lukasa nunku
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bua bobo bavuluke kuhita kua Yehowa
Bualu bua ban a bute bonso ba mu Isalele mbanyi, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, mu dituku dinakashiha ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu nakabajidila kundi
Moshe kakubuela mu ditunga dia Kenaane to Pashishe mvua musengelele Maweja Nangila ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wanyi, udi mudianjile kundeja butumbi ne bukole buebe
Kuena mua kufika kabidi apa to
Yeye wakabutula misoko ai ne mpata yonso, ne bantu bonso ba mu misoko, ne bintu biakadi bidiunda mu buloba

Hashikishabo kuvuwa tshintu atshi, muakuidi neatangile ne ditoba dia disama kadiyi diandamuke mekala, nansha bikaladi kadiyi ditampakane, tshintu atshi katshiena tshiakane, nebatshioshe mu kahia edi ndisama dia nsudi, bikala disama ku mutu kua muena dibala anyi ku mpala hadi dibala
Rebeka kudibuikila tshilamba ku mesu
Kusha wakalela Nimeloda, yeye wakabanga kuikala muntu mukole
nennuvudishile disanka dianyi tshidimu tshisambombo, ne buloba nebukuame bintu bia bidimu bisatu
Biabika muena mashimi bua kutumpila mukuabo bua malu mabi akadiye wenza, nunku bubidi buabo badi batandangana, nebimane ku mesu kua Yehowa ne ku mesu kua bakuidi ne balumbuluishi ba mu matuku au
Muaba awu, mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu kumuenekela Moshe mu ndimi ya kapia munkatshi mua tshipuka

Muakuidi nêle manyi munda mua tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi, muakuidi neamiamine ne munu wandi wa ku tshianza tshia balume manyi adi mu tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi misangu muanda mutekete ku mpala kua Yehowa, muakuidi nealabe manyi adi mu tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia muntu udiye musue kulengesha ne ku tshiala tshiandi tshia ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku muan a dikasa munene wa ku tshia nza tshia balume, ha mutu ha mashi a mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, manyi adi ashala mu tshianza tshia muakuidi, yeye neaele ha mutu ha muntu udiye musue kulengesha, bua kumubuikidila disambuka diandi ku mpala kua Yehowa

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, muakuidi neamutangile kabidi, bielanganeye meji ne disama didi diamba kushika, kadiena ditampakana, nunku muakuidi neamubueshe mu nsubu ha nkayandi matuku muanda mutekete makuabo
Bualu bua bobo nebakudimune mutshima wa muan enu mulume, bua yeye kandondi meme bua kukuatshileye nzambi mikuabo mudimu: nunku Yehowa neanukuatshile tshiji, neanujimishe lubilu
Maweja Nangila anuakidile bimpe, anupe bupole
Padiye umona mputa mu dibala mukunzubile, mufuanangane ne wa disama dia nsudi, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu awu mmupie mikiya, bualu disama dia nsudi ndimukuate ku mutu
Dîyi didi ditangila masungulangana didi dileeja mushindu wa kusakidila bûngi bwa bantu bwa masungula a batshipwita bakulumpa mu tshimenga tshia Kinshasa
Bakamba ne, Bulelela, Yehowa wakasomba anu ne Mose, anyi

Kadi bikaleye mumutahe kayi ne tshiji, anyi bikaleye muele tshintu, tshimukume, kayi mumualamine mu nshila, anyi bikaleye mumukume ne dibue kayi mumutangile, ne mumushihe, kayi muikale n andi lukuna, kayi musue kunuenzela bibi, nebalumbulule tshilumbu tshia mukuna wa muntu ne musombuedi, bu mudi mikenji ei yamba, nebasungile mushihi mu tshianza tshia musombuedi, nebamuhingishe ku musoko wa kunyemena, kuakunyemeneye, ne yeye neashikamemu to ne hafua muakuidi munene, udi ne manyi a tshijila mela ha mutu
Ngombe mulume umue, mukoku wa tshimpanga umue ne muana wa mukoku umue wa tshidimu tshimue bua milambu ya kuosha
Udi amu ne tshibangu tshia mputa wa kapia
Kabidi muana wa ku ndelanganyi ya mukaji neaboze mutu webe, wewe pebe neumusume ku tshikankanya
Kadi Yozefe ne bana babu bonsu bavua Yakobe mubuele nabu mu Ejipitu kufuabu
Bayende neamuimanyike kumpala kua Maweja Nangila bua mutuangaji amuenzele malu aa onsu
Bakasa Hebelone bidimu muanda mutekete ku mpala kua Soana mu Ejipitu
Kuambilabu Moshe ne Arone ne: Maweja Nangila mmumone bionsu ebi
Kumukabu nabi mu mitanda, bilondeshile diyi dia Moshe
Tshibangidilu Diledibua dia Ismayele Sarayi, mukaji wa Abrame, kavua mulele muana to
Nansha nanku, bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kututangila ne dîsu dikole, bilondeshila bulongolodi bufila kudi mêyi a ditunga
Ke muvua ndelanganyi ya Sheme nanku

Mulambu wa bobumue Mushindu wa kulambula Maweja Nangila mulambu wa bobumue: Padi muntu ulambula Maweja Nangila nyama wa mulambu, wimba ne musangu bua kumutumbisha, asakidile kabidi milambu eyi: mulambu wa mikata mikanga kayiyi miela buanga bua mampa, wa tuampa tukese tulaba mafuta, katuyi tuela buanga bua mampa, ne wa mikata mienza ne bukula busambakaja ne mafuta
Rebeka kudiebeja ne: Malu a mushindu ewu adi angenzekela, meme ne difu, bua tshinyi
Nzambi wakamba kabidi ne, Ambila Bena Isalele ne, NDI MUNDI wakuntuma
Kanuenji bilele bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu bunuakadi bashikame, kanuenji bilele bia mu buloba bua Kanâna bundualua kunuha, kanulondi mikenji yabo
Kadi meme nakanuambila ne, Nenuhiane buloba buabo, nennuhebu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nakanujidila munkatshi mua bantu bakuabo
Kadi bantu bakuabu bavua ne mikiya dituku adi bua bitalu bivuabu balenge
Bakenza masoso a or abidi ne nkanu ibidi, bakateka nkanu ei ibidi ku nseke ibidi ya tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi
Tuakalota bilota bubidi bualu, muntu tshiandi tshiota muntu tshiandi tshilota butuku bumue, mutuadi wa maluvu ne mulambi wa bidia bia mukelenge wa Ejipitu, bakadi basuikila mu nsubu wa lukanu
Nanku neanulekele, anuipate mene kashidi mu ditunga diende

Badi mwa kunyenga muntu bintu biende anu padibio biambulwisha bantu bônso nangananga anu bu bôbu mwa kumupingajila kumpala kwa biônso lupetu lukumbanangana bwa kumusamba bilondeshila bulongolodi bwa mêyi ne mikandu
Bantu aba bonso bakadisangisha mu tshibanda tshia Sidima etshi ntshibanda tshia Dishiba dia Mai a Luehu
Nembashihe ne disama dikole, nembahidie, nenkuvuishe wewe tshisamba tshidi tshibahita bunene ne bukole
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udibo bakwata badi ne tshia kumwambila diakamwe tshidibo bamukwatshila ne tshivwabo bamufundila, ne biônso abi, mu mwakulu udiye umvwa
Yeye kakasumba buloba bua babuki, bualu bua babuki bakadi ne tshituha tshiabo kudi Palo, ne bakadila bintu biakabaha Palo nunku bobo kabakahana buloba buabo
Palo wakabakonka ne, Nudi benji ba mudimu kai
Bu muakajimisha Yehowa bisamba bikuabo ku mpala kuenu, nunku nuenu nenujimine, bualu bua nuenu nuakahidia kunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Nanku bena Ngershone nebenze midimu eyi: kuambula tshilamba tshia kubuikila nzubu wa tshijila, biseba bia mikoku ya bimpanga ne bia nyama wa nkonga bia kubuikila pa mutu pa bionsu, tshilamba tshia mu mushiku wa ntenta

Aba mbana ba balume ba Luele, muana wa Esau: mukelenge Nahata ne mukelenge Zela ne mukelenge Shama ne mukelenge Miza, aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Luele mu buloba bua Edome, aba mbana ba balume ba Basemata, mukashi wa Esau
Kanungu ka Midimu ya Mulombodi wa Ditunga kayeena yikumbanangana ne mudimu mukwabo ônso wa basungudibwe, mudimu ônso wa mbulamatadi, wa busivile anyi wa busalâyi ne wa ditambakana dikwabo diônso
Esau wakambila Yakoba ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Undisheku bintu bikunze biudi mulambe bualu bua meme ndi muhungila
Maweja Nangila kuambila Arone ne: Uye kumonangana ne muanenu Moshe mu tshipela
Nsongalume Muena Ebelu, mukuatshishi wa kapitene ka masalayi, wakadi n etu mu nsubu wa lukanu, bakamuambila bilota bietu, ne yeye wakatujinguluila muntu tshilota tshiandi muntu tshiota tshiandi
Dituku dionsu, bena Izrayele nebaboye biakudia bikumbane, kadi anu bua dituku adi
Lea wakalua ne bana bandi bakafua mpala yabo hanshi kabidi, Yosefe ne Lakele bakalua ku nyima, bakatua mpala yabo hanshi
Wewe neulue n au kudi tatu webe, yeye audie, akuvudishile disanka diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua
Wakalua ne mushete mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, wakakudika tshilulu, wakajibikila mushete bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Yuda wakatuma muana wa mbushi mu tshianza tshia mulunda wandi, Muena Adulama, bua kuangateye tshieya tshia keyekeye mu tshianza tshia mukashi, kadi yeye kakamusangana
Kanudi mashi, nansha a nyunyu nansha a nyama mu nsubu yenu
Bualu uvua musue kumusha muntu mukuabu kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, uvua munupatula ku bupika mu Ejipitu

Bukookeshi bwa kudiludika nkaya Autonomie Budiludiki Amnistie Dikupula dia manyooka Accords et traités internationaux Ndondu ne diumvwangana pankatshi pa matunga Diumvwangana dia mu kabujima ne tshikongu Bukalenga , mukalenga Buludiki Mweena mpala wa ditunga Bilo Ndongamu wa lupetu Tshisumbu tshia bakwidianganyi a mweena mwabo Diswisha, didiswisha Dikwatshishangana, bukwatshishanganyi Dîyi dikulu Kasumbu kadikadile komekela Mianda ya Masungulangana
Yosefe wakalesha tatu andi ne bana babo muaba bua kushikamabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu buloba buakatamba buimpe, mu buloba bua Lamesese, bu muakamba Palô
Diakamue kapia kufuma kudi Maweja Nangila, kubosha, kubashidisha muaba awu
Wakashikama mu tshihela tshia Palana, mamu wandi wakamuangatshila mukashi wa mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Anu Yoshuwa, muana wa Nune, muena mudimu webe, ke wafikamu
Nemfundulule pa mabue apu mikenji ya mushindu umue ne ivua pa mabue auvua munyange

Yeye wakambila mulume wandi mei onso ne, Muhika webe, Muena Ebelu, uwakulua n andi mu nsubu, wakabuela kundi bua kunfuisha bundu, ne hanakela di dianyi, yeye wakashiya tshivualu tshiandi kundi, wakanyema
Umona nanku, kuambaye ne: Ndi musue kubenda kusemena pabuipi bua kujadika bualu ebu bua dikema: kadilu katema, tshipuka katshiyi tshipia tshibutuka
Ebi mbiota bia bana balume ba Noa ku milongo yabo, bisamba bia bantu biakamuangalaka ha buloba ku nyima kua nvula munene biakafuma kudibo
Nyoka Idi Isuma bu Kahia Bakumuka ku mukuna wa Hô, bakaya mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze bualu bua kunyunguluka ku nyima kua buloba bua Edome, mitshima ya bantu yakahanga bualu bua nshila
Nenuikale ne milau mu misoko, nenuikale ne milau mu madimi
Nunku bakabikila dina dia musoko au ne, Soâ
Ekesode Dibikidibua dia Mose Mose wakadi ulama mikoko ya Yetelo tatu andi muenu, mubuki wa mu Midiyana, wakaya ne mikoko ku nyima kua tshihela, wakalua ku mukuna wa Nzambi, dina diau Holeba
Kanungu ka Badi bênza lukongu lwa bilumbulwilu bia nsambu pankatshi pa bantu ne Mbulamatadi ludibo bakumbaja kudi Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi ne bilumbulwilu bia mianda ya mbulamatadi
Bintu bionso bia kudia bidi bituangana ne mai akadi mu bintu ebi nebikale ne bukoya, ne mai a kunua onso akadi mu bintu ebi neikale ne bukoya
Mutuangaji neangate mashi a nyama wa milambu, aalabe muntu udi udikobolola awu ku lusongu lua ditshi, ku tshiala ne ku muana nkasa munene bia luseke lua dia balume

Muntu yônso wendenda udi pende ne tshia kwikala ne moyo wende ne mubidi wende katakata ne kabidi udi pende mwa kutantshisha bumuntu bwende mu dineemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso, dia mapa a mukwende ne dia bibidilu bîmpe
Nudi mua kudia bintu ebi miaba yonsu
Nuyiteke kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Bilongelu bia ditunga bidi, mu diumvwangana ne bamfumu ba ditabuuja, mwa kupeesha balongi ba mabeela pa ludimi, pa dilomba dia baledi baabo, dimanya dia maalu didi dilonda ditabuuja diabo
Mayi awu neandamuke mashi
Mfumu wabu uvua Suriyele, muana wa Abikayile
Neamupeshe kabidi nkudimba nansha kamanda nkutshi bu mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Kabena mua kuhikula muntu mujidile munkatshi mua bantu bua kuhishibua, nebamushihe
Ulue ne Alona ne bana bandi balume ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusangakena, uboweshe mai
Abuikile kuinshi kua mpala
Buloba nebukumenene meba ne mingonga
Nenuikale ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena munya ne butuku tô matuku muanda mutekete, nutumikile dî dia Yehowa bua kanufu bienu, bualu bua Yehowa wakangambila nunku
Kanuena mua kuasonga ne biamu to
Pashishe kufuaye
Bantu bakabalabo, bana balume ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu, bakadi binunu muanda mutekete ne nkama itanu

Kanungu ka Mapa a dikolesha ngenyi,bukookeshi bwa kufuka ngenyi ne bwa kufuka bintu mu lungenyi, ne bukookeshi bwa dikebulula dia mamanya ne dia bia kwenza nabi mudimu adi majadika, kadi anu mudineemeka dia mêyi a ditunga, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne dia bibidilu bia mulowu
Mushindu wa kuela bantu lupemba Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Umanyishe Arone ne bana bende meyi adibu mua kuamba bua kuela bena Izrayele lupemba
Kabeena mwa kukanyika muntu nansha umwe bwa kubwelayi mu milongo ya dileeja dia tshiji to
Yeye wakamulelela Zimelana ne Yokeshana ne Medana ne Midiyana ne Yishebaka ne Shua
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita, badi batangila mukanda wa tuludiki twa mumana kukumbana

Budikadidi bwa batshikuma mbila, budikadidi mu dimanyisha ne dimwangalaja dia ngumu ku tudiomba ne bindidimbi, bifundibwa, bibejibeji anyi mushindu mukwabo ônso wa dimanyishangana dia mianda udi mwanyishibwa, kadi anu mu dineemeka dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso, dia bibidilu bia mulowo ne dia mapa a muntu mukwabo yônso
Kubafukaye mulume ne mukaji
Yosefe wakadisha tatu andi ne bana babo ne bantu bonso bakadi mu nsubu wa tatu andi, ku meku abo
Baledi badi ne tshia kwambula bujitu bwa bâna bâbo ne kubeepulaa ku mianda yônso ya tshikisu munda anyi pambelu pa dîku
Mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu kuitaba ne: Mbimpe, ndi nganyisha kabidi biudi wamba
Nanku anu bantu balume ba mu meku a batuangaji, ke badi mua kudia munyinyi awu, bualu udi mulambu wa tshijila menemene
Yeye wakaya kudi tatu andi, wakamba ne, Tatu anyi, ne yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ndiku wewe udi nganyi, muan anyi
Nunku kanuena mua kudia bintu biela buanga bua mampa to
Nudisangishe matuku asambombo, kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete didi dijidila, kabiena bikalaku dituku adi
Moshe kuambila bena Izrayele ne: Nuvuluke dituku edi
Maweja Nangila kutuluka ku lusongu lua mukuna wa Sinayi, kubikila Moshe
Bakalekela bidia tô ne ku dinda bu muakamba Mose, ne bidia kabiakabola, ne bishi kabiakabuelamu

Nanku pikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupesha biakudia bia bungi mu madimi enu, misangu mikuabu kanuena mua kuambula tshia dikumi bua kutshinkisha muaba wikalaye musungule bua kusomba, bualu njila neikale mupite bule
Bua bungi bua bimuna bivuabu nabi, mpata awu kavua mukumbane bua Abrame ne Lote kusomba kaba kamue to

Muntu yonso aditekele kakasu mu bintu biandi bia nvita, ne hayeye mu tshisuku, neaumbule dina, neahingashe buloba ha mutu ha bintu biakahuyeye; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi wendakana munkatshi mua tshitudilu bua kunusungila, ne bua kufila badi n enu lukuna mu bianza bienu; nunku tshitudilu netshikale tshia tshijila
Ndi nditshipa ne: kanuakufika mu ditunga dia Kenaane, dimvua munulaye to
Muakuidi udi ufila mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, yeye neaudie, neaudie mu muaba wa tshijila mu luhangu lua ntenta wa kusangakena
Dîyi dilongolodi didi difila mishindu ya kumanya, kupeta, kujimija anyi kupetulula bweena ditunga dia Kongu
Angata tshimpanga tshimue, ne Alona ne bana bandi balume nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu hatshi
Ku Tabela ne Masa ne Kibelota hatawa nuakafuisha Yehowa tshiji
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubandamuna ne: Nuenu, nudi bena lulengu ba kalandamusenga

Muakuidi nealue ne mashi makuabo a muana mulume wa ngombe ku nsubu wa tshitendelelu, muakuidi nealue munu wandi mu mashi, neamiamine misangu muanda mutekete ku mpala kua tshilulu tshikudika ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kanuitabushi mulambu ei ku bianza bia benyi bua kuyifila kudi Nzambi wenu, mulambu ei idi ne bilema, tshiena nyitabusha bualu bua idi munyanguke

Kabeena mwa kunyingalaja muntu nansha umwe mu mudimu wende bwa pa kutangila kudiye ufumina, bwa bulume anyi bwa bukaji bwende, bwa ngelelu yende ya meji, bwa ditabuuja diende ne bwa makookeshi ende a mu nsombelu mu musoko ne mu bubanji Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne bukookeshi ne dikanyika dia kusakidila mudimu wende ku diibaka ne ditantshisha dia ditunga
Mu tshikondo atshi nakanuambila malu onso anudi ne bualu bua kuenza
Nenshipe kabidi bamuanabute ba bimuna

Meme nakimitshisha baledi ba bantu aba mafu, anyi, nakabalela, anyi, bua wewe wakungambila ne, Ubatuale ha tshiadi tshiebe, bu mudi muledi utuala muana utshidi wamua, tô ne ku buloba buwakalaya batatu abo
Kuvua mungambile bualu ebu kuonsu eku
Bualu bua kahia kakatemeshibua mu tshiji tshianyi, kadi katema tô ne mu Muaba wa Bafue, kadi kosha buloba ne bintu biakadiundamu, kadi kosha makunshi adi muinshi mua mikuna mile
Hakumuka difutu ku mutu kua Ntenta, hashishe Bena Isalele bakaya ku luendu, mu muaba wakimana ditutu, Bena Isalele bakalongolola tshitudilu
Bakumuka mu Limona pelese, bakashikama mu Libina
Bakamukudi muna di ne, Nansha, katuena bamanye mua kuenza nunku, anu hatuasangisha mikoko yonso ne humushabo dibue ku mushiku wa dina, hashishe netunuishe mikoko mai
Bualu muoyi wa tshintu udi mu mash atshi
Lote kuya kuasa mitanda yende mu bimenga bia mu mpata wa Yardene, wendakana ne bimuna biende too ne ku Sodome

Nenteke mikalu yenu ku Dishiba Dikunze tô ne ku mai manene a Bena Peleshete, ne ku tshihela tô ne ku musulu wa Pelata, bualu bua meme nenfile bena buloba mu bianza bienu, nuenu nenubihate ku mpala kuenu
Bobo nebenze bungi bua tushola buakenzabo diambedi, kanuena nuhuekesha mudimu, nansha kakese, bualu bua bobo badi bafuba, badi bamba ne, Tudi basue kuya kushihela Nzambi wetu nyama
Pa kumbusha bionso abi, polovensa idi miludika kudi Bukalenga bunene ne Tshimamwende wa Bukalenga tshia polovensa
Kadi muntu kafiki mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu wenu kayi ne tshintu tshia kumulambula to
Bakashikama ku mpala kuandi, muntu ku mulongo wandi muntu ku mulongo wandi, wakatuadishila ku muan a bute to ne ku muan a mukala, balume aba bakakemangana
Mulombodi umue amukosele muminu pa muaba awu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Kumuambilabu ne: Mbuji wa mpumbu awu, mbamane kumuosha pa tshilambuilu kudi Elazare ne Itamare, bana ba Arone bavua bashale ne muoyi
Nengenze malu a dikema mavule mu ditunga diende
Musulu wa Yaboke udi wenza mukalu wadi ne ditunga dia bena Amone
Kadi Bena Lewi nebenze mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bobo nebadituadile bubi buabo eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele ku bikondo bienu bionso, bobo kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Wewe kubafikisha mu ditunga dia tshijila
Bakatshidi halua kudiye ne bintu biakadi mitshima yabo misue ku dinda ku dinda
Tela wakalela Abalama ne Nahô ne Halana, Halana wakalela Lota
Bantu babidi kuambula bionsu abi ku mukolu
Udi mufuke muntu ne mukana mua kuakula nnganyi
Mose ne Yoshua bakaya, bakadisangisha mu ntenta wa kusambakena
, katuyi babale Kora ne bantu bavuaye nabu badianjile kufua
Bakaya ne Yosefe mu Ejipitu
Nealue ne muana wa ngombe ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena ku mesu kua Yehowa, neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha muana wa ngombe, neashihe muana wa ngombe ku mesu kua Yehowa
Buela biebe ne nyama yonso idi mimpe, balume muanda mutekete ne bakashi muanda mutekete, ne nyama idi kayiyi mimpe, buela ne balume babidi ne bakashi babidi
Bana ba bakaji babidi ba Lote kuimita mafu a kudi tatuabu
Mose wakalelela mikenji bu buhianyi bua tshisambakena tshia Yakoba
Ne bikala bualu bukufikishe munda, meme nempingane kabidi
Bualu muanabute wa ku nzubu kua muntu yonsu uvua mufue
Wakangata dianyi dionso diakadi ha bintu bia munda ne lukutu lua mutshima ne tumuma tubidi ne dianyi diatu, Mose wakabisha ha tshioshelu
Bualu Maweja Nangila mmumane kumvua lumu lua buenzayi bua bena tshimenga etshi, mututume bua kutshibutula
Wakenza mitshi ya acacia, wakalamata tshiamu tshia mitaku ku nseke yonso
Bialua muakuidi ne hatangileye ne disama kadiena ditampakana mu nsubu hashikishabo kumujinguila, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Nsubu eu udi muakane bualu bua disama diakashika
Bobo nebabalonde ku nyima, tshisumbu tshisatu
Yeye wakamba ne, Mukelenge, kukuatshi tshiji, nengakule musangu eu, bikalamu bantu bakane dikumi Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nshiha musoko bualu bua bantu dikumi
Muntu eu wakalua n abo mu nsubu wa Yosefe, wakabaha mai, ne bobo bakuvuwa makasa abo, ne yeye wakadisha mpunda yabo kabidi
Enza makoha ne muonshi wa bleu ku mibangu ya bilulu idi ituangana, ku tshisumbu ne ku tshisumbu tshia bilulu
Mpindiewu ukadi uditeka kabidi mfumuetu
Kanusakididi bualu bukuabu ku mikenji ya Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, indi munulongeshe
Badi babakengesha bikole ne tshikisu
Kualakanyi tshintu nansha tshimue tshia mukuenu: nansha nzubu wende, mukajende, mupika wende, ngombe wende, mpunde wende
Kutshinyi, bualu bua Nzambi wakamana kunvua di dia nsongalume mudiye mulale

Misoko ya Kunyemena ya ku Esete kua Yadene Hashishe Mose wakasungula misoko ya kunyemena isatu dishiya dia Yadene kudi diba dihatuka; bualu bua mushihi wa muntu ku mpukahuka, wakadi kayi n andi lukuna diambedi, anyemene ku umue wa mu misoko ei, ikale biandi ne muoyo
Bakumuka ku mukuna wa Shefe, bakashikama mu Halada
Kumuladika tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi, kubuejamu Urime ne Tumime
Baledi badi ne bukookeshi bwa kusungula diikala dia ndongeshelu wa kupeesha bâna baabo
Maweja Nangila kumuandamuna ne: Bisamba bia bantu bibidi bidi munda muebe, neulele bisamba bibidi bishilangane
Teka nkanu hehi ne mpenge ya mesa bualu bua kutuala n ai mesa Enza biebe mitshi ya acacia, ulamike or ku nseke yai yonso, bua kutuala n ai mesa
Abrahame mumane kukulakaja, mukumbaje bidimu lukama makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu, kutuilaye mu diakalenga, kulonda bankambua bende
Kadi biwunvua di diandi ne biwenza mei onso andi nkuambila, nunku meme nengikale bu muena lukuna kudi bantu badi n ebe lukuna, ne bu muena nvita kudi bantu badi basue kusangana n ebe
Lubena, muan a bute wa Isalele, bana balume ba Lubena, Hanoka ne meku a Bena Hanoka, Palu ne meku a Bena Palu, Heselona ne meku a Bena Heselona, Kantu ne meku a Bena Kami

Yakalua kudi Belâma, yakamuambila ne, Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, udi wamba ne, Kuitabusha bua bualu buonso bukuhumbishe bua kulua kundi, bualu bua meme nenkuhe butumbi bunene, nengenze mei onso audi wamba, lua biebe, ndi nkusengelela, ungelele bantu aba mulau
Hanuamana kusabuka Yadene, nenjadike mabue au mu mukuna wa Ebala, nenuashinguile ne nshimete, bu mundi nnuambila lelu
Mêyi ne mikandu adi aleeja mushindu wa kusanka ne mapa awu
Yehowa neanutumine disama dia nfuenke ne dia mubidi kahia ne dia biusha ne dia lukanku, ne miele ya nvita, ne luhehele lua nvunde ne butu; malu au neanulonde tô ne hanuafua

Masanka Alualua kudi Batumikidi ba Yehowa Binunvua mikenji ei, binuayenza, hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nênze tshihungidi ne luse biakalayeye batatu benu: yeye neanusue, neanusankishe, neanuvudishe, yeye neasankishe bana benu kabidi, ne bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba buebe, midioko yenu, ne nvinyo yenu mihia mihia, ne manyi enu ne bana ba ngombe yenu ne bana ba mikoko yenu, mu buloba buakalayeye batatu benu bua kunuhabu
Tshitupa tshinâyi : Bidi bitangila makanyika a mweena mwabo Kanungu ka Badi bafwanyikija ne muntu yônso udi anu mumanya mêyi ne mikandu
Kadi nansha nanku, kabeena mwa kwanji kwimanyika midimu ya kabadi ka kabwendela to
Kadi katangila mu kabwendela malomba a ditangilula mapangadika a tubadi twa Mbulamatadi twa kabwendela

Yobaba wakafua, ne Hushama, wa mu buloba bua Bena Temana, wakadia bukelenge buandi Hushama wakafua, ne Hadada, muana wa Bedada, wakahita Bena Midiyana bukole mu buloba bua Moaba, wakadia bukelenge buandi, dina dia musoko wandi ne, Awita
Mu dikumbaja dia midimu eyi ne makookeshi aa, Tshibutshilu Tshinene tshia Kongu tshidi tshidikadile ne tshidi ne bukookeshi bwa kudiludika nkayatshi
Eu udi mudimu wa meku a bana balume ba Melali, udibo benza mu ntenta wa kusambakena, ku tshianza tshia Itamâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi
Nenuele Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu tuasakidila, bua padiye munufikishe mu ditunga edi dimpe
Bidimu bia Enoshe bidi nkama tshitema ne bitanu
Bakaya ne dibendele ba tshitudilu tshia Lubena, ne Elisû, muana mulume wa Shedeu, wakadi ku mutu kuabo
Bua tshitangidi bualu ebu bubi budi bulue kudi tatu wanyi

Padi tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia mpetu tshivwabo bafila mu tshipungu tshianyisha kudi Dîyi dikulu, kabayi batshielela tukanda kumpala kwa diunzulula dia tshikondu tshipiatshipia, mulombodi wa ditunga udi utshilondeshisha, mu dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene, dikala dishintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, kayi upwa mooyi makumbaja meelela tukanda kudi Tshibambalu ne Tshimbambalu
Meme Moshe, mvua mupeshe ndelanganyi ya Rubene ne ya Ngade tshitupa tshia ditunga dia mikuna dia Ngilaade, ne bimenga bionsu bivuamu

Bu muvua Maweja Nangila mutshishe butuku abu bua kupatula bantu bende mu Ejipitu, ke mudi bena Izrayele pabu, ku ndelanganyi ne ndelanganyi, mua kutshisha dituku adi bua kuvuluka dipatuka diabu mu Ejipitu, bualu ndituku dia tshijila
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu kutuambuluisha
Maweja Nangila kubambila ne: Nuteleje bimpe tshindi nnuambila
Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia mu polovensa katshiena mwa kweela mêyi pa mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene to
Bu mudi muoyi wa tshintu muikale mu mashi, ndi nnukandika bua kanushipi muntu nenu, tshianana meme nennushipeshe panyi
Dituku dia muanda mutekete ndia Dikisha, dia kunnemeka anu meme, Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Dituku adi, Maweja Nangila kutua ndondu ne Abrame muaba awu, kumulaya ne: Matunga aa nengapeshe ndelanganyi yebe, biangatshile ku musulu wa Ejipitu ne ku musulu munene wa Perate
Hakalua Yosefe ku nsubu kuandi, bakalua ne matabisha mu bianza biabo, bakamukukuila hanshi
Aba mbana balume ba Melali bakabalabo ku meku abo, bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Yakoba wakamba ne, Yehowa Nzambi wa kaku wanyi Abalahama, ne Nzambi wa tatu anyi Isaka, wewe wakungambila ne, Uhingane kuebe, ne kudi bana benu, nenkuenzele bimpe
Abrame uvua muase pabuipi ne mitshi ya tshijila ya Mambre, muena Amore
Mpindiewu ndi nnulomba ne: Numbuikidile bubi buanyi
Ndi nkupa tshimanyinu tshidi tshileja ne: Meme ke udi mukutume
Padi ditoba adi ditampakane ku tshimana, mutuangaji atume diyi, balamune mabue adi makuate butu awu
Bualu mu mashi ke mudi muoyi
Mayi a tshipupu kakubutula kabidi bantu ne bidi ne muoyi pa buloba to
Mulume kuinyika mukajende dina ne: Eva
Neinuvuluije muvua Maweja Nangila munupatule mu ditunga dia Ejipitu ku bukole buende
Nudi nuteta Yehowa munyi
Munyinyi awu, nebaujikije dituku anu dimue
Mambre ne bana babu Eshekole ne Anere bavua batue ndondu ne Abrame
Katataka, tangila, muadi wa Bena Isalele Wakafika kundi, Hakatangila kabidi dikenga diabo didi Bena Ejipitu babakengesha n adi
Batuangaji boshe munyinyi onsu ewu pa tshilambuilu, pamue ne mulambu wa kuosha, bualu udi mulambu wa dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
; Mfumu wa bena Ashere: ke Pagiyele, muana wa Okrane, ne bantu bende
Meme kulosha mu kapia
Panudi numuangala, amu bena Levi nebatulakaje nzubu wa tshijila awu, bua kuya kumuasa kabidi muaba unudi nuya
Kubengaye diyi dia Moshe ne Arone bu muvua Maweja Nangila mudianjile kuamba
Yehowa wakamba ne, Mpala wanyi neaye n ebe, ne meme nenkuhe dikisha
Moshe kuandamuna Maweja Nangila ne: Bantu kabena mua kusemena pabuipi ne mukuna wa Sinayi to
Nundekelele bubi buanyi anu musangu eu, nundombele Yehowa Nzambi wenu, yeye angumushile bualu ebu bua lufu

Nzambi wakamba ne, Tuenze muntu ne tshifuanyikishi tshietu mufuanangane n etu, balue bakokeshi ba minyinyi ya mu mai manene ne ba nyunyu ya mulu, ne ba bimuna, ne ba buloba buonso, ne ba tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi
Kanulambi muana wa mukoko ne mabele a mamu wandi

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, yeye neangate bana balume ba mikoko babidi badi kabayi ne tshilema ne muana mukashi wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue udi kayi ne tshilema ne bituha bisatu bia dikumi bia épha bia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ne dikoho dia manyi
Muntu udi uhenda tatu andi anyi mamu andi, nebamushihe bulelela

Aba mbashihianganyi badi mua kunyemenamu bua kuikala ne muoyo: muntu yonso udi ushiha mukuabo ku mpukahuka, kakadi n andi tshiji diambedi; bu muntu wakuya ne mukuabo muitu bua kutaha nkunyi, ne hakuambeye kutaha mutshi ne kasui, ne kasui kakukuka, kakutaha muntu mukuabo, kakumushiha; muntu eu neanyemene ku umue wa misoko ei, neikale ne muoyo

Kadi biatangila muakuidi ne miosa mitoke tô kayenaku, ne disama kadiena dibuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, nunku muakuidi neamubueshe ha nkayandi mu nsubu matuku muanda mutekete, bikala disama ditampakane mu dikoba, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi
Kadi Rebeka uvua ne muanabu wa balume, dina diende Labane
Biashala bidimu bia bungi, neamuhingishile bu mushinga wa kudihikula n au tshituha tshia bintu biakamusumbabo babi
Bualu nudi bafike ku mbelu kua muntu wenu
Mvidi Mukulu kufuka bantu, bafuane Mvidi Mukulu mene
Kanungu ka Badi bênza Kapangu ka kulu ka disungidila ditunga
Mukoku awu wikale kauyi ne bulema, wikale mukumbane mushinga wa mulambu wa dinua tshibalu udibu balambula Maweja Nangila
Mutshima wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye bakalekela bantu
Mêyi ne mikandu adi aleeja mishindu ya kusanka ne mapa awu
Kuambilaye bantu bonsu ne: Umukayi ku ntenta ya bena buenzavi aba
Bana benu ba balume bamane kukumbaja matuku muanda mukulu, badi ne bua kubateka panshi, nansha bapika badibu balelela muebe, nansha bapika benyi baudi musumbe, badi kabayi ba mu diku diebe
Nowa kuolola tshianza kumukuata, kumubueja mu buatu
Kuikadi ne nzambi mikuabo ne meme hohamue
Mona, meme nengimane ku mpala kuebe ha mutu ha dibue dia Holeba, wewe neukume dibue ne mai neahatuke, bantu banue mai Mose wakenza nunku ku mesu kua bakulu ba Bena Isalele
Mesa a Bidia Bilesha Ek

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi, bua yeye angate malonga munkatshi mua kahia, ne wewe utangalashe kahia kuaka ebi mbintu bia tshijila, malonga a bantu aba babi bakadijinushila mioyo yabo, wenze n au tshibuikilu tshia tshioshelu bobo bakâfila ku mpala kua Yehowa, nunku adi bintu bia tshijila, neikale bu tshivulukidi kudi Bena Isalele
Nakadi ne dikenga nunku, munya wakangosha, mashika akankuata butuku, tshitabala tshiakankuata
Hakashika matuku muanda mutekete mai akavulangana ha buloba
Labana wakamba ne, Bualu ebu nebuikale bu mu di diebe
Kadi padibu bamane kulamuna mabue a nzubu awu ne matoba avuaku, bakone bimana babishinguila, kadi nzubu awu mukuate kabidi butu, mutuangaji neaye kukenketa kabidi mushindu udi ditoba
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Etshi ntshilele tshia kuhita kua Yehowa muenyi kena mua kutshidia
Mose wakasua kushikama ne mulume au, ne yeye wakaha Mose Sipola, muan andi wa bakashi
Bantu abu kumukuata ku tshianza, kukuata kabidi ne mukajende, ne bana bende ba bakaji babidi kubapatula mu tshimenga
Kadi, badi basombele mulu, kumonabu bana ba bakaji ba bantu babalengelela

Dutelonone Malu Adibo ne bualu bua Kuenza bua Kuheta Buhikudi ne Masanka Halua malu au onso kunudi ne disanka ne mulau, binakuteka ku mpala kuenu, ne hanuayuluka malu au munkatshi mua bisamba bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unutuma munkatshi muabi, ne hanuakudimuna mitshima yenu kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mei andi ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso, bu munakunuambila lelu, ne nuenu ne bana benu; hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neakudimune buluka buenu, neanuleshe luse, neahingane kunudi, neanusangishe ba munkatshi mua bantu bonso muakanumuangalasha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Neangate mbushi ibidi, neayiteke ku mpala kua Yehowa ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Yonsu wa kudibu kuangata tshiamu tshiende tshia musenga wa kamonya, kuelamu makala a kapia, kabidi ne manananshi bua kulambula Maweja Nangila
Nembutule kabidi nyama yonsu minene ne mikese too ne nyunyi yonsu idi ibuka mulu, bualu ndi ne kanyinganyinga bua pandi mubifuke
Genese Nzambi Udi Ulokesha Nvula Munene Yehowa wakambila Noa ne, Buela biebe mu buatu ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu muebe, bualu bua meme nakakumona muimpe ku mesu kuanyi munkatshi mua tshikondo etshi
Njila mwibîdi : Bidi bitangila budikookeshi Kanungu kitânu Didikookesha dia ditunga didi bwaalu bwa beena ditunga
Bua bualu ebu mbuakalotela Palo bilota bibidi, bualu ebu nebujadikibue kudi Nzambi, Nzambi neabushikishe tshituha tshibi
Mose wakakebakeba mbushi wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne monai, bakamana kuwosha

Dutelonone Mikenji ya Mamuma a Diambedi ne ya Tshia Dikumi Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana, hanuabunyenga ne hanuashikamamu, hashishe nenuangate bintu bionso bidi biboba diambedi mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, nubiteke mu tshisaka, nulue n abi mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, usungula, bua kujadikamu dina diandi
Kubisuikabu mu bilamba, kubiambula pa makaya
Nenuikale ne biakudia bipite bungi

Bakumuka mu tshihela, bakaya ku Matana: bakumuka ku Matana, bakaya ku Nahaliele, bakumuka ku Nahaliele, bakaya ku Bamota, bakumuka ku Bamota, bakaya mu tshibanda tshia mu buloba bua Moaba tô ne ku mutu kua mukuna wa Pisega, kuakatangilabo tshihela
Kadi Nzambi wakamueneka kudi Abimeleke mu tshilota butuku, wakamuambila ne, Wewe udi anu muntu mufue, bualu bua mukashi uwakuangata udi mukashi wa munga muntu
Yeye wakamba ne, E
Ushiye disoso ku mutu kua tshikowelu bua kubueshamu mutu, nyungulula disoso ne muonshi muhindakasha, bu mudibo benza tshikowelu tshia nvita tshikowelu katshihandiki nansha
Tuye n ebe, tuhunge tshihungidi, wewe ne meme, tshihungidi etshi tshikale bu kuditshiha kua bualu munkatshi muetu
Bana bende Izake ne Ismayele kumujika mu lubuebue lua Makpela luvua pabuipi ne Mambre, mu budimi bua Efrone, muana wa Sohare, muena Iti

Bantu bine aba badi bamanyisha majinga abo mu tshibûngi tshia bisumbu bia tshidiidi tshishindika kudi dîyi dikulu didi kabidi dijadika ne kwenza tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi tshia mu kabumwe kudi tshibawu tshia dipàangila dia ditunga
Udi ubungamina tshinyi
Yeye wakaya kudi Lakele kabidi, wakatamba kunanga Lakele ku mpala kua Lea, yeye wakakuatshila Labana mudimu bidimu muanda mutekete bakuabo

Yakoba wakambila bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wandi ne bonso bakadi n andi ne, Umushai nzambi ya bende idi munkatshi muenu, nudilongolole, nuluate bilulu bikuabo, tubike tumuke, tuye ku Betele, nengenzeleku Nzambi, waka ngunvuila mu dituku dia dikenga dianyi, wakadi n anyi mu nshila kunakaya, tshioshelu
Shekeme wakambila tatu wa mukashi ne bana babo ne, Ndi musue kuikala ne diakalengele ku mesu kuenu, nennufute bintu bionso binudi nuamba
Neabitue mu mashi a nyunyi uvuaye mukose muminu, ne mu mayi a mpokolu adi mu luesu
Muhika wandi mukashi, dina diandi Leuma, wakamulelela Teba ne Gahama ne Tahasha ne Maka

Hakashikisheye kubambila mei a onso, buloba buakahandika muinshi mua makasa abo, buloba buakubulula mukana muabu, buakabamina ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu yabo ne bantu bonso bakalamata Kola ne bintu biabo bionso
Ndi nnujadikila ne: nennukengeshe too ne panuabutukila bonsu mu tshipela emu, bualu nudi bantu babi badi bantombokela
Yeye neikale ne disanka bulelela Ha kunvua Esau mei a tatu andi waka dila muadi bikole ne mutshima wandi munyingalala, wakambila tatu andi ne, Unsankishe meme kabidi, tatu anyi
Nanku bumudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu ununanga, kakunulekela, kakunubutula to
Ngulube kena muakane kunudi bualu bua yeye udi ne mikono mihanduluke kadi kena uhingishilula bintu mukana; kanudi munyinyi wa nyama ei, kanulengi tshianza ham bidi ha bitalu biai
Â mmena a bana ba Isalele bakalueye n abo mu Ejipitu Lubena, muan a bute wa Yakoba
Yosefe wakambila Palô ne, Bilota bia Palo bidi tshilota tshimue, Nzambi wakamanyisha Palô malu akadiye ha kuenza

Ebele kabidi wakalua ne ban a bute ba mikoko ne dianyi diai Yehowa wakitabusha Ebele ne mulambu wandi, kadi yeye wakahidia Kana ne mulambu wandi Kana wakadi ne tshiji, wakabungama Yehowa wakakonka Kana ne, Udi ne tshiji bua tshinyi
Yeye neafile mulambu wandi wa mikata ya bukula budi ne luevene ne mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala bua kusakidileye n ai Nzambi
Nebayilongeshe kabidi ndelanganyi yabu
Bakumuka mu Iyima, bakashikama mu Dibona gada
Bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa bakabalabo kudi Mose, muntu yonso ku mudimu wandi ne ku bujitu buandi, bakabalabo kudiye bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Bena Isalele bakadila Mose matuku makumi asatu mu mpata wa Moaba; nunku matuku a kudila kua Mose akashika
Kadi muena Izrayele nansha muenyi, udi wenza bualu bubi ku bukole, udi upenda Maweja Nangila
Kadi Noa wakasangana luse ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kanusongi mpingu, kanuzodi bimfuanyi bileja mvidie, nansha bayileja bu bantu balume nansha bakaji, bu nyama, nyunyi, bilandadi, nansha minyinyi ya mu mayi
Diba didi tshijila atshi tshijika, mukaji indile matuku muanda mutekete, bua mikiya ijike
Tshisangilu Tshinene tshidi tshianyisha Tuludiki twatshi twa munda
Aba mbana ba balume ba Lewi ku mena abo Gêshona ne Kohata ne Melali
Diba adi Maweja Nangila kulokesha mu Sodome ne Ngomore mvula wa kapia kakole ka mfundanga, kela ndimi
Lote ubamona, kujukaye bua kubakidila
Mose wakakonka Alona ne, Bantu bakakuenzela tshinyi bua wewe wakubavuishila bualu bubi

Ku nyima kua kulela kua Hanoka, Yalede wakikala ne muoyo bi dimu nkama muanda mukulu, wa kalela bana balume ne bana bakashi Matuku onso a Yalede akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne makumi asambombo ne bibidi, yeye wakafua biandi

Bua kujikija mikiya ya nzubu awu, mutuangaji neangate nanku mashi a nyunyi, mayi a mpokolu, nyunyi uvua mushale ne muoyi, mitshi ya sedre, bilamba bienza ne miosa ya nyama bilaba kakula, ne mabeji a mutshi wa isope
Bualu Maweja Nangila uvua munukandike bua kupingana mu ditunga edi
Ndi ne luse lua bungi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona mu mukuna wa Hô, hehi ne butshika bua buloba bua Edome ne, Alona neadisangishe kudi bankambua bandi, yeye kena ubuela mu buloba bunakalaya Bena Isalele, bualu bua nuenu nuakuhidia dî dianyi ku mai a Meliba

Hanuatshintshimika musoko musangu mule, hanualuangana n abo bua kûnyenga, kanushihi mitshi ya tumuma ne tusui; nudi mua kudia tumuma atu, kanushihi mitshi, bualu bua mitshi ei idi bu bantu banudi uluangana n abo, anyi
Bena Isalele bonso bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose ne Alona
Nzambi wakamubikila mu katshi, wakamba ne, Mose, Mose Yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mukandike Moshe ne: Kubadiki tshisamba tshia bena Levi pamue ne bena Izrayele ba bisamba bikuabu nansha
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kumuambila ne: Undombele malaba
Kadi nuenu bavua balamate Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, nutshidi bonsu ne muoyi too ne lelu
Nuenu nenutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, nenubienze, nenushikame mu buloba talala
Aba mbana balume ba Efelayima ku meku abo Shutela ne meku a Bena Shutela, Bekê ne meku a Bena Bekê; Tahana ne meku a Bena Tahana
Aba mbakelenge bakakokesha ba mu buloba bua Edome, diambedi mukelenge kayi muanze kukokesha Bena Isalele
Bukole buebe mbupite
Nuenze midimu yonsu amu matuku asambombu, nuyijikije
Mai akadi mu mulondo akashika, ne yeye wakaladika muana muinshi mua katshi kasase
Abrahame kushala mu ditunga dia bena Peleshete matuku mulongulongu
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nulale bienu kunoko butuku ebu, nennuambile dî kabidi, bu mudi Yehowa ungambila, ne bakelenge ba Moaba bakashala ne Belâma
Hakahita ngondo isatu, bakambila Yuda ne, Tamâ ma muen ebe wakandamuka bu mukashi wa masandi, ne yeye wakimita difu kabidi ku masandi
Padi nyama wa ku inudi nudia mudifuile, muntu mulenge nyama awu neapie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Maweja Nangila kumuenekela kabidi Abrame, umuambila ne: Ditunga edi nendipeshe ndelanganyi yebe
Nyoka kubenga wamba ne: To, kanuena nufua nansha
Meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Tshitupa tshibîdi : Bidi bitangila makookeshi a bubanji, a nsombelu mu musoko ne a bunkambwa
Kayeena yikumbanangana kabidi ne majitu kampanda mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi kansanga to
Hashishe Yosefe wakambila bantu ne, Monai, nakunusumbila Palo lelu, nuenu ne buloba buenu ka maminu adi aha bua bualu buenu, nuakune mu buloba
Enza bintu bu nsengu ya ngombe ku matumba anai, enza nsengu ne dibaya dimue, lamika tshiamu tshia mitaku ku nseke yonso
dikuba dia mwaba wa nsombelu, miaba milenga mifuka kudi nzambi, bitupa bia matunga ne bukubi bwa miaba milenga;

Kadi nenjadike tshihungidi tshianyi n ebe, wewe neubuele mu buatu ne bana bebe balume ne mukashi webe ne bakashi ba bana bebe

Yeye neikale ne mashi a kudilengesha kuandi tô matuku makumi asatu ne asatu, kalengi tshianza tshiandi ha tshintu tshia tshijila, kabuedi mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu tô ne hashikisheye matuku a kudilengesha kuandi

Padibo babakengela, beena bukalenga bunene badi ne tshia kubweela mu midimu ya Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne mu ya batshipwika bakulumpe, kwangatamu tshikolokolo ne kupeesha batshipwita mûmvwija ônso adibo babaloomba pa midimu yabo
Kalongu kinâyi : Bidi bitangila bilumbulwilu bia basalayi
Wewe neuteke tshibuikilu ha mutu ha mushete neubueshe mabue a dihungila andi nkuha mu mushete
Kànkamana mwena kwanyì, Mutu tudie emu kumutwikale, Bidimu bitu byà kukùdimuka
Ku ndelanganyi aku nekupatuke bisamba bia bungi, nekupatuke kabidi bakalenga banene
Moshe kutuluka ku mukuna, kupingana mu mitanda, kubikidisha bakulu ba bena Izrayele, kubambila bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Bana ba balume ba Benyamina, Bela ne Bekê ne Ashebele ne Gela ne Nâmana ne Ehi ne Losha ne Mupima ne Hupima ne Ada
Muntu yonso udi wenza mudimu dituku adi nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo

Kanungu ka Panyima pa dishintakaja dia ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, Minisitila kavulambedi udi mwa kushindika, kumpala kwa Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka, bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bunene pa ndongamu wende, pa diteeja dia tshidiidi tshijima anyi pa disungula dia mukanda
Wakalua ne tshimpanga tshikuabo, tshimpanga tshia kujidila kua bakuidi; Alona ne bana bandi balume bakatentekasha bianza biabo ha mutu ha tshimpanga
Kasala kaadi kadi Debout Congolais
Mu tshibawu tshia mutabala mudi disumba anyi disumbisha dia bintu dishindameena pa dimanya dia mianda idi beena bintu kabayi mwa kumanya tshiendelela
Meme tshiena mumanye Yehowa ne tshiena ndekela Bena Isalele
Kadi Moshe kunyema, kuya mu ditunga dia Madiyane
Mvidi Mukulu kubambila ne: Mbanupeshi midioku yonsu ya pa buloba idi ne ntete, ne mitshi yonsu idi ikuama bimuma, bikale biakudia bienu
Alona wakalela Nadaba ne Abihu ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ
Yakoba wakatangila mpala wa Labana, kakadi bu muvueye dia mbedi

Ndongamu , diteeja dia tshidiidi tshiônso tshijima anyi mukanda udibo bateela ku tulongo twapitshi badi bawangata bu mwanyishibwa pa kumusha padibo banyishai mukanda wa ditangilula mu mikenji miteeka mu tulongo ne twa kanungu aka
Enza mitshi ya acacia ya kuela ku tshioshelu, lamika tshiamu tshia mitaku ku nseke yonso ya mitshi
Izake ne: Tudi ne nkunyi ne kapia, kadi muana wa mukoku wa kulambula udi penyi

Bualu bua ndi mumanye ne, Ku nyima kua lufu luanyi nenutambe kudisangisha ne kusesuka mu nshila unakunulesha; malu mabi neanukuate mu matuku atshidi ku mpala; bualu bua nuenu nenuenze malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufikisha munda bua mudimu wa bianza bienu
Kabavua baya kuasa mitanda muaba mukuabu, pavua divuba dishale kuimana pa nzubu wa tshijila
Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila Bukalenga bunene

Netshikale ha mpala ha Alona, ne Alona neatuale mahambuka a Bena Isalele mu muaba wa tshijila hayeye bua kubajidila ne bintu bidibo bafila kudi Nzambi, netshikale ha mpala handi matuku onso bua Yehowa abitabushe
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu lukama dikumi ne tshitema
Muntu yonso udi utentulula mukalu wa muena mutumba n andi udi ne mulau

Bakudima kuyaya dîba Kuyaya kumpengelela kwadi Bilumbu ni bya salala bya ya Ngondu wa kubanda mulundingu Mukàjì mufwà bintu bibombe Maman Ndimi Ngoyi Maman Colonel Yaye lele yaye lele Ngimba ne Mulume Mutombo ee Ngimba ne Ange Kayembe ee Ngimba ne Ngalula Waba Milolo ee Ngimba ne Yaya Sangye e Ngimba ne Mputu wa ba Ntumba ee Tangila Kabeya Ndombie Twayi lona, lekelayi mwadi Balongeshi bakalukanyia Simon Kabila lekela we Mwâna we lekela kudila mwadi ee Mwâna we lekela kudila mwadi ee Bakulumpa bakadima kwěpì Bakadima kuyaya dîba Kuyaya kumpengelela kwànyì Bulumbu ni byà salala bya ya Ngondu wa kubanda mulundingu Mukàjì mufwa bintu bibombe Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Byà kulwa disànka Maestro
Bikaleye mumukume ne dibue mu tshianza tshiandi, ne biafileye, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu, nebashihe mushihi wa muntu
Pashishe avule bilamba abi, avuale bikuabu
Badi Bahita Bena Isalele Bukole ku Hôma Nom
Yehowa wakamba ne, Bualu ebu nebubitabushishe ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo, Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Isaka ne Nzambi wa Yakoba wakamueneka kudi

Kanungu ka Bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu badi babulêja kudi dîyi dilongolodi Njila mwisambombo : Bidi bitangila lupetu lwa Mbulamatadi Kalongu ka kumpala : Bulongolodi bwa mu kabujima Kanungu ka Franc congolais ke udi kabujima kamwe ka kashintu ka Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungala
; Mfumu wa bena Isakare: ke Netaneyele, muana wa Shuware, ne bantu bende
Bualu uvua mutuambile ne: Meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Biwaya biebe n etu, hashishe bikala Yehowa mutuenzele bimpe, tuetu netukuenzele bimpe
Yeye wakabambila ne, Yehowa ashale n enu binanulekela ne bana benu bakese, bualu bua bualu bubi budi munda muenu
Mulau wa Tuishi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ubike ne dinda dionso, uye kudi Palô hayeye ku mai, umuambile ne, Yehowa udi Wamba ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye kuntendelela
Bua Nafatale yeye wakamba ne, Nafatale wakadiukutshisha ne diakalengele, udi mûle tente ne disanka dia Yehowa
Mayi a tshipupu mamane kukama, Nowa kushala ne muoyi bidimu nkama isatu ne makumi atanu
Uvuluke ne: ndelanganyi yebe yonsu imvua mukulaye neyifumine anu kudi Izake
Uyaya kudi kunyi

Yehowa Nzambi wakafuka nyama yonso ya mu madimi ne nyunyu yonso ya mulu ne buloba, wakalua n ai kudi mulume bua kutangila bu muakadiye mua kuyidika, dina dionso diakidikeye tshifukibue tshionso diakadi dina dia tshi
Misoku ya ditunga adi batshidi bayibikila ne: mmisoku ya Yayire
Kadi baleleshi bakatshina Nzambi, kabakenza muakabambila mukelenge wa Ejipitu, kadi bakasungila bana balume
Mukenji eu newikale kunudi bikondo bienu bionso tshiendelele
Wewe newangatshile Bena Lewi meme ndi Yehowa mu miaba ya ban a bute ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, ne bimuna bia Bena Lewi mu miaba ya ban a bute ba bimuna bia Bena Isalele
Meme nenjidile ntenta wa kusangakena ne tshioshelu, nenjidile Alona ne bana bandi balume kabidi bua kunkuatshilabo mudimu wa buakuidi
Nanku, Kayine kupeta tshiji tshikole, kufika munda
Kalongu ka kumpala : Bidi bitangila Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka
Tshisamba tshia Zebulone:
Mvula kukamuka, makubakuba ne mabue a mvula kujika
Uye kuimana kumpala kuende
Mose wakamba ne, Ebu mbualu buakamba Yehowa bua nuenu nuenze, ne butumbi bua Yehowa nebumueneke kunudi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nakubikila Besalele, muana mulume wa Uli, muana mulume wa Hu wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda
Lote ukenzakana, kumona muvua mpata ya Yardene mimpe mitambe, bualu ivua ne mayi
Mu dituku dinudi nunyukula bintu, nenufile muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue udi kayi ne tshilema bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Kadi ndi mukushiye ne muoyi, bua ujadike bukole buanyi, kabidi bua lumu luanyi lumanyike pa buloba bujima
Yeye wakatshina, wakamba ne Muaba eu ngua bualu bukole udi nsubu wa Nzambi ne bu mushiku wa diulu
Badi babiaasa ne bidi bienza midimu yabi bidilekelela, mu dineemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne dia bibidilu bîmpe
Kadi Bena Lewi nebashimike ntenta yabo minyunguluke nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bua mulau kaukuatshi Bena Isalele Bena Lewi nebabale nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Yeye wakaditshiha kudiye, wakahana bintu bia buan a bute kudi Yakoba
Wakenza minda muanda mutekete ne biamu bia kujimisha n abi minda ne malonga ai ne or nkayandi
Mose Wakangata makalu ne ngombe, wakabifila kudi Bena Lewi
Mu munya, Mvidi Mukulu uvua mu divuba kumpala kua bena Izrayele bua kubaleja njila
Wewe newenze bitubuidi bia or, ne tukanu tua or tubidi, tudi tuhindakasha bu muonshi, uteke tukanu ku bitubuidi
Abimeleke kubika patshiatshia, kubikila balombodi ba mu bukalenga buende
Nanku mukalenga awu ne ndelanganyi yende, nebashale mu bukalenga matuku a bungi, balombola bena Izrayele
Njila mwinâyi : Bidi bitangila bukalenga bukoshi bwa nsambu Kalongu ka kumpala

Padi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa kabiyi bifila diandamuna pa dipatula dia lupetu lwa nzanzanza mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga, mu dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene dikala dishintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, udi wenzeja bulongolodi bwa Tshingenyingenyi budi butangila dipatula dia lupetu
Yosefe wakumuka ku mpala kua Palô, wakendakana mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Mose wakangata tshiadi, wakatshinyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa: etshi ntshintu tshia Mose tshia ku tshimpanga tshia kujidila n atshi bakuidi, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Anu bua bualu ebu bumue balume aba nebitabushe bua kushikama n etu tulue bantu bamue bua mulume yonso wa munkatshi muetu atengudibue bu mudibo batengula
Yehowa wakatuma luhehele lukole lua ku wesete, bakabandisha mikumbi, luakayihata mu Dishiba Dikunze, nansha mukumbi umue wakashala mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Kanubuelakanyi ne bena mulongo anyi batempi ba mbuku, kanubakebi, kunudionyi kudibo meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Aba mbakelenge ba bisamba, bakadi ku mutu kua bantu bakabalabo bakatua ne bintu biabo ku mpala kua Yehowa makalu manene asambombo ne ngombe dikumi ne ibidi dikalu dimue kudi bakelenge babidi, ne ngombe umue kudi muntu ne mundi, bakalua n abi ku mpala kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Dituku dia kumpala dia tshidimu tshipiatshipia tshivua Nowa mukumbaje bidimu nkama isambombu ne tshimue, mayi onsu kukama pa buloba

Kulondi ku nyima kua tshisumbu tshia bantu tshinene bua kuenza malu mabi, kuikadi bu mu manyi wa bualu munkatshi mua bantu badi basangisha dî diabo bua kudibingisha mu tshilumbu tshidi ka tshiyi tshilelela

Mikenji ya bena Levi Mua kukobolola mukaji kunyima kua dileta Maweja Nangila kumanyisha Moshe bua ambile bena Izrayele mikenji eyi ne: Padi mukaji ulela muana wa balume, mukaji awu udi upia mikiya matuku muanda mutekete, anu bu muvuaye muyipie mu matuku ende a tshijila tshia bakaji
Bilulu bia ku luseke lua tshibi nebikale coudées dikumi ne itanu, ne makunshi abi asatu ne nkanu isatu
Ku nyima Bena Isalele bonso bakafua ha buihi ne yeye wakabamanyisha mikenji yonso yakamuambila Yehowa ha mukuna wa Sinai
Nakunvua kutontolola kua Bena Isalele kudibo bantontolola n aku

Yeye wakamubandisha ha mutu ha miaba mile ya ha buloba, wakadia bintu biakaboba mu madimi, wakamunuisha buitshi buakadi mu mabue, ne manyi akadi mu mabue makole; Wakamudisha manteke a mabele a ngombe, ne mabele a mbushi, ne dianyi dia mikoko ne bimpanga bia mu Bashana ne mbushi, ne blê yakatamba buimpe, nuakanua nvinyo ya tumuma tukunze tuakadi bu mashi
Mose wakolola tshianza tshiandi mulu ne midima mikole be yakadi mu buloba bua Ejipitu to matuku asatu
Nubenge tshiendenda

Enzai mudimu wenu matuku asambombo; kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete ndituku dia dikisha dia kuela meji, dituku dia kujidila Yehowa, mundi yonso udi wenza mudimu dituku dia Lumingu nebamushihe bulelela
Nanku divuba divua dimane pankatshi pa mitanda ya bena Izrayele ne mitanda ya bena Ejipitu, ditokeshila bena Izrayele, difila midima kudi bena Ejipitu
Nyama udi ne mihesa yandi mihandike anyi mitahe mputa kanumufidi bu mulambu kudi Yehowa mu buloba buenu
Maweja Nangila kungambila ne: Bituadije ku lelu, ndi mumane kufila mukalenga Sihone ne bantu bende mu bianza bienu
bwa kwenzeja padibo babeenga Kanungu ka Lungenyi lwa kwenzeja mêyi ludi lufumina kudi Bukalenga bunene, kudi tshipwita munwamfwanka yônso bipalakana ne kudi tshipwita mukulumpa yônso

Hanuakalua ku muaba eu, Sihona, mukelenge wa mu Heshebona, ne Oga, mukelenge wa mu Bashana, bakaluhuka bua kuluangana n etu, ne tuetu tuakabahita; bakanyenga buloba buabo, tuakabuha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe bu buhianyi buabo
Muntu yonso udi ubuelakana ne bena muhongo ne batempi ba mbuku bua kulonda malu abo a masandi, nengumushe mesu anyi kudi muntu au, nemmumushe munkatshi mua bana babo

Bana ba Yosefe ba mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima binunu makumi anai ne nkama itanu
Muadi wa mashi a muakuny ebe udi wela di kundi difume ha buloba
Nanku, numanye ne: tunyama etu tuonsu tudi ne mikiya
Nyemenamu lubilu, bualu bua tshiena mua kuenza bualu wewe kuyi muanze kufikaku
Bikala nsuki ya muntu mituke, ne bikaleye muena dibala, yeye udi muakane
Diba adi mukajebe Sara neikale mumane kulela muana wa balume
Yehowa Wakenza nunku, ne bisumbu binene bia tuishi biakabuela mu nsubu wa Palô ne mu nsubu ya bena mudimu bandi, tuishi tuakahaula buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Nanku dikombu dia muntu undi musungule nedisase
Kutedi dina dianyi meme, Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu webe, tshitelatela, bualu meme nengangate muntu yonsu udi kayi unemeka dina dianyi bu muena tshibawu
Hama, tatu wa Kanana, wakamona butaka bua tatu wandi, wakamanyisha bana babo babidi bakadi ha bule
Abrahame kuinama panshi kumpala kua bonsu bavua muaba awu, wambila Efrone, bua bonsu bumvue, ne: Ndi nkusengelela ne: unteleje
Dituku dinayi Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Mulu muikale bimunyi bua kuleja dishilangana dia munya ne butuku
Aba mbana ba Zilepa, wakaha Labana muan andi mukashi Lea, yeye wakalelela Yakoba bana aba dikumi ne basambombo
Nenuikale ne disanka bua bana banudi nulela, ne bua bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba, ne bua kukumbasha kua nyama yenu ne bimuna bienu ne mikoko yenu
Mose wakangata umue wa makumi atanu wa bintu bia Bena Isalele, ne wa bantu ne wa bimuna wakabifila kudi Bena Lewi bakadi balama nsubu wa Yehowa, muakambila Yehowa Mose
Yehowa neatahulule bimuna bia Bena Isalele ne bimuna bia Bena Ejipitu, nansha tshintu tshikese tshia Bena Isalele netshifue
Bobo nebanuteke tshikokedi tshia tshiamu ha nshingu yenu tô ne hanuajimishibua kudibo
Moshe udi uya mu Ejipitu Moshe kuya kudi tatuende muenu Yetro, kumuambila ne: Ndi ne bua kuya kumonangana ne bana betu badi bashala mu Ejipitu bua kujadika ne: batshidi ne muoyi

Sheta wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne bitanu, wakalela Enosha Ku nyima kua kulela kua Enosha, Sheta wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne muanda mutekete, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi Matuku onso a Sheta akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne dikumi ne bibidi, yeye wakafua biandi

Wakenza tshilulu tshikuabo tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin tshia kuteka ku mbelu kua tshitendelelu, wakatshienzesha kudi bena lungenyi lule, wakenza makunshi atanu ne bitubuilu biau, wakalamata tshiamu tshia or ha mutu, ne nkanu ya tshilulu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku
Wewe mumane kupatula bena Izrayele mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, nenuntendelele pa mukuna wa Sinayi ewu
Nenutante mu ditunga didi ne biakudia bia bungi, bu muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu munulaye

Dibadika Dilaya dia bena Nazire Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe, bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Pikala mulume nansha mukaji ulaya bua kudijidila bu muena nazire, bua kungenzela meme Maweja Nangila mudimu, muntu awu kena mua kunua mvinyo nansha maluvu makole to
Shimeona ne Lewi badi bana babo mene, miele yabo ya nvita idi mikole
Kuenzekabi nanku
Kadi hanalala tulu mu lufu ne bankambua banyi, hashishe umuka n anyi mu Ejipitu, uye kunjika mu muaba wakabajikabo Yeye wakamba ne, Nengenze bu muwakuamba
Anu nuenu ke badi bamanya butumbi ne bukole buende
Abalahama wakabika muana wandi mulume wakamulelela Sala ne, Isaka Abalahama wakatengula muana wandi mulume Isaka hakahita matuku muanda mukulu, bu muakamuambila Nzambi
Numusombeshe ne muoyi muimpe tshionsu tshidiye ukengela
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita, badi bashintakaja ngenyi pa malomba a kwenzeja dîyi aa
Ujike mukajebe mu lukita luakane lua ku nkita yetu
Kunupatuilaye mayi mu lubuebue luvua lupite bukole
Butuku, divuba adi divua dikenka bu kapia too ne muatshiabu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona, mukulu webe, ne, Kulu nusangu yonso mu muaba wa tshijila udi ku nyima kua tshilulu tshikudika ku mpala kua tshibuikilu tshia mushete wa Nzambi, kufu biebe, bualu bua meme nemmueneke mu difutu ku mutu kua tshibuikilu tshia mushete wa Nzambi

Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya bakoshi ba nsambu badi bakakumbaja kudi: Mulombodi wa Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu; Mulombodi wa palake mulamatshisha ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu; Mulombodi wa kumpala wa Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika; Mulombodi wa palake mulamatshisha ku Kabadi kashipi ka ma pangadika; Mulombodi wa kumpala wa Kapangu ka Mbula Matadi; Mulombodi wa palake mulamatshisha ku Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi; Mulombodi wa kumpala wa Kabadi ka kulu ka basalayi; Balombodi ba palake milamatshisha ku Kabadi ka kulu ka basalayi; Balombodi ba kumpala ba Tubadi twa kabweendela; Balombodi ba palake milamatshisha ku Tubadi twa kabwendela; Balombodi ba kumpala ba Tubadi twa Mbula Matadi twa kabwendela; Balombodi ba palake milamatshisha ku Tubadi twa Mbula Matadi twa kabwendela
Kanungu ka Tshipwita nansha umwe kabeena mwa kumulondesha, kumukeba, kumukwata, kumweela mu lukanu anyi kumulumbulwisha bwa ngelelu wa mêji anyi bwa tukanda tuvwayi mwêla mu dienza dia mudimu wenda
Kadi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, neanuambuluishe, bua nupete bintu bia bungi mu ditunga didiye munupe
Kakuena bia kudia, kakuena mai, ne bidia ebi bia tshianana biakututonda
Kadi bibabo nyama mu tshianza tshiandi, yeye neafute mukelenge wandi
Nunku nakanyunguluka, nakahueka mu tshibanda, ne mukuna wakadi utema ne kahia; ne mabue abidi a mei a tshihungidi akadi mu bianza bianyi bibidi
Kena munubutule to
Wakahingana kudi bana babo, wakamba ne, Nsongalume kenaku, ne meme nenye kudi kunyi
Ufunde mena a bantu balume bonsu badi ne bidimu bituadije ku makumi asatu too ne ku makumi atanu
Mukaji ewu kulela Moshe ne Arone
Mukaji udi pende ne tshia kuleeja mpala mushidu wa momumwe mu bishimikidi bia ditunga dijima, bia polovensa ne bia misoko
Muena mudimu unudi nufuta, nansha muenyi udi usomba ku mbelu kuenu, kabena mua kudia biakudia abi to
Yehowa, tshianza tshiebe tshia balume tshidi ne butumbi ne bukole, Yehowa, tshianza tshiebe tshia balume tshidi tshisunsula bantu badi n etu lukuna
Wakosha munyinyi ne tshiseba ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Angata dikombu diuvua mupandulule nadi musulu wa Nile adi
Ku dî dia Yehowa Bena Isalele bakaya ku luendu, ne ku dî dia Yehowa bakalongolola tshitudilu, hakatshidi ditutu dimana ku mutu kua nsubu, bobo bakashala mu tshitudilu
Palo Wakabikila Mose ne Alona, wakamba ne, Nundombele Yehowa, yeye umushe biula kundi ne kudi bantu banyi, nendekele bantu baye kushihela Yehowa nyama
Uvua mumane kutshimuna kabidi mu tshimenga tshia Edreyi, Oge, mukalenga wa Bashane, uvua muase ku Ashetarote
Kadi bua muana uudi mulele ne mukaji mupika ewu, nealele pende bana ba bungi
Nunku Lota wakasungula mpata wonso wa Yadene, wakaya biandi ku esete, bakaha ndulukangana nunku
Wakateka tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kuosha ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshiendelele wakoshahu mulambu wa bukula bua manvua bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nenuikale ne bintu bipite bungi: ntete ya kuenza bukula, mvinyo, mafuta, ngombe, mikoku ne mbuji
Mose wakambila Alona ne, Ambila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele ne, Luai ha buihi ku mpala kua Yehowa, bualu bua yeye wakunvua tshitanu tshienu
Muntu yonso udi umulenga tshianza ham bidi handi neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Bualu bua bobo bakadi ne bungi bua bintu bia kuenza n abi mudimu wonso, ne bintu bikuabo ha mutu
Abambana balume ba Yishemaele ku mena abo ne misoko yabo ne ku meku abo, baminyampala dikumi ne babidi ku bisamba biabo

Lewitiki Masanka Adi Alonda Batumikidi ba Mikenji Kanusongi mpingu, kanujadiki luhingu lua tshiamu tshiakafulabo, anyi dikunshi anyi dibue diakasongabo mu buloba buenu bua kubmamina, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Muladilu wa Dituku dia Dikisha, muena Izrayele yonsu uvua wambula litre ya biakudia muanda mukulu pa mutu pa inayi iwaye wambula ku dituku
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Muntu yonso udi ushiha Kana, nebamusombuele misangu muanda mutekete Yehowa wakalekela Kana tshimanyinu bua wamusangana kamushihi
Bena Ejipitu nebajadike ne: Meme ndi Maweja Nangila, bualu nembenzeje ku bukole bua balekele bena Izrayele baye
Ke pavua bena Levi kabayi bapeta wabu muaba wa bumpianyi bu bisamba bikuabu
Tshidimu tshivua Agare mulela muana, Abrame uvua ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu ne bisambombu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Palô kena ukunvuila nansha, bualu bua kuvudisha malu anyi a kukema mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Au mmeku a Nafatale, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama mai
Ukavua musue kunubutula
Dîyi dilongolodi didi difila mishindu ya bulongolodi ne ya lwendu lwatshi
Tshintu tshionso tshidibo bajila mu Isalele netshikale tshiebe

Muntu udi musue kudilengesha neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neabeye nsuki yandi yonso, neadioweshe ne mai, yeye neikale muakane; ku nyima nealue biandi mu tshitudilu, kadi neashikame ku mbelu kua ntenta wandi matuku muanda mutekete
Nudi bakese, bashadile kudi bisamba bikuabu
Arone pende neikale koku
Dibadika Milambu ya bia pa madimi Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe bua kumanyisha bena Izrayele ne: Panuafika mu ditunga dindi musue kunupa bua nuenu kusomba, nungoshile nyama mijima bua kundambula
bûngi bwa bantu ne dibabadika bidi bikale ne diambulwisha bwa ditunga dijima;

Nguvenela ne tshindonda tshienda badi babasungula bwa tshipungu tshia mvula itanu tshidibo mwa kwambulula musangu umwe kudi batshipwita ba mu polovensa munkatshi anyi pambelu pa Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa
Abitue mu mashi adi mu luesu a nyunyi uvuabu bakose muminu
Muhi ka wakateka tshianza tshiandi muinshi mua tshibelu tshia Abalahama, mukelenge wandi, wakaditshiha bua bualu ebu
Mvidi Mukulu udi ulaya Moshe ne: nempikule Izrayele Mvidi Mukulu kuambila Moshe kabidi ne: Meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Mvidi Mukulu udi upesha bakulu tshitupa tshia bukole bua Mueyelu wende Moshe kumuka ku ntenta, kuya kuambila bantu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile

nsombelu ne kudi Dilekelela anyi dinyanga dia bâna bu mudi kusangila bu mulume ne mukaji ne bâna bakese, bwenzavi bwa masandi pamwe ne dibatalula mupongo budi bukandikibwa ne badi babufidila manyooka kudi mêyi ne mikandu

Kanuikadi ne kansungusungu hanualumbulula bilumbu; nunvue dî dia muntu mukese ne dia muntu munene muomumue; kanutshinyi mpala wa muntu; bualu bua kulumbulula kua bilumbu kudi kua Nzambi: tshilumbu tshidi tshihita bukole, nulue n atshi kundi, meme nentshiunvue
Wakutuenzela nunku tshinyi, bua kutuhatula mu Ejipitu
Yeye wakuvuwa mai ku mpala kuandi, wakahingana kudibo, wakadikanda, wakamba ne, Lua ne bidia
Nenuvuwe bilulu dituku dia muanda mutekete, nenubale bakane, ku nyima nenuhingane mu tshitudilu
Bobo nebenze mukaba wa efoda bu mudibo benza efoda, newikale tshituha tshimue tshia ku efoda, ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin mutambe buimpe
Nutumikile mikenji ya Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, numunemeke, nuenze mudiye musue
