Mushindu wa kufila tshia dikumi Ku tshidimu tshionsu, nusunguile Maweja Nangila tshia dikumi tshia bia mu madimi enu
Enza biebe bakeluba babidi ne or mutudibue, ubateke ku matshika a tshibuikilu tshia mushete
Kuakungambila ne, Eu udi mukashi wanyi bualu kai
Nanku neikale tshilejilu tshidi bantu batshipangane natshi, batela dina diende
Yosefe wakambila bana babo ne, Ndi Yosefe mene; tatu wanyi utshidi ne muoyo, anyi
Kanungu ka Beena Kongo bônso badi ne bukookeshi bwa kusanka ne bubanji bwa mu ditunga
Nebateke bionsu pa mabaya a kubiambula nawu
Kadi balombodi bakuabu kabavua bangata miaku ya Maweja Nangila ne mushinga
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bobo bakamba dî dimpe
Kanubienzedi mudimu, kanubikukuidi
Ditempu dionsu divua ne muendeshi ne bena mvita kabidi
Kumumanyishaye kabidi bishima bivuaye mumuleje bua kuenza
Bena Isalele bakaya ne bakashi ba Bena Midiyana ne bana babo bakese, bakangata kabidi bimuna biabo ne bisumbu bia mikoko ne bintu biabo bionso
Nanku nenuikale ne mampa mapite bungi
Kadi bitupa bionsu bia nyama awu, nansha mutu, bibelu ne bia munda mene, kanuena mua kubidia bibishi nansha bilamba to, anu biosha muiku
Kadi Lemeke nebamusombuele misangu makumi muanda mutekete
Buatu abu buikale ne mushiku ku luseka
Aba mbana ba Shobala Aluwana ne Manahata ne Ebala ne Shofo ne Onama
Nunku buloba nebuikale ne bidimu bia kubanda, nebuikale hatuhu hanuikala mu buloba bua bantu badi n enu lukuna buloba buenu nebuikale mua kubanda

Pashishe Moshe kuangata mukila wa tshimpanga atshi, mafuta onsu adi malamate ku bia munda, lutandatanda lua ku mutshima, tuonyi tubidi ne mafuta onsu adi malamateku, kabidi ne tshibelu tshia luseke lua dia balume
Neyikubande pambidi kabidi ne pambidi pa bena mudimu bebe ne pa bantu bebe bonsu
Bena Isalele Badi Bumuka mu Ejipitu Bena Isalele bakaya ku Lamesese tô ne ku Sukota, balume bakenda hanshi bakadi bu bununu nkama isambombo, ne bana kabidi
Mpindiewu ngaleledi Abrahame muana wa ku bukunda buende
Kukuatakajabu mabeji a mutshi wa tshinyi bua kuvuala bu bilamba
Pashishe, muena Izrayele awu umushe mutu ne mafuta, akosolole munyinyi
Yehowa wakangambilaku tshikondo atshi bua meme nnumanyishe mei ne mikenji, bua nuenu kubienza mu buloba bunudi nubuela bua kubuhiana
Biula nebiumuke kûdi ne ku nsubu yebe, ne kudi bahika bebe ne kudi bantu bebe, nebishale anu mu musulu nkayau
Lote uvuabu nende, uvua pende ne mikoku, mbuji ne ngombe

Eu udi mukenji wa disama dia nsudi didi mu tshilulu tshiakenzabo ne miosa ya mikoko anyi ne bintu bia lin, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama anyi tshintu tshia tshiseba, bua kutahulula tshintu tshidi tshiakane ne tshintu tshidi ka tshiyi tshiakane
Yosefe wakadi mukokeshi wa mu buloba, nyeye mene wakadi uhanyisha bantu bonso bintu, bana babo ne Yosefe bakalua, bakamukukuila hanshi
Nomba Mîyama ne Alona Badi Batontolola Mose Mîyama ne Alona bakasonguela Mose bua mukashi wa Bena Kushi wakabakeye, bualu bua yeye wakadi mubake mukashi wa Bena Kushi
Mutuangaji oshe bintu bionsu abi pa tshilambuilu, bualu mmulambu udibu boshila Maweja Nangila
Nenudikuate bua kusombamu
Nuvua batentekele ditunga adi matuku makumi anayi
Alabe kabidi mashi awu ku matumba adi matalame ku tshilambuilu tshia kuoshila manananshi, tshidi muaba wa tshijila
Didi ne biakudia bia bungi, mabele ne buitshi
Buloba kupuka, kubajibikila ne meku abu, ne ntenta yabu, ne bantu bonsu bavua baditue ku tshiabu, bena Izrayele bonsu batangile
Ditunga edi dijima ke dimvua mulaye bankambua benu Abrahame, Izake, Yakobe, ne ndelanganyi yabu
Pingaja mukaji ewu kudi bayende

Bualu bua hanakamana kulua n abo mu buloba bunakalaya batatu abo, budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, ne hakamanabo kudia, kukuta ne kuvunda, hashishe nebakudimune mitshima yabo bua kutendelela nzambi mikuabo, nebayikuatshile mudimu, nebampetule, nebashihe tshihungidi tshianyi
Wakafunda mei a dihungila, mikenji dikumi, ha mabue
Nenuele mashi ayi ku tshilambuilu
Bitalu bienu nebikale bu bidia bia nyunyu yonso ya mu diulu ne bia nyama yonso ya ha buloba; kakuena muntu udi uyihata
Genese Nzambi Udi Uhunga Tshihungidi ne Noa Nzambi wakasankisha Noa ne bana bandi, wakabambila ne, Nulelangane, nukumbane ba bungi, nuikale ha buloba buonso
Kupolabu kabidi bimuma bia grenade ne bia mfiku

Bena Izrayele mbapitshile mu matunga a Edome, Mowabe ne Amone Dituku dikuabu, Maweja Nangila kungambila ne: Pitshilayi luseke lua ku mutu wa ditunga, bualu nudi bashale mu mikuna eyi matuku mapite bungi
Yehowa nealue n enu ne mukelenge unuakateka ku mutu kuenu kudi tshisamba tshinudi kanuyi bamanye, nansha nuenu nansha bankambua benu; nenutendeleleku nzambi mikuabo ya mitshi ne mabue
Kadi, patshivua Tera ne muoyi, Arane kutuila mu Ure wa bena Babilone, ditunga dia bankambua babu

Nunku bungi bua Bena Isalele buakabalabo ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita mu Isalele bungi bua buonso buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu nkama isambombo ne bisatu ne nkama itanu ne makumi atanu
Mose wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso, wakabambila ne, Unvuai, Isalele, mei ne mikenji bindi nnuambila mu matshu enu lelu, bua nuenu nubimanye ne nubienze
Mutuangaji nealeje Maweja Nangila milambu eyi, bua kulongolola muvyele awu ne kujikija buvyele buende
Labane kuambila muena mudimu wa Abrahame ne: Luaku, tuye pambelu, lekela kuimana apa
Nanku nenganyishe bena Izrayele baye kulambula Maweja Nangila milambu
Nanku nebakunemeke
Bena Izrayele badi batshimuna mukalenga Sihone Patuvua mu tshipela tshia Kedemote, mvua mutume bantu bua kusengelela Sihone, mukalenga wa mu Eshebone, ne: Tudi basue kupitshilaku mu ditunga diebe
Yeye wakambila tshisumbu tshia bantu ne, Umukai, ndi nnusengelela, ku ntenta ya bantu aba babi, kanulengi tshintu tshiabo tshianza, kabanushihi bua mibi yabo
Hashikisha Yehowa kubihata, kanuambi mu mitshima yenu ne, Mbualu bua buakane buetu, Yehowa wakaluamu n etu bua kuhiana buloba ebu: bualu bua Yehowa udi ubihata ku mpala kuenu bualu bua bubi buabo
Kadi nebikale bipie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Njila wa : Bidi bitangila Bampulushi ba ditunga dijima ne bilwilu
Bukole bua Mueyelu wanyi buudi nabu, nembuabanyine kabidi bakulu abu tshitupa
Kenaane kulela bana ba balume babidi: Sidone muanabute, ne muakunyende Ete
Ubatelele mihanu ya lin ya kubuikila butaka buabo, mihanu neyikale ku tshimono mifike to ne ku bibelu
Bena Ejipitu kupingaja Moshe ne Arone kudi mukalenga wabu

Mfumu yônso wa ditunga dijima, wa polovensa, wa musoko anyi wa kabukulu udi ne tshia kusungila bumwe bwa Ditunga ne bujima bwa malaba aadi, tshianana badi bamupiisha ne tshibawu tshia dipangila dia ditunga
Kanutatshishi muanenu mupele bua bualu abu

Mose wakabikila Yoshua, wakamuambila ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso ne, Wikale ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima, bualu bua wewe uyaya ne bantu aba mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu babo bua kubahabu; ne wewe neubahianyishe buloba abu
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubikila bena meji ne benji ba bilengulengu ne majimbu ba mu Ejipitu
Ulongeshe Yoshuwa malu onsu
Bena Izrayele kuenza muvua Maweja Nangila mubambile
Mmumue ne: tshia dikumi tshimue tshia tshipimu tshia tshibidilu

Nuenu nenudie bana banuakalela, munyinyi wa bana benu balume ne wa bana benu bakashi bakamuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bualu bua kanyinganyinga kadi kanukuata bua ditshintshimika dia misoko yenu ne bua makenga adi bena lukuna benu banukengesha n au
Nenukebeku mua kudihana kudi badi n enu lukuna bu bahika balume ne bahika bakashi, kadi kakuena muntu udi unusumba
Kanutshinyi to

Kadi muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musungule munkatshi mua bisamba bienu bionso, bua kujadikamu dina diandi: nenukebe muaba kudiye mushikame, nenudisangisheku; nenulueku ne milambu yenu ya kuosha, ne nyama mishiha, ne bintu bia dikumi bia bintu bienu, ne bintu bienu bidibo bakuha, ne milambu ya kuditshiha kuenu, ne bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, ne ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne ba mikoko yenu
Nanku bantu bonsu nebikale banunyema, baye kusokoma
Abimeleke kukema wamba ne: Tshiena mumanye udi muenze nanku to
Ku ndekeelu wa tshipungu tshidibu baleeja ku tulongo twa kumpala twa kanungu aka, padi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga katshiyi tshianyisha mapangadika dîyi aa wôwo adi ajika bukookeshi bwa kwenzeja

Genese Yakoba Udi Wamba Malu Alualua bua Bana Bandi Yakoba Wakabikila bana bandi bonso, wakamba ne, Nudisangishe hamue bua meme kunuambila bua malu alualua kunudi mu matuku adi kayi manze kulua, Nuenu bana balume ba Yakoba, nudisangishe hamue, unvuai di telejai matshu kudi Isalele tatu enu

Wewe newambile Palô ne, Yehowa udi Wamba ne, Isalele udi muan anyi wa balume, muan a bute wanyi, ne meme nakamana kukuambila ne, Ulekela muan anyi wa balume, bualu bua kunkuatshila mudimu, kadi wewe wakahidia kulu ulekela, nunku meme nenshihe muana webe, muan a bute webe
Bonsu babidi kusemena pabuipi
Hashishe, Mose wakabanda ne Alona ne Nadaba ne Abihu ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele makumi muanda mutekete
Tuetu katuena mua kushiya tshimuna tshietu nansha tshimue
Eu newikale mukenji kunudi tshiendelele bua kubuikila bubi bua Bena Isalele musangu umue ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Umukayi muaba udi bantu aba bimane
Dikenga disambombu: maputa Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Nuboye butu bua muiku mu bianza
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Bikila tshisamba tshia bena Levi
Ku ndelanganyi ya bena Refayime bonsu, Oge, mukalenga wa Bashane, ke wa ndekelu udi mushale ne muoyi

Luseka lukwabo, nansha bôbo bikale anu bôbo nkayabu ne bukalenga bwa kufuka mêyi ne kutangila Bukalenga bunene, beena Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga kabeena pa mutu pa mêyi ne mikandu to; dikandika dia kubalenga didi mwa kumbushibwa ne kabidi Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi mwa kushipa Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga pikalatshio anu katshiyi tshipetangana ne Bukalenga bunene
Kadi mpindiewu, Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mmunuvudije bu mitotu ya mulu
Nanku kumupeshaye nkanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole nkama inayi, bilondeshile mishinga ya basumbishi ba bintu
Tshintu tshionsu tshikale Maweja Nangila mutupeshe, neupete pebe
Bena Isalele bakambila Mose ne, Mona
Paudi uya kuinshi kua ditunga, meme nenye ku mutu kuadi
Kumpala kwa kusoomba mu nkwaasa, Minisitila kavulambedi udi uleeja ndongamu wa Bukalenga bunene kudi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga
Kusanganaye bakengesha bana babu ne midimu mipite bukole
Abrame kuashila Maweja Nangila tshilambuilu muaba mene uvua Maweja Nangila mumumuenekele
Meme nenshimbule bitendelelu bienu bidi ku mutu kua mikuna, nenkose mpingu inudi nutendelela n ai diba, nengele bitalu bienu ha mutu ha mpingu yenu, mutshima wanyi neunulengulule

Kanungu ka Badi mwa kudidila Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu bwa kwambaku ne dîyi didibu baswa kupatula kadieena diumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu kudi: a Mulombodi wa ditunga, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi alonda dîba divwabo bamutumina dîyi dimana kwanyisha kashidi; b Bukalenge bunene, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi alonda dimutuminabu dia dîyi dimana kwanyisha kashidi, c Batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi batshipwita bakulumpa bûngi butwa ku tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia beena mu Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi aloonda dianyisha diaadi kashidi
Muntu yonsu uvua musombe mu ditunga diabu, mu tshisamba tshiabu, wakula muakulu wa ditunga diabu
Mose wakambila Eleazâ muakuidi ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, ne bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ya bisamba bia Bena Isalele bua bualu buabo
Bafile kabidi muana wa ngombe mulume, kabidi ne muana wa mukoku wa tshidimu tshimue, kayi ne bulema, bua kubilambula Maweja Nangila bu mulambu wa kuosha
Badi ne tshia kumukuba bu mudibo bakuba bantu ne makanyika mafila mu ndondu ne mêyi
Bakashi bonso bakadi ne lungenyi lule mu mitshima yabo bakakuma bilulu ne miosa ya mbushi
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Meme ndi Yehowa wakakumusha mu Ula wa Bena Kasada, bua kukuha buloba ebu bua kubuhiana
Genese Tunkanunuma tua Esau Kul
Udi ne bua kutonda bubi buende, kupingaja tshintu atshi kudi muenatshi, kusakidila kabidi tshia bitanu tshimue tshia mushinga wa tshintu atshi
Bualu bua muanjelo wanyi neaye ku mpala kuebe, nealue n ebe kudi Bena Amole ne kudi Bena Pelizi ne kudi Bena Hiti ne kudi Bena Kanana ne kudi Bena Hiwi ne kudi Bena Yebuse, ne meme nembashihe
Nuakulua ne bantu ba Yehowa mu tshihela etshi bualu bua kubishiha ne nyama yetu munyi
Meme kuimansha butu abu mu musulu uvua upueka mu mukuna
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Ungambile Udi ne muaba mu nsubu wa tatu webe bua tuetu kulalamu, anyi
Pashishe mashi adi mashale, mutuangaji ayitshikije kuinshi kua tshilambuilu atshi
Kadi bantu balume aba mbenyi banyi, bandi ne bua kulama bimpe
Kanutahi mputu ham bidi henu bua kujinga n ai bantu bafue, kanutahi nsalu ham bidi henu meme ndi Yehowa
Yeye wakamba ne, Kanana udi muedibue mulau, yeye neikale muhika wa bahika kudi bana babo
Moshe kubandamuna ne: Kanutshinyi to
Yehowa Nzambi wakafuka mulume ne dinfuenkenya dia buloba, wakela muhuya wa muoyo mu diulu diandi, ne mulume wakalua ne muoyo
Mayi a mu musulu wa Nile kununka mupuya mubi, bena Ejipitu kabayi mua kunua mayi awu kabidi to
Nuenu ke badiye musungule munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabu bidi pa buloba, bua nuikale tshisamba tshiende menemene
Pashishe kumukaye ku tshilambuilu
Katuena bashiye muntu ne muoyi to
Luhanza lua Palô luakadi mu tshianza tshianza, nakahuola tumuma atu, nakatukamina mu luhanza lua Palô, nakateka luhanza mu tshianza tshia Palo
Tshibangidilu Ndelanganyi ya Adame too ne ku Nowa Ke mena a bantu ba ku ndelanganyi ya Adame: Dituku divua Mvidi Mukulu mufuke bantu, wakabafuka bamufuane yeye Mvi di Mukulu
Kadi tuakadiangatshila bimuna ne bintu bionso bia mu misoko
Kufundabu mena a bantu balume bonsu bavua ne bidimu bituadije ku makumi asatu too ne ku makumi atanu, bavua ne bua kuenza midimu mishilangane ya mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Maweja Nangila neanuepule ku masama onsu, ne ku bipupu bikole bionsu, bivua bikuata bena Ejipitu, munudi bamanye
Kabidi muntu yonsu udi ulenga bulalu abu, asukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi
Bobu kuandamuna tatuabu ne: Muena Ejipitu mukuabu mmutusungidile kudi balami ba mikoku, kabidi mmutusunyine mayi, munuishe bimuna bietu
Mena a bamfumu abu adi nunku: Shamuwa, muana wa Zakure, wa mu tshisamba tshia Rubene
Bualu Maweja Nangila udi ukina bintu ebi
Kadi tatuabu kavua mumanye bionsu bivua bienzeka abi to
Yuda wakamba ne, Netuandamune mukelenge wetu dî manyi

Kudi dinyanga dia lumu anyi diupula dia mushinga wa ditunga bu mudi dîba didi lwendu lwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga anyi lwa Minisitila wa Kavulambedi lubengangana ne bibidilu bia mulowu anyi padibo babajadikila ne badi bênza, bênza pamwe anyi bambulwisha bakwabo mu ditulakaja dibi dia lupetu, dibwejilangana anyi dineema dikandikibwe
Alabe kabidi mashi awu ku matumba adi matalame ku tshilambuilu tshia kuoshila manananshi tshidi muaba wa tshijila
Udi ne tshia kudisungila
Kanuena mua kutua nabu ndondu, kanuena mua kubafuila luse
Mu matuku onso a tshijila tshiandi kabateki dihaya ha mutu n andi, neikale mundi wa tshijila tô ne hashikisheye matuku adiye musue kubijidila kudi Yehowa; nsuki ya ha mutu n andi neyikale mile
Zilepa, muena mudimu wa Lea, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume
Bobo nebalame bintu biebe ne bintu bia mu Ntenta: kadi bobo kabalu ha buihi ne malonga a mu nsubu anyi tshioshelu, bua bobo kabafu ne nuenu kanufu kabidi
Kubutulaye bilobu bia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, bajimine mu Mayi manene makunze
Badi Balengesha Bena Lewi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, ubalengeshe
Abalahama wakaha bana ba bakashi bandi bakuabo matabisha, wakabumusha kudi Isaka hakadiye ne muoyo, wakabatuma ku luseke lua ku esete
MUTU WA MUKANDA MWISÂTU III : BIDI BITANGILA BULONGOLODI NE NGENZELU WA BUKALENGA
Nebabuikile tshilamba tshifikuluke pa bintu bionsu bidibu benza nabi mudimu muaba wa tshijila
Moshe kushala ku mitanda, pamue ne mushete wa ndondu wa Maweja Nangila
Ndi musue kuya kudimuena bua kujadika ne batshidi batungunuka ne buenzavi buabu bu mundi mumvue emu

Biatangila muakuidi ne disama kadiena ditampakane mu tshilulu, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama nansha mu tshintu tshia tshiseba, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Nuvuwe tshintu tshidi ne disama, ne yeye neatshiteke ha buatshi matuku muanda mutekete makuabo
Bâna badi ne tshia kwambulwisha baledi baabo
Lufu lua Alona ku Mukuna wa Hô Bakabisha luendu luabo mu Kadesha, ne Bena Isalele bonso bakalua ku mukuna wa Hô
Kanuikadi ne bihiminu bibidi mu nsubu yenu, ne tshinene ne tshikese
Abrahame kulongolola masanka dituku adi
Bena Isalele bakabikila bidia abi ne, Mana Tshiakadi tshintu tshitoke tô bu ntete ya conandre, tshiakadi tshintu tshia kutua kuimpe bu mikata mienza ne bintshi
Wewe ubishe mujangala webe, wolola tshianza tshiebe ha mai, wahandulule, Bena Isalele nebaye munkatshi mua mai ha buloba bûme
Elishure, muana wa Shedeyure, ke uvua ulombola bena Rubene
Palô wakatabala, wakamanya ne, Ntshilota
Nzambi Wakenza nyama ya ha buloba bu mudi mishindu yai, ne bimuna bu mudi mishindu yabi, ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi bu mudi mushindu watshi
Hakunvua mukelenge wa Yosefe mei akamuambila mukashi wandi ne, Muntu webe wakungenzela nunku, tshiji tshikole tshiakamukuata
Mose wakambila Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena ne, Nudi basue bana benu baye ku nvita, ne nuenu nushikame kunoko, anyi
Tshituha tshia buloba bunudi nuha Bena Lewi netshikale ku lumbu lua musoko tô ne ku coudées tshinunu ku nseke yonso
Nanku mbimpe tuye nebe
Tshituha tshibi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne Miyama ne, Busatu buenu nulue mu ntenta wa kusambakena Busatu buabo bakaluamu
Kanupu bualu ebu muoyi diba nansha dimue
Bikaleye kayi musankishe mukelenge wakamubaka, nunku yeye neitabushe ne bamuhikule, kadi yeye kena mua kumuhana kudi ba bende bualu bua yeye wakamudinga
Kulengululaye bualu abu
Nanku, lekelayi kuendakana dituku dia muanda mutekete
Sheme, nkambua wa Bena Ebê, muan abo ne Yafete, yeye mene wakalela bana
Ekesode Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi Palô, umuambile ne, Yehowa udi Wamba ne, Lekela bantu banyi baye kuntendelela
Bobo nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, wakabahatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua meme kuikala munkatshi muabo, ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi wabo
Dibadika Moshe udi utuma batentekedi mu Kenaane Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Usungule mukulu umue ku tshisamba tshionsu tshia bena Izrayele
Yosefe wakambila Palô ne, Kammeme to, kadi Nzambi neahe Palô kujingulula kudi ne ditalala
Kuikishaye pabuipi ne tshiina tshia mayi
Biahidia mukashi kukulonda, hashishe, munda muebe nemu ikale mutoke ku kuditshiha eku
Tshionsu tshidi tshilenga munyinyi wa mulambu awu netshinyanguke
Mmutuadije kabidi ku Sodome ne Ngomore, too ne ku Adma ne Seboyime pabuipi ne Lesha
Kanungu ka Bukookeshi bwa kwikala ne nzubu wa nsongu, bwa kupeta mâyi a kunwa ne nzembwa budi bujadikibwa
Balombodi ba bibambalu bibidi ebi badi ne tshia kwikala beena Kongo ba bangabanga
Kadi batentekedi bavua baye ne Kalebe mu luendu alu kubenga, bamba ne: Katuena mua kuluangana ne bantu aba to
Bialenga muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi tshivuadi tshia dima tshianza, nebatshishihe, ne nguvu yonso yakasongabo ya mabaya nebayuvuwe ne mai

Bobo nebenze mushete wa mutshi wa acacia buludi bua mushete nebuikale coudées ibidi ne tshituha, ne butshiama buau nebuikale coudée umue ne tshituha, ne bule buau bua mulu nebuikale coudée umue ne tshituha
Bowa ne luzakalu kumuenzabi bikole

Ditunga dia Kongu wa mungalata didi dikumbaja kudi tshimenga tshia Kinshasa ne polovensa dikumi idi ilonda eyi idibo bamanya kudi Mbulamatadi: Bandundu, Bas Congo, Equateur, KasaÏ Occidental, Kasaï Oriental, Katanga, Maniema, Nord Kivu, Province Orientale, Sud Kivu
Izake kumunanga bikole
Kadi ndelanganyi ya Rubene ne ya Ngade, ndi muyipeshe ditunga dia pankatshi pa ditunga dia Ngilaade ne musulu wa Amone
Nengele bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba lupemba mu dina diende
Mutuangaji awoshe pa tshilambuilu, bualu mmulambu wa dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila

Eu newikale mukenji wa tshiendelele kudibo muntu udi umiamine mai a kubalengesha n au, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, muntu udi ulenga mai a kubalengesha n au tshianza neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo
Yehowa wakahueka mu diulu, wakalua ha mutu ha mukuna wa Sinai
Bantu bakunvua lumu, bakutshina, mikemu yakukuata Bena Peleshete
Nakukunvuila bualu bua Yishemaele kabidi, mona, nakumusankisha, nemmukumbashe, nemmuvuishe bisamba bia bungi, yeye nealele baminyampala dikumi ne babidi, nemmuvuishe tshisamba tshinene
Ndi ntua kabidi ndondu ne bionsu binuvua bapatuke nabi mu buatu: nyunyi, bimuna ne nyama ya muitu, kabidi ne bivuavua kuenda ne muoyi pa buloba pashishe
Kubikilaye Moshe munkatshi mua tshipuka ne: Moshe
Kabidi nudi mua kuadila amu muaba wa tshijila
Dilolu kumvuabu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wendakana mu lupangu, mulume ne mukaji kubutama munkatshi mua mitshi ivua mu lupangu
Ambule dianza dia bukula, aboshe pa tshilambuilu, bualu mmulambu wa tshivulukilu wa kuosha udi ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Mose Wakenza bu muakamuambila Yehowa; bantu bonso bakasangakena ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Neambule yeye mene bionsu bidibu ne bua kulambula Maweja Nangila: ke munyinyi wa mafuta, ne tshiadi tshia nyama awu
Muntu keena mwa kwanji kufunda Mulombodi wa ditunga ne Minisitila Kavulambedi ku tubadi bwa bibawu bikalabo babûnda pambelu pa midimu yabo too ne ku tshikondo tshiaajika bumfumu bwabo
Nengolole tshianza tshianyi, nembakengeshe ne malu a kukema; ne ku nyima kua malu â yeye neanulekele
Wakâteka ha bilulu bia ha maha bia efoda, mabue â akadi bu tshivulukidi kudi bana ba balume ba Isalele bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kadi nebabanye buloba anu ku nshobo, bobo nebahiane buloba ku mena a bisamba bia batatu abo
Netutule muele wa mvita, tubabunde bonsu
Nunku wewe neumushe Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, Bena Lewi nebikale banyi

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula; ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi; ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia; ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Pagiele, muana mulume wa Okelana
MUTU WA MUKANDA VIII: Bidi bitangila ditangilula dia Dîyi dikulu

Hahileye bua bualu bubi, yeye neatonde bualu bubi buakenzeye yeye neafile mulambu kudi Yehowa wa disambuka dia mikenji, nansha muana mukashi wa mukoko nansha muana mukashi wa mbushi, bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne muakuidi neafile mulambu bua kumubuikidila n au bubi buandi
Apeshe mutuangaji bukula abu, bua yeye ambule dianza dia bukula abu bu mulambu wa tshivulukilu, oshe bukula abu pamue ne milambu mikuabu idibu boshila Maweja Nangila
Tshibangidilu Ndelanganyi ya bana ba Nowa Kul
Nowa kuitaba, kuenza bionsu bivua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile
Pashishe neamuenzele bionsu bidi bikengela bua muntu kikadi ne mikiya
Moshe kumuandamuna ne: Bantu aba mbafike kundi bua kuebeja mudi Mvidi Mukulu mua kukosa bilumbu biabu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Uye biebe ku mpala kua bantu, ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele baye n ebe, angata mulangala webe mu tshianza, uwakakuma n au musulu, ya biebe
Maweja Nangila kumukandika ne: Kulengi muana, kumuenzedi bibi
Kanudi tshintu ne mashi atshi, kanutempi mbuku, kanuenji bilengulengu
Kumutentekelapu ne bapika balume ne bakaji, mikoku, mbuji ne ngombe
Diswika diônso anyi dipangadika diônso badi badiangata mudibio mu mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu anyi mwa Tshisangilu tshia bibambalu biônso

Nakangata bualu bubi bunuakenza, kana ka ngombe mene, nakakosha ne kahia, nakakadiata munda mua dikasa, nakakabotesha bu dinfuenkenya dia buloba: nakela dinfuenkenya diaku mu kasulu kakadi kafuma ku mukuna
Bintu bionsu bidibu bumusha ku mulambu wa tshijila udi bena Izrayele balambula, bidi bintu bia mutuangaji

Mulubu wa mu katoba mu katoba wa dishintakaja dia ngenyi pamwe ne mikanda ya tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe badi bayipatula mu bibejibeji bia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga

Yosefe wakabangata bubidi buabo, Efelayima ku tshianza tshiandi tshia balume ne mpala wandi mutangile ku tshianza tshia bakashi tshia Isalele, ne Manashe ku tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi mutangile ku tshianza tshia balume tshia Isalele, wakabasemesha ha buihi n andi
Wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ku nyima ne munda mua mushete, wakateka tshiamu tshia or ku mibangu ya mushete
Padi muntu wambula nyama ayi mimane kufua, nansha yeye musukule bilamba biende, utshidi amu ne mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Abrame kushala mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Uteke tshiowelu hankatshi ha ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshioshelu tshia milambu, welemu mai
Mukanda mwenza kudi kasumbu kasanga ka bantu ba bûngi bwa momumwe badi baufila ku Bibambalu biônso bibidi bwa biwanyisha
Bena Amaleke mbase kuinshi kua ditunga
Kadi bikunyibua bikuabu kabivua binyanguke, bualu kabivua bianji kutoloka to
Maweja Nangila kufika munda bikole
Nanku muaba onsu uvua mukaji awu musombe, nansha bulalu buvuaye mulale pawaye ku tshijila tshia bakaji, bidi bipia mikiya
Kadi pa wabu bakengesha bena Izrayele nanku, bavua amu bavulangana mu ditunga dijima

Hakuvudishila Yehowa, Nzambi webe, disanka, bikala nshila mutambe kule, ne wewe kuena mua kutuala bintu biebe bualu bua muaba udi Yehowa neusungule bua kujadikamu dina diandi udi utamba kule, hashishe neubihane ku argent: wangate argent mu tshianza tshiebe, uye biebe ku muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, musungule; neudisumbile bintu bidi mutshima webe musue, nansha ngombe nansha mikoko nansha mioyo nansha maluvu makole nansha bintu bionso biudi musue; neubidie ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, neusanke, wewe ne ba mu nsubu webe
Bikala mulambu webe wa bukula budibo balamba mu dilonga, newikale wa bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene busangisha ne manyi
Ebi ke bisamba bionsu bidi bitumbisha Nowa biamba ne: Udi nkambua wetu, bilondeshile ku meku abu ne ku bisamba biabu
Bakalua mu tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bakakosamu ditamba diakadi ne tshisumbu tshia mamuma a nvinyo, bakadituala ku mutshi babidi, balualua ne mamuma makuabo a grenade ne a nfigi
Yehowa neanutumine milau ne makenga ne mahumbisha mu malu anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu, tô ne hanuajimishibua ne hanûmushibua lubilu ha buloba; bualu bua bubi bua bienzedi bienu, bua nuakundekela
Nunku bakahungakasha tshihungidi ku Bê sheba, ne Abimeleke ne Pikola, kamanda ka masalayi andi, bakabika, bakahingana ku buloba bua Bena Peleshete

Pikala muntu musue kundambula ngombe bua mulambu wa kuosha nansha wa bobumue, nansha bua kukumbaja malaya, nansha bua mulambu wa tshibidilu, ku nyama yonsu awu, asakidile kilo tshitema ya bukula, budibu basambakaja ne mafuta litre isatu
Bualu ebu nebuikale bu mukenji wa tshiendelele mu nsubu yenu yonso mu bikondo bienu bionso kanudi nansha dianyi nansha mashi

Moshe, mufikishi wa malu a Mvidi Mukulu kudi bantu Nuenu bumvue diyi adi mu midima ivua ku mukuna utema kapia, bamfumu ne balombodi ba bisamba bienu bia bena Izrayele, kufika kundi, bamba ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu, mmumane kutuleja butumbi ne bukole buende

Muana wa bakaji yonsu wafika bua kusuna mayi, pangamulomba ne: Umpeshe mayi a kunua , pikalaye muitabe bua kumpesha mayi a meme kunua, ne bua kunuisha tumelu tuanyi, nemmanye ne: yeye ke udi Maweja Nangila musunguile Izake
Bena Izrayele kumona bitalu bia bena Ejipitu ku muelelu wa mayi
Onana wakamanya ne bana aba kabena bikala bu bana banyi ne hakayeye kudi mukashi wa mukulu andi, wakalela hanshi, bua yeye kaleledi mukulu andi bana
Ndelanganyi ya Ismayele ivua miase pankatshi pa Avila ne Shure
Mutuangaji nealambule nyunyi umue bua mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu, nyunyi mukuabu bua mulambu wa kuosha
Nzambi wakamba ne, Bulelela, nengikale n ebe, nenkuhe tshimanyinu etshi tshidi tshilesha ne nakukutuma hawahatula bantu badi mu Ejipitu, nenutendelele Nzambi ha mukuna eu
Udi umpesha bantu bungi nenku, bua meme kubalombola bualu kaayi
Hakatshia butuku bakatuma balume aba ne mpunda yabo kuabo
Elishama, muana wa Amikude, ke uvua ulombola bena Efrayime
Bakabakengesha ne mudimu mukole, mudimu wa tushola ne buloba busoha ne midimu yonso ya mu madimi
Yakoba Udi Unyema Labana Hashishe Yakoba wakabika, wakateka bakashi bandi ne bana bandi ha nyima ha tumelo
Nanku Yetro, tatuende muenu wa Moshe, ne mukaji wa Moshe, pamue ne bana ba Moshe babidi abu, kufika mu tshipela ku mukuna wa Mvidi Mukulu, muaba uvua Moshe mutudile
Bana babo bakaya kudiye kabidi bakafua mpala yabo hanshi ku mesu kuandi, bakamba ne, Mona, Buonso buetu tudi bahika bebe
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Bamfumu kabena mua kufika bonsu musangu umue to
Bonsu abu, bisumbu bisatu, ke badi ne bua kubanga luendu, benza tshiluilu tshia kumpala
Nuenu bakumbaje mikenji eyi, matuku onsu atshidi diulu kulu ne buloba panshi, nenushale ne muoyi, nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu, mu ditunga divua Maweja Nangila mulaye bankambua benu
Ndaku, ubikile bakulu ba bena Izrayele bonsu, ubambile ne: Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu, wa Abrahame, wa Izake ne wa Yakobe mmummuenekele
Nennulekele, nuye

Nunku nuenu nenutahulule nyama udi muimpe ne nyama udi kayi muimpe ne nyunyu udi muimpe ne udi kayi muimpe, kanuonyi mitshima yenu kudi nyama anyi nyunyu anyi kudi tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi binakunuhidisha bu tshintu tshidi ka tshiyi tshimpe
Kanungu ka
Kadi misangu yonsu idibu babuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena ne mashi a nyama wa mulambu bua kukobolola nawu bantu muaba wa tshijila, kabena mua kudia munyinyi wa nyama awu
Kena muanyishe bua bena Izrayele bumuke to
Meme nakadiangatshila bana benu, Bena Lewi, munkatshi mua Bena Isalele badi bu kuha kuebe kuwakuha Yehowa bua kuenza mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Kadi mwuluke anu mikenji indi mumane kunuambila
Kadi kabena mua kusemena pa buipi ne tshilambuilu, nansha ne muaba udi bintu bia tshijila to
Maweja Nangila muikale ku lusongu lua mukuna kubikila Moshe, umuambila ne: Ndaku, wambile bena Izrayele, ndelanganyi ya Yakobe, ne: Nudi badimuene mundi muenzele bena Ejipitu
Njila mwisâtu : Bidi bitangila diumvwangana pankatshi pa bukalenga bwenzeji ne bukalenga bweenji bwa mêyi
Bululu mu mayi kujika
Kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neabafile mu bianza bienu, neabakengeshe ne makenga makole, tô ne hajiminabo
Enza biebe nkanu ya or ibidi, uyiteke ku nseke ibidi kuinshi kua mutu watshi; neyikale bu miaba ya kubueshamu mitshi ya kutshituadila

Bakenza n atshi nkanu ya ku tshibi tshia nsubu, ne tshioshelu tshia nyama ne biamu bitshiamakane, ne malonga onso a tshioshelu, ne nkanu ya ku luhangu, ne nkanu ya ku tshibi tshia luhangu, ne milonda yonso ya mu nsubu, ne milonda yonso ya mu luhangu lua ku muaba wa tshitendelelu
Tshisamba tshia Naftali:
dipeta dia bintu bwa majinga a polovensa;
Nanku nenganyishe mupuya muimpe wabi
Bana babo bakadi n andi mukau, kadi tatu wandi wakateka mei au mu mutshima wandi
Nunku nuenu kanuakantuma kunoko, kadi Nzambi wakantuma; nyeye wakanvuisha bu tatu wa Palô ne mukelenge wa nsubu wandi wonso, ne mukokeshi wa buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Pashishe mashi adi mashale, ayitshikije kuinshi kua tshilambuilu atshi
Maluvu mamane kumutenduka, Nowa kumvua tshivua muanende wa mukala mumuenzele atshi
Muenyi udi ushikama munkatshi muenu ikale bu muntu udi muledibue mu nsubu yenu, numusue bu munudi badisue, bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba bua Ejipitu meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Padiku kakuyi midimu, kakweena tshipwita umwe udibo mwa kukwata kakuyi dianyisha dia bilo ba Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi bia Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe to, amu padibo bamukwata tshianza mu tshisaka, padibo banyisha bwa kumufunda anyi padibo bamupisha tshiendelele
Moshe ne Arone kuandamuna mukalenga ne: Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Ebrewu mmutumuenekele

Nakumûsha tente ne Nyuma wa Nzambi ne lungenyi ne dijingulula ne meji mu kuenza kua midimu yonso ya bianza, bua kulongololeye bintu bia or ne bia argent ne bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne bintu bidibo basonga n abi mabue, ne bidibo basonga n abi mitshi, ne midimu yonso ya bantu badi ne lungenyi lule
Bualu bua bintu bionso biakumusha Nzambi kudi tatu etu mbietu ne bia bana betu, nunku wenza malu onso akukuambila Nzambi
Maweja Nangila kumupesha muoyi wa tshitunu, bua numone mua kumunyenga ditunga dinudi mpindiewu
Nukose tshilumbu anu muditshi
Nanku, mutuangaji neakobolole bena Izrayele bonsu basange ntete bu pa tshibidilu
Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nshiha musoko bualu bua bantu makumi anai
Kadi nudi mua kudia bintu bionso bidi ne mahuahua bidi bienda ne mikolo mai bituhike ha buloba, nudi mua kudia mikumbi ne nsua ne bintunte ne mintuntu
Mose wakabikila Mishaele ne Elesafana, bana balume ba Uziele, tatu mukuabo wa Alona, wakabambila ne, Luai ha buihi, numushe bana benu ku mpala kua muaba wa tshijila, yai n abo ku nyima kua tshitudilu
Mose wakalua ne Alona ne bana bandi balume, wakabowesha ne mai

Meme ndi mbikila diulu ne buloba bu bamonyi ba bualu ne, Nakuteka muoyo ne lufu, ne disanka ne mulau ku mpala kuenu lelu: muiku nudisunguile muoyo, nenuikale ne muoyo ne nuenu ne bana benu, bua kunanga Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kutumikila dî diandi, ne bua kumulamata; bualu bua yeye udi muoyo wenu ne muvudishi wa matuku enu; nunku nenushikame mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bua kubahabu
Bulelela, Sara mmuanetu wa bakaji
Kadi bua kumuka ku Kadeshe Barneya, kufika ku musulu ewu, tuvua banenge mu njila bidimu makumi asatu ne muanda mukulu
Yakoba wakamukudimuna ne, Mukelenge wanyi udi mumanye ne bana batshidi batekete ne mikoko ne ngombe bidi ne bana, ne biabenzeshabo lukasa lukasa anu dituku dimue, bimuna bionso nenfue
Kanuenji tshimfuanyi tshia tshintu nansha tshimue tshidiye munukandike
Bintu bionso bia mu mai bidi kabiyi ne mialala ne mabamba nebikale bintu bibi kunudi
Moshe kuteka tshianza pa tshiadi

Yeye neikale bu nyama wa mpunda udi ne luonji munkatshi mua bantu, tshianza tshiandi netshiluishe muntu yonso, ne tshianza tshia muntu yonso netshimuluishe kabidi, yeye neikale mutangilangane ne bana babo bonso Yeye wakidika Yehowa wakamuambila malu au ne, Wewe udi Nzambi udi utangila, bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Nakamana kumona Nzambi, munyi mundi nshala ne muoyo
Bavua bayiteka panshi nseke yonsu ku mpenga kua mitanda bua kuyanyika
Ke bankambua ba meku a bena Rubene
Mu matunga awu, nenuikale nutendelela mvidie ya mabue, nansha ya mitshi misonga kudi bantu, idi kayiyi imona, kayiyi yumvua, kayiyi idia, nansha inunkila
Yuda, bana benu nebakutumbishe, tshianza tshiebe netshifiekele mu nshingu ya bantu badi n ebe lukuna, bana ba tatu ebe nebakukukuile
Nuenu bena Izrayele nuteleje bionsu bindi nnuambila, nubikumbaje
Kadi bilema binudi nuenza mu mudimu wenu wa butuangaji nebitangile anu wewe Arone ne ndelanganyi yebe
Mu matuku onso a tshijila tshiandi kadi tshindi tshiakenzabo ne mitshi ya tumuma ku ntete ya tumuma tô ne ku bihusu biatu
Maweja Nangila kupueka bua kubandila tshimenga ne kaleya bivua bantu abu base
Mutuangaji amukenkete
Nudi bamanye ne nakukuatshila tatu enu mudimu ne bukole buanyi buonso Tatu wenu wakundinga, wakakudimuna difutu dianyi misangu dikumi, kadi Nzambi kakitabusha bua yeye kunkengesha

Bana ba balume ba Yakoba bakalua munkatshi mua bantu bafue bakahaula musoko, bualu bua bobo bakanyanga muan abo wa bakashi Bakangata mikoko yabo ne ngombe yabo ne mpunda yabo, ne bintu biakadi mu musoko, ne bintu biakadi mu madimi, ne biuma biabo bionso ne bana babo ne bakashi babo, bakabangata bu bahika babo ba mu nvita bionso mene biakadi mu nsubu
Wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi muana wa nganyi

Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakimana mu nshila mukese udi hankatshi ha madimi a tumuma, lumbu luakadi ku luseke elu, ne lumbu ku luseke lukuabo Mpunda wakatangila muanjelo wa Yehowa, wakadikuma ku lumbu, wakasunsula dikasa dia Belâma ku lumbu, ne yeye wakamukuma kabidi
Hakila butuku yeye wakangata Lea, muan andi wa bakashi, wakamufila kudiye, ne yeye wakabuela n andi mu nsubu
Mukuna ewu wa Ermone, bena Sidone badi baubikila ne: Sifiyone
Kakahanda mume mu tshitudilu butuku, mana akamueneka n au
Wewe kuolola diboku diebe dia bukole, buloba kumina baluishi betu

Ubambile kabidi ne, Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua bana benu ku bikondo biabo bionso udi ulua ha buihi ne bintu bidi Bena Isalele bajidile Yehowa ne mubidi wandi kauyi muakane, nebamumushe ku mesu kuanyi meme ndi Yehowa
Uye mu ditunga dindi nkuleja
Kadi kanuena mua kudia munyinyi wa nyama muikale ne mashi
Nunku Bena Isalele bakashikama mu buloba bua Bena Amole
Kanungu ka Bampulushi ba ditunga dijima kabeena babwelakana mu mianda ya tshidiidi to
Yeye wakalekela Mose
Uvua mumone muvua muana ne mubidi muimpe
Kadi binuikala kanuyi baditshiha, bualu ebu kabuena bubi kunudi
Nuenu nuelangane meji mu mitshima yenu ne, Bu mudi tatu ukengesha muan andi mulume, nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanukengesha
Dielulula Tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila Nuenu bena Izrayele, nuvuluke mua kuenzela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu tshibilu tshia Dipita diende, mu ngondu wa Abibe wa tshidimu tshionsu
Moshe kuela butu abu mulu

Ebi mbintu biebe kabidi: bintu bidi Bena Isalele banyukula, ne milambu yonso idibo bakuha, nakunuha ne bana bebe balume ne bana bebe bakashi badi n ebe, bu tshintu tshienu tshiendelele muntu yonso udi muakane mu nsubu webe neabidie
Muntu yonsu udi ulenga tshintu tshivua pa bulalu bua mukaji awu, nansha tshivua pa muaba uvuaye musombe, neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Maweja Nangila kumuka muaba awu ne tshiji
dibanza dia mbulamatadi dia ditunga;
Bantu bonso bakabalabo ba mu tshitudilu tshia Efelayima bakadi binunu lukama ne muanda mukulu ne lukama lumue ku bisumbu biabo

Lewitiki Milambu ya Kuosha Yehowa Wakabikila Mose, wakamuambila mu ntenta wa kusangakena ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Halua muntu ne bintu bidiye musue kuoshila Nzambi, alue biandi ne mulambu wa muana wa ngombe anyi muana wa mukoko
Moshe kuandamuna ne: Lekela kungumvuila mukawu

Biafuilanganabo bua tshintu tshionso, nansha ngombe nansha mpunda nansha mukoko nansha bilulu nansha bintu bikuabo bidi bantu bamba ne, Ebu mbualu bua bantu baye kudi balumbuluishi, muntu udi balumbuluishi bahishe yeye neafute mukuandi bintu misangu ibidi
Meme kuteka bua bikale bamfumu, banulombola mu bisumbu bia bantu tshinunu, lukama nansha makumi atanu, too ne ku bia bantu dikumi
Kadi kena mua kuelamu mafuta nansha kutekamu musenga wa kamonya to, bualu mmulambu wa bualu budibu babanda nabu mukaji, kabayi bajadike

Ukuate mudimu webe matuku asambombo, wenza midimu yebe yonso, kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete didi Lumingu lua Yehowa, Nzambi webe Dituku adi kuenji mudimu, nansha wewe nansha muan ebe wa balume nansha muan ebe wa bakashi nansha muhika webe mulume nansha muhika webe mukashi nansha bimuna biebe nansha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuebe, bualu bua Yehowa wakafuka diulu ne buloba ne mai manene ne bintu bionso bidimu matuku asambombo, wakikisha biandi dituku dia muanda mutekete, nunku Yehowa wakalengesha dituku dia muanda mutekete, wakadijidila
Pikala bena mu diku bakese kabayi mua kudia munyinyi awu kujikija, badisange ne bena mutumba bilondeshile bungi bua bantu
Nzambi wakasokolola bubi bua bantu bebe, tangila, buonso buetu tudi bahika bebe, ne tuetu ne muntu wakasanganabo ne luhanza
Kumulombi tshia kasombela ku argent iwakamusombesha anyi ku bintu bia kudia biwakamuha
Bikala mukuenu kayi ha buihi n enu, anyi biwikala kuyi mumumanye, hashishe nuye n abi ku nsubu kuenu, nushale n abi tô ne halua mukuenu bua kubikeba, nuenu nubihingashe kudiye

Nakumana kuamba ne, Nennuhatule mu dikenga dia Ejipitu, nendue n enu mu buloba bua Bena Kanana ne bua Bena Hiti ne bua Bena Amole ne bua Bena Pelese ne bua Bena Hiwi ne bua Bena Yebuse, mu buloba budi ne mabele ne buitshi bia bungi
Nudi bamanye bionsu bidi Maweja Nangila muenze
Yakoba wakatuma di wakabikila Lakele ne Lea mu budimi buakadi bimuna biandi, wakabambila ne, Ndi ntangila ne mpala wa tatu enu kena bu muvueye diambedi kadi Nzambi wa tatu wanyi wakadi n anyi
Bualu bua meme ndi mumanye kutomboka kuenu ne tshitshu tshienu: monai, hantshidi ne muoyo munkatshi muenu lelu, nuakumana kutombokela Yehowa; nenutambe kutomboka ku nyima kua lufu luanyi
bulongolodi bwa dishintakaja dia kashintu
Wewe newenze tshikowelu bikeshe bikeshe ne buanda bua lin muimpe, ne wewe newenze tshilulu tshia lin muimpe ne mukaba muimpe mutambe
Bantu baka tontolola Mose ne, Netunue tshinyi

Kadi bikala mushihi mubi tshile butshika bua musoko wakanyemeneye, ne bikala musombuedi musangakene n andi ku butshika bua musoko wandi wa kunyemena, ne bikala musombuedi mushihe mushihi wa muntu, yeye kena ne bualu bubi, bualu bua yeye wakadi ne bualu bua kuikala mu musoko wa kunyemena to ne bakafua muakuidi munene, kadi ku nyima kua lufu lua muakuidi munene mushihi udi mumanye mua kuhingana ku buloba bua buhianyi buandi
Bilwilu, dikuba ne mianda ya matunga a beenyi bidi mu tshitupa tshia dikwatshishangana pankatshi pa Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne Bukalenga bunene
Kadi batumibue babidi kukoka Lote, kumubueja mu nzubu, kukanga tshiibi

Badi mwa kusanka nabu anu mu bulongolodi bufila kudi mêyi a ditunga adi kabidi mwa kubukandika anyi kubukeepeshila beena bilwilu bia ditunga ne bakubi ba bantu anyi bwa ngenzelu anyi mudimu wa mbulamatadi kampanda udi ne diambulwisha dinene kudi ditunga
Yosefe Mubandishibue bu Muloho wa Bena Ejipitu Bualu ebu buakadi buimpe ku mesu kua Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi bonso

Bikala mulume anyi mukashi ne mputa ku mutu anyi ku muedi, muakuidi neatangile ha muaba au, bielanganeye meji ne mputa udi ubuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, ne nsuki yakuandamuka mitoke tô, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi didi ku mutu anyi ku muedi

Muntu wanyi Mose kena nunku, yeye udi wenza mudimu wandi bimpe mu nsubu wanyi wonso, meme nensombe n andi mukana ha mukana, ne mei adiye mumanye, tshiena nsomba n andi ne nsumuinu, neatangile mundidimbi wa Yehowa nunku kanuakutshina bua kusonguela mundi wanyi Mose munyi
Bantu binyikile misoku ne miaba ya kusomba mu mitanda mena abu
Pa kusakidila pa bina abio, Minisitila kavulambedi udi upeta makookeshi a pabwawo adi amwambulwisha mu midimu yende

Bilondeshila bulongolodi ebu, pikalabo kabayi bapatula dîyi ditangila lupetu lwa tshidimu mu dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu wa lwîshi wa tshikondu tshia ndongamu wa lupetu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga, mu dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene dikala dishintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, udi upeesha tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia lupetu bukola, kayi upwa mooyi makumbaja meelela tukanda kudi Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu
Ke pandi ngamba ne: kabakuikala ne tshiabu tshitupa tshia buloba, bu mudi bisamba bikuabu bia bena Izrayele natshi
Nundombele Yehowa, bualu bua makubakuba ne mabue a nvula biakututonda, nennulekele, kanuena nushala kabidi
Tshitupa : Bidi bitangila bumfumu bwa kabukulu Kanungu ka Bumfumu bwa kabukulu budi bumanyika
Muanjelo wa Yehowa Mutumibue bua Kulomboleye Bena Isalele Mona, ndi nfuma muanjelo ku mpala kuebe, bua kukulama mu nshila ne bua kulua n ebe mu muaba unakakulongoluela
Kanungu ka Polovensa mudibo bayitela kudi kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi idi yenza bitupa bia malaba bia masungula a batshipwita bakulumpa ba Bukalenga bwa kumpala
Ndayi nende bua ikale mukaji wa Izake, muana wa mfumuebe, bu mudi Maweja Nangila mulongolole
Muntu mulume udi kayi mutengula nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo, bualu bua yeye wakashiha tshihungidi tshianyi
Mu buloba bua bisamba bienu, Maweja Nangila neasungule muaba anu umue, muaba udiye musue kusomba bua numonangane nende, numutendelelemu
Tshidi mwa kusopweesha, mu tshiôtshi nkayatshi, Bukalenga bunene ne polovensa pa malongolola aditshi tshimona akumbana mwa kutanshisha bubanji ne nsombelu wa beena ditunga
Bidi bienzela ditunga diônso dijima mudimu
Ku nyima kua lufu lua Abalahama Nzambi wakasankisha Isaka muan andi, ne Isaka wakashikama mu Be laha loi
Muana wa mukalenga kuambila mamu awu ne: Angata muana ewu, umunkoleshile
Bakumuka mu Lisa bakashikama mu Kehelata
Nenku mutuangaji neapatuke mu tshimenga ne nyunyi uvua mushale ne muoyi, amulekele, abuke, aye mu tshisuku
Abalama wakatshidi uya ku Sude
Kanuluatshi tshilulu tshiakakumabo ne miosa ya mikoko misambakasha ne buanda bua lin
Butuku abu kumushabu tatuabu maluvu
Ekesode Mai Adi Ahatuka ku Dibue Bena Isalele bakabisha luendu luabo mu tshihela tshia Sinai, bakashikama mu Lefidima bu muakamba Yehowa, kabakasanganamu mai a kunua
Bikala mulambu wa mundi wa kumuvuisha n au ditalala wa munkatshi mua mikoko wa kudia kudi Yehowa, neafue mulume nansha mukashi udi kayi ne tshilema
Dibadika dia bantu edi, divua dienzeka bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Au mmeku a Bena Lewi ku nsubu ya batatu abo

Mbulamatadi udi ushindika ne muntu yônso udi mwa kupeta ne kwenza mudimu,ushindika ne udi umwepula ku dipangila dia mudimu, ne kabidi udi ushindika ne muntu yônso udi ne tshia kupeta difutu dilelela ne dikumbana bwa kumwambulwisha yêye ne dîku diende, bwa kwikala ne ngikadilu ulonda mushinga wa bumuntu, ngikadilu mukumbaja kudi mishindu mikwabo yônso ya dikuba dia majinga a bantu, bu mudi pansio wa bujika ngondu ne pansio wa kashidi
Ke mutuvua bakuate ditunga didi ku mutu kua tshimenga tshia Aroyere, tshidi pabuipi ne musulu wa Amone
Lewitiki Kabendi Masandi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Ubiteke mu tshisaka tshimue, ulue n abi mu tshisaka ne muana wa ngombe ne bimpanga bibidi
Moshe ne Arone kuya kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, kumuambila ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Ebrewu, udi wamba ne: Mbimpe udipuekeshe kumpala kuanyi

Lewitiki Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Eu udi mukenji wa muena nsudi mu dituku didibo bamulengesha, nebalue handi kudi muakuidi, ne muakuidi neaye biandi ku butshika bua tshitudilu, ne muakuidi neatangile, ne bikala disama dia muena nsudi dishike, neambile bantu bua bamuangatshile nyunyu ibidi idi miakane ne mitshi ya cèdre ne bintu bikunze kunzû, ne mabeshi a hisopa; muakuidi neambile bantu bua bashihele nyunyu umue mu tshivuadi tshia dima ha mutu ha mai adi ahueka
Tshisamba tshia Isakare:

Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Padi muntu kampande munyangakaje mikenji ya Maweja Nangila, muenzele mukuende bibi: Tutele tshilejilu: padi muntu uvila bua tshintu tshivuabu batekesha kudiye, tshintu tshivuaye musombe, tshintu tshivuaye muibe, tshintu tshivuaye munyenge ku bukole, nansha bua tshintu tshijimine tshivuaye muangule, uvila ne: tshiena mutshimone to; nansha kabidi padi muntu uditshipa mitshipu ya dishima bua kupeta tshintu ne budimu, muntu awu mmuena tshibawu, bualu mmuenze bualu bubi
Nanku kanuenji bibi to
Pashishe bamiamine mashi ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu

Yeye wakatuma miloho kudi Belâma, muana mulume wa Beô, ku Petô udi hehi ne musulu wa Pelata ku buloba bua bantu bandi bualu bua kumubikila ne, Tangila, bantu bakaluhuka mu Ejipitu, tangila, badi batangalaka buloba buonso, badi bashikama hehi n anyi
Enza nkanu ya or mai, ne teka nkanu ku mikolo mai ya mesa

Adi apeta bwenzeji dîba didibo baapatula ne adi ajimija bukola bwawu padi tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia dianyisha katshiyi tshifidibwa ku Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga padiku njingakanyi mu dituku dia ndekeelu didibo bateeka kudi dîyi difidi dia bukookeshi
Padibu balambile munyinyi awu mu luesu lua dibumba, kujika, babishipe

Nomba Kubala kua Bungi bua Bantu ku Moaba Hashishe hakashika disama, Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi ne, Nubale bungi bua bantu ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele, ba mu bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, badi bamanye mua kuya mu nvita ya Bena Isalele

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Dituku dia matuku dikumi a ngondo eu wa muanda mutekete ndituku dia kubuikila bubi bua bantu, nebikale dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila, nenujinge mu mitshima yenu, nenufile mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Bena Izrayele badi babenga bua kuya mu ditunga dilaya Tuetu kumuka ku mukuna wa Sinayi, bu muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu netu muambe
Ku mesu kuabu tuetu tuvua badimone anu bu tunkenene
Yakoba wakalua ku Luze eu udi Betele mu buloba bua Kanana, yeye ne bantu bonso bakadiye n abo
Kadi kabidi ne bukookeshi bwa kulumbulwisha badibo babunda nabo bilumbu ne bavwa babambulwisha
Bikaleye muana wa balume wa ngondo umue tô ne ku bidimu bitanu, neubale nshekele itanu, ne bikaleye muana wa bakashi, nshekele isatu
Dibeenga edi diaatambi kusunguluka ne mvita ivwa misunsulula ditunga kutwadijila ku too ne ku
Nuenze madiotu anu bungi bua tshibidilu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne bana bandi balume ne, Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu mu muaba udibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia nebashihe mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu ku mesu kua Yehowa, eu udi mulambu mutambe wa tshijila
Yeye wakaya lubilu, wakahongoluela mai mu luvu lunene, wakaya lubilu ku mushimi kabidi, wakasunyina tumelo biandi tuonso mai
Ke padi mfumuanyi muntume bua kuselela Izake mukaji anu wa mu tshisamba tshia mfumuanyi, ne wa mu diku diabu mene
Etshi ntshihungidi tshidi hankatshi hetu n ebe ne tunkanunuina tuebe tshinudi n atshi bua kutumikila ne, Muana mulume yonso wa munkatshi muenu atengudibue
Yakoba wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakangata dibue diakadive musamehu mutu, wakadimanyika bu tshibumba wakela manyi ha mutu hadi
Pafikile bankambua benu mu Ejipitu, kabavua bapite ku makumi muanda mutekete to
Bualu yeye ke udi ulombola bimpe bantu banyi bonsu bena Izrayele
Pawaye ubuela mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, Abrame kuambila mukajende Sarayi ne: Wewe udi ne mpala muimpe
Palô Wakabikila Abalama, wakamukonka ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi tshinyi
Kanukebi mua kubalesha ditalala ne malu makane tô matuku enu onso
Yeye wakangata manteke ne mabele ne lukungulu lua ngombe luakalambabo, wakabiteka ku mpala kuabo
Ngondo wa kumudilu, mu matuku dikumi ne anai, diba dia dilolo, ndituku dia kuhita kua Yehowa
Eu udi mulambu wa tshiendelele unakanuelela mukenji mu mukuna wa Sinai, mulambu udi utua dihembu, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa
Nanku, panuasua kungashila tshilambuilu tshia mabue, mabue awu ikale anu majima
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga badi bamusungula kudi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia mêyi
Kadi bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe, kabavua babadike bena Levi pamue ne bena Izrayele bakuabu nansha
Kanungu kisambombo Tshibûngi tshia bisumbu bia tshidiidi tshidi tshianyishibwa mu ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata
Kuyabu bonsu kuimana mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Kadi Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, ne Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, anu bobo bakashala ne muoyo munkatshi mua bantu bakaya bua kutentekelabo buloba

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Tangila, wewe neulale tulu ne bankambua bebe; ne bantu aba nebabike, nebalonde malu a masandi a nzambi ya bende ya mu buloba buyayabo, nebandekele, nebashihe tshihungidi tshituakahunga n abo

Hanuashikisha kufila tshia dikumi tshia bintu bienu bionso mu tshidimu tshisatu tshidibo bafila tshia dikumi tshia bintu, nenubale Bena Lewi ne benyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila; nunku bobo nebadie mu misoko yenu, nebukute
Pashishe bana bende ba balume kumuambuila mashi a nyama ayi
Bimuma bia mu ditunga adi mbiebi
Nunku kanunyangi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Kuluanganabu ne bena Izrayele, kubatshimuna, kubipata too ne ku Orma
Kadi yeye bakaha bana balume ba Kohata tshintu, bualu bua bobo bakadi ne mudimu ne bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bakabituala ha maha abo

Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Mona, meme nakakuteka ku mutu kua milambu yanyi idibo banyukula ne bintu bionso bidi Bena Isalele bajila, nakakuha bintu ebi bu tshituha tshia bintu biebe bualu bua kujidila kuebe ne kua bana bebe balume tshiendelele
Isalele wakambila Yosefe ne, Ndi mua kufua katataka, bualu bua nakumana kukumona ku mesu ne wewe utshidi ne muoyo
dilonda dia bukookeshi bwa kabukulu;
Kadi dî edi didi ha buihi n enu ne mukana muenu ne mu mitshima yenu, bua nuenu kudienza
Pashishe mutuangaji alambule nyunyi mukuabu bu mulambu wa kuosha, bilondeshile mudi mikenji ya milambu
Palô wakabika mu butuku, yeye ne bantu bandi bonso, ne Bena Ejipitu bonso, muadi munene wakadi mu Ejipitu, kamuakadi nsubu wakadi kayi ne mufue
Bena tshisamba tshia Binyamine kulonda, babalombola kudi Abidane, muana wa Ngideyoni
Maweja Nangila kumujadikila ne: Bulelela uvua useka
Levi uvua ne bana balume basatu: Ngershone, Kekate ne Merari
Mu matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondu muibidi, kunyima kua dipatuka diabu mu Ejipitu, kufikabu mu tshipela tshia Sine, tshidi pankatshi pa Elime ne mukuna wa Sinayi
Kuenzabu maputa apatuka tufina pambidi pa bantu ne pa nyama
Padi dibeenga kumvwangana ditungununka, Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshidi tshikosa bwaalu ebu kashidi
Tshimuangi Mvidi Mukulu udi uleja Moshe bukole buende Moshe kuandamuna Maweja Nangila ne: Bena Izrayele kabakuitaba, kabakukumbaja bionsu bindi mbambila to

dilongolola dia mianda ya bisalu bidi bieepula nyama ku masama, dilongolola dia labolatwala, lupitadi ne biondapelu bia tshidiilu tshia nyama pamwe ne dilonda dia meeyi ne mikandu ya ditunga idi itangila mianda ya dikuba dia nyama, dilongolola dia diyisha kumpala dia makanda a mubidi a bangabanga;
Kanupandi bilamba bienu, bu bantu badi mu madilu, bualu nudi mua kufua, kabidi Maweja Nangila udi mua kufikila bantu bonsu munda

Neyule nsubu yebe tente ne nsubu ya bantu bebe ne nsubu ya Bena Ejipitu bonso, nansha batatu benu nansha bankambua benu kabakatangila bualu ebu katshia babuela mu buloba ebu to ne katataka Mose wakanyunguluka, wakaluhuka kudi Palô
Kabena babikila kabidi dina diebe ne, Abalama, kadi nebakuidike dina diebe ne, Abalahama, bualu bua nakakuvuisha nkambua wa bisamba bia bungi

Bualu bua muntu udi ne tshilema kena mua kulua ha buihi muntu mufofo anyi tshibombo anyi muntu udi ne diulu dibatama anyi tshioka tshitambe bule, anyi muntu udi ne dikasa ditshibuka anyi udi ne tshianza tshitshibuka anyi muntu udi ne nyima mutuntamana anyi muntu mushunguke anyi udi ne disu disama anyi udi ne mpusu anyi udi ne bilamulamu anyi udi ne mihesa yandi mitshibuke, muntu wa munkatshi mua bana ba Alona muakuidi udi ne bintu ebi ham bidi handi kena mua kulua ha buihi bua kulaleye mulambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, yeye udi ne tshitema, kena mua kudia mulambu kudi Yehowa
Bena tshisamba tshia Levi ba ku ndelanganyi ya Kekate bavua bambule bintu bia tshijila menemene
Pashishe kuambilaye Arone ne: Semena ku tshilambuilu, ulambule mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu, ne mulambu wa kuosha
Dîyi didi dileeja mishindu ya kubweeja malomba aa ne bipeta biawu mudibio babiâmba mu tunungu tudi tudianjila
Arone ne bana bende ba balume kutenteka bianza pa mutu pa ngombe awu
Tshidi tshimanyina pa dineemeka dia makanyika a mianda ya ngumu ne ya dipitshisha dia mushindu wa momumwe dia bisumbu bia tshidiidi, bisumbu ne beena mwabo ku tudiomba twa ditunga
Kanuena mua kumufuila luse, kanuena mua kumuakuila
Mulambu awu uvua ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Kubutulaku bantu bonsu nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, batshikale ne muoyi
Abalahama Wakabikila dina dia muaba au ne, Yehowa yile; nunku badi bamba tô ne ku dituku edi ne, Mu mukuna wa Yehowa nebatuhe bintu
Wewe newangate bilulu, uluatshishe Alona tshikowelu ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu ha efoda ne efoda ne tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi ne umuele mukaba muluka bilengele wa efoda ku tshimono
Bakambilangana ne, Tuyai kuasa musoko ne tshibumba tshile, musonga watshi neufike mulu mu matutu tuikale ne dina dia butumbi, bua katutangadiki ha buloba buonso
Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelese bakadi mu buloba tshikondo atshi
Pashishe nebabueje milonda ku mushete bua kuwambuilaku
Vulukayi dituku dinuvua ku mukuna wa Sinayi, kumpala kua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Ashe, Pagiele muana mulume wa Okelana
Kabuyi bunyangakaja bulongolodi bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi, bulongolodi bwa tunungu , , , , ne budi butangila, bilondeshila dishintuluka dia maalu, Bimamwenda wa bukalenga bia mu polovensa
Nanku muaba awu nenuikale ne disanka dia bungi, bua bionsu binuikala bakumbaje
Dielulula Tshimuna tshionsu tshidi ne bulema pambidi: ngombe, mukoku, nansha mbuji, kanuena mua kutshilambula Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu to
Nanku wewe Moshe neumone mua kumanyisha muanebe wa balume ne muikuluebe mundi mulembakaje bena Ejipitu, muenze bishima bionsu ebi mu ditunga diabu
Abimeleke wakebesha Abalahama ne, Wakuteka bana aba ba mikoko muanda mutekete ha buabo bua tshinyi

Lewitiki Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Biasambuka muntu ku mikenji bua kuenzela Yehowa bualu bubi, ne bienzeleye muena mutumba n andi bualu bubi ne bintu biakafileye mu bianza biandi anyi hendululeye n abi mushinga anyi bibeye bintu biandi, anyi biakengesheye muena mutumba n andi, anyi bianguleye tshintu tshiakajimishabo kudi mukuabo mumudinge bua bualu ebu ne muditshiheye ne mashimi, bienzeye malu mabi â onso, bienzeye bibi, bikaleye muhile, yeye neahingishe bintu biakibeye anyi tshintu tshiakanyengeye ku bukole anyi bintu biakufileye mu bianza biandi anyi bintu biakadi bijimina biakuanguleye anyi tshintu tshiakaditshiheye n atshi ne mashimi, neahingishe tshintu atshi ne tshituha tshitanu ha mutu katshi, neatshihingishe kudi muen atshi mu dituku didibo bamuhisha
Bobu kuandamuna ne: Tudi tulala anu pambelu muaba utudi ewu

Kanuena mua kudia nyunyi eyi to: tshiminyi, mukanku, kabemba ka mvulu, ntuba, nansha nyunyi idi mifuane mukanku, tshikololu, kasonga nyunyi, mfiondu, mukuekue, nansha nyunyi idi mifuane kabemba, tshipungulu, tshiowa, kakutukutu, mukute, kakololu, nkumbikumbi, kalama ngomba, kasongu mule, miena kasuba, nansha mudima
Nuenu benze nanku, Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu neanusankishe mu bionsu binudi nuenza

Bikala mulume ne bakashi babidi, udi musue umue, udi ukina mukuabo, ne bubidi buabo ne mukashi wakadiye musue ne mukuabo wakadiye ukina, hakamulelela bana; ne bikala mukashi wakadiye ukina mumulelele muan a bute wandi; hashishe mu dituku didiye uhianyisha bana bandi balume bintu bidiye n abi, yeye kena mua kuteka muana wa mukashi wakadiye musue ku mpala kua muan a bute wandi wa mukashi wakadiye ukina
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Butuku abu, Moshe kuolola tshianza pa mayi manene
Wakateka mesa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ku luseke lua ku nôde, ku mpala kua tshilulu
Anuele lupemba, bu muvuaye munulaye
Nubidile anu mu nzubu, kanupatuki ne munyinyi pa mbelu
Wakimana biandi hankatshi ha bantu bafue ne bantu bakatshidi ne muoyo, ne disama diakashika
Bena tshisamba tshia Naftali kulonda, babalombola kudi Akira, muana wa Eyinane
Dilolu adi, nyunyi ya tulumbu kuikila muaba uvua bena Izrayele batudile

Kanungu ka Padi bibambalu biônso bibidi bitwilangana mu Tshisangilu Tshinene, bilo bia batshipwita munwamfwanka ke bidi bishaala bilo bia Tshisangilu Bulombodi badi babushiilangana kudi Mulombodi wa batshipwita munwamfwanka bamukombola kudi Mulombodi wa batshipwita bakulumpe
Amu mu tshipela amu, Maweja Nangila kunupa mana, biakudia bivua bankambua benu kabayi banji kumanya
Udi wangata mapangadika mu mukanda wa dekele
Padi mashi a nyama awu masampukile ku tshilamba, tshilamba atshi batshisukuile anu muaba wa tshijila
Hakatangila Palô nvula ne mabue a nvula ne makubakuba biakashika, yeye wakatamba kuenza bibi, wakakolesha mutshima wandi ne yeye ne bantu bandi
Bimunyi abi bikale bimanyinu bia matuku, bidimu ne bikondu bia bibilu, bikale kabidi bitokesha pa buloba bujima
Moshe kuitaba bua kusomba kua muntu awu
Ikale kabidi ne tuampa tukese katuyi tuela buanga, tulaba mafuta, kabidi ne bukula ne mvinyo, bia kulambula musangu umue ne milanbu mikuabu

Bana balume ba Alona bonso nebatshidie, bu tshituha tshiabo mu bikondo biabo bionso munkatshi mua mulambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, muntu yonso udi ulenga bintu ebi tshianza neikale muntu wa tshijila

Wakenza tshitekelu tshia minda ne or nkayandi, bakahita tshitaku tshia kahanza, ne tshintu tshia tshiamu tshiakadi hankatshi, ne luhanza tukese, ne bihunga, ne bilongo ne tshituha tshia tshiamu tshia or tshijima
Minyinyi ya mu mayi yonsu kulua

Bena Izrayele badi babanyangana ditunga dia Ngilaade Ke mutuvua bakuate tshikondu atshi matunga a bakalenga babidi ba bena Amore, bavua base luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene, pankatshi pa musulu wa Amone wa muenji mukole, ne mukuna wa Ermone
Kanuzaji mifuba ya nyama
Esau wakambila tatu andi ne, Wewe udi ne disanka anu dimue, anyi
Kadi katshia wimita difu, kena unnemeka kabidi to
Nkadi mumane kumufila mu bianza biebe, yeye ne bantu bende bonsu, kabidi ne ditunga diende dijima
Abrahame ne: Udi mu ntenta muamua
Padi mputa awu mondoke, kabidi boya bua muaba awu bukunzubile, buenda butuka, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu ewu mmupie mikiya, bualu udi ne disama dia nsudi ku mutu nansha ku tshibanga
Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi, mianda idi ilonda eyi idi ipona mu bukookeshi bupalakana bwa bukalenga bunene ne polovensa:
Uvua wamba ne: Tshiena musue kumona mudi muananyi ufua to
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne binai ne nkama mai
Bumushe munyinyi wa mafuta onsu, bu mudibu benza bua mulambu wa bobumue
Nunku yeye wakambila Abalahama ne, Wihate muhika eu ne muana wandi mulume bualu bua muana wa muhika eu kena mua kuhiana buhianyi muomumue ne muana wanyi Isaka mene
Bumue tatu anyi neandengele tshianza, ne meme nengikale bu muena mashimi ku mesu kuandi nendieleshe mulau, tshidivuishi disanka
Tshimuangi Musambu wa Moshe ne wa bena Izrayele Pashishe, Moshe ne bena Izrayele kuimbila Maweja Nangila musambu, bamba ne: Nengimbile Maweja Nangila musambu: mmuleje bukole budiye nabu
Bobo bakamunguila ba bungi, Lota mene mene bakasemena ha buihi bua kuhandabo tshibi
Nanku bua kunulombola, mvua mubikidishe bantu bashindame, ba lumu luimpe, bavua bamane kuikala ne midimu mikuabu mu bisamba bienu
Bobo bakamumona kule kuakua, ne diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufika ha buihi n abo, bakamuelela tshifufu bua kumushiha
Kanungu ka Dikokangana pa bulongolodi bwa dîyi, kumpala kwa Tshibambalu tshia kumpala tshidibo bamanyisha, didi ditangila mukanda udibu batuma kudi Bukalenga bunene
Biahana muntu nsubu mu musoko udi munyungulula ne lumbu yeye udi mua kuhikula nsubu diambedi tshidimu tshimue katshiyi tshianze kuhita, tô tshidimu tshijima yeye udi mua kumuhikula
Yakoba wakabikila muaba wakayikidileye ne Nzambi ne Betele
Biahana muntu muahandi mukashi bu muhika, yeye kena uluhuka bu bahika balume
Mayi kuwuja buloba mu matuku makumi anayi
Nanku bitudi benza lelu ebi, ke bivua Maweja Nangila mutume diyi bua tuenze bua kunukobolola
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mulambu wa bobumue Padi muena Izrayele ulambula ngombe bu mulambu wa bobumue, ngombe awu ikale mulume nansha mukaji, kayi bulema
Nyama yonsu uvua witaba dina divua muntu umuinyika

Biwahidia kulekela bantu banyi, nentumine bisumbu bia tuishi kûdi ne kudi bahika bebe ne kudi bantu bebe ne mu nsubu yenu, nsubu ya Bena Ejipitu neyikale ne bisumbu bia tuishi tente, ne hanshi ha buloba kabidi
Abrame mumane kusomba mu ditunga dia Kenaane bidimu dikumi, Sarayi kumupesha Agare bua ikale mukajende

Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi bielela bingenyingenyi bia mêyi a mpetu tukanda mu mushindu udibo bateeka bwa dîyi dilongolodi didibo bâmba mu kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu
Nenuikale ne disanka mu bisaka bienu ne mu malonga anudi nuenzelamu mampa
Kuasaye mitanda yende pankatshi pa Betele ne Ayi
Nuyifunde kabidi ne ku biibi bia bimenga bienu, ne ku mishiku ya mbelu ya nzubu yenu

Palô wakakohola kakanu ka tshimanyinu tshiandi tshifundahu ku munu wandi, wakakela ku munu wa Yosefe, wakamuluatshisha bilulu bia lin, wakamuela lukanu lua or mu nshingu muandi, wakamuendesha mu dikalu dibidi dia bukelenge, wakela mbila ku mpala kuandi ne, Tuai binu hanshi, wakamuteka mu bukelenge bua buloba bua Ejipitu buonso Palo wakambila Yosefe ne, Meme ndi Palo, ne biwikala kuyi muambe di diebe, muntu kena mua kubisha tshianza tshiandi anyi dikasa diandi mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Pingaja tshianza tshiebe pa tshiadi
Kanuidikiji mushindu uvuabu bayitendelela
Rebeka kumona Izake, kutuluka pa kamelu
Yosefe wakabambila ne Tshiena mua kuenza nunku anu muntu wakasanganabo ne luhanza mu tshianza tshiandi neikale muhika wanyi kadi bakuabo benu nuhingane kudi tatu wenu talala

Dibadika BENA IZRAYELE MU TSHIPELA TSHIA SINAYI Badi babadika bisamba bia bena Izrayele musangu wa kumpala Dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu muibidi wa tshidimu tshivua tshilonda tshidimu tshia dipatuka diabu mu Ejipitu, Maweja Nangila kuyukila ne Moshe mu tshipela tshia Sinayi, mu ntenta wa kusambakena, umuambila ne: Wewe ne Arone, nubadike bena Izrayele bonsu
Mapangadika dîyi adi ajika bukookeshi tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia dianyisha
Patshiatshia, Maweja Nangila, uvua mu divuba ne mu tshimunyi tshia kapia, kumona tshiluilu tshia mvita tshia bena Ejipitu
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bu mu dî dia Yehowa ne, Ba mu tshisamba tshia bana balume ba Yosefe badi bamba dî dilelela
Bobo bakalongolola matabisha diambedi Yosefe kayi muanze kulua diba hankatshi, bualu bua bakunvua lumu ne, Netudieku n andi bidia
Kubangabu kuakula bu bambi munkatshi mua mitanda
Bana ba balume ba Nowa: Sheme, Kame ne Yefete ke badi bavudija ndelanganyi, mayi a tshipupu mamane kukama
Mukelenge Palô wakadi ne tuhita tuandi tubidi tshiji, kahita ka bena maluvu ne kuhita ka bena bidia
kufuka Mbulamatadi wa mêyi ne mikandu;
Nenvuishe mikete yanyi bu mukuatshiki wa maluvu bualu bua mashi abo, ne muele wanyi wa nvita neudie munyinyi wabo ne mashi a bafue ne a bena lukanu, ne mitu ya bukelenge ba bena lukuna

Muntu ne muntu wakadi ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzu ne bia lin, ne bia miosa ya mbushi ne biseba bia bimpanga bitua mu mai makunze kunzû, ne biseba bia nkonge ya mu mai, wakalua n abi
Bena Ejipitu bonso bakumbula mena hehi ne musulu, bakakeba mai a kunua, bualu bua kabakamanya mua kunua mai a mu musulu
Muena mudimu kuandamuna ne: Ke Izake mfumuanyi
Nakatendelela Yehowa, nakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, kushihi bantu bebe ne buhianyi buebe buwakahikula ne bukole buebe, bantu bawakahatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole
Bualu bua Bena Isalele badi bantu banyi banakahatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Alona ne bana bandi balume nebaluate mihanu ei hayabo mu tshitendelelu anyi hayabo hehi ne tshioshelu bua kuenza mudimu wabo mu muaba wa tshijila, bobo kabatuadi mahambuka, kabafu
Dishintakaja dia ngenyi ne dieela dia tukanda didi mwa kwenzeka amu panyima pa mêba makumi anayi ne mwanda mukulu a difila dia mukanda

Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila bilwilu Kanungu ka Mu bilwilu mudi bilwilu bia pabuloba,bilwilu bia mu lupepela, bilwilu bia mu mâyi ne midimu yabi mibikwatshishi; bidi ne mudimu wa kusungidila bujima bwa tshipaapu tshia ditunga ne mikalu yadi
Padiye umona ne: disama didi amu muvuadi, kadiena ditampakane mubidi mujima, neateke kabidi muntu awu pa nkayende matuku muanda mutekete makuabu
Dituku dia kumpala, numushe manga a mampa onsu adi mu nzubu yenu
Ulamike tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe ha mutu hatshi ne ku nseke yatshi ne ku nsengu yatshi, nyungulula mubangu watshi ne or ku nseke yonso
Belâma wakaya ne Balaka, bakalua ku Kîyata husota
Bantu bakuabo ba munkatshi muabo bakadi ne lukuka be Bena Isalele bakadila kabidi, bakamba ne, Nganyi neatuhe munyinyi wa tuetu kudia
Milambu eyi ishale yebe wewe ne ya ndelanganyi yebe kashidi
Pashishe nuangate kabidi tshitupa tshia bintu bidi bena Izrayele bela mulu bua kundambula
Kadi pawikala ubenga anu kubenga bua kulekela bantu banyi, malaba ndi ntuma mpasu mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu
Kadi, kanuena mua kuela buanga bua mampa mu mulambu nansha umue unudi nulambula Maweja Nangila to
Mikenji Idi Isuika Bena Tshimbambila Muntu udi ukuma mukuabo, udi umushiha, nebamushihe yeye bulelela
Bobo bakamuitaba ne, E, yeye udi ne bukole, ne tangila, muan andi wa bakashi, Lakele, ulualua ne mikoko
Maweja Nangila uvua mupite kufikila Arone munda, musue kumushipa
Mudimu musunguluke wa tshisamba tshia bena Levi Kadi kabavua babadike tshisamba tshia bena Levi pamue ne bisamba bikuabu bia bena Izrayele to
Kadi Moshe kuakuila bansongakaji aba, kubasunyina mayi, kunuisha bimuna biabu
Pashishe kufuaye
Muena nsudi uvuabu bakobolola awu, asukule bilamba biende, akungule nsuki ne boya buonsu, wowe mayi adi umusha mikiya
Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala udibo bafila kudi Yehowa

Mose wakambila Kola ne, Wewe ne bantu bonso baudi habo nuikale ku mpala kua Yehowa ne kua Alona makelela: mundi yonso angate dilonga diandi dia kahia, atekehu musenga wa manananshi, bantu bonso balue ne malonga nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu ku mpala kua Yehowa, ne wewe ne Alona, mundi ne dilonga diandi mundi ne dilonga diandi
Au mmena a bana balume ba Esau Elifasa, muana wa balume wa Ada, mukashi wa Esau, ne Luele muana wa Basemata, mukashi wa Esau
Kuvudi mamu webe mukuabo anyi tatu webe mukashi bilulu, bualu bua yeye wakavula bana babo bilulu, bobo nebadituadile bubi buabo
Wakamukudimuna ne, Tshia kuheta n atshi luse kudi mukelenge wanyi Esau wakamuambila ne, Ndi ne bintu bikumbane, muakunyi anyi ushale ne bintu biudi n abi
Lote mumane kushiyangana ne Abrame, Maweja Nangila kuambila Abrame ne: Kenzakana, tangila ku mutu kua ditunga ne kuinshi kuadi, kudi diba dipatukila ne kudidi dibuelela
Meme ndi Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua bebe: wa Abrahame, wa Izake ne wa Yakobe
Abalahama wakangata mikoko ne ngombe, wakabika kudi Abimeleke, bubidi buabo bakafua ndondo

Nanku mafuta adi mashale mu tshianza awu, mutuangaji aalabe kabidi makese muntu, udi udikobolola awu, miaba ivuaye mulabe mashi a nyama wa mulambu, ku lusongu lua ditshi, ku tshiala ne ku muana nkasa munene bia luseke luende lua dia balume
Bana ba balume ba Gada, Sifiona ne Haga ne Shuni ne Esebone ne Eli ne Alodi ne Aleli
Mikenji ya bena Levi e
Mose ne Alona bakumuka ku mesu kua bantu, bakaya ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bakatua mpala yabo hanshi
Tshituha tshidi bule bua coudée ku luseke lumue ne tshituha tshidi bule bua coudée tshiota tshisonga netshikale ku luseke lua tshitendelelu bua kutshibuikila
Kadi, nenufuile bonsu mu tshipela emu, bualu nudi nunjana
Alambule Maweja Nangila ngombe mulume, udi kayi ne bulema, bua Maweja Nangila amufuile luse
Bikaleye muvuishe malu au bu malu a hatuhu, hakunvueye, nunku yeye neamutuadile bubi buandi

Kabakatangila bualu buakenzeye Datana ne Abilama, bana balume ba Eliaba, muana mulume wa Lubena; muakabulula buloba mukana muabu, buakabamina, ne ba mu nsubu yabo, ne ntenta yabo ne bintu biabo bionso bia muoyo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Tshimenga nansha tshimue tshia mu bimenga ebi, katshivua ne bukole bua kutuluisha
Nunku nenumushe mashi adi kâyi ne tshilumbu munkatshi muenu hanuenza malu adi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa
Hakakola dî dia mpungi bikole bikole, Mose wakela dî ne Nzambi wakitaba kudiye ne dî diandi
Pashishe kutshiangataye, anu muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile

Mukenji wa Mikau Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bikala mukashi wa muntu usesuka, bikaleye umuenzela bibi, bikala mulume mukuabo ulala n andi, bikala bualu ebu busokoma ku mesu kua mulume wandi, kabuyi bumanyibue, bikala mukashi muonyibue ne kakuyi mumonyi wa bualu, kabayi bamukuata hakadiye wenda n andi, ne bikala mukau mumukuate bualu bua mukashi wandi udi muonyibue anyi bikala mukau umukuata bualu bua mukashi wandi udi kayi muonyibue, hashishe mulume alue biandi ne mukashi wandi kudi muakuidi, nealue ne mulambu wandi, tshituha tshia dikumi tshia tshihiminu tshia bukula bua orge, kedihu nansha manyi, katekihu nansha musenga wa manananshi, bualu bua eu udi mulambu wa mukau, mulambu wa bukula wa tshivulukidi, bua kuvuluishangana bualu bubi
Muntu nansha umue wa bena Ejipitu kena mupande to
Bana benu ba balume bonso nebamueneke kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Moshe kubenga, wamba ne: Ndi nkusengelela ne: utume muntu mukuabu

Aba mbana ba Esau bakamulelelabo mu buloba bua Kanana Esau wakangata bakashi bandi ne bana bandi ba balume ne bana bandi ba bakashi ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wandi, ne bimuna biandi, ne nyama yandi yonso, ne bintu bionso biakamueneye mu buloba bua Kanana, wakumuka kudi muakunyi andi Yakoba, wakaya ku buloba bukuabo
Nuikale anu ne tshiamu tshimue tshidi tshiakane, ne tshihiminu tshimue tshidi tshiakane; nunku matuku enu neikale a bungi mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Pashishe Maweja Nangila kuambila Abrahame ne: Bantu mbafunde bena Sodome ne Ngomore kundi, bualu buenzayi buabu mbupite
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kwenza mushindu wa kuvudija bûngi bwa mpala ya balema mu bishimikidi bia ditunga dijima, bia polovensa ne misoko

Wakenza mabaya a mu nsubu makumi abidi a kuteka ku luseke lua ku sude, Wakenza masoso makumi anai a tshiamu tshia argent mu mabaya makumi abidi, masoso abidi mu dibaya dimue a kuteka mu tutshi tua tutuha, ne masoso abidi mu dibaya dikuabo a kutekamu tutshi tua tutuha

Yeye wakabûsha mitshima tente ne lungenyi bua kuenza n alu midima yonso ya bantu badi basonga bintu ne badi bakuma bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin, ne ya bantu bonso badi balongolola midimu ya lungenyi

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu edi, dîyi didi diteeka tuludiki bwa : a makookeshi a bweena mwaabo ne mashindikila a nshindameenu adibo bapeesha beena mwabo bwa kusankabo ne budikadidi bwa muntu yônso; b bulongonlodi bwa mianda ya masungulangana; c mpetu ya Mbulamatadi; d makanyika adibo bateekela beena mwabo kudi bilwilu pa bumuntu bwaabo ne pa bintu biaabo; e bweena ditunga, ngikadilu ne bukole bwa bantu, bulongolodi bwa mianda ya diselangana, bwa dipianangana ne bupapayi; f disunguluja dia ntupakanyi ne manyooka adibo bayikosela, njila wa kulonda, bwa kutangila manyooka, bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa bukalenga bukoshi bwa nsambu, diaasa dia nkongu ya bilumbulwidi mipiamipia, mukanda wa ngikadilu wa bandumbulula, bulongolodi bwa mianda ya mêyi a ditunga bwa Kapangu ka ku kulu ka bandumbulula; g bulongolodi bwa dilumbulwilangana, diambulwishangana mu dilumbulula ne diimanyina dia bantu ku bilumbulwilu; h bungenda mushinga, bulongolodi bwa bweena makookesha ne makanyika a bweena mwabu ne a bungenda mushinga; i dikupula dia manyooka kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne dipingaja dia beena bilumbu mwabo; j bûngi bwa diabanya, mushinga wa ditapulula ne mushindu wa kufutshisha bitadi bia mishindu yônso, bulongolodi bwa dienza dia lupetu; k mpetu misomba ne ditula dia mpetu ya Mbulamatadi; l mikanda milongolodi ya ngikadilu wa beena mudimu bashindama ba Mbulamatadi, beena mudimu ba bilongelu bia ku mutu, bilongelu bikulumpa ne dikebulula dia mamanya; m bilwilu , bampulushi ne midimu ya bukubi; n makookeshi a mianda ya midimu ne ya bukubi bwa bantu; o bulongolodi bujima bwa bilwilu ne bwa bumpulushi bwa ditunga, mushindu wa kwangata bantu ku busalayi ne ku bumpulushi bwa ditunga, dibanda dia miânzu, makookeshi ne makanyika a basalayi ne beena mudimu wa bumpulushi

Kanungu ka Bûngi bwabo mu tshipidi tshiônso, midimu ya kutuma dîyi dîba diônso ne miaba yônso, idi ne tshia kulondeshila bipangidikilu bilelela bitangila popamwe dikumbana dia mubidi,dia kalasa kalonga ne bibidilu bîmpe pamwe ne dileeja dia mpala dia momumwe dia polovensa ne polovensa
Ke mikenji idi itangila muena nazire
Dutelonone Bunene bua Yehowa Nunku suai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numunemeke, nutumikile malu andi ne mei andi ne mikenji yandi matuku onso
Kadi nudi batufikisha mu tshipela emu bua kutubutula ne nzala
Arone kukonka Moshe ne: Lelu bena Izrayele bavua balambula Mvidi Mukulu mulambu wa kudikobolola, pamue ne mulambu wa kuosha
Panudi nuya ku mvita mu ditunga dienu bua kuluisha bena lukuna benu, nuele mpungi ne bibingu bia mvita musangu umue
Nunku nutumikile dî dianyi, kanuenji bilele ebi bibi biakenzabo ku mpala, kanudionyi mu malu au meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Mutuangaji kayi muanji kubuela mu nzubu amu bua kutangila mudiye mukuate butu, neatume diyi bua bapatule bintu bionsu bivua mu nzubu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bana ba bakashi ba Selofehada badi bamba dî dilelela: Ubahe buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo ne tatu abo, buhianyi bua tatu abo nebulue kudibo

Nenuikale ne disanka dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne nuenu ne bana benu balume ne bana benu bakashi, ne bahika benu balume ne bahika benu bakashi, ne Bena Lewi badi ku mbelu kuenu badi kabayi ne buhianyi kunudi

Kuhita ka bena maluvu kakambila Yosefe tshilota tshiandi ne, Mu tshilota tshianyi, nakumona muonshi wa tumuma tua nvinyo ku mpala kuanyi, mudishi eu wakadi ne matamba asatu akasampila ntonga, ne bilongo biakabaluluka, biakakuama tumuma tuhia
Ndi nnyoka muana wa ku ndelanganyi misatu nansha minayi bua mibi ya baledi bende
Neutukokeshe, anyi

Mêyi malongolodi, kumpala kwa kupatukau, ne Mêyi maludiki a mianda ya munda mwa Bibambalu bia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga ne mwa Tshisangilu tshiaatshi tshinene,mwa Kasumbu kadikadile komekela mianda ya Masungulangana mu ditunga ne kabidi mwa Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya Diumvwa ne dimona dia bimfwanyi ne ya dishintakaja ngenyi, kumpala kwa kutwadija mwa kualonda, badi ne tshia kuatuma ku Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu kadi ne tshia kwamba ne adi aneemeka Dîyi dikulu
Biamuha mukelenge wandi mukashi ne biamulelela mukashi nansha bana ba balume nansha bana ba bakashi, mukashi ne bana bandi nebikale ba mukelenge wandi, yeye muhika neaye nkayandi

Anu Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakadi mushale wa Bena Lefa; monai, bulalu buandi buakadi bua biamu; budi mu Laba wa Bena Amona: bule buabu buakadi coudées tshitema ne butshiama buabu buakadi coudées mai

Tshimuangi Yetro udi umonangana ne Moshe Yetro, mutuangaji wa mu Madiyane, tatuende muenu wa Moshe, kumvua ye lumu lua bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu muenzele Moshe ne bena Izrayele pawaye mubapatule mu Ejipitu
Bu muakadi Yehowa ne disanka bua kunuenzela bimpe ne bua kunukumbasha ba bungi, mbu mudiye mua kuikala ne disanka bua kunujimisha ne bua kunushiha; nebanûmushe mu buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana
Mulau ukukuate, Moaba
Yeye wakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, ndi mumanye ne, Nembuhiane munyi
Oholiaba, muana mulume wa Ahisamaka, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana wakadi n andi, mundi wa lungenyi lule wakenza bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû
Bidi bibaluluke bu bibanda, bu bibunda bidi hehi ne musulu, bu mitshi ya aloe yakakunabo kudi Yehowa, bu mitshi ya cèdre idi hehi ne mai

Yeye wakabadimusha, wakabambila ne, Nkadi ha kudisangisha ne bankambua banyi, nunjike mu muaba wakajikabo batatu anyi mu lubuebue ludi mu budimi bua Efelona, Muena Hiti, mu lubuebue ludi mu budimi bua Makepela, ku mpala kua Mamale mu buloba bua Kanana, buakasumba Abalahama kudi Efelona, Muena Hiti, bu muaba wa kujikabo bantu bafue
Moshe kumuka kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bua kutendelela Maweja Nangila
Tshikondu atshi ke tshivua bantu batuadija kutendelela Mvidi Mukulu, batela dina dia Maweja Nangila
Ku bisamba bionsu, nansha bidi ne bantu bapite bungi, kakuena tshisamba tshidi ne mikenji mimpe, bu idi mu mukanda wa mikenji undi nnuleja lelu ewu
Aba mbana ba balume ba Lakele bakaleleleye Yakoba buonso buabo dikumi ne banai

Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada bakadi ne bimuna bia bungi be, hakatangilabo ne buloba bua Yazê ne buloba bua Gilada buakadi muaba muimpe wa bimuna, Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena bakalua kudi Mose ne Eleazâ muakuidi ne kudi bakelenge ba tshisumbu, bakamba ne, Atalota ne Dibona ne Yazê ne Nimela ne Heshebona ne Eleale ne Sebama ne Nebo ne Beone, buloba buakashihabo kudi Yehowa ku mpala kua tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele, mbuloba bua bimuna, ne bantu benu badi ne bimuna
Luvu luvuaye mulenge, nebalukone ne mayi mavule
Muena tshibawu awu neasakidile kabidi pa bintu abi, mukoku wa tshimpanga, bua mutuangaji amukobolole, amulombele luse kudi Maweja Nangila
