Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuangata dima, kufuka nadi mulume, kumuela mueyelu wa muoyi mu mimpempe ya diulu, mulume kushala tshifukibua tshidi tshienda ne muoyi
Noa wakenza nunku, wakenza muanda yonso yakamuambila Nzambi
Maweja Nangila kuntuma bua kunumanyisha ne: Nupitshile ku mikuna ya Seyire, muaba udibu basombe kudi bana benu, ndelanganyi ya Esawu
Binuatumikila dî dianyi, ne binuanemeka tshihungidi tshianyi, nuenu nenuikale bantu banyi ba munkatshi mua bantu bonso, bualu bua buloba buonso mbuanyi
Unvua dî dianyi, nenkuhe lungenyi, ne Nzambi neikale n ebe, wewe wikale muakuidi wa bantu kudi Nzambi, Ulue biebe ne malu onso kudi Nzambi
Bakashiha Hamo ne muan andi Shekeme ne muele wa nvita, bakangata Dina mu nsubu wa Shekeme, bakaluhuka n andi
Kutukandiki tshiakabidi bua bena Izrayele kabayi kulambula Maweja Nangila milambu
Muntu udi ushiha nyama neafute muena nyama ne mundi udi ushiha mukuabo nebamushihe
Esawu kudia, kunua, kutungunuka ne luendu
Yeye wakatubuesha mu lukanu, mu nsubu wa kapitene ka masalayi malami, mu muaba muakadi Yosefe musuikila
Bavua baluisha Kedorlayomere, mukalenga wa bena Elame, Tidale, mukalenga wa bena Ngoyime, Amrafele, mukalenga wa bena Babilone, ne Ariyoke, mukalenga wa bena Elazare
mêyi adi alongolola mianda ya malaba ne majimba, bulongolodi bwa mwaba wa kusomba, ngikadilu wa mâyi ne meetu;
Padiye umona ne: dikeji adi ndishale anu mushindu umue, nansha kadiyi ditampakane, udi wamba ne: tshintu etshi ntshipie mikiya
Nudi ne muan enu mukuabo wa balume, anyi
Enza bu mundi nkuambila dituku edi
Lelu nenusabuke musulu wa Yardene
Bualu bua bobo bakungambila ne, Utuenzele nzambi idi mua kuya ku mpala kuetu, bua muntu eu Mose wakatumikila mu buloba bua Ejipitu, katuena bamanye bualu buakumukuata
Nuikale ne bihimu bimpe ne bihiminu bimpe, nuikale ne épha muimpe ne hin muimpe meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakantaha tula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Kadi katuena mua kulambula Maweja Nangila milambu mudi bena Izrayele netu bonsu benza bua tshinyi
Maweja Nangila mmupeshe Moshe mikenji eyi, mu tshipela ku mukuna wa Sinayi, dituku divuaye mutumine bena Izrayele diyi, bua bikale bamulambula milambu
Nanku padi matuku a kudilongolola ku buvyele akumbana, bua muana wa balume, nansha bua wa bakaji uvuaye mulele, mukaji awu aye kudi mutuangaji, imanyine ku mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Tuvua badimuene bishima binene ne bia dikema, bivua Maweja Nangila mukengeshe nabi mukalenga awu, diku diende ne bantu bende bonsu

Nzambi wakambila Abalahama ne, Bualu ebu kabuikadi bujitu ku mesu kuebe, bualu bua nsongalume ne bua muhika webe, witabusha mei onso akukuambila Sala, unvua dî diandi, bualu bua tunkanunuina tuebe netubikidibue mu Isaka
Nuenu kanuyi bakumbaje mikenji yende, Maweja Nangila neanufuile munda
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Bangate kabidi ngombe mulume, mukoku wa tshimpanga bua mulambu wa bobumue
Yeye kakungambila ne, Yeye udi muan etu mukashi, anyi
Nyoka wakakonka mukashi ne, Nzambi wakamba ne, Kanudi mamuma a nu tshi yonso idi mu budimi, anyi
Bena tshisamba tshia Merari bavua base luseke lua ku mutu kua nzubu wa tshijila
Kakahanda dime diakadi hanshi, monai, tshintu tshikese tshibulunge tshiakadi ha tshihela, tshiakadi tshikese bu dime dikuatakane ha buloba
Wakaya n andi mu mpata wa Sofima, ku mutu kua Pisega, wakasa bioshelu muanda mutekete, wakosha mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga ku tshioshelu ne ku tshioshelu
Wakalua kudiye, wakadi muimane ha buihi ne mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia, miloho ya Moaba yakadi n andi
Nuvuluke muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu muenze ne mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, ne bantu bende bonsu
Padi mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi bioshe muiku, bilambe mu luesu, nansha bikange pa dilata, bintu ebi nebishale bia mutuangaji uvua mulambule mulambu awu
Aye nende mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusambakena bua kulomba luse kudi Maweja Nangila
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Wewe wakusungi la mioyo yetu, utuendeshe diakalengele ku mesu kua mukelenge wetu, nebikale bahika ba Palo
Anu Moshe nkayende ke uvua musemene pabuipi ne divuba difike, muaba uvua Mvidi Mukulu
Mose wakaya ne mifuba ya Yosefe, bualu bua yeye wakatshihisha Bena Isalele ne, Nzambi nealue kunudi bulelela, nuenu nenuye ne mifuba yanyi
Alona nealuate tshikowelu henzeye mudimu, nebunvue tshiona tshia ndibu hayeye mu muaba wa tshijila ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne haluhukeye kabidi, bua yeye kafu nansha
Biafila muntu argent anyi biuma mu bianza bia mukuandi bua kubilama, ne biabibabo mu nsubu muandi, biasanganabo muibi, yeye neabafute bintu misangu ibidi
Ke bavua balambula musenga wa kamonya
Yokeshana wakalela Sheba ne Dedana, bana balume ba Dedana bakadi Ashulima ne Letushima ne Leumima
Ismayele mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete, kulondaye bankambua bende mu lufu
Bualu mulambu awu kawena umulengelela to, udi umubipila
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kubikila mulume, kumukonka ne: Udi penyi
Nunku Alona wakalua ha buihi ne tshioshelu, wakashihela kana ka ngombe ka mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi
Dikopu dimue dia tshiamu tshia mpawungi dia bujitu bua grame , diwule ne manananshi a kuosha
Kadi uvua ne mupika wende, nsongakaji wa bena Ejipitu, dina diende Agare
Yakoba wakahanda bivualu biandi, wakaluata tshilulu tshikayabala mu tshimono, wakajinga muan andi matuku a bungi
Diba diakadi dimane kubanda mulu hakabuela Lota mu Soa
Mukelenge wa Sodoma ne mukelenge wa Amole ne mukelenge wa Adema ne mukelenge wa Bena Seboi ne mukelenge wa Bela eu udi Soa bakaluhuka, bakaluangana n abo mu tshibanda tshia Sidima
Nunku yeye wakidika mushimi wa mai ne, Bê laha loi kukudimuna kua muaku ne, Mushimi wa Nzambi wa muoyo utu wantangila udi hankatshi ha Kadesha ne Belede
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Nanku anu bantu balume ba mu meku a batuangaji ke badi mua kudia munyinyi wa mulambu awu
Shete mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama ne bitanu, kulelaye Enoshe
Baleleshi bakambila Palo ne, Bualu bua bakashi ba Bena Ebelu kabena bu bakashi ba Bena Ejipitu bobo badi ne bukole bua kudilelela, ne bakamana kulela diambedi baleleshi kabayi banze kulua kudibo
Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi, Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidi tshienza mêyi
Yeye uvua mungambile ne: Sangisha bena Izrayele bonsu
Mfumu wa tshisamba etshi uvua Elishafane, muana wa Uziyele
Kubambilaye ne: Nundombele kudi Maweja Nangila: umushe ndimba eyi, idi itutatshisha meme ne bantu banyi
Nowa kuenza bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile

Kanungu ka Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kufila mpala mu batshipwita bakulumpa padiye kêna ukumbaja makanyika adi alonda aa: kwikala mweena Kongu; kwikala ne mvula ya tshileledi kayiyi mishadila ku ; kwikala ne bujima bwa makookeshi a bweena mwabo ne a tshidiidi; kubeenga kubwelakana mu maalu adibo babenga kudi dîyi dia masungulangana
Hakabandisha Mose tshianza tshiandi Bena Isalele bakatamba bukole, ne hakahuekesheye tshianza tshiandi, Bena Amaleka bakatamba
Yeye udi mujidile kudi Yehowa matuku onso a tshijila tshiandi

diteeka dia beena mudimu wa manga bilondeshila mukanda mulongolodi wa ngikadilu wa beena mudimu bashindame ba mbulamatadi; dienza dia ndongamu ya dikomba ne dilwisha dia masama a tshibidilu ne a tshiâmbu bilondeshila ndongamu wa ditunga: bulongolodi bwa midimu ya mankenda ne ya didimwija bantu ku masama mu polovensa; dilonda ne ditangila dia mêyi adi aludika midimu ya bondopi ne ya manga mu ditunga pamwe ne bulongolodi bwa midimu ya londapu, bwa midimu ya diambulwisha bantu ne ya batumibwa, ya biâpu bia mianda ya londapu ne bwa midimu ya manga, dilongolola ne divudija dia londapu lwa nzanzanza;
Wakabuesha mabue a mikenji mu mushete, wakateka mitshi ya kutuala n ai mushete, wakateka tshibuikilu ha mutu ha mushete
Anu dituku adi, lubuebue lua Makpela luvua mu budimi bua Efrone, luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua Mambre, kushala mu dina dia Abrahame, kabidi ne mitshi yonsu ivua mikuna mu budimi amu
Moshe kuambila mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne: Maweja Nangila udi wamba ne: Mundankulu, nempitshile mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Malaleyele mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi asambombu ne bitanu, kulelaye Yerede
Badi ne bua kuenza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena

Kanana wakalela Sidona muaba buta wandi ne Hete ne Bena Yebuse ne Bena Amole ne Bena Gîgashi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Aka ne Bena Sina ne Bena Âwada ne Bena Semâ ne Bena Hamata Ku nyima kua malu au, Bena Kanana bakamuangalaka
Kukonkabu Moshe ne: Uvua mutupatule mu Ejipitu bua tuetu kuluila mu tshipela bua tshinyi
Kanungu ka Kabadi ka bukubi bwa Mbulamatadi bwenzeji
Genese Tunkanunuina tua Bana ba Noa Kul
Kusombuela kudi kuanyi, ne difutu kabidi, halua dituku didi dikasa diabo difinuka, bualu bua dituku dia dikenga diabo diakalua, ne malu akadi ha kulua kudibo nealue lubilu

Mu bidimu bimpe muanda mutekete buloba buakalua ne bintu bia bungi, mafuka mafuka Yeye wakasangisha bintu bia kudia bionso bia mu bidimu abi muanda mutekete bia mu Ejipitu, wakabiteka mu bimenga, bintu bia kudia biakadiunda mu madimi a ha matshika a musoko, wakabiteka mu musoko au
Munyinyi udi utuanganaa ne tshintu tshibi, kabena mua kûdia, nebawoshe mu kahia
Dituku dia dikumi ne dimue: Pagiyele, muana wa Okrane, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Ashere
Arpakshade mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi asatu ne bitanu, kulelaye Shela
Nanku mupika udibu balelela ku nzubu kuebe, nansha udibu basumba, babateke bonsu panshi, bua ndondu wanyi amueneke kashidi mu mubidi wenu

Yeye wakalamba munyinyi muimpe wa dihembu kabidi, wakalua n au kudi tatu andi, yeye wakambila tatu andi ne Tatu anyi abike biandi adie munyinyi wa ntole wa muan andi, bua mutshi ma webe unvudishile disanka
Kadi mbua numanye binudi mua kudia ne binudi kanuyi mua kudia
Kanunyangi tshilumbu tshia muntu
Dutelonone Buloba Buimpe bua Kuhiana Nuenze mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne muoyo, nukumbane, nubuelemu bua kuhiana buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu
Nzambi wa tatu ebe udi ukukuatshisha, Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso udi ukusankisha ne masanka adi afuma mu diulu, ne masanka adi afuma muinshi mua buloba, ne masanka adi afuma ku mabele ne mafu
Moshe ne Arone kudiela panshi kumpala kua bena Izrayele bonsu
Tshibangidilu Mvidi Mukulu udi utua ndondu ne Nowa Mvidi Mukulu kuela Nowa ne bana bende lupemba wamba ne: Tantayi, nuvu langane buloba bujima
Nakanuambila ku tshikondo atshi ne, Tshiena mua kunutuala nkayanyi: Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakunukumbasha ba bungi, ne monai, lelu nudi bu bungi bua mitoto ya mulu
Meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu kunupatula ku bukole buanyi
Pashishe neabiteke bionsu mu bianza bia muntu awu
Amu padibu baatwa tshiâla , mapangadika aa adi atumibwa ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi, maalu ônso mimanyika , kamba ne adi asesuka anyi kaena asesuka ku Dîyi dikulu edi
Nakukuha wewe tshituha tshikuabo tshia buloba ku mutu kua bana benu, tshinakanyenga mu bianza bia Bena Amole ne muele wanyi wa nvita ne buta buanyi
Nuvuluke Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, nukumbaje meyi ne mikenji biende, bindi nnuambila lelu ebi

Alona nealue biandi mu ntenta wa kusangakena, neavule bilulu biandi bia lin biakadiye muluate hakayeye mu muaba wa tshijila, neabishiyemu, yeye neowe mai mu muaba wa tshijila, nealuate bilulu biandi, neahatuke neafile mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bantu wa kuosha ha ka hia, neabuikile bubi buandi ne bubi bua bantu
Ngershone uvua mulele bana ba balume babidi: Libni ne Shimeyi

Mose wakamba ne, Mona, nengumuke kûdi, nendombe Yehowa ne yeye neamushe bisumbu bia tuishi kudi Palô ne kudi bena mudimu bandi ne kudi bantu bandi makelela, kadi Palô katu dingi kabidi bua kulekela bantu baye kushihela Yehowa nyama
Bana balume ba Yawana badi nunku Elisha ne Tâshishi ne Kitima ne Dodamma
Bana ba Yakoba bakakudimuna Shekeme ne tatu andi Hamo mei a budimu, bualu bua yeye wakanyanga muan abo wa bakashi, Dina
Kanungu ka Dibweela dia bilumbulwilu didi dienzeka ku mêsu a bantu bônso, pa kumbusha pikala ngenzelu ewu mwa kwikala ne njiwu ku bulongama bwa bantu bônso anyi ku bibidilu bia mulowu
Kuendi tshiendenda
Amrame wakashala ne muoyi bidimu lukama ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete
Kadi dinda nenumone butumbi buende, bualu mmumane kumvua munudi numujana
Yehowa wakadi ne disanka bualu bua batatu benu, yeye wakahasua, yeye wakasungula bana babo bakabalonda ku nyima, wakanusungula nuenu mene mene munkatshi mua bantu bonso, bu mutshidi bualu lelu
Nealuishe muntu yonsu
Maweja Nangila kuteka tshimanyinu pambidi pa Kayine bua muntu yonsu wasangila nende kamuenzedi bibi to
Kahia bakahatuka kudi Yehowa, kakosha mulambu ne dianyi biakadi ha tshioshelu, hakakatangila bantu bonso, bakela mbila, bakatua mpala hanshi
Hashishe, hakabuela diba ne midima yakadiku, tshikutu tshiakadi ne muishi wa kahia ne tshimunyi tshia kalua kakole biakahita hankatshi ha nseke ya minyinyi
Mushindu wa kukumbaja mapangadika adi mu tuloongu tudi ku mutu etu pamwe ne makookeshi makwabo a batshipwita badi bawuleeja kudi mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu
Kadi nenufile milambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia tô matuku muanda mutekete, dituku dia muanda mutekete ndituku dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Matuku awu onsu muanda mutekete, kanuena mua kulama buanga bua mampa mu ditunga dienu dijima
Kuasabu muaba awu

Kanungu ka Dîyi didi dileeja mishindu ya kwasa matanda kwasa mayeba, kuteeka, kulenga, koosha ne kusumbula bishakata bia lulengu, bidi bibolesha anyi biladioaktif, bidi bifuma ku matanda a biamu binene anyi a midimu ya bianza adi asanganyibwa mu buloba bwa ditunga
Yehowa wakakengesha Palo ne ba mu nsubu wandi ne bihuhu bikole bualu bua Salai, mukashi wa Abalama
Diyisha dianyi dimate hanshi bu nvula, ne mei anyi akudimuke bu mume; bu nvula mukese ha mashinde a nseku, bu nvula wa mudimbi ha midioko
Neakulelele muana wa balume
Biasua muena nsubu kuhikula nsubu wandi, yeye neasakidile tshituha tshitanu tshia mushinga wa nsubu ha mutu hau, ne nsubu neikale wandi
Tshibangidilu Abrahame ne Abimeleke Abrahame umbuka ku Mambre, kuyaye kuasa kuinshi, mu ditunga dia Kenaane, pankatshi pa Kadeshe ne Shure
Bobo batshidi bantu bebe ne buhianyi buebe, bawakahatula ne bukole buebe bunene ne diboko diebe diolola
Hakalueye hehi ne tshitudilu, wakatangila kana ka ngombe ne bantu baja maja Mose wakadi ne tshiji tshikole, wakela mabue hanshi akadi mu bianza biandi, wakatshibula kuinshi kua mukuna
Nansha bia munyi , kabeena mwa kulombola muntu mu ditunga dia Mbulamatadi mudibo mwa kumunyanga, kumukengesha anyi kumukisa, kumupwekesha mushinga ne kumumona bu nyama
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuenza lupangu mu ditunga dia Edene luseke ludi diba dipatukila, kutekamu muntu uvuaye mufuke awu
Nebabusangishe ne manyi mu dilonga, ne hashikishabo kubulamba, nebafile bituha bidi bilamba kudi Yehowa bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu

Yakoba wakambila Yosefe ne, Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso wakamueneka kundi ku Luze mu buloba bua Kanâna wakansankisha, wakangambila ne, Mona, nenkuvuishe tshisamba tshinene, nenkukumbashe, neulue tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu, nempe tunkanunuina tuebe buloba ebu tshiendelele
Abrame kunyenga bintu bionsu bivuabu banyema nabi
Lemeke kushala kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama itanu makumi tshitema ne bitanu

Bakenza ndibu ya or nkayandi, bakateka ndibu hankatshi ha tumuma tuakadi kuinshi kua tshikowelu, kadibu ne kamuma kadibu ne kamuma kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshia kuenza n atshi mudimu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Bikala malu a onso kayi akudimuna mitshima yenu kundi, binuampidia, meme nennuhidie kabidi, nennukume misangu muanda mutekete bualu bua mibi yenu
Tuakanyenga misoko yandi yonso ku tshikondo atshi, katuakashiya musoko umue; tuakanyenga misoko makumi asambombo, ne luseke tuonso lua Âgoba, bukelenge bua Oga mu Bashana
Ke Moshe kusangisha nkanu ya kupikula nayi bungi bua bena Izrayele buvua bupite bungi bua bena Levi
Mana avua muntu yonsu upeta, avua bu litre inayi
Dîba edi Minisitila kavulambedi udi ufila mukanda wa dilekele dia mudimu dia Bukalenga bunene kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga mu mêba makumi abidi ne anaayi
Bankambua benu makumi muanda mutekete bakaya mu Ejipitu; katataka Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuvudisha bungi bua mitoto idi mu diulu
Bintu bionso bidibo bakuata n abi mudimu mu tshiendelele ne milonda yonso yatshi, ne milonda yonso ya luhangu luatshi, nebikale bia tshiamu tshia mitaku
Kanutshinyi bisamba ebi to
Malu aa avua menzeke, Moshe mumane kutshimuna Sihone, mukalenga wa bena Amore, uvua muase ku Eshebone
Milka ne Iska bavua bana ba Arane
Badi mua kumukuma mikumu makumi anai, kadi kabahitshi: biahilabo mikumu ei, muan enu neikale bu muntu wa hatuhu kunudi

Mu dîba dia mvita anyi didibo bapeesha bilwilu bukookeshi bwa kubweeja bulongama mu bantu bônso,anyi didibo badiundisha bukookeshi bwa kubwejabu budipope, Mulombodi wa Ditunga mu dipangadika dilonga mu Kapangu ka baminisitila, udi mwa kwanji kwimanyika pa tshipaapu tshiônso tshia Ditunga anyi pa tshitupa tshimwe tshiaadi ne bwa bûngi bwa matuku ne bibawu bidiye uteela, midimu ya dinyookangana ya bilumbulwidi bia bantu bônso pa kumbusha beena tshidiidi, bwa kuyipeesha bilumbulwidi bia basalayi
Kadi bantu bonso bakamba ne, Tubakume ne mabue Butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka mu ntenta wa kusambakena kudi Bena Isalele bonso
Bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; Yehowa wakanusungula munkatshi mua bantu bonso ba ha buloba bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi
Kadi nuenu nuvua babenga diyi dia Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu bua kuya mu ditunga adi
Miaba yonsu ivua mayi apatukila muinshi mua buloba ne mulu kudikangayi, mela kukama
Munyinyi awu kawakuikala wa dituku dimue, matuku abidi, asatu, dikumi, nansha makumi abidi to
Enza mbote makumi atanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mesu a mbote ku mibangu ya tshilulu tshikuabo bualu bua kutuangasha bilulu, bua ntenta ikale bu tshilulu tshimue
Mose wakamba ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Undeshe butumbi buebe
Kanuangatshi bintu bia buhikudi kudi mushihi wa muntu udi muhile bulelela, bualu bua nebamushihe bulelela
Bantu bonsu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Efrayime badi
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Bena nvita badi munkatshi muenu bangate bintu bia nvita bualu bua kushikisha dikenga didi Yehowa musue kusombuela n adi Bena Midiyana
Mikenji eyi idi bua bantu bonsu, benyi ne bena ditunga
Yosefe wakavuluka bua bilota biandi biakabaloteleye, yeye wakabambila ne, Nudi batentekedi, nuakuluila bua kutangila ne buloba budi butuhu
Lota wakumuka ku Soâ, wakaya kushikama ku mikuna, yeye ne bana bandi bakashi babidi, wakatshina bua kushikama ku Soâ, wakikala biandi ne bana bandi bakashi babidi mu lubuebue
Kaleba ne Yoshua Badi Bashala ne Muoyo Aba mbantu bakabalabo kudi Mose ne kudi Eleazâ muakuidi, bakabala Bena Isalele mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mutangilangane ne Yeleko
Wakela makalu a Palô ne bisumbu biandi bionso mu mai manene, wakashiha tuhita tuakasunguleye mu Dishiba Dikunze
Maweja Nangila kumuambila ne: Ntuadile muana wa ngombe, mbuji ne mukoku wa tshimpanga bia bidimu bisatu
Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudibo, bua kubashiha munkatshi mua tshitudilu, tô ne hakafuabo buonso buabo

Nanku panuikala ne biakudia bia bungi, nusomba mu nzubu mimpe, nupeta bintu bia bungi: ngombe, mikoku, mbuji, biamu bitoke bia mushinga mukole, ne bia mpawungi, ne bintu bikuabu bia mishindu yonsu, kanuditambishi to
Mvidi Mukulu kufuka tshibuashibuashi bua kupandulula mayi adi muinshi ne adi mulu
Kusungulaye bantu bashindame munkatshi mua bena Izrayele
Yeye wakalukila kudi Yuda, wakamuambila ne, Tshiakumusangana, ne balume ba musoko bakungambila ne, Mukashi wa masandi kakadiku
Muntu yonsu udi ulala mu nzubu awu, nansha udilamu biakudia, udi ne bua kusukula bilamba biende
Yakoba wakalua ku musoko wa Shekeme, mu buloba bua Kanâ na, talalâ, hakafumeye ku Padanaalama, wakashimika ntenta yandi ku mpala kua musoko
Ku Holeba wa mu nshila wa ku mukuna wa Sei tô ne ku Kadeshe bânea, nduendu lua matuku dikumi ne dimue
Kumulondelaye kabidi muvua Maweja Nangila mubapandishe mu makenga onsu avuabu nawu mu njila
Nebabuikile bionsu ebi ne tshilamba tshikunze tshienza ne miosa ya nyama
Kuelaye bianza mulu kudi Maweja Nangila
Bialenga muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi munga muntu tshianza diambedi yeye kayi muanze kuowa bianza biandi, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Moshe kuambila kabidi bena Izrayele ne: Nanku nukumbaje bionsu bidi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munuambile, anu mudibi amu

Badi Babanyangana Biakanyengabo Eleazâ muakudi wakambila bena nvita bakaya mu nvita ne, Eu udi mukenji wakela Yehowa kudi Mose: kadi or ne argent ne tshiamu tshia mitaku ne tshiamu tshifike ne tshiamu tshia étain ne tshia plomb ne tshintu tshionso tshidi katshiyi tshitua mu kahia, nenutshiteke mu kahia bua kutshilengesha, kadi nenutshilengeshe ne mai adibo balengesha n au bintu, bintu bionso bidi bihia mu kahia nenubilengeshe mu mai

Enza mutu wa buatu, ushiye muaba wa coudée umue hankatshi ha mutu ne buatu buashi ku nseke yonso, ushiye mushiku ku luseke lukuabo lua buatu, lungakasha nsubu isatu, nsubu wa kumudilu ne nsubu muibidi ha mutu ne nsubu muisatu ha mutu
Maweja Nangila kuitaba majinga enu, kungambila ne: Dilomba dia bena Izrayele didi dimpe

Wakumukaku, wakaya ku Bê sheba Yehowa wakamueneka kudiye butuku abu mene, wakamba ne, Ndi Nzambi wa tatu webe Abalahama, kutshinyi, bualu bua meme ndi n ebe, nenkusankishe, nenkumbashile tunkanunuina tuebe bualu bua muntu wanyi Abalahama
Uvua muyifunde pa mabue abidi, avuaye mumpeshe meme Moshe, kayi musakidileku mikenji mikuabu to
Hakakumbana matuku andi, monai, bana ba makasa bakadi munda muandi
Kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kakunyua mei a Belâma; kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakakudimuna mulau ulua disanka dienu, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanusua

Dutelonone Masanka Alualua kudi Batumikidi ba Mikenji Binuananukila kutumikila mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kuenza mikenji yandi yonso indi nnuambila lelu, hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuteke ku mutu kua bisamba bionso bia hanshi ha buloba; ne masanka â onso nealue kunudi, neanuhete, binuatumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bakelenge ba mu Isalele, bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo, bakafua bintu
Minyinyi ya mu mai idi mu musulu neyifue, mai neanunke muhuya mubi, mai a mu musulu neatonde Bena Ejipitu
Tshitupa nansha tshimwe tshia beena ditunga anyi muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kubwangata ne mbwende to

Tshibangidilu Abrame udi upandisha Lote Mu tshikondu atshi, bakalenga banayi, Amrafele, mukalenga wabena Babilone, Ariyoke, mukalenga wa bena Elazare, Kedorlayomere, mukalenga wa bena Elame, ne Tidale, mukalenga wa bena Ngoyime, kuluishabu bakalenga bakuabu batanu: ke Bera, mukalenga wa bena Sodome, Birsha, mukalenga wa bena Ngomore, Shinabe, mukalenga wa bena Adma, Shemebere, mukalenga wa bena Siboyime ne mukalenga wa bena Bela badibu babikila ne bena Soware
Nomba Bungi bua Bena Lewi ne Midima Yabo Ebi mbikondo bia Alona ne Mose mu dituku diakasomba Yehowa ne Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai
Mukaji udibu babanda ne: mmuende tshiendenda Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Tuambe ne: Mukaji wa bende mmuende tshiendenda
Betuyele uvua muana wa Nahore, muanabu ne Abrahame
Dipangadika diônso didibo bamba ne kadieena dineemeka Dîyi dikulu kadieena ne bukola to, kakuyi dieebeja muntu bwaalu

Aba mbana balume ba Ashê ku meku abo: Yimena ne meku a Bena Yimena, Yishewi ne meku a Bena Yishewi, Belia ne meku a Bena Belia, ne bana balume ba Belia Hebe ne meku a Bena Hebe, Malekiele ne meku a Bena Malekiele
Bushuwa, kuena mutufikishe mu ditunga didi ne biakudia bia bungi to
Mabue a nvula ne miele ya nvula biakabuelakana, biakatamba bikole, kabakatangila bualu abu mu buloba bua Ejipitu katshia bualua tshisamba tshia bantu
Muenyi ne muena mudimu wa difutu kabena mua kutshidia
Kabundi ka mputu kakena kakane kunudi, bualu bua kadi kahingishilula bintu mukana, kadi kakena ne mikono mihanduluke
Mbabula ayi, ivua ya bena tshibawu bamane kufua bua buenzavi buabu
Bantu bakadi ne nyota, bakatontolola Mose, bakamba ne, Wakuluila n etu ku Ejipitu bua kutushiha ne bana betu ne bimuna bietu ne nyota munyi
Kena nansha ne muntu udi mua kumujadikila bualu, nansha udi mubumone
Nentume tuishi ku mpala kuebe bualu bua kukuihatshila Bena Hiwi ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Hiti
Mayi avua apatuka munda mua buloba ke avua abupesha tshitalela
Mose ne Eleazâ muakuidi bakangata or ya tuhita tua binunu ne binunu ne tuhita tua nkama ne nkama, bakalua n ai mu ntenta wa kusambakena bu tshivulukidi tshia Bena Isalele ku mesu kua Yehowa

Muvua kabidi ngombe milume dikumi ne ibidi, mikoku ya bimpanga dikumi ne ibidi, bana ba mikoku dikumi ne babidi ba tshidimu tshimue, bua milambu ya kuosha pamue ne milambu ya bintu bia mu madimi ya kulambula pamue ne nyama
Muntu udibo bânji kulama mu tshimana udi ne bukookeshi bwa kuyukila diakamwe ne beena dîku diende anyi ne mumwakwidi wende
Ei idi ndelanganyi ya tunkanunuina tua Sheme Hakadi Shema ne bidimu lukama, wakalela Âpakashada, bidimu bibidi ku nyima kua nvula munene
Bakabuesha mabue au mu masoso a tshiamu tshia or
Mutuangaji neatshipishe mukaji, umuambila ne: Pikala mulume mukuabu kayi mukubuelele mu nzubu, wewe kuyi mudinyange, kuyi mudinge bayebe, mayi audi unua aa kakukuenzela bualu to
Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Bilele bia Bena Buloba Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, kanuyidi bua kulonda ku nyima kua malu a bundu a bisamba abi
Muntu wa munkatshi mua bana balume ba Alona udi ufila mashi ne dianyi bia mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala neikale ne diboko dia balume bu tshintu tshiandi
Mu tshidimu etshi tshia disanka dinene nenuhingane muntu yonso ku buloba buandi muntu yonso ku buloba buandi
Nunku bakamushiha ne bana bandi balume ne bantu bandi bonso, nansha mundi umue wakashala, bakanyema buloba buandi
Abalama wakambila Lota ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Katutandanganyi, balami ba bintu bietu kabatandanganyi, bualu bua tudi bana ba muntu umue
Ekesode Dikengeshibua dia Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu Â mmena a bana balume ba Isalele bakalua mu Ejipitu, muntu ne muntu ne ba mu nsubu wandi bakalua ne Yakoba

Biangata mulume muan abo mukashi, muana wa tatu andi anyi muana wa mamu andi, biavuleye bilulu biandi, ne biamuvula mukashi bilulu, ebu mbualu bua bundu, nebumushibue munkatshi mua bana babo, yeye wakavula muan abo mukashi bilulu, yeye nendituadile bubi buandi
Buikale ne nzubu isatu milungakaja ya tshilalakulu: wa panshi, wa pankatshi ne wa kulu
Labane kuya lukasa bua kusambakena ne muntu uvua ku tshiina tshia mayi
Bobu nebadimanye
Wenze midimu yebe yonsu matuku asambombu
Yakoba wakambila Lakele ne, Ndi muan abo ne tatu ebe, ndi muana wa Lebeka, Lakele wakaya lubilu, wakamanyisha tatu andi
Kuvudi muan enu mukashi bilulu, bikaleye muana wa tatu ebe anyi muana wa mamu ebe udi muledibue mu nsubu muenu, anyi muaba mukuabo
Ngadiyele, muana wa Sodi, wa mu tshisamba tshia Zebulone
Hakalua dituku disambombo, bakasangisha bituha bibidi, bihiminu bibidi ku muntu ne ku muntu, ne bakulu ba munkatshi muabo Bakalua, bakamanyisha Mose
Bena Izrayele badi batombokela Maweja Nangila tshiakabidi Moshe kumanyisha bena Izrayele malu onsu avua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Hakalua dituku disatu ne dinda, makubakuba ne miele ya nvula ne difutu difike biakadi ha mukuna, ne di dia mpungi diakatamba bukole, bantu bonso bakadi mu tshitudilu bakazakala
Ukenzakana, kumonaye tumelu tuye kudiye
Palô wakamba ne, Nennulekele, nuye mu tshihela bua kushihela Yehowa Nzambi wenu nyama, kadi kanuyi kule, nundombele Nzambi
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga ke udi ne bukookeshi bwa kufwilangana luse
munda bu udi Bulongolodi budibo bamona ne kabweena bumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu kabeena mwa kubukumbaja to
Tshiena muhunge n enu nuenu nkayenu tshihungidi etshi ne kuditshiha eku, kadi ne muntu yonso udi muimane ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, lelu, ne muntu yonso udi kayi muimane n etu lelu
Tshintu tshionsu tshidi muntu ulambula Maweja Nangila, nebatshipeshe mutuangaji
Wewe neulamike tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe mu nseke yonso, ne ku mpenge kabidi
Beena Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga badi polovensa

Ndi mumutangile kadi tshiena mumutangile katataka, ndi mumumone kadi yeye kena ha buihi, Mutoto nebiluhuke kudi Yakoba, ne dikombo dia bukelenge nedibike munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, nedikume ku matshika a Moaba, nedishihe bana bonso ba Shete

Yeye neahingishe mushinga wa tshintu tshia tshijila ne tshituha tshitanu ha mutu, neabifile mu bianza bia muakuidi, ne muakuidi neafile tshimpanga bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Nuitabe bionsu bidibu banuambila kudi batuangaji ne balumbuluishi, badi muaba wa tshijila wa Maweja Nangila, nubikumbaje
Meme nendue n enu mu buloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, nennuhebu bu buhianyi ndi Yehowa
Ndi musue kubabutula bonsu amu mpindiewu
Mai adi aluhuka mu milondo yandi, bana bandi nebikale munkatshi mua mai a bungi, mukelenge wandi neahite Agaga bunene, bukelenge buandi nebutumbishibue
Bungi bua bantu bakafua ku disama edi bakadi binunu dikumi ne binai ne nkama muanda mutekete, ha mutu ha bantu bakafua bua bualu bua Kola
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita Tuludiki twa munda badi batutangila bu tukumbana

Bana ba Lubena, muan a bute wa Isalele, ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo muntu ne muntu, ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu balume bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Lubena binunu makami anai ne bisambombo ne nkama itanu
Bakumuka mu Alusha bakashikama mu Lefidima, ne bantu kabakadi ne mai a kunua
Muena mudimu kayi muanji kujikija ditendelela, Rebeka, muana wa Betuyele, kufika, muambuile mulondu wa mayi pa makaya
Arone kusengelela Moshe, wamba ne: Mukalenga wanyi, tudi bena tshibawu
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuikale talala, kanutshinyi Nzambi, Nzambi wa tatu wenu, wakanuha bintu mu bibombi bienu, meme nakadi ne argent yenu
Bena Izrayele balonde anu mikenji eyi, bua kundambula ngombe, mukoku wa tshimpanga, muana wa mukoku, nansha muana wa mbuji
Yeye wakakebulula kakasangana mpingu
Padi muntu ulenga nyama eyi, udi upia mikiya; nyama yonsu idi yenda pa munda mua diikasa

Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia diumvwangana ne ndondo ne matunga makwabo, tshinyangu tshiônso tshia bulume ne bukaji tshienzela muntu bwa kusendekeja, kupandulula dîku ne kubutula tshisamba tshijima badi batshitangila bu tshibawu tshienzela bumuntu tshidibo banyooka kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Kakunulokeshila kabidi mvula
Tshimenga nansha tshimue katshivua ne bukole bua kutuluisha
Hakaluabo kudi Luele, tatu abo, yeye wakamba ne, Nuakuhingana lubilu lelu bualu kai
Nudi mua kudia nyunyu yonso idi miakane
Nanku bintu abi nebishale bia mutuangaji
Patuikala dijinga ne biakudia, nansha ne mayi a kunua, netusumbe
Nanku bonsu banudi nabu, bambule bia mvita, bapite kumpala kua bana benu bena Izrayele bakuabu, bua kusabuka musulu wa Yardene
Kanuena mua kuangata tshintu nansha tshimue tshia bidibu ne bua kuosha, bua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu amone mua kutuyisha tshiji tshiende

Yeye udi mua kudia bidia bia Nzambi wandi ne bidia bidi bitambe tshijila ne bia tshijila, kadi yeye kena mua kubuela mu muaba wa tshijila anyi mua kulua ha buihi ne tshioshelu, bualu bua yeye udi ne tshilema, kanyangishi nsubu wanyi nansha, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa wakabajidila
Nanku Maweja Nangila kunyingalala bua muntu uvuaye mufuke, muteke pa buloba
Tshipungu tshia beena Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu tshidi tshia bidimu tshiteema kabayi batshiambulula
Meme ndi Yehowa
Isaka wakamuambila ne, Nakatshina ne, Nebanshihe bua bualu buandi

Kulumbulula Kuakane Nenudisunguluile balumbuluishi ne bafundi mu misoko yonso, idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe, ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba; bobo nebalumbuluishe bantu bilumbu biabo ne dilumbuluisha didi diakane

Bana balume ba Alona bakamulesha mashi, yeye wakatua munu wandi mu mashi, wakâlaba ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu, wakalongolola mashi ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu, kadi yeye wakosha dianyi ne tumuma ne lukutu lua mutshima bia mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ha tshioshelu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Wewe newele dî kudi Bena Isalele bua kuluabo ne manyi a olive a kuela mu muinda, muinda uteme matuku onso
Moshe umvua nanku, kudielaye mpala panshi

Nebashihe muprofete au anyi mulotshi au wa bilota, bualu bua yeye wakamba mei adi anutombuesha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanu; hatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, wakanuhikula mu nsubu wa lukanu; udi musue kunusesuisha mu nshila wakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenubua nuenu kuendamu
Bienza mu Kinshasa dia Yozefu KABILA MUTUDI BANDAMUNA IMWE MIAKU Français Assemblée nationale Tshiluba Autonomie de gestion Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka, Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga
Dielulula Mikenji dikumi Moshe kubikila bena Izrayele bonsu, kubambila ne: Bena Izrayele, telejayi meyi ne mikenji, bindi nnuambila lelu
Bobo nebatonde mibi yabo, nebatonde mitu ya batatu abo kabidi disambuka diabo dia mikenji ne kumpidia kuabo, nunku meme nakabahidia, nakabafila mu buloba bua bantu badi n abo lukuna
Nanku bena Merari bavua ne mudimu wa kulama bimpe bintu bionsu ebi
Yeye nkayandi wakahita ku mpala kuabo, wakakukuila hanshi misangu muanda mutekete to ne hakasemeneye ha buihi ne mukulu andi
Bakumuka mu Haselota, bakashikama mu Litema
Ndi mumane kukulongoluela muaba wa kulala ne wa kuladika tumelu tuebe
Yeye wakamuvudishilaku disanka Yakoba wakidika muaba au ne, Peniele bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Nakumonangana ne Nzambi mpala ha mpala ne muoyo wanyi wakuhanduka

Nudimuke bienu, bua kanudidingi mu mitshima yenu, kanusesuki bua kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo midimu ne kuyitendelela; bualu bua Yehowa neanukuatshile tshiji, yeye neabuikile diulu ne nvula kayena iloka, ne buloba kabuena bukuama bintu; nunku nenujimishibue lubilu mu buloba buimpe buakamba Yehowa
Bena Izrayele bonsu basanga bavuabu babadike ku tshisamba ne ku tshisumbu badi
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Kenana Enosha wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne dikumi ne bitanu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Bena Emi ke bavua badianjila kuasa mu ditunga dia Are
Bia bisatu bibidi bia beena Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu badi ne tshia kwikala bamanyi ba mêyi ne mikandu bafumina mu midimu ya bukoshi bwa nsambu, ya diakwilangana ku bilumbulwilu anyi ya tulasa tukulumpe

Mukashi wakadi ne mutshima mulengele ne kalolo munkatshi muenu wakatshina mua kuihata makasa ha buloba bualu bua kalolo ne kanemu kakatamba, neikale ne disu dibi kudi mulume udiye munange, ne kudi muan andi mulume ne kudi muan andi mukashi, ne kudi muana muhia muhia wakaleleye ha binu biandi ne kudi bana bonso hadiye mulele; yeye neabadie mu musokoko bua kuhanga kua bia kudia mu ditshintshimika ne ditata bidi bena lukuna banutatshisha n abi ku misoko yenu
Nuikale bantu ba tshijila, bualu meme ndi wa tshijila
Au mmena a bana ba balume ba Gêshona ku meku abo Libini ne Shimei
Ke Moshe kuashila Maweja Nangila tshilambuilu, kutshinyika dina ne: Maweja Nangila ke dibendela dianyi
Mashi adi ku muelelu wa biibi bia nzubu inudi nusomba awu, neikale tshimanyinu tshidi mua kunupandisha
Kanungu ka Dilongolola dia polovensa didi dilondeshila ngenyi miludiki mifila mu mulongo mwisâtu wa dîyi ditudi nadi edi
Kumukila ku mukuna wa Sinayi bua kufika ku Kadeshe Barneya, muntu udi mua kuenda matuku dikumi ne dimue, pikalaye mulonde njila wa ku mikuna ya Seyire
Mose wakadimusha bantu dituku adi mene ne, Bantu aba nebimane ha mutu ha Gelizima bua kuvudishila bantu disanka hanuasabuka Yadene: Shimeona ne Lewi ne Yuda ne Yisakâ ne Yosefe ne Benyamina
Hakafikabo ku nsubu wa tshilala benyi, umue wabo wakasulula tshi bombi tshiandi bua kudisheye mpunda wandi, wakatangila argent yandi ba mutu ha tshibombi tshiandi
Yehowa wakadi ne Yosefe, wakamuendesha diakalengele, wakadi mu nsubu wa mukelenge wandi, Muena Ejipitu
Muntu udi ulala mu nsubu neuvuwe bilulu biandi, ne muntu udi udia bidia mu nsubu neuvuwe bilulu biandi
Moshe kupatuka, kushiyangana ne mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Dîyi diaadi dia bukole didi Bululama Ditalala Mudimu

Bikala Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muleheshe matshika enu, bu muakudi tshiheye kudi bankambua benu, bianuheye buloba buonso buakalayeye bankambua benu; binuatumikila mukenji eu, undi munuelele lelu, binuawenza, bua kusua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenda mu nshila yandi; hashishe nenusungule misoko mikuabo isatu ha mutu ha misoko ei isatu
Ndi mumupeshedi, yeye ne ndelanganyi yende, bualu yeye uvua muitabe diyi dianyi, mundamate ne muoyi mujima
Udilongolole dinda, Ulue biebe ne dinda ku mukuna wa Sinai; Ulue biebe kundi ku mutu kua mukuna
Tangila, meme nkayanyi, nendokeshe mai mangi ha buloba bua kujimisha bintu bionso bidi ne muhuya wa muoyo munda muabi muinshi mua diulu, tshintu tshionso tshidi ne muoyo ha buloba netshifue
Ewu ke mulambu wa dinua tshibalu bua muntu yonsu udi mubunde tshibawu kudi Maweja Nangila
Ujikija kunua, nsongakaji kumuambila kabidi ne: Ndi nya kusuna makuabu bua kunuisha tumelu tuebe tuonsu
Nuikale ne bukole ne mitshima ya dikima, kanubatshinyi, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, yeye mene uyaya n enu; yeye kena unuhanga, kena unulekela
Sala, mukashi wa mukelenge wanyi, wakamulelela muana mulume hakadiye muntu mununu, yeye wakadia muana eu bintu bionso bidiye n abi
Wewe mubenge, neanyoke ditunga diebe, neatume ndimba miaba yonsu
Wewe newenze mesa a mutshi wa acacia buludi buau nebuikale coudées ibidi, ne butshiama buau nebuikale coudée umue, ne bule buau bua mulu nebuikale coudée umue ne tshituha

Kadi bikala mulambu wandi wa kuditshiha n au anyi mulambu udiye ufila ku disua diandi, yeye neaudie mu dituku didiye ûfila ne tshituha tshidi tshishale yeye neatshidie makelela, kadi bikala tshituha tshia munyinyi wa mulambu tshishale tô ne ku dituku disatu, nebatshioshe mu kahia
Wambile bantu mu matshu abo ne, Mulume yonso alombe muena mutumba n andi, ne mukashi yonso alombe mukashi muena mutumba n andi bilenga bia argent ne bilenga bia or
Yeye wakatshimanya wakamba ne, Etshi ntshikowelu tshia muan anyi, nyama mubi wakamudia, bulelela, Yosefe udi muhandibue bihese bihese kudi nyama
Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi badi munkatshi muabo udi ulemba nyama anyi nyunyu bua kudia neahongolole mashi andi hanshi, neajibikile ne dinfuenkenya dia buloba
Yayende wa muana awu, uvua muimanyine pa bule, bua kumona tshivua ne bua kuenzekela muana

Bualu ku bisamba bionsu, nansha bidi ne bantu bapite bungi, kakuena tshisamba tshidi ne mvidie pabuipi natshi, bu mudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu pabuipi netu, misangu yonsu itudi Kunubikila, tumulomba diambuluisha
Munyinyi wabi newikale webe bu mudi tshiadi tshidibo banyukula ne tshibelu tshia ku tshianza tshia bukole
Bakelenge bana ba Palo bakamumona, bakamuanyishila Palo, bakaya n andi mu nsubu wa Palo
Nubandamune ne: Mmulambu wa tshivulukilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila
Kunupatulaye mu Ejipitu ku bukole buende
Mu ditunga adi, mudi biakudia bia bungi: ntete mishilangane ya kuenza bukula, mitshi ya mfiku, maluvu a mvinyo, mitshi ya grenade, mafuta a olive ne buitshi
Moshe kuamba ne: Nenujadike mundi tshiyi ndienzela malu nkayanyi to, kabidi mudi Maweja Nangila nkayende muntume bua kukumbaja bionsu ebi
Monai, nakuteka buloba ebu buonso ku mpala kuenu: nubuelemu, nuhiane buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu etu Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bua kubahabu ne tunkanunuina tuabo tudi tubalonda ku nyima
Kadi nyama yonsu, nyunyi ya mulu ne bilandadi, mbayipeshi bidimenena, bikale biakudia biayi
Wimane nabi kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Bena Midiyana, bendi ba mushinga bakahita, ba kahatula Yosefe mu mukela, bakamuhanyisha Bena Yishemaele ku bituha bia argent makumi abidi
Abrahame kudiela mutu panshi, useka wamba ne: Muntu mukulumpe wa bidimu lukama, udi mua kulela muana bishi
Biwatangila mpunda wa muntu udi n ebe lukuna muhone muinshi mua bujitu buandi, kushiya mpunda nunku, kadi umukuatshishe ne bujitu buandi
Ditunga edi dijima dia Kenaane diudi upitshila mpindiewu bu muenyi, nenkupeshadi kashidi
Nanku mu tshisamba tshionsu, nusungule bantu bashindame, ba meji, ba lumu luimpe, bua mbateke, bikale banulombola
Kanubeyi nsuki yenu biketu, kanuhungi miedi yenu ku bihanga
Aboye butu budi pa tshilambuilu, anji kubuteka panshi ku luseke lua tshilambuilu
Tuakanyunguluka, tuakaya mu nshila wa ku Bashana: ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakalua ne bantu bandi bonso bua kuluangana n etu ku Edelei
Kubenzejabu mudimu wa bupika ne tshikisu tshipite bukole
Wewe kabidi udi anu muenyi mu ditunga dietu
Kadi tshimuna tshia bena Izrayele katshiena tshifua nansha tshimue
Nanku bu meme mudie munyinyi wa mulambu wa kukobolola dituku edi, Maweja Nangila uvua mua kusanka anyi

Bualu bua wakadi ne anu bintu bikese tshiyi muanze kulua kunoko mpindiu biakuvulangana tshisumbu tshinene, Yehowa wakukusankisha wewe bua malu onso anakukuenzela, ne katataka meme nengenze mudimu tshikondo kai bua kukumbasha bia ba mu nsubu wanyi kabidi
Lemeke kusela bakaji babidi: dina dia mukalenga muadi divua Ada, dia mutu wa lubanza divua Sila
Yehowa wakamba ne, Wele hanshi Nunku wakawela hanshi ne wowo wakakudimuka nyoka, Mose wakamunyema

Yakoba Udi Uluangana Bibula ne Muntu ku Peniele Butuku abu wakabika biandi wakangata bakashi bandi babidi ne bakashi babidi benji ba mudimu ne bana bandi dikumi ne umue, bakasabuka ku dilobo dia Yaboka
Budikookeshi Dinyooka dia lukanu Dinyooka Teletwale Dibandila dia matunga ne bintu Mianda ya bia kwenza nabi mudimu Tshinyangu, tshimvundu Tshisabu Kabumwe, bobumwe Viza Dianyishibwa
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Hawahingana mu Ejipitu, wenza ku mesu kua Palô malu a kukema onso anakuteka mu tshianza tshiebe, kadi meme nenkoleshe mutshima wa Palô, ne yeye kena ulekela bantu
Bikaleye muana wa balume udi ne bidimu bitanu tô ne ku bidimu makumi abidi, neubale nshekele makumi abidi, ne bikaleye muana wa bakashi, nshekele dikumi
Pashishe netupingane apa
Nakashala ku mukuna matuku makumi anai bu munakenza diambedi: Yehowa wakangunvuila musangu eu kabidi; Yehowa kakanushiha
Hashishe Yuda wakambila Tama ma mue n andi ne, Ushale bu mukashi wa mu lufuila mu nsubu wa tatu ebe to ne hadiunda muan anyi Shela
Binuahidia kunvua mei anyi bua malu a onso, binuampidia, meme nennuhidie kabidi, nengikale n enu tshiji nennukengeshe misangu muanda mutekete bualu bua mibi yenu
Kadi nentue ndondu ne Izake, muana walelabu kudi mukajebe Sara tshidimu tshidi kumpala etshi
Udi wambila beena mu Tshimamwende wa bukalenga mianda idiye ubadisha ne kakuyi dishintakaja dia ngenyi
Adama wakamanyangana ne mukashi wandi kabidi, Wakalela muana mulume, wakamuidika dina ne, Sheta Wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpa muana mukuabo mu muaba wa Ebele, bualu bua Kana wakamushiha

Kadi nudi mua kushiha nyama ne mua kudia munyinyi ku mbelu kuenu udi mitshima yenu misue, bu mudi disanka dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, diakanusankisheye n adi; bantu badi kabayi bakane ne badi bakane badi mua kudia munyinyi wa kabuluku ne mbashi
Tuakabajimisba, bu munuakenzela Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona; tuakahaula misoko yonso yakadi ne bantu, ne bakashi ne bana bakese
Hashishe Palô wakatabala Wakalala tulu kabidi, wakalota tshiota tshikuabo, wakamona miehu ya mponda muanda mutekete minene, miakane idiundile ku lubalabala lumue
Bana ba balume ba Lakele bakadi Yosefe ne Benyamina
Diabanyangana dia makookeshi pankatshi pa Mbulamatadi ne polovensa didi ne tshia kwenzeka mu bulongolodi bwa mutu wa mukanda IV bwa Dîyi ditudi nadi edi
Nakanulombola mu tshihela tô bidimu makumi anai: bilulu bienu kabiakasunsuka ham bidi henu, ne bisabata kabiakasunsuka ku makasa enu
Moshe kuitaba bionsu bivua tatuende muenu mumuambile
Muntu yonso udi usangisha manyi bu au, anyi udi waela muenyi, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubikila Moshe kumuambila ne: Nuenu bantu balume, bakaji benu ne bana, nuye kutendelela Maweja Nangila, kadi bimuna bienu, mikoku, mbuji ne ngombe, bishale munemu
Bakumuka mu Etama bakahingana ku Pihahilota, udi ku mpala kua Bâla sefona, bakashikama ku mpala kua Migedola
Kanungu ka : Bukalenga bukoshi bwa nsambu budi budilekelela ne bukalenga bulongolodi bwa mêyi ne mikandu ne kabidi ne Bukalenga bunene
Sala wakadia ne, Tshiakaseka, bualu bua yeye wakadi utshina

Biafileye muana wa mukoko bu mulambu wandi, nealue handi ku mesu kua Yehowa, neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha muana wa mukoko wa mulambu wandi, neamushihe ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, bana balume ba Alona nebamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu
Hakaheta Labana Yakoba, wakamusangana mumane kushimika ntenta yandi ku mukuna, Labana ne bantu bandi bakalala ku mukuna wa Gilada
Monai argent ituakasangana mu bibombi bietu, tuakulua n ai kûdi kabidi hatuakafuma ku buloba bua Kanana
Wakenza nkanu ya or mai ya kuteka ku matumba anai, ibidi ku luseke lumue, ibidi ku luseke lukuabo

Pa mwânzu ewu, mudimu watshi udi wa: a bulami bwa lupetu lwa mbulamatadi; b dikuba ne dishindamija dia bulongolodi bwa mianda ya kashintu; c disunguluja ne dikumbaja dia bulongodi bwa mianda ya kashintu; d ditangilula dia bujima bwa mianda ya tshibutshilu; e difila dia ngenyi mitangila bubanji ne lupetu kudi Bukalenga bunene

Tshikondo tshidibo bashehula bintu netshikale tô ne ku tshikondo tshidibo bahuola mamuma a mitshi, ne tshikondo tshidibo bahuola mamuma netshikale tô ne ku tshikondo tshidibo bakuna bintu, nenukute mafu tente ne bia kudia, nenushikame mu buloba buenu talala
Kanungu ka Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu anyi Tshisangilu Tshinene tshidi tshikwaata mudimu wa mushinga anu padi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beenatshi babwêla
Yakoba wakasemena ha buihi ne Isaka tatu andi, yeye wakamulengela tshianza tshiandi, wakamba ne, Dî ndia Yakoba kadi bianza mbia Esau
Yakoba wakaya ku Sukota, wakasaku nsubu, wakenzelaku bimuna biandi bitanda, nunku bakidika muaba au ne Sukota
Butshia pa kabundubundu Abrahame kuya muaba uvuabu bimane ne Maweja Nangila
Yosefe wakalua ne Yakoba, tatu andi, wakamuteka ku mpala kua Palô, ne Yakoba wakavudishila Palo disanka
Baye kuimansha ku mpenga kua tshimenga muaba wa bintu bibi
Ke muvuabu base mitanda yabu ku tshisumbu ku tshisumbu, muaba uvua dibendela diabu
Kadi uvua mupitshile patupu ku nzubu ya bana betu, kayi muimane bua kubashipa
Bakumuka mu Abalona, bakashikama mu Esione gebê, Bakumuka mu Esione gebê, bakashikama mu tshihela tshia Sina dina dikuabo ne Kadesha
Ku tunyama tukese tudi tuenda panshi, numanye ne: tudi ne mikiya tudi nunku: tshibulebule, mpuku, misodi ya mishindu yonsu, dibula mutshi, dimemba, tshimpulumunzu, lomba ne lungonyonyi
Mikenji idi itangila tshilambuilu tshia milambu Nanku, Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe kabidi bua kuambila bena Izrayele ne: Nuadimuenyi nkayenu mundi nyukila nenu, meme muikale mulu
Pashishe meme kumukonka ne: Wewe udi muana wa nganyi
Mutshi ma wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye kakunvuila Bena Isalele, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Amrame uvua musele tatuende mukaji Yokebede
Kadi batuangaji ne bantu bonsu kababandi ku mukuna kundi to
Nenunyukule mulambu wa bukula buakaboteshabo diambedi kudi Yehowa, ku bikondo bienu bionso
Nebadie munyinyi mu nsubu umue, kanuhatuki ne munyinyi ku nsubu, kanutshibudi nansha mufuba umue

Nanku mafuta adi mashale mu tshianza awu, mutuangaji neaalabe muntu udi udikobolola miaba iwaye mulabe mashi a mukoku wa mulambu wa dinua tshibalu: ku lusongu lua ditshi, ku tshiala, ne ku muana nkasa munene bia luseke luende lua dia balume
Ke muvuaye utendelela Mvidi Mukulu wa kashidi, utela dina dia Maweja Nangila

Bana ba Manashe ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Manashe binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi ne nkama ibidi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Uhatule muntu eu muena bihendu ku butshika bua tshitudilu, bantu bonso bakunvua mei andi batentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu handi ne bantu bonso bamukume ne mabue
Moshe kupesha Arone ne bana bende ba balume bintu bionsu abi ku bianza bua babiele mulu, babinyukule kumpala kua Maweja Nangila

Tangila, hantshidi muimane hehi ne mushimi wa mai, ne bana bakashi ba bena musoko bakadi balua bua kusunabo mai, witabushe ne nsongakashi undi ngambila ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Utule mulondo webe wa mai, umpe mai a kunua, yeye angandamune di ne, Nua biebe, nennuishe tumelo biebe kabidi, nunku yeye mene ikale mukashi uwakasunguila muntu webe Isaka, nunku nemmanye ne wewe wakufuila mukelenge wanyi luse
Hakashikisha Yehowa kusomba ne Mose ha mukuna wa Sinai, yeye wakamuha mabue abidi akadi ne mikenji mifundahu ne munu wa Nzambi
Upueka ku tshiina, kusunaye mayi mulondu tente
Nanku, bana bende ba balume kumuambuilabu mashi
Nunku uditshihe n anyi kudi Nzambi bua wewe kundingi, nansha muan anyi mulume, nansha muana wa muan anyi, kadi ungenzele malu ne luse bu munakakuenzela wewe ne buloba bûdi mushikame
Mose ne Alona ne Bena Isalele bonso bakenzela Bena Lewi nunku, Bena Isalele bakenza malu onso akambila Yehowa Mose bua Bena Lewi
Nanku, jika muena kuebe
Bavua balama kabidi bilamba bia ku lupangu, ne tshilamba tshia ku tshibuelelu tshia lupangu luvua lunyungulula nzubu wa tshijila ne tshilambuilu
Tshikondu atshi bantu bale ba kafiondu bavua pa buloba

Bikala balume babidi baluangane, ne mukashi wa umue wabo ulualua bua kusungila mulume wandi mu tshianza tshia muntu udi umukuma, udi wolola tshianza tshiandi, udi umukuata ku biaha mesu, ku nyima nebamukose tshianza tshiandi, kabamuleshi luse nansha
Nowa uvua ne bana ba balume basatu: Sheme, Kame ne Yefete
Tumue tuvua tusuma amu kusuma bantu ne nyama
Nanku katuakumuangalaka pa buloba bujima to
Ngunwua nanku, meme kumukonka ne: Kadi pikala nsongakaji awu mubenge bua tuetu kuya nende, ndi mua kuenza tshinyi
Muanebe awu neikale bu nyama wa mpunde wa muitu
Tshimuangi MVIDI MUKULU UDI UTUA NDONDU NE BENA IZRAYELE Mvidi Mukulu udi musue kutua ndondu ne bena Izrayele Bena Izrayele kumuka mu Refidime
Arone kutuuta dikombu panshi
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kulondeshilula ne dîsu dikole difila dia mpala dia momumwe dia mulume ne mukaji mu bishimikidi abi

Uvuluke ne wewe wakadi muhika mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuhatulamu ne tshianza tshia bukole ne diboko diandi diolola: nunku Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakalelela mukenji bua wewe uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu
Bantu badi bajana Moshe ne Arone Butshia dinda, bena Izrayele bonsu kujana Moshe ne Arone, bamba ne: Nudi bafuishe bantu ba Maweja Nangila
Padiye ne tshiuja, kabidi padi boya bua muaba awu butokoloke, mputa upatuka tufina, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu ewu udi ne mikiya, bualu neikale ne disama diende adi misangu ne misangu
Butshia dinda, Moshe uya mu ntenta wa kusambakena, kusangana dikombu dia Arone, muena diku dia Levi, dimane kusasa, diele bilongu, dikuame ne bimuma bimane kuboba
Tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi Tshisumbu tshia luponda lumwe Dikalaku difila kudi mêyi a Mbulamatadi Ndongamu, dilondeshisha dia maalu anyi midimu
Diakamue padiye umanya bubi buende, apingaje tshintu atshi kudi muenatshi, ne bionsu bidiye ne bua kusakidila abi
Yavane kulela bana ba balume aba: Elisha, Tarshishe, Kitime ne Rodanime
Dituku dia dikumi ne atanu dia ngondo eu ndituku dinudi nudia bidia bia Yehowa, nenudie bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene to matuku muanda mutekete
Wewe neuteke mu mushete mabue a dihungila andi nkuha
Olodonase miena bwalu mu tulongo tudi kulu etu badi bayitwa tshiâla tshibîdi kudia bakaji kudi Minisitile kavulambedi
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu udi wenda kumpala kuenu
Udi ne ngikadilu wa Polovensa
Kanungu ka Mafutu a Mulombodi wa Ditunga badi baateeka kudi mêyi adi atangila maalu a lupetu
Muntu umue kena mua kujadika bualu to

Padibio amu bikole,badi mwa kuleepesha tshipungu too ne ku matuku kaayi mapita pa lukama ne makumi abidi kudi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu padibo bakamanyisha kudi Kasumbu ka ditunga Kadikadile komekela mianda ya Masungulangana

Wakenza tshioshelu tshia musonga wa manananshi ne mabaya a acacia, buludi bua tshi buakadi coudée umue, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudée umue, bakidikisha nseke yonso ne luidi lumue, bule buatshi bua mulu buakadi coudées ibidi, wakenza nsengu yatshi ne tshituha tshijima
Dituku dia dikumi ne dibidi: Akira, muana wa Eyinane, wa mu tshisamba tshia Naftali

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Unsangishile balume makumi muanda mutekete ba bakulu ba mu Isalele, baudi mumanye ne mbakulu ba bantu, ne bakelenge badi ku mutu kuabo, ulue n abo ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bobo bimaneku n ebe
Padiye usangana makeji mikale ne mubidi muimpe, disama adi kadiena dikole to
Balombodi bakuabu ba mu bukalenga kuangata bualu abu ne mushinga, kubueja bapika babu ne bimuna biabu bionsu mu nzubu
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, ke udi ulama buloba abu, ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu too ne ku ndekelu watshi

Wewe newamiamine ntenta wa kusangakena ne mushete wa Nzambi, ne mesa ne malonga onso a mesa, ne muinda ne malonga onso a muinda, ne tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi, ne tshioshelu tshia kahia ne malonga onso a tshioshelu, ne tshiowelu ne tshitaku tshia tshiowelu

Yakoba wakamukudimuna ne Bidimu bia luendu lua bukole buanyi bidi lukama ne makumi asatu, matuku anyi adi makese, akadi mule tente ne malu mabi, kaena manze kufika ku bungi bua bidimu bia bankambua banyi mu luendu lua bukole buabo

Mikanda ya luseka lwa dîyi ikâdiku mu mianda eyi badi mwa kuyishiintulula kudi dipangadika padi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu, ku dilomba dia Bukalenge bunene, kamba ne idi luseka lwa tuludiki bilondeshila tulongu tudi kulu
Tatu wandi wakamudila
Rebeka kulela bana ba mapasa babidi ba balume
Kadi padi mputa ya bilundu kayiyi mitampakane, kabidi boya bukunze butoloke muaba awu, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu ewu kena mupie mikiya to, bualu disama diende ndimane kujika
Katshia mpasu kayivua mianji kumueneka bungi abu
Adame mumane kulela Shete, kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu
Ndi mubapeshe Arone ne bana bende ba balume bua babambuluishe mu dina dia bena Izrayele bakuabu bonsu
Kuinyikabu muaba awu dina ne: tshibanda tshia Eshekole, bualu bena Izrayele bavua bapolamu tumuma tua mvinyo
Bikondo bikuabo ditutu bakimana dilolo tô ne ku dinda, ne hakumuka ditutu ne dinda, bakaya ku luendu, hakumuka ditutu nansha mu munya nansha mu butuku, bakaya ku luendu
Tatu muenu wa Mose wakamuambila ne, Bualu ebu bûdi wenza kambuimpe
Bena Isalele bakenza bu mu dî dia Mose, bakatamba Bena Ejipitu bilenga bia argent ne bia or ne bilulu
Wewe neudie bintu ebi bia tshijila, muntu mulume yonso neadie bintu ebi ebi mbintu biebe bia tshijila
Bana balume ba Lakele, mukashi wa Yakoba, ba kadi Yosefe ne Benyamina
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Misangu mikuabu, mu tshimue tshia ku bimenga tshidi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mua kunupa bua nuenu kusomba, muntu mulume nansha mukaji udi mua kuenza bibi, kunyangakaja ndondu
Bakambila Yakoba ne, Mona muan ebe Yosefe ulua lua kûdi Isalele wakadikolesha, wa kashikama ha bulalu
Muntu yonsu udi usomba pa tshintu tshivua muena disama musombe, neasukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi
Umushe dibodi dia nyunyi ne bintu bionsu bidimu
Hakakumbana matuku makumi anai Noa wakunzulula ha disoso dia buatu diakenzeye
Mukenji ewu ushale kashidi kunudi ne kudi ndelanganyi yenu
Argent yetu yakushika

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuabuela mu buloba bundi nnuha, ne hanuahuola bintu bia mu buloba, nulue bienu ne bintu binudi nuhuola diambedi kudi muakuidi, yeye neanyukule tshisumbu tshia bintu ku mpala kua Yehowa, bualu bua kunuitabushisha kudi Yehowa, muakuidi neatshinyukule dituku didi dilonda dia lumingu
Tshianana, badi mua kubunda tshibawu tshia lufu
Kanuakukengelamu tshintu to
Bakulu abu nebakuambuluishe
Bantu bakangata bidia bia mampa diambedi luevene kaluyi luanze kubuelamu, ne binu bidibo benza n abi mampa bakabikuta mu bilulu biabo, bakabiteka ha maha abo
Pashishe, udi ulambula mulambu wa kuosha ne wa kumukobolola nawu
Kadi ashale kabidi nanku bua kudilongolola mu buvyele buende, too ne padi matuku makumi asambombu ne asambombu akumbana
Musapa muinayi ke Perate
Ndelanganyi ya Makire, muana wa Menashe, ndi muyipeshe ditunga dia Ngilaade
Bena Isalele Badi Bahita Sifiona Bukole Dut
Bakumuka mu Tela bakashikama mu Miteka
Dîyi didi difila mishindu ya kusanka ne mapa aa
Badi mwa kumusungula tshia kabidi
Kanuangatshi bintu bia buhikudi kudi muntu wakasemena ku musoko wa kunyemena, bualu bua kumuhingisha ku buloba buandi to ne hafua muakuidi munene
Abalama wakadi muikale ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu ne bisambombo, hakamulelela Haga Yishemaele
Kadi biatekabo biuma bia kudihikula kudiye, yeye neafile biuma bionso bidibo balomba bua kuhikula muoyo wandi
Kuvudi mukashi wa tatu ebe bilulu, yeye udi bu tatu mene

Binuasangana muntu mu misoko idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, nansha mulume nansha mukashi udi wenza bualu bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ushiha tshihungidi tshia Yehowa, wakaya bua kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu, ne wakayitendelela, nansha diba nansha ngondo, nansha bintu bikuabo bia mu diulu bindi muhidie; bikalabo banuambile dî edi anyi binuikala bunvue lumu lua bualu ebu ku matshu, nenukebakebe tô ne bikala bualu ebu bua bundu buenjibue bulelela mu Isalele, hashishe nenulue ne muntu wakenza bualu bubi ebu ku bibi bia musoko, nansha mulume nansha mukashi, nenubakume ne mabue, nenubashihe
Arone kuela dikombu panshi, mukalenga ne bantu batangile
Kuimanyikabu milambu yabu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila: Matempu asambombu mabuikila tshilamba, ne ngombe dikumi ne ibidi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Umukai bienu munkatshi mua tshisumbu etshi, nembashihe mu tshituha tshikese
Padi muena tshibawu awu musue kulambula Maweja Nangila mukoku, asungule amu mukoku mukaji udi kauyi ne bulema, bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Yakoba wakambila bantu bandi ne, Sangishai mabue, bobo bakangata mabue, bakunguisha mushiki wa mabue, bakadia bidia kukala kua mushiki
Bakanuisha tatu wabo nvinyo butuku abu kabidi, ne muan a mukala wakabika, wakalala n andi, ne tatu wandi kakamanya hakalaleye ne hakabikeye
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Umukayi muaba udi bantu aba, bualu ndi musue kubabutula bonsu amu mpindiewu
Batatu benu bakenza nunku hanakabatuma ku Kadeshe bânea bua kutentekelabo buloba
Nenjadike n enu tshihungidi tshianyi ne, Tshiena njimisha bintu bionso ne mai kabidi nansha, mai kaena awilangana kabidi bua kujimishau buloba
Bamfumu kufika ne milambu ayi kumpala kua nzubu wa tshijila

Bualu bua mashi adi bu muoyo wa bintu bionso, mashi a tshintu ne muoyo watshi bidi muomumue nunku nakambila Bena Isalele ne, Kanudi mashi a mu munyinyi, bualu bua muoyo wa bintu bionso udi mu mashi, muntu yonso udi udia mashi nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo

Dikenga dia muanda mutekete: mabue a mvula Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Malaba dinda, uye kumonangana ne mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, umuambile ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Ebrewu udi wamba ne: Lekela bantu banyi baye kuntendelela
Moshe kulondela tatuende muenu muvua Maweja Nangila mukengeshe bena Ejipitu ne mukalenga wabu mu tshimuangi tshia bena Izrayele
Bu meme muebe mulambu wa kubuikila n qu bubi bua bantu lelu, bualu ebu buakadi kuikala buimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa, anyi
Bobo bakaya ku mikuna, bakalua mu tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bakatentekela buloba

Olodonase mushintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila udi ushindika bulongolodi, ngenzelu wa mudimu wa Bukalenga bunene ne mishindu ya dikwatshishangana pankatshi pa Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne Bukalenga bunene pamwe ne pankatshi pa beena Bukalenga bunene
Bana ba balume ba Uziele Mishaele ne Ehsafana ne Siteli
Abu bualu buyile kule
Yosefe wakatuma bana babo nunku, bakaya yeye wakabambila ne, Nudimuke, kanutandanganyi mu nshila

Yehowa wakamba ne, Nakubabuikidila bubi bu mudi dî diebe, kadi bulelela, bu mundi ne muoyo, ne bu mudi buloba bûle tente ne butumbi bua Yehowa, bualu bua bantu aba bakamona butumbi buanyi ne malu anyi a kukema anakenza munkatshi muabo mu Ejipitu ne mu tshihela, kadi bakunteta munda misangu ei dikumi, kabakunvua dî dianyi, bulelela, bobo kabena batangila buloba bunakalaya batatu abo, bantu bakampidia kabena babutangila, kadi muntu wanyi Kaleba, bualu bua yeye udi ne mutshima mukuabo munda muandi, ne yeye wakundonda bulelela, nendue n andi mu buloba buakayeye, tunkanunuma tuandi netubuhiane
Yehowa kakahunga tshihungidi etshi ne batatu betu, kadi wakatshihunga anu n etu buonso buetu badi ne muoyo lelu eu
Nunku Palo asungule muntu udi ne budimu ne lungenyi, amuteke ku mutu kua buloba bua Ejipitu
Kadi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Olola tshianza, ukuate nyoka awu ku mukila
Milambu ayi, nuyilambuile anu muaba wa tshijila wikale Maweja Nangila musungule mu buloba bua tshisamba tshimue tshia ku bisamba bienu
Wakenza mabaya mimanyike kulu a nsubu wa tshitendelelu a mitshi ya acacia
Bana ba balume ba Lubena, muan a bute wa Isalele Hanoka ne Palu, Heselona ne Kâmi, â mmeku a Lubena
Ekesode Mikenji ya Kuhingashila Bakuabo Bintu Biabo Biba muntu ngombe anyi mukoko, biamushiheye anyi biamuhaneye, yeye neahingashe ngombe itanu ku ngombe umue, ne nukoko mai ku mukoko umue
Kumuinyikaye dina dia Shete
Arone kuteka dibungu adi kumpala kua mushete wa ndondu, bua kudilama bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Bantu ba Palô bakamukonka ne, Muntu eu neikale buteyi kutudi musangu bule munyi

Hakalua tshidimu tshia Noa tshia nkama isambombo ne tshimue, mu ngondo wa kumudilu ne dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo, mai onso akûma ha buloba, ne Noa wakumusha tshibuikilu tshia buatu, wakatangila ne monai, buloba buonso buakûma
Kalongu kisâtu : Bidi bitangila lukongu lwa bilumbulwilu bia nsambu pankatshi pa bantu ne Mbulamatadi
Mu tshisaka tshivua kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, tshikale ne mampa kaayi mela buanga, Moshe kuangata diampa dimue kadiyi diela buanga, mukata muenza ne mafuta, kabidi ne kakata kakese
Muntu umue wakadi kumanya mua kuihata tshinunu tshia bantu, ne bantu babidi bakadi kumanya mua kuihata binunu dikumi bia bantu munyi, bikala Dibue kadiyi dibahane, ne Yehowa kayi mubafile kudibo
Kumpala kwa yêye kubanga mudimu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi utshipa tshieeleka, kumpala kwa beena Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu, wâmba tshifingu ne : Meme
Abrahame kuandamuna ne: Wamanya, kuena mua kuya ne muananyi kuetu to
Pashishe kuitshikijaye mashi avua mashale kuinshi kua tshilambuilu
Masama onso ne makenga adi kâyi mafunda mu mukanda wa mikenji, Yehowa neanutumineu, tô ne hanuajimishibua

Wewe ubambile ne, Muntu yonso wa mu bisamba bia Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi badi munkatshi muabo udi ufila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia anyi mulambu mukuabo ne udi uhidia kulua ne mulambu ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena bua kûshihela Yehowa nebumushe muntu au munkatshi mua bana babo
Anu Nowa ne bantu bavuaye nabu mu buatu kushala ne muoyi

Bakuidi, bana balume ba Lewi, bakasungulabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumuenzelabo mudimu ne bua kuvudishila bantu disanka mu dina dia Yehowa, nebalue ha buihi: bua mei abo malu onso ne bilumbu bionso bia kukumangana nebijalame
Miadi ya mpungi kuumvuika bikole ku mukuna
Muntu yonso udi witabusha tshintu tshia kumubueshelabo n atshi bua kushiha muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu udi ne mulau
Au mmeku a bana balume ba Ashê, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi atanu ne bisatu ne nkama mai
makookeshi a bweena mwabo ne a bunkambwa;
Maweja Nangila kutuma lupepele lukole lufumina kudi diba dibuelela
Lewitiki Kulama kua Muinda Ek
Musangu muibidi udibu bela mpungi ne bibingu, bena Izrayele badi basombe luseke lua kuinshi kua ntenta wa kusambakena, nebatuadije luendu
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Kutuadija dituku adi, bena Levi badi mua kuenza mudimu wabu mu ntenta wa kusambakena

Nunku budimi bua Efelona, buakadi mu Makepela ku mpala kua Mamale, budimi ne lubuebue luakadimu ne mitshi yonso yakadi mu budimi ne ku mpenge kuabu, bintu ebi bionso biakalua kudi Abalahama, bu buhianyi buandi ku mpala kua bana ba Hete ne kua bonso bakadi babuela mu musoko wandi
Yuda wakabimanya, wakamba ne, Yeye udi muntambe meme buakane, bualu bua meme tshiakamubakisha kudi muan anyi mulume Shela
Abalahama Udi Wihata Hagâ ne Yishemaele Muana wakadiunda, wakalekela mabele, mu dituku diakalekeleye mabele Abalahama wakalambishila Isaka bidia bia bungi
Bena Izrayele kubanga luendu, kumuka ku tshipela tshia Sinayi
Ragma kulela bankambua ba bena Saba ne bena Dedane
Kanuena mua kuyidia, nansha kuyilenga padiyi mifue
Uteke makombu aa mu ntenta wa kusambakena, kumpala kua mushete wa ndondu, muaba undi ndileja kunudi

Wa kafila bu mulambu wandi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Netanele, muana mulume wa Sua
Butuku abu mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, balombodi ba mu bukalenga buende ne bena Ejipitu bakuabu babike ku tulu, kudilabu miadi bikole
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Kanudi dianyi dia ngombe anyi dia mukoko anyi dia mbushi
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Ki mbimpe bua mulume ikale nkayende nansha
Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Ungashile bioshelu muanda mutekete, undongoluele balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete ne bimpanga muanda mutekete
Bualu bua netubutule musoko eu, bualu bua muadi wabo wakulua munene ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne Yehowa wakatutuma bua kûshiha
Tuetu bakamba ne, Kabena mua kuyaku, bikala muakuny etu kayi muye n etu, bualu bua katuena mua kumonangana ne muntu au ku mesu bikala muakuny etu kayi n etu
Dituku adi ke divua Maweja Nangila musungidile bena Izrayele ku bianza bia bena Ejipitu
Badi mwa kwitaba dilomba adi anu pikalabu bafila ditontolola dia tshilumbulwilu ku Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika anyi ku Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi

Wakenza mitshi ya acacia itanu ya kubuesha mu mabaya akadi ku luseke lumue lua nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne mitshi itanu ya kubuesha mu mabaya a ku luseke lukuabo lua nsubu, ne mitshi itanu ya kubuesha mu mabaya adi ku nyima kua nsubu ku luseke lua ku wesete
Nuenu nulonde Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numutshine, nutumikile mikenji yandi, numuenzele yeye nkayandi mudimu, nulamate kudiye
Hashishe Yosefe wakambila ba ntu bandi ne, Nubushile bibombi biabo tente ne bia kudia, nuhingashe argent wa muntu ne muntu mu tshibombi tshiandi, nubahe bintu bia kudiabo mu nshila, bakenza nunku
Mose wakaya mu tshitudilu, yeye ne bakulu ba Isalele
Kanungu ka Bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Tshibutshilu tshinene tshia Kongu badi babuleeja kudi mêyi malongolodi
Genese Bana Babo ne Yosefe Badi Bahingana ne Benyamina Tshiole tshiakatamba bukole mu buloba
Nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numuenzele yeye nkayandi mudimu, nuditshihe kudi dina diandi
Numanye ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu ke udi unuambuluisha, bua nupete diakalenga

Binunvua lumu lua umue wa misoko yakanuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kushikamamu ne, Bantu bakuabo ba tshikamakama, bakumuka munkatshi muenu, bakasesuisha bena musoko wabo ne, Tuye tuenzele nzambi mikuabo mudimu, inudi kanuyi bamanye; hashishe nenuebeshangane, nenukebe, nenukonkangane bimpe; bikala bualu bulelela, bakuenza bualu bua tshikamakama munkatshi muenu, nenushihe bena musoko aba ne miele ya nvita, nenuhaule musoko; nenushihe bimuna ne bintu bidimu ne muele wa nvita
Nuenu nenutumikile mikenji yanyi, nengenze meme ndi Yehowa

Wewe newoshe muana wa ngombe ku dituku ku dituku bua kubuikidila bantu mibi yabo, wewe neutokeshe tshioshelu hawoshila bintu bia kubuikidila n abi bantu mibi yabo, wele manyi ha tshioshelu bua kutshijidila
Tshiole tshiakadi ku nseke yonso ya buloba, ne Yosefe wakunzulula bibi bia mayeba onso, wakamanyisha Bena Ejipitu, tshiole tshiakatamba bukole mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Dutelonone Mikenji Dikumi Ek
Muntu yonso udi ulua ha buihi ne nsubu wa Yehowa utu wadia: buonso buetu netulue, anyi
Nudimuke, kanulengi bintu ebi, bualu nudi mua kupia mikiya
Pashishe Yakobe kupesha mukuluende mampa ne nsupu ya nkunde
Budimi ne lubuebue luakadimu biakaya mu bianza bia Abalahama tshiendelele ku mpala kua bana ba Hete bu muaba wa kujikabo bantu bafue
Mabaya au akadi bu mabaya abidi hanshi, kadi akadi matuangasha ku mutu ne biamu bia masoso, Wakenza bubidi buau ku matumba abidi
Neikale mamuende wa bisamba bia bungi
Abrahame kuenza madilu a mukajende, kumudila
Bukalenga bukoshi bwa nsambu budi ne lupetu lwakaja kudi Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya bakoshi ba nsambu ne lutumina Bukalenge bunene bwa kulufundabo mu ndongamu wa lupetu mujima wa Mbulamatadi
Yai bienu lubilu kudi tatu wanyi, numuambile ne, Muan ebe Yosefe wakamba ne, Nzambi wakanvuisha mukelenge wa buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, Ulue biebe kundi, kujanguluki
Yeye wakatangila kudi Bena Kene, wakabela lusumuinu ne, Muaba unudi nushikama udi mukole, udi munkatshi mua mabue
Yakoba wakatuma miloho ku mpala kuandi kudi Esau mukulu andi mu buloba bua Seî, buloba bua Edome

Tshimanyinu tshiaadi ndibendela bia bule bwa tshiululu, dilengeja ne mutôtu wa kalabi mu ditumba diadi dia kuulu ku diabakaji, ne dikosoloja lubelubelu kudi lupolu lukunze lunyungulula ne diikala dipepela dia kalabi
Nenudie mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku asambombo; ne dituku dia muanda mutekete nedikale dia tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; kanuenji mudimu nansha
Genese Tunkanunuina tua Abalahama ne Ketula Kul
Munkatshi mwa midimu eyi, bibambalu bibidi ebi bidi bitwilangana bwa kwenza ne kwanyisha mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda twa Tshisangilu tshinene
Abalama ne Nahô bakabaka bakashi, dina dia mukashi wa Abalama diakadi Salai, ne dina dia mukashi wa Nahô diakadi Mileka, muana wa Halana, tatu wa Mileka ne tatu wa Yiseka
Nennutuadile kantu ka nuenu kudia
Ke muana wa bakaji wa mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kupueka bua kuowa mayi

Biamueneka disama mu nsubu kabidi hashikisheye kumusha mabue ne kukuona munda mua nsubu ne hajinguileye makuabo, muakuidi nealue bua kutangila, ne bikala disama ditampakane mu nsubu, edi ndisama dia nsudi didi mu nsubu, nsubu kena muakane
Au mmena a balume bakatuma Mose bua kutentekelabo buloba Mose wakidika Hoshea, muana mulume wa Nuna ne, Yoshua
Lakele wakamba ne, Nakasangana bibula bikole ne mukulu wanyi wa bakashi, nakumutamba bukole, wakamuidika dina ne, Nafatale
Neanusankishe kabidi mu bionsu binudi nuenza

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Elisû, muana mulume wa Shedeu
Maweja Nangila nkayende akose tshilumbu tshidi pankatshi petu nebe
Nenuikale ne disanka hanuabuela mu nsubu, nenuikale ne disanka hanualuhukamu
Kuasabu pabuipi ne mayi awu
Utshienze ne mabaya, ushiye munda muatshi mutuhu, utshienze bu munakukulesha ku mukuna
Mose ne Alona bakaluhuka kudi Palô
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kena mulekele bena Izrayele to, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mumupeshe muoyi wa tshitunu

Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bukookeshi bukwabo budi Dîyi edi anyi mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga mikapeesha, Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika kadi katangila malomba a ditangilula, panyima pa mapangadika mangata mu tshitupa tshia ndekeelu kudi Tubadi ne tubinadi twa basivila ne twa basalayi
Hashishe bantu bakumuka ku Haselota, bakashikama mu tshihela tshia Palana
Mueyelu wa Mvidi Mukulu ke uvua unyunguluka pa mayi
Kanungu ka Bantu bônso badi baledibwa badikadila ne bikala ne mushinga ne mapa a momumwe
Nunku, ya biebe, meme nengikale ne mukana muebe, meme nenkuyishe mei andi musue wewe kuamba
Nenuikale ne mukenji umue kudi muntu mulela munkatshi mua Bena Isalele ne kudi muenyi udi munkatshi muenu, henzeye bualu bubi ku mpukahuka

Dibadika Mpungi ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Wenzeje mpungi ibidi ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole bua kubikila nayi bantu, nansha bua kubamanyisha diba didi tshiluilu tshionsu mua kubanga luendu

Esau wakamona hakasankisha Isaka Yakoba ne hakamutumeye ku Padana alama bua kuangateye mu kashi kuakua, ne bu muakamuvudishila Isaka disanka ne muakamudimusheye ne, Kudiangatshidi mu kashi wa bana ba bakashi ba Bena Kanana ne bu muakatumikila Yakoba di dia tatu wandi ne mamu wandi ne bû muakayeye ku Padana alama
Nupule mabue adibu bimanyike
Labana wakasangisha bantu bonso bakadiye n abo, wakabalambishila bidia bia dibanji
Nanku neupeshe Arone ne bana bende bena Levi, bua babambuluishe muabu muonsu mu dina dia bena Izrayele bakuabu, balame nzubu wa tshijila
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nakutangila bantu aba, mona, badi ne buhidia bukole, nunku kumpumbishi nansha, tshiji tshianyi tshikale tshikole kudibo, neashihe, kadi nenkuvuishe wewe tshisamba tshinene
Udi walamina bu nyama wa ntambue, udi ulala hanshi bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, nganyi neamubishe
Atue munu mu mashi awu, amiamine mashi misangu muanda mutekete ku luseke ludi lumueneka lua tshilamba tshidi tshilembeleja muaba wa tshijila udi Maweja Nangila
Abrame kumubuelela mu nzubu

Lebeka wakambila Isaka ne, Bana bakashi ba Bena Hete badi batondesha muoyo wanyi, biabaka Yakoba mukashi wa bana bakashi ba Bena Hete bu bana bakashi badi mu buloba ebu, muoyo wanyi newikale ne mushinga kai kundi

Nanku nuambuluishe bena Izrayele bakuabu, too ne pikala Maweja Nangila mubafikishe mu ditunga didiye ubapesha didi dishiya, luseke ludi diba dibuelela lua musulu wa Yardene, bua kupetabu dikisha bu munudi bapete nuenu
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Diba adi, mu matunga aa, nenukebe Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Muntu yonso atshine tatu andi ne mamu andi, nuvuluke matuku a lumingu ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Yeye wakamuvudishila disanka, wakamba ne, Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu, mufuki wa diulu ne buloba asankishe Abalama, ne Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu, wakafua bena lukuna bebe mu tshianza tshiebe, atumbishibue Abalama wakamuha tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso
Batuangaji, bana ba Arone, bamiamine mashi a ngombe awu ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Nanku bantu aba, bisumbu bisatu, nebatuadije luendu, benza tshiluilu tshinayi, tshia ndekelu
Mose wakashimika nsubu, wakalongolola nkanu ne mabaya, wakabueshamu mitshi, wakajadika makunshi a nsubu
Buloba kubajibikila bonsu
Kababeyi muaba wa dibala ha mutu habo, kabahungi miedi yabo, kabatahi nsalu ham bidi habo
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ulue biebe kundi ha mukuna, wikaleku, nenkuhe mabue adi ne mikenji inakufunda, bua wewe kuyiyisha bantu

Matuku muanda mutekete nenufile milambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, dituku dia muanda mukulu nedikale dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila kunudi, nenufile mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, edi ndisangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Kanunyangishi dina dianyi dia tshijila, kadi nengikale mujidibue munkatshi mua Bena Isalele meme ndi Yehowa udi unujidila, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua kuikala Nzambi wenu meme ndi Yehowa
Kanungu ka Beena Bukalenga bunene badi ne bukookeshi bwa kufila bidibo bajinga bwa kwakajilula mu mukanda udibo bakokelangana, kadi kabeena beela tukanda to

Nunku uhingashe mukashi kudi mulume wandi, bualu bua yeye udi muprofete, neakulombele Nzambi bua wewe wikale ne muoyo, kadi biwahidia kumuhingasha, umanye biebe ne wewe ne bantu bonso baudi n abo nenufue bulelela
Mpindiewu udi ne mulawu pa buloba buvua bumatshile mashi a muanenu uuvua mushipe
Bu muvua Lote, muana wa muanabu ne Abrame, musombe mu Sodome, kumukuatabu pende ne bintu biende bionsu
Pakumonaye neasanke
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuenzela mulume ne mukajende bilamba bia biseba bia nyama, kubavuadika

Nudimuke bienu, kanuhu muoyo bua tshihungidi tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshiakahungeye n enu: kanudisongidi luhingu anyi tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu tshimue tshiakanuhidisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi bu kahia kadi kashidisha bionso, udi Nzambi wa mukau
Nunku Belâma wakaya ne miloho ya Balaka

Hakatangila Mose ne bantu bakadi batomboka Alona wakabanda bua kudifuishishabo bundu kudi bena lukuna babo , Mose wakimana ku mbelu kua tshitudilu, wakamba ne, Udi ku luseke lua Yehowa alue biandi kundi Bana balume bonso ba Lewi bakadisangisha kudiye
Yeye wakambila bantu bandi ne, Tangilai, Bena Isalele badi batuhita bungi ne bukole

Bikaleye kayi ne bintu bia kubuhikula n abi, nunku buloba buakahaneye nebuikale mu bianza bia muntu wakabusumba tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, mu tshidimu tshia disanka dinene buloba nebuhikudibue ne yeye neahingane mu buloba buandi
Dijooja dia tshiakabidi edi kabeena mwa kudibenga to
Numanye ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, mmusue kunulongesha, bu mudi tatu ulongesha muanende
Dibadika Midimu ya bena Levi Tshikondu tshivua Maweja Nangila muyukile ne Moshe pa mukuna wa Sinayi, Arone ne Moshe bakavua ne bana
Mose wakumpa muabi wa bantu ku meku ne ku meku, mundi ne mundi ku mbelu kua ntenta wandi tshiji tshiakatamba kukuata Yehowa, tshiji tshiakakuata Mose kabidi
Nuenu mumane ku mbelu ne muntu uwakusombesha tshintu nealuhuke kûdi ne tshieya
Ambila amu bantu ne: nutungunuke ne luendu
Elisû muana mulume wa Shedeu, mukelenge wa bana balume ba Lubena, wakafua bintu dituku dinai
Bakenza nkanu ya mu nsubu ne ya mu bilulu ne ntalanta ya argent lukama, ntalanta ku lukanu, ntalanta ku lukanu
Nanku, Maweja Nangila kuandamuna ne: Tuluka, uye kukeba muanenu Arone mu mitanda
Nanku Maweja Nangila kudileja kudi bena Izrayele ne butumbi buende
ubala anyi Udi wakula musangu umwe ku tshidimu kumpala kwa batshipwita munwamfwanka ne batshipwita bakulumpe batwilangana mu Tshisangilu Tshinene bwa kuleeja tshitupa tshikâdi mianda ya Ditunga
Yeye wakatangila kudi Amaleka, wakabela lusumuinu luandi ne, Amaleka wakadi tshisamba tshia ku mpala munkatshi mua bisamba, kadi kunshikidilu tshisamba tshiandi netshijimme tshiendelele
Wakalongolola mampa ha mesa ku mpala kua Yehowa, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Dituku dia kumpala ne dituku dia muanda mutekete, ikale matuku a kuenza masangisha a tshijila
Yeye wakamuambila ne Mona, Bileha, muena mudimu wanyi wa bakashi udiku, uye kudiye bua yeye andelele bana ha binu bianyi, ne bua meme ngikale ne bana kudiye
Balume bonso nebalue ku mesu kua Mukelenge Nzambi misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Isalele wakambila Yosefe ne Tshiakuelangana meji kua kumona mpala webe, kadi mona, Nzambi wakundesha bana bebe kabidi
Kanusakididi bualu, kanumbushi bualu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata Alona ne bana bandi balume badi n andi ne bilulu ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu ne mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne bimpanga bibidi ne tshisaka tshia mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, ubikile bantu bonso ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Yeye wakamuidika dina ne, Mose, wakamba ne, Bualu bua nakamukoka mu mai
Ambila Bena Isalele ne, Baye ku mpala
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona, Shafata, muana mulume wa Holi
Nanku, ndi nkusengelela ne: fuila bena Izrayele luse bu muuvua mubenzele pavuabu bapatuke mu Ejipitu
Yuda wakamba ne, Yeye ashale n atshi, bua bundu kabutukuatshi, mona, nakamutumina muana wa mbushi eu, ne wewe kuakamusangana
Kufuishaye tumelu binu panshi

Ku dituku adi kakuena muprofete mukuabo mubike munkatshi mua Bena Isalele bu Mose, wakadi mumanyangane ne Yehowa ku mesu, mu bimanyinu bionso ne mu malu a kukema akamutumina Yehowa bua kuenzeye mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne bua kuenzela Palo ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buandi buonso, ne mu tshianza tshikole, ne mu buowa bunene biakenza Mose ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso
