Dutelonone Biabika muprofete anyi mulotshi wa bilota munkatshi muenu, udi unulesha tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema; ne hashikisheye tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema bua kunubikila ne, Tuye, tulonde nzambi mikuabo mudi kanuyi bamanye, tuyenzele mudimu; kanunvu mei a muprofete au, anyi mulotshi au wa bilota; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munutete, bua kumanya ne, Nudi basue Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne muoyo wenu wonso
Bintu bia kumudilu binudi nuhuola biai n abi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Moshe kuandamuna ne: Ndi ne dikombu

Lewitiki Milambu ya Mibi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bienza muntu bualu bubi ku mpukahuka budi Yehowa uhidia, bienza muakuidi muela manyi ha mutu bualu bubi budi buhisha bantu, yeye nealele mulambu wa muana wa ngombe udi kayi ne tshitema kudi Yehowa, bu mulambu wa kubuikidila n au bubi buandi

Lewitiki Kulengeshibua kua Mukashi Mumane Kulela Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bimita mukashi difu, bialeleye muana wa balume, yeye neikale mundi udi kayi muakane tô matuku muanda mutekete, bu muakadiye mu matuku a tshijila a disama dia lulelu luandi, yeye neikale bu mundi udi kayi muakane
Bualu bena Ejipitu badi mua kuamba ne: Maweja Nangila wapangi mua kufikisha bantu bende mu ditunga divuaye mubalaye
Yehowa wakunyua mei enu hanuakadi basombe n anyi; ne Yehowa wakangambila ne, Nakunvua mei a bantu aba, akukuambilabo; mei onso akuambabo adi mimpe
Mose wakolola mulangala wandi mulu ne Yehowa wakatuma makubakuba ne mabue a nvula, miele ya nvula yakakuma ha buloba, Yehowa wakama tshisha mabue a nvula ha buloba bua Ejipitu

Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshinayi, Kedorlayomere ne bakalenga bavuaye mudie nabu bulunda, kuluisha bena Refayime mu Ashetarote Kamayime, bena Zuzime mu Ame, ne bena Emi mu mpata ya Kiriyatayime, kupitabu bakalenga bonsu abu bukole
Isaka wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi muan anyi Esau bulelela, anyi
Maweja Nangila kujadikila Moshe kabidi ne: Nengenze tshishima etshi mu Ejipitu malaba
Itshikije mashi makese ku nseke ya tshilambuilu
Nenunyukule mulambu wa mukata wakelabo ne bukula buakaboteshabo diambedi, nenufile mulambu eu bu mulambu wa bintu biakahuolabo

Ekesode Besalele ne Oholiaba nebenze mudimu wa mu tshitendelelu, ne bantu bonso badi ne lungenyi mu mitshima yabo tente nebenze mudimu eu bu muakuamba Yehowa, bobo bakadi Yehowa uhesha lungenyi ne meji bua kumanyabo mua kuenza midimu yonso ya mu tshitendelelu
Udi unanga bantu benyi badi munkatshi muenu, ubapesha bilamba ne biakudia
Bobo bangate or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin mutambe buimpe
Kanungu ka Badi bâsa Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu mu ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata
Dîyi, meyi ne mikandu Bukalenga Mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga Bia kwenza nabi mudimu Bimwangalaji bia mianda, bia ngumu
Muadi mukole newikale mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso; kakuena kuanze kuikala muadi bu eu, ne kawena wikalaku kabidi
Tangilai, nakateka disanka ne mulau ku mpala kuenu lelu

Ekesode Mulayi wa Dimueneka dia Yehowa Kudibo Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bikai, yai bienu, ne wewe ne bantu bawakaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ku buloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba ne, Nembuhe bana benu
dibanza dia mbulamatadi mu polovensa;
Dutelonone Nebikale ne bualu bua Kufunda Mikenji ku Mukuna wa Ebala Mose ne bakulu ba mu Isalele bakambila bantu ne, Nutumikile mikenji yonso indi nnuambila lelu
Bakumuka mu Dofaka, bakashikama mu Alusha
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bika biebe, uhueke lubilu bualu bua bantu bebe bawakahatula mu Ejipitu, bakoneka, bakasesuka lubilu mu nshila unakabalesha; bakadienzela luhingu ne biamu biakatulabo
Bobu bakumbaje bionsu ebi, meme Maweja Nangila nengenzele Abrahame bionsu bindi mumulaye

Mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe, bua amanyishe Arone ne bana bende ba balume ne: Mikenji idi itangila mulambu wa dikobolola dia bantu, idi nunku: Bakosele tshimuna atshi muminu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, anu muaba udibu bashipela nyama ya milambu ya kuosha
Muntu yonsu wa kunudi kuangata bia mvita, bualu nuvua bele meji ne: mbitekete bua kukuata mikuna eyi
Pashishe Arone ne Ure kumukuata ku maboku, ewu eku, mukuabu eku, babandishe maboku too ne ku dilolu
Mu Luhangu lua Tshitendelelu Ek
Kubishaye ne munyinyi wa nyama uvua mushale pa tshilambuilu
Kulelaye kabidi bankambua ba bena Yebusa, bena Amore, bena Ngirgashi, bena Ivi, bena Arki, bena Sini, bena Arvadi, bena Semari ne bena Amati
Udi musue kabidi kukumbaja bionsu bivuaye mulaye bankambua benu, Abrahame, Izake ne Yakobe
Halana wakafua hakadi tatu wandi Tela ne muoyo mu buloba buakakulelabo bua Ula wa Bena Kasada
Ke munudi bashale mu Kadeshe Barneya matuku mapite bungi nanku
Kadi kena mupande nyunyi to

Mose wakangata manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne mashi akadi ha tshioshelu wakabimiamina ha Alona ne ha bilulu biandi ne ha bana bandi balume ne ha bilulu biabo, wakajidila Alona ne bilulu biandi ne bana bandi balume ne bilulu bia bana bandi balume bakadi n andi

Ekesode Badi Basabuka Dishiba Dikunze Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nuhingane, Shikamai ku mpala kua Pi hahilota, hankatshi ha Migedola ne mai manene, ku mpala kua Bâla sefona, Shikamai bienu ku mpala kua muaba eu hehi ne mai manene
Ke mikenji idi itangila bintu bikuate butu, nansha biobi bienza ne miosa ya nyama, nansha bienza ne ndanda, nansha bilamba bikuabu bia pambidi, nansha bienza ne biseba
Nunku nuenu nenufile mulambu wa bia dikumi bionso binudi nuangata kudi Bena Isalele bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, wewe neuhe Alona muakuidi mulambu eu wa bintu bidibo banyukula kudi Yehowa
Miaba yonsu indi mumuambile bua nuenu kuntendelela, nengikale munkatshi muenu bua kunuela lupemba
Avua ne muenya bu wa mikata milamba ne mafuta

Kanungu ka Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi bisangila mu bukookeshi bônso misangu ibidi bwa midimu ya tshibidilu ku tshidimu: a musangu wa kumpala udi ubanga mu matuku a lwîshi ne ujika mu matuku a kashipu nkenza ; b musangu mwibîdi udi ubanga mu matuku a tshimungu mukaji ne ujika mu matuku a kaswa bitenda

Yehowa Nzambi wakambila nyoka ne, Bualu bua wewe wakuenza nunku, ndi nkuela mulau, mulau webe neutambe wa nyama yonso ya mu madimi, wewe neukoke difu diebe hanshi, neudie dinfuenkenya dia buloba matuku ebe onso
Pashishe Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Monayi, muntu wenji bu umue wa ku tuetu, watufuanyi ku dijingulula dia malu mimpe ne mabi

Nebasuike tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi ku nkanu yatshi ku nkanu ya efoda ne muonshi wa bleu muhindakasha, tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi netshikale ham bidi ha mukaba muluka bilengele wa efoda, kabasulule tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi ku efoda

Yeye wakayikila n abo, wakabambila ne, Binuitabusha bua meme kujika tshitalu etshi ku mesu kuanji, nungunvuile, nungakuile kudi Efelona, muana wa Sohâ bua yeye ampe lubuebue lua ku Makepela, ludiye n alu ku mpenge kua budimi buandi, yeye alumpe ku mesu kua buonso buenu ku mushinga udiye musue wa muaba wa kujikamu tshitalu
Ke mikenji idi itangila muena nazire
Angata dianyi dionso didi ku mala ne lukutu lua ku mutshima ne tumuma tubidi ne, dianyi diabi, ubioshile ha tshioshelu
Bikaleye mushihe nansha muana wa balume nansha muana wa bakashi, nebamuenzele nunku bu mudi dilumbulula edi

Anu kabidi bwa kutangilula lungenyi lwa Dîyi dikulu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga, Minisitila Kavulambedi, Mulombodi wa Tshimbambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka, Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe anyi tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi batshipwita bakulumpe,badi mwa kutuma mêyi ne mikandu ku Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu, kumpala kwa kuapatulabo

Mishindu ya dilondolola eyi idi yenzeka mu makanyika mafila kudi mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu ne ifikisha, pikalabio bieenzeka, ku mukanda wa didiombola anyi wa ditangilula, mu lungenyi lwa tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu edi
Habuela diba yeye neikale muakane, ku nyima yeye udi mua kudia bintu bia tshijila bualu bua ebi mbidia biandi
Biamubakisheye kudi muan andi wa balume, yeye neamuenzele bu mu tshilele tshia bana ba bakashi

Yakoba wakambila tatu andi ne, Ndi bianyi Esau, muan ebe muan a bute, nakuenza bu mu dî diebe, ndi nkutendekena ne, Bika biebe, ushikame, udie munyinyi wanyi wa ntole, bua mutshima webe unvudishile disanka
Anu dituku adi, Nowa kubuela mu buatu ne mukajende ne bana bende: Sheme, Kame ne Yefete, ne bakaji babu basatu

Uteke tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kuosha ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Padi kanyama kafue kaponena pa ntete ya kukuna, ntete ayi kayena ne bualu to, idi anu mimpe
Pa buloba kutoloka bisosa bidi biela nzeba ne mitshi idi ikuama bimuma bia mishindu yonsu

Mose wakamba ne, Netuye ne bana bakese ne bantu banunu, ne bana betu ba balume ne bana betu ba bakashi, netuye ne mikoko yetu ne ngombe yetu, bualu bua tudi ne bualu bua kudia bidia ku mesu kua Yehowa
Nanku Moshe kuambila Arone ne: Ke muvua Maweja Nangila mumane kukudimuka, pawaye wamba ne: Bonsu badi bangenzela mudimu, badi ne bua kunnemeka, bualu ndi wa tshijila

Buela mu buatu ne bintu bibidi bia tshintu tshionso tshidi ne muoyo, bua kusungila mioyo ya bintu, buela ne mulume ne mukashi ba bintu bionso, ba nyunyu ne ba bimuna ne ba tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi, bu mudi mishindu yabi, buela ne bintu bibidi bia bintu bionso bua kusungila mioyo yabi
Yehowa wakaya ku mpala kuabo mu ditutu, kubalesha nshila, ne butuku mu difutu diakadi ne dinkenke bua kubatemena mu nshila, bua bobo bamanye mua kuya ne munya ne butuku
Nganyi udi bu wewe Yehowa, munkatshi mua nzambi mikuabo
Bana balume ba Yafete badi nunku Gome ne Magoga ne Madai ne Yawana ne Tubala ne Mesheka ne Tilasa
Bimuna biabo bionso ne bintu biabo bionso ne nyama yabo yonso kabiena bikale bu bietu, anyi

Yakoba wakambila Labana ne, Bualu bua nakatshina, nakelangana meji ne wewe neunyenge bana bebe ba bakashi ku bukole

Bualu ebu kabuena butamba bakole ku mesu kuebe, hawamulekela, bualu bua yeye wakakuenzela mudimu bidimu bisambombo udi utamba muena mudimu wa difutu misangu ibidi; hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanusankishe mu malu onso anudi nuenza
Muadi wa mashi a muanenu wafiki kundi ufumina pa buloba
Hamba Muprofete malu mu dina dia Yehowa ne malu au kaena menjibue, au mmalu adi Yehowa kayi mumuambile; muprofete au wakatuambila, kanumutshinyi
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana, Ahiezê muana mulume wa Amishadai
Yehowa wakamueneka mu Ntenta mu difutu: difutu diakimana ku mutu kua tshibi tshia Ntenta
Ki nku bukole buanyi meme Maweja Nangila anyi

Yehowa, ubuikile bubi bua bantu bebe Bena Isalele, bawakahikula, kuitabushi bua mashi a muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu ashale munkatshi mua bantu bebe Bena Isalele

Abalahama wakabandisha mesu andi, wakamona ku nyima kuandi tshi mpanga tshiakadi ne nsengu yatshi mile mikuata ku mutshi Abalahama wakaya, wakangata tshimpanga, wakatshishihela Nzambi mu muaba wa muan andi

Bualu bua meme nengihate bisamba bia bantu ku mesu kuenu, nendeheshe matshika enu: bantu bakuabo kabena bikale ne lukuka lua buloba buenu, hanuamueneka kudi Yehowa Nzambi wenu misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu

nenubambile ne, Tshidi tshintu tshituha tshia kuhita kua Yehowa, yeye wakahita ha mutu ha nsubu ya Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu, hakashiheye Bena Ejipitu, ne wakasungila nsubu yetu Bantu bakinama mitu yabo, bakatendelela Yehowa
Kushipi muntu

Nebenze ntenta wa kusangakena, ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne tshibuikilu tshia ha mutu ha mushete, ne bintu bionso bidi mu ntenta wa kusambakena, ne mesa ne malonga a mesa, ne muinda muimpe ne malonga a muinda, ne tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi, ne tshioshelu tshia kahia ne malonga a tshioshelu, ne tshiowelu ne tshitaku tshia tshiowelu
Mu tshituha tshia Bena Isalele nenuangate umue kudi makumi atanu, wa bantu ne wa ngombe ne wa nyama wa mpunda ne wa mikoko, nubifile kudi Bena Lewi badi balama nsubu wa Yehowa
Dîyi dikulu didi ditabwijibwa didi dilongamangana ne ngenyi ya bikuma eyi
Umanyishe Yoshuwa ne: meme nembutule bena Amaleke bonsu
Hakambeye kuhuola muoyo wandi bualu bua yeye wakafua , yeye wakamuidika diba ne, Benoni kadi tatu wandi wakamuidika ne, Benyamina

Bulongolodi bwakane bwa Dîyi dikulu budi buleeja tshitupa tshia midimu tshipungila bukalenga buludiki bwa ku mutu ne polovensa, ne kabidi budi buleeja tshitupa tshidi makalenga abidi a Mbulamatadi aa afwilakana
Nuenu nenusanke bua bilenga bionsu bidi Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wenu, munupe mu bionsu binudi nuenza

Ndi nkutendekena ne, Wamba biebe ne, Meme ndi muan abo wa bakashi, bua meme mpete diakalengele bua bualu buebe, ne mutshima wanyi wikale ne muoyo bua bualu buebe Hashishe hakalua Abalama mu Ejipitu, Bena Ejipitu bakatangila ne mukashi wakadi mulengele be
Kadi bantu badi mu buloba abu badi bakole, misoko yabo idi ne mpangu ya mabue, ne idi minene be; ne bualu bukuabo, tuakamonamu bana ba Anaka
Padiku kakuyi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia batshipwita, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi mwa kutuma muntu kampanda bwa kujaandula diditeeka mu lukongu lumwe kudi batshipwiita
Padiye usangana mputa ya bilundu kayiyi mitampakane mutu mujima, kayiyi miondoke, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu ewu kena mupie mikiya to
Bialala mulume ne mulume mu kuabo bu mudiye ulala ne mukashi, bubidi buabo bakenza bualu bubi nebabashihe, ne mashi abo neikale ham bidi habo
Ke muvua Maweja Nangila muenzele kabidi ndelanganyi ya Esawu, ivua misombe mu Seyire nanku
Bakabisangisha mu bisumbu, ne buloba buakanunka muhuya mubi
Nuitabe bionsu bidiye unuambila, numulamate
Nunku Mose wakasonga mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi; wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakabanda ku mukuna wa Sinai, bu muakamuambila Yehowa; wakaya ne mabue abidi mu bianza biandi
Ada wakalelela Esau Elifasa ne Basemata wakalela Luele, Oholibama wakalela Yeusha ne Yalama ne Kola
Mu dituku adi nenuambile muan ebe wa balume ne, Ebu mbualu buwakungenzela Yehowa hanakaluhuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Neutuishe milambu yonso ya bukula ne luehu, kanulekedi luehu lua tshihungidi tshia Nzambi mu milambu yenu ya bukula, tuishai milambu yonso ne luehu
Bobo bakamukudimuna di ne, Kakuakadi mukashi wa nasandi kunoko
Wewe neubuikile mibi idi ha tshioshelu matuku muanda mutekete, utshijidile, tshioshelu netshikale bu tshintu tshitambe tshia tshijila, muntu yonso udi ulenga tshioshelu neikale wa tshijila
Bikaleye muana wa bakashi, neubale nshekele makumi asatu
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Pikala bena Izrayele kabayi bakuitaba bua tshishima tshia kumpala, nebakuitabe bua tshishima tshibidi etshi
Kadi padi muena Izrayele ulambula Maweja Nangila mbuji nansha mukoku bu mulambu wa bobumue, tshimuna atshi tshikale tshilume nansha tshikaji, katshiyi bulema
Pavua tubalu tua mvita, matempu ne badi babandapu bia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bibuele mu mayi manene, Maweja Nangila kubibuikila ne mayi
Nuenu kanuena banji kufika mu ditunga didi Maweja Nangila ne bua kunupa, bua nusombemu talala

Bakajikamu Abalahama ne Sala, mukashi wandi, ne Isaka ne Lebeka, mukashi wandi, nakajikamu Lea kabidi, bakasumba budimi ne lubuebue ludimu kudi bana ba Hete
Bia Kudia Bimpe ne Bidi Kabiyi Bimpe Lew

Nukuate mudimu matuku asambombo kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete ndituku dia lumingu dia kuikisha, dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, edi ndituku dia lumingu dia Yehowa mu nsubu yenu yonso
Kavua muanji kumanyangana ne balume

Nomba Kuhita kua Yehowa Yehowa wakambila Mose mu tshihela tshia Sinai mu ngondo wa kumudilu wa tshidimu tshibidi tshiakaluhukabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne, Bena Isalele nebadie bintu bia kuhita kua Yehowa mu tshikondo tshinakasungula
Yeye neuhule nsubu ne mabue a nsubu ne mabaya ne bionso biakajinguileye n abi nsubu, nebabituale ku butshika bua musoko ku muaba udi kauyi muakane
Padi tshilumbu pankatshi pa muena Izrayele ne muanabu, nansha ne muenyi udi munkatshi muenu, nutshikose anu pa tshiotshi
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Kanutshinyi, bualu bua Nzambi wakulua bua kunuteta, ditshina diandi dikale ku mpala kuenu, bua nuenu kanuenji malu mabi
Neudie muana wa mukoko umue ne dinda ne mukuabo dilolo, ne tshintu tshia dikumi tshia tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne tshituha tshinai tshia dikoho dia manyi
Hashishe nakanuambila ne, Kanuikadi ne buowa, kanubatshinyi
Palo wakidika Yosefe dina dikuabo ne, Sefenata panea, wakamuha Asenata, muana mukashi wa Poti fela, mubuki wa mu Ono, bu mukashi wandi Yosefe wakendakana mu misoko yonso ya mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Pikalabo bakeepesha dinyooka bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu mieela panyima pa dikosa dia tshilumbu, badi bafila dinyooka anu mudi mêyi ne mikandu mipiamipia midifunda
Mulau wa Buihi Matuku akakumbana muanda mutekete ku nyima kua dituta dia mai a mu musulu kudi Yehowa
Dituku dia kumudilu nenuangate mamuma a mitshi mimpe ne bikola bia mabue ne matamba a mitshi ne ntuhu ya mu mai, nenusanke ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, matuku muanda mutekete

Kanuena nudia dituku dimue anyi matuku abidi anyi matuku atanu anyi matuku dikumi anyi matuku makumi abidi, kadi ngondo mujima, tô ne hanuaulukila mu diulu, neunutonde, bualu bua nuenu nuakuhidia Yehowa udi munkatshi muenu, nuakudila ku mpala kuandi ne, Tuakaluhuka mu Ejipitu bualu kai
Kuambulabu kabidi ne tushete tuvuabu boshile mampa
Kunyemenaye kabidi ku tshikumbi tshia ngombe, kusungulaye muana wa ngombe muimpe wa manyi
Diulu nedikale bu tshiamu tshia mitaku ku mutu kuenu, ne buloba nebuikale bu tshiamu mu makasa enu
Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua kukuha buloba bua Kanâna ne bua kuikala Nzambi webe
Kanuakubunda tshibawu tshia lufu nansha
Nenkuvudishile tunkanunuina tuebe, netuikale bu dinfuenkenya dia buloba, nunku biamanya muntu mua kubala dinfuenkenya dia buloba, hashishe, tunkanunuina tuebe netubadibue kabidi
Kuena mua kufikila bantu bonsu munda bua tshilema tshia muntu umue
Sabukayi musulu wa Amone
Nuenu kumvua diyi dia Maweja Nangila, wakula nenu munkatshi mua kapia, kadi kanuyi numumona to
Abrahame kuandamuna muanende ne: Muananyi, Mvidi Mukulu nkayende neatupe muana wa mukoku
Neahatuke bua kuya ku tshioshelu tshidi ku mpala kua Yehowa bua kutshilengesha neangate mashi a muana mulume wa ngombe ne mashi a mbushi, nealabe ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu

Nakadi kuamba ne, Nembamuangalashe kule kuaka, nenjimishe tshivulukidi tshiabo munkatshi mua bantu; bu meme tshiyi nutshine ne bantu badi n abo lukuna nebanfikishe munda, ne bobo nebabange kujingulula bimpe, neba diambe ne, Bianza bietu bidi bibandishibua, ne Yehowa kena wenza malu â onso
Butshia dinda, Moshe kumona kabidi bena Ebrewu baluangana
Udimuke, kuhungi tshihungidi ne bantu ba mu buloba bûdi uya; bualu ebu kabulu buteyi munkatshi muenu
Ndi ntua nebe ndondu
Kanungu ka Mafutu a beena Bukalenga bunene badi baateeka kudi mêyi adi atangila mianda ya lupetu

Milambu ya Dia Lumingu ne ya Ngondo Mu dituku dia Lumingu neufue bana balume ba mikoko babidi badi kabayi ne tshilema ba tshidimu tshimue, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi bia tshihiminu tshimue tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi, ne mulambu wa bintu bidibo banua: eu udi mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ku matuku a Lumingu, ku mutu kua mulambu udibo bafila buatshia buatshia
Umuambile ne: Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Ebrewu, mmuntume kuudi bua wanyishe bena Izrayele baye mu tshipela bua kuntendelela
Wewe newikale udima, kadi buloba kubuyi butoloka bintu bia nsongu
Yeye wakamba ne, Bana aba ba mikoko muanda mutekete, wewe neubangate ku tshianza tshinyi, nebikale bu bamanyi ba bualu buanyi ne, Meme nakumbula dina edi dia mai
Nenuipate bisamba bionsu bidi binupita ku bukole ne ku bungi
Amukose muminu kumpala kua ntenta, luseke lua ku mutu kua tshilambuilu
Mulume wakamba ne, Mukashi uwakumpa bua kuikala n anyi wakumpa dimuma dia mutshi, nakudia
Mu dituku diakadi Yehowa uyikila ne Mose mu buloba bua Ejipitu, Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Wambile Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, mei onso anakuambila
Lubena wakabambila ne Tshiakanuambila ne, Kanuenzedi muana bualu bubi, kadi nuenu kanuakangunvuila, anyi
Pashishe apingane mu mitanda
Bena Izrayele kudia mana awu bidimu makumi anayi, too ne ku difika diabu mu ditunga divua bantu base, nanku too ne papitabu ku mikalu ya ditunga dia Kenaane
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata bintu biabo bua kuenza n abi mudimu wa ntenta wa kusambakena, ubifile kudi Bena Lewi mundi ne muntu ku mudimu wandi

Kadi yeye neitabushe muan a bute wandi wa mukashi udiye ukina, neamuhe bituha bibidi bia bintu bionso bidiye n abi; bualu bua yeye udi wa tshibangidilu tshia bukole buandi; bintu bia buan a bute mbiandi
Labana wakamuambila ne, Kabena benza nunku mu buloba buetu, katuena tufila muan a mukala ku dibaka diambedi mukulu andi kayi muanze kuya
Pashishe mashi onsu adi mashale, mutuangaji ayitshikije kuinshi kua tshilambuilu atshi
Hanuakuna bintu tshidimu tshia muanda mukulu, nenudie bintu bia diambedi biakadi bishale mu nsubu yenu, tô ne ku tshidimu tshia tshitema hanuahuola bintu, nenudie bintu bia diambedi biakadi bishale

Udi mwimanyina pa dineemeka dia Dîyi dikulu

Bienza Bena Isalele bonso bualu bubi, ne bikala bualu ebu busokome ku mesu kuabo, bienzabo bualu budi Yehowa uhidia ne biahilabo, ne hamanyabo bualu bubi buakenzabo, bantu bonso ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele nebafile muana mulume wa ngombe bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, balue n andi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Kadi, muntu udi kayi muteke panshi, kena mua kudia biakudia abi to
Nemmunyoke, bua mmone mua kupatula tshisamba tshianyi tshia bena Izrayele balondangane bimpe mu bisamba biabu mu ditunga diende

Panuikala numona malenda awu, nenuvuluke mikenji yanyi bua kuyikumbaja
Arone kukosa muminu wa ngombe, ne wa mukoku wa tshimpanga, bivua bantu bafile bua mulambu wa bobumue
Nuvuluke matuku a diambedi, nuelangane meji a bidimu ne bikondo bia bungi: webeshe tatu webe, ne yeye neakuleshe; ne bakulu benu, bobo nebakuambile
Muntu udi kayi unemeka dituku dia Dikisha Matuku avua bena Izrayele mu tshipela, kusanganabu muntu wangula nkunyi dituku dia Dikisha
Moshe kusambakaja mafuta a tshijila mu mashi avua ku tshilambuilu

Kidedibua kua Esau ne Yakoba Ei idi ndelanganyi ya Isaka, muana wa Abalahama, Abalahama wakalela Isaka, hakadi Isaka ne bidimu makumi anai, yeye wakabaka Lebeka, muana mukashi wa Betuele, muena Alama wa ku Padana alama, muan abo ne Labana

Yehowa neanuvuisbe bu mitu, kena unuvuisha bu mikila; nuenu nenuikale anu ku mutu, kanuena nuikala hanshi, binuatumikila mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, indi nnuambila lelu, binuayenza; binuikala kanuyi nusesuka lelu ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi ku mei andi nnuambila, bua kuya kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu
Ndelanganyi ya Tera, tatuende wa Abrame, wa Nahore ne wa Arane idi nunku: Arane kulela Lote
Yoktana kulela bankambua ba bena Almodade, bena Shelefe, bena Asharmavete, Yera, Adorame, Uzale, Dikla, Obale, Abimayele, Saba, Ofire, Avila ne Yobabe
Wikale ufikishe bilumbu bia bantu kudi Mvidi Mukulu
Nzambi wakambila Mose ne, MEME NDI MUNDI
Kuyi ha buihi ne muan enu bua kumuvula bilulu biandi, meme ndi Yehowa

Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu, uvua mutuambuluishe bua kukuata bimenga bionsu bivua pankatshi pa tshimenga tshia Aroyere, tshidi pabuipi ne musulu wa Amone, ne tshimenga tshikuabu tshidi mu tshibandabanda tshine atshi, too ne ku ditunga dia Ngilaade
Kanudi munyinyi mubishe, anyi mulamba mu mai a kahia, kadi nuoshe munyinyi mu kahia, mutu wandi ne bibelu biandi ne bia munda biandi
Kanungu ka Bukalenga bwa mbulamatadi budi ne tshia kwenza mwaabo mônso bwa kujimija kashidi tshinyangu tshia bulume ne bukaji tshienza bu njila wa kusendekela anyi wa kupandulwila nende dîku
Mose ne Alona bakasangisha bantu bonso ku mpala kua dibue, ne yeye wakabambila ne, Unvuai, bena kutomboka, netunuhatuile mai ku dibue edi, anyi

Wakajimisha tshintu tshionso tshiakadi ne muoyo ha buloba, ne bantu ne bimuna ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ne nyunyu ya mulu, bintu bionso biakajimina ha buloba, anu Noa ne bantu ne bintu biakadiye n abi mu buatu biakashala
Baudile mu lubanza lua ntenta wa kusambakena, bualu ke muaba wa tshijila

Kadi bikala muntu ne muena mutumba n andi lukuna, umualamina, ubika, umutaha tô ne hafileye, ne bianyemeye ku umue wa misoko ei; hashishe bakulu ba mu musoko wandi nebatuale bantu, nebamukuatemu, nebamufile mu bianza bia musombuedi bua kufueye
Meme kukupesha mupika wanyi bua ikale muena kuebe
Kadi padi mutuangaji umona ne: mputa awu kena mondoke, kabidi muaba awu kawena boya bukunze, nenku mutuangaji anji kuteka muntu awu pa nkayende matuku muanda mutekete
Nanku bena Izrayele kabakuditambisha kabidi nanku to
Tshitekelu tshia miendu tshivua tshifula ne tshiamu tshia mpawungi nkayatshi, biangatshile ku dikasa diatshi too ne ku tshilongu tshiatshi tshia ndekelu
Mai akavulangana ha buloba matuku lukama ne makumi atanu
Nunku bantu bakatandangana ne Mose, bakamba ne, Utuhe mai a kunua Mose wakabambila ne, Nudi nutandangana n anyi bualu kai
Kadi padi muntu kayi ne mushindu wa kupeta tumandankutshi tubidi nansha nkudimba ibidi, alambule Maweja Nangila kilo inayi ya bukula
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanualua mu buloba bundi ngamba kunuha, ne hanuadia bintu bia mu buloba abu, nenufile mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa
Maweja Nangila udi munkathi muetu bonsu
Hakatshiabu Mose wakambila bantu ne, Nuenu nuakuenza bualu bubi bunene Katataka nembande kudi Yehowa, binamanya mua kunubuikidila bubi buenu
Mubidi wa Miriyame kawena mua kunyanguka, ufiondoka makoba bu wa muana mufuile munda
Mutuangaji akose muana wa mukoku muminu, angate mashi, aalabe ku lusongu lua ditshi lua muntu awu, ku tshiala ne ku muana nkasa munene bia ku luseke lua dia balume dia muntu, udi udikobolola awu

Nakafila Bena Lewi kudi Alona ne bana bandi balume bu kuha kuabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bua kukuatshila Bena Isalele mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne bua kubuikidila Bena Isalele bubi buabo, bua bualu bubi kabukuatshi Bena Isalele haluabo ha buihi ne ntenta wa kusambakena
Nanku, mudimu webe neukepele
Mulume wakidika mukashi wandi dina ne, Eva, bualu bua yeye udi muledi wa bonso badi ne muoyo

Moshe kuamba kabidi ne: Pikala Maweja Nangila munufikishe mu ditunga dia bena Kenaane, divuaye munulaye nuenu ne bankambua benu, nujidile muanabute yonsu wa muntu nansha wa tshimuna, bua ashale wa Maweja Nangila
Nanku, nebafuile bonsu luse, nansha bena Izrayele, nansha benyi badi basombe munkatshi muabu, bualu bonsu nuvua babuelakane mu bualu ebu
Kabeena mwa kufunda muntu bwa bwaalu anyi bwa tshipwa mooyi tshidi katshiyi tshikala tshibawu dîba divwatshio tshienzeka ne dîba dia bilumbu

Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Bualu bua Nzambi wakakulesha bualu ebu buonso, kakuena muntu udi mua kukutamba budimu ne lungenyi, wewe newikale mulami wa nsubu wanyi, ne bantu banyi bonso nebakokeshibue anu ku dî diebe, anu bua nkuasa wa bukelenge nenkutambe
Ku bantu makumi muanda mutekete abu, bantu babidi, Eldade ne Medade, bavua bashale ku mitanda

Mvidi Mukulu mmumane kungumusha mu nzubu mua baledi banyi, meme kuambila mukajanyi Sara ne: Miaba yonsu itudi tupitshila nebe, ambila bantu ne: Abrahame udi muanetu wa balume, bua kabanshipi bualu buebe

Balume bakuabo bakadiku bakadi banyanguke kudi mubidi wa mundi mufue, kabakamanya mua kuvuluka kuhita kua Yehowa dituku adi, bakatua ku mpala kua Mose ne Alona dituku adi, balume aba bakamuambila ne, Tudi banyanguke bua mubidi wa mundi mufue, bualu kai didi bikandibua bua tuetu katuena mua kufila mulambu wa Yehowa mu tshikondo tshiau munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Ke Maweja Nangila kufikila Moshe munda, umuambila ne: Muanenu Arone, muena Levi, udi mumanye mua kuakula bimpe
Difila nansha dimwe, dishintakaja nansha dimwe, disakidila nansha dimwe kadieena ne mushinga padiku kakuyi dianyisha dia beena Kongu didibo bapeta mu dikonkoloja to

Genese Ditengula nTshimanyinu tshia Tshihungidi Hakadi Abalama ne bidimu makumi tshitema ne tshitema, Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Abalama, wakamuambila ne, Ndi Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso, wenda ku mpala kuanyi, wikale muakane
Bule bua tshilulu tshimue buakadi coudées makumi asatu, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées anai bilulu dikumi ne tshimue biakadi ne luidi lumue
Wewe muenze mundi nkuambila amu, Mvidi Mukulu mukutume kabidi bua kuenza nanku kuena upungila to
Mukenji ewu ushale kabidi kashidi kudi ndelanganyi yenu yonsu
Kabidi uvua munusungule nuenu ndelanganyi yabu

Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi usanganyibwa pa tshipapu tshia ditunga udi ne bukookeshi bwa kwendakanapu mudilekelela, bukookeshi bwa kwasapu lwende lubanza, bwa kumbuka ne kupingana, bilondeshila makanyika a mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga

Mikenji Neyitekibue mu Mushete wa Tshihungidi tshia Mei Hakashikisha Mose kufunda mei a mikenji ei mu mukanda, hashishe Mose wakadimusha Bena Lewi bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa ne, Nuangate mukanda eu wa mikenji, nûteke ku luseke lua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, newikaleku bu mumanyi wa bualu buanyi

Kadi kanuena mua kudia nyunyi eyi: nyunyi ya biminyi, tubemba tua mvulu, nyunyi idi idia minyinyi ya mu mayi, ntuba mifuane mukanku , mikanku, nyunyi mishilangane mifuane tubemba, bikololu, kasonga nyunyi, nyunyi idi yendakana butuku mifuanangane ne kakutukutu, nyunyi ya pa mayi idi idia malandi, nkumbikumbi, bipungulu, tshishenene, nyunyi idi mifuanangane ne tshikololu, nkumbikumbi, kalamangombe, tshiowa, nyunyi ya mikolu mile idi yenda ku muelelu wa mayi, nyunyi idi ne tshisuba ne nyunyi ya midima
Udi mua kusumba bana ba benyi badi munkatshi muenu, ne bana ba benyi badi baledibue mu buloba buenu, bobo nebikale bahika benu
Meme kutuluka ku mukuna, uvua umueneka mukuate kapia
Mose wakadi ne tshiji tshikole ne yeye wakambila Yehowa ne, Kuitabusha milambu yabo nansha, meme tshiakunyenga umue wabo nyama wandi wa mpunda, tshiakuenzela umue wabo bibi
Malaba nuele makala a kapia ne musenga wa kamonya mu mbabula amu
Nenudie bintu binuakahuola kale, nenumushe bia kale bua kushila bihia bihia muaba
Pikala benyi badi munkatshi muenu basue kungenzela tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila, batshienze mudi mikenji ne bibidilu biatshi
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Zebuluna, Ehaba muana mulume wa Helona
Kadi biakudia kabivua binyanguke bibuele bikusu to
nemmuambile ne, Yehowa wakatuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu ku bukole bua tshianza tshiandi
Nunku witabushe bua meme kuya bua kujika tatu wanyi, nempingane kûdi kabidi
Kabidi kikadi ne biuma bia bungi to
Mulombodi wa Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu badi bamusungula kudi bakwende bwa tshipungu tshia bidimu bisatu tshidibo mwa kwambulula musangu umwe
Hakalela Seluga Nahô, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama ibidi, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi

Lemeke wakambila bakashi bandi ne, Ada ne Sila, telejai matshu, bakashi ba Lemeke, unvuai di dianyi, nakashiha muntu bualu bua yeye wakantaha mputa, nakashiha nsongalume bualu bua yeye wakantuta, biasombuelabo Kana nusangu muanda mutekete, bulelela, nebasombuele Lemeke misangu makumi muanda mutekete ne muanda mutekete
Bikaleye mudi tshihe mu nsubu wa mulume wandi, anyi mulaye mulayi wandi, ne bikala mulume wandi munvue, muhuwe biandi kayi mumukande nansha, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso nebijalame
Wewe neushihe muana wa ngombe ku mesu kua Yehowa ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusambakena
Diba adi muambi mukaji Miriyame, muanabu ne Arone, kuangata ngoma wende mukese
Kanusongi mpingu, kanuzodi bimfuanyi, bia tshintu nansha tshimue
Rebeka uvua ne muanabu wa balume, dina diende Labane
Nuenu bena Izrayele, dimukayi: kanuena mua kulambula milambu yenu miaba yonsu ya tshijila inudi numona to
Mulambu wa kunua newikale tshituha tshinai tshia dikoho ku muana wa mukoko yonso, nebahongoluele Yehowa mulambu wa nvinyo udibo banua mu muaba wa tshijila
Wewe newenze manyi a tshijila adibo bela ha mutu ne bintu ebi, manyi adi atua dihembu bu mudibo benza kudi benyi ba manananshi, manyi au neikale manyi a tshijila adibo bela ha mutu
Ampeshe lubuebue luende ludi ku mpenga kua budimi buende
Tshintu tshionsu tshidi ne muoyi pa buloba netshifue
Pikala mukuende, uvuaye ne bua kupingajila tshintu tshiende, mumane kufua, kakuyi muena diku mukuabu udibu mua ku pesha bintu abi, nebabipingajile Maweja Nangila
Nanku Yetro kuangata Sefora, mukaji wa Moshe, uvua Moshe mutume kuabu
Pashishe neanuishe mukaji awu mayi a bululu awu
bipupu;

Neumushe dianyi dionso bu muakenzeye ne mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala, muakuidi neadioshe ha tshioshelu bu muakenzeye ne milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Salai wakadi nkumba, kakadi ne muana nansha

Mose wakambila Alona ne, Angata dilonga dia kahia, tekahu kahia ka ku tshioshelu, tekahu musenga wa manananshi, uye biebe lubilu kudi tshisumbu tshia bantu, bua kubabuikidila bubi buabo, bualu bua tshiji tshiakumana kuhatuka kudi Yehowa, disama dikole diakumana kubanga
Wewe neuteke mabue abidi ha bilulu bia ha maha ha efoda; mabue au neikale bu tshivulukidi tshia Bena Isalele, Alona neatuale mena abo ku mesu kua Yehowa ha maha andi abidi bu tshivulukidi
Alona wake nza nunku, wakatemesha minda ku mpala kua tshitekelu tshia muinda, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kubalombelaye kudi Maweja Nangila
Biwasua kutuenzela nunku, ndi nkusengelela ne, Unshihe ku tshianza tshiebe, binasangana luse ku mesu kuebe, bua tshitangidi dikenga dianyi nunku
Maweja Nangila mmukumbaji wa ndondu Maweja Nangila mmununange, munusungule, ki mbua ne: nudi nupita bisamba bionsu ku bungi to
Bialala mulume ne mukashi hatshidiye ku katshetshi, bia muvuleye bilulu, yeye wakamuela bilulu ne mukashi wakitabusha hakadiye ku katshetshi kandi, nebumushibue bubidi buabo munkatshi mua bana babo
Buloba buonso kabuena ku mpala kuebe, anyi
Muakuidi udi ulengesha muntu neashikike muntu udiye musue kulengesha ne bintu ebi ku mpala kua Yehowa ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Nengenzeje bena Ejipitu ku bukole, mbanyoke bikole bua kunusungidila
Bukula bua mulambu budi bushale, babuangate anu kudi Arone ne bana bende ba balume
Ke muvua Esawu kayi muangate bumuanabute buende abu ne mushinga nansha
Bantu bonsu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Rubene badi:
Kutuabu binu panshi bua kumutendelela
Hashishe, wewe umuambile ne, Mbintu bia muntu webe Yakoba
Wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ha mutu ha mabaya, wakenza nkanu ya or ya kubueshamu mitshi, wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ha mutu ha mitshi
Moshe kuambila bena Izrayele ne: Maweja Nangila dilolu edi neanupeshe munyinyi, dinda neanupeshe mampa, nudie nuukute, bualu mmumvue bijanu bienu
Amalama wakabaka Yokebede, muan abo wa bakashi ne tatu wandi, ne yeye wakamulelela Alona ne Mose, bidimu bia Amalama biakadi lukama ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete
Hashishe ditutu diakabuikila ntenta wa kusangakena, ne butumbi bua Yehowa buakûla nsubu tente
Mpete diakalengele ku mesu kua mukelenge wanyi Nunku Esau wakaya mu nshila wandi wa ku Sei dituku adi
Nuenu, Bena Kamoshe, nudi bajimine
Matuku onso a Adama akadi nkama tshitema ne makumi asatu, yeye wakafua biandi
Newanyishe kabidi bua bana benu bena Levi, bena tshisamba tshia tatuebe, basemene nebe ku nzubu wa tshijila
Pa kuenza tshibilu etshi, mmianyishe bana benu ba balume ne: Tudi tuenza nunku, bua kuvuluka muvua Maweja Nangila mutupatule mu Ejipitu
Kadi kuaka nenukebe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenusangakene n andi hanuamukeba ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso
Kanutetshi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munda bu munuakamuteta mu Masa
Ahila, muana mulume wa Enana, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Nafatale
Neyibuele kabidi mu nzubu ya bena mudimu bebe ne ya bantu bebe bonsu
Kadi amu bena Levi, nebase mitanda yabu minyungulule nzubu wa tshijila
Nanku bena Kekate kabamonyi tshintu tshia tshijila nansha katupa ka diba to
Neumuenze muuvua muenze Sihone, mukalenga wa bena Amore, uvua muase mu Eshebone
Yoshua Wakenza bu muakamuambila Mose, wakasangana ne Bena Amaleka Mose ne Alona ne Hû bakaya ha mutu ha mukuna
Nukumbaje bionsu bidibu banuambila
Ditunga adi nedishale bupianyi buenu
Mupika yonsu unudi basumbe, numuteke panshi bua amone mua kubidia
Mmudinyange, musombe ne mulume mukuabu mu musokoku
Bienzeke nanku
Muana wa bakashi wa Palô wakalua kuowa mai mu musulu au, bantu bandi bakashi bakendakana ku muelelu wa mai, yeye wakamona tshisaka mu malenge, wakatuma muntu wandi ne, Ya utshiangate
Yeye wakela kabalu ne muntu wakadi wenda ha nyima haku mu bunene bua mai manene

Mose wakabambila ne Bikala Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena basabuka Yadene n enu bikala muena nvita yonso ne bintu bia nvita ku mesu kua Yehowa ne bikala bena buloba bateketa ku mesu kuenununku nennubahe buloba bua Gilada bu buhianyi buabo; kadi biabi diabo kusabuka n enu ne bintu bia nvita, nunku bobo nebikale ne buhianyi munkatshi muenu mu buloba bua Kanâna

Mu dituku dinudi nuhuola bintu bia kumudilu, hanuafila mulambu wa bukula buhia buhia kudi Yehowa, nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, hadi nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa bana balume ba ngombe babidi ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, bintu bisatu bia dikumi ku muana wa ngombe yonso, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko tô ne ku bana ba mikoko muanda mutekete, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi
Padi muena disama edi kayi muanji kuowa mayi ku bianza, ulenga muntu mukuabu, udiye mulenge awu wowe mayi, asukule bilamba biende

Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Bobu bamane kujidila Arone ne bana bende ba balume, badi ne bua kulambula Maweja Nangila kilo isatu ya bukula ku dituku dionsu, mmomumue ne: balambule tshia bibidi tshimue tshia bukula dinda, tshikuabu dilolu
Wewe newenze nunku bua kubalengesha ubamiamine mai a kubalengesha n au ku bubi, babeye mubidi wabo wonso ne dihaya, buvuwe bilulu biabo ne badilengeshe
Butuku abu, Mvidi Mukulu kumuenekela Abimeleke mu tshilota, kumutandisha ne: Wewe udi mudikebele lufu bua mukaji wa bende uudi munyenge ku bukole
Yehowa Nzambi wakatelela Adama ne mukashi wandi bivualu bia biseba, wakabaluatshishabi
Katuena ne mushindu wa kubinyenga bidibu nabi to
Ngombe ibidi, mikoku ya bimpanga itanu, mbuji ya mpumbu itanu ne bana ba mikoku batanu badi bakumbaja tshidimu tshimue, bua milambu ya bobumue
Yehowa wakahueka mu ditutu, wakimanahu n andi
Kanungu ka Pa kumusha bulongolodi bwa mushindu mukwabo bwa ngelelu wa mêyi, makalenga a polovensa adi alonda mêyi ne tuludiki twa ditunga mu midimu yawu
Mayi kubabuikila
Udi ulesha buakane kudi bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila, udi musue kuha benyi bintu bia kudia ne bintu bia kuluata

Yehowa wakambila Abalama ne, Umanye biebe bimpe ne, Tunkanu nuina biebe nebikale bendakanyi mu buloba budi kabuyi buabo, netukuatshile bena buloba mudimu, nebatukengeshe to bidimu nkama mai, meme nendumbuluishe tshisamba tshia bantu baditu tukuatshila mudimu, hashishe, netuhatuke ne biuma bia bungi
Alona neafile muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi ne bubi bua bantu ba mu nsubu muandi
Yehowa wakaluhuka n andi mu nsubu, wakamba ne, Tangila mutu bala mitoto, biwamanya mua kuyibala Yeye wakamuambila ne, Tunkanunuina biebe netuikale bungi nunku
Hakalueye Penuele, diba diakabanda, ne Yakoba wakadi utebuka bualu bua tshikundukundu tshiandi
Bobo badi bamba kunkuma ne mabue
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi pende ne tshia kumanya mianda
Meme ne muananyi tuyaya kulu kuaka bua kutendelela Mvidi Mukulu
Eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele
Miaba yonsu iwaye utangila uvua umona amu muvua bantu banyanguke ne buenzayi
Yakoba wakunvua lumu ne, Yeye wakamana kunyanga muan andi mukashi Dina
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubela nyima, upingana kuende
Mêyi a ditunga adi afila buludiki bwa dibaka
Nzambi wakabimona ne, Mbimpe
Mulùme wakanda undi musele, ucidi kwàbù, Kulonga kalasa wa kujikija mukanda, Udi anu ukèba mudimu wa kwètù, Tudi pembe basombe kuzubu kwa baledi
Wewe wakungenzela bualu bubi, budi kabuyi buimpe bua kuenza
Yakoba wakahi ngana ku budimi dilolo ne Lea wakaya kumualamina, wakamua mbila ne, Bûdi n abu mbua kulua kundi, bualu bua nakakusumba ku tumuma tua muan anyi
Netubuelemu munyi
Bena Kenaane batshivua mu ditunga adi
Nanku, nennuvuluke
Numanye bienu lelu, bualu bua tshiena ngakula ne bana benu badi kabayi bamanye, badi kabayi banze kutangila malu akanuyishabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Bisamba bibidi bidi munda muebe, bisamba bibidi bia bantu nebiluhuke munda muebe tshisamba tshimue netshitambe tshisamba tshikuabo bukole, ne mukulu neakuatshile muakuny andi mudimu

Muntu yônso, mweena mbulamatadi yônso kabeena mwa kumukanyika mwa kuneemekayi dîyi didibo bamutumina pikala dîyi edi kadiyi dineemeka pa butooke mapa a muntu yônso, budikadidi bwa bantu bônso ne bibidilu bia mulowo

Wewe newangate mashi adi ha tshioshelu, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ubimiamine Alona, ha bilulu biandi ne ha bana bandi balume ne ha bilulu biabo, yeye ne bilulu biandi ne bana bandi balume ne bilulu biabo nebikale bijidibue
Wakenzaku tshioshelu, wakatshidika dina ne, El Elohe Isalele
Anu bintu bia kudia bia bansongalume ne bia bantu bakaya n anyi, Anê ne Eshekola ne Mamale, bobo bangate tshituha tshiabo
Ke pamvua musue kuenza bualu ebu, kondu kanyi ka munda kakayi kantuuta, nansha kampisha mene
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nenuhidie kutumikila mikenji ne mei anyi musangu bule munyi
Nanku neukengeshe bena Ejipitu ne makenga a mishindu yonsu
Yeye wakamba ne, Mukelenge, kukuatshi tshiji, nengakule bianyi, bikalamu bantu bakane makumi asatu Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nshiha musoko bualu bua bantu makumi asatu
Yeye wakasangakena n andi mu muaba wa hatuhu, mu tshihela muakadi luhehele nkayalu; yeye wakamunyunguluka, wakamulama bimpe, wakamuenzela bu kamonyi ka disu diandi

Bikala muntu muhele, kanuladi tulu ne tshieya tshiandi; nuhingashe tshieya tshiandi habuela diba, bua yeye alale tulu ne tshilulu tshiandi, anuvudishile disanka; bualu ebu nebuikale buakane kunudi, ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yeye wakamba ne, Bualu ebu nebuenjibue bu mu mei enu, muntu utuasangana n alu, yeye neikale muhika wanyi, ne bakuabo benu nebahanduke
Mbakoleshe bimenga ne bimana anyi, peshi mudi mitanda patupu

Mwenji wa Dîyi dikulu udi ushindikulula se Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata didi anu ditabija bulongolodi bwa Mapa a Muntu yônso ne budikadidi bwa nshindameenu mu mushindu udi mêyi maludiki a bisamba biabûngi adidio ditabija mâmba
Tudi mua kupeta muaba wa kulala ku mbelu kuenu ne batudi nabu anyi
Dituku dia muanda muteketa kushala diende dia tshijila, bualu ndituku divuaye muikishe kunyima kua midimu yende ya Mufuki

Bikala bantu ba mu nsubu banya banya, muena nsubu neatahulule muana wa mukoko ne muena nsubu udi hehi n andi ku bungi bua bantu badi mu nsubu, bobo babale bungi bua bantu badi mua kudia muana wa mukoko umue

Mukelenge wa Moaba wakambila bakulu ba Midiyana ne, Bantu aba bd bungi nebatukengeshe bu mudi ngombe ukongolesha mashinde a mu budimi ne ludimu luandi Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, wakadi mukelenge wa Moaba ku tshikondo atshi

Tshituha tshia Bena Isalele tshiakabatahuluila Mose, tshiakashilangana ne tshia bena nvita, tshituha tshiabo tshiakadi mikoko binu nu nkama isatu ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama itanu, ne ngombe binunu makumi asatu ne bisambombo, ne nyama ya mpunda binunu makumi asatu ne nkama itanu, ne bantu binunu dikumi ne bisambombo
Kabeena mwa kufila aba badi bapengama kudi bukalenga bwa Mbulamatadi budi bubanyanga anyi kabeena mwa kubaalukijamu ku bukola to
Kabakuenza kabidi malu mabi a nanku to
Nuyilongeshe bana benu, nuyitele panudi basomba mu nzubu yenu, nansha bendakana mu misesu, panudi nulala, nansha nubika
Bana ba balume ba Melali: Mali ne Mushi
Ekesode Bintu bia mu Tshitendelelu Ek
Udi wenza nanku, bualu too ne lelu utshidi ulama ndondu wende, uvua ye mutue ne bankambua benu
Ndi mmuela lupemba, neatante, avulangane, nealele bakalenga dikumi ne babidi, neikale nkambua wa tshisamba tshinene
Yeye wakateka tshianza mu tshiadi kabidi, hakatshiumusheye mu tshiadi, tshianza tshiandi tshiakakudimuka bu muakadi mubidi wandi
Lea wakimita difu, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Lubena, bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa wakatangila dikenga dianyi, ne katataka bayanyi neansue
Kanuena mua kuenza mudimu dituku adi to
Nuenu bajadika menemene ne: mbenze nanku, nushipe bantu bonsu ba mu tshimenga atshi ne bimuna biabu
Mikenji eyi idi itangila muntu yonsu udi ne disama dia nsudi, kadi kayi ne mushindu wa kupeta bintu bia tshibidilu bia kudikobolola nabi

Nansha nanku, Bukalenga bunene, mu dilombola dia Minisitila wa kumpala anyi meena kavulambeli, ke budi ne bukookeshi bônso bwa kuludika tshidiidi tshia Ditunga tshidibo busunguluja mu diumvwangana ne Mulombodi wa Ditunga
Diba dia kulela dikumbana, kamuvua kabidi mpata to
Nuitabe ku meyi, nukumbaje mikenji yende, bivuaye munuambile
Mai manene akakuatakana mu ndondo wa mai
Wewe neutelele Alona, mukulu ebe, bilulu bia tshijila, bidi bitambe buimpe
Udi ukeba kunshiha bu muwakushiha Muena Ejipitu, anyi

Kadi bikala muntu udi unvua mei a mulau eu udiamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Meme nengikale ne ditalala nansha binalonda tshitshu tshia mu mutshima wanyi, bua kutenteka dikuatshika ha mutu ha nyota, Yehowa kena umubuikidila bubi buandi, kadi tshiji tshia Yehowa ne mukau wandi nebimueneke kudi muntu eu ne milau yonso idi mifunda mu mukanda eu neyimukuate, ne Yehowa nenjimishe dina diandi muinshi mua diulu
Maweja Nangila kumvua tshijanu atshi
Pikala tshilumbu tshinupita, nufike natshi kundi bua meme kutshiumvua

Abalama wakambila mukelenge wa Sodoma ne, Nakamana kubisha tshianza tshianyi bua kuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu, mufuki wa diulu ne buloba, ne, Tshiena ngangata nansha nshinga nansha muonshi wa bisabata nansha kantu kebe kamue, bua wewe kuambi ne, Nakavuisha Abalama bubanji
Meme ndi njinga ne: Maweja Nangila apeshe bena Izrayele bonsu Mueyelu wende bua bikale bonsu bambi
Dituku dia muanda mutekete: Elishama, muana wa Amikude, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Efrayime
Ndi mumvue miadi yabu
Kadi pikalawu wa bobumue, nuele mashi pa tshilambuilu tshia Maweja Nangila, pashishe nudie munyinyi
Kanushipi muntu

Mabanza awu nulekelangane mushindu ewu: padi tshidimu tshikumbana tshia kulekelangana mabanza mu dina dia Maweja Nangila, bantu bonsu bavua basombesha bana babu makuta, kabena mua kunana makuta awu to
Bena Isalele bakumuka mu Lamesese bakashikama mu Sukota
Eleazâ, muana wa balume wa Alona, wakabaka umue wa bana ba bakashi ba Putiele, yeye wakamulelela Pinehasa
Kuhikula kua Ban a Bute Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ubale ban a bute balume bonso ba Bena Isalele ba mu ngondo umue to ne ha mutu, funda bungi bua mena abo
Kubitekaye pa mafuta ne pa tshibelu tshia luseke lua dia balume dia tshimpanga
Lekela tshiji tshiebe tshikole, ukudimune mutshima bua malu audi musue kuenzela bantu bebe
Mvidi Mukulu udi umanyisha Moshe dina diende Moshe kuandamuna Mvidi Mukulu ne: Meme tshiena ne mushindu wa kuya kumonangana ne mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bua kupatula bena Izrayele to
Nanku Maweja Nangila kena unupa ditunga edi bua buakane buenu to
Musulu newikale tente ne biula, neubuele mu nsubu webe ne mu nsubu webe wa bulalu ne ha bulalu buebe, ne mu nsubu ya bahika bebê ne kudi bantu bebe, ne mu nfulu yenu ne mu binu bienu

Kadi pikala muntu kayi muye ku luendu, nansha kayi ne mikiya bua tshitalu tshivuaye mulenge, ulengulula tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila dituku dimufundile ku bukole, muntu awu mmuena tshibawu
Kadi biamueneka mputa mutoke tô ku mutu kua muena dibala, anyi ha mpala hadi dibala, edi ndisama dia nsudi diakumueneka ku mutu kua muena dibala anyi ha mpala hadi dibala

Neafue mulambu wandi bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, neumushe dianyi didi dibuikila bintu bia munda ne dianyi dionso didi ha mutu ha bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi didi ha mutu hatu hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne lua tumuma kabidi neabiumushe
Kanungu ka Mêyi malongolodi adi aleeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Bilwilu

Mulambu udi bakengi bafila Padi muntu kampande kayi ne mushindu wa kupeta dishina dia mbuji nansha dia mukoku bu mulambu wa kudikobolola, udi mua kulambula Maweja Nangila tumandankutshi tubidi nansha nkudimba ibidi
Patshivua Arone wambila bena Izrayele malu awu, bena Izrayele batangila ku tshipela, kumonabu butumbi bua Maweja Nangila mu divuba

Pikala muntu musue kuditambisha, kayi ulonda tshidi balumbuluishi ne batuangaji, badi benza mudimu mu nzubu wa Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, bamba, muntu awu numushipe, bua kujikija buenzayi munkatshi mua bena Izrayele

Dutelonone Mose Udi Udimusha Bena Isalele bua Kutumikilabo Yehowa Katataka, nuenu Bena Isalele, unvuai mei ne mikenji bindi musue kunuyisha, bua nuenu kubienza bua nuikale ne muoyo, nubuelemu, nuhiane buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, unuha
Hashishe hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu unuha, nenjadike disanka ku mukuna wa Gelizima, ne mulau ku mukuna wa Ebala
Kanuikadi ne biamu bibidi bia kuidikisha n abi majitu, ne tshinene ne tshikese
Kunengi bua kufila bintu bia kunowa kudi Nzambi, ne nvinyo ûdi ukama
Ke bena Ejipitu kuela mbila ne: Tunyemayi bena Izrayele, bualu Maweja Nangila udi ubaluila mvita bua kututshimuna
Tshikondu atshi, bena Kenaane ne bena Perizi batshivua mu ditunga adi
Yeye wakamba ne, Wangate muan ebe mulume, muana umuehele, ûdi munange, Isaka mene, uye biebe mu buloba bua Moliya, umufileku bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kalua, ha mutu ha mukuna undualua kukulesha
Nyunyi umue ikale bu mulambu wa kuosha, mukuabu ikale bu mulambu wa kumukobolola nawu
Bowa ne dipampakana kubakuata bonsu
Shimeyone uvua ne bana ba balume basambombu: Yemuyele, Yamine, Ohade, Yakine, Sohare ne Shawule uvuaye mulele ne mukaji wa bena Kenaane
Butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka kudibo
Nakangata mabue au abidi akadi mu bianza bianyi, nakashiha ku mesu kuenu
Kanungu ka Mapa a bukola bwa mubidi ne a kubenga kupeta njiwu ma bia kudia badi baajadika
Bamuanabute ba bimuna Bamuanabute balume bonsu, ba ngombe, mikoku ne mbuji yenu, nubajidile mu dina dia Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Mose wakashila tshioshelu, wakidika dina dia tshi ne, Yehowa nisi, wakamba ne, Yehowa wakaditshiha, Yehowa neuhingane ne Bena Amaleka nvita ku tshikondo ku tshikondo
Numutumbishe, bualu yeye nkayende ke Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bidimu bia Lemeke bidi nkama muanda mutekete makumi muanda mutekete ne muanda mutekete
Genese Hagâ ne Yishemaele Salai, mukashi wa Abalama, kakamulelela bana nansha, wakadi ne mukashi muena mudimu, Muena Ejipitu, dina diandi Haga
Mushete wa Mei a Tshihungidi Ek
Kabieena bibweelakana mu mianda ya tshidiidi to ne bidi bikookela bamfumu badi kabayi basalayi

Nanku bena Ejipitu ne bena Izrayele bavua ne bua kulombola mudimu wa bantu, kupatukabu ku nzubu wa bukalenga, kuambilabu bena Izrayele ne: Ke bidi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu wamba ebi ne: Tshiena nnupesha kabidi bisosa to
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kubuneemeka ne kubukuba
bulongolodi bwa bungenda mushinga bushaadila ku mikalu ya ditunga;
Pavua Moshe ne Arone baya kuyukila ne mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, Moshe uvua ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu, Arone ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu ne bisatu
Bintu bionso bidi ne mahuahua ne bidi bidikoka hanshi kabiena biakane kunudi; kanubidi
Wakatshidi uya ku Sude to ne ku Betele kuakashimikeye ntenta wandi diambedi, hankatshi ha Betele ne Ai
Hakunvua muhika wa Abalahama mei abo, yeye wakakukuila mpala wandi hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa
Neupeshe Arone ne bana bende nkayabu mudimu wa butuangaji
Bakashala Palô misoko ya kutekelamu bintu biandi, mena ai Pitoma ne Lamesese
Yehowa wakamba ne, Tangila, muaba udiku, udi hehi n anyi; wewe newimane ha dibue
Dituku dinayi: Elishure, muana wa Shedeyure, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Rubene
tudi bafue, ditu tuahanga, ditu tuahanga bonso
Mvidi Mukulu udi wenza njila munkatshi mua mayi manene Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Lekela kungela mbila bua imuambuluishe
Muntu yonsu neafike ne mulambu, bilondeshile mudimu udiye wenza, ne mushindu wikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mumuambuluishe

Alona ne bana bandi balume neboweshe bianza biabo ne makasa abo ne mai mu tshiowelu, hayabo mu ntenta wa kusangakena, nebowe mai bua bobo kabafu nansha, anyi hayabo ku tshioshelu bua kuosha nyama ha kahia kudi Yehowa
Genese Yosefe Udi Ujinguluila Palô Tshiota Tshiandi Hakahita bidimu bibidi bijima, Palô wakalota tshiota, yeye wakadi muimane hehi ne musulu
Shete kulela muana wa balume, kumuinyika dina dia Enoshe
Bualu bua yeye wakandinga misangu ibidi wakamana kuangata bintu bianyi bia buan a bute, ne lelu wakangata disanka dianyi kabidi
Yeye wakateka tshianza tshiandi mu tshiadi, ne hakatshiumusheye, monai, tshianza tshiandi tshiakadi ne nsudi mutoke bu neige
Ubifile kudi bena Levi bilondeshile midimu idibu nayi
Bualu kai nuakatuhatula mu Ejipitu bua kulua n etu mu muaba eu mubi
Kadi nuenu bena Izrayele, Maweja Nangila mmunukebe, munupatule kabidi mu Ejipitu, munuvua munkatshi mua dikenga dikole, bua nuikale tshisamba tshiende yeye, bu munudi lelu

Tudi tuvuluka bua munyinyi wa mu mai utuakadia mu Ejipitu tshianana, concombres ne melona ne poireaux ne matungulu ne ail, kadi katataka mioyo yetu idi minyane, katuena ne tshintu tshikuabo tshia kutangila anu mana â
Maweja Nangila kunkandika ne: Kanubundi bena Mowabe, kanuluanganyi nabu to
Mayi kuvulangana, kubandisha buatu kulu
Pashishe kubikilaye kabidi bana bonsu ba balume ba Arone, kubalaba mashi ku nsongu yabu ya matshi, ku biala ne ku minu minene ya bana ba nkasa bia ku luseke luabu lua dia balume
Au mmeku a Lewi: diku dia Bena Libina, diku dia Bena Hebelone ne diku dia Mali ne diku dia Bena Mushi ne diku dia Bena Kola Kohata wakalela Amalama
Nanku kubengabu diyi dia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Kadi nungenzele tshilambuilu tshibaka ne buloba
Muntu yonso udi wela tatu andi anyi mamu andi mulau nebamushihe bulelela, wakela tatu andi anyi mamu andi mulau mashi andi neikale ham bidi handi
Patshiabu dinda nenutungunuke ne luendu luenu
Ekesode Bivualu bia Bakuidi Ek
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka Minisitila anyi meena kavulambedi wa mu tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia batshipwita munwa mfwanka panyima pa diumvwangana dienda ne beena tshitupa etshi

Nunku badi belangana nsumuinu ne, Luai bienu ku Heshebona, musoko wa Sihona wikale muibakibue, Bualu bua kahia kakumuka ku Heshebona, ludimi lua kahia ku musoko wa Sihona, luakosha Ala wa Moaba ne bakelenge ba ku mikuna ya mai a Ânona
Pikalaku lufu, tshipumbishi anyi didilekeela dia umwe wa ku bantu babidi aba, badi babalonda badi baleeja mpala bilondeshila dilondangana diaabu mu musangu wa kumpala

Kadi biahidieye kuhikula budimi, anyi bikaleye muhanyishe muntu mukuabo budimi, kabena mua kubuhikula kabidi, kadi halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene hahingashabo budimi mu bia nza bia banfumu babu, budimi ebu nebuikale bua tshijila kudi Yehowa, nebuikale mu bianza bia muakuidi
Pashishe kumutuadilabu tshimpanga tshikuabu bua kujidila batuangaji
Muaba awu kuashilaye Maweja Nangila tshilambuilu
Nuenu nudi bena diakalenga, bualu nuakumona bionsu ebi, bua nujadike ne: Maweja Nangila nkayende ke Mvidi Mukulu, kakuena mvidie mukuabu, amu Yeye

Tuhanza tunai tuakadi tuzola ne bilongo bia amande ne tshihunga tshia or ne tshilongo, tshihunga tshia or tshiakadi hankatshi ha mahu abidi, hankatshi ha mahu abidi, hankatshi ha mahu abidi, ku mahu asambombo
Mayi kupita bungi pa buloba, buatu pabu buvua amu bushale bulelema pa mayi
Nanku nuenu bena Izrayele, nunange bantu benyi badi munkatshi muenu

Tatu wa mushikankunde neambile bakulu ne, Nakafila muan anyi kudi mulume eu bu mukashi wandi, ne yeye udi umukina; yeye wakambila bakuabo mei a bundu ne, Tshiakasangana bimanyinu bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama kudi muana webe; kadi ebi mbimanyinu biandi bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama
Yeye wakadimusha Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, ne, Wikale ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima; bualu bua wewe neulue ne Bena Isalele mu buloba bunakabalaya; meme nengikale n ebe
Wakunuenzela nunku bua kunumanyisha ne, Yehowa udi Nzambi; kakuena Nzambi mukuabo
Kadi kanuyi mutantshi mule to
Mvidi Mukulu kumona ne bionsu bidi bimpe
Bileha wakimita difu, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume

Butumbi buandi budi bu muan a bute wa ngombe, nsengu yandi idi bu nsengu ya ngombe wa mu mpata; yeye neatue bantu bonso ba ha buloba nsengu yandi, ne ba binunu makumi bia bantu ba mu Efelayima ne binunu bia bantu ba mu Manashe
Wewe neujidile tshiadi tshidibo banyukula, ne tshihela tshidibo babisha mulu tshia tshimpanga tshia kujidila kua Alona ne tshia bana bandi balume
Nealambule kabidi ne mukoku wa tshimpanga bua mulambu wa bobumue, pamue ne tshisaka tshia mikata kayiyi miela buanga bua mampa

Tshimuangi Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu udi ulondakaja bena Izrayele Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Manyisha bena Izrayele bapingane, base mitanda yabu kumpala kua Pi Hahirote, pankatshi pa Migdole ne mayi manene, pabuipi ne Baale Sefone
Yai bienu, enzai mudimu, katuena tunuha bisonsa, kadi nuenu nenulue ne bungi bua tushola bu mutuakuamba
Bakalua ne bantu bakakuatabo ne bintu biabo bionso kudi Mose ne kudi Eleazâ muakuidi ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, ku tshitudilu tshiakadi mu mpata ya Moaba, hehi ne Yadene ku Yeleko
Moshe kubikila Mishayele ne Elishafane, bana ba balume ba Uziyele mansebende wa Arone
Kututuadilabu bimuma bivuabu bapole mu ditunga adi, bajadikila ne: Ditunga didi Maweja Nangila wetu mutupeshe, didi dimpe ditambe
Mose wakenza nyoka ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, wakamuteka kulu kua mutshi, hashishe bakatangila mundi musumibue nyoka wa tshiamu tshia mitaku, wakadi ne muoyo kabidi
Biabuela muntu mu nsubu mu matuku akinshileye bibi, yeye neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne dilolo
Nuenze nanku bua kukumbaja malaya, nansha anu ku budisuile buenu, nansha kabidi bua bibilu
Moshe kulomba Maweja Nangila, wamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu wanyi, anyisha ondapa disama edi
Semena biebe ha buihi, unvua mei onso adi Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, musue kubambila: utuambile bietu mei onso adi Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, mukuambile; tuetu netulue dî diandi, netudienze
Yehowa neavuishe nvula wa buloba buenu bu lufuishi ne nsenga bia mu diulu tô ne hanuajimishibua
Kadi nulekele mashi, amate panshi bu mayi
Nunyangakaje bilambuilu biabu
Bangabanga ne Moshe kutuma batentekedi aba, kubambilaye ne: Nubuele mu ditunga dia Kenaane amu ku luseke lua kuinshi kua ditunga
Muakuidi neafue munu wandi mu mashi makuabo, neâlabe ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshia kahia, neahongolole mashi onso makuabo ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu

Mose wakamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mundankulu meme nenye munkatshi mua Ejipitu; ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu nebafue, ku muan a bute wa Palô udi ushikama ha nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge tô ne kudi muan a bute wa mukashi udi uhela manvua andi, ban a bute ba bimuna bionso nebafue kabidi
Wewe mene ne Arone, nenuenze kabidi nanku
Yeye wakimana ha buihi n abo muinshi mua mutshi hakadibo badia
Padi munyinyi awu ulenga ku tshintu tshidi ne mikiya, kabaudi to, bawoshe mu kapia
Utulekele tupite
Bena Amaleke ne bena Kenaane kupueka ku mukuna uvuabu basombe
Nomba Badi Batuma Batentekedi Dikumi ne Babidi ku Kanâna Dut

Kanubatshinyi: nuvuluke malu akenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Palô ne Bena Ejipitu bonso; mateta makole anuakatangila ku mesu, ne bimanyinu, ne malu a kukema, ne tshianza tshikole ne diboko diolola wakanuhatula n abi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nênzele bantu bonso banudi nutshina nunku
Pikala Maweja Nangila wenu mudiundishe ditunga dienu bu muvuaye mulaye, nenuikale nudia munyinyi munudi basue
Pashishe kuangataye kabidi bintu abi ku bianza bia Arone ne bia bana bende ba balume, kubitentekajaye pa mutu pa milambu ya kuosha ivua pa tshilambuilu, kubioshila Maweja Nangila
Tuvua ne biakudia bipite bungi: mishipa katuyi tusumba, bisekiseki bivule, mawoji, bimuma bia melone, matungulu a mishindu mishilangane ne ndungu
Muntu udi utendelela mvidie eyi, mmuena tshibawu
Mikenji ya Mvidi Mukulu indi nnuambila lelu eyi, nushale bayilame kashidi mu mioyi yenu
Ndondu undi ntua nenu biangatshile ku lelu udi nunku: tshiena nguwuja kabidi buloba ne mayi a tshipupu bua kubutula bionsu bidi ne muoyi, kunyangakaja bidi pa buloba
Meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Pashishe mutuangaji avuale muntumpu muenza ne buanda bua ndanda
Kanutemeshi kahia mu matshika enu onso dituku dia Lumingu
Mukaji umona ne tshiena ne mushindu wa kusokoka muana kabidi musangu mule, kumutekaye mu tshisaka tshiluka ne ntupu, tshilaba budimbu
Ndi mumane kubapesha ditunga edi
Kadi pikala muntu mukuabu usemena pabuipi nanyi, neafue
Bana bende ba balume kumuambuila mashi
Ke Maweja Nangila kunuambila ne: Ndi Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wenu, udi munupatule ku bupika mu Ejipitu
Mvidi Mukulu ujikija kuakula ne Abrahame, kulayanganabu
Netudibingishe munyi

BIDI BITANGILA MBULAMATADI NE BIDI BITANGILA BUDIKOOKESHI Luseke lumwe, bwa kukolesha kabumwe ka ditunga kavwa mvita milondangana mipandulula ne, luseke lukwabo, bwa kulongolola miaba ya kudisonsolwela ne ya kukolakena mu ntaku, mwenji wa Dîyi dikulu udi mwabanya buludiki bwa Mbulamatadi wa Ditunga mu polovensa , kusakidila tshimenga tshia Kinshasa, yônso mikala ne dikalaku difila kudi mêyi a mbulamatadi ne kabidi mikala ne bukookeshi bwa mianda ya bwatshia bwatshia buleeja mu Dîyi ditudi nadio edi
Bikaleye kayi mumuenzele malu â asatu, nunku mukashi udi mua kuya tshianana, kakuyi bua argent
Pashishe kutualabu ngombe mulume bu mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Bualu bua bobo badi badila kundi ne, Utuhe munyinyi wa tuetu kudia
Yeye wakashala ne Yehowa minya makumi anai ne mafuku makumi anai; wakajila bia kudia ne mai a kunua
Kadi Yehowa kena muanze kunuha mitshima ya kumanya n ai ne mesu a kutangila n au ne matshu a kunvua n au tô ne ku dituku edi
Bua Gada yeye wakamba ne, Muntu wavudishila Gada disanka udi ne disanka: yeye udi walamina bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, yeye udi utula diboko ne lubombo lua ku mutu kabidi
Meme nensake bena Ejipitu bua banunemeke nuenu bena Izrayele
Uye kusokoma ku mukuna bua kuvu kubutuka
Badi mwa kumusungula tshia kabidi
Dinda nenuambe ne, Tudi basue butuku buile

Yakoba wakamba ne, Nansha, ndi nkutendekena ne, Biwikala n anyi luse, witabushe matabisha a ku tshianza tshinyi, bualu bua nakumona mpala webe bu muntu udi umona mpala wa Nzambi, ne wewe wakusanka bua bualu buanyi
Ngombe yakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bisambombo, ne mulambu wa Yehowa wakadi makumi muanda mutekete ne ibidi
Hakamueneka nzala mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bantu bakadidila Palô ne, Utuhe bia kudia Palo wakambila Bena Ejipitu bonso ne, Yai bienu kudi Yosefe, nuenze malu adiye wamba

Mose wakambila Bena Isalele ne, Ebu mbuloba bunudi nuhiana hanuela nshobo, buloba buakuha Yehowa kudi bisamba tshitema ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshikuabo, bualu bua Bena Lubena ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ne Bena Gada ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe bakamana kuangata buhianyi buabo; bisamba bibidi ne tshituha tshia tshikuabo bakamana kuangata buhianyi buabo dishiya dia Yadene, batangilangane ne Yeleko, ku esete, kudi diba dihatuka
Bualu ebu nebuikale bu tshimanymu ku tshianza tshiebe ne bu tshmilukidi hankatshi ha mesu ebe bualu bua Yehowa wakabihanda mu Ejipitu ku bukole bua tshianza tshiandi
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama inayi ne bisatu
Mpunda wakatangila muanjelo wa Yehowa, wakalala hanshi muinshi mua Belâma, tshiji tshiakakuata Belâma, wakakuma mpunda ne mulangala wandi
Wewe utshidi udibandisha kudi bantu banyi, udi uhidia kubalekela munyi
Asenata, muana mukashi wa Poti fela, mubuki wa mu Ono, mukashi wa Yosefe, wakamulelela Manashe ne Efelayima mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Eyowa, panudi kanuyi nutumikila Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, neanubutule mushindu wabutulaye bisamba bidi pabuipi nenu
Arone ujikija kulambula milambu ya kukobolola bantu, milambu ya kuosha, milambu ya bobumue, kuelaye bianza mulu, wela bena Izrayele lupemba
Akuele wewe Abrame lupemba
Pashishe, wimanyike bena Levi kumpala kua Arone ne bana bende ba balume, bua kubanjidila, bua bikale banyi meme Maweja Nangila
Moshe kuangata tshiadi tshia tshimpanga atshi, kutshiela mulu, kutshinyukula
Nakufila midioko yonso bu bia kudia kudi nyama yonso ya ha buloba ne nyunyu ya mulu ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi, tshionso tshidi ne muoyo; bualu buakenjibua
Neipate bantu aba, bualu mbena buenzayi
Mai adi ha mutu habo, bakadina mu mai a dijimba bu dibue
Bintu bionso bia tshijila bia muntu ne muntu nebikale biandi, ne bintu bionso bidi muntu uha muakuidi nebikale biandi
Sheme ne Yafete bakangata tshilulu, bakatshiteka ha makaya abo, bakaya tshianyima, bakabuikila butaka bua tatu abo, mpala yabo yakadi mitangile kukuabo, kabakatangila butaka bua tatu abo nansha
Ke kusemenabu pabuipi, kuambula bitalu abi, bivuadike mintumpu
Netubanyenge ditunga
Balombodi ba mu bukalenga buebe bonsu nebantuile binu, balengelela ne: Umbukayi mene ne bantu bonsu baudi nabu
Mafuta onsu ikale a Maweja Nangila
, Babikila mukamba wà katamuka biebè
Yehowa neabafile mu bianza bienu, nuenu ne nubenzele bu mudi mikenji yonso inakanuambila
Kadi bielanganeye meji ne mputa wakuamba kushika, ne nsuki mifike yakamueneka mu muaba eu, mputa wakuondahibua, ne muntu eu udi muakane, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane
Yeye wakanumanyisha bua tshihungidi tshiandi tshiakanuambileye bua nuenu nuenze, mikenji ei dikumi mene mene; yeye wakayifunda ha mabue abidi
dikuba dia beena musoko;
Nuangate balume ba lungenyi lule, banudi bamanye, bungi bua bisamba bienu, nembateke ku mutu kuenu
Bintu bia batuangaji Maweja Nangila kuambila Arone ne: Ndi mukupeshe mudimu wa kutangila milambu yonsu ya tshijila idi bena Izrayele bandambula
Pashishe divuba dinene kumueneka ku mukuna
Bukalenga bunene budi bulombola tshidiidi tshia Ditunga
Isaka wakakuna bintu mu buloba abu, ne tshidimu atshi wakahuola lukama lukama, Yehowa wakamusankisha
Bualu yeye nealombole bena Izrayele, bua kusabukabu musulu wa Yardene, too ne muafikabu mu ditunga diudi umona edi
Wewe neubikile bantu bonso badi ne mitshima ya lungenyi, bantu banakûsha ne lungenyi tente, bua bobo batelele Alona bilulu bia kumujidila, bua yeye ankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi
Nuenu kupingana mu mitanda kudi Maweja Nangila, kumudidila

Tela wakangata Abalama, muan andi mulume ne Lota, muana wa Halana, muikulu wandi, ne Salai, ma muen andi, mukashi wa muan andi mulume Abalama, bakamuangala mu buloba bua Ula wa Kasada bua kuya ku buloba bua Kanâna, bakafika ku Halana, bakashikamaku
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama inayi ne bisatu
Genese Abalahama ne Abimeleke Abalahama wakumuka ku muaba au, wakaya ku Sude, wakashikama hankatshi ha Kadesha ne Shû, wakashikama ku Gelâ
Kanulu ne mashi a nyama mishiha ne mampa adi ne luevene hohamue; kanushihi nansha tshintu tshikese tshia mulambu wa disanka dia kuhita kua Yehowa tô ne ku dinda
Bumfumu bwa kabukulu budi ne dikanyika dia kukolesha bumwe ne dikongangana dia ditunga
Nzambi wakamona munya ne Mmuimpe Nzambi wakatahulula munya ne midima

Bikaleye kayi ne mushinga wa muana wa mukoko, yeye neafile mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji kudi Yehowa, nansha nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi nansha mputu nyunyu ibidi, nyunyu umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia

Kabadi Tshisangilu tshinene Tshisumbu tshia badi kabayi benza tshidiidi Ditangilula Tshisangilu Tshibutshilu tshinene tshia diabanyinangana bintu ne lupetu Bukalenga bwa nkaya Kamuyi ditontolola, kamuyi dikonka Assemblée provinciale Accord global et inclusif Autorité Administration Ambassadeur Bureau Bugdet Barreau Civique Campagne Coopération Constitution CEI Citoyen, citoyenne Chef de l Etat Conseil Culture Cas échéant Communication moyen de Composantes et entités Capitale Cour Congrès Civile société Censure Conférence Caisse nationale de péréquation Dictature De plein droit Détention Droit s Droits de l homme Délit d initié Décentralisation Démocratie Député Décret Économie Etat Etat des droits Etat de siège Etat d urgence Entités administratives Election libre transparente démocratrique Finances Forces de l ordre Fonction publique Général e Génocide Gouvernement Garantie Haute trahison Hymne Infraction information justice juridiction Judiciaire pouvoir , autorité,ordre Loi législature législation Logistique Média Motion magistrat Ministère Mandat Minorité muntu bwaalu Dikwata, diela dia mu lukanu Bukookeshi,mapa, maneema a bu muntu, mianda idi mitangila mêyi ne mikandu
Ke mikenji yanyi inudi ne bua kulama: Bantu balume bonsu ba ku ndelanganyi yebe, nubateke panshi
Kanulengi tshintu tshiabu nansha tshimue to
Bavua bamunemeke bikole kudi balombodi ba mu bukalenga ne kudi bena Ejipitu bakuabu bonsu
Kana wakumuka ku mesu kua Yehowa, wakashikama mu buloba bua Nodo, ku esete kua Edene
Kabeena mwa kupatula midimu ya Mbulamatadi mipiamipia anyi kuyikudimuna pambelu pa ndongamu ya mêyi a mpetu
Biwahidia kubalekela, nentume biula mu buloba buebe
Maweja Nangila udi ujinga bua nukumbaje meyi ne mikenji biende, bindi nnuambila lelu ebi, bua nuikale bena diakalenga
Bena tshisamba tshia Ngade kulonda, babalombola kudi Eliyasafe, muana wa Deyuwele
Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena bakamba ne Netuenze bu mudi Yehowa wambila bantu bandi
Kadi Moshe kumuandamuna ne: Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kena mua kumvua tshindi ngamba to, bualu ndi ngakula ne lutatu

Nzambi wakamba ne, Bintu bidi bikenka bikale mulu mua diulu bua kutahulula munya kudi butuku, bikale bua bimanyinu ne bua bikondo ne bua matuku ne bua bidimu, bikale bu minda mulu mua diulu bua kutokeshayi ha buloba, bualu buakenjibua
Mulau wa Mabue a Nvula Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bika ne dinda dionso, wimane ku mpala kua Palô, umuambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu udi wamba ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye kuntendelela
Mpindiewu, nuenu bitabe tshindi nnuambila, balame ndondu wanyi, nenuikale tshisamba tshianyi tshindi musungule munkatshi mua bisamba bionsu bidi pa buloba
Butuku abu nebakange munyinyi awu
Bika biebe, wendakana mu buloba buonso, mu bule buabu ne mu butshiama buabu, bualu bua nenkuhebu
Kuenza kua Nsubu wa Tshitendelelu Ek
Kadi Maweja Nangila kubabutula bonsu, pakafika bena Amone
dibandila dia ditunga ne dia bintu;
Yehowa wakahueka mu difutu, wakimana ku mbelu kua Ntenta, wakabikila Alona ne Mîyama, bobo bakaluhuka
Pashishe, nebasakidile kabidi milambu ya tshibidilu ya bukula ne ya maluvu a mvinyo

Kanungu ka Badi bênza bilumbulwilu bia nsambu ya pankatshi pa beena mwabo bôbo nkayabu bikumbajangana kudi tubadi na tubinadi twa basivila ne twa basalayi tuteeka mu bukookeshi bwa Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika
Mesu a bubidi buabo akabuluka, bakamanya ne, Tudi butaka, bakatela mabeshi a nfigi, bakadienzela mbondia
Nenubale mbingu muanda mutekete: ku tshikondo tshinudi nuhuole bintu nenubange kubala mbingu ei muanda mutekete
Kanuakupeta bikuabu pa mbelu to
Mulau wa Midima Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe mulu, midima ikale mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bantu babubute mu midima
Hakumukabo mu musoko, kabayi banze kuya kule, Yosefe wakambila mulami wandi ne, Bika biebe, ulonde balume aba ne hawabaheta, ubakonke ne, Bualu kai nuakashintakasha malu mabi ku malu mimpe
Kadi bena Izrayele bakuabu bonsu bateke madilu bua bantu bavua Maweja Nangila mushidishe ne kapia

Hashishe nenulue ne bintu binakanuambila ku muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi; milambu yenu ya kuosha ne nyama yenu mishiha, ne bintu bia dikumi bia bintu bienu, ne bintu bienu bidibo bakuha, ne milambu ya kuditshiha kuenu kunudi nuditshiha n aku kudi Yehowa
Pashishe kuangata dikoba divuaye mukose muana adi, kudilaba Moshe pa mbidi wamba ne: Udi bayanyi wa mashi
Binuahanyisha mukuenu bintu bienu anyi binuasumba bintu ku bianza bia mukuenu, kanuenzedianganyi bibi
Umwe ne umwe udi ne tutupa twa teletwale twikala katuyi ku bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bwa kumutu etu: tshimenga,komina, seketela ne musoko wa bamfumu ba kabukulu
Nenusungule misoko isatu dishiya dia Yadene, ne isatu mu buloba bua Kanâna, neyikale misoko ya kunyemena
Moshe kubanda ku mukuna bua kumonangana ne Mvidi Mukulu
Belâma wakabika dinda, wakambila miloho ya Balaka ne, Yai bienu ku buloba buenu, Yehowa wakahidia bua meme kuya n enu
Arone kuenza bivua Moshe mumuambile
Hanualua ne mulambu wa kubisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa, nûfile ne mutshima udiye mua kuitabusha
Bualu uvua musue kunumusha mu njila uvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munuambile bua kulonda
Kadi padi milambu ya bintu bibishi kabiyi bilambe pa kapia, nansha ya bintu bisambakaja ne mafuta nansha ya bikuabu, babiabanyangana bungi bua momumue kudi bana ba Arone ba balume
Dina dia diboko dia kumudilu didi Pishona, didi dinyunguluka buloba buonso bua Hawila, kudi or, or wa mu buloba abu udi muimpe, ne mabue a mushinga mukole a bdelhum ne a onyx adiku
Kena witaba mabuejilu to
Nusangishe bakulu benu bonso ba mu bisamba bienu ne tuhita tuenu kundi, bua meme kubambila mei â onso ku matshu abo, nembikile diulu ne buloba bu bamonyi ba bualu kudibo
Kayine kumuka muaba uvua Maweja Nangila, kuya kusomba mu ditunga dia Node luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua Edene
Balaka wakamushihela ngombe ne mikoko, wakantumina Belâma ne miloho yakadi n andi
Yai muana mulume wa Manashe wakaya wakanyenga misoko mikuabo wakayidika ne, Hawota y i misoko ya Yai
Majitu a manyooka adi itshikila anu mweena mambu ende nkayende

Muaba awu, ke unudi mua kulambuila bintu bionsu binudi nabi: milambu ya kuosha, ya bobumue, tshia dikumi tshia bintu bia mu madimi, milambu ya budisuile, milambu ya mapiku, too ne ya banabute ba bimuna bienu: ngombe, mikoku ne mbuji
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi bialueye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neajidile nsubu wandi
Asenata, muana mukashi wa Poti fela, mubuki wa mu Ono, wakalelela Yosefe bana ba balume babidi, diambedi tshiole katshiyi tshianze kulua
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Meme Yehowa, tshiena ngenza malu â, anyi
Neyinuambuluishe bua nukuate ditunga dinuabuela
Kutedi dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi webe, tshitelatela, bua Yehowa kena ubingisha muntu udi utela dina diandi tshitelatela
Wewe wakuenza bualu buhote
Bivua kabiyi bipie, meme kubizaza, kushalabi butu
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe kabidi ne: Teka tshianza pa tshiadi tshiebe
Yehowa Nzambi wakakuma bintu mu budimi ku esete, mu Edene, wakatekamu mulume wakafukeye
Nebalondangane muntu yonsu mu mulongu wende, ku tshisumbu ne ku tshisumbu, bilondeshile muaba uvuabu base mitanda yabu, balonda dibendela dia tshisamba tshiabu
Bena Peleshete bakadi n andi mukau
Musangu awu, Maweja Nangila kungambila, bua meme kunulongesha meyi ne mikenji yonsu bua nuenu kubikumbaja, panuakuata ditunga dia Kenaane
Udi mufike munda bua tshinyi
Yeye wakabebesha kabidi ne, Nudi bamanye Labana, muana wa Naho, anyi

Yeye neafile mulambu eu bua muaba wa tshijila, bualu bua Bena Isalele kabena bakane, ne bualu bua disambuka diabo dia mikenji, ne bualu bua malu mabi abo onso, nênze nunku bua kulengesha ntenta wa kusangakena udi munkatshi muabo, munkatshi mua bubi buabo
Enza mabaya makumi abidi a kutoka ku luseke lua tshitendelelu lua ku nôde, ne biamu bia mahoka ne tshiamu tshia argent makumi anai, mahoka abidi ku dibaya dimue, bualu bua kuelamu tutshi tua bituhu
Tshibilu etshi, nutshienze ku tshidimu tshionsu, dituku diatshi
Yeye wakamuhabi, wakaya kudiye, ne mukashi wakimita difu kudiye
Wakidika dina dia mai ne, Eseke; bualu bua bobo bakatandangana n andi
Uvua mumutue kabidi ne tuetu bonsu, batshidi ne muoyi lelu aba
Abalahama wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakaya ku muaba wakimaneye ku mpala kua Yehowa; wakatangila ku luseke lua Sodoma ne Amola ne Mpata yonso, ne tangilai, muishi wakadi ubanda bu muishi wa tshikutu
Lota wakaluhuka, wakambila baku bakadi babangila bana bandi bakashi ne, Jukai, numuke mu musoko eu, bualu bua Yehowa neashihe musoko Kadi yeye wakadi bu muntu udi wakula biakulakula kudi baku bandi
Padi muena Izrayele ulambula mbuji nansha mukoku bu mulambu wa kuosha, asungule anu mukoku wa tshimpanga, nansha mbuji wa mpumbu udi kayi bulema
Mutuangaji imanyike muena nsudi awu ne bintu biende bionsu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Kadi mmupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Muntu yonso wakatshina di dia Yehowa munkatshi mua bena mudimu ba Palô wakatuma bantu bandi, bakasangisha bimuna biandi mu nsubu
Bakumukamu, bakashikama mu tshibanda tshia Zalede
Nupikule kabidi muanabute yonsu wa balume wa muntu

Yeye wakanuhuekesha, wakanufuisha nzala ne wakanudisha ne mana a mu diulu, anudi kanuyi bamanye, ne akadi batatu benu kabayi bamanye; bua kunumanyisha ne, Muntu kena wikala ne muoyo bualu bua bidia nkayabo kadi utu wikala ne muoyo bualu bua mei onso adi ahatuka mukana mua Yehowa
Biwenza bimpe, kuena ubanduluka, anyi
Wa kabifila mu bianza bia bahika bandi, tshisumbu ha buatshi tshisumbu ha buatshi, wakabambila ne Sabukai ku mpala kuanyi, nushilangane muaba hankatshi ha tshisumbu ne tshisumbu
Tuetu katuena bakumbane nansha bua nutujane
Kadi nyama ya tshijila, nansha ya mulambu wa mapiku, nuyilambuile anu muaba wikale Maweja Nangila musungule
Nanku matuku dikumi ne anayi a ngondu wa kumpala dilolu, too ne ku matuku makumi abidi ne dimue dilolu, nudie anu mampa kaayi mela buanga
Mabaya ikale mashilangane kuinshi ne matuangane kulu, ku dikoha dia kumudilu, bubidi buau neikale nunku, teka mabaya au ku matumba a tshitendelelu
Wakela lusumuinu luandi kabidi ne, Nganyi neikale ne muoyo hashikisha Nzambi malu au
Isaka tatu andi wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi nganyi
Nanku kuambilaye Nowa ne: Tshikondu tshia kubutula bionsu bidi ne muoyi pa buloba tshiakumbanyi
Bena Izrayele kuenza bionsu bivuabu babambile abi
Mulombodi wa Ditunga wa tshimpitshimpi udi wimanyina pa bulongolodi bwa disungula dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga mupiamupia bilondeshila makanyika ne tshipungu tshidi Dîyi dikulu dikosa
Mose wakabanda mu mukuna ne difutu diakabuikila mukuna
Nunku Yosefe wakasumbila Palo buloba bua Ejipitu buonso bualu bua Muena Ejipitu yonso wakahana madimi andi bualu bua tshiole tshiakabatamba bukole, buloba buakalua bua Palô
Abrahame kupesha Izake bia bumpianyi bionsu bivuaye nabi
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Vulukai dituku edi dinuakuhatuka mu Ejipitu, mu nsubu wa lukanu, bualu bua Yehowa wakanuhatula mu muaba eu ne bukole bua tshianza tshiandi, kanudi bidia bidi ne luevene
Mulume umona mukaji, kuelaye diyi dikole wamba ne: Mpindiewu mbapetshi wa ku meme, munyinyi wa ku munyinyi wanyi, mufuba wa ku mifuba yanyi
Binatuisha muele wanyi wa nvita, ne bingolola tshianza tshianyi bua kulumbulula bilumbu, meme nensombuele badi n anyi lukuna, neafute badi n anyi tshiji
Bidi bena Izrayele ne bua kuenza Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: manyisha bena Izrayele ne: Kanuena mua kudia munyinyi wa mafuta a nyama, nansha a ngombe, a mukoku, nansha a mbuji
Kena mumanye mua kudiona bualu bua tatu andi anyi bua mamu andi anyi bua muan abo mulume anyi bua muan abo mukashi hafuabo, bualu bua tshijila tshiandi kudi Yehowa tshidi ha mutu n andi
Nanku, Maweja Nangila neanupeshe munyinyi wa nuenu kudia
Ambila kabidi bena Izrayele ne: Nudilongolole bua dituku dia maloba, numushe mikiya
Mvua ntshina, nzakela tshiji tshikole tshivua Maweja Nangila natshi
Bena Izrayele bonsu bumuke ne muena tshibawu awu muaba udi mitanda, bamuase mabue, bamushipe
Bualu bua nakumana kukulongoluela nsubu ne muaba wa tumelo tuebe
Dielulula Maweja Nangila mmunange bena Izrayele patupu Nuenu bena Izrayele, telejayi
Mulambu awu udi mushindu umue ne mulambu wa ntete ya kuenza bulula, nansha wa maluvu mapiamapia a mvinyo, udi bana benu bandambula

MUTU WA MUKANDA WA KUMPALA I : BULONGOLODI BWA MU KABUJIMA Tshitupa Tshia kumpala : Bidi bitangila Mbulamatadi ne Didikookesha Njila wa kumpala : Bidi bitangila Mbulamatadi Kanungu ka kumpala Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata didi, anu mu mikalu yadi ya mu dia a kashipunkenza ayi, Mbulamatadi wa mêyi ne mikandu, mudikadile, mudikookesha, musangisha ne kayi kwabanya, udi utangila majinga a bantu, wa mungalata ne kayi mutwa ku tshia tshisumbu tshia ditabwija nansha tshimwe
