Hafila muntu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa bua kushikisha kuditshiha kuandi anyi mulambu udi mutshima wandi musue kufila wa munkatshi mua ngombe anyi mikoko, nengitabushe anu tshintu tshidi tshiakane, katshiena mua kuikala ne tshitema
Pashishe tshiluilu tshivua ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Efrayime kubanga luendu, bena mvita bambula dibendela diabu
Muntu awu apingaje tshintu atshi amu bu mu watshi, asakidile kabidi ne tshia bitanu tshimue tshia mushinga wa tshintu atshi
Nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numuenzele mudimu, nulamate kudiye, nuditshihe kudi dina diandi
Mukelenge wa Sodoma wakambila Abalama ne, Umpe bantu, wewe wangate biuma
Musangu wa kumpala udibu bela mpungi nanku, bena Izrayele badi basombe luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua ntenta wa kusambakena nebatuadije luendu
Milambu ivua mfumu yonsu mufila ivua nunku: Dilongu disalame dia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, dikale ne bujitu bua grame
Moshe kuambila Arone ne: Bikila bena Izrayele bonsu, basemene kudi Maweja Nangila, bualu mmumane kumvua bijanu biabu
Bualu ebu kabuena bunusankisha
Udi lupuishi, newandamuke kabidi lupuishi
Wakenza manyi adibo bela ha mutu ne musenga wa manananshi kudi bantu bakadi ne lungenyi lule

Kadi bikala mitshima yenu mihambuke, ne binuikala kanuyi nunyua, kadi binuatendelela nzambi mikuabo bua kuyikuatshila mudimu, meme ndi nnuambila lelu ne, Nenujimishibue bulelela; kanuena nuvudisha matuku enu mu buloba bunuyaya dishiya dia Yadene bua kubuhiana
Labana wakafua Zilepa, muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi, kudi Lea muan andi wa bakashi bu muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi
Shila malu a mushimi kaba, kanushihi muntu muimpe udi kayi ne bualu meme tshiena mbingisha muntu mubi
Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu nkadi ne tshia kutangila dilomba adi, mu tshipungu tshia ngondo umwe

Genese Yosefe Udi Udimanyisha kudi Bana Babo Hashishe, Yosefe kakamanya mua kudikanda kudishikunka ku mesu kua bantu bakimana ha buihi n andi, wakamba ne, Numushe bantu bonso kundi Nansha muntu mukuabo wakashala n andi hakadimanyisha Yosefe kudi bana babo
Wakenza mesu a mbote ne bilulu bia bleu ku luseke lua tshilulu tshiakadi ha bule, Wakenza nunku kabidi ne tshilulu tshikuabo tshiakadi ha bule
Meme tshiena ngangata tshintu nansha tshimue pa kumusha biakudia bivua bantu banyi badie
Nuenu bena Izrayele, numanye ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu nkayende ke Mvidi Mukulu wa bushiwa
Wakalua ne mulambu wa bantu, wakangata mbushi wa mulambu wa kubuikila bubi bua bantu, wakamushiha, wakamufila bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, bu muakenzeye mulambu wa diambedi
Bualu bua kahia aka kanene nekatuoshe; bitunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, kabidi, hashishe netufue
Pashishe kufuaye

Hanakufika lelu ku mushimi wa mai, nakuamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mukelenge wanyi Abalahama, biwasua kungendesha dikasa dimpe mu nshila unaya, tangila, hantshidi muimane hehi ne mushimi wa mai, witabushe ne nsongakashi ulualua bua kusuneye mai undi ngambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne Umpeku tuima tua kunua mu mulondo webe, yeye neangandamune dî ne, Nua biebe, nennuishe tumelo biebe kabidi, ka yeye mene ikale mukashi wakasunguila Yehowa muana mulume wa mukelenge wanyi

Kanungu ka Ngikadilu wa Mbulamatadi wa ditunga, masungula a kudi bônso, bukalenga bwa dileeja mpala, bûngi bwa misangu ne lupolu lwa disomba dia mu nkwaasa wa bumfumu bwa ditunga, budikadidi bwa Tubadi, tshidiidi tshia babûngi ne bisumbu bia bakwidi ba beena mudimu kabieena mwa kuteekibwa mu mulongo wa bidi mwa kutangilula mu Dîyi dikulu to
Nenushikame munkatshi muetu, buloba nebuikale ku mpala kuenu, nuikalemu, nuendulukemu mushinga, nuangatemu bintu
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kumubanjija
Pashishe, tshilambuilu katshikadi ne bibandilu to, bualu butaka bua udi ubanda bua kundambula milambu budi mua kumueneka
Bituenza mikenji ei ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bu muakabambileye, netubadibue ne mbakane
Kanungu ka Bukalenga bukoshi bwa nsambu ke budi bujadika budikadidi bwa muntu ne muntu pamwe ne makookeshi a nshindameenu a bweena mwaabo
Nennuangate bu bantu banyi ne meme nengikale Nzambi wenu, nuenu nenumanye ne, Meme udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuhatula muinshi mua majitu a Bena Ejipitu
Maweja Nangila neabatumine mangulungu bua kubabutula
Diba didi tufina, tuvua tupatuka, tupisha muntu awu mikiya, tujika, muntu awu udi ne bua kushala muindile matuku muanda mutekete bua mikiya yende kujika payi
Nuenu bantu balume bu munudi nujinga kutendelela Maweja Nangila, nuye nkayenu

Bungi bua matuku atuakalala mu nshila ku Kadeshe bânea tô ne ku kasulu ka Zelede akadi bidimu makumi asatu ne muanda mukulu; tô ne hakafua mulongo wonso wa bena nvita munkatshi mua tshitudilu, bu muakabalaya Yehowa
Labana wakambila Yakoba ne, Bualu bua wewe udi muan etu wa balume, bidi bimpe wewe unkuatshile mudimu tshianana, anyi
Nvula yakaloka ha buloba munya ne bufuku tô matuku makumi anai
Bana Baledibue kudi Yakoba Hakatangila Yehowa ne Lea wakadi mubengibue, yeye wakamulelesha bana, kadi Lakele wakadi nkumba
Yehowa wakenza bu mu dî dia Mose yeye wakumusha bisumbu bia tuishi kudi Palô ne kudi bena mudimu bandi ne kudi bantu bandi, nansha kishi kamue kakashala
Nengikale n enu luse, nennuleleshe bana ba bungi, nennuvudishangane, nenjadike tshihungidi tshianyi munkatshi muenu
Mose ne Eleazâ muakuidi bakangata bintu bia tshiamu tshia or tshiakatulabo ku bianza biabo
Mvidi Mukulu kumuandamuna ne: Nansha
Padi muena Izrayele ulambula Maweja Nangila nyunyi bu mulambu wa kuosha, asungule kamanda nkutshi nansha nkudimba
Bu meme mukutumine wewe ne bantu bebe disama dikole dia tshiambu, bonsu nuvua mua kuikala bamane kubutuka
Tshitupa tshia kumpala
Meme nembabishile muprofete munkatshi mua bana babo bu wewe; meme nenteke mei anyi onso mukana muandi, ne yeye neabambile mei onso anamuambila
Bualu bena Ejipitu bavua benda babipatshila
Nentume dishina dianyi ku mpala kuebe, nentshinyishe bantu bonso baudi ufika kudibo, nenkobamishe bantu bonso badi n ebe lukuna nyima yabo
Maweja Nangila udi unutumina diyi bua nuenu bena Izrayele, kumusha tshiadi ne tshibelu bia nyama inudi nulambula bu mulambu wa bobumue
Nakanuambila nunku, kanuakangunvuila; kadi nuakadi ne budisu, nuakahidia dî dia Yehowa, nuakadiyila ku mikuna
Meme Maweja Nangila ndi munupeshe mudimu wa butuangaji ewu
Bantu bakitabusha ne hakunvuabo ne, Yehowa wakulua kudi Bena Isalele, wakumona dikenga diabo, bakinama mitu yabo, bakatendelela
Yeye neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha mbushi wa mulambu wandi, neamushihe kudibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Pashishe mutuangaji neafunde meyi a mitshipu aa mu mukanda, atue mukanda awu mu mayi a bululu aa, bua miaku ayi ishale mu mayi aa
Kabeena mwa kwipata mweena Kongu nansha umwe mu bulaba bwa Ditunga anyi kumukanyika bwa kuyaye kusomba pambelu pa lubanza lwende lwa tshibidilu to
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe mulu, bua mabue a nvula ikale mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, ne ha muntu ne ha nyama ne ha midioko yonso ya mu budimi, mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso

Dipangadika dia kulondeshisha ne dia kufunda beena bukalenga bunene badi badieelela tukanda kudi tshitupa tshidi tshipita bûngi tshia beena tshibambalu tshia batshipwiita munwamfwanka bilondeshile bulongolodi bwa dîyi diludiki dia mianda ya munda mwaatshi
Maweja Nangila mmungendeshe diakalenga mu njila mujima, mumfikishe anu mu diku dia mfumu wanyi Abrahame
Mfumu wa tshisamba eshi uvua Eliyasafe, muana wa Layele
Umbuke ne butu abu mu mitanda, aye nabu muaba musunguluke kauyi mikiya bua kubimansha
Neikale muena tshibawu, bualu mmubenge miaku yanyi, munyangakaje mikenji yanyi
Nanku, dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu muibidi, Moshe ne Arone kusangisha bantu bonsu
Bikala muana mukashi wa muakuidi mubaka kudi muenyi, yeye kena mua kudia tshintu tshia tshijila tshifila kudi Yehowa
Maweja Nangila kuandamuna ne: Meme musangane bantu bakane makumi anayi, nemfuile bantu luse bualu buabu
Kuendeshi muan ebe mukashi masandi, malu a masandi neikale mu buloba, ne buloba nebukale ne malu mabi tente
Abalahama Udi Ulomba Nzambi bualu bua Sodoma Bantu aba bakabika, bakatangila ku Sodoma, ne Abalahama wakaya kubashindikila mu nshila
Kanusangishi mei ha mutu ha dî dinakanuambila, kanumushi mei ku dî adi; bua nuenu nutumikile mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Nakanuambila
Kadi, meme nennyoke tshisamba tshikale tshiyikuata ku bupika atshi
Moshe ne Arone kukumbaja bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mubambile
Nanku kabena ne bua kumuteka pa nkayende to
Bobo bakahaula mpala yabo hanshi
Uvua utangila bantu bavua benza mudimu muaba wa tshijila
Yeye mumane kunukengesha ne nzala, kumupeshaye mana, biakudia binuvua kanuyi banji kumanya, nansha nuenu nansha bankambua benu
Nanku nenganyishe mupuya muimpe wabi
Dîyi didi dileeja mishindu ya makanyika a dikumbajija, a dilongolola pamwe ne njila ya mwa kualonda
Esau wakashikama mu mukuna wa Sei Esau udi Edome
Pafinda mvula kulu, pambamona muanza nkongolu, nemvuluke ndondu awu
Lakele wakamba ne, Biwampa tumuma tua muan ebe, Yakoba nealale n ebe butuku ebu
Balume aba bakumuka, bakaya mu nshila wa ku Sodoma, kadi Abalahama wakatshidi muimane ku mpala kua Yehowa
Madiyane uvua mulele bana ba balume batanu: Efa, Efere, Anoke, Abida ne Elda
Kadi muntu mulume udibu kabayi bateke panshi, nebamuipate munkatshi mua bantu banyi, bualu kena munemeka ndondu wanyi to
Nanku muntu yonsu udi ushipa muntu mukuabu mu mpukapuka, kayi nende ne muoyi mubi, neanyemene mu tshimenga tshimue tshia ku bimenga ebi bua kudipandisha
Muleleshi wakamba ne, Mona tshihatukidi tshiwakuhatuka
Bintu bionsu bidi bena Izrayele bandambula bia mu ditunga diabu mbiebe wewe ne bia bena diku diebe bonsu badi kabayi ne mikiya
Minisitila kavulambedi udi mwa kulebeka amwe makookeshi enda kudi ba meena
Enosha wakikala ne muoyo bidimu makumi tshitema, wakalela Kenana

Nebenze bilulu bitambe buimpe, ne bilulu bia tshijila bia Alona muakuidi, ne bilulu bia bana bandi balume, bua kunkuatshilabo mudimu wa buakuidi, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne bintu bia manananshi bidi bidia dihembu bia mu muaba wa tshijila bobo nebenze malu onso anakukuambila
Kadi Mvidi Mukulu kuambila Abrahame ne: Kufiki munda bua muana ewu ne bua mukajebe mupika to
Mukelenge wa Edome wakalua ne bantu ba bungi, ne tshianza tshikole
Wakenza mesu a mbote makumi atanu ku luseke lua tshilulu tshiakadi ha bule, ne mesu a mbote makumi atanu ku luseke lua tshilulu tshikuabo tshiakadi ha bule
Dîyi didi difila makanyika a mwa kulongolola nau masungulangana ne dieebeja dia dianyisha dia beena ditunga
mianda ya batshikuma mbila, tshisanji, televizio, matanda a bindidimbi;
Kakuena udi wa tshijila, amu wewe
Maweja Nangila neanuambuluishe, nupangane, nupite bisamba bionsu ku bubanji

Dimungutula nansha dimwe kadieena mwa kwenzeka mu tshidimu tshidi tshilonda masungulangana, nansha mu tshikondo tshia mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi wa bilwilu anyi tshia mvita, nansha padi Ditunga ku bulombodi bwa mfumu wa tshimpitshimpi
Bantu kukonka Abrahame ne: Mukajebe Sara udi penyi
Dibadika dia bantu adi divua dienzeka mu tshipela tshia Sinayi, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Ubambile bapingane ku nzubu yabu ya ntenta
Kadi wewe neuye kudi bankambua bebe hola, neujikibue muntu mununu
Kabena bitabe ku bionsu bimvua mubambile
Kadi bikala mulume wandi mumukande mu dituku diakunvueye kuditshiha, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso nebikale tshianana, Yehowa neamubuikidile bualu abu
Nansha muntu musue kundambula bimuna bia bungi, ku tshimuna tshionsu asakidile anu milambu mikuabu ituatedi eyi
Ke padibu binyika kasoku aka ne: Soware
Meme tshiena mumanye Maweja Nangila bua meme kuitaba diyi diende
Maweja Nangila uvua wenza bionsu ebi, bualu uvua unanga bankambua benu
Kuyabu kuenza bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe ne Arone
Bobu ke bankambua ba bena Peleshete
Bakelenge bakafua bintu bia kujidila n abi tshioshelu mu dituku diakelabo manyi ha mutu hatshi, mbakelenge mene bakafua bintu biabo ku mpala kua tshioshelu
Wewe wambile Bena Isalele ne, Muntu yonso udi uhenda Nzambi wandi nendituadile bubi buandi

Wewe newenze tshitekelu tshia minda tshia or mutambe buimpe, nebenze tshitekelu etshi ne or muhite, ne tshishikaminu tshiatshi ne mukolo watshi, tukoho tuatshi ne mahu atshi ne bilongo biatshi nebenze ne tshituha tshimue tshia or mene tshiakenzabo n atshi tshitekelu
Mu buatu amu, ubuele ne mukajebe, bana bebe ba balume ne bakaji babu
Wakenza tshilulu tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin, bakenza tshifuanyikishi tshia bakeluba mu tshilulu kudi bantu bakadi ne lungenyi lule
Malu anuvua bangambile avua a meji
Bena Izrayele kudidila Moshe

Bikala muntu kayi musue kuangata mukashi wa muan abo, hashishe mukashi wa muan abo mulume neaye ku tshibi tshia musoko kudi bakulu, neambe ne, Muan abo ne mulume wanyi udi uhidia kulelela muan abo wakafua bana mu Isalele, yeye kena mungangate bu mukashi wandi
Nenganyishe mupuya muimpe wawu
Bualu bua dibue diabo kadiena bu Dibue dietu nansha bikala bena lukuna balumbuluishi ba bualu
Nanku bena Izrayele kukumbaja bimpe bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Ke nuwuaye mupandishe Lote
Kuikadi ne nzambi mikuabo ne meme hohamue
Shela wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu, wakalela Ebê

Dielulula DIYUKI DIA KUMPALA DIA MOSHE Mukanda ewu udi utuambila malu avua Moshe muyukile ne bena Izrayele bonsu, patshivuabu luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene, mu tshipela tshidi pabuipi ne Sufe
Moshe ujuka, kusemenaye pabuipi ne Datane, Abirame, kabidi ne bakulu ba bena Izrayele
Bobo bangashile tshitendelelu, bua meme kuikala munkatshi muabo
Badi ne bukole anyi mbafuba
Nanku kanuena mua kudia munyinyi wayi, nansha kuyilenga padiyi mifue

Wakenza tshikowelu tshia efoda ne buanda bua bleu, bakashiya disoso bua kubueshamu mutu, bakanyunguluka disoso ne muonshi muhindakana bu mudibo benza tshikowelu tshia nvita, bua tshikowelu katshihandiki nansha
Nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu yonsu nuikale nuvuluka dituku edi
Ke padibu babikila tshina tshia mayi tshidi pankatshi pa Kadeshe ne Berede ne: Lahayi Royi, mmumue ne: tshina tshia Udi ne muoyi uvua mummone
Bantu kai bakumpa dî dia Nzambi diakalua kudibo munkatshi mua kahia, bu munuakadiunvua, ne bakikala ne muoyo
Baluishi nebabatshimune
Shelumiele, muana mulume wa Shulishadai, mukelenge wa bana ba Shimeona, wakafua bintu dituku ditanu
Buloba kubajibikila bonsu ne bena meku abu, ne bantu bonsu bavua nabu Kora, ne bintu biabu
Nunku tuakahita bana betu, bana ba Esau, bakadi bashikama mu Sei, mu nshila wa ku Alabâ ku Elata to ne ku Esione gebê
Bena tshisamba tshia Ashere kulonda, babalombola kudi Pagiyele, muana wa Okrane
Mvidi Mukulu kumvua muadi wa muana
Abrahame kuitaba bivua Efrone muakule, kumubadilaye nkanu bungi buvuaye utela, bana babu bumvue
Yehowa wakadi ne tshiji kudi Isalele ne wakabende sha eku ne eku mu tshihela to bidimu makumi anai tô ne hakafua bantu bonso ba tshikondo atshi, bakadi benze bualu ebu bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa

Kadi katangila malomba bwa ditangilula, panyima pa mapangadika mangata kudi Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika ne kudi Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi, anu paditu mwa kupangadika mwa kufila tshilumbu ku bilumbulwilu bidi bitangila mianda ya bantu nkayabu anyi ku bilumbulwilu bidi bitangila nsambu ya pankatshi pa bantu ne mbulamatadi
Bisamba bionsu bivua bimuangalaka pa buloba, mayi a tshipupu mamane kukama, mbifume anu kudi Nowa
Bantu balume bonsu ba tshisamba etshi, bituadije ku bana batekete ba ngondu umue too ne ku bantu bakulumpe, bavua
Mulume eu wakinyika mutu wandi, wakatendelela Yehowa
Kumonaye ne: bionsu bidi bimpe
Bena Izrayele kuinyika biakudia abi ne: mmana

Lebeka wakambila Ya koba muan andi ne, Tangila, nakunvua tatu ebe wambila Esau, mukulu ebe ne, Ulue kundi ne munyinyi wa ntole, undambile munyinyi muimpe wa dihembu, bua meme ngudie, nkuvudishile disanka ku mpala kua Yehowa diambedi tshiyi muanze kufua
Baluishi aba kuasa mu ditunga adi
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Wakakuma mpunda webe misangu isatu bualu kai
Bena Isalele bakatangila bualu bukole buakenzela Yehowa Bena Ejipitu, ne bantu bonso bakatshina Yehowa, bakeyemena Yehowa ne muntu wandi Mose
Bantu bonsu kutshina Maweja Nangila, kumutekemena
Bena Ejipitu bamona nanku, kutshinabu bena Izrayele bikole

Bintu ebi bidi bibi kunudi munkatshi mua bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi, muntu yonso udi ubilenga tshianza hadibi bifue yeye neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo Bikala bintu ebi bifue ne biahonabi ha tshintu, tshintu atshi netshikale ne bukoya, nansha dilonga nansha bilulu nansha biseba nansha tshibombi nansha tshintu tshikuabo tshidibo benza n atshi mudimu, nebatshiteke mu mai, netshikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo, nunku netshikale tshitoke tô
Bakalua kudi Bena Isalele ne lumu lubi lua buloba buakatentekelabo, bakamba ne, Buloba abu butuakutentekela buta buadia bantu badi bikalamu, bantu bonso batuakamonamu badi bantu ba mibidi minene

Nomba Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuabuela mu buloba bua Kanâna ebu mbuloba bua buhianyi buenu, buloba bua Kanâna mene ku mikalu yabo yonso mukalu wenu wa ku luseke lua sude newikale ku tshihela tshia Sina, ne ku mukalu wa Edome to ne kuinshi kua Dishiba dia Luehu ku luseke lua ku esete, mukalu wenu neunyunguluke mukuna wa Akalabima ku luseke lua ku sude, neutuangane ne tshihela tshia Sina tô ne ku Kadeshe bânea, tô ne ku Hasâ adâ, to ne ku Asemona, mukalu wenu neunyunguluke ku Asemona tô ne ku kasulu ka Ejipitu tô ne ku mai manene
Kufikabu pabuipi ne Ebrone, muaba uvuabu base kudi bena Akimane, bena Sheshayi ne bena Talmayi
Nengikale Mvidi Mukulu webe kabidi ne wa ndelanganyi yebe yonsu
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Ashe, Setû, muana mulume wa Mikaele

Dutelonone Mua Kufutshisha Mushihianganyi Bubi Buandi Biasanganabo muntu mufue mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu nubuhiane, kabayi bamanye muntu wakamushiha; hashishe bakulu ne balumbuluishi nebaluhuke, nebahime mutantshi kubangila ku muaba udi tshitalu tô ne ku misoko idi ha buihi ne muntu mufue; bakulu ba mu musoko udi utamba ha buihi ne muntu mufue nebangate kana ka ngombe kadi kakayi kanze kuenza mudimu ne tshikokedi; bakulu ba mu musoko nebahueke ne kana ka ngombe mu tshibanda tshidi ne mai adi ahueka, tshidibo kabayi banze kudimamu ne kukunamu bintu, nebatshibule nshingu wa kana ka ngombe mu tshibanda atshi
Hanoka wakendakana ne Nzambi, ne yeye kakikalaku bualu bua Nzambi wakamuangata
Pa nuenu kumuka, nenupawule bena Ejipitu
Kanuonyi buloba bunudi nushikamamu, kundi mushikame kabidi, bualu bua meme Yehowa ndi mushikame munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Kanudi nansha tshintu tshikese tshia luevene, mu nsubu yenu yonso nenudie anu bintu bidi kabiyi ne luevene
Nenkande mundi udi kayi muanze kukandibua kudi Yehowa munyi
Moshe kufikisha bivua bantu bandamune kudi Maweja Nangila
Muntu yonso udi udia mashi nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Moshe kutendelela Maweja Nangila bua umushe ndimba iwaye mutumine mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Ukadi mumane kumfuila luse, nangananga paudi mumpatule mu tshimenga etshi bua kumpandisha

Tangilai, ndi ne bana bakashi babidi badi kabayi banze kumanya balume, binuitabusha, nendue n abo kunudi, nubenzele bu munudi basue, kadi kanuenji balume aba bualu, bualu bua bobo bakulua mu diledi dia nsubu wanyi
Yosefe wakasangisha argent yonso yakadi mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ya mu buloba bua Kanâna ku bintu bia kudia biakasumbabo, Yosefe wakalua ne argent yonso mu nsubu wa Palo
Kumuangalaye nabu mu ditunga dia Ure wa bena Babilone, kuya kuasa mu ditunga dia Kenaane

Minyinyi ya mu mai yakadi mu musulu bakafua, musulu wakamuha muhuya mubi, ne Bena Ejipitu kabakamanya mua kunua mai a mu musulu, mashi akadi mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, Bena bilengulengu ba mu Ejipitu bakenza muomumue ne manga abo, mutshima wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye kakabunvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Bana ba mapasa abu kukola
Numanye bienu lelu, nubueshe bualu ebu mu mitshima yenu ne, Yehowa udi Nzambi wa mu diulu ne hanshi ha buloba kabidi: kakuena mukuabo
Bualu bua mashi adi bu muoyo wa tshintu nakanuha mashi ha tshioshelu bualu bua kunubuikidila n au bubi buenu mashi adi anubuikidila bubi bualu bua muoyo wau
Bantu bonsu kutuilangana ku mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Munyinyi awu, nudi mua kuudila ku nzubu yenu pamue ne bantu bonsu, badi ne mikiya nansha badi kabayi nayi, anu bu munudi nudia munyinyi wa kabuluku nansha wa ngulungu
Tuakabika ku Holeba, tuakenda tô mu tshihela atshi tshinene tshibi tshinuakatangila, ku nshila wa ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, bu muakatuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wetu; tuakalua ku Kadeshe bânea
Ku nyima Lea wakalela muana wa bakashi wakamuidika dina ne, Dina
Miaba yonso mudi nudiata munda mua makasa enu neyikale yenu: ku tshihela ne mikuna ya Lebanona ne ku musulu munene wa Pelata tô ne ku mai manene adi ku nyima kuenu
Mukashi wakamba ne, Wewe udi bayanyi wa mashi bualu bua ku tengula
Abalahama wakamuambila ne, Udimuke, kuyi ne muan anyi kabidi kuakua
Eu udi mukenji wa muena nsudi udi kayi mua kusangisha bintu bia mushinga mukole bia kudilengesha n abi
Salai wakambila Abalama ne, Mona, Yehowa wakumpidisha bua kulela, ndi nkutendekena ne, Uye biebe kudi mukashi, muena mudimu wanyi, binamanya mua kuheta bana kudiye Abalama wakitabusha di dia Salai
Kadi mpindiewu tudi basue kuya muaba uvua Maweja Nangila mutuleje
Mvidi Mukulu udi musue kupandisha Nowa Ndelanganyi ya Nowa idi nunku: Nowa nkayende munkatshi mua bantu ba tshikondu atshi, uvua muntu muakane, witaba Mvidi Mukulu, udisanga nende mu malu onsu
Tuetu bamane kufika mu Kadeshe Barneya, meme kunuambila ne: Tuafiki pabuipi ne mikuna ya bena Amore, idibu batupa kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu
Bakumuka mu Mala bakatua ku Elima mu Elima muakadi mpokolo ya mai dikumi ne ibidi ne mabue a ngashi makumi muanda mutekete bakashikamaku
Ndi njinga bua Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu, anuvudije kabidi, nuvulangane misangu tshinunu
Ke padibu babikila Esawu ne: Edome, mmomumue ne: mukunzubile

Hakabidikishabo ne tshihiminu, muntu wakadi usangisha bia bungi bintu kabiakashala kudiye, ne muntu wakadi usangisha bikese kakadi ne nzala, muntu ne muntu wakadisangishilabi bu muakamanyeye mudiadieye
Bintu bionso bidi bidikoka hanshi ne mafu, anyi bintu bidi bienda ne mikolo mai, kanudi bintu ebi bionso bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba, bualu bua bintu ebi bidi bibi

Bia momumwe Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa tshidi mwa kufila bukookeshi, biumukila ku dîyi, kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa bwa kweela mêyi pa mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa polovensa
Bika biebe, ubishe nsongalume, umukuate ku tshianza, bualu bua meme nemmuvuishe tshisamba tshinene
Hakukonkabo kudi muan ebe mulume ne, Mei au ne mikenji ne malu biakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bidi tshinyi
Nudi mua kudia nyunyu yonso idi miakane

Biahikula Muena Lewi nsubu, nunku nsubu wakahanabo ne musoko wa buhianyi buandi nebihingane kudibo halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, bualu bua nsubu ya mu misoko ya Bena Lewi idi buhianyi buabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Mikenji ya Mankenda Hanuaya kuluangana ne badi n enu lukuna, hashishe nudikande mu malu mabi onso

Kadi bikala tshilamulamu tshitampakane mu dikoba, hakashikisheye kudilesha kudi muakuidi bualu bua kudilengesha, nunku yeye neadileshe kudi muakuidi kabidi, muakuidi neatangile ne bikala tshilamulamu tshitampakane mu dikoba, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane disama edi didi dia nsudi
Mutuangaji alambule mulambu awu pamue ne mulambu wa bukula
Yehowa wakamujika mu tshibanda tshia buloba bua Moaba tshiakatangilangana ne Bete peô; kakuena muntu udi mumanye kudi lukita luandi tô ne ku dituku edi
Ekesode Kumanyishi bakuabo lumu ludi kaluyi lululela
Meme kuangata lupingu lua kana ka ngombe ka tshiamu, lunuvua badienzele bua bubi buenu
Bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila, udi unondapa
Mêyi maludiki adi aleeja bulongolodi bwatshi ne lwendu lwatshi
Moshe kubakonka ne: Nudi nuntandisha bua tshinyi
Muaba awu mudi mpawungi, mpawungi muimpe mutambe, kamonya ka dipembu ka mbdeliyume ne mabue a mushinga mukole a onikse kabidi
Kununganaye wamba ne: Nansha bantu bikale anu ne meji mabi biangatshile ku buana buabu, kadi tshiena ntshipa buloba kabidi bua buenzayi bua muntu
Mu ditunga dia Ejipitu nemuikale madilu adibu kabayi banji kudila musangu mukuabu ne adibu kabayi mua kudila kabidi to
Ndimba kubuela mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu ne ku mudimu wabu
Yakobe kuandamuna Esawu ne: Nanku anji kuditshipa ne: Ndi mpesha Yakobe bumuanabute buanyi
Hakadi Esau ne bidimu makumi anai, wakangata Yudita, muana mukashi wa Bêli, Muena Hiti, ne Basemata, muana mukashi wa Elone, Muena Hiti, bu bakashi bandi
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi ufila mpeta mu milongu ya ditunga ne bitadi, bu mudibio mu mêyi a ditunga
Kanuedianganyi meji a bintu bienu, bualu bua bintu bimpe bionso bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu mbienu
Kuibi
Kanuena mua kubipua muoyi musangu nansha umue to

Kanulu ne difutu dia mukashi wa masandi anji dia muntu udi bu mbua, mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kushikisha diditshiha dienu; bualu bua bubidi buabo badi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Moshe ne Arone pamue ne bena Izrayele bonsu, kukumbaja bimpe bionsu bivua Mvidi Mukulu muambe bua kuenzela bena Levi
Kunyangabu ditunga dijima ne bintu bionsu bia bena Amaleke too ne bia bena Amore bavua basombe mu Ashashone Tamare
Dibolesha diônso anyi dinyangakaja diônso didi difuma ku mianda ya bubanji didi anu difikisha ku dikumbajija ne anyi ku dilongolola
Neubamanyishe mei a Nzambi ne mikenji, neubaleshe nshila udibo ne bua kuendamu, ne mudimu udibo ne bua kuenza
Yeye wakaluhuka kudi Palo, wakalomba Yehowa
Abalahama wakamba bua Sala, mukashi wandi, ne, Yeye udi muan etu mukashi, ne Abimeleke, mukelenge wa Gelâ, wakatuma bantu, bakangata Sala
Maweja Nangila kukonka Moshe ne: Tshiudi natshi ku bianza atshi ntshinyi
Nanku Arone ne bana bende balombole bena Ngershone ku midimu eyi
Yeye wakayangata ku bianza biabo, wakayilamba mu kahia, wakayiteka ne mulolo bu kana ka ngombe, bakamba ne, Bena Isalele, ke nzambi wenu, wakanuluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Batuangaji, bana ba Arone, baye ne mashi a ngombe awu kudi Maweja Nangila
Kadi kanudi muoyo wa munyinyi wonso, mmashi mene mene
Wakaluhuka kudi Palô ne tshiji tshikole
Dîku, kazubu ka nshindameenu ka tshinsanga tshia bantu, badi badilongolola mu lungenyi lwa kujadika bumwe bwaadi, bushindame bwaadi ne bubukubi bwaadi
Mêyi a ditunga adi aleeja bulongolodi, lwendu ne makookeshi a bilumbulwilu bia beena mwabo bôbo nkayabu
Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nya, nempingane kuetu kudi bana betu
Pashishe aye ne mukoku wa tshimpanga kudi mutuangaji
bishimikidi bia mianda ya manga ne ya dinanga dia bantu;
Wakenza mabaya asambombo a kuteka ku nyima ku luseke lua ku wesete
Yehowa neabenzele bu muakenzeleye Sihona ne Oga, bakelenge ba Bena Amole, bakashiheye ne buloba buabo
Kahia bakahatuka kudi Yehowa, kakabosha, bakafua ku mpala kua Yehowa
Bakateka bintu bia kudia ku mpala kuandi, kadi yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena ndia diambedi tshiyi muanze kunuambila bualu bunakuluila Labana wakamuambila ne, Ambaku
Nudi mua kuamba muntu wa bende kasombela; kadi kanulombi mukuenu kasombela; bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, anuvudishile disanka mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza, mu buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana
Nyama yonso udi wenda ne makama udi mubi kunudi, muntu yonso udi ulenga tshianza ham bidi hai neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Kanuvua bangate bionsu bivuaye munuambile ne mushinga

Yeye wa kamba ne, Ndi Nzambi wa tatu ebe, kutshinyi bua kuya mu Ejipitu, bualu bua nenkuvuisheku tshisamba tshmene nenye n ebe mu Ejipitu, nennumusheku kabidi bulelela, Yosefe neateke bianza biandi ha mesu ebe Yakoba Wakabika ku Be sheba, bana balume ba Isalele bakatuala Yakoba tatu abo ne bana babo ne bakashi babo mu makalu akabatumma Palo
Kadi ku luende luseke, kavua mupete mukuende wa bu yeye uvua mua kumuambuluisha
Hakafikabo ku tshituilu tshia Atada, tshidi dishiya dia Yadene, bakadila muadi mukole, baka jinga tatu wandi to matuku muanda mutekete

Afile bimuna bisatu, kabiyi ne tshilema pambidi, bua kubilambula Maweja Nangila: muana wa mukoku wa tshidimu tshimue bua mulambu wa kuosha, lukungulu lua mukoku lua tshidimu tshimue bua mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu, ne mukoku wa tshimpanga wa mulambu wa bobumue
Ka kuvua kushala tshintu tshibishi nansha tshimue ku mitshi yonsu ya mu ditunga dia Ejipitu nansha pa madimi
Mikuna eyi idi dishiya dia musulu wa Yardene, dishiya dia njila udi luseke ludi diba dibuelela lua musulu, mu ditunga dia bena Kenaane badi basomba mu tshibandabanda tshia Yardene
Nenkuele lupemba, wikale tatu wa tshisamba tshinene tshia bantu
Kadi padi dikeji kadiyi ditampakana pambidi ponsu, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu awu kena mupie mikiya to

Nuangate mabeshi a hisopa, nutue mu mashi adi mu dilonga, numianune mashi ku mutshi wa ha mutu ha mushiku wa mbelu ne ku biluwa bibidi bia mushiku wa mbelu, muntu kaluhuki mu nsubu wandi tô ne ha tshia butuku

Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Wimane ha buihi ne mulambu webe wa kuosha ha kahia ne meme nengumuke, bumue Yehowa nealue kusangakena hanyi, nenkuambile malu onso adiye ungambila Yeye wakaya kulu ku muaba wakadi mutuhu

Balahanana, muana wa Akabô, wakafua ne Hada wakadia bukelenge buandi, dina dia musoko wandi ne, Pau, dina dia mukashi wandi diakadi Mahetabela, muana wa bakashi wa Mateledi, muana wa bakashi wa Mezehaba
Nealongolole mampa dituku dia lumingu ku mpala kua Yehowa ku lumingu ku lumingu, yeye nênzele Bena Isalele bualu ebu bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele
Ke bilamba bidi bileja mikalu ya lupangu ludi lunyungulula muaba wa tshijila ne tshilambuilu
Maweja Nangila kupueka mu divuba, kuimana mu mushiku wa ntenta
Maweja Nangila kuambila kabidi Moshe ne: Ndi nkupesha bukole bua kuenza bishima
Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu etu, anukumbashe tô ne hanuahita bungi buenu bua katataka misangu tshinunu, anusankishe bu muakunulayeye
Diba adi Maweja Nangila uvua uyukila ne Moshe
Kuambilaye Arone ne: Angata muana wa ngombe mulume udi kayi ne bulema, umulambule Maweja Nangila bu mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Meme Moshe mvua mubande ku mukuna bua kuangata mabue, avua ne mikenji ya ndondu wenu ne Maweja Nangila
Bena Isalele Badi Bahita Oga wa ku Bashana Bukole Dut

Kanungu ka Padiku dibenga kumvwangana dia munanunanu pankatshi pa Bukalenga bunene ne Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwaka, Mfumu wa Ditunga udi, panyima pa diyukilangana ne minisitila kavulambedi ne Balombodi ba Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa, mwa kumungutula Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita

Yeye wakabambila ne, Edi ndî diakuamba Yehowa ne, Makelela udi dituku dia kuikisha dia tshijila, dituku diakadijidila Yehowa nulambe bidia ne munyinyi binudi basue, ne bintu bionso bidi bishala, nubitekele bua kudia makelela
Bena Izrayele nebabatenteke bianza

Mose ne Alona bakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Dilolo nenumanye ne, Yehowa wakunuluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne dinda nenumone butumbi bua Yehowa, bualu bua Yehowa udi munvue munudi numujiana, tuetu tudi banganga bua nudi nutujiana

Bualu bua misoko mudi nubaha munkatshi mua Isalele, bantu badi ne misoko ya bungi, nebabahe misoko ya bungi, ne badi ne misoko mikese nebabahe misoko mikese, nebahe Bena Lewi misoko bu bungi bua buhianyi buabo
Bana balume ba Manashe Mala ne meku a Bena Mala, Mala wakalela Gilada; Gilada ne meku a Bena Gilada

Yakoba Udi Unyema Esau Esau wakadi ne Yakoba lukuna bualu bua disanka diakamusankisha n adi tatu andi Esau wakamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Hashika matuku a madilu a tatu anyi, hashishe, nenshihe muakuny anyi Yakoba
Bule bua tshilulu tshimue nebuikale coudées makumi asatu, ne butshiama bua tshi coudées mai, idikisha bilulu dikumi ne tshimue ne luidi lumue
Kadi kanukukuidi mvidie mikuabu, mvidie ya bisamba binudi nabi mutumba
Mayi awu kubutula matempu ne bavua babanda pa tubalu bia tshiluilu tshijima tshia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, tshivuabu balonda natshi bena Izrayele mu mayi
Tshimuangi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Neudimuene nkayebe mundi ngenzeja mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ku bukole bua kulekelaye bena Izrayele baye
Kubanemekabu kudi bena Ejipitu, kupetabu bintu bivuabu balomba bena Ejipitu
Abalahama wakalomba Nzambi, ne yeye wakakolesha Abimeleke ne mukashi wandi ne bena mudimu bandi ba bakashi, ne bobo bakalela bana
Padi muena disama edi musombe pa tshiseba tshia kabalu, tshiseba etshi netshikale tshipie mikiya
Mose wakahingana kudi Yehowa, wakamba ne, Bantu aba bakuenza bualu bubi bunene, bakudienzela nzambi wa or
Yuda wakambila Onana ne, Uye kudi mukashi wa mukulu ebe, umuangate bu mukashi webe, yeye nealelele mukulu ebe bana

Ku tshikondo atshi Yehowa wakajidila tshisamba tshia Lewi, bua kutualabo mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne bua kuimana ku mpala kua Yehowa bua kamuenzela mudimu, ne bua kuvudishila bantu disanka mu dina diandi, bu mudibo benza lelu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi bantu, ubajidike lelu ne makelela, bobo bauvu we bilulu biabo, badilongolole ku dituku disatu, bualu bua Yehowa neahueke ha mukuna wa Sinai ku mesu kua bantu dituku disatu
Pikale tshitupa tshinene katshiyi tshikumbana mu dieela dia tukanda dia musangu wa kumpala, badi balongolola mu tshikondo tshia matuku dikumi ne atanu, dieela dia tukanda dia musangu mwibîdi
Mashi neikale mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu too ne mu nguvu ne mu mabungu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Muntu udi ufila mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa nealue ne tshituha tshia mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala, yeye nealue ne mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia mu bianza biandi, nealue ne dianyi ne tshiadi, nebatshinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa
Baledi ba Rebeka kumuela lupemba, bamba ne: Wewe muanetu wa bakaji, Ulele balume, ulele bakaji ba bungi
Nzambi wakamuambila ne, Dina diebe nYakoba, kabakubikidi ne Yakoba kabidi, nebakubikile ne, Isalele
Nanku panudi nutendelela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, kanuenji muvua bena ditunga benza to

Bualu bua Yehowa nealumbuluile bantu bandi bilumbu biabo, neakudimune mutshima wandi bualu bua bantu bandi, hatangileye ne bukole buabo buakujimina, ne kakuena muntu udi mushale muhika anyi mudishikaminyi
Bena Izrayele kusabuka ku makasa kume
Mose wakabika ne Yoshua mukuatshishi wandi, Mose wakabanda mu mukuna wa Nzambi
Uvua ne mukajende Sarayi ne Lote muana wa muanabu ne bintu biende bionsu
Maweja Nangila kuamba mundamunda muende ne: Tshiena mua kusokoka Abrahame bualu bundi nya kuenza to, bualu ndelanganyi yende neikale tshisamba tshinene ne tshia bukole
Kadi ku bintu bionsu bidi ne masala, bikale kabidi ne mapangu anayi, nudi mua kudia anu bidi ne mikolu, bitupika
Kabidi udi uyipia matuku muanda mutekete, uyipisha ne bulalu buonsu budiye ulala
Muntu yonso utu wenza malu au, malu au mabi, udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa
Netubabutule
Ndi musue kubabutula, kabayi mua kubatela kabidi pa buloba
Ke padi mulume ushiya tatuende ne mamuende, ulamata mukajende, bua bonsu babidi bikale anu muntu umue
Wewe wakambila bantu bebe ne, Binuikala kanuyi balue ne muakuny enu, kanuena numonangana n anyi ku mesu
Kapia kujima
Yuda wakamonaku muana wa bakashi wa muena Kanana, dina diandi Shua, yeye wakamuangata, wakalala n andi
Wewe mubenge bua kubatekela, wewe mubakandike amu kubakandika, nenkunyoke bikole, mbutule bimuna biebe bionsu ne disama dikole dia tshiambu
Nanku kanuena mua kudia munyinyi wa nyama midifuile to
Bakabisha luendu luabo ku Sukota, bakashikama mu Etama, ku butshika bua tshihela
Ada wakalela Yabala, yeye wakadi nkambua wa badi bashikama mu nsubu ya ntenta ne badi ne bimuna
Nanku nuikale ne muoyi muimpe, nusombeshe mupele tshintu tshidiye ulomba
Benyi badi munkatshi muenu nebabandile ku mutu kuenu, ne nuenu nenuhuekele
Nanku, Arone neajidile bena Levi, abandambule meme Maweja Nangila pa muaba wa bena Izrayele bonsu, bua bangenzele mudimu
Muana mulume udi biandi muakuidi mu muaba wandi neabiluate matuku muanda mutekete hayeye mu ntenta wa disangisha bua kuenza mudimu mu muaba wa tshijila
Kadi, bu muvua Abimeleke kayi muanji kumubuelela mu nzubu, kuambaye ne: Akia
Muntu mukuabu kena mua kufika pabuipi nenu to
Biwahidia kubalekela, ne biwabakanda, Yehowa neateke tshianza tshiandi ha bimuna bidi mu budimi, ha tubalu ne nyama ya mpunda ne nyama ya tumelo ne ngombe ne mikoko, dishina dikole nedibikuate
Kapitene ka masalayi kakatufila mu bianza bia Yosefe, yeye wakatukuatshisha, tuakashala mu nsubu wa lukanu musangu
Miakulu yaadi ya mu ditunga idi tshikongo, dingala, tshisawudi ne tshiluba
Muntu udi kabidi mwa kudifidila mpala nkayenda kayi upitshila mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi to

Abalahama wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakasuika tshiseba ha nyima ha nyama wandi wa mpunda, wakangata bansongalume bandi babidi ne Isaka muan andi, wakahanda nkunyi ya kalua ka ha tshioshelu, wakabika, wakaya ku muaba wakamuambila Nzambi
Kadi bena Izrayele bavua bapita munkatshi mua mayi manene ku makasa kume, mayi mimane bu tshimana ku dia balume, tshikuabu ku dia bakaji
Nanku bakalenga babidi, wa Sodome ne wa Ngomore, kudishinda mu bina abi pavuabu banyema mvita

Nadaba ne Abihu bakafua ku mpala kua Yehowa, hakaluabo ne kahia kakadi kakayi kajidila ku mpala kua Yehowa, mu tshihela tshia Sinai, bobo kabakadi ne bana, ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ bakenza mudimu wa buakuidi ku mesu kua Alona tatu abo
Bantu bauvua mupatule mu Ejipitu mbenze bualu bupite bubi

Kudisongidi luhingu anyi tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu tshia mu diulu anyi tshia tshintu tshia hanshi ha buloba anyi tshia tshintu tshia mu mai adi muinshi mua buloba: kubmamina, kubitendeledi; bua meme Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ndi bianyi Nzambi wa mukau; ntu ngatumina bana ba tshihungu tshisatu anyi tshinai badi n anyi lukuna mibi ya batatu abo; ntu ngalesha bihungu tshinunu badi bansue ne badi benza mikenji yanyi luse lujalame
Nempete diakalenga bualu buebe
Ke mulambu wa dinua tshibalu
Neboshe munyinyi ku kahia butuku abu, nebaudie ne mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, nebaudie ne matamba adi ne bululu
Kadi balume babidi bakashala mu tshitudilu, dina dia umue ne Eladada ne dina dia mukuabo ne Medada
Nebabueje milonda ku tshilambuilu bua kutshiambuilaku
Yeye kabidi ke udi utangila mafuta a kuela mu miendu, musenga wa kamonya wa kuosha, bintu bia mu madimi bidibu bandambula matuku onsu, kabidi ne mafuta a tshijila
Pinganayi ku midimu yenu
Nudi nutupa ku diyi dia Maweja Nangila
Nebafue amu kufua
Mutshima wanyi kaubuedi mu tshifufu tshiabo, ne butumbi buanyi kabubuelakanyi n abo mu disangisha diabo

Kumpala kwa kubangabo mwa kuulonda, mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda badi ne tshia kuwutuma kudi Mulombodi wa tshibambalu tshieena bwaalu ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu bwa kaamba ne udi umvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu, mu tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu
Katataka binuasua kulesha mukelenge wanyi luse ne bulelela, nungambile, ne binuahidia, nungambile kabidi: nunku meme ndi mua kuya ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nengenze bualu ebu buwakuamba bualu bua wewe wakasangana luse ku mesu kuanyi, meme ndi mumanye Hina diebe
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nengikale ne bantu aba babi badi bantontolola musangu bule munyi
Yetelo wakasanka bua malu mimpe onso akenzela Yehowa Bena Isalele, bualu bua yeye wakabasungila mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu
Bobo bakabanyangana maloba a bisamba bia bantu akadi kukala kua mai manene, muntu ne muaku wandi, muntu ne muaku wandi, bu mudi meku abo ne bisamba biabo
Bu muvua Maweja Nangila mubambile, bena Izrayele kumuka bonsu pamue mu tshipela tshia Sine, benda bimana mu njila bua kuya mu Refidime
Dijika dia midimu didi dienzeka padi tshibambalu tshijikija ndongamu uvwabo batshibikidila ne bikala kabayi bapitshisha matuku makumi asatu kutwadijila ku dituku dia mbangilu wa midimu
Ndi Nzambi wa ku Betele kuwakela manyi ha mutu ha dibue, ne kuwakaditshihila kundi, bika biebe, umuka ku buloba ebu, uhingane ku buloba buakakulelabo
Bena Moaba bakatamba kutshina bantu, bualu bua bungi buabo; mitshima ya Bena Moaba yakanyingalala bualu bua Bena Isalele
Kumonaye ne bionsu bidi bimpe
Yosefe wakabumusha hankatshi ha binu biandi, wakatua mpala wandi hanshi
Tshidi ne bwikadi bufila kudi mêyi a ditunga
Yehowa Nzambi wetu nyama, bua yeye katukengeshi ne masama anyi muele wa mata
Tuye kuenza budimuke, kabalu ba bungi, halua nvita, kabayi kudi bantu badi n etu lukuna bua kuhingana n etu nvita, kabumuki mu buloba buetu

Yehowa wakela dî kudi Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Angata mulangala webe, olola tshianza tshiebe ha mutu ha mai a mu Ejipitu, ku mutu kua misulu yabo ne tusulu tuabo ne mashiba abo, mai onso akudimuke mashi, mashi neikale mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso ne mu milondo ya mitshi ne mu milondo ya mabue
Yeye wakakenzakana, wakamona Benyamina, muakuny andi, muana wa mamu wandi, wakabakonka ne, Eu udi muakuny enu unuakungambila, anyi
Bipupu abi, nebikuate anu bantu badi banukina
Yosefe wakabakonka ne, Bualu ebu bunuakuenza budi munyi
Mabue a nvula akashika bintu bionso bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu biakadi mu budimi, ne bantu ne nyama, mabue a nvula akashika midioko yonso ya mu budimi ne mitshi yonso
Bule bua dibaya dimue nebuikale coudées dikumi ne butshiama buadi nebuikale coudée umue ne tshituha
Kanusuiki ngombe ne mpunda ku mutshi wa tshikokedi umue
lupetu bwa mbulamatadi mu Ditunga;
Ke bankambua ba meku a bena Shimeyone awu

Kanungu kinâyi Badi mwa kutapulula polovensa ne bitupa bia teletwala bidikadila bipiabipia pa kukosolola anyi kusambakaja bia kale bilondeshile makanyika mafila kudi Dîyi dikulu ne kudi mêyi a ditunga
Bobo nebalame bintu biandi ne bintu bia bantu bonso ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bua kuenzelabo mudimu wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Mmunukumbajile bionsu bivuaye mulaye bankambua benu
Kadi padibu bakambila mu luesu lua tshiamu tshikunze, balukone, balusukule ne mayi a bungi
Kadi padibu basukule tshintu atshi, dikeji dishale dimueneka kakese, mutuangaji neakose anu muaba udi dikeji awu
Bialua mukuenu mundi muhele, biadihaneye kûdi, kumuenzeshi mudimu bu muhika
Neyidie bintu bionsu bivua bishale pa madimi, bivua mabue a mvula kaayi nenyange, too ne mitshi yonsu idi imena mu madimi enu
Kanuikadi ne meji mabi a ne: tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete tshia kulekelangana mabanza tshidi pabuipi
Alona udi nganyi bua nuenu nudi numutontolola
Kadi ku muana wa mukoku yonsu, wa mulambu wa kuosha nansha wa bobumue, asakidile kabidi litre umue ne tshitupa wa maluvu a mvinyo
Ditunga didi Maweja Nangila ukuba Ditunga dinudi nukuata mpindiewu, kadiena bu ditunga dia Ejipitu dinudi bumuke to
Abalama wakikala mu buloba bua Kanana, Lota wakashikama mu misoko ya mu mpata, wakashimika ntenta yandi tô ne ku Sodoma
Ndi mumanye ne: nudi ne bakaji ne bana, kabidi ne bimuna bipite bungi
Mukuna wa Sinayi uvua mufikisha kudi muinshi, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mupueke pa mukuna munkatshi mua muinshi wa kapia

Nunku nebaye ne ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshisumbu tshia Bena Lewi tshikala munkatshi mua bisumbu bikuabo bu mudibo bashikama mu bitudilu, nebaye ku mpala nunku, muntu mu muaba wandi mundi mu muaba wandi ku mabendele abo
Kumonaye ne bionsu bidi bimpe
Ei idi ndelanganyi ya Esau, nkambua wa Bena Edome ba mu mukuna wa Sei
Mishindu ya kuludika ne kupeshangana buloba bwa Mbulamatadi butedibwa mu kalongu kadianjila aka idi mifidibwa kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Mikenji eyi idi yambuluisha bua kujadika ne bintu ebi mbipie mikiya, nansha kabiena biyipia
Kadi kavua muloke mu Ngoshene to, bualu mmuaba uvua bena Izrayele basombe
Yehowa neanuluile nvita yenu, nenuikale holâ
Nanku, wewe Arone ne bana bebe ba balume, nufile muntu yonsu wa bena Kekate muaba udiye ne bua kuenza mudimu
Nenupingane mu tshipela, batangile ku Mayi manene makunze
Pashishe Rebeka ne bena mudimu bende kubanda pa tumelu

Mu bulongolodi bwenza kudi Dîyi dikulu ne kudi mêyi a ditunga, Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika kadi katangila mu tshitupa tshia kumpala ne mu tshia ndekeelu bibawu bibunda kudi: batshipwita munwamfwanka ne batshipwita bakulumpe; beena Bukalenga bunene bônso ba ditunga pa kumbusha Minisitila Kavulambedi; beena Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu; balumbulwishi ba ku Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika ne balumbulwishi ba ku palake waku; beena Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi ne beena palake mulamatshisha ku Kapangu aka; beena ku Kapangu ka mianda ya lupetu ne beena palake mulamatshisha ku Kapangu aka; balombodi ba kumpala ba Tubadi twa kabwendela ne bamfumu ba palake milamatshisha ku Tubadi etu; balombodi ba kumpala ba Tubadi twa Mbulamatadi twa kabwendela ne bamfumu ba palake milamatshisha ku Tubadi etu; banguvenêla, bindonda bia banguvenêla ba polovensa ne baminisitila ba polovensa; balombodi ba Bisangilu bia polovensa

Yeye udi udianjila kudisunguila tshituha tshiandi, bualu bua etshi ntshituha tshia mukokeshi, wakalua n atshi kudi ba ku mutu kua bantu; yeye udi ujadika dilumbulula diakane dia Yehowa, ne mikenji yandi kudi Bena Isalele
Moshe kuandamuna bena Izrayele ne: Nukoleshe muoyi
Bobo bakaha Yakoba nzambi yonso ya bende yakadibo n ai ne nkanu yakadi ku matshu abo, Yakoba wakabijika muinshi mua mutshi munene wakadi hehi ne Shekeme
Kufukaye mitotu kabidi
Nuditengule mu mitshima yenu, kanuikadi bantu ba tshitshu kabidi

Mu dituku ditanu bana balume ba ngombe tshitema ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Bena Izrayele nebase mitanda yabu muaba udi tshisumbu tshiabu tshia bena mvita, pa buipi ne dibendela diabu

Bakusesuka lubilu mu nshila unakubambila, bakulamba nkanu ya or, bakutula kana ka ngombe, bakukatendelela, bakukashihela milambu, bakuamba ne, Bena Isalele, nzambi wenu nyeu wakanuluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Kanuangatshi tshintu tshia mabuejila

Kanungu ka Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kufila mpala ku masungula a Mulombodi wa Ditunga padiye kêna mukumbaja makanyika adi alonda aa: kwikala ne bweena Kongu bwa bangabanga; kwikala ne mvula ya tshileledi kayiyi mishadile ku ; kwikala ne bujima bwa makookeshi a bumuntu ne a tshidiidi; kubenga kubwelakana mu maalu adibo babenga kudi dîyi dia masungulangana
Nebateke kabidi pa mutu pa bionsu ebi tshilamba tshifikuluke tshienza ne miosa ya nyama
Nuyilambule dilolu diba dimane kubuela, bualu ke diba dinuvua bapatuke mu Ejipitu

Pashishe mutuangaji ele bintu bionsu ebi mulu, abinyukule bua kubilambula Maweja Nangila: ke mafuta onsu adi malamate ku bia munda, tuonyi tubidi ne mafuta onsu adi malamateku, mafuta adi malamate ku mulemba, ne lutandatanda ludi ku mutshima, ludibu balamuna pamue ne tuonyi
Muana mulume wenu wa mukoko neikale muakane ne wa tshidimu tshimue nebamuangate munkatshi mua mikoko anyi mua mbushi
Wakabituma luendu lua matuku asatu hankatshi ha Labana ne Yakoba, Yakoba wakadisha bimuna bikuabo bia Labana biakashala ku nyima
Banda ku lusongu lua mukuna wa Pisga, ukenzakane nseke yonsu: ku mutu kua ditunga, kuinshi kuadi, luseke ludi diba dipatukila, ne ludidi dibuelela
Kujidila kua Ban a Bute Nenujidile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ban a bute balume ba ngombe ne ba mikoko; kanuenzeshi ban a bute ba ngombe mudimu, kanukoshi ban a bute ba mikoko miosa
Nenuikale ne mukenji umue ne dî dimue kunudi ne kudi muenyi udi munkatshi muenu
Kanungu ka Beena tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka badi ne mwânzu wa batshipwita ba ditunga
Pamona mutuangaji ne: boya bua muaba awu kabuena butokoloke, kabidi tshibangu katshiena tshiondoke, tshibangu atshi tshidi anu tshimpe, neateke muntu awu pa nkayende matuku muanda mutekete
Bana bandi bakadi ne mukalu wabo ku Hawila to ne ku Shû, ku mpala kua Ejipitu mu nshila wa ku Ashû, bakashikama batangilangane ne bana babo bonso
Muana wa masandi kabuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa; ne tunkanuniuna tuandi kaubuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa tô ne hahita bikondo dikumi

Bintu biakafileye biakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete, bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi, mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu, ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kumusha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Nashona, muana mulume wa Aminadaba
Cilunga mulwesu, cikombola cikwanga Baswa kulwata, tulwata anu momumwa, Cyètù canza colola anu wa kulomba yo yo yo
Bika biebe, va ku Padana alama ku nsubu wa Betuele tatu wa ma mu ebe wangataku mukashi wa bana bakashi ba Labana, muan abo wa balume ne mamu ebe
Genese Buhidia bua Bantu Nyoka wakatamba nyama yonso yakafuka Yehowa Nzambi bidimu
Kadi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kena mulekele bena Izrayele to, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mumupeshe muoyi wa tshitunu
Kumukaye mu ditunga adi, kuyaye mu Ashure
Bualu mudimu ewu udi mupite bukole
Witabe bionsu bidiye ukuambila
Meme nakadimusha balumbuluishi benu tshikondo atshi ne, Unvuai bilumbu bia bana benu, nulumbulule bilumbu bia muntu ne muan abo mulume ne muenyi udi n andi biakane
Ndi nkusengelela ne: ubambile ne: Abrame mmuanetu

Hamo ne muan andi Shekeme bakalua ku tshibi tshia ku musoko wabo, bakayilala ne bena musoko, bakamba ne, Balume aba badi bashikama n etu talala nunku tuitabushe bua bobo bashale mu buloba buetu bendeshangane n etu mushinga buloba budi bunene bua bobo bikalemu tuangate bana babo ba bakashi bu bakashi betu, tufile bana hetu ba bakashi budibo
Kanukunyi ntete ya mishindu ibidi mishilangane mu budimi bua tumuma tukese, anyi nebajidile bintu bionso biakadiundamu ne ntete inuakukuna ne tumuma tukese tudi mitshi ei ikuama
Gamaliele muana mulume wa Pedasu neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Manashe
Datane ne Abirame bavua bapatuke mu ntenta yabu, bimane pambelu ne bakaji babu, bana babu ne bena meku abu bonsu
Kutuadijaye kulomba Mvidi Mukulu wamba ne: Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa mfumuanyi Abrahame, lelu ndi nkusengelela ne: ungendeshe diakalenga, ukumbaje biuvua mulaye mfumuanyi Abrahame
Nanku nemmuenzeje malu ku bukole
Hashishe nebâteke dina dianyi ha Bena Isalele, meme nembavudishile disanka
Yehowa wakahueka mu dî ditu, wakasomba n andi, wakangata tshituha tshia Nyuma wakadiye n andi, wakamuteka kudi bakulu makumi muanda mutekete, hashishe hakalua
Bikalabo babakibue kudi balume ba mu tshisamba tshikuabo tshia Bena Isalele, nunku nebanyeme buhianyi buabo ku buhianyi bua batatu etu, nebabusangishe ku buhianyi bua tshisamba tshiakayabo
Kuambulaye dianza dia bukula, kuboshila Mvidi Mukulu pa tshilambuilu
Ke mumvua munuambile diyi dia Maweja Nangila ne: bintu ebi nebabidie amu kudi Arone ne bana bende ba balume

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu edi, dîyi didi difila ngenyi miludiki mishindame idi itangila: a buludiki budikadila bwa polovensa ne bwa bitupa bia teletwale bidikadila, bwa makookeshi abio ne bwa mishimi ya mpetu yabi; b diasa dia kumpanyi,nzubu ne bishimikidi bia mbulamatadi; c bulongolodi bwa maalu a malaba, a majimba, a meetu ne a nzubu; d diambulwishangana ne dilamisha dia lupetu; e bilongelu ne bukola bwa mubidi; f bulongolodi bwa nzubu ya lukanu: g tshibûngi tshia tshidiidi ne tshia diakwila dia beena mudimu; h bukookeshi bwa kwimanyika mudimu; i bulongolodi bwa ditangalaja dia ngumu; j dikebulula dia mamanya ne dia bia kwenza nabi mudimu; k didisanga dia basumbi, basumbishi anyi bapatudi; l mianda ya dikolesha dia lungenyi ne ya difuka dia bintu; m mianda ya manayi ne lutetuku; n mianda ya madimi, ya bumunyi bwa nyama, ya bulobi bwa mishipa ne ya bumunyi bwa bia mu mâyi; o dikuba dia mwaba wa nsombelu ne dibandila dia ditunga ne bintu; p dikuba dia bisumbu bia beena butekete
Hakaluabo ku Mala kabakamanya mua kunua mai a Mala, mai akadi ne bululu, nunku balodiha muaba au ne, Mala
Nuangate mulonda, numutubule ditshi, bua ashale mupika wenu too ne ku lufu luende
Maweja Nangila kukonka Kayine ne: Muanenu Ebele udi penyi
Umupeshe kabidi ne maluvu a mvinyo
Aba mbantu badi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu edi, mishindu ya Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa ya kumanyisha ne ya kulondolola Bukalenga bunene, kumpanyi ya Mbulamatadi, nzubu ne midimu ya Mbulamatadi idi: a lukonko lwa mukana anyi lwa pa dibeji kwikala anyi kakuyi dikokangana, kabayi balulondeshisha kudi dieela dia tukanda; b lukonko lwa pa mianda ya lelu; c dieebeja dia diumvwija; d dituma dia bantu bwa kutangilula; e diteelejibwa kudi tusumbu tukese

Mu makanyika mafila kudi mêyi a ditunga, bidi biambulwisha, mu dîba dia ditalala, ku ditantshisha dia bubanji, dia nsombelu wa bantu ne dia bunkambwa pamwe ne ku dikuba dia bantu ne bintu biaabo Kanungu ka Bilwilu bidi bia ditunga dijima
Bakatula tshiamu tshia or to ku muhimbu mukese, bakenza nshinga ya or, bakatshikuma ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzu ne bua lin kudi bantu ba lungenyi lule
Dielulula Nukumbaje mikenji yonsu indi munuambile eyi
Muaba onsu udi muntu awu usomba, nansha bulalu budiye ulala, bidi anu bipia mikiya
Nuenu nenudie bidia bia disanka ku mesu kuanyi misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Utangile hanshi mu muaba webe wa tshijila mu diulu, uvudishile bantu bebe ba Isalele disanka, ne buloba buwakutuha, bu muwakalaya bankambua betu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Bualu bua bintu biabo biakatamba bia bungi kabakamanya mua kushikama kaba kamue, ne buloba buakadibo bashikame buakadi bukese bualu bua bungi bua bimuna biabo
Yeye kungandamuna ne: Ndi muana wa Betuyele, ne kabidi muikulu wa Nahore ne Milka
Ke mena a bamfumu ba meku bavuabu basungule balombodi ba bena mvita ba mu bena Izrayele
Helabo mpungi umue, bakelenge ne bantu ba ku mutu kua binunu bia Bena Isalele nebadisangishe kûdi
Adame ne Eva kulela muana we balume mukuabu
Nyama yonso idi ne mikono mihanduluke ne idi kayiyi mihingishilula bintu mukana udi mubi kunudi, muntu yonso udi ulenga tshianza ham bidi hai neikale ne bukoya
Ndelanganyi ayi kayivua misombe muaba umue ne ndelanganyi mikuabu ya Abrahame to

Kadi pikala mulume mukuabu mukubuelele mu nzubu, wewe mudinyange, mudinge bayebe, Maweja Nangila akunyoke, ushale nkumba, upeta difu dia munana, bua ushale tshilejilu kudi bantu bonsu, bua batshipangane, batela dina diebe
Biangatshile ku dituku dia kumpala too ne ku dituku dia muanda mutekete, muntu yonsu udi udia mampa mela buanga, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele

Bakasemena ha buihi ne mulami wa nsubu wa Yosefe, bakayikila n andi ku tshibi tshia nsubu, bakamba ne, Mukelenge wetu, tuakalua kunoko diambedi bua kusumba bia kudia, ne hatuakafika ku nsubu wa tshilala benyi, tuakasulula bibombi bietu, tuakamona argent yetu yonso munda mua tshibombi tshia muntu ne muntu, tuakulua n ai kabidi mu tshianza tshietu
Wakaladika tshiamu tshia or ha mutu ha mesa ne ku matengu onso kabidi
Hakamanya muntu ne, Tshiena mumuhite bukole wakalenga tshianza ha tshikundukundu tshiandi ne tshikundukundu tshia Yakoba tshiakakoyoboka hakadiye uluangana n andi bibula
; Mfumu wa bena Zebulone: ke Eliyabe, muana wa Elone, ne bantu bende
Nuenu nutumikile, nuenze mei onso anakunuambila; kanutentekashi dî dikuabo ha mutu ha mei au, kanûmushi dî ku mei au
Kudi mvidie ukadi mupatule tshisamba tshia bantu bende mu bupika, muleje bumfumu buende, ne bukole buende, bu munuvua nuenu badimuene anyi
Ungambile, difutu diebe nedikale tshinyi

Bakenza nunku, Alona wakolola tshianza tshiandi ne mulangala wandi, wakakuma dinfuenkenya dia buloba ne nkusu yakadi kudi bantu ne kudi nyama, dinfuenkenya dionso dia ha buloba diakakudimuka nkusu mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Muntu kangatshi mabue adibo bahela n au manvua, anyi dibue dia mpelu bu tshieya; bualu bua budi bu muntu udi ufila muoyo wandi bu tshieya
Mitshi ai neyikale mu nkanu ya mushete, kayumuki nansha
Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga tshidi kabidi mwa kutalula bujitu bwa muntu kansanga udi mu Bukalenga bunene pa ditabija dia mukanda wa didiombola
Pashishe nyama kayena mua kushipa muntu to, tshianana meme nenyishipeshe kabidi
Tuetu kubutula misoku eyi ne bantu bonsu ba wamu, balume, bakaji ne bana, anu bu mutuvua benze mu ditunga dia Sihone, mukalenga wa Eshebone
Witabe diyi dianyi, wikale muntu muakane
Mitshima yenu kayinyingaladi, kanukuatshiki tshiji bualu bua nuenu nuakumpana kunoko; bualu bua Nzambi wakantumina ku mpala kuenu bua kusungila mioyo ya bantu
Kabidi bimuna bienu kabienji mudimu to
Bakanua, bakasanka n andi
Kadi Yehowa wakangunvuila musangu eu kabidi
Kuenzekabi nanku
Yehowa wakumpa mabue au abidi akadi mafunda ne munu wa Nzambi; akadi mafundahu mei onso akanuambila Yehowa ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia mu dituku dia disangisha dietu
Genese Yosefe Udi Ujinguluila Bena Lukanu Bilota Biabo Hakashika malu au, mutuadi wa maluvu wa mukelenge wa Ejipitu ne mulambi wa bidia biandi bakafikisha mukelenge wabo wa Ejipitu munda
Bakenza tukanu tua or tuakadi tuhindakana bu muonshi
Nunku Yakoba wakaha Esau bidia ne tshiteku, yeye wakadia, wakanua, wakabika, wakaya, nunku Esau wakahatula bintu bia buan a bute
Ke muvua mena a bana ba balume dikumi ne babidi ba Ismayele nanku
Kanudi mashi, nuahongolole ha buloba bu mai
Nenuikale ne disanka mu misoko yenu, nenuikale ne disanka mu madimi enu
Yehowa Nzambi wakambila mukashi ne, Bualu ebu buwakuenza budi tshinyi
Bobo nebadie bintu abi bidibo babuikidila n abi bantu mibi yabo, bua kubajidila ne kubalengesha kudi Yehowa, kadi muenyi kena mua kudia bintu ebi, bualu bua bidi bia tshijila
Tshibanda tshia Sidima tshiakadi tshiule tente ne bina bia bitume ne bakelenge ba Sodoma ne Amola bakanyema, bakahonamu, bakuabo bakashala bakanyemena ku mukuna
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mona, nennulokeshile bidia bia mu diulu, bantu nebaye, nebabisangishe ku dituku bikumbane ku dituku bikumbane
Ndi mumusungule bua alongeshe bana bende ne ndelanganyi yende mikenji yanyi, bua babikumbaje bikale bantu bakane
Tunkanunuina tua Tela Ei idi ndelanganyi ya tunkanunuina tua Tela
Wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ha mutu hatshi ne ku nseke yatshi ne ku nsengu yatshi, wakenza tshintu tshia or ku matengu onso
Nengele bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba lupemba bualu buebe
Kadi mpindiewu, mmunusungule nuenu, ndelanganyi yabu, munkatshi mua bisamba bionsu, munudi bamone emu
Nanku nuenu bena Izrayele bonsu, bana benu, bena mudimu benu, bena Levi, benyi banudi nabu, bana ba nshiya, ne bakaji bakamba badi munkatshi muenu, nusanke bua tshibilu etshi
Muntu udi udia munyinyi wa nyama awu, nansha yeye musukule bilamba biende, udi amu upia mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Kushihianganyi
Kubala muan abo ne mukashi ebe, bua kumutatshisha hatshidiye ne muoyo ne kumuvula bilulu
Batuangaji bamiamine mashi awu ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Ludi ne bule bua metre anayi ne tshitupa, butshiama bua metre abidi
Mvidi Mukulu mmufike bua kunuteta, bua numutshine, nulekele buenzayi
Pashishe kufuaye
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi mwa kuselangana ne muntu ônso udiye musungula; wa bulume anyi bukaji bushilangana ne bwende,ne udi mwa kwaasa dîku

Bakabisha luendu luabo mu Lamesese mu dituku dia dikumi ne atanu dia ngondo wa kumudilu, ku nyima kua dituku dia kuhita kua Yehowa Bena Isalele bakumuka ku mesu kua Bena Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole, hakadi Bena Ejipitu bajika ban a bute bakashihabo kudi Yehowa munkatshi muabo Yehowa wakalumbuluisha nzambi yabo kabidi
Nenufundehu mikenji ei hanuasabuka; nunku nenubuele mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, munulaye
Tshisamba tshia Efrayime, muana wa Yozefe:
Munyinyi wa mafuta onsu awu, ke udi mutuangaji umusha kabidi padiye ulambula milambu ya bobumue
Nunku bakamuidika dina ne Pelese Ne ku nyima muan abo wakadi ne muonshi mukunze musuika ku tshianza tshiandi wakahatuka, bakamuidika dina ne, Zela
Lewitiki Kujidila kua Alona ne Bana Bandi Balume Ek

Yehowa wakangambila ne, Kumutshinyi nansha; bualu bua nakumufila ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buandi mu tshianza tshiebe; wewe neumuenzele yeye bu mu wakenzela Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi ushikama mu Heshebona
Aba mbana balume ba Dana ku meku abo: Shuhama ne Bena Shuhama
Alona nealue ne bintu ebi mu muaba wa tshijila ne muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne tshimpanga tshia mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Kadi nebambenge too ne ku diba kaayi
Kadi pikalaye kayi mumanye bualu, kayi mudinyange, mayi a bululu aa kaena amuenzela bualu to
Ekesode Mikenji Dikumi Dut
Kanungu ka Badi basungula tshipwita mukulumpa bwa tshipungu tshia mvula itaanu
Mutuangaji oshe bionsu ebi pa tshilambuilu

Dishiya dia Yadene mu buloba bua Moaba, Mose wakabanga kubamanyisha bua mikenji ne, Yehowa Nzambi wetu wakatuambila mu Holeba ne, Nuakumana kushikama musangu mule mu mukuna eu: bishai luendu luenu, yai bienu ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, ne ku miaba yonso idi hehi n abo mu Alabâ ne mu mikuna ne mu bibanda, ne mu luseke lua ku Sude, ne hehi ne muelelu wa mai manene, mu buloba bua Bena Kanâna ne mu Lebanona tô ne ku musulu munene dina diau Pelata
Esau wakamuebesha ne, Tshisumbu atshi tshinene tshmakusangakena n atshi mu nshila ntshia bualu kai
Hakatangila bantu bonso ne Alona wakafua, Bena Isalele bonso bakamujinga tô matuku makumi asatu
Nunku kanuena nuona buloba bunudi nushikamamu, bualu bua mashi adi ona buloba, kabena bamanye mua kuhikula buloba hakamata mashi, anu ku mashi a muntu wakamatshisha mashi
Bana ba Yakoba Kul
Nenuhatuke dituku edi mu ngondo wa Abiba
Palô wakabikila bena meji ne bena muhongo ne bena bilengulengu ba mu Ejipitu, bakenza muomumue ne manga abo

Mose wakadi ushimika ntenta ku butshika bua tshitudilu, wakamubikila ne, Ntenta wa kusambakena Muntu yonso wakasua kukeba Yehowa wakaluhuka mu tshitudilu bua kuya ku ntenta wa kusambakena, wakadi ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Moshe kumuandamuna ne: Pangumuka mu musoku emu, nengele bianza mulu kudi Maweja Nangila bua mvula wa makubakuba ne mabue akamuke

Dinda adi mutshima wandi wakabanga kubungama, wakatuma dî, Wakabikila bena majimbu ne bena meji bonso ba mu Ejipitu, Palô wakabamanyisha bilota biandi, kadi nansha umue wabo wakamanya mua kujinguluila Palô bilota biandi
Budi bumanyisha Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne batshipwita bakulumpa
Kadi pavuaye utshiumusha, tshivua tshitokesha bu busu bua ndanda kudi disama dia nsudi
Bikala tshintu atshi ha bulalu buakadiye anyi ha tshintu tshiakashikameye hakatshilengeye, yeye neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo

Yehowa neahite bua kushiha Bena Ejipitu, hamoneye mashi ku mutshi wa ha mushiku wa mbelu ne ku biluwa bia mushiku wa nsubu, neaye biandi ha mutu ha tshibi, neahite, Yehowa neahidishe mushiku ne, Kayi mu nsubu yenu bua kunushiha
Bantu bavua bamba ne: muaba ewu ngua bena Refayime, bualu bobu ke bavua basemu bangabanga
Diba adi, nuebejangane, nulondakajangane bimpe bua kujadika ne: bualu ebu mbulelela anyi

Mukanda mufila ku dijooja dia tshiakabidi badi bawanyisha kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa anyi mu mushindu wawu wa ku tshibangilu, anyi panyima pa diwushintulula dilomba kudi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beena Tshibambalu etshi
Yeye wakadi ne tshiji tshikole nunku munyi
Monai, di dia Yehowa diakalua kudiye ne, Muntu eu kena wikala muhianyi wa bintu biebe nansha, kadi yeye uwalela nkayebe neikale muhianyi wa bintu biebe
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi asambombo ne bibidi ne nkama muanda mutekete
Ke Moshe kuangata mafuta a tshijila, kualaba ku ntenta wa kusambakena ne ku bintu bionsu bivuamu
Nebabutuke bonsu
Hashishe Abimeleke Wakabikila Abalahama, wakamukonka ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi tshinyi
Bavua base tshimenga tshia Ebrone, bidimu muanda mutekete bangabanga ne kuasa tshimenga tshia Tanise mu Ejipitu
Nanku bena Izrayele kumusha bantu bonsu abu mu mitanda yabu
Tshiena mua kuitaba bua nuye ne bakaji ne bana to, bualu nudi nuleja patoke munudi ne meji makuabu mabi munda muenu
Bintu abi nebishale biebe ne bia ndelanganyi yebe kashidi
Hakalela Nahô Tela, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne dikumi ne tshitema, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Pashishe kumpeshaye mabue awu
Kadi ndi ngitaba biudi ulomba bua Ismayele

Dutelonone Mose Udi Ubavuluisha Dî Diaka balaya Yehowa ku Holeba Â mmei akambila Mose Bena Isalele dishiya dia Yadene mu tshihela mu Alabâ tshitangilangane ne Sufa, hankatshi ha Palana ne Tofele ne Labana ne Heselota ne Dizababa
Kubalejabu kabidi bimuma bia mu ditunga adi

Muakuidi neabifile kudi Yehowa, neafile mulambu wandi wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia neafile tshimpanga bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa ne tshisaka tshia mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, muakuidi neafile kabidi mulambu wa bukula ne mulambu wa bintu bia kunua
Nanku mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu uvua anu ne tshitunu
Kadi biwokala kuyi wenza bimpe, bualu bubi budi bualamina ku mbelu kuebe, mutshima wa bubi newikale kudi, kadi wewe ubukokeshe
Wakabandisha mesu andi, wakamona dina dia mai mu budimi ne bisumbu bia mikoko bisatu biakadi bilalaku, bualu bua bakadi banuishaku mikoko, ne dibue dinene diakadi ku mushiku wa dina dia mai
Nungenzele meme Maweja Nangila tshibilu
Nanku, minyinyi yonsu ya mu mayi idi kayiyi ne misalala nansha ne mamba, kanuena mua kuyidia to
Ke kumiaminaye kabidi mashi avua mashale ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Merari uvua mulele bana ba balume babidi: Mali ne Mushi
Abalahama wakakuna mutshi ku Be sheba, wakabikilaku dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Kashidi
Wewe neubale bungi bua bintu kudi mundi mulume udi ne bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ku bi dimu makumi asambombo bu nshekele ya argent makumi atanu bu nshekele udibo bafila mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Midimu ya pa bwayi idi ijika padi mianda ya kutangila ijika
Kanungu ka Badi batwa Mêyi tshitampi tshia mbulamatadi ne baapatula mu tshibejibeji tshia mbulamatadi
Nuenu kabidi nulelangane, nukumbane, nuvulangane ba bungi ha buloba, nukumbanehu

Bakenza nkanu yonso ya makunshi ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, kadi bitubuidi bia makunshi biakadi bia tshiamu tshia argent, wakalengesha mitu ya makunshi onso ne tshiamu tshia argent, ne makunshi onso a luhangu akadi malengesha ne tshiamu tshia argent
Dutelonone Lufu lua Mose Mose wakaya ku mpata ya Moaba ku mukuna wa Nebo, ku mutu kua Pisega, kuakadi kutangilangana ne Yeleko

Numanye bienu ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi mene; Nzambi utu walamata dî diandi, utu watumikila tshihungidi tshiandi ne luse luandi kudi bantu badi bamusue ne batu batumikila mikenji yandi tô ne ku bihungu tshinunu; utu wafuta bantu badi n andi lukuna difutu diabo ku mesu kuabo, bua kubashiha: yeye kena uhanga muntu udi n andi lukuna, neamufute ku mesu kuandi
Ekesode Kujidila kua Ban a Bute Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Unjidile ban a bute bonso ba Bena Isalele, bonso badianjile kuledibua, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, bobo mbanyi
Biwalua ne mulambu wa bintu bia kumudilu binudi nuhuola kudi Yehowa, nufile bintu bidi mu miehu biosha mu kahia, miehu mihia mihia idibo ba tua diambedi
Belâma wakambila mpunda ne, Bualu bua wewe wakansekesha, bu meme muikale ne muele wa nvita mu tshianza, nakadi kukushiya
Nanku, kanubatshinyi to, bualu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu neanuluile mvita ayi
Bikala nsuki ya muntu ya ku mpala nubike, ne bikala mpala wandi ne dibala, yeye udi muakane

Binuateleja matshu bimpe ku mikenji inakunuambila lelu, bua kusua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne kungenzela mudimu ne mitshima yenu yonso ne muoyo wenu wonso, hashishe nentume nvula ha buloba buenu mu tshidimu tshia nvula, ne nvula ya mbedi ne nvula ya ku nyima; nenumanye mua kuhuola manvua enu ne kukama nvinyo mihia mihia ne manyi enu
Nanku, Moshe kuangata matempu ne ngombe, kubiabanyina bena Levi
Nenyipatule pambelu, nuenze nayi bu munudi basue
Meme Yehowa nakuamba, nengenzele bantu aba bonso badi bampidia nunku, nebajimine mu tshihela etshi, nebafuemu
Tuakamuandamuna di ne, Tuakulota bilota, ne kakuena muntu udi mua kutujinguluilabi
Agare kuimita difu
Kanutendeledi mvidie mikuabu to
Butumbi bua Yehowa buakikala ha mukuna wa Sinai, ne difutu diakaubuikila matuku asambombo Dituku dia muanda mutekete yeye wakabikila Mose munkatshi mua ditutu
Kuvudi mukashi wa muan enu mulume bilulu, yeye udi mukashi wa mua n enu mulume
Kumujikabu
Bantu bakalua kudi Mose, bakamba ne, Tuakuenza bibi bualu bua tuetu tuakujiana Yehowa ne wewe kabidi, ulombe Yehowa atumushile nyoka munkatshi muetu Mose wakalombela bantu Nzambi
Uteke nsonga ibidi ya tukanu tuhindakasha ku bilulu bia efoda bidi ha maha, ku mpala kuabi
Diambedi nuakadi bungi bua mitoto ya mu diulu kadi nenushale anu banya banya, bualu bua kanuakunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bia momumwe, tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa katshieena mwa kweela mêyi pa mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa polovensa to

Bikaleye kayi ne mushinga wa nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi anyi mputu nyunyu ibidi, yeye neafile tshituha tshia dikumi tshia épha wa bukula bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, kedihu nansha manyi nansha musenga wa manananshi, eu mmulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu
Pikalaye wa balume numushipe, pikalaye wa bakaji numulekele ne muoyi
Muntu yonsu kabidi neamuluishe
Yeye wakamba ne, Dina dia Yakoba kadiena dimukumbane, anyi
Nupingane kunu ne bimuma bia mu ditunga adi
dipangadika dia bingenyingenyi, ndongamu ne diumvwangana bwa kwambulwishangana mu mianda ya bubanji, ya dikolesha dia ngenyi, ya mamanya ne ya majinga a bantu pankatshi pa matunga;
Bakumuka mu Alamona dibelatayima, bakashikama mu mikuna ya Abalama, mitangilangane ne Mukuna wa Nebo
Arone kukumbaja bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Bualu Maweja Nangila uvua musue kusungidila Lote
Musambu wa Mose Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bonso mei a musambu eu mu matshu abo, tô ne hakashikisheye
Bimenga biabu bidi binene
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubikila Moshe ne Arone
Bikala disama dishale mu tshilulu nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama anyi mu tshintu tshia tshiseba, disama edi didi ditampakana, neboshe tshintu atshi mu kahia
Kadi, tshidi ne mikiya too ne ku dilolu, pashishe mikiya idi ijika
Angatai bisumbu bia mikoko ne bia ngombe, bu munuakamba, yai bienu, nunvudishe disanka kabidi
Aba mbana balume ba Shutela: Elana ne meku a Bena Elana
Mvidi Mukulu kubiteka mu tshibuashibuashi bua bitokeshe pa buloba, diba ditokesha mu munya, ngondu ukenkesha butuku
Padibo babenga mukanda wa ditangilula nansha wa didiombola, bavwa bawutwa tshiâla badi mwa kulongolola mukanda mukwabo munkatshi mwa midimu imwe ayi
Abrame umvua ne: mbakuate Lote, muana wa muanetu, kubikilaye biende bilobu nkama isatu dikumi ne muanda mukulu, bia mu diku diende
Ndelanganyi ya Dedane ivua nunku: Bena Ashure, bena Letushe, ne bena Leyume

Katataka nudikonke munda bua matuku adi ku nyima akadi ku mpala kuenu, katshia Nzambi wafuka bantu ha buloba, ne ku luseke lumue lua diulu tô ne ku luseke lukuabo ne, Bikalaku bualu bunene nunku, anyi bikalabo bunvue lumu lua bualu bua nunku
Nuenu ke badi Maweja Nangila musungule, bua nuikale tshisamba tshiende tshisunguluke munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabu bionsu bia pa buloba
Hakatangila Lea ne, Tshiena ndela bana kabidi, yeye wakangata Zilepa, muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi, wakamufila kudi Yakoba bu mukashi wandi
Ufike nabu ku ntenta wa kusambakena
Mikalu ya polovensa ne ya tshimenga tshia Kinshasa badi bayikosa kudi dîyi dilongolodi
Tshianza kushala muatshi mua kale katshiyi ne disama dia nsudi to

Au mmena a bakelenge aba: wa tshisamba tshia Yuda, Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune; wa tshisamba tshia Shimeona, Shemuele, muana mulume wa Amihuda, wa tshisamba tshia Benyamina, Elidada, muana mulume wa Kiliona, wa tshisamba tshia Dana, Buki, muana mulume wa Yogeli, wa tshisamba tshia Yosefe tshisamba tshia Manashe, Haniele, muana mulume wa Efoda, wa tshisamba tshia Efelayima, Kemuele, muana mulume wa Shifetana, wa tshisamba tshia Zebuluna, Elisafana, muana mulume wa Pânaka, wa tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, Palatiele, muana mulume wa Azana, wa tshisamba tshia Ashê, Ahihuda, muana mulume wa Shelomi, wa tshisamba tshia Nafatale, Pedahele, muana mulume wa Amihuda

Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne wa mulambu wa bukula ne wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne wa mulambu wa kusambuka kua mikenji, ne wa tshijila tshia bakuidi, ne wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala, wakambila Yehowa Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai mu dituku diakeleye mukenji wandi kudi Bena Isalele bua kufilabo milambu yabo kudi Yehowa mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Kadi nsubu ya mu misoko idi kayiyi minyungulula ne lumbu neyikale ne madimi, nudi mua kuyihikula, ne bena nsubu nebahingane halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Kabidi bantu bakuabu nebapete diakalenga kuudi
Bobo kabakamanya ne, Yosefe wakadi ujingulula mei akadibo bambilangana, bualu bua muandamunyi wa miaku wakadiku
Balombodi ba bena Izrayele bateke bianza pa mutu wa ngombe awu
Miehu mikese yakamina miehu yakadi miakane
Sungula luseke luudi musue

Mose wakamba ne, Etshi ntshintu tshiakuamba Yehowa ne, Nushale ne tshihiminu tshia bintu ebi tô ne ku bikondo bienu bionso, bua nuenu numone bidia binakanudisha n abi mu tshihela, hanakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Nungashile tshishihelu tshia buloba, nufile ha mutu hatshi milambu ya kuosha, ne milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, ne mikoko yenu ne ngombe yenu, ku miaba yonso kundi nnuvuluisha dina dianyi, nendue kunudi, nennusankishe

Kabakanji kutangila bunene buandi ne tshianza tshiandi tshia bukole, ne diboko diandi diolola, ne bimanyinu biandi, ne midimu yandi biakanuenzeleye mu Ejipitu kudi Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, ne ku buloba buandi buonso
Wakamba ne, Bialua Esau ku tshisumbu tshimue bua kutshishiha, tshisumbu tshikuabo netshihanduke
Kadi nebapete tshia dikumi tshia bintu bidi bena Izrayele ne bua kundambula
Kabidi munyinyi awu nudie ujike dituku dimue
Bidi mutuangaji wangata Padi muntu ufila nyama wa mulambu wa kuosha, tshiseba tshia nyama awu, tshishale amu tshia mutuangaji uvua mulambule mulambu awu
Pa kabundubundu batumibue abu kusamina Lote, bamba ne: Jukayi lukasa, angata mukajebe ne bana bebe ba bakaji babidi
Kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete kanuakubipeta to, bualu ndituku dia kuikisha
Kabuena nunku ne, Wewe uyaya n etu, ne tuetu, meme ne bantu bebe, netuikale bu bantu badi bahanduluka kudi bisamba bionso bia bantu badi hanshi ha buloba, anyi
Bantu ba mu tshisamba tshia Ashe nebashikame hehi n andi Pagiele muana mulume wa Okelana neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Ashe
Nuenu nuambile tatu wanyi bua butumbi buonso bundi n abu mu Ejipitu, ne bua malu onso anuakumona, nuhingane ne tatu wanyi kunoko lubilu
Balaka Wakenza muakamba Belâma, wakosha ngombe ne tshimpanga ku tshioshelu ne ku tshioshelu
Lebeka wakadi ne muan abo wa balume dina diandi Labana, Labana wakaya lubilu kudi mulume wakadi ku mushimi wa mai
Kena mua kunua maluvu a buanji, kena mua kunua mayi a tumuma tua mvinyo, kena mua kudia tumuma tua mvinyo tubishi, nansha tume
Ke mushindu udiye ujikija mikiya ku nzubu nanku
Wewe Kora ne bonsu banudi nabu, nuangate mbabula
Nunku nubueshe mei â munda mua mitshima yenu ne muoyo wenu; nuasuika ku tshianza tshienu bu tshimanymu ne hankatshi ha makiki enu
Nuele meji ku bionsu bivua bienzeka pa buloba bujima
Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi upatula mêyi bilondeshila makanyika adibo balongolola kudi Dîyi dikulu dia mpindiewu

Bu Nzambi wa tatu anyi, Nzambi wa Abalahama, ne ditshina dia Isaka kabiyi bikale n anyi, wewe wakadi kuntuma ne bianza bituhu bulelela Nzambi wakutangila dikenga dianyi ne mudimu wa bianza bianyi, ne yeye wakukubela butuku bua lelu
Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Wewe ne bana bebe balume, kanunu nvinyo ne bintu bikole bia kunua hanuahuola mu ntenta wa kusambakena bua kanufu bienu

Yeye neatangile hadi disama, ne biamueneka disama mu bimanu bia nsubu milongo mifike ne milongo mikunze, ne bielanganeye meji ne bintu ebi biakubuela munda mua tshimanu mene mene, muakuidi neahatuke ku mushiku wa mbelu wa nsubu, neinshile bibi bia nsubu matuku muanda mutekete
Kubengaye diyi dia Moshe ne Arone bu mu vua Maweja Nangila mudianjile kuamba

Yuda wakambila Isalele tatu andi ne, Utume nsongalume n anyi, netubike, netuye, bua betu ne wewe ne bana hetu bakese bikale ne muoyo, katufu Meme nendieyeke kudiye bu tshieya mu muaba wandi, udi mua kumusombuela ku tshianza tshianyi binahanga kuhingana n andi kudi ne kumuteka ku mpala kuebe hashishe nendibadile bujitu ebu tshiendelele; bu tuetu katuyi bajanguluke nunku, tuakadi mua kuhingana kunoko tshiakabidi
Yeye wakamba ne, Wewe kuena mua kumona mpala wanyi; bualu bua muntu kena mua kumona mpala wanyi ne kuikala ne muoyo
Dilolo nenuambe ne, Tudi basue butuku butshie bualu bua buowa budi bunukuata mu mitshima yenu, ne bua malu anudi batangila ku mesu
Kupeshaye kabidi bena Merari, matempu anayi ne ngomba muanda mukulu, bua mudimu udibu benza ku bulombodi bua Itamare, muana wa Arone
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ndi muan ebe, muan a bute Esau
Nzambi wa kashidi udi muaba webe wa kushikama talalâ, ne maboko andi a tshiendelele atu akubisha: yeye wakihata bena lukuna ku mesu kuebe, ne yeye wakamba ne, Bashihai
Hanukonka bana benu ne, Nudi nuenzela tshilele etshi tshinyi
Hashishe bakahanda bilulu biabo, bakahingasha majitu ha nyima ha mpunda yabo, bakahingana mu musoko
Mifundu yaadi mmienza ne mutu wa nkashama mweela munkatshi, ku dia bakaji ne ku dia balume kudi mubanga wa kapumbu ne difuma,biônso biteeka pa dibwe
Nenulongolole nshila, nenutahulule mikalu ya buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi bituha bisatu, bua mushihianganyi yonso anyemenemu
O, nakadi kusua bua mutshima eu wikale munda muabo, bua kuntshina ne bua kuenza mikenji yanyi yonso matuku onso, ne bobo bikale ne dikasa dimpe, ne bana babo badi balonda ku nyima tshiendelele
Kakuena muntu ukadi mumvue Mvidi Mukulu wa muoyi wakula munkatshi mua kapia, bu mutudi tuetu bena Izrayele bumvue, kushalaye ne muoyi
Nzambi wakambila Belâma butuku ne, Bialua balume aba bua kukubikila, ubike biebe, uye habo, kadi wenze biebe anu dî dinakuambila

Nomba Badi Bakuatshisha Bakuidi ne Bena Lewi Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Wewe ne bana bebe balume ne ba mu nsubu wa ba tatu ebe nenutuale mahambuka a ku buakane a bantu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, wewe ne bana bebe balume nenutuale mahambuka a mudimu wenu wa buakuidi
Numanye ne: idi ne mikiya
Bimuna bia bena Levi kabidi nebikale bianyi meme, pa muaba wa bamuanabute ba bimuna bia bena Izrayele
Yeye neabake mukashi utshidi kamama
Pawafika kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, wenze bishima bionsu bindi mukuleje
Utusumbe bietu ne buloba buetu kabidi ku bia kudia ne tuetu ne buloba buetu netuikale bahika ba Palo, utuhe bia kudia, tuikale ne muoyo, katufu, ne buloba kabushadi hatuhu
Tshikuabu kupeshaye bayende, awu pende kudia
Mukashi wakambila nyoka ne, Tudi mua kudia mamuma a mitshi yonso idi mu budimi, kadi mamuma a mutshi udi munkatshi mua budimi, Nzambi wakamba ne, Kanuadi, kanualengi, bua kanufu
Yehowa wakakolesha mutshima wa Palô, yeye kakabunvuila, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Yeye neamukuate ku mahuahua andi, neamuhande hankatshi, kadi kahanduludi bituha bibidi nansha, ne muakuidi neamuoshile ha tshioshelu, ha nkunyi idi mu kahia bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Kadi katataka biwasua kubabuikidila bubi buabo, kadi biwikala kuyi musue, ndi nkusengelela ne, Unjimishe mu mukanda webe uwakufunda

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wangate Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, udi ne Nyuma munda muandi, utentekashe tshianza tshiebe ha mutu n andi, umushikike ku mpala kua Eleazâ muakuidi ne ku mpala kua bantu bonso, umuambile dî ku mesu kuabo
Amu Yozefe uvua mumane kudianjila mu Ejipitu
Muaba awu, nenusumbe bintu bionsu binudi basue: ngombe, mikoku, mbuji, maluvu a mvinyo, nansha maluvu makole, bua nuenu kudia, kunua, kusanka ne bena meku enu bonsu
