Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nuambile Bena Isalele ne, Ebi mbintu bidi ne muoyo binudi mua kudia munkatshi mua nyama yonso idi ha buloba
Nunku akobolole muena tshibawu anu mushindu ewu bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Nudienzele bisele ku mpenga inai ya bilulu bienu binudi baluata
Kanuakupeta biakudia pa madimi enu to
Pashishe, dituku dia muanda mutekete, mutuangaji neakonkonone muntu awu tshiakabidi
Nanku, bayende kena ne bualu to
Wakenzaku tshioshelu wakabikila mua ba au ne, Ele betele bualu bua mu muaba eu Nzambi wakamueneka kudiye hakadiye unyema ku mesu kua mukulu andi

Nuenu nuakuitabusha Yehowa bu Nzambi wenu lelu, nuakuamba ne, Tuetu netuende mu nshila yandi, netutumikile mei andi ne mikenji yandi ne mikandu yandi, netunvue dî diandi; ne Yehowa wakanuitabusha bu bantu ba buhianyi buandi bu muakanulayeye, bua nuenu nutumikile mikenji yandi yonso, ne kunubandisha ku mutu kua bisamba bionso biakafukeye mu butumbi ne mu dina ne mu buneme; bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bu muakuambeye
Lupuishi alu, neluenzeje maputa apatuka tufina pambidi pa bantu ne pa nyama

Mikalu idi luseke ludi diba dibuelela, idi ilonda tshibandabanda tshia Yardene, biangatshile ku dijiba dia Ngenesarete too ne ku Mayi manene a luepu, too ne ku mukuna wa Pisga, luseke ludi diba dipatukila

Bualu bukuabo, Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bua bualu buenu, wakaditshiha ne, Wewe kuena mua kusabuka Yadene ne kubuela mu buloba abu buimpe budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bu buhianyi buenu; kadi bûdi n abu mbua kufuila mu buloba ebu, kuena mua kusabuka Yadene; kadi nuenu nenusabuke, nenuhiane buloba abu buimpe
Maweja Nangila kubikila Moshe, Arone ne Miriyame, ubambila ne: Ndayi bonsu basatu mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Munyinyi wa nyama unu vua balambula Maweja Nangila dilolu dia dituku dia kumpala, nuudie, ujika anu dituku adi
Tshiole tshiakashala mu buloba bidimu bibidi, ne bidimu bitanu bidi bishala bidibo kabayi badima, kabayi bahuola bintu
Esau wakamba ne, Witabushe bua bantu banyi bakuabo bashale n ebe Yakoba wakamukonka ne, Bua tshinyi
Kushalabu bulelema pa mayi
Nanku, wewe ne bantu bebe, nudi nutombokela Maweja Nangila
Ndi ntua ndondu ewu nebe kashidi, kabidi ne ndelanganyi yebe yonsu
Kadi paudi kuyi wenza bimpe, bubi budi bukuimanyine ku tshibi; kadi ukebe mua kubutshimuna
Kabivua biumuka kumpala kuabu to
Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi wa nzambi mikuabo, udi Mukelenge wa bakelenge, Nzambi munene ne mukole, udibo batshina, yeye katu watangila bantu ne kansungusungu, kena witabusha matutu
Nanku butuku bujima baluishi kabavua mua kupetangana
Kushe kulela bankambua ba bena Seba, Avila, Sabta, Ragma ne Sabteka
Nanku, malaba pa diba edi, nendokeshe mvula mukole wa mabue, udi kayi muanji kuloka mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu too ne mpindiewu
dikebulula dia mamanya ne bia kwenza nabi mudimu pamwe ne bulusa bwa balongi, bwa dishikuluja dia lungenyi ne bwa dikolesha dia mu maboko mu dikebulula;
Dituku adi too ne butuku, Maweja Nangila kutuma lupepele lufumina kudi diba dipatukila
Bobu bamane kupatuka mu ditunga, mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu mukuabu kuambila Lote ne: Nyema, kolesha bua kudipandisha
Kadi wewe mubenge kupingaja mukaji, neufue, kabidi bantu bonsu baudi nabu nebafue
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele nunku kadi bobo kabakatumikila dî dia Mose bualu bua kanyinganyinga ka mutshima, ne bua dikenga dia buhika
Nzambi wakamba mei â onso ne, Ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu nsubu wa buhika
Nudimuke bualu bua disama dia nsudi, bua nuenu kuenza malu onso bimpe adi bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi banuyisha: bu munakabambila bobo, nuenu nuenze nunku
Wewe Kora ne bana benu bena Levi, Maweja Nangila mmunusungule bua nusemene pabuipi nende
Kanuenji mvidie inudi nutendelela pamue nanyi
Nzambi wakamona Bena Isalele Nzambi wakamanya dikenga diabo
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina, Palati, muana mulume wa Lafu
Kumukabu ne muntu awu muaba uvua mitanda, kumuasabu mabue, kufuaye
Ditunga dijima kununkadi mupuya mubi
Kubatumaye mu ditunga dia ku luseke ludi diba dipatukila
Pashishe padi butu bukuate ku tshintu atshi, dikeji dimueneka tshiakabidi, neboshe tshintu atshi
Wakenza mitshi ya acacia ibidi, wakalamina or ku nseke yai yonso

Belâma wakambila Nzambi ne, Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, mukelenge wa Moaba, wakantumina dî ne, Bantu bakaluhuka mu Ejipitu, bakatangadika buloba buonso, lua biebe, ubangelele mulau, hashishe nemmanye mua kuluangana n abo, nembihate
Pa kumbusha bulongolodi bukwabu bwa Dîyi dikulu
Kujadikabu ne: Maweja Nangila wamonyi makenga etu, watusambi
Malenda ku bilamba Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu, nutele malenda ku mielelu ya bilamba bienu ne buanda bufikuluke

Hanuafila mulambu wa tshimpanga, nenulongolole tshintu tshitanu tshia bukula bubotesha busangisha ne tshituha tshisatu tshia dikoho dia manyi, ne tshituha tshisatu tshia nvinyo bu mulambu udibo banua bua kûtuisha dihembu kudi Yehowa
Wewe newangate mabue abidi a onyx, ufundehu mena a Bena Isalele, mena asambombo ha dibue dimue ne mena asambombo adi ashala ha dibue dikuabo, balondangane bu mudi kuledibua kuabo
Pashishe kufofomijabu mesu a bonsu bavua ku tshiibi, bansongalume ne bantu bakole, bua bapange kumona tshiibi
Mvidi Mukulu umvu muadi wa muana
Mvidi Mukulu kumuambila ne: Kusemenyi pabuipi to
Mukenji wa Bamonyi Kanuitabushi dî dia mumonyi umue udi utumpila mukuabo tshianana bua dihambuka diandi anyi bua bubi buakenzeye; malu neajalame anu ku mei a bamonyi babidi anyi basatu
Bonsu pamue bituadije ku bana batekete ba ngondu umue too ne ku bantu bakulumpe, bavua
Wakuvuwa bintu bia munda ne bioku, wakabisha ha tshioshelu ha mutu ha mulambu wa kuosha
Hanoka wakikala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asambombo ne bitanu, wakalela Metushela Ku nyima kua kulela kua Metushela, Hanoka wakendakana ne Nzambi bidimu nkama isatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Bimenga abi bavua babikolesha ne bimana, babiela mu mpangu mikanga ne bibi bia biamu
Moshe ne Arone bakavua bamane kuenza bishima bia bungi, mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu mutangile
Neabiele mulu, abinyukule kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Neasakidile kabidi maluvu a mvinyo litre ibidi
Kabidi nenuikale bamfumu ba bisamba bia bungi, kanuyi penu ku bumfumu bua tshisamba nansha tshimue
Kadi kumvuaye diyi dia mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu difumina mu diulu dimubikila ne: Abrahame, Abrahame
Bakanuisha tatu wabo nvinyo butuku abu, ne muaba bute wakabuela, wakalala ne tatu wandi, tatu wandi kakamanya hakalaleye ne hakabikeye
Nuyisuike kabidi ku maboku enu, ne pa mpala yenu, bua kanuyipu muoyi to
Aba mbantu bakasungula Yehowa bua kutahulula Bena Isalele buloba bua Kanâna
Angatayi bimuna bienu, nuye nabi

Nenuambe ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne, Tatu wetu wakadi Muena Sulia, wakadi wamba kufua; ne yeye wakaya mu Ejipitu, wakashikamamu bantu banya banya; yeye wakalua tshisamba tshinene tshia bukole ne bantu ba bungi
Tusangishe bintu bia kudia mu bidimu ebi bimpe, tubiteke mu bianza bia Palo bua bantu kudiabo mu bimenga, tubilame bimpe
Nuyibenge, nuyimanshe
Bantu bonsu nebanutshine, bakuatshike bowa miaba yonsu inudi nupitshila, bu muvua Maweja Nangila munulaye
Bantu ba mu maloba onso bakalua mu Ejipitu kudi Yosefe bua kusumbabo bia kudia, bualu bua tshiole tshiakadi tshikole mu maloba onso
Bantu bakatandangana ne Mose, bakamba ne, Biakadi bimpe bua tuetu kufua bu muakafua bana betu ku mesu kua Yehowa
Bakumuka mu Kehelata, bakashikama ku mukuna wa Shefe
Kadi hakabuela Mose kudi Yehowa bua kusomba n andi, yeye wakumusha tshilulu tshikudika tô ne hakaluhukeye; wakaluhuka, wakambila Bena Isalele mikenji yakamuambila Yehowa
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mmunuvudije
Nanku kanuakuikala ne diakalenga to
Mu tshikosu, bena Ejipitu kubenzeja midimu ya mishindu yonsu ne tshikisu
Padi muntu kampande muenze bualu bubi budi bubengangana nansha ne mukenji umue wa Maweja Nangila, nansha muenze kayi mumanye, muntu awu udi muena tshibawu
Batuangaji badi mua kufika pabuipi nanyi, kadi bumushe mikiya
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Ubambile ne, Kanuyi, kanuluanganyi; bualu bua meme tshiena munkatshi muenu; kanuhonyi ku mpala kua bantu badi n enu lukuna
Wewe ushale anu Muakuidi wa bantu kudi Mvidi Mukulu
Muntu udi mwa kudifidila mpala nkayenda kayi upitshila mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi to
Nudimuke
Isaka wakabambila ne, Nudi n anyi lukuna, nuakungihata munkatshi muenu, nunku nuakuluila kundi bua tshinyi
Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila bilumbulwilu bia beena mwabo bôbo nkayabu
Nujadike mudi ditunga adi
Batshidi mua kulumona mu Raba, tshimenga tshinene tshia bena Amone
Kabeena mwa kwaasa Tubinadi twa sungansunga anyi twa tshiumusha to, nansha bôbu batwinyika dîna kayi
Ne mashi au neabuikidibue
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, Netanaele muana mulume wa Sua
Diba adi, Maweja Nangila neanufuile munda, anubutule musangu umue
kulwisha dilengulula dia manyooka;
Kanungu ka Mêyi malongolodi adi aleeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa midimu ya bampulushi ba ditunga dijima
Kupinganabu ku Kadeshe, mu tshipela tshia Parane, muaba uvua Moshe, Arone ne bena Izrayele bonsu
Yehowa wakatuma nyoka idi isuma bu kahia kosha munka tshi mua bantu, yakasuma bantu, bantu ba bungi ba Isalele bakafua
Umukumbajile biudi mulaye

Kadi biwikala musesuke kudi mundi udi kayi mulume webe, ne biwikala muonyibue ne bikala mundi udi kayi mulume webe mulale n ebe, nunku muakuidi neatshihishe mukashi kuditshiha kua mulau muakuidi neambile mukashi ne, Yehowa akuenzeshe mulau ne kuditshiha munkatshi mua bana benu, haboleshe Yehowa tshibelu tshiebe, ne hatuntumusheye mubidi, ne mai au adi elesha mulau neabuele mu mala ebe, neatuntumushe mubidi webe, neaboleshe tshibelu tshiebe Ne mukashi neitabe ne, Amen, Amen

ngendu ya mu njila, ditambakana dia mashinyi, diibaka ne dilongolwesha dia njila idi yambulwisha bantu bônso, difutshisha ne diabanya dia lupetu lwa bitadi bia mu njila idibo bibaka kudi bukalenga bunene ne anyi kudi polovensa;
Ke Rebeka awu mukutangile
Munudi nudilombela kabidi muanzu wa butuangaji mbishi
Biasua muntu kuhikula tshituha tshia tshintu tshia dikumi, yeye neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu hatshi
Muanza nkongolu udi tshimanyinu tshidi tshivuluija ndondu wa kashidi undi mutue ne bantu ne bionsu bidi ne muoyi pa buloba
Uteke tukanu tua or tuhindakasha ku nkanu idi ku nseke ya tshilulu
Dituku dia muanda mutekete bena Izrayele bakuabu kumuka mu mitanda bua kukeba biakudia

Bakulu ba mu musoko au nebakuate muntu au, nebamukengeshe; ne bobo nemmuambile ne, Ufute lukama lua nshekele ya argent ne yeye neayifile kudi tatu wa mushikankunde eu, bualu bua yeye wakuona lumu lua mukashi utshidi kamama mu Isalele: yeye neikale mukashi wandi, yeye kena mua kumuhidia tô matuku andi onso
Kuladi ne nyama bua kudionena mutshima webe, ne mukashi kimanyi biandi ku mpala kua nyama bua kulala handi, bualu ebu budi butamba bubi
Kutedi dina dia Nzambi tshitelatela, kuhendi mukokeshi wa bantu bebe
Diba adi, mvua muambile bisamba bionsu ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mmumane kunupesha ditunga edi
Wewe newenze nkanu ya or ibidi, uteke nkanu ei ku nseke ibidi ya tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi
Mose wakalua, wakambila bantu mei onso a musambu eu mu matshu abo, yeye ne Hoshea, muana mulume wa Nuna
Tshibangidilu Mvidi Mukulu udi utua ndondu ne Abrame Malu onsu mamane kupita, Maweja Nangila kumuenekela Abrame, umuambila ne: Abrame, kutshinyi to
Kakusomba pamue ne bana babu to
Nebabanye buhianyi bunene anyi buhianyi bukese anu ku nshobo
Kunutshimunabu, kunujingilabu bu mbulubulu, kunulonda too ne ku Orma
Ebele pende kumulambula banabute ba mikoku mimpe ya mafuta
Reyuma mukaji mukuabu wa Nahore, uvua mulele bana ba balume aba banayi: Teba, Ngahame, Tahashe ne Maaka
Lupuishi kuandamuka tumue mu ditunga dionsu dia Ejipitu
Badi ne tshia kupeta difutu dikumbana bwa kushindika budikadidi bwabo ne mushinga wabo
Bua tshinyi kuena mungambile ne: Sarayi mmukajebe
Dianyi dia tshintu tshidifuile ne dianyi dia tshintu tshihandibue kudi nyama nudi mua kuenza n adi mudimu mukuabo, kadi kanudi dianyi adi
Yeye wakamba ne, Nakunvua di diebe mu budimi, nakutshina, bualu bua nakadi butaka, nakusokoma
Enza tukoho binai tua ha tshitekelu bu bilongo bia amande ne mahu atshi ne bilongo bia tshi
Mukalu wenu wa luseke lua ku wesete neutuangane ne muelelu wa mai manene, eu newikale mukalu wenu wa ku wesete
Mu buloba buonso bunudi nuhiana biasumbabo bukuabo, nebashiye tshieya tshia buhikudi bua buloba kudi wakabusumbisha
Mutuangaji neumushe tshitambala tshia ku mutu wa mukaji awu, neamupeshe mu bianza mulambu wa bualu buvuabu ba mubande nabu, kabayi bajadike
Wakashimika luhangu ludi lunyunguluka nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne tshioshelu tshia milambu ya kuosha, wakakudika tshilulu ku mbelu kua luhangu
Musangu eu nentume milau yanyi yonso ku mutshima webe ne kudi bena mudimu bebe ne kudi bantu bebe, bua kukumanyisha ne, Kakuena nzambi mukuabo bu meme mu buloba buonso
Bavua ba bungi, kabidi banene bale, bu muvua ndelanganyi ya Anake
Eyowa, Kayine nebamusombuele misangu muanda mutekete
Pashishe meku a bena Kenaane kutangalakawu
Dina dia diboko dinai didi Pelata
Moshe, Arone ne Ure kubanda pa katongobela ka mukuna
Nanku anu muntu udi kayi ne mikiya ke udi mua kudia munyinyi wa mulambu ewu
Genese Yakoba Udi Ukuatshila Labana Mudimu bua Kuheteye Lakele ne Lea Yakoba wakaya ku luendu luandi wakateka ku buloba bua bantu ba ku esete
Nanku kuinyikabu muaba awu ne: Bersheba, bualu bonsu babidi bavua batuilapu ndondu ne mutshipu
Kadi baleleshi bavua batshina Mvidi Mukulu
Bena Isalele Badi Batombokela Yehowa ku Holeba Numanye bienu ne, Yehowa kena munuhe buloba ebu buimpe bu buhianyi bualu bua buakane buenu; bualu bua nudi bantu ba tshitshu

Nenufume ku nsubu yenu ne mitanda ya mampa ibidi ya kunyukula, milamba ne bituha bibidi bia dikumi bia épha ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne luevene, ebi mbintu bihuola bia diambedi bifila kudi Yehowa
Muntu uvua muambule bia bungi, kavua nabi bipite, uvua muambule bikese, uvua anu nabi bikumbane
Numuleje tshidiye ne bua kuenza, kabidi ne tshintu tshidiye mua kuambula
Uhiane biebe buloba bua ku dishiha ne bua ku sude
Mulami wa nsubu wa lukanu wakafua bonso bakadi mu nsubu wa lukanu mu tshianza tshia Yosefe, malu onso akenzabomu, yeye wakadi bu muenzeshi wau
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele nunku bua matuku a kudia bidia akasungula Yehowa

Hanuahanga kuluangana, muakuidi neasemene ha buihi ne bantu, neabambile ne, Bena Isalele, unvuai, nuakusemena hehi ne bantu badi n enu lukuna bua kuluangana n abo lelu: kanuikadi ne mitshima mitekete, kanuikadi ne buowa, kanuzakadi, kanubatshinyi; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuluila, bua kuluangana ne badi n enu lukuna ne bua kunusungila

Muana wa balume yonsu mumane kukumbaja ngondu umue, nebamupikule ku nkanu itanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, bu mudi mushinga wa mu muaba wa tshijila, mudi lukanu lumue ne bujitu bua grame dikumi
Patupu netufue
Nanku bavua bajula mitanda, bayasa tshiakabidi amu ku diyi dia Maweja Nangila
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Uhueke biebe, udimushe bantu, kabalu ha buihi bua kumona Yehowa, bungi buabo nebafue
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: imanyisha kabidi bena Izrayele ne: Padi muntu ulambula Maweja Nangila nyama wa mulambu wa bobumue, neapeshe Maweja Nangila bidi bimutangila
Ngenzelu wa mêyi a ditunga udi mutamba ngelelu wa mêyi a polovensa mushinga

Yeye wakamba ne, Nempunge n enu tshihungidi; nengenze malu a kukema ku mesu kua bantu bebe bonso, malu adi kâyi manze kumueneka ha buloba buonso anyi kudi tshisamba tshikuabo; bantu bonso badi n ebe nebamone bienzedi bia Yehowa; bualu bua meme nengenze n ebe bualu bukole
Hakalua Palo ha buihi, Bena Isalele bakabandisha mesu abo, bakamona Bena Ejipitu babalonda ku nyima, bakatamba kutshina, Bena Isalele bakadila kudi Yehowa
Moshe kuangata dikombu divua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile bua kuya nadi
Kadi ndi nkusengelela ne: Kutunyoki bua bubi butudi benze
Kanungu ka Dikumbajangana,bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu badi babuleeja kudi mêyi malongolodi
Kadi Nadabe ne Abiku kufuila mu tshipela tshia Sinayi kumpala kua muaba wa tshijila, kabayi banji kulela bana
Kanungu ka Minisitila udi mfumu wa tshibambalu tshienda
Nanku matuku makumi anayi a munya ne butuku mamane kukumbana, Maweja Nangila kumpesha mikenji ya ndondu, kungambilaye ne: Tuluka lukasa
Nuangate anu tshia dikumi, nutshifile kudi mutuangaji Arone bua kutshindambula
Meme ndi Maweja Nangila, udi munupatule mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, bua ngikale Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Hashishe bakulu ba mu musoko wandi nebamubikile, nebasombe n andi; ne himaneye, wamba ne, Tshiena musue kumuangata, hashishe mukashi wa muan abo nealue kudiye ku mesu kua bakulu, neambulule tshisabata ku dikasa diandi, neamutuile lute ku mesu; neamuambile ne, Nebenzele mulume nunku udi uhidia kudiundisha nsubu wa muan abo mulume
Bualu bua wewe neutangile buloba budi ku mpala kuebe; kadi kuena ubuela mu buloba bundi mpa Bena Isalele

Yeye neoshe mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, yeye neumushe dianyi dionso ne dianyi dia mukila didi hehi ne muongo ne dianyi didi ha mutu ha bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi didi ha mutu hatu hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne lua tumuma kabidi yeye neabiumushe
Mabaya muanda mukulu akadiku ne masoso a tshiamu tshia argent dikumi ne asambombo, masoso abidi ku dibaya ku dibaya
Nunku tuakashikama mu tshibanda tshitangilangane ne Bete peô
Biashala bidimu bikese tô ne ku tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, bobo nebabibale, yeye neamuhingishile tshituha tshia kudihikula n atshi bu bungi bua bidimu biandi bidi bishala
Mu dîba edi, badi banji kwimanyika manyooka

Mose wakaha Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe muana mulume wa Yosefe buloba bua Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole ne buloba bua Oga mukelenge wa Bashana, bungi bua misoko yabo to ne ku matshika abo onso
Bualu ebu kutonda Moshe
Mvidi Mukulu kuambila Abrahame kabidi ne: Wewe ne ndelanganyi yebe yonsu nulame ndondu ewu
Munyinyi onsu wa mafuta, wa nyama mudifuile, nansha mushipa kudi nyama mukuabu wa lonji, kabena mua kuudia to, kadi badi mua kukuata nawu midimu mikuabu
Nanku, bena Izrayele bavua bajula mitanda, bayasa muaba mukuabu, pavua Maweja Nangila muambe
Mu Holeba nuakafuisha Yehowa tshiji kabidi ne Yehowa wakadi n enu tshiji, wakamba kunushiha
Bana babo bakamuambila ne, Wewe newikale mukelenge wetu, anyi
Bakulu ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha muana mulume wa ngombe ku mesu kua Yehowa, nebashihe muana mulume wa ngombe ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kuangataye kabidi bana ba balume babidi ba Sefora: ke Ngershone uvua Moshe muinyike nanku, bualu uvua muambe ne: Ndi muenyi mu ditunga dia bende
Badi balekela difila dia dinyooka pikala, bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu mieela panyima pa dikosa dia tshilumbu: dinyooka edi badikupula; bwaalu buvwabo badifila kabutshiyi ne ngikadilu wa tshibawu
Labana wakadi ne bana bakashi babidi dina dia muan a bute diakadi Lea, ne dina dia mukuny andi diakadi Lakele
Meme kubanda nabi ku mukuna
Nuye bienu ne muntu wa mu tshisamba muntu wa mu tshisamba, muntu yonso udi ku mutu kua nsubu wa batatu abo
Bana ba Midiyana bakadi Eha ne Ehê ne Hanoka ne Abida ne Eleda Bana aba bonso bakadi bana ba Ketula
Bena Izrayele kumuangala ku mukuna wa Maweja Nangila, kuenda matuku asatu
Numanye ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu neanupe ditunga edi dimpe, kadi ki mbua buakane buenu to
Dikosolola dia teletwale munda mwa polovensa badi badifila kudi dîyi dilongolodi
Ndi mfila mushinga wa budimi, uwangate, bua njike muena kuanyi
Dinda, bena Izrayele bavua baye kuangula, baapela pankatshi pa mabue abidi, nansha baatua mu tshinu
Muhika wa Abalahama wakahatula bilenga bia argent ne bia or ne bilulu, Wakabikila kudi Lebeka, yeye wakaha muan abo mulume ne mamu wandi kabidi bintu bia mushinga mukole
Pashishe bena Izrayele bonsu kuya kuimana muaba awu bua kutendelela Maweja Nangila
Ditumibwa dia ku makanda diônso didi tshianana

Bikaleye mumukume ne tshiji, anyi bikaleye mumuele tshintu, hakadiye muale mu nshila, wakamushiha, anyi bikaleye mumukume ne tshianza tshiandi ne tshiji, mumushihe, nebashihe muntu wakamukuma, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu musombuedi neashihe mushihi wa muntu, hasangakeneye n andi
Muaba wa tshijila awu, nuenu bena Izrayele, nusanke ne bana benu, bena midimu benu, bena Levi, benyi banudi nabu, bana ba nshiya, ne bakaji bakamba badi munkatshi muenu
Bobo bakamukudimuna ne, Muntu webe tatu wetu, udi mukole, utshidi ne muoyo Bobo bakatua mpala yabo hanshi, bakamukukuila

Mu dituku dinai bana balume ba ngombe dikumi ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue, badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba; ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Bualu bukuabo kabidi, Yehowa neatume matembue munkatshi muabo, bantu badi bashala nebasokome, tô ne hafuabo ku mpala kuenu
Mose wakaluhuka mu musoko kudi Palô, wakolola bianza biandi kudi Yehowa, ne makubakuba ne mabue a nvula biakashika, nvula kakamata ha buloba kabidi
Nakadi nkuenzela nunku dia mbedi, anyi
Biahona tshituha tshia mibidi mufue ya bintu ebi ha tshintu, tshintu atshi netshikale ne bukoya, nansha nfulu nansha bivuadi, nebanshihe, bidi ne bukoya, nebikale bibi kunudi
Bobo nebangate mashi, nebâmiamine ku mutshi wa ha mutu ha mushiku wa mbelu ne ku biluwa bibidi bia mushiku wa mbelu wa nsubu mudibo bamudîla
Ndelanganyi ya Ngershone Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ubadike kabidi bena Levi ba bena Ngershone ku meku ne ku bisamba
Mikiya ya bakaji ku tshijila Padi mukaji ku tshijila tshia bakaji, mashi apatuka mu mubidi wende, udi ushala mupie mikiya matuku muanda mutekete
Tshintu tshidi mua kuhita Yehowa bukole, anyi
Makelela nengimane ha mutu ha mukuna ne mulangala wa Nzambi mu tshianza tshianyi
Pashishe kusuikaye muanende Izake, kumuteka pa tshilambuilu pamutu pa nkunyi
Baketeka nsonga ibidi mikuabo ya tukanu tuhindakana mu masoso abidi, nunku bakatuteka ha bilulu bia efoda bia ha maha ku mpala kua tshilulu

Difutu Diakadi Dikenka Butuku Bakalekela Palô bantu, Nzambi kakabalombola mu nshila wa ku buloba bua Bena Peleshete, nshila au wakatamba buihi, Nzambi wakamba ne, Bamue bantu nebakudimune mitshima yabo hatangilabo nvita, nebahingane mu Ejipitu
Mikenji idi ilesha Bujitu bua Bena Bintu Biatuta muntu muhika wandi mulume anyi muhika wandi mukashi ku disu, ne biafuadi, yeye neamumushe ku butaka buandi bualu bua disu diandi
Afile kabidi mikata, kayiyi miela buanga bua mampa, kadi milamba mu mafuta, tshisaka tente
Nembihate bilulu bitulu tô ne hakakumbana ba bungi ne hanuahiana buloba
Yeye wakatshisulula, wakamona muana, ne muana wakadila Yeye wakafuka muana luse, wakamba ne, Yeye udi muana wa Bena Ebelu
Nanku, divuba divua kumpala kua bena Izrayele mu munya, ne tshimunyi tshia kapia tshivua kumpala kuabu butuku

Pikalabo kabayi bafila tshingenyingenyi mu tshipungu tshîmpe bwa kutshipatulabo kumpala kwa ntwadijilu wa tshikondu tshipiatshipia, Bukalenga bunene budi bulomba Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga bwa tshiaanji kwanyisha dipatula dia lupetu lwa nzanzanza
Padi muntu kampande udia munyinyi wa ku mulambu awu dituku disatu, Maweja Nangila kena mua kuanyisha to
Badi baleeja mpala musangu mwibîdi amu kudi bantu babidi badi bapeta mêyi mapita bungi musangu wa kumpala
Ngombe minyane muanda mutekete yakalonda ku nyima kuai idi bu bidimu muanda mutekete, ne miehu yakafubidila ku luhehele luakafuma ku esete, idi bu bidimu muanda mutekete bia tshiole
Dîba adi, badi bamupingana kudi muntu wa kumpala uvwa mumutwa munyima
Bobo bakamba ne, Netubikile nsongakashi, netumuebeshe yeye
Mose wakambila tatu andi muenu malu onso akenzela Yehowa Palô ne Bena Ejipitu bualu bua Bena Isalele, ne bua makenga akabakuata mu nshila, ne muakabasungila Yehowa
Isalele wakashikama mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu buloba bua Goshene bakangata bintu mu buloba abu, bakavulangana bakakumbana ba bungi
Meme tshiena mulele muana
Bualu mmulambu wa kudikobolola nawu

Nuenze bienu nunku Kola ne bantu hadiye habo bangate malonga a kahia, batekemu kahia, batekehu musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kua Yehowa makelela, ne muntu udi musungudibue kudi Yehowa neikale muntu wa tshijila, nuenu bana balume ba Lewi nudi nutamba kudienzela malu

Yakoba wakananga Lakele, yeye wakambila Labana ne, Nenkukuatshile mudimu bidimu muanda mutekete bualu bua muan ebe muana wa bakashi muan a mukala Labana wakamuambila ne, Bualu bua meme kumufila kudi budi butamba bua meme kumufila kudi mulume mukuabo ushale n anyi
Ndi nnusengelela ne, Nubingambile
Bantu bonsu bavua bungi nunku: Tshisamba tshia Rubene:
Bualu meme Maweja Nangila ndi mufuke diulu, mayi manene ne bionsu bidimu, anu mu matuku asambombu

Padi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfuaka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa tshikosa difila dia bukookeshi buvwa bwimikila Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga bwa polovensa mushindu awu, bulongolodi bwa mêyi a polovensa adibo bapatula mu mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene, bilondeshila difila dia bukookeshi edi, adi ashala ne bwenzeji mu polovensa mweena bwaalu too ne palwa Dîyi dikulu dia ditunga kujikija mianda ayi
Bualu bua bena nvita bonso bakadiangatshila bintu mundi ne mundi
Tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole tshia malongu onsu atshi tshivua tshia bujitu bua Kilo , bilondeshile tshipimu tshidi muaba wa tshijila
Mahalelela wakikala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asambombo ne bitanu, wakalela Yalede
Aba mbana ba balume ba Lea bakaleleleye Yakoba mu Padana alama, ne muan andi wa bakashi Dina, bana bandi ba balume ne bana bandi ba bakashi makumi asatu ne basatu
Ndelanganyi yebe neyinyenge misoku ya bena lukuna bayi
Nenudie dituku adi mene mene, kanushiyi tshintu tô ne dinda meme ndi Yehowa
Meme kunuambila bionsu abi
Bena Izrayele ba tshivua badila muadi, bela mbila, bua dikenga divuabu nadi
Padi Mulombodi wa ditunga kayi mupatula dîyi mu bipungu biteeka kudi Dîyi dikulu, dîyi edi didi dipatuka kabayi baditontolola

Pikala, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu kumpala kwa ndekeelu wa dilonga dia ndongamu wa lupetu, Bukalenga bunene kabuyi bufila tshingenyingenyi tshiabu tshia ndongamu wa lupetu, badi batangila ne Bukalenga ebu budi bumana kudilekeela mudimu

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent dia nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Ehaba, muana mulume wa Helona

Kanungu ka Mweenyi yônso udi usanganyibwa mu bulaba bwa ditunga bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu, badi ne tshia kumukuba mushindu umwe udibo bakuba bantu ne bintu biaabo, bilondeshila bulongolodi bwenza mu ndondo ne mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga
Teka mesa ku mpala kua tshilulu, ne teka muinda ku luseke lua tshitendelelu ludi ku Sude, neuteke mesa ku luseke lua ku nôde
Kadi kapia kadi pa tshilambuilu kadi ne bua kutema anu kutema

Muakuidi neangate dikoho dia manyi, nele munda mua tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi, neafue munu wandi wa ku tshianza tshia balume mu manyi adi mu tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi, neamiamine manyi ne munu wandi misangu muanda mutekete ku mpala kua Yehowa

Ndi nkutendekena ne, Wangata bintu biebe bia bule mbi, mukulu wa mikete ne buta buebe, uye mu tshisuku, unkebele ntole undambile munyinyi wa dihembu undi musue Ulue n au kundi, nengudie, bua mutshima wanyi ukuvudishile disanka diambedi tshiyi muanze kufua

Bobo nebanutshintshimike ku bibi bienu bionso tô ne hahona ngumbu yenu yonso inuakueyemena mu buloba buenu buonso; bobo nebanutshintshimike ku misoko yenu yonso mu buloba buonso budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Nenubahe kabidi bintu binudi nuhuola diambedi, ne tshia nvinyo muhia muhia, ne tshia manyi enu, ne miosa ya mikoko
Muana wa mukalenga kuitaba ne: Eyowa, ndaku
Bakumuka mu Yotebata, bakashikama mu Abalona
Binualonda mei, anyi binuatumikila mikenji yanyi, binuayenza, nennuhe nvula mu tshidimu tshia nvula, ne buloba nebukuame bintu bia bungi, ne mitshi ya mu madimi neyikuame mamuma a bungi
Kadi bobo bakaya ku mutu kua mukuna ku bukole, kadi Mose ne mushete wa Yehowa kabiakumuka mu tshitudilu
Nanku bionsu bivua Moshe muambe, kubifidilabu mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Kadi meme nempeshe mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu muoyi wa tshitunu
Muhika wandi wakamukudimuna di ne, Abu biahidia mukashi kundonda ku buloba ebu, netuhingane ne muan ebe mulume ku buloba buwakumuka, anyi

Nuenu nenukudimune di ne, Bantu bebe bakadi balami ba bimuna hatuakadi bitende tô ne katataka, ne tuetu ne batatu etu, bua nuenu nushikame mu buloba bua Goshene Bualu bua mulami yonso wa mikoko udi mulenguludibue kudi Bena Ejipitu
Kuinyikabu muaba awu ne: Kibrote Taawa, mmumue ne: nkita ya bena lukuka
Nujadike mushindu udi ditunga: didi dimpe anyi ndibi
Ku dituku dinakasungula nempingane kûdi, hakumbana ngondo yandi, Sala nealele muana mulume
Hawalua ne mulambu wa bukula budibo balamba mu nfulu, nebuikale mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene busangisha ne manyi, anyi mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene idi ne manyi mela ha mutu

Biwabakengesha ne biadilabo kundi, meme nengunvuile muadi wabo, ne tshiji tshianyi netshitambe bukole, nennushihe ne muele wa nvita, ne bakashi benu nebikale bakashi ba mu lufuila ne bana benu nebikale bana ba nshiya
Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua matuku ebe ikale a bungi, ne bua wewe ukume dikasa dimpe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ukuha
Bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Abalahama wakadi ne bidimu makumi tshitema ne tshitema hakamutengulabo
Baye kukuata ditunga dimvua muditshipe bua kupesha bankambua babu

Muntu yônso udi mwa kubweela mu bilongelu bia ditunga kabayi bamusunguluja bwa mwaba udiye mufumina, bwa dikoba, ditabuuja, bulume anyi bukaji, mmwenenu wa mianda ya tshidiidi anyi ya dieela dia meji, ngikadilu wende wa mubidi, wa lungenyi anyi wa lumvu bilondeshila bukookeshi bwende
Bulelela, yeye udi unanga bantu bonso, bantu bandi bonso ba tshijila hadi mu tshianza tshiebe: bobo bakashikama hanshi ku makasa ebe, bua kunvua mei ebe
Bukalenga bunene budi butangila buludiki bwa midimu ya mbulamatadi, Bilwilu, bampulushi ne midimu ya bukubi
Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Bena Lewi nebabale mu mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena, wewe neubalengeshe, neubanyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuelela muntu mukenji ne: Udi mua kudia bimuma bia mitshi yonsu idi mu lupangu
Mvidi Mukulu kuambila kabidi Abimeleke mu tshilota atshi ne: Ndi mumanye ne: udi muenze nanku kuyi mumanye bualu
Neasombe amu pa nkayende
Padiku tshipumbishi, badi banji kumupingana kudi mweena Bukalenga udi mubabidila bakwabo ku mulongo
Bena Eme bakashikamamu diambedi, bantu banene, bantu ba bungi, bule bua Bena Anaka: badi bababikila kabidi ne, Bena Lefa, bu Bena Anaka; kadi Bena Moaba bakababikila ne, Bena Eme
Mena a bana ba balume ba Lewi ku bikondo biabo adi nunku Geshona ne Kohata ne Melah, bidimu bia Lewi biakadi lukama makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete
Yeye udi ulama ndondu wende too ne ku ndelanganyi tshinunu

Mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu kubikila Abrahame tshiakabidi, umuambila ne: Maweja Nangila udi ujadika ne: Bu muudi muenze nanku kuyi mumpale muanebe umuepele, bu mundi meme Mvidi Mukulu, ndi nditshipa ne: Nenkuele lupemba; nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe bungi bua mitotu ya mulu, nansha bu lusenga lua ku muelelu wa mayi manene
Kadi bana benu batekete banuvua nuelela meji ne: nebashale bapika, nembafikishe mu ditunga dia Kenaane, dinudi nubenga
Midimu ya tshibidilu ya tshisangilu tshiônso kayeena mwa kupita pa ngondo isatu to
Kanungu ka Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kweepula bansonga ku bidi mwa kunyanga bukola bwabo bwa mubidi, dimanya diabo dia maalu ne dikola dikwatakane
Ke pavuabu babikila muaba awu ne: Mara mmumue ne: a bululu
Kabena bakesha bantu bebe bisonsa, ne badi bamba ne Enzai tushola, mona, badi bakulua bantu bebe, kadi dihila didi kudi Bena Ejipitu bebe
Adi a njila umwe anyi a mantonya
Neanutshimuine mvita eyi
Badiku bwa beena ditunga bônso ba Kongu
Nanku, nuvuale bilamba bitela ne malenda
Mose wakalua ne bana balume ba Alona, wakabaluatshisha tuzaku, wakabasuika ne mikaba, wakabasa bifulu ku mitu yabo, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Aba mbana balume ba Benyamina ku meku abo, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama isambombo
Kabidi kanuakutendelela mvidie, bua kulonda majinga enu mabi ne lukuka luenu
Yakoba wakambila Labana ne, Umpe mukashi wanyi, bualu bua matuku anyi akukumbana bua meme kuikala n andi
Dituku dikuabo, muana wa bakashi wa Shua, mukashi wa Yuda, wakafua, Yuda wakasambibua, wakaya kudi bakoshi ba miosa ya mikoko yandi ku Timena, kudi mulunda wandi Hila, Muena Adulama
Kadi pavua munya ukola, biakudia bivua bishale panshi bivua bienguluka

Dibadika Bena Izrayele badi babenga kuya mu Kenaane Bena Izrayele bonsu kutshisha butuku ne mbila ya miadi, badiwula Moshe ne Arone, bamba ne: Bivua bimpe tuetu kufuila mu Ejipitu, nansha mu tshipela emu
Kadi muntu udi wenza bualu bubi ne mutshima mukole nansha muntu mulela munkatshi muenu nansha muenyi, muntu au udi uhenda Yehowa, nebamumushe munkatshi muabo
Wewe newasuike bu tshimanyinu ku tshianza tshiebe, ne hankatshi ha makiki

Kadi panudi nulambula Maweja Nangila bintu bia tshianyi bia mu madimi enu, nudi mua kuelamu buanga bua mampa ne buitshi, kanuyi nubiosha pa tshilambuilu, bu munudi nuenza ne mulambu udi ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Kuinyikabu muaba awu dina ne: Tabera, mmumue ne: kapia, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua muoshe mitanda yabu muaba awu
Mose Udi Usungula Yoshua bu Muenampala Wandi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Banda biebe ku mukuna wa Abalima, utangile buloba bundi mpa Bena Isalele

Dibadika Ditomboka dia Kora Muena Levi mukuabu, diende Kora, muana wa Ishare, wa mu diku dia bena Kekate, uvua muambile bena Rubene basatu, Datane ne Abirame, bana ba Eliyabe, ne One, muana wa Pelete, meji mabi a kutombokela Moshe
MUTU WA MUKANDA MUIBÎDI II : BIDI BITANGILA MAPA A MUNTU YÔNSO, BUDIKADIDI BWA NSHIDAMENU NE MAKANYIKA A MWEENA MWAABO NE A MBULAMATADI
Bantu bebe kabena mua kuenza bualu bubi nunku
Zebuluna neashikame kukala kua mai manene muaba wandi newikale muaba wa mabi manene, mukalu wandi neufike tô ne ku Sidona
Baye nawu muaba wa tshijila, baufile kudi mutuangaji bua yeye aye nawu ku tshilambuilu

Dikenga dia ndekelu: lufu lua bamuanabute Mundankulu, Maweja Nangila kushipa bamuanabute bonsu ba mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, biangatshile ku muanabute wa mukalenga wa ditunga, too ne ku muanabute wa muntu tshianana uvua mu nzubu wa lukanu
Kadi mayi avuabu nawu mu kabulubulu kujika
Kabavua baye ku ntenta wa kusambakena to
Muntu yonso udi ulenga bintu ebi bianza neikale ne bukoya, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Moshe kunyema nyoka awu
Lumu bakafika kudi mukelenge wa Ejipitu ne, Bantu bakanyema Palô ne bantu bandi bakakudimuna mitshima yabo, bakamba ne, Tuakenza tshinyi hatuakalekela Bena Isalele ku mudimu wetu

Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso anufue luse ku mesu kua mulume au, bua yeye ahingashe muan enu mukuabo ne Benyamina kabidi mu bianza bienu Bianjimishilabo bana banyi, nembajimishe Bobo bakangata matabisha au, ne argent misangisha misangu ibidi, ne Benyamina mu bianza biabo, bakabika, bakaya mu Ejipitu, bakimana ku mpala kua Yosefe
Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu kadi ku bukookeshi bwa Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga
Awu kumukonka ne: Agare, mupika wa Sarayi, udi ufuma penyi
dikosa dia bitadi pa makasa a mushinga, bitadi pa kumpanyi ne bitadi pa muntu ne muntu bilondeshila kanungu ka ;
Maweja Nangila kuangata lubala luvuaye mulamune alu, kuenza nalu mukaji, kumupesha mulume

Moshe ne Arone pamue ne bamfumu dikumi ne babidi ba meku, mfumu umue ku tshisamba umue ku tshisamba, ke bavua babadike bantu balume bonsu, bavua ne bidimu makumi abidi ne pa mutu, bikale ne bukole bua kuenza mudimu mu bisumbu bishilangane bia tshiluilu tshia Izrayele
Apeshe mutuangaji bintu bionsu abi

Mose wakabikila Datana ne Abilama, bana balume ba Eliaba, ne bobo bakamba ne, Katuena tulua, bualu budi bukese bua wewe wakumuka n etu mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi bua kubishiha mu tshihela, udi musue kudibandisha bu mukelenge wetu kabidi, anyi
Mvidie eyi ke idibu batendelela kudi bantu ba bisamba bikuabu, bidi pabuipi nenu, nansha bidi kule, pa buloba bujima
Nyama kubuela mu buatu pamue ne Nowa, mulume umue ne mukaji umue ku nyama yonsu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Hingasha mulangala wa Alona ku mpala kua mushete, bu tshivulukidi kudi bantu badi basue kutomboka, neumanye mua kushikisha kutontolola kudibo bantontolola n aku bua bobo kabafu nansha
Biamona mukashi katshetshi mu matuku a bungi adi kâyi a tshikondo tshiandi, matuku au onso neikale bu matuku a tshikondo tshia ndi, yeye udi ne bukoya

Kadi bikala disama dia nsudi ditampakane mu dikoba ne biabuikiladi dikoba dionso dia muena nsudi, ku mutu tô ne ku makasa andi, ku miaba yonso idi muakuidi utangila, nunku muakuidi neatangile ne bikala disama dia nsudi dimane kubuikila dikoba diandi dionso, yeye neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu wakadi ne nsudi udi muakane, wakandamuka muteke tô, yeye udi muakane
Maweja Nangila kakuikala nenu to, bualu nudi bamubenge

Biafila muntu mulambu eu bua kubakidila Nzambi, yeye nealue kabidi ne mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene busangisha ne manyi, ne mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene miela manyi ha mutu, ne mikata ya bukula bubotesha budi busangisha ne manyi
Mikenji ei kayena dishiya dia mai manene, bua nuenu nuambe ne, Nganyi watusabukila dishiya dia mai manene bua kulua n ai kutudi ne bua kutunyuisha bua tuetu kuyenza
Enza biebe bilulu bia miosa ya mbushi dikumi ne tshimue bualu bua kuteka ha mutu ha tshitendelelu
Mikenji ya mulambu wa dinua tshibalu ne ya mulambu wa kukobolola bantu, idi anu mushindu umue

Enza bivuadi bia tshiamu bia kumusha n abi butue bua tshioshelu, ne bikasu biatshi ne malonga atshi ne bitubuidi bia kukuata n abi munyinyi, ne bihanza biatshi, enza bintu ebi bionso ne tshiamu tshia mitaku
Ke padibu bandomba bua kuya kulambula Mvidi Mukulu wabu milambu
Nunku Mose wakambila Alona ne, Ebu mbualu bakamba Yehowa ne, Nenjidibue kudi bantu balualua ha buihi n anyi, nentumbishibue ku mesu kua bantu bonso Alona wakahuwa talalâ
Udi ne tshia kukuba bumpianyi bwa bankambwa bwa ditunga ne kabidi udi ne tshia kubutantshisha
Nanku Maweja Nangila neabipate
Kuakuitabusha bua meme kusangana mishiku ne bana banyi ba balume ne bana banyi ba bakashi munyi
Nuenu bena Izrayele, nudi tshisamba tshisunguluke tshia Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Nunku Nzambi wakumusha bimuna bia tatu enu, wakubimpa
Nuenu nenusankishibue ku mutu kua bantu bonso: nansha mulume nansha mukashi munkatshi muenu anyi munkatshi mua bimuna bienu nebikale nkumba
Ulekele bantu baye kutendelela Yehowa Nzambi wabo, wewe kuena mumanye ne, Buloba bua Ejipitu buakushihibua, anyi
Udi ne bukookeshi bwa kufuta mabanza pa tshipaapu tshijima tshia ditunga
Tuetu kubenda, bua kupitshila mu tshipela tshia Mowabe
Yeye wakahingasha kahita ka bena maluvu mu mudimu wandi kabidi, ne yeye wakaha Palo luhanza luandi mu tshianza tshiandi kabidi
Hashishe angata manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne ela manyi au ha mutu handi

Yehowa neanumuangalashe munkatshi mua bantu bonso ku ditengu edi dia buloba tô ne ku ditengu dikuabo; nenukuatshileku nzambi mikuabo ya mitshi ne ya mabue mudimu, mudi kanuyi bamanye, ne bankambua benu kabakayimanya kabidi
Padi mputa mitampakane mutu mujima, mutuangaji kena ne bua kutangila boya to
Nomba Mikenji ya Kuditshiha Mose wakambila bakadi ku mutu kua bisamba bia Bena Isalele ne, Edi ndî diakutuambila Yehowa
Nanku nenuikale bena diakalenga, nenukuate ditunga dimpe, divua Maweja Nangila mulaye bankambua benu

Bikala bana balume ba difu dimue bashikame muaba umue, ne biafua umue wabo kayi mushiye muana mulume, mukashi wa muntu mufue kayi ku dibaka kudi mulume mukuabo; muan abo ne mulume wandi neamuangate, alue bu mukashi wandi; neamuenzele bualu buakadiye ne bualu bua kuenza bu muan abo
Nulonde anu dilumbuluisha didi diakane, nunku nenuikale ne muoyo, nenuhiane buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha

Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikidila Bena Isalele bonso bubi, ne bubi buabo nebuikale bubuikidibue, bualu bua bobo bakahanga ne bakalua ne milambu yabo, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa, ne mulambu wa kubuikila hau bubi ku mpala kua Yehowa, bualu bua dihanga diabo; bubi bua Bena Isalele bonso ne bua muenyi udi munkatshi muabo nebuikale bubuikidibue, bualu bua bakadi benze bualu ebu ku mpukahuka
Kadi Abrahame kulomba kudi Mvidi Mukulu bua apandishe Abimeleke, apandishe kabidi mukajende ne bakaji bende bapika, bua bamone mua kulela bana tshiakabidi
Mampa a Kuteka ku Mpala kua Yehowa Wangate bukula bubotesha, ulambe n abu mikata dikumi ne ibidi, ulambe mukata umue ne bituha bibidi bia dikumi bia épha
Tshidi ne lupetu lulongama lufila kudi Lubandi lwa Mbulamatadi lwipatshila bia lukama bia lupetu lônso lwa ditunga dijima ludi lubwêla ne ludi Mbulamatadi upeta ku tshidimu tshiônso
Mu Madiyane muvua mutuangaji Yetro ne bana bende ba bakaji muanda mutekete
Nowa kubuela mu buatu ne mukajende, bana bende ba balume ne bakaji babu, bua kudipandisha ku mayi a tshipupu
Genese Nzambi wakavuluka Noa ne nyama yonso ne bimuna bionso biakadi n andi mu buatu, Nzambi wakahehesha luhehele ha buloba ne mai akahueka
Yakoba wakamba ne, Anji kunsumbisha bintu bia buan a bute diambedi
Nashona, muana mulume wa Aminadaba wa tshisamba tshia Yuda, wakafua bintu biandi dituku dia kumudilu
Mose wakabandisha tshianza tshiandi, wakakuma dibue ne mulangala wandi misangu ibidi, mai a bungi akabuluka, ne bantu bonso bakanua, ne bimuna biabo
Lufu ne Kujikibua bia Abalahama Â adi matuku a bidimu bia Abalahama, biakadi lukama ne makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu
Ushikishe lumingu lua muana eu, hashishe, netukuhe muana mukuabo kabidi biwankuatshila mudimu bidimu muanda mutekete bikuabo
Kanuenji mudimu nansha mukese dituku adi eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu bikondo bienu bionso mu nsubu yenu yonso
Bikala muena musoko mulale ne mukashi webe, wewe wakadi kutuvuisha mu mulau

Hakatangila Yakoba Lakele, muana wa Labana, muan abo wa balume ne mamu andi, ne mikoko ya Labana muan abo wa balume ne mamu andi, Yakoba wakasemena ha buihi, wakumusha dibue diakadi ku mushiku wa dina, wakanuisha mikoko ya Labana, muan abo wa balume ne mamu andi

Lewitiki Bidimu bia Kuikisha ne Tshidimu tshia Buhikudi Yehowa wakambila Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuabuela mu buloba bundi nnuha, nenushiye buloba bua kubandabu kudi Yehowa
Hashishe, bakashi benji ba mudimu bakasemena ha buihi, bobo ne bana babo, bakafua mpala yabo hanshi
Tshiena mubanyenge tshintu, nansha mpunde mene
Nenteke lukuna hankatshi hebe ne mukashi, ne hankatshi ha bana bebe ne bana bandi, muana wa mukashi neakukume ku mutu kuebe, ne wewe neumusume ku tshikankanyi tshiandi
Umanye ne: netukuenzele bibi bipite bia bantu aba
Mesu andi neikale makunzekunzû ne manye, ne menu andi neikale matoke to ne mabele
Aba mbana balume ba Hama ku meku abo ne ku nuaku yabo ne ku maloba abo ne ku bisamba biabo
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi Padi muena Izrayele ulambula Maweja Nangila mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi, angate bukula, elepu mafuta, atentekepu ne musenga wa kamonya

Aba mbana balume ba Gilada: Yezê ne meku a Bena Yezê, Heleke ne meku a Bena Heleke; Aseliele ne meku a Bena Aseliele; Shekeme ne meku a Bena Shekeme; Shenuda ne meku a Bena Shenuda, Hefê ne meku a Bena Hefê
Sala wakadi useka munda munda, wamba ne, Meme nakulua mukoke ne mukelenge wanyi muikale mununu kabidi, nengikale ne disanka, anyi
Kabeena mwa kupiisha muntu nansha umwe,nansha mu mushindu kaayi, ne bwaalu mmupeta lungenyi lwa nanku to
Bana ba balume ba Yisakâ, Tola ne Puwa ne Yoba ne Shimelona
Moshe ne Arone kuya kuimana kabidi muaba awu
Muakuidi neamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, neoshe dianyi bu mulambu udi ulua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Dileeja dia tshiji diônso mu miaba ya bantu bônso anyi mu tshibwaasha didi dikanyika badi badilongolola bwa se bafunda mukanda bwa kumanyisha bamfumu baludiki badi ne bukookeshi abu
Kadi Maweja Nangila kuamba ne: Bua buenzayi bua muntu pa buloba, ndi nkepesha bidimu biende, bishale anu lukama ne makumi abidi, bualu muntu udi anu wa mubidi
Bualu bobu benze nanku, bavule ba kudibu nebafue
Arone ne Miriyame kumujana bua mukaji awu
Maweja Nangila kavua muanji kubutula Sodome ne Ngomore to
Mei au anakukuambila lelu eu ikale mu mutshima webe; wewe newayishe bana bebe, wewe neusombelele n abo bua mei au, hawashikama mu nsubu webe, ne hawenda mu nshila, ne hawalala, ne hawabika
Mayi mamane kuvulangana pa buloba, kubuikilawu mikuna yonsu nansha ne ivua mitumbuke
Sihona wakahidia bua Bena Isalele bahite ku buloba buandi, kadi Sihona wakasangisha bantu bandi bonso, wakaya kudi Bena Isalele mu tshihela tô ne ku Yahasa; wakatuangana nvita ne Bena Isalele
Kupikula bapika Pikala muanenu muena Ebrewu, mulume nansha mukaji, musue kudisumbisha bu mupika kuudi, akukuatshile mudimu anu bidimu bisambombu
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Wangate milambu yabu
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nakutangila dikenga dia bantu banyi badi mu Ejipitu bulelela, nakunvua muadi wabo bualu bua tuhita tuabo, bualu bua ndi mumanye kanyinganyinga kabo
Bakosha misoko yabo yakadibo bashikamamu ne bitudilu biabo ne kahia
Nansha nanku, pa dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene, padibio bisumpakaja, badi mwa kupwekesha tshipungu etshi ku matuku mwanda mukulu

Kanungu ka Bibambalu biônso bibidi bidi bitwilangana mu Tshisangilu Tshinene pa mianda eyi: a lwendu lwa kulonda mu diakajilula dia Dîyi dikulu bilondeshila tunungu twa too ne ku twa Dîyi dikulu edi ; b dianyisha dia diludika ne dikuba dia ditunga pa lukasa kudi bilwilu ne dieelangana dia mvita bilondeshila tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu edi ; c diteeleja dia muyuki wa Mulombodi wa ditunga pa ngikadilu wa mianda ya Ditunga bilondeshila kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi ; d diteeka dia bantu basatu beena Kabadi komekela mianda ya Dîyi dikulu bilondeshila bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi
Tuhita tuakabenzesha ne, Nushikishai mudimu wenu wa buatshia buatshia bu munuakenza hanuakadi ne bisonsa

Nenuenze bu mudibo bamba ha muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, usungula; nuenu nenutumikile mei onso adibo banuyisha: nenuenze bu mudi mikenji idibo banuyisha, ne bu dilumbulula didibo banuambila; kanusesuki ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi mu dî didibo banuambila
Udi unkengesha nunku bua tshinyi
Mu dituku adi mene mene Yehowa wakumuka ne Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu ne bisumbu biabo
Mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu kuela diyi difumine mu diulu, kuebeja Agare ne: Tshidi tshikutonda nanku ntshinyi
Dituku dikuabu pikala bana benu banukonka tshinudi nuenzela nanku, nubambile ne: Tudi tuvuluka bukole bua Maweja Nangila, uvua mutupatule ku bupika mu Ejipitu
Kanudinyangi nuenu ne bintu ebi bibi, bidi bilandala panshi, bualu nudi mua kupia mikiya

Mose wakamba ne, Katuena mua kuenza nunku, bituashihela Yehowa Nzambi wetu nyama, netuenze bualu budi bufuisha Bena Ejipitu bundu, bituenza bualu budi bufuisha Bena Ejipitu bundu ku mesu, bobo kabena batukuma ne mabue, anyi
Hakashikisheye kumunuisha mai, yeye wakamba ne, Nensunyine tumelo biebe mai kabidi to ne hukutatu

udibo basungula Mulombodi wa Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata, ndi ngamba kumpala kwa Nzambi ne Ditunga ne : nendondesha ne nensungidila Dîyi dikulu ne mêyi ne mikandu ya Ditunga; nenshindika budikadidi ne bujima bwa tshipaapu tshia Ditunga; nendaminyina bobumwe bwa Ditunga; nendonda amu dijinga dia bantu bônso ne kaneemu ka mapa a bumuntu; nendifila ne bukole bônso mu dilengeja dia nsombelu wa bantu ne mu difila dia bupole; nenkumbaja midimu minene idibo bampeesha mu dilonda dia mêyi ne anu bu mupika menemene wa bantu
Kanubabundi to

Beena ku Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu badi ne tshia kujadika ne badi bamanyi bapiluke mu mianda ya lupetu, ya mêyi ne mikandu ne ya diludika dia mianda ya mbulamatadi ne badi ne tshia kujadika kabidi ne bakaadi bênza midimu eyi bidimu kabiyi bishadila ku dikumi
Kupingaja bia bende Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Muntu yonsu, mulume nansha mukaji, udi wenzela mukuende bibi, neikale ne tshilumbu tshinene kudi Maweja Nangila
Nushale mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena too ne pakumbana matuku muanda mutekete a tshijila tshienu
Nzambi wakatangila buloba ne monai, buakadi bunyanguka, bualu bua bantu bonso bakanyanguka mu bienzedi biabo bia ha buloba
Bualu ebu buakadi bujitu bukole kudi Abalahama bualu bua muana wandi mulume

Biahuekeshabo mitshima yabo idi kayiyi mitengula, bitabushabo dikenga dia mibi yabo, nenvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi ne Yakoba ne tshihungidi tshianyi ne Isaka ne tshihungidi tshianyi ne Abalahama, nenvuluke buloba ebu
Muana wa mukoku nansha muana wa mbuji awu ikale wa tshidimu tshimue, kayi ne tshilema pambidi, kabidi anu mulume wa nyama
Bua bualu ebu kanuena nudituadila bubi, hanuanyukula bintu bidi bitamba buimpe kanuena nuona bintu bia tshijila bia Bena Isalele, bua nuenu kanufu
Nebateke tshiseba tshikole tshia nyama wa nkonga pa mutu pa bionsu
Tuetu katuena tuhiana n abo buloba budi dishiya dia Yadene to ne ku mpala, bualu bua buhianyi buetu budi dishiya dia munemu ku esete kua Yadene
Yeye kena mutangile malu mabi munkatshi mua bana ba Yakoba, yeye kena mutangile mitshima mikole munkatshi mua Isalele
Ku luseke lumue lua tshipela etshi kuvua tshimenga tshia Parane, ku luseke lukuabu kuvua bimenga ebi: Tofele, Labane, Asherote ne Di Zahabe
Kuvudi muana mukashi wa muana webe mulume, anyi muana mukashi wa muana webe mukashi bilulu, bobo badi bu wewe mene
Nanku numushe bubi buonsu munkatshi muenu
Dibadika Tshitekelu tshia miendu Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe, bua ambile Arone ne: Paudi utemesha miendu muanda mutekete, uyiteke bimpe bua itokeshe kumpala kua tshitekelu tshia miendu
Mêyi ne mikandu idi ileeja mishindu ya kulonda
Nakanuambila ku tshikondo atshi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuha buloba abu bu buhianyi: bena nvita nebasabuke ne bintu bia nvita ku mpala kua bana benu ba Bena Isalele
Kuelabu Maweja Nangila mbila mikole bua abambuluishe

bilumbu mikala atontolola Kadi katangila, padiku kakuyi bilumbulwilu bikwaabo bidi ne bukookeshi abu, malomba a kufutshibwa bwa kulongola bubi bwa pa bwabo, bumweeneka anyi bwikala mu lungenyi lwa muntu, bufumina ku dipangadika diangata anyi dituma kudi bamfumu ba Ditunga
Yetelo, tatu muenu wa Mose, wakoshila Nzambi nyama ya mulambu, ne Alona ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele bakalua kudia bidia ne tatu muenu wa Mose ku mesu kua Nzambi
Dielulula Nuitabe mikenji ya Mvidi Mukulu Moshe kuambila kabidi bena Izrayele ne: Nuenu bitabe meyi ne mikenji bindi munulongeshe, nenuikale ne muoyi
Nenuikale ne milau hanuabuela mu nsubu, nenuikale ne milau hanualuhukamu
Ekesode Malu Adibo ne bua Kuenzela Bahika Dut

Yeye wakasemena ha buihi, wakatuangana n andi mishiku, yeye wakanunkila muhuya wa bilulu biandi, wakamuvudishila disanka ne, Tangila, muhuya wa muan anyi udi bu muhuya wa budimi buakasankishibua kudi Yehowa, nunku Nzambi akumatshishile dibungi dia mu diulu akuhe buloba butu bukuatshike bintu bia bungi, ne manvua ne nvinyo muhiamuhia bia bungi, bantu bakukuatshile mudimu, ne bisamba bia bantu bitue mpala hanshi ku mesu kuebe wikale mukelenge wa bana benu, bana ba mamu webe batue mpala hanshi ku mesu kuebe, muntu yonso udi ukuela mulau neadiele mulau muntu yonso udi ukuvudishila disanka, adivudishile disa nka
Mpindiewu ndi muimane ku mpokolu wa mayi

Mu matuku makumi asatu adi alonda dijika dia midimu, pa kubeenga kufila dimanyisha edi, pikalaku dimanyisha dia diibila anyi manunganyi a dipeta dia biûma kadiyi dijadikibwa badi bamanyisha Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu anyi Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika bilondeshila mianda
Biashikama muenyi mu buloba buenu, kanumuenzedi bibi
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama inayi ne makumi asatu
Kanutendeledi mvidie Kadi, nutambe kuvuluka bualu ebu: Dituku divua Maweja Nangila wakula nenu ku mukuna wa Sinayi, munkatshi mua kapia, kanuvua bamumone to
Bena Izrayele mene kutuadija kudiabakena, bebejangana ne: Udi mua kutupesha munyinyi wa tuetu kudia nnganyi
Kadi mundi udi kayi muakane ne kena udilengesha, nebamumushe munkatshi mua tshisumbu, bualu bua yeye wakuona nsubu wa tshitendelelu, kabakamumiamina mai a kumulengesha n au, yeye kena muakane
Ndi mbangata bua bikale banyi, pa muaba wa bamuanabute bonsu ba bena Izrayele
Yehowa mene uyaya ku mpala kuebe, yeye neikale hebe, kena ukuhanga, kena ukulekela: kutshinyi, kuzakadi

Nuoshe mpingu yabo yakasongabo ne kahia: kanukumi mitshima yenu kudi argent anyi or idi ha mutu hai, kanuyidiangatshidi, kanudionyi mu buteyi ebu; bualu ebu budi butonda mutshima wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nakunvua tshitanu tshia Bena Isalele, ubambile ne, Dilolo nenudie munyinyi, dinda nenukute bidia, nuenu nenumanye ne, Meme ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kadi padi mutuangaji umona ne: muntu ewu udi ne mpusu mubidi mujima, ku mutu too ne ku makasa, neamukenkete menemene

Hakahita matuku asatu, dituku adi diakadi dituku dia kuledibua kua Palo, yeye wakalambishila bantu bandi bidia bia disanka, ne yeye Wakabikila kahita ka bana maluvu ne kahita ka bena bidia ku mesu kua bantu bandi
Bela, muana wa Beô, wakakokesha mu Edome, dina dia musoko wandi ne, Dinehaba
Muntu yonso udi utuala mubidi mufue wa nyama ei, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale ne bu koya tô ne dilolo, nyama ei idi mibi kunudi
Yehowa abandishe mesu andi kunudi, anuhe ditalala
Balami ba bimuna bia Abalama ne balami ba bimuna bia Lota bakatandangana
Kadi dituku adi, meme kumulombela ne yeye kabidi
Mose wakamona mudimu wonso wakenzabo, ne mona, baka wenza bu muakamba Yehowa Mose wakabandisha disanka
Kanungu ka Dijikija dia dipanga dia mukanda didi dipangadika dia ditunga dijima,didi Bukalenga bunene ne tshia kwenzela ndongamu wa sungansunga bwa kudikumbaja
Kuambulaye nyama ya milambu ya kuosha ibidi ayi anu bilondeshile mikenji
Wakambila tatu wandi ne mamu wandi ne, Tshiena mumumone; kena mumanye bana babo, kena mumanye bana bandi, bualu bua bobo bakatumikila dî diebe ne tshihungidi tshiebe

Ngabilayi kwakalwa maalu Adi ku batoka ne bafika Adi munda mwa bukwadisamba Atonda bantu munda mwa micima wabo Bààbà wanyì, Bààbà Bààbà wanyì twambilayi kwa kalwa maalu Bààbà wanyì twambilayi kwa kalwa maalu Bààbà wanyì twambilayi kwa kalwa maalu Mu Budimi bwa Edena Adama ne Eva bateka Bwà kutangila difunkibwa Nzambi wanyì e Umwayi mwa kalwa maalu : Bwà kudia kwenba Adama ne ututena Kulela kwaba Eva ne umona maalu Cilwàlwa bununu
Pashishe mutuangaji neangate muana wa mukoku ne mafuta
Tshibangidilu tshia bukelenge buandi tshiakadi Babela ne Eleke ne Akada ne Kalene mu buloba bua Shinâ

Haleha bidimu bisatu nuenu nempatule tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso biakakumbana tshidimu atshi, nenutshiteke ku mbelu kuenu; ne Bena Lewi, bualu bua bobo kabena ne tshituha anyi buhianyi kunudi, ne benyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila badi ku mbelu kuenu nebalue, nebadie, nebukute; nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Kadi Yehowa wakadi ne Yosefe, waka mulesha luse, wakamuendesha diakelengele kudi mulami wa nsubu wa lukanu
Yeye neanufikishe mu ditunga adi bua dishale bumpianyi buenu

Ei idi ndelanganyi ya bana ba Yishemaele, muana wa Abalahama wakamulelela Haga, Muena Ejipitu, muena mudimu wa bakashi wa Sala: au mmena a bana ba Yishemaele ku bikondo biabo muaba bute wa Yishemaele Nebayota, ne Kedâ ne Adebele ne Mibesama, Mishema ne Duma ne Masa, Hadada ne Tema ne Yetû ne Nafisha ne Kedema
Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila tshibutshilu tshinena Kanungu ka Tshibutshilu tshinene tshia Kongu ke tshidi tshikala nzubu mupatudi wa kashintu wa ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata

Mulambu wa mutuangaji munene Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Padi muntu muenze bualu bubi mu mpukapuka, kayi mulonde mikenji ya Maweja Nangila, numukobolole nunku: Padi mutuangaji munene muenze bualu bubi, budi butampakena bena Izrayele bonsu, udi ne bua kudikobolola
Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Ya biebe mu tshihela bua kusangakena ne Mose Yeye wakaya, wakasangakena handi mu mukuna wa Nzambi, wakatuangana n andi mishiku
Badi bankambua ba bisamba bibidi

Mose wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso, wakabambila ne, Nuenu nuakatangila malu onso akenzela Yehowa Palo mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku mesu kuenu, ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buonso; mateta makole anuakatangila ne mesu, ne bimanyinu ne malu a kukema
Mutuangaji alambule nyama wa tshibawu awu, akobolole muena tshibawu bilondeshile mudi mikenji, bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Tuetu kushala ku mikuna ya Seyire matuku mapite bungi
Nakaha Maki Gilada

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakatuadishila disanka mu malu onso anuakenza ne tshianza tshienu; yeye wakamanya ngendu yenu mu tshihela etshi tshinene; mu bidimu ebi makumi anai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakadi n enu; kanuakakengela tshintu
Kabiena mua kuenzeka to
Pashishe, ele mashi ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Moshe ne Arone kuenza bionsu abi
Nanku nembatumine disama dia tshiambu, mbabutula
Lote kumusengelela ne: Mukalenga, kabienzeki nanku to
Kanuena nutujiana, nudi nujiana Yehowa
Kabidi muntu kena mua kutatshisha muanabu bua kufutaye dibanza adi to
Nanku wewe Moshe, usemene kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu, uteleje bionsu bidiye ukuambila, utumanyishabi
Bantu bonso badi balela munkatshi muenu nebenze bilele ebi, hafilabo milambu ya kuosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa

Pikala Kasumbu kakese kasanga ka bantu bûngi bwa momumwe kakayi kafika ku dianyisha mukanda umwe anyi pikala mukanda ewu kabayi bawanyisha mu mushindu udibo balongolola kudi tulongo twapitshi etu, Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshidi tshiangata mapangadika bwa kashidi
Dituku dikuabo Kana wakalua ne bintu biakamena mu buloba bu mulambu kudi Yehowa
Bana balume ba Shimeona ku meku abo Nemuele ne meku a Bena Nemuele, Yamina ne meku a Bena Yamina, Yakina ne meku a Bena Yakina, Sela ne meku a Bena Sela, Shaula ne meku a Bena Shaula
Bamamu bonsu ba bena Izrayele kumulonda, kuimba ngoma, kuja ne maja
Nenshimike nsubu wanyi wa tshitendelelu munkatshi muenu, mutshima wanyi kawena wikala ne tshiji kunudi
Wakateka tshiowelu hankatshi ha ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshioshelu tshia mulambu ya kuosha, wakelamu mai a kuowa, akadi Mose ne Alona ne bana bandi balume bowesha n au bianza ne makasa
Mulume wakamba ne, Eu udi mufuba wa mifuba yanyi ne musunyi wa misunyi yanyi, nebamuedike ne, Mukashi, bualu bua bakamuangata kudi mulume
Yeye wakasungula bantu batanu ba munkatshi mua bana babo, wakabafila kudi Palô

Anyi bikala munyinyi eu mubishe muandamuke muteke tô kabidi nunku yeye nealue kudi muakuidi, muakuidi neamutangile, ne biandamukeye mutoke tô, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu wakadi ne nsudi udi muakane, ne yeye neikale muakane
Bakashihela ba demon badi kabayi Nzambi nyama, nzambi idibo kabayi bamanye, nzambi mihia mihia yakamueneka anu katataka, yakadi batatu benu kabayi batshina diambedi
Bungi bua bana ba balume ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu buakadi binunu muanda mukulu ne nkama isambombo, bakadi balama bintu bia nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Mutuangaji enze bionsu ebi anu muvuaye wenza bua mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi
Hakamona Alona bualu ebu, Wakenza tshioshelu ku mpala kua luhingu, Alona wakela dî, wakamba ne, Makelela disanka dia Yehowa nedikaleku
Baluishi benu bonsu, bena mutumba, kabakunuenzela bualu
Bakahingana, bakalua ku Ene mishapata eu udi Kadesha , bakahaula buloba buonso bua Bena Amaleka ne Bena Amole bakadi bashikama mu Hasasona tamâ
Mose wakenza muakamba Yehowa, bakaya ku mutu kua mukuna wa Hô ku mesu kua bantu bonso

Pa kumbusha bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu, Tshibambalu anyi Tshisangilu tshia bibambalu biônso bibidi tshidi mwa kupangadika ne tukanda twikale twa muntu pa nkayenda padibio bikengela kwanyisha mukenji kampanda
Luseke lukwabo, Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi didi ditabwija lungenyi luludiki lwa mungalata ludi lwamba ne bukalenga bônso budi bulwila kudi bantu badi bikala babwaaba
Yehowa wakenza bu mu dî dia Mose, biula biakafua mu nsubu ne mu mbanza ne mu madimi
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Kanungu ka Beena Kongu bônso badi momumwe ku mêsu a mêyi ne mikandu ne badi tshia kwikala balamibwa mushindu wa momumwe kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Ndi mumanye mua kukuambila bualu, anyi
Ke Maweja Nangila kutuambila bua tukumbaje meyi ne mikenji biende bionsu
Mukalenga wa bena Sodome kuya mu tshibandabanda tshia Shawe mmumue ne tshia Mukalenga , bua kuakidila Abrame pawaye upingana ku mvita, mumane kutshimuna Kedorlayomere ne bamfumu bonsu bavuaye nabu
Mashi onsu adi mashale, ayitshikije kuinshi kua tshilambuilu

Bukalenga bônso budi bufumina kudi beena ditunga badi babudia diakamwe mu njila wa dieebeja dia dianyisha dia beena ditunga bônso anyi mu njila wa masungulangana, ne mu mantonya, menza kudi beena mpala baabo
Yeye neatuale muana mulume wa ngombe ku butshika bua tshitudilu, neamuoshe ha kahia bu muakenzeye ne muana mulume wa ngombe wa kumudilu eu udi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu bonso
Nuenu bena Izrayele nudi tshisamba tshijidila Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Kadi misoko ya bantu aba idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuhayi bua nuenu kuyihiana, kanusungidi tshintu tshimue tshidi tshieyela muhuya; kadi nenubishihe bionso: ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Amole ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; bua bobo kabanuyishi mua kulonda malu mabi abo, adibo benzela nzambi yabo; nunku nuenu nenuenzele Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bibi
Bakidikisha nseke yonso ne luidi lumue, bakatshibula tshilulu, buludi buatshi buakadi bunene bua ntanta wa tshianza ne butshiama buatshi buakadi bunene bua ntanta wa tshianza
Butshia Abrahame kujuka ne dinda dionsu, kuangata muanende Izake, bena mudimu bende babidi, mpunde wende ne nkunyi
Bualu bua nakumutangila ku mutu kua mabue, nakamumona ku mutu kua mikuna, bantu aba badi bashikama ha buabo kabena babadibua munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabo
Yoshuwa, muana wa Nune, uvua wambuluisha Moshe bituadije ku buana, kuelaye diyi ne: Mfumuanyi Moshe, ubakandike, kabenji nanku
Kuyabu ne muena mudimu wa Abrahame pambelu
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Mapangadika dîyi mashintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila ne mamanyisha badi mwa kuashintulula mu bulongolodi bwawu anu kudi dîyi
Bana ba balume ba Ashe, Yimena ne Yishewa ne Yishewi ne Belia ne muan abo wa bakashi, Sela, ne bana ba balume ba Belia, Hebê ne Malekiele
Bana balume ba Hama badi nunku Kusha ne Miselayima ne Puta ne Kanana

Mulume eu nealue ne mulambu wa kubuikila n au disambuka diandi dia mikenji kudi Yehowa, ku mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusangakena, neafile tshimpanga tshia mulambu wa kubuikila n au disambuka diandi dia mikenji
Wimane nabu kumpala kuanyi
Panudi nuenza tshibilu dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu yonsu, nansha tshibilu tshia mushindu mukuabu, nenuele mpungi diba didibu bandambula milambu ya kuosha, nansha milambu ya bobumue
Dutelonone Bikala bantu babidi batandangane, ne haluabo bua kulumbuluishibua, balumbuluishi nebalumbulule tshilumbu tshiabo; ku nyima nebabingishe muntu muimpe ne nebahishe muntu mubi
Muakuidi udi ufila mulambu wa bukula budibo balamba mu nfulu ne mu tshivuadi ne mu dilonga, yeye mene neangate bintu ebi bionso
Bobo nebalumbuluile bantu bilumbu matuku onso bobo nebalue kûdi ne bilumbu binene, kadi bobo nebakose bilumbu bikese; nunku badi mua kukumatshisha
Wakateka bitekelu bia minda mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ku mpala kua mesa ku luseke lua nsubu lua ku sude
Padiye ulambula mukoku, aye nawu muaba wa tshijila
Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Naho ne Nzambi wa tatu wabo ikale mulumbuluishi hankatshi hetu Yakoba wakaditshiha ku ditshina dia tatu wandi Isaka
Bualu bua meme nakamulelela muana mu bununu buandi
Nenufike pabuipi ne ditunga dia bena Amone
Mose wakaluhuka ku mpala kua Yehowa ne milangala yonso kudi Bena Isalele bobo bakatangila ne muntu yonso wakangata mulangala wandi
Bobo nebalonde ku nyima kua bonso ku mabendele abo
Nenuikale ne mitshi ya olive mu madimi enu onso, kadi kanuena nudilaba manyi ai ham bidi; bualu bua mamuma neahohoke
Tuyayi ku mbelu
Nenshipe bamuanabute bonsu ba bantu ne ba nyama
Nuenu bena Izrayele, nulame mikenji eyi bimpe, nuyikumbaje
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Manashe, Gamaliele muana mulume wa Pedasû
Bamane kuenda matuku asatu, Abrahame ukenzakana kumona mukuna awu umueneka pa bule

Bintu bidi bidimenena mu tshidimu tshia kubanda kua buloba nebikale bintu bienu bia kudia, bintu biebe ne bia muhika webe mulume ne bia muhika webe mukashi ne bia muena mudimu webe ne bia muenyi udi ushikama n ebe ne bia bimuna biebe ne bia nyama yonso idi mu buloba buebe bintu bionso biakadimenena nebikale bintu bia kudia
Pikala Maweja Nangila mumane kubutula bantu abu, kanulondi bibidilu biabu to
Bena Merari ke bavua ne mudimu wa kulama bintu bivuabu benza nabi nzubu wa tshijila: mabaya, makunji ne bitaku biawu, ne bintu bikuabu bionsu

Kadi Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona, wakahidia bua tuetu tuhite mu buloba; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanyengabasha meji andi, wakakolesha mutshima wandi, bualu bua kumufila mu tshianza tshienu, bu muakenzeye lelu
Nanku mukalenga alame mukanda awu pabuipi nende, bua ikale uubala matuku onsu atshidiye ne muoyi, bua anemeke Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wende, akumbaje mikenji yonsu idibu bafunda mu mukanda awu
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu neele meji ne: bena Izrayele mbapambuke mu njila, bajimine mu tshipela
Ke patudi tushipela Maweja Nangila bamuanabute ba bimuna
Moshe kumvua buowa, kudiambila ne: Bualu ebu bakadi babumanye
Nebalame bintu bionsu bia mu ntenta awu
Nushale anu mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena matuku muanda mutekete a munya ne a butuku, bua kuenza mudimu munufundile kudi Maweja Nangila, bua kanufu

Dituku dikuabu, nudi mua kumvua ne: mu tshimue tshia ku bimenga, bidi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupe bua kusomba, mudi bantu babi badi bambila bena Izrayele bua kutendelela mvidie inudi kanuyi bamanye mpindiewu
Nunku nenumushe malu mabi â munkatshi muenu
Kadi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kena mutekete bena Izrayele to
Neamoshile mujima pa tshilambuilu pamue ne bukula
Maweja Nangila kumuandamuna ne: Muntu kena ukushipa to
Bena Isalele buonso buabo bakajiana Mose ne Alona mu tshihela

Ya ye lele ya ye lele Nganji kubikila Maamù eh Mamyanyi mwa Mbuya kasasu eh Mambi wa Tumba ne Tshala eh Mwana mudikaya yampongo eh Moyi munda nganyi wa ngakwile eh Ngipata mukunda muya mukanka mwana we lekela we Mwâna we lekela kudila mwadi e Mwâna we lekela kudila mwadi e Bakulumpa bakudima kwěpì
Kupetabu diakalenga kudi bena Ejipitu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mona, meme nakudiangatshila Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele mu miaba ya ban a bute bonso bakalelabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, Bena Lewi nebikale banyi: bualu bua ban a bute bonso mbanyi, mu dituku dinakashiha ban a bute bonso mu buloba bua Ejipitu, nakadijidila ban a bute bonso ba mu Isalele, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, bobo mbanyi, meme ndi Yehowa

Â mmatuku anakasungula bua nuenu nuambile bantu bua bikondo bia masangisha a tshijila bia kufila milambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bukula ne mulambu wa bintu bia kunua, mulambu dituku diau mulambu dituku diau, malu â adi ha mutu ha matuku a lumingu lua Yehowa ne bintu binudi basue kufila ne ha mutu ha bintu bidi mitshima yenu musue kufila kudi Yehowa
Bobo bakangata ku bianza bia Mose bintu bionso biakafua Bena Isalele ne disanka bua kuenza n abi bintu bionso bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Katuena basue kufika to
Nanku pavua divuba dishale dibuikila muaba wa tshijila matuku a bungi, bena Izrayele kabavua bumuka muaba awu to
Nanku kanuena mua kutendelela kabidi Maweja Nangila munudi nuenza mpindiewu to, muntu yonsu utendelela wende mushindu
Wakenza makunshi a acacia anai, wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ku makunshi, akadi ne bitubuidi bia or, wakenza nkanu yau mai ya tshiamu tshia argent
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi, anyi yeye neatekeshe mitshima ya bantu bakuabo

Muntu nansha umwe peshi tshisumbu tshia bantu katshiena mwa kwangata tshitupa tshia buloba bwa ditunga bu mwaba wa kubangila dikeba dia kukudimuna mianda ya tshidiidi anyi dibweeja dia tshimvundu mu ditunga dia Kongu anyi mu ditunga dikwabo diônso to
Yeye wakabela lusumuinu luandi ne, Balaka, mukelenge wa Moaba, wakumbikila ku Alama ne ku mikuna ya ku Esete ne, Lua biebe, ungelele bana ba Yakoba mulau, lua biebe kukanda Bena Isalele
Kudingidi mukuenu
Kanungu ka Bampulushi ba ditunga dijima badi bakookela bamfumu badi kabayi basalayi ba mwaba udibo benzela mudimu ne badi ku dîyi dia minisitila mwimikila mianda ya munda wa ditunga
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Wakakuambila ne, Udi butaka nganyi
Badi bantu banyi
Kulama kua Muinda Lew

Alona neamiamine mashi a nyama mishiha ha nsengu ya tshioshelu etshi bua kubuikidila bantu mibi yabo, yeye nênze bualu ebu musangu umue ku tshidimu ku tshidimu bikondo bienu bionso, tshidi tshia tshijila tshitambe kudi Yehowa
Nenubabutule bonsu, kabayi babavuluke kabidi pa buloba
Kuvudi tatu ebe mukashi bilulu, yeye udi muan abo ne tatu ebe

Hakahita matuku asatu Abalahama wakabandisha mesu andi, wakamona muaba kule kuakua Abalahama wakambila bansongalume bandi babidi ne, Nuenu nushale kimoko ne nyama wa mpunda, tuetu netuye ne nsongalume, netutendelele, netuhingane kunudi
Nanku muntu kena mufue kabidi to
Nuvuluke matuku anyi a lumingu, nuikale ne kanemu mu nsubu wanyi, meme ndi Yehowa
Dibadika Badi banyoka Miriyame Moshe uvua musele mukaji muena Kushe
Nenteke lukuna pankatshi pebe ne mukaji, pankatshi pa ndelanganyi yebe ne yende
Kadi nansha bikala nanku, disanka dia ne mapa a tshidiidi ndianyishibwa anu bwa beena Kongu, pa kumbusha mapangadika makwabo adi mêyi ne mikandu mwa kwangata
Ke mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubabikila, ubakonka ne: Nudi benze nenku bualu kayi
Yeye nealue n abu kudi muakuidi, ne muakuidi neabuambule dianza tente bu tshivulukidi, neabuoshe ha tshioshelu bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia eu udi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu

Bakenza nkanu ya or ibidi, bakayiteka muinshi mua bilulu bia ha maha, ku mpala kuabi ne ku mutu kua mukaba muimpe wa efoda Bakasanka tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi ne nkanu yatshi ku nkanu ya efoda ne muonshi wa bleu muhindakana tshilulu etshi tshiakashala hehi ne mukaba wa efoda, kabakatshisulula, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Nusangishe bantu bonso, ne balume ne bakashi ne bana bakese ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, bua buonso buabo bumue, bayile lungenyi, batshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, batumikile mei onso a mikenji ei; nunku bana babo badi kabayi banze kumanya nebunvue, nebamanye mua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tô matuku onso anudi nushikama mu buloba bunudi nuya dishiya dia Yadene bua kubuhiana
Kadi Nzambi wakabalombola mu nshila wa ku tshihela hehi ne Dishiba Dikunze Bena Isalele bakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne bintu bia nvita
Nanku muaba onsu unudi basomba kanuena mua kudia kabidi mashi a nyunyi, nansha a nyama too ne kashidi
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Yalede, Mahalelela wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi asatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Nuenze tshibilu etshi matuku muanda mutekete, bua kutendelela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Bakulu bonso ba mu musoko eu udi utamba ha buihi ne muntu mufue, nebuvuwe bianza biabo ha mutu ha kana ka ngombe kadi ne nshingu waku mutshibula mu tshibanda; bobo nebitabe ne, Bianza bietu kabiakamatshisha mashi au, mesu etu kaena mâmone
Moshe ne Arone kuangata bantu bavuabu basungule abu bua bikale babambuluishi babu
Isaka wakumbula kabidi mena a mai akimbabo mu matuku a tatu wandi Abalahama, bualu bua Bena Peleshete bakelamu buloba bakafua Abalahama, Isaka wakayidika mena akidika Abalahama
Mu Gêshona muakadi diku dia Bena Libini ne diku dia Bena Shimei, au mmeku a bena Gêshona
Uvua mubapatule mu Ejipitu anu bua bafuile mu tshipela
Kadi baku bende kuela meji ne: udi wamba bilele
Uvua ne mikoku, mbuji, ngombe, biamu bia mpawungi, ne biamu bitoke bia mushinga mukole kabidi
Halua tshidimu tshitanu, nudi mua kudia mamuma ne kuendulula n au mushinga meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Mutuangaji akobolole muena tshibawu awu anu mushindu ewu, bua Maweja Nangila amufuile luse bua bubi buvuaye muenze kayi mumanye
Muntu yonsu uvua musombe mu ditunga diabu, mu tshisamba tshiabu, wakula muakulu wa ditunga diabu
Hanuasombesha mukuenu tshintu, kanuyi mu nsubu wandi bua kudiangatshila tshieya tshiandi

Kanungu ka Kumpala kwa kubweela mu bukalenga ne ku ndekeelu wa bukalenga, Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne beena Bukalenga bunene badi ne tshia kufila ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu mukanda udi umanyisha bintu bia mêku abu, babala bintu binyunganyunga, mwikala kabidi ne bintu bieela mu mushinga , bintu bisangila ne bantu, makanyika, bia mushinga bikwabo, lupetu ludi mu tshibutshilu, bintu bikeena binyungakana, mwikala mpaangu ikeena miibaka, meetu, madimi ne bilaala, majimba ne nzubu mikwabo yônso, ne mikanda yaayi
Bana benu kabidi, tshisamba tshia Lewi, tshisamba tshia tatu ebe, ulue n abo bua bobo bakukuatshile mudimu kadi wewe ne bana bebe balume badi n ebe nenuikale ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena

Biafila muntu nansha nyama wa mpunda nansha ngombe nansha mukoko nansha nyama mukuabo kudi mukuandi bua kumiamina, ne biafua nyama, anyi biamutahabo mputa, anyi biamuihatabo ne muntu kayi mumutangile, ditshiha dia Yehowa nedikale hankatshi ha bubidi buabo bua kujingulula ne, Yeye kakalenga bintu bia mukuandi tshianza, ne bitabusha mukelenge wa nyama au nunku, mukuandi kena ne bualu bua kumufuta
Mutshima wa Yehowa wakanyingalala bualu bua yeye wakafuka bantu ha buloba, kanyinganyinga kakadi mu mutshima wandi
Mukoku awu wikale wa mushinga mukumbane wa nkanu ya tshiamu tshitoke, bilondeshile tshipimu tshia nkanu tshidibu natshi muaba wa tshijila, bualu mulambu ewu ngua dinua tshibalu

Noa wakaluhuka ne bana bandi balume ne mukashi andi ne bakashi ba bana bandi, ne nyama yonso ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi ne nyunyu yonso ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshiendakana ha buloba, bu mudi mishindu yabi, biakaluhuka mu buatu
Yakoba wakimanyika dibue dinene bu tshibumba ha muaba wakayikidileye n andi, wakahongolola mai a kutendelela n au ha mutu hadi wakelahu manyi kabidi
Pashishe Moshe ne bakulu makumi muanda mutekete ba bena Izrayele, kupingana ku mitanda
Kuambilaye Maweja Nangila ne: Kuitabi milambu yabu to
Mubuki wa Midiyana wakadi ne bana ba bakashi muanda mute kete bobo bakaha kusuna mai, bakûsha luvu lua mai tente bua kunuisha mikoko ya tatu abo mai
Padi mutuangaji mumane kuteta muntu, mumusangane ne: kena ne mikiya, kadi pashishe dikeji didi dituadija kutampakana pambidi, muntu awu neapingane tshiakabidi kudi mutuangaji
Kufila Kuabo kua Buatshiabuatshia Nom
Nanku tuetu tudi bajadike ne: Mvidi Mukulu udi mua kuakula ne bantu, kabayi bafua to
Dimue dituku, muanende wa bakaji muanabute, kuambila muakunyi ne: Tatu ukadi mununu
Yeye wakamuebesha ne, Nenkueyeke tshieya kai
Kubelaye lupemba, kubinyika dina dia bantu

Yehowa wakela n abo tshifufu, wakabateta, wakabambila ne, Binuatumikila di dia Yehowa Nzambi wenu, binuenza malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuandi, ne binuateleja matshu kudi mikenji yandi, binuenza mei andi onso, tshiena nnutumina nansha disama dimue dinakatumina Bena Ejipitu, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa udi unuondaha
Kushalabu bantu ba bukole
Yeye ulualua mu nshila bua kusangakena hebe, ne hakatangileye, yeye neasanke mu mutshima wandi
Kupita matuku muanda mutekete, Nowa kutuma nyunyi wa nkudimba tshiakabidi
Neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô matuku onso a disama diandi, yeye kena muakane, neashikame ha nkayandi ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Seruga mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi asatu, kulelaye Nahore
Sara kuimita, kulelela Abrahame muana wa ku bukunda, mu tshikondu tshivua Mvidi Mukulu mujadike

Tatu wabo Isalele wakabambila ne, Bikala bualu butukuate, enzai bienu nunku nuangate bintu biakakuamibua mu buloba buetu, nubiteke mu bisaka bienu, nuye n abi bu matabisha kudi mulume au Nuangate bintu bia muhuya muimpe, baume ne buitshi ne mula ne pistaches ne amandes, nuye ne argent muhite misangu ibidi mu bianza bienu, argent yakahingashabo munda mua bibombi bienu, nuye n ai mu bianza bienu kabidi, bumue bakenza bualu abu ku mpukahuka nuangate muakunyi enu kabidi, bikai bienu, nuye kudi mulume au
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi biafileye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neabake mukashi au
Kuvudi tatu ebe anyi mamu ebe bilulu, yeye udi mamu webe, kumuvudi bilulu
Nudi mua kumudia ku mbelu kuenu: muntu udi muakane anyi udi kayi muakane udi mua kumudia bu mudiye udia kabuluku anyi mbashi
Ei idi mikenji ludi mua kuteka ku mpala kuabo
Mukuna awu batshidi baubikila too ne mpindiewu ne: Pa mukuna ewu Maweja Nangila neatupeshe

Bakamuha bidia ha buandi, bakabaka bidia ha buabo, ne bakaha Bena Ejipitu bakadi badia n andi ha buabo, bualu bua Bena Ejipitu kabatu badia bidia ne Bena Ebelu, bualu ebu budi bufuisha Bena Ejipitu bundu
Ndi ngakula nende mudi bantu bayukidilangana, mmuambile malu onsu patoke, ndileja kudiye

Labana wakamba ne Mushiki eu udi bu mutshihu wa bualu hankatshi hetu lelu Nunku bakabikila muaba au ne, Galede ne, Misepa, bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa atulame meme ne wewe, hatuamuangalaka muntu ne muntu
Nunku halua tshidimu tshia disanka dia Bena Isalele, buhianyi buabo nebusangishibue ku buhianyi bua tshisamba tshiakayabo, nunku buhianyi buabo nebumuke ku buhianyi bua batatu etu

Halua Yehowa n enu mu buloba bua Bena Kanana ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Amole ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse buakalayeye batatu enu ne, Nennuhebu, buloba budi ne mabele ne buitshi bia bungi, nuenu nuvuluke tshilele etshi mu ngondo eu
Moshe kukosa tshimpanga atshi muminu, kulaba Arone mashi atshi ku lusongu lua ditshi, ku tshiala ne ku muana nkasa munene bia ku luseke luende lua dia balume
Kahia bakahatuka kudi Yehowa, kakosha balume nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu bakadi bafila musenga wa manananshi
Ntu ngalesha bihungu tshinunu badi bansue ne badi benza mikenji yanyi luse lujalame

Alona nealongolole minda dilolo ne dinda ku mesu kua Yehowa ku dituku ku dituku, ku mpala kua tshilulu tshia ku muaba wa tshijila mu ntenta wa kusangakena eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu bikondo bienu bionso
Mose wakambila Nzambi ne, Meme ndi nganyi bua kuya kudi Palo ne bua buhatula Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu

Uzole tukoho tusatu bu bilongo bia amande mu ditamba dimue, dihu ne tshilongo dihu ne tshilongo, uzole tukoho tusatu bu bilongo bia amande mu ditamba dikuabo, dihu ne tshilongo dihu ne tshilongo, uzole nunku ku matamba asambombo adi masa ku tshitekelu
Bualu nyama itudi tulambula Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu, bena Ejipitu badi bayinemeka
Lota waka luhuka kudibo wakinshila tshibi ku nyima kuandi
Bena Izrayele bonsu bikale benza tshibilu etshi
Udi unanga amu kunanga bantu bonsu badi bamunanga, bamutumikila
Nanku Sefora, mukaji wa Moshe, kuangata dibue ditue, kuteka nadi muanende wa balume panshi
Bana balume ba Kusha badi nunku Seba ne Hawila ne Sabeta ne Lâma ne Sabeteka Bana balume ba Lama badi Sheba ne Dedana
Nuenu nuakalua ha buihi, nuakimana kuinshi kua mukuna; mukuna wakatema kahia tô ne mu diulu, ne midima mikole ne matutu
Balombodi ba bisamba abi bionsu kumupesha makombu dikumi ne abidi
