Mudi dipeeja dia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga padi, ku nkonku miela kudi Tshibambalu tshimwe anyi tshikwabo tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga pa bidi bitangila midimu ya Bukalenga bunene, Minisitika kavulambedi kayi ufila diandamuna nansha dimwe mu tshipungu tshia matuku makumi asatu
Mulau wa Mputa ya Mbalanga Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nuangate manza a butue bua mu tshikutu, Mose abumiamine mulu ku mesu kua Palô
Neamiamine mashi awu ne mayi mu nzubu misangu muanda mutekete
Miaba yonsu inudi basombe, nudie anu mampa kaayi mela buanga
Bakatuenzela bimpe mu Ejipitu, nunku Yehowa neanuhe munyinyi, nenudie
Wewe neuhidie kudihuekesha ku mesu kuanyi musangu bule munyi
Moshe kumuka kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, kupatuka mu musoku
Nenku, nebapingaje mabue makuabu, basunguile tshiakabidi miaba ivua mabue ayi
Moshe ne Arone kuambila bena Izrayele bonsu ne: Dilolu edi, nenujadike ne: Maweja Nangila ke uvua mutupatule mu Ejipitu
Pikala muntu wa kunudi muambi, meme Maweja Nangila nendimanyishe kudiye, mmuleje malu mu lungenyi, nansha mu tshilota
Kadi nuyilambule anu muaba wikalaye musungule bua nuenu kumonangana nende

Kanungu ka Muntu nansha umwe, tshianana udi upeta dinyooka dia dipangila dia ditunga, kêna mwa kwaasa bisumbu bia basalayi, bia bifwanangana ne bia basalayi anyi bilwilu biende nkayende, anyi kwambulwisha babitenda ne bia lufu

Bua Yosefe yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa avudishile buloba buandi disanka, bua bintu bia mushinga mukole bia mu diulu, bua mume, ne bua mai adi muinshi mua buloba; ne bua bintu biakakuama mamuma bualu bua diba, ne bua bintu bidi belangana ku ngondo ku ngondo; bua bintu bimpe bia mu mikuna, ne bua mabue a mushinga mukole a mu mikuna ya tshiendelele; ne bua bintu bimpe bia ha buloba ne tshiuwidi tshiabu, ne bua diakalengele dia bantu badi bashikama muitu
Ne tangila, meme nenkoleshe mitshima ya Bena Ejipitu, nebayemu ku nyima kua Bena Isalele, nengangate butumbi bualu bua Palô ne bisumbu biandi bionso ne makalu andi ne masalayi andi adi enda ha tubalu
Wakimita difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, yeye wakamba ne Bualu bua Yehowa wakumpa ne meme ndi mubengibue, nunku yeye wakumpa muana eu mukuabo, wakamuidika dina ne, Shimeona
Nunku tangildi, mesu enu adi amona bu mudi mesu a muakuny anyi Benyamina amona ne, Mukana muanyi mudi munuambila malu au
Hakatentekelabo buloba nunku matuku makumi anai, bakahingana
Maweja Nangila kuambuluisha bena Izrayele
Yonsu udi udia munyinyi awu, mmuena tshibawu
Nuvua badienzele lupingu lua kana ka ngombe ka tshiamu
Bena Isalele bakaditshiha kudi Yehowa ne, Biwafila bantu aba mu bianza bietu, netushihe misoko yabo yonso
Bualu nuvua penu benyi mu ditunga dia Ejipitu

Ndi musue kunusungidila mu dikenga edi, kunumusha mu ditunga edi, kunubueja mu ditunga dia bena Kenaane, bena Iti, bena Amore, bena Perizi, bena Ivi ne bena Yebusa, ditunga didi ne mabela ne buitshi bipite bungi
Makunshi a tshibi akadi anai, ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku mai, ne bitubuidi bia argent, bakalengesha makunshi ne tshiamu tshia argent
Nudilengeshe nunku, nuikale bantu ba tshijila bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Nanku Moshe ne Arone kubuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Kadi kahita ka bena maluvu wakahua Yosefe muoyo, yeye kakamuvuluka
Kumukeye mu nsubu wandi, yeye udi mua kuikala mukashi wa munga muntu
Moshe kuambila Yoshuwa ne: Sungula bantu ba bukole
Mai akahuekahueka ha buloba, hakakumbana matuku lukama ne makumi atanu, mai akadi ahueka

Ndi nkusengelela ne, Nuitabushe bua tuetu tuhite ku buloba buenu, katuena tuhita mu madimi anyi mu madimi a tumuma, katuena tunua mai a mena a mai anuakumbula, netuye anu mu musesu wa mukelenge, katuena tusesuka ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi tô ne hakahita butshika buenu
Kudinabu too ne panshi pa mayi, bu mudi dibue dia bujitu
Padi muntu mulume nansha mukaji muikale ne bilundu ku mutu, nansha ne mputa ku tshibanga, mutuangaji amukenkete
Diba mene adi, muena nazire neakunguile nsuki mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Alona wakadi ne bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi ne bisatu hakafueye mu mukuna wa Hô
Au mmena a balume badi mua kuimana n enu
Yeye wakabisha mesu andi wakamona bakashi ne bana, wakamukonka ne, Bantu aba badi n ebe mbanganyi
Kadi meme nemmupeshe muoyi wa tshitunu

Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne bukookeshi bwa kutumina bukalenga bwa mbulamatadi mukanda udiye mufunda yêye nkayende anyi mufunda mu tshibûngi bwa kubumanyisha idi mwenda munda, bukalenga abu budi ne tshia kufila diandamuna mu ngondo isatu idi ilonda

Wewe newangate dianyi dia tshimpanga, ne mukila udi ne dianyi ne dianyi didi ku mala ne lukutu lua ku mutshima, ne tumuma tubidi ne dianyi diabi ne tshibelu tshia ku tshianza tshia balume, bualu bua tshimpanga etshi ntshia kujidila n atshi bakuidi
Nyeye wawa mu njila bua kumonangana nebe
Bualu munyinyi wa mulambu wa nanku udi wa tshijila menemene
Bantu bakajiana Nzambi ne Mose kabidi ne, Nuakatuluhuila mu Ejipitu bua kutufuisha mu tshihela nunku bua tshinyi
Abalahama wakadi ne bidimu lukama hakamulelabo muana wandi mulume Isaka
Wakamuambila kabidi ne, Tudi ne mashinde ne manvua a bungi, ne miaba ya kulala
Hakikila nyunyu ya bikololo ha bitalu ebi, Abalama wakayihata
Hanuahuola bintu binuakakuna mu buloba, kanuhuodi ku matengu a madimi, kanusangishi bintu bionso binudi nuhuola
Tshitupa tshibîdi : Bidi bitangila Bweena Ditunga Kanungu ka Bweena ditunga dia Kongu budi bumwe ne bwa mukawu

Yehowa wakamba ne, Nengendeshe buimpe buanyi buonso ku mesu kuebe, nemmanyishe dina dianyi dia Yehowa ku mpala kuebe; nengikale ne dinanga kudi bantu bandi musue kuikala ne dinanga, nendeshe luse kudi bantu bandi musue kulesha luse
Nudimuke, kanufidi milambu ya kuosha mu miaba yonso mudi nutangila; kadi muaba udi Yehowa Usungula munkatshi mua bisamba bienu, nenufileku milambu yenu ya kuosha, nenuenzeku mei onso anakunuambila

Dituku dikuabo hakayeye mu nsubu bua kuenzeye mudimu wandi, ne mu nsubu kamuakadi muntu mukuabo, yeye wakamukuata ku tshivualu tshiandi, wakamuambila ne, Ulale n anyi, ne yeye wakashiya tshivualu tshiandi mu tshianza tshiandi, wakanyema, wakahatuka
Hashishe Bena Isalele bakimba musambu eu ne, Mai abande, nuenu nuimbile musambu; mpokolo wa mai wakumbulabo kudi bakelenge, ne kudi miloho ya bantu ne dikombo dia bukelenge ne milangala yabo
Badi babikila tshimenga atshi ne: Babele, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mubondakajilamu miakulu ya bisamba bionsu

Yehowa Nzambi wakaladika mulume tulu tukole, ne yeye wakalala tulu, wakangata lubale luandi lumue, Wakabikila musunyi kabidi, ne lubale luakangata Yehowa Nzambi kudi mulume, yeye Wakenza n alu mukashi, wakalua n andi kudi mulume
Biadia muntu tshintu tshia tshijila ku mpukahuka, yeye neasangishe tshintu tshitanu ha mutu hatshi, neahe muakuidi tshintu tshia tshijila
Enza biebe nkanu ya or ibidi, uyiteke muinshi mua bilulu bia efoda bia ha maha, ku mpala kuabi ne ku mutu kua mukaba wa efoda
Pavuabu benda pamue, Izake kukonka Abrahame ne: Tatu
Moshe kumukuata ku mukila, kumonaye ukadi ne dikombu mu bianza

Kanungu ka : Mu tshikondo tshia midimu yabo, Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne beena Bukalenga bunene kabeena, bôbo nkayabo anyi batuma muntu, mwa kusumba anyi kwangata mu mushindu kampanda, anyi kufutshila tshintu tshia Mbulamatadi, tshia polovensa anyi tshia bitupa bidikadile bia teletwale to
Kabidi nenukuate ditunga dia Kenaane, didibu banupesha kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu
Bakamulesha mulambu wa kuosha, tshituha ne tshituha ne mutu, yeye wakabisha ha tshioshelu
Labana ne Betuele bakamba ne, Bualu ebu buakufuma kudi Yehowa, tuetu katuena mua kukuambila dî dibi anyi dî dimpe
Tshisangilu tshia ntwadijilu badi batshilombola kudi mufundi wa mikanda wa dipoko wa buludiki bwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga

Moshe kuandamuna ne: Unjadikile dituku diudi musue, nkulombele bua Mvidi Mukulu abutule ndimba idi ikutatshisha wewe ne balombodi ba mu bukalenga buebe, kabidi ne bantu bebe, bua ishale anu mu musulu wa Nile
difila ne dilama mikanda ya nzubu mu dineemeka dia bulongolodi bwa ditunga;
Ngombe minyane yakadia ngombe muanda mutekete yakadi midiunde ne ya manyi
Bena Izrayele kumbuka ku Kibrote Taawa, kuya kuasa mitanda yabu ku Asherote
Pelege wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu, wakalela Leu
Anu bobu aba ke bavua bambile mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bua anyishe bena Izrayele bumuke bonsu mu ditunga diende
Nebasakidile kabidi mbuji wa mpumbu bua mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Mu matuku onso adiye mudijidile kudi Yehowa yeye kena mumanye mua kulua ha buihi ne mundi mufue
Ke mikenji inudi ne bua kulama nuenu, ne ndelanganyi yenu kashidi

Padibio bipetangana mu tshisangilu tshinene, Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga ne Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi ne bukookeshi bwa kufunda Mulombodi wa Ditunga anyi Minisitila wa Mbedi ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu, nangananga bwa dipangila dia ditunga ne bwa dibwiisha dia mianda misokoma ya ditunga

Kanungu ka Difunda, kumpalampala kwa biônso, mu ndongamu wa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu dia tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi , dia dipangadika dia dîyi anyi dia diteeja dia tshidiidi tshia mu kabujima didi dienzeka kakuyi dieelakana padi Bukalenga bunene bwa Mbula Matadi budilomba, panyima pa dipeshangana dia ngenyi dieenza mu Tshipangu tshia ba meena
Ndi mpingana kuetu kudi baledi banyi
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Kena mua kuasa tshifulu ku mutu to
Ditangilula didi dilwa dia kashidi anu padibo banyisha tshingenyingenyi, dilomba anyi difwanyikija kudi beena ditunga
Maweja Nangila kufundulula mikenji dikumi pa mabue mapiamapia, bu muvuaye mufunde pa mabue a kumpala

Kanungu ka Polovensa ibidi anyi ya bûngi idi mwa kulongolola, mu diumvwangana, mwaba wa kubotakajila ne wa kutwangajila tshidiidi tshiayi ne kabidi kuludika pamwe bitupa bikwabo bidi midimu yabi mikala itangila bu mianda idi ikumbanangana ne makookeshi ayi
Ke munudi mua kujadika ne: meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Bobo bakanyingalasha mutshima wa Isaka ne wa Lebeka
Udi amu ne tshibangu tshia tshiuwuja
Badi basungula tshipwita mukulumpa yônso ne bantu babidi badi mwa kumupingana
Bantu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Efrayime nebase mitanda yabu ku tshisumbu ku tshisumbu, luseke ludi diba dibuelela, muaba udi dibendela diabu
Bualu bua meme nakangata tshiadi tshidibo banyukula ne diboko didibo bakuha munkatshi mua milambu ya Bena Isalele, nakabifila kudi Alona muakuidi ne bana bandi balume bu bituha biabo tshiendelele

Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshidi tshipeepeja bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bunene anyi bwa umwe wa ku beena Bukalenga bunene pa disungula dia mukanda wa dianyisha anyi dia mukanda wa didiombola
Nudi tshisamba tshia tshijila tshia Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bakatamba mikata ya bidia biakadi kabiyi ne luevene biakaluabo n abi, kabakadi ne luevene bualu bua bakahitata mu Ejipitu, kabakamanya mua kushala, ne kabakadianjila kudilongoluela bia kudia
Enza mbote ya or makumi atanu ku mubangu wa tshilulu tshimue, ne mesu a mbote makumi atanu ku mubangu wa tshilulu tshikuabo, bua kutuangasha bilulu, tshitendelelu netshikale bu tshilulu tshimue

Hakamba Palo kuhidia kundekelu, Yehowa wakashiha ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ba bantu ne ba nyama kabidi, nunku ndi mushihele Yehowa ban a bute ba balume ba nyama, kadi ndi muhikule ban a bute ba balume banyi
Uhande mabaya a mitshi ya acacia bua kuimanyika kulu mu tshitendelelu
Dielulula Bena Izrayele ntshisamba tshia Maweja Nangila Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, neanufikishe mu ditunga dinudi ne bua kukuata
Hadiundisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, matshika enu muakanulayeye, ne nuenu nenuambe ne, Netudie munyinyi, bualu bua mitshima yenu idi misue kudia munyinyi; nudi mua kudia munyinyi udi mitshima yenu misue
Maweja Nangila kuandamuna ne: Ndi mbafuila luse bu muudi ulomba
Tshibangidilu Diledibua dia Izake Maweja Nangila kusankisha Sara, kumukumbaja bionsu bivuaye mumulaye

Nomba Bena Isalele Badi Batendelela Bâla peô Bena Isalele bakashikama mu Shitima, bantu bakabanga kuenda masandi ne bana bakashi ba Bena Moaba, bualu bua bakabikila bantu ku milambu ya nzambi yabo, ne bantu bakadia, bakinamina nzambi yabo
Bena Izrayele kulomba bena Ejipitu bilamba ne bintu bienza ne tshiamu tshia mpawungi nansha ne tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole bu muvua Moshe mumane kubambila

Bintu bidi n abi Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona, muakuidi, nebikale manyi a minda ne musenga wa manananshi, ne mulambu wa bukula, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutuyeye udi mulami wa nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bintu bionso bidimu, ne wa muaba wa tshijila ne bintu bionso bidimu
Wewe ne ba mu nsubu webe nenubadie ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ku tshidimu ku tshidimu mu muaba udi Yehowa musungule

Pikalabio bienzeka mushindu wa momumwe luseka lukwabo, mwenyi yônso udi usanganyibwa mu njila mululame pa tshipaapu tshia ditunga udi ne tshia kusanka pende ne mapa ne budikadidi bwa momumwe ne bwa mweena Kongu, pa kumbusha mapa a tshidiidi
Mmubutule mu mayi tubalu ne bavua babandapu
Abrahame mumane kufua, Izake kuya kusomba pabuipi ne tshiina tshia mayi tshia Lahayi Royi
Mutuangaji aye ne nyunyi awu kumpala kua tshilambuilu
Meme tshiena muimite, tshiena mulele bantu bonsu aba to
Kulondabu njila wa mu tshipela bua kuya luseke ludi Mayi manene makunze
Nanku tuetu kushala mu tshibandabanda etshi, batangilangane ne tshimenga tshia Bete Peyore
Nuvuluke ne: nuvua bapika mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Alunsumbishe ku mushinga walu, nuenu batangile, bua lushale muaba wanyi
Kadi bobu balame kashidi muoyi wa kunnemeka, ne wa kukumbaja mikenji yanyi, nebikale bena diakalenga, pamue ne ndelanganyi yabu
Bikalabo kabayi bitabusha bimanyinu ebi bibidi, kabayi bunvue dî diebe, wewe newangate mai a mu musulu, wele ha buloba bûme, ne mai awakangata mu musulu neakudimuke mashi ha buloba bûme
Ke bankambua ba meku a bena Kora
Muntu nealuhuke kudi Yakoba, neikale ne bukelenge butambe, neashihe tshituha tshia bantu badi bashala mu musoko
Tshimenga atshi nutshiupule bua kashidi, kabayi mua kutshiasulula kabidi to
Bantu bonso bakakuohola nkanu ya or yakadi ku matshu abo, bakalua n ai kudi Alona
Nanku nuenu kanumuku mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena bua kanufu, bualu Maweja Nangila mmunulabe mafuta a tshijila
Pashishe bavua baalamba mu ngesu, nansha baenza mikata
Nzambi wakunvua kulomba kua Lea, yeye wakimita difu, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume muitanu
Hanuahuola bintu binuakakuna mu buloba, kanuhuodi ku matengu a madimi, kanusangishi bintu bionso, nenushiye bintu ebi bua kukuatshisha n abi bahele ne benyi meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Tshitupa tshia tshisamba tshia Menashe, tshidi tshisomba luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua Yardene, ndi mutshipeshe tshitupa tshivua tshishale tshia buloba bua Ngilaade, ne ditunga dijima dia Bashane, mmumue ne: muaba uvuabu kudi mukalenga Oge kale
Bialala mulume ne mukashi, biamueleye bilumi, bubidi buabo nebadioweshe ne mai, nebikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Bidi matabisha akatumineye Esau mukelenge wandi, ne mona, yeye udi kabidi ku nyima kuetu
Muena nsudi eu neahande bilulu biandi, neashiye nsuki ya ku mutu kuandi tshianana, neabuikile mushiku wandi wa ha mutu, nêle mbila ne, Tshiena muakane, tshiena muakane
Kadi kabena mua kuhana madimi adi ku matshika a misoko yabo, ebu mbuhianyi buabo tshiendelele
Kanuenji malu mabi makuabu, adi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu ubenga, amufikisha munda
Kadi mpokolo wa mai anyi dina dia mai diakumbulabo didi ne mai a bungi, mai au neikale malengele, kudi bintu bionso bidi bituangana ne mibidi yabi mufue nebikale ne bukoya
Yosefe wakambila tatu wandi ne, Aba mbana bakumpa Nzambi kunoko Yeye wakamba ne, Ulue n abo kundi, nembavudishile disanka
Kadi Nowa uvua muena diakalenga kudi Maweja Nangila

Dibadika Mushindu udi bisamba bia bena Izrayele ne bua kuasa mitanda Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Bena Izrayele bonsu base mitanda yabu muaba udi tshisumbu tshiabu tshia bena mvita, pa buipi ne dibendela dia tshisamba tshiabu
Bua Zebuluna yeye wakamba ne, Usanke mu kuluhuka kuebe; ne Yisakâ, usanke mu ntenta yebe
Bobo bakalumbuluila bantu bilumbu matuku onso, bakalua ne bilumbu bikole kudi Mose, ne bobo bakakosa bilumbu bikese
Yeye wakafunda ha mabue, bu muakafundeye diambedi, mikenji dikumi yakanuambila Yehowa ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia mu dituku dia disangisha dietu; Yehowa wakumpau

Kadi bianza bia Mose biakanema bujitu; bakangata dibue, bakaditeka ku nyima ne yeye wakashikama ha mutu hadi, ne Alona ne Hû bakabandisha bianza biandi, umue ku luseke lukuabo, umue ku luseke lukuabo, ne bianza biandi biakakoleshibua to ne hakabuela diba
Minyinyi yonsu ya mu mayi neifue
Yayende wa muana kukonka muana wa mukalenga ne: Udi musue nkubikidile mukaji wa bena Ebrewu udi mua kukuamushila muana ewu dibela anyi
Kadi Abalama wakambila Salai ne, Mona, muena mudimu webe udi mu tshianza tshiebe, umuenzele bu mûdi musue Salai wakamuenzela bibi ne yeye wakanyema ku mesu kuandi
Bakamona Nzambi wa Isalele, muinshi mua makasa andi muakadi mabue a saphir, akadi matoke tô bu mubidi wa diulu
Kanutshinyi ku mesu kuabo, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi munene udi uvuisha ditshina dikole
Butshia, Lote kufika mu Soware
Wakuvuwa bintu bia munda ne bioku ne mai, Mose wakosha tshimpanga tshijima ha tshioshelu, eu udi mulambu udi utua dihembu, mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Bamuanabute bonsu badibu bandambula, ba bantu ne ba nyama mbebe wewe
Butshia dinda, kuyabu ku mukuna, bambilangane ne: Tudi bamane kuenza bibi
Ke Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Olola diboku mulu bua mvula mukole wa mabue aloke, alokele bena ditunga dia Ejipitu, bimuna biabu ne bintu bionsu bidi mu madimi
Kadi kubumushaye mu ditunga divua Izake
Nzambi wakambila Noa ne, Etshi ntshimanyinu tshia tshihungidi tshinakujadika hankatshi hetu ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo ha buloba
Ke muudi mua kujikija bijanu bidibu banjana nabi
Ekesode Kuhita kua Yehowa Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne, Ngondo eu neikale tshibangidilu tshia ngondo kunudi, neikale ngondo wa kumudilu kua tshidimu kunudi
Kudisombuedi, kuikadi ne lukuna kudi bana ba bana benu, kadi sua mukuenu bu mûdi mudisue, meme ndi Yehowa
Tera mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi muanda mutekete, kulelaye Abrame, Nahore ne Arane
Osheya, muana wa Nune, wa mu tshisamba tshia Efrayime
Meme nakabambila ne, Muntu yonso udi ne or akuohole, ne bobo bakafua or kundi, nakuela mu kahia ne kana aka ka ngombe ka or kakahatuka mu kahia
Bualu bukuabo, nakunvua mikemu ya Bena Isalele badi mu butaka kudi Bena Ejipitu, ndi muvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi
Ebere kulela bana ba balume babidi: muanabute dina diende Pelega, bualu mu matuku ende ke muvua ditapulukangana dituadija munkatshi mua bantu
bua bobo kabakatshumanya Mose wakabambila ne, Tshidi bidia biakunuha Yehowa bua kudia
Ke munudi mua kuenzela mukaji yonsu padiye ulela muana wa balume, nansha wa bakaji

Bualu bua yeye wakasua batatu benu, nunku yeye wakasungula bana babo bakabalonda ku nyima, yeye nkayandi wakanuhatula mu Ejipitu ne bukole buandi bunene; bua kunuihatshila bisamba bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole ku mesu kuenu, ne bua kulua n enu mu buloba buabo bu buhianyi, bu mudi bualu ebu lelu
Dikenga dia kumpala dia bena Ejipitu: mayi adi andamuka mashi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu udi ne tshitunu
Hakashikisha Yakoba kubadimusha nunku, wakateka makasa andi ha bulalu, wakahuola muoyo wandi, wakasangishibua kudi bankambua bandi
Kola wakabikila tshisumbu tshonso tshia batomboki ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka kudi tshisumbu tshonso
Nanku dimukayi, kanupambuki, kanushiyi njila mululame
Mukenji ewu nuulame kashidi ku ndelanganyi ne ku ndelanganyi yenu yonsu
Tshintu tshionso tshidi tshituangane ne munyinyi au netshikale tshia tshijila, hamiaminabo mashi a mulambu, biamatshilau ha tshmialu, wewe neutshisukule mu muaba wa tshijila
Kubelaye lupemba, wamba ne: Tantayi, nulelangane, nuvulangane buloba bujima

Mikenji ya tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Mikenji ya tshibilu tshia Dipita dianyi idi nunku: Muntu muenyi kena mua kudia biakudia bia Dipita dianyi to
Kufikalu ne nyunyi ya tulumbu ku mitanda aku
Diba adi, mwuluke Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wenu, uvua munupatule mu Ejipitu mumwuamu bupika
Butuku abu budi butuku budibo basue kuyidika Yehowa, bualu bua yeye wakabahatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ebu mbutuku bua Yehowa budi Bena Isalele bavuluka ku bikondo biabo bionso
Isalele wakamona bana babidi ba Yosefe, wakamukonka ne, Aba mbanganyi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Utume bantu, bua bobo batentekele buloba bua Kanâna, bundi mpa Bena Isalele, usungule mundi ku tshisamba ku tshisamba, mundi yonso udi bu mukelenge munkatshi muabo
Bukookeshi bwa kweela mwadi pa nkoselu wa tshilumbu budi bujadikibwa bwa muntu yônso
Avuale kabidi kaputula ka tshilamba kenza ne buanda bua ndanda
Kanungu ka Bintu bia muntu nkayende bidi bia kuneemekibwa bikole
Bualu bua mikenji ei inakunuambila lelu kayena minuhite bukole bua nuenu kuyenza; kayena kule
Bobo nebashikame mu misoko ei, ne bimuna ne bintu biabo ne nyama yabo mikuabo nebikale mu buloba budi bunyunguluka misoko

Pa kutangila bunene ne bukole bwa ntatu idi mitangila ditanta dia bubanji ne dia nsombelu wa bantu idi ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata diakanangana nayi, mwenji wa Dîyi dikulu mmufuka Tshipangu tshimikila mianda ya Bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bantu, tshidi ne mudimu wa kufila ngenyi milomba pa mianda eyi kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga, Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga ne kudi Bukalenga bunene
Nebadije tshilamba tshikuabu tshifikuluke tshienza ne miosa ya nyama pa mesa a mampa a tshijila
Neoshe dianyi dionso ha tshioshelu, bu muakenzeye ne dianyi dia mulambu wa kuikisha n au ditalala, muakuidi neafue mulambu wa ku buikila n au bubi buandi ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue

Kadi bikala Yehowa wenza bualu buhia buhia, ne buloba bubulula mukana muabu bubamina ne bantu bonso hadibo n abo, ne bobo baya ku Muaba wa Bafue hatshidibo ne muoyo, nunku nenumanye ne bantu aba bakalengulula Yehowa
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Umuka biebe munkatshi mua tshisumbu etshi tshia bantu, nenubashihe mu tshituha tshihi

Tshituha tshidi tshishale netshikale kudi Alona ne bana bandi balume bu tshintu tshia kudia, bobo nebadie tshituha tshidi katshiyi ne luevene mu muaba wa tshijila, mu luhangu lua ntenta wa kusambakena
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Muakuny ebe wakulua ne bu dimu wakumana kuangata disanka diebe
Nomba Dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa muanda mutekete nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshiula, kanuenji mudimu, edi ndituku didibo bela mpungi
Yehowa nkayandi wakamulombola, kakadi nzambi wa bende kudiye
Kanungu ka Bumuntu bwa muntu wendenda budi ne tshia kwangatshibwa ne mushinga mukole
Kalongo kisambombo : Bidi bitangila lwendu lwa tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa
Kadi bumuke ku luseke ludi diba dipatukila, kusanganabu mpata munene mu ditunga dia Babilone
Kumubikilaye ne: Abrahame
Kanusangishi tumuma tuonso ludi mu madimi enu, kanuambudi tumuma tuakahona hanshi mu madimi enu, nushiye bintu ebi bia kukuatshisha n abi bahele ne benyi meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Nanku bobu kuanyisha bua kuya ku nzubu kuende
Wewe udi anu mupuwe, kuyi ubasungila

Wewe neubale bidimu bia kubanda kua buloba muanda mutekete, bidimu muanda mutekete misangu muanda mutekete, neubale nunku bidimu muanda mutekete bia kubanda kua buloba misangu muanda mutekete tô ne ku bidimu makumi anai ne tshitema
Nemmanye ne, Nakasangana luse ku mesu kuebe, ne meme ne bantu bebe, kudi kunyi
Mulombodi wa kumpala wa Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika ke udi ubuludika
Udi musue kuangata tumuma tua muan anyi kabidi, anyi

Muntu udi muakane neasangishe butue buonso bua muana wa ngombe, neabuteke ku butshika bua tshitudilu ha muaba mutoke, nebabulamine tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele bu mai a kulengesha hau bubi eu udi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Luhuka mu buatu ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo biakadi n ebe ne nyunyu ne bimuna ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi, bilelangane, bivulangane bia bungi ha buloba
Nanku, bena Kekate kabena ne bua kulenga bintu bia tshijila abi ne bianza to, bualu badi mua kufua
Pashishe Moshe kubabueja mu ntenta
Nudi mua kuupesha benyi badi munkatshi muenu, nansha kusumbisha benyi bakuabu
Binuikala nusesuka bua kulekela kulonda ku nyima kuandi yeye neabashiye mu tshihela, yeye neashihe bantu aba bonso
Ushimbule bioshelu biabo, utshibule bibumba biabo, ukose mpingu yabo ya Bashela
Ke muatshimunaye kabidi bakalenga bonsu banudi nusangana dishiya dia musulu wa Yardene
Isalele wakabisha luendu luandi, wakashimika ntenta yandi ku nyima kua tshibumba tshinene tshia Ede
Muntu yonsu udi ulenga tshintu tshivua muena disama edi musombe, neapie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Bilulu bitanu nebikale bituangane ne bilulu bitanu bikuabo, binga bilulu bitanu nebikale bituangane ne bilulu bitanu bikuabo
Bitata abi bivua bivuluija bena Izrayele ne: muntu udi kayi wa ku ndelanganyi ya Arone, kena mua kuoshila Maweja Nangila musenga wa kamonya to
Kadi yeye wakabambila ne, Nudi bafuba, nudi bafuba, ne bua bualu ebu nudi nuamba ne, Witabushe bua tuye kushihela Yehowa nyama
Yeye kakalenga tshianza tshiandi ha bantu banene ba Bena Isalele, bakamona Nzambi, bakadia bidia, bakanua
Kutshiompakajaye tshiluilu atshi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata bintu bia manananshi a mushinga mukole bia stacte ne onyx ne gabanum, bintu bia manananshi matambe buimpe, widikishe bintu bionso ne tshihiminu tshimue
Avua muwule ne manananshi tente
Genese Badi Bahanyisha Yosefe Badi Baya n Andi mu Ejipitu Yakoba wakashikama mu buloba buakadi tatu andi mushikame mu buloba bua Kanâna
Moshe kumona muvua tshipuka tshitema kapia katshiyi tshipia tshibutuka
Ndi mumvue miadi ya bantu banyi
Belâma wakabandisha mesu andi, wakatangila Bena Isalele bashikama ku milongo ya bisamba biabo, Nyuma wa Nzambi wakalua kudiye
Badi bamumanyisha mu dibweela dia tshilumbulwilu dia ku mêsu a bantu bônso

Ku nyima kua malu au bakambila Abalahama ne, Mona, Mileka wakalelela muan enu Naho bana, dina dia muan a bute ne, Uza, ne dina dia muakuny andi ne Buza, ne Kemuele, tatu wa Alama ne Kesede ne Hazo ne Piledasha ne Yidilafa ne Betuele
Nuye luseke ludi ne mikuna, muaba udibu base kudi bena Amore

Bikala muntu munkatshi muenu udi kayi muakane bua malu akamukuata butuku, hashishe yeye neaye ku mpenge kua tshitudilu, kabuedi mu tshitudilu; kadi hafika dilolo, yeye neowe mai, ne habuela diba, yeye neahingane mu tshitudilu
Awu kulonda bena Izrayele, bualu bena Izrayele bavua bapatuke mu Ejipitu bu bantu bakadi mua kudienzela malu
Ke kuvua ndimi ya kapia ilakuka, iya mulu, yenza mavuba a muinshi mufike
Yehowa wakabidika mesu a Belâma, ne yeye wakamona muanjelo wa Yehowa muimane mu nshala, ne muele wa nvita mu tshianza tshiandi, yeye wakinama mutu wandi, wakatua mpala hanshi
Ufunde mena abu, bituadije ku bana batekete ba ngondu umue ne pa mutu too ne ku bantu bakulumpe, bilondeshile meku abu ne bisamba biabu

Yeye wakamuambila ne, Wangate lukungulu lua ngombe lua bidimu bisatu, ne dishina dia mbushi dia bidimu bisatu, ne tshimpanga tshia mukoko tshia bidimu bisatu, ne nyunyu wa nkutshi ne mputu nyunyu Yeye wakangata bintu ebi bionso, wakabihanda nseke, wakateka luseke eku luseke eku, kadi yeye kakahanda nyunyu nseke
Yakoba wakalamba bintu bia kudia, Esau wakahingana mu tshisuku, wakadi muhungila
Ndaku
Mulume wakidika bimuna bionso ne nyunyu yonso ya mu diulu ne bimuna bionso bia mu madimi mena abi, kadi mulume kakadi ne mukuatshishi wa bu muakadiye nansha
Budi butshimuna badi bakubenga
Mu nzubu wa tshijila wa Maweja Nangila, ke munudi mua kudila biakudia bia tshijila, pamue ne bena meku enu bonsu
Wakindila matuku muanda mute kete makuabo, waka tuma nyunyu wa nkutshi kabidi, ne nyunyu kakahingana kudiye kabidi tshiendelele
Tatuende muenu umona bionsu bivua Moshe wenzela bantu, kukonkaye Moshe ne: Udi wenza mudimu anu nkayebe bua tshinyi
Bavua benza mudimu muaba wa tshijila mu dina dia bena Izrayele bonsu
Ke muvua Mvidi Mukulu mujikije mudimu wa kufuka diulu ne buloba nanku
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Kutushiyi, ndi nkusengelela, bualu bua wewe udi mumanye ne, Tuetu netuikale mu tshihela, wewe newikale bu mesu etu
Neabafile kunudi, bua mbatshimune bonsu, nubabutule
Nanku nenuikale bena diakalenga mu ditunga, dindi meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupeshe bua nushalemu ne muoyi matuku a bungi
Bimuna bionso bidi ne mikono mihanduluke, bidi bihingishilula bintu mukana: nudi mua kudia nyama ei
Bualu meme Maweja Nangila ndi munkatshi muabu
Muntu awu afile kabidi milambu iwaye kayi mufile
Uteke mabue awu mu mushete
Dina dia Muena Isalele wakashihabo ne mukashi wa Bena Midiyana diakadi Zimeli, muana mulume wa Salu, mukelenge wa nsubu ya batatu abo ya Bena Shimeona
Udi ushikama nkayebe ne bantu bimana ku mpala kuebe dinda tô ne ku dilolo munyi
Mpunde, tubalu, tumelu, ngombe, mikoku ne mbuji, bionsu nebibutuke
Isalele udi ushikama biandi talalâ, mpokolo wa Yakoba udi ha nkayandi mu madimi a blé ne a nvinyo mihia mihia: ne matutu andi adi amatshisha dibungi
Butshia muanabute kuambila muakunyende ne: Ngaladi ne tatu butuku ebu
Au mmeku a Dana ku meku abo
Ekesode Nzambi Udi Ubaka Mona Bakabika mu Elima ne Bena Isalele bonso, bakalua mu tshihela, dina diatshi Sina, hankatshi ha Elima ne Sinai
Bena Isalele Badi Bahita Sihona Bukole Nom
Bakabihata ku mesu kua Palô
Kadi Maweja Nangila kubabutula bonsu munkatshi mua mayi
Tshiji tshiabo tshidi tshiedibue mulau, bualu bua tshiakatamba bukole ne bualu bua lukina luabo kaluakadi ne luse, nembatahulule mu Yakoba, nembamuangalashe mu Isalele
Nudimuke mu malu onso anakanuambila, kanuambilanganyi dina dia nzambi mikuabo, bantu bakuabo kabunvu dina adi mukana muebe
Mvidi Mukulu kumuandamuna ne: Meme ndi nebe
Moshe kuebeja Maweja Nangila ne: Bantu aba badi bakeba kungasa mabue bua kunshipa, mbenzele tshinyi
Beena bukalenga bunene badibo bafunda badi ne tshia kudilekeela mudimu

Kanungu ka Padiku mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi mbulamatadi wa bilwilu, Mulombodi wa ditunga udi wangata ,mu olodonase mushintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, mapangadika adi akengedibwa bwa kujikija bwaalu

Tubadi ne tubinadi, twa beena mwaabo ne twa basalayi, tudi tulonda ndondu ya pankatshi pa matunga idi ditunga ditaba mu njila mululame, mêyi, mapangadika maludiki, padiwo kâyi abengangana ne mêyi ne mikandu ne kabukulu kadi kafila bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne bibidilu bia mulowu
Esau Udi Uhana Bintu bia Buan a Bute Bana aba bakadiunda, Esau wakadi tshilembi tshidi ne budimu bua bungi, Yakoba wakadi biandi munda mukole, wakashikama mu ntenta

Ebi mbintu bidibo ne bualu bua kutuala, mu mudimu udibo benza mu ntenta wa kusambakena mabaya a nsubu ne mitshi yandi ne makunshi andi ne nkanu yandi, ne makunshi a ku luhangu ne nkanu yau ne milonda yau ne nshinga yau ne bintu biau bionso bidibo benza n abi mudimuku mena abi wewe neubaleshe bintu bia majitu abo
Kuatayi ditunga diende, nuasemu
Neulele bana anu mu dikenga
Biakuma ngombe mulume anyi mukashi ne nsengu yandi ne biafueye, nebakume ngombe mabue, kabadi munyinyi wandi nansha, kadi muena ngombe neabinge
Hakashikama Abalama mu buloba bua Kanâna to bidimu dikumi, Salai, mukashi wa Abalama, wakangata Hagâ, Muena Ejipitu, muena mudimu wandi, wakamuha kudi Abalama, mulume wandi, amubake bu mukashi wandi
Pashishe kuambilaye Moshe ne: Newambile bena Izrayele ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu, wa Abrahame, wa Izake ne wa Yakobe mmuntume kunudi
Âpakashada wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu ne bitanu, wakalela Shela Hakalela Âpakashada Shela, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama mai ne bidimu bisatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Nenuenzeleku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshioshelu ne mabue, kanuoshi tshiamu ha mutu hau
Bakabika ne dinda, bakahingana, Isaka wakabatuma kuabo, bakaya talala
Hanuabuela mu budimi bua tumuma bua mukuenu, nudi mua kudia tumuma kukuta tente, kadi kanuangatshi tumuma mu tshisaka
Wangate manyi adibo bela ha mutu, wamiamine ha nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne ha bintu bionso bidimu, ujidile nsubu ne bintu biandi bionso, neikale mujidila
Munazi neabeye nsuki ya ha mutu ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena neangate nsuki, neayiteke ha kahia kadi kuinshi kua mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala
Kubadikaye bamuanabute ba balume ba bena Izrayele bonsu
Bilobu bia bena Mowabe kuzakala
Bungi bua Bena Isalele buakabalabo buakadi binunu nkama isambombo ne tshimue ne nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi asatu
Timena wakadi mue na mudimu wa bakashi wa Elifasa, muana wa Esau, ne yeye wakalelela Elifasa Amaleka, aba mbana ba balume ba Ada, mukashi wa Esau

Bualu bua buloba bunuyaya kuhiana kabuena bu buloba bua Ejipitu munuakumuka, bunuakakuna ntete yenu, nuakayimiamina mai nuendakana ku makasa, bu tshibanda tshia midioko; kadi buloba bunuyaya kuhiana mbuloba bua mikuna ne bibanda, buloba ebu budi bumina mai a nvula ya mu diulu, buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ulama; mesu a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, atu atangila ha buloba abu ku tshibangidilu tshia tshidimu tô ne kunshikidilu kuatshi
Lote kupatuka mu nzubu, kuinjila tshiibi, kubambila ne: Bana betu, ndi nnusengelela ne: kanuenzedi bantu aba bibi nanku to
Muakuidi neanyukule bintu ebi ne mampa a bintu biakahuolabo diambedi ne bana ba mikoko babidi bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa, nebikale bintu bia tshijila kudi Yehowa bualu bua muakuidi
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Nutungunuke ne luendu too ne ku mikuna ya Lebanone, ne ku musulu munene wa Perate
Tangilai, kabena balue ne mashi a mulambu mu nsubu munda mua tshitendelelu; nuakadi kûdia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bu munakamba

Kadi mundi udi kayi munyanguke, ne udi kayi muye ku luendu, udi uhidia kuvuluka kuhita kua Yehowa, nebumushe muntu au munkatshi muabo; bualu bua yeye kakafila mulambu wa Yehowa mu tshikondo tshiau, muntu au neadituadile bubi buandi
Yeye wakambila bana babo ne Bakumpingashila argent yanyi, idi mu tshibombi, mitshima yabo ya kahandika, bakazakala, bakambila ngana ne, Bualu ebu buakutuenzela Nzambi budi tshinyi
Yeye wakalua muntu munene be, wakatamba kudiunda bunene, wakadi ne bisumbu bia mikoko ne bia ngombe ne bantu ba bungi ku nyima kuandi
Nashona muana mulume wa Aminadaba neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Yuda
Kadi nenjadike tshihungidi tshiandi ne Isaka, wakulelela Sala tshidimu tshialua hakumbana ngondo yandi

Muakuidi nealue n andi ha buihi, neamuteke ku mpala kua Yehowa ne muakuidi neangate mai a tshijila mu tshivuadi tshia dima, neangate dinfuenkenya dia buloba didi hanshi mu ntenta wa kusambakena, neadiele mu mai
Bena Izrayele kusopa buloba kuenza madiotu, kudimina bena Ejipitu madimi
Kekate ke nkambua wa bena Kekate, badi batapulukangana meku anayi: dia bena Amrame, dia bena Ishare, dia bena Ebrone ne dia bena Uziyele
Batentekedi badi bamanyisha Moshe bivuabu bamone Matuku makumi anayi mamane kupita, batentekedi kujikija mudimu wabu
Muinshi uvua ubanda bu tshikutu tshia kapia
Muana wa bakashi wa Palô wakamuambila ne, Wangate muana eu, umungamushile mabele, nenkufute Mukashi wakangata muana, wakamuamusha mabele
Muakuidi neatangile ha munyinyi wa mubidi mubishe, neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane, munyinyi eu mubishe kawena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi
Bidimu bia Adame pa buloba bidi nkama tshitema ne makumi asatu
Kabatangidi lue vene mu miaba yenu yonso tô matuku muanda mutekete; kanushiyi munyinyi unuakashiha wa milambu dilolo dia dituku dia ku mpala butuku buonso tô ne ku dinda
Kadi minyinyi yonsu ya mu mayi idi kayiyi ne misalala nansha ne mamba, kanuyidi to, nansha tusha tudi tuvuandulula mayi, nansha tunyinyi tukuabu tua mu mayi
Muntu yonso udi ulumbuluisha benyi anyi bana ba nshiya anyi bakashi ba mu lufuila dilumbulula didi kadiyi diakane udi ne mulau
Abalahama wakitabusha dî dia Efelona Abalahama wakamuidikishila bungi bua argent buakalombeye ku mpala kua bana ba Hete, nshekele ya argent nkama mai bu muakitabusha bahanyi ba bintu
Agare kudikonka ne: Ndi mumone Udi mummone anyi
Nanku nenubinyenge ditunga adi bua nusombemu
Lekela bena Izrayele, baye kutendelela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wabu, bualu ditunga dia Ejipitu didi mua kubutuka
Kuedi manyi au ham bidi ha bantu, kabena manyi mafuanangane n au, wowo adi a tshijima, neikale a tshijila kunudi
Yai, muana mulume wa Manashe, wakangata luseke luonso lua Âgoba tô ne ku butshika bua Bena Geshû ne Bena Mâka, wakidika buloba bua Bashana bu dina diandi ne, Hawota yai tô ne ku dituku edi

Nunku bakumuka ku nsubu wa tshitendelelu wa Kola ne Datana ne Abalama ku nseke yonso: ne Datana ne Abilama bakaluhuka, bakimana ku mbelu kua ntenta yabo ne bakashi babo ne bana babo balume ne bana babo bakese
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana, Amiele, muana mulume wa Gemali
Bualu bua meme nempite buloba bua Ejipitu butuku abu, nenshihe ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ba bantu ne ba nyama; nendumbuluishe nzambi yonso ya Ejipitu, meme ndi Yehowa
Nansha nanku, bwa bidi bitangila dîyi dia lupetu, badi ne tshia kufila tshingenyingenyi mu tshipungu tshidibo balêja mu kanungu ka , ku Bilo bia Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka

Enza biebe tshilulu tshinene tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzu ne bua lin udi mutambe buimpe utshienzeshe kudi bantu badi ne lungenyi lule badi bamanye mua kuenza tshifuanyikishi tshia bakeluba mu tshilulu atshi
Tunkanunuina tua Sheme Kul
Badi bapatukila mu masungulangana a kudi bônso diakamwe ne muntu ne muntu pa nkayenda
Moshe kubambila ne: Panudi nukumbaja bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila munuambile bua kuenza, yeye neadileje kunudi ne butumbi buende
Moshe
Lengesha makunshi onso ne tshiamu tshia argent, ne bitubuidi bia argent ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku
Wakenza nsengu ku matumba anai, wakenza nsengu ne tshituha tshijima, wakalamata tshiamu tshia mitaku ku nseke yonso

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nudi bantu ba buhidia bukole, binaya bianyi munkatshi muenu anu tshituha tshikese, nennushihe, nunku nuvule bintu bia kudilengesha n abi, bua meme mmanye tshindi mua kunuenzela

Nudimuke, kanuedianganyi meji mabi mu mitshima yenu ne, Tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete, tshidibo balekelelangana bintu tshikadi ha kulua, ne kanuenzedi muan enu muhele bibi, bua kubenga kumuha tshintu; bua kadidi kudi Yehowa bualu buebe, ne bua wewe kushadi ne bubi
Bana ba balume ba Bileha, muena mudimu wa bakashi wa Lakele, bakadi Dana ne Nafatale
Meme ke Mvidi Mukulu wa bukole buonsu uvua mumuenekele Abrahame, Izake ne Yakobe
Tubakilangane n enu, nuenu nufîle bana benu ba bakashi kutudi ne nuangate bana betu ba bakashi kunudi
Tshisamba tshia Shimeyone:
Kadi kabena batupa bisosa bia kuenza nabi mudimu wa madiotu to
Nenubutuke mu ditunga edi dimpe, didiye unupesha
Bamue kuambula bia bungi, bakuabu kuambula bikese
